Description: reported this by the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak. He terrorized the district center, Marganetska, Pokrovska, Myrivska and Chervonogrigorivska communities. There were two fires, which the rescuers put out. 5 private houses, 2 farm buildings were damaged, another one was destroyed. 2 cars and a truck were gutted. Damaged infrastructure, gas stations, power lines, gas pumps. People were not injured. We remind you, from since the beginning of the day, 91 skirmishes took place at the front. Our defenders stop the enemy, hold the lines and destroy the plans of the Russians. At the same time, the occupiers continue to concentrate their efforts on the Lyman, Pokrovsky, Kurakhiv, Vremiv directions and Kurshchyna.

Title: The President of Ukraine discussed the situation in Georgia with the President of Georgia
Description: About this go on the President's website. The head of state expressed support and solidarity with the Georgian people, who are now defending their future in the European Union and opposing the government's decision to suspend negotiations on EU accession until 2028. -We are with your people, of course, and always on the side of your country - your way of life and your choice of future membership in the EU and NATO. Always with your people. We see everything, we support,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy said. The situation in Georgia is a key topic discussed during the meeting. Salome Zurabishvili spoke about the mass violations during the recent parliamentary elections in Georgia, in particular about the restrictions on the voting rights of Georgians living abroad. According to her, large-scale demonstrations against election falsification and forceful suppression and intimidation of protesters continue in Georgia. The President of Georgia thanked for all the support shown and welcomed Ukraine's decision to apply sanctions against the founder of the -Georgian Dream- party Bidzina Ivanishvili and 18 of his accomplices - Georgian officials, including against Prime Minister Irakli Kobakhidze. According to Volodymyr Zelenskyi, these are sanctions against those persons who are pushing the independent Georgian people in another direction – towards Russia. -We really wanted to show our partners, who are very strong in the world - the EU, the United States - that we should be with you, with Georgia, with your people,- concluded the President. We remind you, in Paris, President Volodymyr Zelenskyi met with the Federal Chancellor of Austria Karl Neghammer and discussed the continuation of support for Ukraine.

Title: Andriy Yusov: The so-called Russian Federation is a constant threat to free humanity and progress
Description: About this reports Main Intelligence Department of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. -The so-called Russian Federation, no matter what this empire was called at different periods of history, is a threat to free humanity, to progress, but now, first of all, to our physical safety, to the safety of our children, our society and the country. There is no reason to think that the Kremlin's plans have changed or that Putin will suddenly wake up and think that he has been doing something wrong for the past three years or ten years,- Andriy Yusov emphasized. In addition, Andriy Yusov talked about the change in enemy tactics and the challenges for Ukrainian intelligence, effective opposition to the Putin regime, the role of the latest technologies in the war - drones, artificial intelligence and cyber attacks, details of the support of Russian aggression from North Korea, and the participation of Kirill Budanov in the liberation of territories. We remind you that the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine showed an effective destruction of equipment and of the occupiers's manpower.

Title: Up to 12 years behind bars: a resident of the Kharkiv region was sentenced for leaking information a...
Description: reports this by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. She was sentenced to 12 years in prison. Prosecutors proved that from May to July 2023, the convicted woman sent text messages to an agent of the Russian Federation with data on the movement and location of military equipment and personnel of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Kharkiv region via messenger. This information was then passed on to representatives of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation for use during hostilities. The convicted woman will be in custody until the verdict enters into force. We remind you, an ex-policeman was sentenced to 15 years in prison for cooperation with the occupiers.

Title: Volodymyr Zelenskyi met with the Chancellor of Austria and discussed the restoration of the energy i...
Description: About this goes on the website of the President of Ukraine. The President thanked Austria for humanitarian and financial assistance to Ukraine since the beginning of the full-scale Russian invasion. The head of state emphasized that Ukraine expects continued aid next year, particularly in humanitarian demining, treatment and rehabilitation of wounded civilians, and is also interested in the participation of Austrian companies in the reconstruction of the country. The president also noted that it is important to support our energy system during the winter and protect people from Russian aerial terror. In particular, there is a need to build shelters in schools and hospitals. The Chancellor of Austria assured the continuation of aid to Ukraine and support of sanctions pressure on the Russian Federation. In particular, one of the topics discussed during the meeting was Europe's energy independence from Russian energy sources. Volodymyr Zelenskyi and Karl Negammer paid special attention to the steps that should be taken to force Russia to establish a lasting and just peace. The head of state also invited Austria to join the G7 Joint Declaration on support for Ukraine and to conclude a bilateral agreement on long-term support in the future. In addition, the President talked about all the efforts of Ukraine to return illegally deported Ukrainian children to the Russian Federation and the obstacles that Russia creates on this path. We remind you that the in the area of ​​responsibility of the -Khortytsya- military defense unit, it remains tense, but controlled by the Defense Forces.

Title: - We are constantly working to ensure that the lands along the state border, in accordance with the ...
Description: He stated this during the telethon -Edyny Novyni-. Along the length of the border, this shade can be from 30 to 50 meters. And if we talk about the border with Belarus and Russia, this section can be wider - up to two kilometers, but it is not necessary that all this land is transferred to the property of the military units of the DPSU. It is necessary to understand that the lands can be state property, communal, private, and there are also lands along the border belonging to the nature reserve fund. And if we talk about the last category, then they can be of state or local importance. And it is precisely in order to transfer the lands of state reserves to military units that there should be a Presidential Decree. Therefore, the relevant Decree of December 5 reduces the land of the Chernobyl reserve and the land with a width of 45 meters along the state border is transferred to the ownership of the military units of the DPSU for the arrangement and maintenance of engineering and fortification facilities. This will allow us to continue increasing the engineering arrangement of the border, maintenance of crossings, border signs, equipping technical systems of terrain control, video surveillance systems. So that we have proper arrangements on the state border in a direction that is threatening to us. We continue to strengthen the border with Belarus along its entire length, because this is a threatening direction for us as long as Belarus remains under the influence of Russia. We must have strong defensive positions there to repel any attack should the situation change. At the moment, Russia does not have a sufficient number of units, forces and means on the territory of Belarus that could pose a threat to us. We remind you, situation in the area of ​​responsibility of the -Khortytsya- military defense unit, it remains tense, but controlled by the Defense Forces.

Title: the kremlin drags on the war with a cheap mortgage
Description: This is reported by Foreign Intelligence Service of Ukraine. Despite huge budget payments to ordinary Russians for those who volunteer to sign a contract to participate in the war, the Kremlin faces a steady decline in the number of people willing to fight. Instead, high losses require a constant supply of manpower. Under such circumstances, the Russian authorities invent new and new forms of encouragement that would force the residents of the Russian Federation to go and kill Ukrainians. Subsidized mortgages are another attempt to solve the issue of reducing army recruitment. Currently, the mortgage rate without benefits reaches 35% in the Russian Federation. There is also a so-called preferential -family mortgage-, where the rate is about 6%, but this program is constantly underfunded from the budget. Because of this, the first installment on a preferential mortgage has already been raised to 50%, which makes it unaffordable for most Russians. We remind you that EU countries on the eve of Donald's inauguration Trump's initiative to create a fund for joint defense projects and arms purchases is being discussed.

Title: The situation in the area of ​​responsibility of the OSUV - Khortytsia - remains tense, but controll...
Description: This was stated by Lt. Col. Nazar Voloshyn, spokesman for the -Khortytsia- OSU. -Of course, the situation is changing dynamically, and in our area of ​​responsibility, 150 clashes with the enemy took place per day. The enemy attacked the Pokrovsky, Kurakhivskyi and Vremiivskyi directions the most. There were 48 enemy assaults in the Pokrovsky direction, 35 in the Kurakhivskyi direction, and 21 in the Vremiivskyi direction. Also, during the past day, the enemy in our area of ​​responsibility carried out 5 airstrikes, dropped 8 guided and aerial bombs, carried out more than 3,200 attacks on populated areas with various types of weapons and 250 strikes with kamikaze drones,- he emphasized. Already this day, 11 enemy assaults took place, which carried out more than 300 attacks on positions and populated areas using various types of weapons. The enemy is trying to carry out active offensive actions, but the Defense Forces restrain the offensive, inflicting considerable losses on him both in manpower and in equipment. The Kurakhiv direction is important for the enemy to align the front line. This will allow him to regroup, withdraw some units for recovery, and then, having accumulated resources, conduct further offensive actions. The Vremiiv direction in the northwest of the Donetsk region is also a priority for the enemy, because it is one of the elements of the Kurakhiv-Pokrovsky offensive. The day before yesterday, the enemy was more active there, there were 37 enemy assaults. However, the Defense Forces, having recaptured the settlement of Novy Komar, improved their tactical position. In the Pokrovsky direction, the formations of two Russian combined armies are concentrated against us. These are the 2nd and 41st armies of the -Center- troop group. In the Kramatorsk direction, near Chasovoy Yar, the 98th Airborne Division, which was twice defeated by our defenders, and which was repeatedly replenished with personnel, is standing against us. In the Pokrovsky direction, one of our brigades restrains the assaults of four motorized rifle brigades of the Russian army at once, one of which is the 74th motorized rifle brigade. The enemy is trying to move its personnel and equipment between directions in the east of Ukraine. In particular, in the Pokrovsky, Kurakhivskyi, Vremiivskyi and Toretsk directions. Where he suffers a significant defeat, he tries to compensate for the lost forces and resources from other directions. We remind you that Oleksandr Syrsky released the video, on which our drones destroy enemy equipment and infantry.

Title: Border guards demonstrate meticulous and methodical destruction of Russians
Description: About informs State Border Service of Ukraine. The strikes also hit field depots of ammunition and fuel and lubricants, eliminating important resources of the occupiers. In addition, the control point of enemy drones was destroyed. The effective work of the -Phoenix- border guards once again demonstrates the indomitability and strength of the Ukrainian defenders, who methodically deprive the enemy of combat capabilities. As reported by ArmyInform, The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces showed an effective defeat equipment and manpower of the occupiers.

Title: A traitor in uniform: an ex-policeman was sentenced to 15 years in prison for collaborating with the...
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this. Prosecutors proved that during the occupation of Shevchenkive village of Kupyan district, the former policeman voluntarily went over to the side of the enemy. In July 2022, he submitted an application to the so-called -military-civilian administration of the Kharkiv region- to join a pseudo-law enforcement agency and concluded an -employment contract.- Initially, he was given the position of -acting precinct police inspector-, and in September 2022 he was promoted to -chief of police station No. 2- in the village. Before the liberation of Kharkiv Oblast by the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the ex-policeman fled to the Russian Federation together with the Russian military. He is wanted, and the terms of serving the sentence will begin to be calculated after his arrest. As reported by ArmyInform, gave over 120,000 liters of diesel fuel to the occupiers, instead of pouring it over and burning it them: a traitor was sentenced in Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: The enemy is concentrating its efforts on Kurshchyna: more than 90 clashes with the Russians per day
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The border regions of Chernihiv Oblast were hit by Russian artillery shelling. Today, the enemy attacked the settlements of Vilchyki and Senkivka. In the Kharkiv direction Defense forces repelled one assault by enemy troops near Vovchansk. On the Kupyansk direction, the enemy tried five times during the day to advance to our positions in the Lozova, Masyutivka and Zeleny Gayu areas. Three skirmishes continue. The aggressor increased the number of attacks to 15 in the Limansky direction. Attacked near Tverdokhlibovo, Kopanok, Bohuslavka, Grekivka, Cherneshchyna, Makiivka, Zarichny, Terni and Yampolivka. Eight clashes are currently ongoing. In the Kramatorsk direction, our defenders repelled four attacks by the occupiers in the areas of Chasovoy Yar, Stupochky and Bila Hora. Two more attacks are ongoing. In the Toretsk direction the enemy tried to advance five times in the Toretsk, Dilyivka and Nelipivka districts. There is currently one battle in progress. Enemy activity currently persists in the Pokrovsky direction. Clashes of varying intensity have started here 13 times today. Enemy attacks were repulsed in the districts of Promenya, Lysivka, Dachenskyi, Pushkini, Zori, and Novotroitskyi. Currently, six clashes are still ongoing. Fierce battles are taking place in the Kurakhiv direction. During the day, 19 combat clashes took place near Sontsivka, Zora, Kurakhovo, Elizavetivka, Romanivka, Hannivka, Uspenivka, Rozlyv, and Neskuchny, and eight attacks by the occupiers are ongoing. In the Vremivsk direction the aggressor attacked the positions of our defenders 10 times in the area of ​​the settlements of Vesely Gay, Kostyantynopolske, Sukhyi Yaly, Novodarivka, Novosilka, Temyrivka, five clashes are ongoing. In the Dnieper direction Defense forces repelled one enemy assault. In Kurshchyna, Ukrainian defenders are still repelling 10 attacks by invaders, a total of 16 clashes have been recorded in the direction today. There were no significant changes in the situation in the rest of the directions. Ukrainian troops are exhausting the enemy along the entire line of battle and in the rear. As reported by ArmyInform, the occupiers attack with columns -head on-: marines told about the specifics of the battles in Kurshchyna.

Title: A helicopter destroys -Shahed-, naval drones launch drones: a stream from a front-line city
Description: Taurian paratroopers from the 79th brigade dismantled another column of Russians in the Kurakhiv direction. As a result, two armored vehicles of the occupiers were burned, 27 Russians were killed, and another 12 were wounded. Shahed was destroyed with the help of a Mi-8 helicopter. Two Ukrainian helicopters escorted the Shahed-136 attack UAV outside the city. When he flew over the forest, he was fired from an on-board machine gun. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - Captain Artem Golub and Lieutenant Yevhen Nazarenko

Title: Collaborators at the maintenance of Luhansk region prepare children for -their-
Description: This is reported by a> Center of national resistance. The main condition for victory was the ability to control drones. According to the -educators-, it was the control of the drones, as well as the best results in the dress and song competition, that showed that the children were continuing the age-old Cossack traditions. -After all, such talents demonstrate the readiness of young men and women to join the ranks of the Kremlin army at any moment,- the organizers said. The students of the fake Luhansk Cossack Cadet Corps won. Distorting the historical truth, brainwashing is the Kremlin's tradition, which criminally takes root in all territories where the occupiers set foot. The topic of Cossacks is particularly distorted for propagandists. And it is mostly used in schools. Cossacks in Ukrainian schools in the temporarily occupied territories have already become teachers. For example, in the Kherson region, these representatives of the occupation forces conduct lessons on so-called political information. Children are told about how Russian peace is being implemented on Ukrainian lands destroyed by them, films are shown about the beauty of the Russian Federation and how important it is to become a part of Russia. We remind you that the occupiers use the labor of people with disabilities to -own- needs.

Title: The commander-in-chief showed a spectacular defeat of the equipment and manpower of the occupiers
Description: He showed the corresponding video on his official page. The shots show the accuracy and precision of the defenders, who with their resets turn the enemy's equipment into scrap metal, and the Russians are sent to the kobzon. We remind you that in the Kurakhiv direction, the Russians keep their large presence and do not lose their ambitious plans to move forward. However, they are hindered by the successful combat operations of our fighters.

Title: Numerous victims of attacks in the Kherson region: the enemy continues insidious attacks on the civi...
Description: informs Kherson OVA about this. In the village of Kindiyka, a 46-year-old man was injured as a result of such an attack: he received a mine-explosive injury and shrapnel wounds to his arms and legs. The victim was hospitalized. Another victim was a 35-year-old resident of Antonivka. An hour ago, a Russian drone dropped explosives, causing the man a mine-explosive injury and shrapnel wounds to the chest and arm. Yesterday evening, another Kherson resident was injured by a drone strike. A 46-year-old man suffered a mine-explosive injury and hypertensive crisis. A few days ago, as a result of Russian shelling, a 62-year-old resident of the Kherson region suffered an explosive injury and shrapnel wounds to the lower leg. Two men who were attacked by drones the day before also needed medical help. Among them is a 79-year-old resident of Kindyika, who received a mine-explosive injury and shrapnel wounds to the torso, forearm and leg. His condition is currently being checked by doctors. In Bilozerka, the occupiers threw explosives on a civilian car. A 73-year-old man was injured, who received a mine-explosive injury and a concussion. As ArmiyaInform reported, Russian troops shelled a village in Zaporizhzhia: a civilian died.

Title: The occupiers use the labor of people with disabilities for their needs
Description: This is reported by Center of National Resistance. Here, patients are forced to carry out plans to manufacture so-called aid for the needs of terrorists. First of all, it is about weaving camouflage nets. The occupiers of using the labor of people with disabilities cynically argue that weaving has healing properties for the sick and develops fine motor skills. The Russian occupiers' use of the labor of the unprotected population of the temporarily occupied territories of Ukraine is a -normal practice-. Since the beginning of the year, the Luhansk character of the Kremlin program has been actively implemented in the schools of the Luhansk region. Pupils organize propaganda events, in particular, make trench candles for terrorists of the Russian army. We remind you that the enemy is terrorizing agrarians from temporarily occupied Ukraine with innovations.

Title: EU countries plan to create a fund to strengthen defense potential
Description: About this informs the Foreign Intelligence Service of Ukraine. Funds are planned to be raised by placing bonds under national guarantees of participating countries. The model will involve both EU member states and non-EU states (Great Britain, Norway). Participation in the fund will be voluntary, which will allow neutral countries (Ireland, Austria, Malta, Cyprus) to refuse the project, but not to veto it. The estimated amount of funding could be at least 500 billion euros – the minimum required to meet Europe's defense needs over the next decade. Implementation of the project will be an important step towards strengthening the defense potential of the EU. The initiative already has the support of the Netherlands, Finland, and Denmark. We remind you, the second batch of F-16 for Ukraine from Denmark is already in Ukraine.

Title: The occupiers attack with columns -head-on-: the marines told about the specifics of the battles in ...
Description: About this on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- Aeneas told the spokesman for the 36th Separate Brigade of Marines named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Bilinskyi. According to the spokesman, only today the brigade destroyed four units of armored vehicles - BMD and BMP. In total, in the Kursk direction, the brigade destroyed more than 24 units of armored vehicles, two tanks, 26 units of KAMAZ-type vehicles, passenger cars, ATVs, and also removed more than 1,000 personnel. -The Russians are attacking in columns, head-on, trying to break the morale and fighting spirit of the Ukrainian defenders, as well as to mask some actions where, in their opinion, they have some success. But luckily for us, they have no success, painstaking combat work is going on every day,- noted -Enei-, the spokesman emphasized that they do not ignore any Russian occupier, they understand this, that's why many of their infantry go to deserters. -The enemy is trying to land those who are left closer to our positions so that they somehow conduct combat operations against such legendary brigades as ours and neighboring ones,- the speaker noted. The specificity of the work in the Kursk region is that maneuver work is carried out - both defense and offensive. -This is used by both the enemy and us. However, many enemy infantry do not even reach the point they were assigned. And because of the great losses, they are not morally ready to fight even in the Kursk region, not ready to perform the tasks that their leadership sets them,- Eneis summarized. As reported by ArmyInform, drones and DRGs are not so effective in the rear: what winter changed at the front.

Title: Agrarians from temporarily occupied Ukraine are being terrorized by the enemy with an innovation
Description: reports this Center of national resistance. the Kremlin obliged farmers to obtain Russian-style driver's licenses for tractor drivers. The process of replacing the document will continue until the end of December 2025. If the farmers do not fulfill the new conditions of the Russian terrorists, their equipment will be confiscated. Meanwhile, in the temporarily occupied Zaporizhzhia, Putin's henchmen began to fight hysterically over possible farmers' riots. After all, due to total looting, terror and confiscation of property, farmers cannot withstand the conditions in which the Kremlin forced them. We remind you, in the Vasylivsky district, the Russian occupiers fired artillery attack on the village of Primorske.

Title: Consequences of the drone attack in the Kyiv region: there is damage to private houses
Description: This was reported by the head of the Kyiv Regional Military Administration, Ruslan Kravchenko. Air defense forces successfully destroyed all enemy targets. There were no casualties among the population, no hits to critical or residential infrastructure were recorded. At the same time, the wreckage of a downed drone caused damage in one of the settlements: Operational groups continue to work on the spot, recording the effects of the attack and assessing the damage. As ArmiyaInform reported, Russian troops shelled a village in Zaporizhzhia: a civilian died.

Title: The occupiers have blocked exits from Aidar and are simulating the restoration of factories
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysohor, head of the Luhansk OVA. The invaders organize queues of cars and check local residents and guests according to their lists. This time, they are looking not only for ATO/OOS members, but also for their relatives, even distant ones. According to Artem Lysohor, this is how Russian law enforcement agencies try to achieve -results- for reporting at the end of the year. At the same time, the occupation authorities announce the attraction of investors to the industrial enterprises of the front-line cities. However, in reality, no activity was observed on the destroyed objects. During the two years of occupation, demining of the territories has not even begun. It is known that the launch of the -Azot- chemical plant in Severodonetsk has been postponed for the -next few years-. Currently, the occupiers are trying to restore only one of dozens of shops, which has been operating as a separate enterprise since the 1990s. Raids and imitation of industrial recovery become a cover for repression and attempts to create the appearance of economic activity in the occupied territories. As reported by ArmyInform, Kysh Babaj and Tol Babaj: occupiers brought fabulous guests from Tatarstan and Udmurtia.

Title: 570 evacuated residents: front-line Donetsk continues to hold the blow
Description: About this informs the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. Pokrovsky district: Kurakhove and nearby villages remain under constant fire. In Pokrovsk, two houses and a gas pipeline were damaged, and in the village of Kotlyne, two people were injured and a house was destroyed. Kramatorsk district: two high-rise buildings and an administrative building were damaged in Lyman. Bakhmut district: damage to five private houses was recorded in Siversk. Four private houses, a high-rise building and an industrial building were damaged in the Chasovoyarsk community. In total, during the day, Russian troops shelled populated areas of the region six times. It was possible to evacuate 570 people from the front line, including 53 children. As reported by ArmyInform, missile and artillery strikes in Kherson Oblast: a child is among the victims.

Title: Ukraine adopts the Croatian experience in anti-mine activities: a workshop within the framework of t...
Description: reports this by the Main Directorate of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security. The educational session covered the following topics: Specialists of the Croatian Mine Action Center shared their 30-year experience in demining territories affected by the 1991-1995 war for independence. They talked about the creation of national demining standards, conducting non-technical surveys, as well as monitoring the work of non-governmental organizations. Special attention was paid to the use of drones equipped with video cameras, magnetometers and other equipment for surveying contaminated areas. In addition, the possibilities of involving IT solutions, interactive databases, maps and artificial intelligence for the analysis of large volumes of data were discussed. Colonel Yevhenii Zubarevskyi, head of the mine action organization department, noted that the Croatian experience will be taken into account during the development of national standards in this area. The head of the CROMAC operations department, Davor Laura, emphasized that modern technologies and innovative approaches used by Croatia are actively studied by the international community. The acquired knowledge already today helps Ukraine to effectively free territories from mines and explosive objects, save the lives of civilians and return land to civilian use. As reported by ArmyInform, Minister of Defense of Ukraine discussed the North Koreans in Kurshchyna with the Japanese ambassador.

Title: Not so effective drones and DRG in the rear: what winter has changed at the front
Description: Oleksandr Danylenko, the head of the group of interaction with the media of the State Border Service -Hart- brigade, told about this on the -Social News- broadcast. In particular, in Vovchansk, the enemy storms up to ten times a day. However, the border guards of the -Hart- brigade repulsed the enemy, intelligence revealed the movement of the enemy, attempts to set up positions. Enemy DRGs are also trying to sneak into the rear, but our guys detect them. Therefore, the situation is under control. -Regroupings associated with fairly large losses occur constantly among the enemy. The number of manpower and equipment is kept at approximately the same level, but this is enough to make breakthrough attempts in the area,- Oleksandr Danylenko noted. In addition, snow and frost leave their mark. At low temperatures, drones, of which there are many, fly less because the batteries drain faster. And when it snows, visibility becomes worse, drones become less effective. -Also, due to the low temperatures, thermal imagers can see people and equipment better, and tracks are better visible on the snow. And this must be taken into account in order to be invisible to the enemy. And the enemy, unfortunately, also takes this into account,- the spokesman noted. Oleksandr Danylenko noted that every day our servicemen with artillery, mortars, and drones destroy enemy positions, equipment, guns, vehicles, mortars, personnel, and destroy their fortifications. -The enemy is suffering significant losses both in manpower and equipment. It's not very easy for him here, that's why he sits and waits, and with the help of the DRG he tries to feel our weak points, but he has no success,- the speaker added. As reported by ArmyInform, in the direction of Kurakhiv Russians maintain their large presence and do not lose their ambitious plans to move forward. However, they are hindered by the successful combat operations of our fighters.

Title: Russian troops shelled a village in Zaporozhye: a civilian was killed
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA. As a result of shelling, a private house was destroyed. Unfortunately, the 65-year-old owner of the house died. The head of the OVA also noted that the service station was destroyed as a result of Friday's enemy strike. The blast wave and debris damaged 5 high-rise buildings, 8 private houses, a dormitory and shops. In addition, 26 have already been injured as a result of an enemy attack on Zaporozhye. 12 people remain in hospitals. Four men are in serious condition. One of them had a traumatic amputation of a limb. Three children are under the supervision of doctors — an 11-year-old boy with soft tissue injuries, a 4-year-old girl with a facial injury, and a four-month-old girl with a bruised abdomen. We will remind you that 10 people died, 24 were injured as a result of the enemy attack of the Russian Federation on Zaporozhye. As reported by ArmyInform, almost 300 times populated areas of Zaporozhye shuddered from Russia's blows.

Title: It's good that there are no shouts -Hurray-: the Russians are storming blindly on buggies and motorc...
Description: The press officer of the 33rd separate mechanized brigade, Nazar Voytenkov, told about this on the -Suspilne Novy- broadcast. -Our defenders are under constant pressure from the enemy, because there are really many Russians. Despite this, every day our UAV units destroy from 5 to 15 enemy soldiers,- he noted. According to observations from the sky, it is clear that they are trying to organize points of accumulation of their strength, warehouses from BC. -We destroy all this and interfere with their logistics. Despite the cold weather, they move on light non-armored vehicles (quad bikes, motorcycles, buggies, pick-up cars), transport personnel to the accumulation points, which we monitor and destroy with preventive pinpoint strikes,- noted Nazar Voytenkov. According to the spokesman, our tankers are working well. Armored groups advance to the front and destroy the enemy literally a few meters away in fortified places, dugouts and other locations. -In the ranks of our enemy there are both trained military personnel and mobilized ones, with which the enemy is renewing its frantic losses. But one should not underestimate the power of the enemy, because whatever they are, there are still a lot of them,- Nazar Voytenkov summarized. As reported by ArmyInform, something like an ear stick or rag: for Russians, their people are just -rozhidnyk-.

Title: The occupiers doubled the use of drones in the Luhansk direction
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysohor, head of the Luhansk OVA. Only in the past day, the occupiers directed 116 drones towards Ukrainian positions. Also, the enemy fired at our defenders nine times with barrel artillery, used rocket artillery and launched an air strike on Novoyehorivka. Ukrainian defenders successfully repelled enemy attacks in the Grekivka, Nadia and Makiivka regions, inflicting significant losses on the enemy. The situation in Luhansk region remains tense, but under the control of the Defense Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, the Armed Forces of Ukraine stopped 177 assaults: the General Staff of the Armed Forces named two areas where the enemy is most active.

Title: Fleeed from Romania to the Armed Forces: details of return after illegal border crossing
Description: About this informs DPSU. The detainee turned out to be a citizen of Ukraine, a resident of Vinnytsia, who is a military serviceman of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In October, he voluntarily left his post and illegally crossed the border. Later, learning about his brother's mobilization to the army, he decided to return to continue defending the country with him. The detained serviceman was informed about the possibility of avoiding punishment for voluntarily leaving the military unit in accordance with Article 401 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine. Currently, the materials on the administrative offense have been compiled, and the man is preparing to resume his service. This case reminds of the new norms of the law, which allow military personnel to return to the ranks of the army without criminal liability in case of voluntary return to service. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces or recruiting centers.

Title: Something like an ear stick or a rag: for Russians, their people are just -raskhodnyk-
Description: Major Anastasia Bobovnikova, the spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU, told about this on the air of -Suspilne Novosti-. However, unfortunately, the Russians are much more numerous than our defenders. And they are able to replenish their losses at the front from the reserves. In the Kramatorsk direction near Chasov Yar, the enemy is accumulating a significant number of troops and is trying to storm. The number of assaults is increasing. In the Seversky direction, the enemy received a good repulse and now does not even try to storm our troops. The enemy almost does not use the equipment in the above-mentioned directions, because it is not effective in urban battles. -Artillery and possibly tanks firing from closed positions are being used. Our FPV drones, artillery, do well with them. Every day we get a good catch - from 3 to 5 units of artillery installations are destroyed,- noted Anastasia Bobovnikova. According to her, there are no big changes in weather conditions. Assaults are increasing, the number of shelling in the area of ​​responsibility of the Luhansk Military Academy is about 1,500 per day, and the number of airstrikes is not decreasing. Yes, recently the enemy carried out 18 airstrikes. As reported by ArmyInform, the Air Defense Forces destroyed half of the drones with which Russia attacked the civilian population.

Title: President: The second batch of F-16 is already in Ukraine
Description: This stated President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy. According to the President, the planes provided by the Danes from the first batch are already shooting down Russian missiles and saving our people, our infrastructure. He also noted that now our air shield is additionally strengthened. -If all partners were just that determined, it would have been possible to make Russian terror impossible. Matt, thank you, your team and all the Danish people!- - emphasized the head of state.

Title: The defense forces damaged the control points of the Russian troops
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. However, our soldiers continue to actively inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying forces, exhausting the enemy along the entire line of battle. Yesterday, the aviation and missile forces and artillery of the Defense Forces carried out five strikes on the areas of concentration of personnel and anti-aircraft defenses of the enemy, and also hit two control points. We remind you that last day, the total losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,300 people. Also, our soldiers neutralized 17 armored combat vehicles, 12 artillery systems, two air defense vehicles, 19 operational-tactical UAVs and 49 vehicles. As reported by ArmyInform, the Armed Forces of Ukraine stopped 177 assaults: the General Staff of the Armed Forces named two areas where the enemy is most active.

Title: Rocket and artillery strikes in the Kherson region: a child is among the victims
Description: This was notified by the head of Kherson OVA Oleksandr Prokudin. Last day Komyshany, Tyaginka, Mykhailivka, Antonivka, Stanislav, Shiroka Balka, Zmiivka, Beryslav, Bilozerka, Veletenske, Tomina Balka, Novokairi, Novovorontsovka, Zorivka, Shlyakhove, Poniativka, Davydiv Brid, Vesele, Mala Oleksandrivka and the city of Kherson. Also, the enemy directed three missile strikes on Beryslav district. According to the head of the OVA, the Russian military attacked the residential quarters of the populated areas of the region, in particular damaged 16 private houses. The occupiers also mutilated a gas pipeline, a granary, a gas station and private cars. According to information of Khersonska ODA, a resident of Vesely was sent to the hospital, who was hit by a Russian drone A 57-year-old man was diagnosed with a mine-explosive injury and leg injuries. In addition, the Russian occupation army attacked Komysany around eight o'clock in the morning. A 53-year-old man was injured as a result of the shelling. He has explosive and craniocerebral injuries, a contusion. As reported by ArmyInform, almost 300 times populated areas of Zaporozhye shuddered from Russia's blows.

Title: Air defense forces destroyed half of the drones that Russia used to attack the civilian population
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As of 8:30 a.m., units of anti-aircraft missile forces, EW and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine shot down 7 enemy UAVs in the Kyiv, Vinnytsia, Odesa, Cherkasy and Zhytomyr regions. It is noted that 6 drones were lost in location, 1 — left the controlled airspace in the direction of the Russian Federation. As reported by ArmyInform, the Armed Forces of Ukraine stopped 177 assaults: the General Staff of the Armed Forces named two areas where the enemy is most active.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Almost 300 times, populated areas of Zaporozhye shuddered from Russian strikes
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhzhya OVA. Russian troops carried out 19 airstrikes on Zaporizhzhia, Novoandriivka, Novopavlivka, and Malia Tokmachka. In addition, 161 UAVs of various modifications attacked Bilenka, Kamianske, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghirya and Novodarivka. According to Ivan Fedorov, 7 rounds of anti-aircraft fire were fired on the territory of Novodanilivka, Novoandriivka and Novodarivka. Also, 89 artillery strikes fell on Kamianskyi, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Malia Tokmachka, Biloghirya and Novodarivka. -We received 20 reports about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure,- added the head of the OVA. As reported by ArmyInform, 10 people died , 24 were injured as a result of the enemy attack of the Russian Federation on Zaporozhye.

Title: The Armed Forces stopped 177 assaults: the General Staff of the Armed Forces named two areas where t...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. According to detailed information, during the day the enemy launched three missile strikes against the positions of Ukrainian units and populated areas using five missiles, as well as ten airstrikes, dropping 36 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, it carried out about 4,000 attacks, of which 143 were from reactive salvo fire systems. The aggressor carried out airstrikes on the settlements of Novoyehorivka, Constantinople, Dachne, Odradne, Zaporizhzhia, Novopavlivka and Novosilka. Yesterday, aviation and missile forces and artillery of the Defense Forces carried out five strikes on the areas of concentration of personnel and anti-aircraft defenses of the enemy, and also hit two control points. In the Kharkiv direction near Vovchansk, Tykhi and in the direction of Visoka Yaruga and Kozacha Lopan, Russian terrorists stormed the positions of Ukrainian units five times and were repulsed. Nine skirmishes took place over the past day in the Kupyansk direction, in particular, near Kolisnikivka, Lozova, Zagryzovo, and Zapadny. According to the specified information, the enemy attacked 14 times near Cherneshchyna, Grekivka, Kopanok, Nadia, Makiivka, Torskyi and Terniv in the Lymansk direction. In the vicinity of the settlements of Bila Hora and Stupochka, in the Kramatorsk direction, five clashes took place during the day. In the Toretsk direction the Russians attacked nine times near Toretsk, Dilyivka and Shcherbinivka. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders repelled 48 enemy assaults in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Lysivka, Zhovte and Chumatske settlements. In the Kurakhiv direction, attacks took place 35 times in the past day near Stary Terni, Zori, Sontsivka, Kurakhovo, Dachny, and Dalny. Our defenders repelled 21 assaults near the settlements of Uspenivka, Kostiantynopolske, Rozdolne, Novodarivka and Novosilka, which are in the Vremivsk direction. An attempt to attack our positions in the direction of Novodanilivka, in the Orikhov direction turned out to be a failure for the invaders. The enemy was defeated three times, attacking the defensive lines of the Ukrainians on the Dnieper direction. In Kurshchyna Ukrainian defenders repelled 14 attacks by Russian invaders. In the Gulyajpil direction the situation has not changed much. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. We remind you that last day, the total losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,300 people. Also, our soldiers neutralized 17 armored combat vehicles, 12 artillery systems, two air defense vehicles, 19 operational-tactical UAVs and 49 vehicles.

Title: The enemy keeps a ship in the Mediterranean Sea with 16 Kalibr missiles on board
Description: This was reported by the Navy of Ukraine. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. In the Mediterranean Sea, 1 enemy ship, which is a carrier of Kalibr cruise missiles, with a total volley of up to 16 missiles. For a day, in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention for the Protection of Human Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, Voladymyr Zelensky presented a battle flag to 38 separate brigade of the Marine Corps of the Navy.

Title: Kryvyi Rih is recovering from the blow: the body of the third victim was recovered from the rubble
Description: This was notified by the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak. The rocket damaged 2 high-rise buildings, 10 private houses, 3 administrative buildings, an educational institution and cars. Meanwhile, the Russians continued shelling Nikopol region, using Grad rocket launchers and heavy artillery. Enemy strikes fell on Nikopol and Pokrovska hromada, where 2 industrial enterprises were damaged. Despite the destruction, there is currently no information about civilian casualties in the Nikopol district. As reported by ArmyInform, on December 6, 2024 military forces of the Russian Federation carried out a missile attack on the city of Kryvyi Rih.

Title: Almost five dozen units of motor vehicles and 1,300 infantrymen: the General Staff of the Armed Forc...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 07.12.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, fierce battles continue in the East: ZSU restrained 163 Russian assaults.

Title: Armored toy for Kim Jong-un: North Korea inspected a new tank
Description: Arms market experts interviewed by reporters of the American magazine Newsweek say that North Korea has introduced a new main combat tank (OBT), the design of which is similar to modern Western counterparts. Tianma-2 -resembles modern Western and American main battle tanks very much,- the Army Recognition Group, a Belgian company, said in turn , which conducts military analysis. Experts from a group that studied images of the Tianma-2 released by the North Korean news agency compared the tank to the German Leopard 2A7/A8, known for its advanced and modern armor, firepower and digital systems. Experts in the basics of tank construction have determined that the layout of the North Korean MBT involves the placement of the driver-mechanic at the front on the left, the turret located in the center, and the power plant located at the rear. The tank is manned by a crew of three, supported by an automatic loading system for the main weapon, a 125 mm smoothbore gun. The turret design includes modular composite armor that provides improved protection against kinetic energy projectiles (APFSDS) and cumulative charges (HEAT projectiles). The modular design allows for quick replacement of damaged armor sections in the field, which is characteristic of many modern main battle tanks. In addition, dynamic armor (ERA) covers the front and sides of the hull, and special wire protection is installed in the rear to protect against rocket-propelled grenades and other cumulative charges. One of the most striking updates of this model of the North Korean battleship is the integration of an active protection system (APS), which is similar to the Trophy APS from Israel and its European counterparts. The Tianma-2's APS system includes radar sensors on each side of its turret for threat detection, as well as countermeasures designed to intercept incoming anti-tank missiles and projectiles. To further strengthen the tank's defenses, the turret roof is equipped with an anti-tank launcher to combat drones, reflecting North Korea's emphasis on countering new aerial threats. The upgraded Tianma-2 turret also includes a Remotely Operated Warfare Station (ROWS) equipped with a 12.7 mm heavy machine gun, as well as launchers capable of firing anti-tank guided missiles (ATGMs). The tank is equipped with a panoramic sight system for observing the battlefield and conducting the battle by the commander and gunner, which provides enhanced opportunities to capture targets with their subsequent escort. Originally unveiled as the M2020 during a military parade on October 10, 2020, the Cheonma-2 has undergone significant changes since its first public appearance. It was officially named Cheonma-2 after North Korean leader Kim Jong Un's visit to the Defense Development Academy on May 29, 2024. The original Cheonma-2 demonstrated North Korea's desire to modernize its armored forces, and the new Tianma-2 builds on that prototype by integrating advanced technology and improved battlefield survivability. According to Army Recognition experts, the exhibition presentation of Tianma-2 emphasizes that North Korea continues to focus on the development of local military technologies capable of competing with global standards. The inclusion of advanced features such as APS, modular armor and counter-drone capabilities signal a shift to equipping your forces with tanks designed for the high-intensity scenarios of modern warfare. Defense market experts noted that given the technological leaps demonstrated in its design, the appearance of the Tianma-2 in North Korea's arsenal is likely to attract close attention from regional and global military analysts. Although North Korea has not provided official specifications or performance data for the new MBT, visual evidence from the exhibition underscores its desire to create a powerful and modern main battle tank. The event adds a new dimension to the regional security landscape, as Tianma-2 could potentially strengthen North Korea's armored forces, influencing tactical and strategic calculations on the Korean Peninsula and beyond. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7xM_Rm2m7bA Video: Presentation of the new main battle tank of the DPRK Tianma-2. Asian Defense's visualization

Title: Fierce battles continue in the East: the Armed Forces held back 163 assaults by the Russians
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The enemy launched two rockets (2 missiles), seven air strikes (in particular, 13 anti-aircraft missiles were used) and 512 kamikaze drone strikes, carried out 3,270 attacks on the positions of our troops. In the vicinity of Vovchansk, Tykhoi and in the direction of Visoka Yaruga and Kozacha Lopan in the Kharkiv direction, Russian terrorists stormed the positions of Ukrainian units five times and were repulsed. Estimated losses 87 occupiers were killed and wounded in the direction of the enemy, an artillery system, four armored combat vehicles, 17 UAVs, three units of automobiles and a unit of special equipment were destroyed, as well as BBM and four units of automobile equipment were damaged. Nine times the enemy attacked our fortifications on the Kupyansk direction nearby Kolisnikivka, Lozova, Zagryzovo and Zapadny. At the moment, two clashes are ongoing. The positions of Ukrainian defenders in the areas of Cherneshchyna, Grekivka, Kopanky, Nadiya, Makiivka, Torske and Terny settlements were stormed by Russian troops 14 times in the last day in the Lyman direction. Attacks repulsed. Three attempts by the invaders to advance in the Kramatorsk direction ended in failure near White Mountain and Stupochky, two skirmishes are still ongoing. In the Toretsk direction the occupiers stormed the Toretsk, Diliivka and Shcherbinivka districts eight times. Two attacks continue. In the Pokrovsky direction the invader carried out a total of 44 assault and offensive actions. The greatest activity of the Russian occupiers remains in Myrolyubivka, Promenya, Lysivka, Zhovtoy and Chumatsky districts. Three clashes are still ongoing. Enemy losses 107 soldiers were killed and 172 wounded in the direction, Ukrainian defenders destroyed an armored personnel carrier, five cars, two ATVs, a UAV control antenna and a motorcycle of the invaders. direction. At this time of the day, there are 35 attacks. Terrorists tried to advance in the districts of Stary Terny, Zori, Sontsivka, Kurakhovo, Dachny, and Dalny, currently fighting is going on in 11 locations. Six skirmishes are ongoing in the Vremivsk direction, so far the aggressor has stormed the front edge of our defenses near Uspenivka, Kostiantynopolsky, Rozdolny, Novodarivka and Novosilka 20 times. The enemy's attempt to advance in the direction of Novodanilivka in the Orichivsk direction ended in vain. The aggressor carried out airstrikes by air defense systems against the civilian infrastructure of Novopavlivka and Zaporizhzhia. On the Dnieper direction three enemy attacks were repulsed, the enemy had no success. The operation of the Defense Forces of Ukraine in the Kursk region continues, fierce battles are taking place, Ukrainian defenders are inflicting significant losses on the invading Russian army. The department honored Ukrainian soldiers from the 68th separate hunting brigade named after Oleksa Dovbush, the 425th separate assault battalion -Skelya- and the 48th separate assault battalion named after Noman Chelebidzhikhan, who steadfastly restrained the onslaught of the overwhelming enemy forces. As reported by ArmyInform, the border guards of the -Forpost- brigade continue their effective work to eliminate enemy vehicles. In particular, our soldiers destroyed two UAZ vehicles in the Vovchan direction.

Title: The rescue operation ended in Zaporizhzhia: the number of dead and injured increased
Description: The Ministry of Internal Affairs of Ukraine informs about this. The number of victims has increased to 24 people, including three children - a four-month-old baby, a 4-year-old and an 11-year-old child. Unfortunately, 10 people died, eight of whom were in cars. At the scene of the tragedy, emergency and communal services worked to eliminate the consequences of the attack and provide assistance to the victims. The circumstances of the incident are being investigated.

Title: What awards are in the system of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine and the Armed Forces of Ukraine
Description: Awards are primarily a moral value, because they testify to the recognition by the state and society of a person's real merits. After 2014, with a review of the war in Ukraine, the entire award system of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine and the Armed Forces of Ukraine was compositionally and ideologically modified to reflect the historical progress of the Ukrainian military. The Department for the Development of Military Symbols and Heraldry of the Central Directorate for the Development of Material Support of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine is responsible for the development of military awards, which, in response to ArmyInform's request, reported what awards are in the system of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine and the Armed Forces of Ukraine and what are the principles and ideology of creation modern Ukrainian military awards. Awards in the system of the IOU and ZSU are divided into four main complexes. The first is the departmental incentive awards of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The current decorations of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine are established by the Order of the Ministry of Defense No. 392 dated November 21, 2022. According to it, servicemen and employees of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, as well as other persons, can be awarded the badges -Cross of Special Merit- and -For Exemplary Service-, as well as medals: -Iron Cross-, -Knight's Cross-, -Military Cross-. , -Cross of Valor-, -For Wound-, -Cross of Honor-, -Golden Trident-, -For Strengthening defense capabilities-, -3rd point of the military brotherhood-, -Defender of Ukraine-, -For assistance to the defense-, -Cross of the Ground Forces-, -Cross of the Air Forces-, -Cross of the Naval Forces-, -Cross of Special Operations Forces-, -Cross of the Forces Territorial Defense-, -Logistics Forces Cross-, -Support Forces Cross-, -Medical Forces Cross-, -Airborne Assault Forces Cross-, -Cross Communications and Cyber ​​Security Troops, Cross of the State Special Transport Service, Peacekeeper Warrior, Service Veteran, 20 Years of Faithful Service, 15 Years of Faithful Service, 10 Years of Faithful Service. The second award complex is the incentive awards of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine -Cold weapon- and -Firearm-, established by the order of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine No. 693 dated 10/23/2012. According to this order, the -Firearms- badge is a pistol, a revolver and a hunting firearm, and the -Meadow Weapons- badge is a saber, broadsword and a club. The third award complex is the Honorary Badges of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, established by the order of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine No. 187 dated 07/05/2023. This order, in particular, established the following badges of honor: -Cross of Merit-, -Cross of the Brave-, -Steel Cross-, -Silver Cross-, -Golden Cross-, -Military Honor Cross-, -3a conscientious service-, -Combatant cross- with the breastplate -Honor and memory- next to it, -For invincibility-, -For life preserved-, -3a contribution of the army-, -The best sergeant (sergeant) of the Armed Forces of Ukraine-, -For combat valor-, -Shield of the winner-. And, finally, the fourth complex is the Commemorative breastplates of military units, established by the order of the Minister of Defense of Ukraine No. 478 of 03.08.2021, which is entitled -Regulations on the commemorative breastplates of military administration bodies, units, military units , institutions and organizations of the Armed Forces of Ukraine-. According to this provision, commemorative badges were established -with the purpose of developing the symbols of military administration bodies, units, military units, institutions and organizations of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, increasing the prestige of military service, strengthening military-patriotic education.- Drawings of breast insignia are developed taking into account the specifics of the activity of the military unit, its affiliation to the relevant type of Armed Forces, type of troops (service), history and combat traditions, place of deployment, etc. When creating award systems, specialists were primarily guided by the provisions of Decrees of the President of Ukraine No. 694 dated May 18, 2000. -On streamlining heraldry in Ukraine- and No. 365 of May 30, 2012. -About departmental encouraging awards-. However, ideologically and artistically, awards were created based on the position of continuity of modern awards from the symbols and award traditions of the period of the Ukrainian Revolution of 1917–1921, awards of the UHP government in exile, awards of Ukrainian national emigrant organizations of 1930–1990, awards of the Ukrainian Insurgent Army of 1942–1950 years Some awards are based on historical prototypes. In particular, the -Iron Cross- medal originates from the single combat award of the UNR Iron Cross -For the Winter Campaign and Battles-, established by the order of the Main Command of the Army and Fleet of the UHP dated 10.19.1920, signed by Simon Petlyura, the chief commander of the troops of the UNR Directory. The official incentive award of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine -Golden Trident- originates from the award project of the Western region of the Ukrainian People's Republic, established on April 30, 1919, which was not implemented more than a hundred years ago. A number of insignia of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine are based on the awards of the Ukrainian Insurgent Army. For the first time, the UPA Main Command introduced the awards system by its order No. 3/44 dated January 27, 1944. The design projects of these awards and the technology of their minting in underground conditions were developed by a member of the regional reference office of propaganda of the OUN Branch of the North-Western Ukrainian Lands, the famous graphic designer Nil Khasevych (1905–1952) and his student -Svyrid-. They were approved by the UGVR on June 30, 1950. An equally important element of the award ideology and award practice was the study of modern phalerist traditions of partner countries and their comparison with the national phalerist heritage. In particular, an in-depth analysis was carried out regarding the military awards of the USA, Great Britain, the Republic of Poland, the Federal Republic of Germany, and the French Republic.

Title: Mobilization of volunteers in the Transcarpathian way: about -chips- recruiting, monetary reward and...
Description: But the main thing is that they give a 100% guarantee that you will be sent to serve in the military unit in which you want to serve or they will choose the appropriate unit for your specialty. In addition, they also give a monetary reward of 20 thousand hryvnias for the fact that you are called up for service under a contract from the Tyachiv district of Transcarpathia. Active military personnel and their families are provided free of charge with rehabilitation programs and rest in the sanatoriums of Solotvyno in Transcarpathia. How did you manage to establish an effective recruiting mechanism? Why do people believe the servicemen of Tyachiv RTCC and SP and go to Transcarpathia from all over Ukraine? What is their main -feature-? ArmyInform asked the head of the Tyachiv district TCC and SP Colonel Andrii Oleschuk about this: -Our recruiting system works simply and efficiently. About a year ago, we realized that we needed to change our approach to recruiting candidates for military service under a contract. We analyzed our work and formed several important criteria, which gave, in fact, the result of recruiting volunteers. Right now, we are exceeding our contract staffing plan by 300%. So, first, we introduced advertising in social networks, in the media, and created printed campaign products. Social advertising is aimed at different strata of the population and it is conventionally divided into three directions: — Russia has attacked and the Motherland must be defended; — advertising that shows the destroyed cities and villages of our Ukraine; — a social package and state social guarantees: financial support, rewards, vacations, career growth. Plus an additional incentive from us to recruiters in the amount of 20 thousand hryvnias. The first two ads worked well in 2022-2023. People are looking more at cash benefits and social security issues this year. The second is communication with military units. We work with many military units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. First of all, these are the local unit of the TrO Forces, the 128th separate Transcarpathian mountain assault brigade, the 47th separate mechanized brigade -Magura- and many other units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Third, the creation of comfortable conditions, documentary support for conscripts, humane treatment of candidates and their social support. Of course, no lies, work on mutual trust and feedback from the recruiters themselves. This, by the way, is the most important criterion of our work. If the recruiter has a letter of recommendation from a military unit in his hands and he has had experience in military service for the past 10 years, then the process of filing documents together with the VLK (if everything is in order with his health - ed.) goes as quickly as possible. Unless, of course, an additional medical examination is required. If everything is OK: before 12 o'clock and the serviceman is already leaving for his military unit. Is it fast, I think so. Very often there are situations when people come from other regions, because at the local TCC it takes more time to process documents and send them to the army. And guys don't want to wait. For example, in Kyiv, one man was processed for 5 days, as soon as he learned about the speed of work of Tyachiv RTCC and SP, he immediately went to us with the documents. In general, they come from different regions of Ukraine. From Kherson, Kyiv, Dnipro, Ivano-Frankivsk, Lviv, Chernihiv, etc. We estimated that almost 60% of the people who came to us could not register for service in the TCC and SP at their place of residence. Next, if, for example, a person who has never served, but wants to join the ranks of the Marines, then together we will find him the unit in which he wants to go. This applies to all majors. Sapper, signalman, paratrooper, tanker, anti-aircraft gunner, stormtrooper, medic, cook, military sailor, etc. Again, it doesn't matter how long the search itself takes. The recruiter lives, eats and rests on weekends as much as necessary. The main criterion is that a person should be satisfied with the choice and be sure to serve where he wants. We had an incident. A man who worked in civil aviation arrived. Well, we spent a month and a half looking for a suitable specialty for him and a part in which he wanted to serve. And all this time he lived here in Tyachevo. We take people where they want to go. And we guarantee them that they will get to serve there. There are, of course, isolated cases when recruiters, who already come to the Training Centers of the Armed Forces of Ukraine to pass the BZVP, are not always assigned to the military units to which they wanted. We, for our part, can no longer influence these things. Financial support is provided by the Tyachiv District and Transcarpathian Regional Council. These are primarily united territorial communities, private entrepreneurs and philanthropists from our area, who renovated sleeping quarters, toilets and showers. That is, they provided normal living conditions for volunteers. Plus, they provide funds for a cash reward of 20,000 hryvnias to everyone who enlisted from us to join the army. Food itself: purchase of products, their delivery, cooking itself. This is all for the charity funds of our entrepreneurs. And what is interesting, military personnel who have already served some time on the front lines can come here to us on vacation with their families and undergo rehabilitation in sanatoriums and recovery centers in Solotvino and other places located in Tyachiv district. Plus recreation centers in Khust. Military personnel even come to us after being wounded. There are rehabilitation centers with hot salt springs in Solotvino. With the permission of recruiters: we organize watching movies in cinemas, swimming in pools, hiking in the mountains. This is all absolutely free for our defenders who voluntarily went to serve under a contract. All candidates for contract service take a course in tactical medicine at our RTCC and JV in cooperation with the national resistance center of the Transcarpathian region: they learn to provide first aid, work with tourniquets. At the end of the course, everyone is given a first-aid kit with the necessary drugs free of charge. Plus, they take classes on national resistance. These are the basics of military affairs. They are also taught the basic skills of handling weapons. For this, we have the appropriate weapon models. If we take young people, they are interested in the newly created units of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Unmanned Systems. About 40% want to serve there. Older people, who have already served in the army, are more likely to choose those specialties in which they completed their military service or those in which they fought during the ATO/OOS period. There is another category of recruiters who are ready to fight in assault brigades. In principle, it does not matter to them which VOS to obtain. Or those who only want to join the Army or the Marines. And there are quite a few of them. I remember, even a year ago, there was a huge lack of trust in the work of our RTCC and SP. After all, society, unfortunately, has developed a negative attitude, in principle, towards the work of TCC and joint ventures. There was a stereotype - they say that even volunteers are deceived, they do not get where they want to serve. In addition to the long processing of documents and VLK, quality is a problematic issue, people lose hope and lose the desire to protect the state from the enemy. This is where our -main chip- lies. We undertook to reverse this negative trend with the recruitment of volunteers and to show that RTCC and JV can work effectively. At the same time, creating the necessary household and social conditions. Everything for people - comfort and service. People who voluntarily went to this terrible war to defend Ukraine from the enemy deserve special respect. This is the key point. Yes, step by step, we fixed the system and it worked. Feedback from military units helped us a lot in this. Who recommended us to potential candidates to come to us and get registered quickly. I remembered one incident. A volunteer with a letter of recommendation to one of the mechanized brigades of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. We called the representatives of the unit, they say, they say, -make arrangements, but we don't believe that he will get to us.- We, in turn: -ok, when the military comes to you in the unit - go on a video call for confirmation.- At that time, the team was really surprised. After that, even more volunteers were called to that part through our RTCC and SP. Gradually, the principle of -word of mouth- worked for the very recruiters who signed a contract with us. These are hundreds and hundreds of real testimonials. Here, we can say, came a turning point in trust in our work. Next, our authority was already working for us. Plus a monetary reward of UAH 20,000, it also worked effectively. There are people with different social status. Many people come to us without money. There is an important nuance here. Everyone knows that in the Armed Forces, monetary support is calculated for the actually served last month. And what to do with those military personnel who undergo BZVP in Educational Centers. That is, they have no money in the first month of training. We are solving this problem with the help of these 20 thousand hryvnias. These funds are received by our volunteers in Tyachevo, before being sent either to Training Centers or directly to military units. All volunteers receive monetary incentives without exception. In addition, we provided proposals for the implementation of the mechanism for the purchase of cars for personal use by servicemen who entered into the first contract. We will remind that contract holders have the right within three months from the date of conclusion of the contract to receive a certificate for the purchase of a vehicle in the amount of 150 thousand hryvnias. The mechanism itself is still under development. We, in turn, offer to ensure communication between the owners of car dealerships and the military. That is, to undertake a commitment and help our defenders buy a car. It is necessary to dispel an absolutely harmful myth, which was successfully launched into the information space of Ukraine by Russian propaganda. It concerns the passing of the VLK of those who are conscripted into the army. For example, the TCC and SP -turn a blind eye- to obvious health problems and seek to drag everyone to the ZSU in a row. This is not true. Once a 45-year-old man from Cherkassy came to us. He was obviously from a poor family. He ate at our place more than three times a day. So, in the course of VLC, he was diagnosed with throat cancer, accordingly, he was informed about the diagnosis and was not invited. They bought a train ticket and he went home for treatment. There was a volunteer, a 28-year-old guy from the Kherson region. A letter of recommendation is in hand. He passed the tests, his blood sugar is high, up to 60. We tell him, boy, go home, get treatment, and then come to us. The part was informed that we could not call him. Many candidates have AIDS and other diseases that make them ineligible for military service. This is all clearly established. Because the most important thing for us is the health and life of people. Therefore, we invite all willing conscripts who are fit for service in terms of health to stand up for the defense of Ukraine. One of the main differences between contract service and mobilization during martial law is the ability to choose a unit and specialty. Photo of Tyachivsky RTCC and SP

Title: The enemy is dispersing the attack on - NATO's plan for the introduction of troops into Ukraine -
Description: In fact, the narrative of the Western -occupation- of Ukraine has been promoted by Moscow since the Revolution of Dignity. It is Russia that has been violating the territorial integrity of Ukraine since 2014, and in 2022 it tried to completely occupy the country. In addition, Russia is dispersing a manipulative -throw-in- as if -Western Ukraine will join NATO separately from other regions, like West Germany during the Cold War- with a reference to the American publication Politico. Actually in the article of the Politico publication entitled -Ukraine's peace plans: Many ideas for ending the fighting, but the sides, as before, are far from each other- there are several models for ending hostilities in Ukraine. One of the options is when Ukraine receives an invitation to join the alliance within its internationally recognized borders, instead security guarantees are extended to those territories under the control of the Ukrainian authorities. Thus, Russian mass media and social media users once again take quotes from foreign media out of context, this time to spread the narrative about the division of Ukraine. Such statements are aimed at causing Ukrainians to mistrust Western allies, shaking the unity of the country and its partners.

Title: -Twice for seven-, or How the master sergeant Red twice led his comrades out of the encirclement in ...
Description: In the ranks of the Ryzhy Armed Forces from the first day of the large-scale invasion: -At 7 a.m. on February 24, I heard explosions and went outside. A comrade drove by in a car, he says, war. I immediately went to the TCC for a military ID and passport. I had a first-line reserve after my military service. They said I was needed. We were put on a bus and we went to Goncharivske. Then I didn't think about anything in particular: they said it must be, therefore it must be.- At that moment, Ryzhy's family was waiting for the arrival of their daughter. The wife saw off with tears in her eyes. Mom was also upset. But the man says that they still couldn't refuse him. Then there was a clear realization: first of all, it is necessary to protect the closest people. In 2022, as part of a rifle battalion, he went to defend the state in Donetsk region. He says that even then the situation was tense, but the enemy had fewer drones at that time. For the most part, the enemy stormed with infantry: -By the end of 2023, they had a lot more technical means. We were constantly under enemy drones: you enter a position under drones, take turns constantly under drones, leave the same way under drones. In winter, everything is complicated by the fact that the leaves fall, so it is more difficult to disguise the position.- One of the episodes that Ryzhom remembers the most happened on December 1-2, 2023. Then a group of enemy infantry consisting of eight people came almost close to the position of the rifle battalion: -There were four of us and eight of them. Landing. From one end of the hole, from the other end of the hole - they haven't had time to dig yet. The branches were used to make a shack so that the fpv wouldn't fly in. It was foggy. A drone hovered above us. While I was contacting the senior to find out if it was our bird or not, I lowered my head and saw the enemy 10 meters away. A battle ensued. They immediately threw us at RGD-5. For a moment, I might as well call it quits. But I realized that I want to live more than they do. And immediately shot two stores in the Somali style, then began aiming fire. The guys and I put 5 of them, one gave up. Two of them were beaten up, they were still shouting: -friend-brother, pamagi-. It was not possible to take those two and to provide them with help - all the time the Russians were firing from grenade launchers and mortars. Therefore, our infantrymen did not come out of the shelter. Instead, the Russian, who surrendered first, even managed to tell a little about himself. However, as it turned out later, the versions about why he took part in the war were made up on the fly: -I remember that he said his name was Vova, he was 40 years old. He went to war so as not to be imprisoned. But when he was brought to our far position, he told a completely different story there. That he was caught, brought by force. They promised that trenches would be dug, but they threw themselves into the storm.- Currently Ryzhy, together with his brothers, performs combat missions in the territory of the Kursk region. Twice he had to remove people from the environment. And twice he was able to get everyone out alive. -The first time, a platoon leader came and said that it was necessary to go on an assault. We went as a group of 16 people on two BMPs. Three tanks moved to cover us. They drove to the place, took positions. It was difficult, many enemy fpvs, three hundred appeared among us. The wounded were evacuated. Reinforcements came to us and we continued our work. But the next day, neither evacuation nor support groups could reach us. We took up a street and a half. The enemy realized that there were not so many of us and began to knock out every house. They worked on us actively with mortars, rockets, and fpv, there was constant shelling from small arms. It was not possible to get us through the windows, because we strengthened them well with boards, beds, and bedside tables. But then the Russians started breaking through the roofs, dropping the so-called -lighters-. And when one house was occupied, it was necessary to move to the next one,- Ryzyy recalls. -When the combatant realized that the equipment could not reach us, he began to take us out in small groups. It turned out that I became the leader of the group. He took out at least seven people. They walked -on brimstone-, through the enemy's street. The commander accompanied us by radio.
