Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In the Kharkiv direction one enemy attack was repulsed near Tykh. In addition, the occupiers launched an airstrike in the Krugli district. On the Kupyansk direction the enemy tried five times to advance to our positions near Nova Kruglyakivka, Lozova and Synkivka. All enemy attacks have already been repelled. Petropavlivka and Lozov were hit by the Russian occupiers. In the Lyman direction, the invading army attacked 15 times in the districts of Grekivka, Tverdokhlibovo, Yampolivka, Terniv, Zarychny, Torsky, Druzhelyubivka, Bilogorivka, and in the Serebryansky forest. One attack is still ongoing. In the Kramatorsk direction, the enemy's activity resulted in five combat encounters near Chasovoy Yar, Stupochky and Predtechyny. In the Toretsk direction one battle continues near Toretsk, five enemy assaults were stopped by our defenders in the Toretsk and Nelipivka districts. The enemy tried 37 times to wedge into our defense on the Pokrovsky direction. The occupiers attacked in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Lysivka, Dachenske, Zhovte, Pushkine, Novotroitske, Shevchenko, Novopustinka settlements. Thirty-six offensive actions of the enemy were stopped by the Defense Forces, one attack is still ongoing. The enemy suffers significant losses - our soldiers neutralized more than 450 occupiers in this direction, 217 of them irreversibly. One infantry fighting vehicle, four units of motor vehicles and two units of enemy motor vehicles were destroyed, one trench EW was neutralized, and one motor vehicle unit and one gun were also damaged. On the Kurakhiv direction the enemy attacked our positions near Berestki, Stary Terni, Zori, Sontsivka, Kurakhovo, Dalnyi, Elizavetivka, Hannivka, Romanivka, and Uspenivka. To date, Ukrainian soldiers have repelled all 47 enemy attacks. In the Vremivsk direction our troops repelled 35 attacks near Kostiantynopolskyi, Rozlyv, Suhy Yali, Makarivka and Novodarivka - by this time all clashes had been completed. In addition, Komar and Vremivka were hit by airstrikes. In the Orikhov direction, our defenders repelled an enemy attack in the direction of Novodanilivka. In the Dnieper direction Russian invaders attacked our positions three times. They were repulsed and suffered losses. On the Siversky and Gulyajpilsk directions, at this time of the day, the enemy did not conduct active operations. The Defense Forces of Ukraine continue the operation in the Kursk region, at this time it is known about 15 skirmishes and more than 450 shelling of populated areas and positions of our units. For effective and professional combat work in the department, the soldiers of 37 separate marine infantry brigades, 100 separate mechanized brigades, 14 separate Ivan Bohun operational brigades, 128 separate Transcarpathian mountain assault brigades, 124 separate territorial defense brigades who effectively destroy the enemy, inflict significant losses in manpower and technology. As reported by ArmyInform, occupiers due to colossal losses are changing tactics in the Pokrovsky direction.

Title: Night drone attack on Kyiv: debris fell on the roadway
Description: This was reported by Serhiy Popko, head of the Kyiv City Military Administration. In Kyiv, an air alert was declared twice, which lasted a total of 4 hours. As a result, the windows of the non-residential premises were damaged. Also, the wreckage of the drone was found on the roadway in the same area. According to preliminary information, there were no fires, destruction of buildings, and no injuries. Services are working quickly at the scene, clarifying the details of the incident. As reported by ArmyInform, on the evening of December 5, the enemy -Shahed- took aim at private residential building in the settlement of Koryukiv district.

Title: Illusory victories of the Russian Federation: what the enemy invents to divert attention from large-...
Description: Moreover, the MORF regularly reports on the -destruction- of HIMARS launchers, the number of which has already exceeded that received by Ukraine. About writes Center for Strategic Communications and Information Security. These statements are aimed at supporting the illusion of Russia's -greatness-, because Russian propaganda has always operated on the principle of quantitative exaggeration. For example, back in 2017, Sergei Shoigu reported on the -laying off- of 500,000 km² in Syria, although the area of ​​the entire country is only 185,000. km². At the same time, the real facts remain outside the official summaries. By report of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, in November, the Russian army suffered the largest irreversible and sanitary losses in force since the beginning of the large-scale invasion: during this month, our soldiers -two hundred- and -three hundred- 45,720 enemy soldiers. But this data is overlooked by propagandists who focus on creating their own illusory victories. After all, the Russians can indeed shoot down Ukrainian missiles with oil depots, airfields or military factories. Such fake -reports- not only create a false picture of reality for the domestic audience, but are also designed to divert attention from Russia's large-scale losses and failures at the front.

Title: A serious reason for neurosis in the Kremlin: Germany is waiting for a missile capable of -penetrati...
Description: However, as informs the portal of the influential German publication Der Spiegel, the Bundeswehr does not yet have an appropriate budget for this is an important project, ArmyInform reports. According to the publication, the Ministry of Defense of the Federal Republic of Germany presented to the budget committee of the Bundestag the profile of the corresponding project in confidential documents for the state budget for 2025. Accordingly, from a military point of view, it makes sense to order 600 Taurus Neo cruise missiles for approximately €2.1 billion. The first units of long-range weapons may be delivered in 2029. The decision to develop Taurus Neo, according to German observers, marks a significant step in modernizing Germany's military potential and strengthening its strategic position in a tense geopolitical context. According to German media reports, the Taurus Neo project is aimed at expanding the capabilities of the existing Taurus KEPD 350 cruise missile. In particular, according to German parliamentary sources, the modification involves increasing the flight range, increasing the accuracy of hitting targets and the power of the warhead. The Taurus Neo's technical improvements are expected to include a flight range exceeding 500 km. The guidance system will be modernized, it will integrate advanced technologies of inertial navigation and GPS correction to increase accuracy for detecting hard-to-reach targets. It is also assumed that the missile will be equipped with a more powerful warhead designed to penetrate heavily fortified structures such as bunkers or underground storage facilities. In addition, the Taurus Neo can include anti-missile defense bypass technologies, which increases the missile's ability to evade enemy radars and anti-aircraft defenses. Currently, the German armed forces have at their disposal approximately 600 Taurus KEPD 350 missiles, which are mainly used on Tornado fighters. Although the missile has also been tested on the Eurofighter EF2000, this aircraft is not yet used as a standard launch platform for the Taurus. The upcoming conclusion from the operation of Tornado fighters raises the question of the launch platform for the Taurus Neo. As such, the Eurofighter is the Bundeswehr's most likely option, while integration with the F-35As recently ordered by Germany is unlikely without a full redesign of the missile to match the internal compartment of the American stealth fighter. Experts of the IKK defense portal Defense Express (DE) reminded that the first batch of Taurus missiles in 600 units cost the Germans €570 million, deliveries continued until December 2010. As reported by ArmyInform , Taurus missiles in Germany were repeatedly requested by Ukraine. However, the chancellor of the country, Olaf Scholz, makes categorical statements from time to time that Germany will not transfer these long-range weapons to Ukraine, and the other day he noted that he will not change his position on this issue. As of today, according to data by the authors of the DE portal, Germany does not produce Taurus cruise missiles. Last year, the CEO of MBDA Deutschland, Joachim Knopf, stated that it would take a year to resume production of these weapons, taking into account delays in the delivery of electronics or explosives. As reported, in the long term, Germany could consider integrating the Taurus Neo into the FCAS (Future Combat Air System) is a next-generation fighter project developed in cooperation with France, Spain and Belgium. Despite the fact that in the coming decades, the US Air Force is expected to play a central role in the modernization of European air forces. In Germany, it is believed that the Taurus Neo technology could have significant implications for European defense. As a high-precision, long-range weapon, this missile can enhance deterrence capabilities while offering additional strategic capabilities for the continent's collective defense. However, the financing of the Taurus Neo project remains a serious problem for the German government. So, according to data reporters of the defense portal The War Zone, the budget of the Federal Republic of Germany for 2025 will require include the €350 million required to launch development, and current budget constraints may affect costs in the coming years. However, the support expressed by the government coalition in Germany indicates a favorable outcome for the implementation of the project, despite possible debates in the German parliament regarding the feasibility of prioritizing such costs in difficult economic conditions. The announcement of the Taurus Neo project came just two days after the signing of a historic defense agreement between Germany and the United Kingdom aimed at accelerating the development of a new, more advanced long-range missile than the Storm Shadow. This agreement was followed by the announcement of the UK joining the European Strike Program (ELSA): a French-led initiative that includes Germany, Poland and Italy. As part of ELSA, it is planned to develop a missile with a flight range of 1,000 km. up to 2 thousand km by 2030. Taurus KEPD 350 cruise missile. Video: Luftwaffe/Bundeswehr

Title: -The U.S. military was cool long before 2022-: about the war of the Hornet, Chip and Dale and the fi...
Description: Experienced artilleryman Major Kostyantyn Rymarenko told ArmyInform about what the long years of war in Donbas since 2014 gave the Ukrainian army, why the armed forces were cool long before the large-scale attack of the Russian Federation on Ukraine, as well as why UAVs are critical for artillery with the call sign -Khorunzhiy-. Military -Khorunzhiy- began his career in 2012 with ordinary military service. Then, as a graduate of the Alfred Nobel University in Dnipropetrovsk, he had to serve only 9 months. However, in the end, this short term was only the beginning of a long military career, during which he went from a soldier to a major. To the question about the military department during higher education, the officer answers awkwardly, noting that this is a separate sad story. Unfortunately, during the 1990s and early 2000s, and especially after 2010, the system of training military personnel through military departments at universities was largely disorganized. So the future officer began his service in the army -on a general basis- and now does not regret it. He recalls that during the conscript service, despite the chronic underfunding, outdated material base and remnants of the -Soviet regime-, military affairs were taught qualitatively. - In Divychki, conscripts were taught very well - no worse than officers are taught now. Everything was very well organized, it was very cool training - no questions. Almost everything I know about artillery, how it works, all the basics, I know because of my military service. Really taught very well. Although it was a bit -long- (smiles - author), they taught everything - from A to Z. They laid a very strong base, - says the gunner. All the best from this basis, he believes, allowed the Armed Forces of Ukraine to give a worthy rebuff to the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine in 2014 and became a reliable basis for the further development of the Ukrainian army. The following years before a large-scale attack were also not wasted, so the ASU was already cool well before 2022. Kostyantyn Rymarenko met Russia's attack on Ukraine in the ranks of the Armed Forces, because he signed a contract after the -period-. So we can say that he has been fighting since the very first days of the more than ten-year war. — In 2014, the 25th brigade was the first to leave for Donbas in a convoy, it was the first battalion tactical group (battalion tactical group — author) of the first battalion. On March 10, 2014, we went to the area of ​​the Amvrosiivka settlement. The first 150 km went well - people supported, helped, gave all kinds of -little things-, says the officer. Then the problems began - people in civilian clothes obstructed the movement of convoys of military equipment, blocking roads and chasing traffic. Voyskovyi recalls that the demonstrators were not only extremely decorated due to anti-Ukrainian propaganda, but also well coordinated - it was noticeable that someone was leading them. - Everything was coordinated to the point that they knew the point where it would be most profitable to stop the convoy. Because a convoy is a lot of armor and wheels, it is a military Ural. We often drove on dirt roads, fields - and people in civilian clothes clearly met us where we had to enter the paved road. They already stood at that place in advance, that is, they were coordinated, because they themselves could not follow our movement and understand where exactly we were going, -Khorunzhiy- recalls. The crowd blocking the road could number from a few dozen to two or three hundred people, who had to be bypassed, persuaded or even dispersed by force. It was noticeable that the hysteria among the locals was being specially fanned, and in the crowds you could see trained -activists- provocateurs who organized everything. The further combat path of the gunner lay through Amvrosiivka, Sloviansk, Debaltseve, Shakhtarsk… The attempt to liberate Donetsk in mid-August 2014 was memorable, during which units of the brigade were supposed to move from Debaltsevo through Nizhnya Kryna in the direction of Khartsyzk. It was then, the officer is convinced, that Russia's first large-scale attack on Ukraine took place. Before that, the Russian Federation operated through special services, organizing, coordinating and supplying weapons to Russian and pro-Russian militants. In the last decade of August 2014, the neighboring aggressor state directly used units of its regular army. Then one group of Ukrainian troops, says -Khorunzhy-, advanced through Nizhnya Kryna to the south, while the second was to go north to Khartsyzk from the side of Ilovaisk. They both had about 7 kilometers to go. — 14 kilometers — and Donetsk would be in a cauldron. But on August 24-25, 2014, the first full-scale invasion of Russia took place, which was hidden. The Ilovai group had an option to come to us to the north, and if we hit each other at the same time, we would meet in Khartsyzka, and everything would be fine, the gunner explains. To prevent this plan, Russia was forced to use units of the regular army, because there were clearly not enough Russian and pro-Russian fighters, and they did not have any tangible support among the local population. Khorunzhiy spent the next six years in a war that many Ukrainians chose not to notice. Meanwhile, soldiers of the Armed Forces defended Ukraine, restraining the enemy in the East of the country. The defenders gave their lives and health, for years they almost did not see their relatives and friends, while the rest of the country continued to live their usual lives. — During the year, we spent 10 months in the ATO/OO zone, then two months at home. Of these two months, we spent one at the training ground, and the other was at the PPD (permanent deployment point - author) and went to training. That is, during my service, I almost did not see my own family, my children, - explains the soldier. However, this time did not pass in vain either for Konstantin himself or for the Armed Forces. -Khorunzhiy- was trained and obtained the rank of primary officer, served in the command and artillery reconnaissance battery, was a platoon commander and a battery commander. And the Ukrainian army has gone through an important path of modernization and gaining combat experience. — In May 2015, I went to study. We mastered the AN/TPQ-48 - studied, disassembled, assembled, repaired. We were well taught in electronics, then there were also courses. After all, in November 2015, I was given the rank of junior lieutenant, - recalls Kostyantyn Rymarenko. The AN/TPQ-48 is an American man-portable counter-battery radar station designed to detect enemy mortar installations. Together with other innovations and assistance from partners, it became very helpful during the war in Eastern Ukraine. In 2020, Kostyantyn Rymarenko resigned from the Armed Forces, hoping to spend more time with his family and recall his civilian specialty as a marketer. However, a large-scale attack by the Russian Federation disrupted all plans for a peaceful life. - From the very morning of February 24, I sent my family to my relatives, and I immediately took my bag - all the military property I had - and went to the military commissariat. When I arrived, they didn't even know what to do and how to do it. And I was already completely gathered at their door. I was quickly taken through all the offices, all the officers - and on the same day I went to the brigade, -Khorunzhiy- recalls. Several days were spent on organizational work, and already on February 27, the officer left for Donbas, where to this day he defends Ukraine as part of his native 25th separate Sicheslav Airborne Brigade. — When I put my family in the car and sent them to my relatives, took my bag and went to the military checkpoint, I honestly thought I was going to die. I did not believe that we would succeed. But maybe it's because everyone thought so and everyone left - that's why we survived and are still standing, the soldier explains. He is sure that it was the simultaneous rise and joint efforts of Ukrainians, primarily those who gained military experience during the war in the East in 2014-2022, that allowed Ukraine to withstand the extremely difficult conditions of the first months of the large-scale invasion. Another key to the successful defense of Ukraine is the creativity of Ukrainian defenders and innovation in the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Ukrainians brought knowledge, skills, skills and even hobbies acquired in civilian life to the Armed Forces - and this gave a colossal result. — In civilian life, I had a hobby — I flew on FPVs, on quadcopters. Thanks to this, we were the first in the brigade to fly a quadcopter. At the beginning of the large-scale invasion, there was only one Mavic in the division. Three officers flew on it: I, at that time a senior lieutenant and commander of intelligence, also a senior lieutenant - the deputy commander of a battery from the MPZ - and a division commander in the rank of lieutenant colonel, - says the military man. Before that, the gunners had only wing-type UAVs, and they were even afraid to fly on the recently handed over single Mavic, so as not to lose it. However, in the end, the gunners confidently mastered the new technique and ensured an extremely high result. Three officers took turns flying one drone and directly adjusted fire, transmitting data by radio to the gun commanders. This made it possible to quickly adjust fire and achieve significant accuracy. The scaling of the same process and the significant increase in the number of UAVs made it possible to spread the acquired experience to other artillery divisions of the brigade - and drones changed everything. — If we had as many drones at the beginning of the war as we do now, the occupiers would have all died then. We fired about 300 shells without knowing where. We were told the coordinates - we shot there. If the volumes that we fired at the beginning of the war were combined with such direct streams, which thanks to UAVs we have now, it would be possible to simply destroy any position, the officer explains. The military jokingly compares the 25th Sicheslav Airborne Brigade to Chip and Dale from the famous Disney cartoon about the chipmunks. After all, he says, the brigade is often sent to the direction where the biggest problems arise and where it is urgently necessary to -put out the fire-. — The first time this happened was in the Avdiivka region, when we were planned to be taken out for recovery and replaced by another brigade. Our units began to leave, but not even a day and a half passed when those who replaced us began to fall and lose positions. Therefore, we were forced to urgently return and save the situation, the officer says. Then many more times the Czechoslovak paratroopers were transferred to the hottest and most difficult areas of the front, and everywhere they provided the desired result - both in defense and in attack. -Khorunzhiy- fondly remembers the Slobozhan offensive operation, when the Defense Forces managed to liberate a huge territory of the Kharkiv region with a swift thrust. — When we were transferred to Kharkiv Oblast, there were very big doubts, but we fulfilled the assigned tasks and everything was successful. With minimal losses and with a huge amount of trophies, Raisin was liberated. Then, with already greater losses, unfortunately, they reached the Lyman, he says. The military believes that if it was then possible to introduce additional reserves, reinforce and replace the already exhausted Ukrainian military, the offensive could be continued. Victory in the war is just as achievable, he is convinced. For this, the two most important conditions are necessary - nationwide support of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and a sufficient number of motivated and well-trained soldiers. Photo by the author and from the archive of the 25th separate Sicheslav Airborne Brigade

Title: Order -Golden Star- and not only: ArmyInform about social protection Heroes of Ukraine
Description: This title is the highest state award given for heroic deeds. Along with the title, the Order of the -Gold Star- is awarded. Also, this title provides a number of additional payments and benefits. What social guarantees do the Heroes of Ukraine receive, ArmiyaInform tells. Heroes of Ukraine, who received the title for a heroic deed, can count on housing. Volodymyr Zelenskyi signed the relevant decree this year. The document states that one-time address assistance in the form of residential premises for permanent residence can be granted regardless of the presence of such persons on the register of citizens who need improvement of living conditions. Also, family members can receive such targeted assistance, if the title of Hero of Ukraine with the award of the -Golden Star- was awarded posthumously, or in the event of the death of a person who was awarded the title of Hero of Ukraine. If the title of Hero of Ukraine is awarded for a heroic deed, a one-time reward must be paid. According to Cabinet resolution, the amount of the award is 50 of the subsistence minimum established for able-bodied persons on January 1 of the calendar year in which the title is awarded. In 2024, it is 151 thousand 150 hryvnias. The payment can be received directly by the Hero of Ukraine. In the event that the title is awarded posthumously, the payment is divided equally among all family members. To receive a payment, you need to contact the Pension Fund of Ukraine and submit relevant documents: Also Ukrainian legislation provides monthly cash payments, in particular, to Heroes of Ukraine, who have been awarded the title of -Gold Star- since 2014. The amount of payment is 3 minimum wages established on January 1 of the calendar year. An application for receiving a payment must be submitted to the Pension Fund of Ukraine. In addition to housing and payments, Heroes of Ukraine receive a number of benefits from the state. The list is determined by Law of Ukraine -On the status of veterans war, guarantees of their social protection-. In particular, direct participants in the protection of the sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine and who, since 2014, have been awarded the title of Hero of Ukraine with the awarding of the -Golden Star- order, are considered to have special merits for the Motherland. These people are entitled to a significant list of benefits: Financial: Medical: Housing and utilities: Transportation: This is not a complete a list of benefits granted for special services to the Motherland. Everything is described in more detail directly in the law.

Title: Heroes of Ukraine: ArmyInform found out in which branches of the army there are the most of them
Description: During the Russian-Ukrainian war, this honorary title gained special importance in the state. After all, heroism has become inseparable from sacrifice. He became something exceptional, extraordinary. As ArmiyaInform was informed by the Personnel Center of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, from the beginning of the Russian-Ukrainian war on February 20, 2014 to December 2, 2024, 449 servicemen were awarded the title of Hero of Ukraine (excluding the Military Intelligence Service and units under its direct control and the Military Intelligence Directorate of the Military Intelligence Service). Moreover, from 2014 to 2021, only 52 people were awarded the Golden Star, and starting from 2022, the number of awardees has more than doubled this number every year. The most Heroes of Ukraine in the Ground Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine — 234 people, in the Airborne Assault Forces — 57, in the Air Force — 52, TrO of the Armed Forces of Ukraine — 39, SSO of the Armed Forces of Ukraine — 28, Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine — 23. More about the distribution of the awarded by types and types of troops ( forces) — in the infographic We would like to remind that from May 2023, preliminary consideration of submissions and other materials on awarding the title of Hero of Ukraine for the performance of a remarkable heroic act by persons who took a direct part in the implementation of measures to ensure the defense of Ukraine, the protection of the safety of the population and the interests of the state, is carried out by an expert group. which is formed from representatives of all power structures.

Title: The occupiers created classes of young Russian Guardsmen at TOT
Description: About this informs Center of national resistance. In the temporarily occupied territories, the enemy pursues a policy of militarizing children in order to raise future janissaries from them in the future wars of the empire. In particular, the Russians invented classes of -young Russian Guardsmen-, which were supervised by the police. The children were given -cadet- uniforms and forced to swear allegiance to the occupiers. At the same time, they were given lectures by people who organize torture chambers and kidnap people from the streets. In the future, the children were promised benefits when entering specialized educational institutions. The Kremlin spent hundreds of years building a system in which service to a dictator or in the army is the only chance to build a career if you live in the provinces of the empire. In this way, Moscow ensures control over the captured lands and gains manpower for wars of aggression. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the occupied Luhansk Region they are planning to spend 43 billion rubles on the so-called development of the coal industry.

Title: Shahed hit a private house in Chernihiv Oblast
Description: This was reported by the head of Chernihiv OVA Vyacheslav Chaus. As a result of the attack, a local resident was injured and was hospitalized in a local hospital. All relevant services worked on the spot to eliminate the consequences and help. As reported by ArmyInform, the aggressor hit Nikopol region with kamikaze drones and artillery, a total of 15 attacks per day.

Title: Our drones destroyed the position of the occupiers by intercepting a video signal from an enemy UAV
Description: The video of the operation of our drones was published by the commander of NSU Oleksandr Pivnenko. The enemy drone, after working, returned to its base, which was a fatal mistake for the occupiers. Thanks to the received video, the National Guardsmen accurately determined the coordinates of the enemy's drone launch point and delivered a devastating blow to it with FPV drones. As reported by ArmyInform, unique footage of combat work with a foray into an enemy cell showed fighters of the 4th separate unit of the Omega Special Purpose Center.

Title: Volodymyr Zelensky presented the Gold Heart award and talked with Ukrainian volunteers
Description: About this it is stated on the website of the Head of State. -I congratulate you, all our Ukrainian volunteers, on International Volunteer Day. I want to thank you for your work, for your service. You give your life, first of all, to our fighters, warriors - to all those on whom the lives of each of us, our children, depend. I want to thank you for helping as much as possible both at the front and in civilian life,- said the President. Volodymyr Zelenskyy emphasized that the Ukrainian volunteer movement unites caring people who are always ready to help. The President presented the -Golden Heart- award to Volodymyr Alekseev, head of the Supervisory Board of the Public Organization -DOF-, Oleksandr Belyuza, head of the Public Organization -BELUGA UA-, Maria Berlinska, head of the Victory Drones project of the Dignitas Foundation, Lyubov Galan, co-founder of the Public Organization -Princip Human Rights Center-, volunteers Svitlana Zabava, head of the public union -Ukrainian network for children's rights-. Yevhen Kaplin of the public organization -PROLISKA-, Volodymyr Kolomaik, founder of the charitable organization -International Charitable Fund -UNITIUA-, Zhanna Lishchynska, co-founder and head of the board of the Zaporizhia Regional Public Organization -Peace and Protection of the Family-, volunteer of the charitable foundation -Volunteer Headquarters of the 5th Separate Kyiv assault brigade- Lyudmila Menuyk, head of the humanitarian department of the charitable organization -Serhiy Prytula Foundation- Maryna Petrychenko, head of the All-Ukrainian public organization -Knight's Cross- Oksana Tunik-Fryz, volunteer of the public union -Ukrainian Network for Children's Rights- Anastasia Khaliulova, volunteer of the charitable organization -Charitable Fund -Save Ukraine- Myroslava Kharchenko, director of the charity organization Charitable Foundation -Steel- to Tetiana Kharko, head of the public organization -Hardened hearts- Tetyana Khytriy and the members of the band -Kurgan and Aggregat- Amil Elman Ogla Nasirova, Ramil Elman Ogla Nasirova and Yevgenia Volodchenko, who organize large-scale gatherings for Ukrainian soldiers. Volodymyr Zelenskyi launched the -Golden Heart- award in 2022. Since then, every year on the International Volunteer Day, the President presents it to those who have made a significant contribution to the provision of volunteer assistance and the development of the volunteer movement. During the meeting, the Head of State discussed with representatives of the volunteer movement the provision of the Defense Forces, in particular the purchase of FPV drones and the strengthening of air defense, as well as the construction of fortifications. Separately, Volodymyr Zelenskyi spoke about the preparation of the first meeting of the Technological Stavka, which is to be held this month. In addition, the implementation of the initiative of the Head of State Bring Kids Back UA and specific steps for the return of Ukrainian children illegally deported by Russia were discussed. We remind you, Volodymyr Zelenskyi said that today is the 30th anniversary of the Budapest Memorandum. Ten years of war. This document has not worked for a single day.

Title: Rustem Umyerov discussed international military aid for Ukraine with attachés of partner countries
Description: This is stated in a post on the minister's Facebook page. The main topic of discussion is international military aid for Ukraine. -I expressed my sincere gratitude to every country that supports us in the fight against the aggressor. It is extremely important for Ukraine and our partners that the transferred weapons and equipment are used as efficiently as possible on the battlefield,- said Rustem Umyerov. Together with the representatives of the Verkhovna Rada Committee on National Security, Defense and Intelligence, the participants of the meeting informed the military attachés about the digitalization of military aid records. Before the start of the full-scale Russian aggression, weapons records were kept exclusively in paper format. The Great War showed that such approaches need to be fundamentally changed. This year, the Ministry of Defense made significant progress in reforming the supply of weapons and equipment to NATO standards. One of the key achievements was the implementation of the SAP system, which translates the accounting and provision of the army into a modern digital format, convenient for analysis and control. Thanks to the license transferred by Germany, SAP is scalable to all units of the Defense Forces. Today, the system covers 3,000 users at the tactical, operational and strategic levels. About 300,000 items have already been entered into the database, and in the online mode we monitor key indicators: the number of weapons, their condition and distribution among units. -Such formats of meetings with the military attachés of our allies will be regular. At the next event, we plan to summarize the results of military aid for previous years and define support plans for 2025. Transparency, clarity and accountability are the principles that the Ministry of Defense steadfastly adheres to in cooperation with our allies,- Rustem Umyerov concluded.

Title: The invaders attacked Nikopol 15 times a day
Description: notifies the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak. The enemy aimed at Nikopol, Pokrovska, Marganetska, Chervonogrigorivska and Myrivska communities. Damaged infrastructure. 2 five-story buildings, 13 private houses, 11 farm buildings, 3 garages, a car and a scooter were damaged. 3 greenhouses were mutilated, one more was destroyed. Caught a gas pipeline. People were not injured. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the Pokrovsky direction every day dozens of enemy attacks, however, the number of attack aircraft has changed — they have been drastically reduced.

Title: Effective guarantees are needed, a mere signature or promises are not enough for security — the Pres...
Description: He said this in his evening address. -Today is the 30th anniversary of the Budapest Memorandum. Ten years of war. This document has not worked for a single day. And because of this, everyone in the world will now know that just the signature of any state, some assurances or promises are not enough for security,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy said. The head of state also emphasized the need for timely supplies of weapons from Western partners. -Effective guarantees are needed. That is, a real alliance and a realistic security foundation within the country. A weapon that allows you to defend yourself and restrain the enemy. And unity, which helps to persevere even in the most difficult moments. We are working on each of the security elements. Thanks to everyone who helps! Thanks to all our people who provide all this,- he said.

Title: In the rear of the enemy: fighters of the special unit blew up a high-rise building with occupiers
Description: The video was published on the page of the National Guard of Ukraine. The building was occupied by enemy infantry, which had to be destroyed. They decided to do this by collapsing the entire structure directly on the occupiers. For this, the special forces approached the building with the enemy under cover of fire. In a matter of minutes, the house was filled with explosive devices, which detonated as soon as the fighters left. In this way, the special forces wished -good night to the occupiers-. In the video, you can hear the emotional cries of fighters who were a hair's breadth away from possible death. Omega aerial scouts recorded the result of the fighter's risky operation. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how fighters of the battalion of unmanned systems of the 63rd mechanized brigade -dron/->hit the occupier, who was carrying canisters with fuel.

Title: Crimes of the Russian army: more than 1,000 civilians have been blown up by landmines since the begi...
Description: This was reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Kharkiv, Kherson and Mykolaiv regions remain the most polluted freed territories. Representatives of the Main Department of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine reported this at the fifth review conference (5RC) on the implementation of the Convention on the Prohibition of the Use, Stockpiling, Production and Transfer of Anti-Personnel Mines and Their Destruction, which was held in the Kingdom of Cambodia within the framework of the Siem Reap-Angkor summit. Representatives of 90 participating countries, 12 observer countries of the Ottawa Convention and almost 20 delegations of various international organizations took part in the event. The Ukrainian delegation told the international community in detail about the crimes of the Russian Federation related to the use of anti-personnel mines against the civilian population. The conference participants were also provided with information about shelling of humanitarian demining groups, which prevent the full implementation of mine action activities. In addition, it was informed about the measures to clean up the territories contaminated by Russian anti-personnel mines and the progress in this area that the units of the Ministry of Defense managed to achieve during 2024. Thus, during the non-technical survey, 35,000 km² of the territory was marked as not containing evidence of the presence of risks. This made it possible to reduce the area of ​​potentially contaminated areas from 174,000 to 139,000 km². As reported by ArmyInform, in 2024 in Ukraine 10 new demining battalions were created. In addition, the fleet of mechanized demining vehicles increased from two units to 52, of which 42 are in the Armed Forces and 10 are in the State Special Transport Service.

Title: In the Kherson region, three people were injured due to Russian shelling
Description: The Kherson Regional Prosecutor's Office informed about this. As of 17:30, it is known about three victims among the civilian population. A 53-year-old man was injured due to the dropping of explosives from a drone in Kherson. Under similar circumstances, a 51-year-old man was injured in Antonivka. Also, as a result of an enemy attack on the village of Tomyna Balka, a 67-year-old man received acupressure and shrapnel wounds. As a result of shelling, seven civilian objects were damaged in the Kherson region, including private and apartment buildings, cars, etc. Under the procedural guidance of the prosecutor's office of the Kherson region, an investigation into the facts of war crimes was launched (Part 1 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine).

Title: Increasing the ruble discount rate will not help and it will continue to fall
Description: About this notifies the Foreign Intelligence Service of Ukraine. The regulator allows its increase to 25% at the next meeting of the board of directors on December 20. Also, according to the statement of the Central Bank, the exchange rate has become a new -pro-inflationary factor-. Price growth remains high, and the slowdown in lending, in particular corporate lending, is recorded. It is unlikely that an increase in the discount rate will help the ruble. High inflation of 8.8% and an increase in the key rate in December create significant risks for the Russian economy. We are talking about a decrease in the purchasing power of the population, an increase in the cost of lending, an increase in the debt burden, etc. The war against Ukraine is finally bringing the Russian economy into the abyss. We remind you that the Russian authorities plan to allow the use of in harmful jobs in the industry of teenagers from the age of 16.

Title: The Russians are looking for deserters at the TOT of the Kherson region
Description: This is reported by the Center of National resistance In the region, there have been recorded cases of massive non-compliance with orders by subordinates due to low morale and alcohol abuse. As a result, the occupation command made a decision to conduct police raids on abandoned settlements from the Russian Guard in order to find deserters. In case of detection of fugitives, they are thrown into meat assaults in other directions of the front. In this way, the enemy intimidates the personnel and maintains discipline. However, practice shows that even such methods do not help. We remind you that border guards together with the police exposed a corruption scheme organized by an active serviceman who promised to place a conscript in a -warm- military service for $5,000 service, avoiding the war zone.

Title: Oleksandr Syrsky awarded the artillery soldiers who are fighting in Kurshchyna
Description: This is stated in a message on the page on Facebook. -He presented the artillery soldiers with state awards and departmental awards and congratulated them on their professional holiday. Thank you for the courage, resilience and heroism that they show every day defending the state, destroying the enemy's armored vehicles and personnel on his land,- Oleksandr Syrskyi said. He emphasized that thanks to the Ukrainian soldiers in the Kursk region, it was possible to destroy the aggressor's plans to attack the Sumy direction from the Kursk region and transfer this war to the enemy's territory. As reported by ArmyInform, on December 4, on the occasion of the Day of Missile Troops and Artillery of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, President Volodymyr Zelenskyi met with Ukrainian defenders and honored them with state awards. The President also noted two artillery brigades with the medal of honor -For courage and bravery-.

Title: 82% of EW assets were contracted by the Ministry of Defense in less than three months after codifica...
Description: About this notified the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. -This allowed the Armed Forces of Ukraine to get new anti-UAV complexes, tactical EW, reconnaissance aircraft, deepstrike drones, attack kamikaze and copter-bombers without bureaucratic delays,- the minister noted. Rustem Umyerov reported that this year the Ministry of Defense has already allocated over 87 billion UAH for the purchase of drones, including 59 billion UAH for deepstrike drones. -By the end of the year, this amount will increase. Our task is to provide the army with high-quality drones and EW on time and in the right quantity. This is critically important for Ukraine's victory,- the minister concluded. As reported by ArmyInform, in 2025 for Ukrainian defenders supplies more than 30,000 DeepStrike attack drones.

Title: Due to colossal losses, the occupiers change their tactics in the Pokrovsky direction
Description: Mykola Koval, the head of the press service of the 14th Brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine -Chervona Kalina-, reported this on the -Suspilne.Novyny- broadcast. According to Mykola Koval, the enemy began to use less manpower. If earlier they could use only 50 people in one assault group in -roll-ups-, now a maximum of 10 soldiers attack. -It is already clear that they have suffered great losses, colossal, so they are changing tactics. The enemy continues to discover our weak points. Make a maximum concentration of assault groups in one place so that you can break through. But you can see that we have now stopped the active actions of the enemy in that direction,- said Mykola Koval. As ArmyInform wrote, in the Pokrovsky direction the enemy continues to press in the area of ​​Zhovte and Lysivka settlements.

Title: The Ministry of Defense named the type of troops that leads in the number of female military personn...
Description: About it in interview ArmyInform told Head of the Department of Humanitarian Support of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Diana Kopanytsia. According to her, the indicators are somewhat lower in the Air Force and Medical Forces, where the number of servicewomen in each branch exceeds 6,000. After all, we also have hundreds of women successfully serving and performing combat missions in the Special Operations Forces and the Unmanned Systems Forces,- Diana Kopanytsia shared the data. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Armed Forces of Ukraine, they told how many thousands of women on the frontline.

Title: Kharkiv region — counterattack on the occupiers, SSO captured Russians in Kursk region: stream from ...
Description: To do this, the special forces drove up in armored vehicles close to the high-rise building, pelted it with explosives and immediately left. The building exploded and buried the Russians under the rubble. SSO fighters entered enemy positions and captured 12 Russians, 17 more decided not to surrender, so they had to be liquidated. The video shows the work of soldiers of the 73rd Marine Center and the 6th Ranger Regiment during a raid on the Russians in the Kursk region. Operators of the -Rubizh- operational brigade tracked down and destroyed the Russians in the Limano-Kupian direction. Fighters intercepted a video signal from an enemy drone, which dropped ammunition on our positions, and returned to the base. With the help of the video, the National Guardsmen accurately determined the coordinates of the Russian position and sent FPV drones there. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters — Captain Artem Golub and Lieutenant Yevhen Nazarenko.

Title: Assault and sweep using the salami tactic: the GUR revealed unknown details of the mission in the Kh...
Description: This is stated in message GUR MOU. The units of active actions of the GUR of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Kraken, -Artan-, the International Legion, the Legion -Freedom of Russia- together with the fighters of the NSU and the Armed Forces of Ukraine knocked the enemy out of their positions with joint efforts. This operation forced the Russians to abandon the idea of ​​breaking through to Kharkiv and shelling the city with barrel artillery. The active phase of the operation took place according to the -salami tactic- - the advanced units of -Artan- and -Kraken- seized the first positions of the Russians and secured them. After that, the fighters of the International Legion, as well as the -LSR- brought their comrades from the -Charter- brigade to these positions, and the shock fists of the GUR went forward again. -The storming and clearing of some areas lasted an average of 3-4 days. Then it took about three days to gather forces, organize logistics and determine the next points on which we will strike. We scouted the situation, understood how many forces and means we needed to knock out the enemy, and then advanced again for several days,- said a special officer of the GUR MOU. The occupiers also had a system of underground passages and burrows in the area, which had to be stormed and cleared.

Title: The ZSU is introducing a new uniform for women: field, demi-season and winter
Description: About it in interview ArmyInform told Head of the Department of Humanitarian Support of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Diana Kopanytsia. -Every day, with the joint efforts of the Ministry of Defense and the General Staff, we are working to improve material support for female military personnel, and at the moment we have the following results in this direction. In December 2023, for the first time, female servicemen received 50,000 sets of summer field suits, which are made taking into account female anthropometric parameters. Such uniform samples contain structural elements that allow female servicemen to feel comfortable while performing tasks in field conditions and permanent deployment points,- said Diana Kopanytsia. According to her, field trials of demi-season uniforms for women are currently underway, and the first samples of winter uniforms are prepared for scientific and research tests. And during 2023, women's underwear was also tested, which in 2024 was supplied to the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -The supplied underwear samples cover a wide range of sizes and have a comfortable cut that does not restrict movement and is suitable for use in full equipment during combat missions. Ultimately, in December 2023 and January 2024, the Ministry of Defense certified two bulletproof vests for female servicemen. Appropriate means of protection have an outwardly curved armor plate, narrowed shoulders and an extended bottom, which helps adjust the body armor to the anatomical features of a woman,- Diana Kopanytsia summarized. As ArmiyaInform wrote, in November 2024 it became known that the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine ->starts conducting military (experimental) tests of new winter clothing and underwear designed for military personnel taking into account anthropometric data.

Title: Volodymyr Zelenskyi and Mark Rutte discussed the situation at the front and the supply of ammunition
Description: This was reported by /a> Office of the President. The head of state talked about the situation on the battlefield in general and in certain areas of Donetsk region, the course of operations in the Kursk region and the results of Ukraine's use of long-range capabilities provided by allies. The President emphasized that the uninterrupted supply of 155 mm caliber shells, weapons and military equipment from the announced support packages is important for the timely completion of combat brigades. Volodymyr Zelenskyi and Mark Rutte agreed to cooperate more actively with partners to implement the decisions of the Washington NATO summit regarding air defense systems and additional strengthening of Ukraine against Russian air terror in the winter. Separately, the head of state thanked the Secretary General of the Alliance for holding a meeting of the Ukraine-NATO Council at the level of foreign ministers in Brussels, all the signals about further military support for Ukraine and a clear understanding of the need for investments in the Ukrainian defense industry. The President emphasized the importance of inviting Ukraine to NATO. As ArmiyaInform reported, during a two-day ministerial meeting in Brussels of the countries of the North Atlantic Alliance discussed increasing aid to Ukraine against the background of Russian advance on the front.

Title: The defense forces of Ukraine will receive more than 30,000 DeepStrike attack UAVs in 2025
Description: This was announced on December 5 by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. According to him, some of these UAVs were financed by international partners, having invested in the Ukrainian defense industry. These new-generation drones are capable of operating autonomously at long distances and hitting enemy targets with high precision. Rustem Umyerov noted that the Ministry of Defense continues to increase investments in the development of high-tech systems. This not only meets the needs of the front, but also supports the defense industry, creates jobs and develops Ukrainian technology. -Ukraine is changing the rules of the game on the battlefield thanks to innovative technologies! We demonstrate to the world: Ukraine is capable of innovation and technological independence,- he assured. The Minister of Defense emphasized that even in the conditions of war, Ukrainians are developing state-of-the-art production, strengthening defense capabilities. -Ukraine is creating a techno-army ready to defend itself with all available means. This is an important signal to our allies and the enemy: we are strong, innovative and invincible!- - he summarized. As reported by ArmyInform, President Zelensky declared that the main guarantor of the Stability Plan should be weapons - 30 thousand long-range drones, 3,000 cruise missiles and a wave of technological innovation.

Title: For $5,000, he promised -warm- military service, but he was caught in the act
Description: About this informs December 5 State Border Service of Ukraine. -Operative employees of the 9th Border Detachment named after the Sich Riflemen documented in the regional center the fact of criminal activity of a person who abused his influence to resolve the issue of military service,- the DPSU said. In particular, it was about ensuring the service of a conscript in a military unit that is not involved in the performance of tasks in the area of ​​active hostilities. -For his -services-, the man planned to receive a monetary reward in the amount of 5 thousand US dollars from the -client-. These funds were allegedly intended to be transferred to the employees of the military medical commission,- the border guards noted. The perpetrator was detained while receiving the first tranche of illegal profit in the amount of 3,000 US dollars. -He demanded and received money from a man of draft age, promising first a limited fitness for service, and then securing service in a rear unit. Currently, the suspect has been remanded in custody with the possibility of bail in the amount of 151,400 hryvnias,- the report said. The measures were carried out within the scope of accompanying criminal proceedings, initiated based on the materials of operatives of the border agency under Art. 369-2 of the CCU -Abuse of influence-. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Intense battles: 106 clashes have been recorded at the front since the beginning of the day
Description: This is reported in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 16 :00 December 5. Border settlements continue to suffer from shelling from the territory of the Russian Federation. Areas of settlements of Krasnopill, Pokrovka and Demyanivka in Sumy region were affected by barrel artillery fire. In addition, the enemy carried out an airstrike with a KAB on Glukhov. In the Kupyan direction Ukrainian soldiers repulse three enemy attacks in the direction of Nova Kruglyakivka and Lozova. One attack has already been repelled. Petropavlivka and Lozov were hit by airstrikes by the National Army. On the Kharkiv direction, the Russian occupiers carried out an airstrike with a KAB in the Krugli area. On the Lymansky direction during the day, the invading army carried out 12 assaults and offensive operations near Grekivka, Tverdokhlibovo, Yampolivka, Terni, Zarichny, Torsky and in Serebryansk Forestry. Currently, four clashes are still ongoing. In the Kramatorsk direction, our defenders repulse the enemy's assault near Chasovoy Yar. In the direction of Toretsk Defense forces repelled one attack near Toretsk. In the Pokrovsky direction since the beginning of the day, the occupiers have made 26 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their positions in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Lysivka, Dachenske, Zhovte, Pushkine, Novotroitske, Shevchenko, Novopustinka settlements. The defense forces are holding back the onslaught and repulsed 18 enemy attacks. 8 clashes are still ongoing. In the Kurakhiv direction, the occupiers conducted 35 attacks near Berestki, Stary Terni, Zori, Sontsivka, Kurakhovo, Dalnyi, Elizavetivka, Hanivka, Romanivka, and Uspenivka. Ten clashes have been ongoing so far. In the Vremivsk direction, our defenders repelled enemy attacks fifteen times near Kostyantynopolsky, Rozlyv, Suhy Yali, Makarivka and Novodarivka, ten of them are still ongoing. In the Orikhov direction, our defenders repelled the enemy attack in the direction of Novodanilivka. In the Siversky, Gulyaipilsky and Dnipro directions at this time of the day, the enemy did not conduct active operations. In Kurshchyna Ukrainian defenders repelled seven enemy attacks, fighting continues in four more locations. In general, last day losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,580 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 13 tanks, 22 armored combat vehicles, 21 artillery systems, 31 operational-tactical UAVs, 97 units of automobile equipment and 2 units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: 15 years in prison: six citizens who fought against the Defense Forces of Ukraine were sentenced
Description: This is stated in the message of the Prosecutor General's Office. It has been proven that in January 2022, a resident of Luhansk voluntarily joined the Russian army, receiving the position of an armored personnel carrier gunner. He was engaged in the construction of defense structures and the protection of warehouses with ammunition. Later, five more citizens from Luhansk region and Donetsk region joined the army of occupiers, in particular, a former prisoner who signed a contract with the occupiers while in Makiivka correctional colony. All six took part in military operations against the Armed Forces of Ukraine. They built fortifications, guarded warehouses with ammunition, delivered them to positions and took direct part in the battles in Luhansk region, in particular near Vrubivka, and in Donetsk region - in the area of Avdiivki, the villages of New York, Berestov, Klishchiivki, Verkhnyotoretskoho. The men were detained by the Ukrainian military in August-October 2024. They were in custody until the verdicts were announced.

Title: More than 1,000 women in the Armed Forces have been awarded state awards
Description: About it in interview ArmyInform told Head of the Department of Humanitarian Support of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Diana Kopanytsia. -The number of female servicemen in leadership positions is almost 7,000, and this number shows a gradual trend towards growth,- Diana Kopanytsia said. More than 1,000 servicewomen have been awarded state awards and more than 18,000 have already received combatant status. We remind you that ArmyInform reported that at military universities this year the most popular specialties and specializations among women were by which commanders of mechanized units, units of Airborne Assault Forces and Special Operations Forces are trained.

Title: He restored communication on the occupied railway — a collaborator from the Kupyan region was taken ...
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this. According to the investigation, during the forcible seizure of Kupyan Oblast by the armed forces of the Russian Federation, the suspect, who before the full-scale invasion of the Russian Federation worked on the railway, voluntarily decided to work for the enemy. At the beginning of July 2022, the man, having relevant work experience and relevant professional skills, assumed the position of -head of the communication section of the shop- in the so-called -SE -Kupyanskaya zheleznaya doroga-. Using the material resources and capacities of the Ukrainian enterprise, the collaborator ensured the uninterrupted operation of the occupation railway. Acting in the interests of the enemy, the man organized and directly performed repair work related to the establishment and restoration of all types of communications. By his actions, the suspect helped the enemy to unhindered transport military equipment, ammunition and personnel from the Russian Federation to the temporarily occupied Ukrainian territories with the help of railway transport. The law enforcement officers collected the necessary evidence base and exposed the collaborator. At the request of the prosecution, the suspect was remanded in custody without bail. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that at dawn servicemen of the Kodim border service department of the Podilsk detachment discovered a group of people who tried to illegally cross the border with Moldova.

Title: Strengthening the Defense Forces: Ukraine and Norway intensify cooperation
Description: This is stated in message MoU. During the meeting, he spoke about the situation at the front, about Russia's daily shelling of the Ukrainian energy system with attack drones, cruise missiles and ballistic missiles. Lieutenant General Ivan Havryliuk named the critical needs of the Defense Forces of Ukraine. He also informed about the increasing support of the Russian Federation by the DPRK. It is not only about new supplies of ammunition and missiles. And about the increase in the number of North Korean troops near the borders of Ukraine. -The enemy is constantly changing the terror tactics of Ukraine. Ahead is a difficult winter period, which the aggressor will use to plunge our country into darkness and cold. We must quickly strengthen the capabilities of our air defense and replenish the stock of missiles to the existing systems. The Kremlin's desire for escalation should receive a consolidated response from our partners,- Ivan Gavryliuk emphasized. The representative of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of the Kingdom of Norway, Colonel Kjell Hauan, noted that supporting Ukraine is one of Norway's priorities. The participants of the Norwegian delegation assured of further active assistance within the framework of the Capability Coalitions. The parties agreed on steps to intensify cooperation in the production of certain types of weapons. The First Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine also emphasized the need to focus efforts on solving the task of equipping the units that are currently being formed with armored vehicles. As ArmiyaInform reported, Ivan Gavrylyuk discussed with the delegation of the British government new opportunities for cooperation in the field of defense industry, localization of production of defense products and use of revenues from frozen Russian assets.

Title: Reform of the food system of the Armed Forces: a pilot project will start in 2025
Description: About this informs December 5 Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Next year, the procurement agency of the DOT will ensure the purchase of food products for the Armed Forces of Ukraine, both under the current model and under the pilot model. -The essence of the innovation is that the selection of manufacturers will take place for individual groups of goods through public procurement platforms, and further shipment of products through the distribution centers of suppliers,- the statement said. The total expected value of contracts for the first half of 2025 is more than UAH 3 billion. -The reform of the food system of the Armed Forces reaches a new level. The announcement of tenders under the pilot model for 2025 is an important step towards raising quality standards and supply efficiency. We are implementing a modern approach that should improve reliability, transparency and compliance with the needs of our military,- said Deputy Defense Minister of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. According to him, the new mechanism will cover five regions and the city of Kyiv and will become a testing ground for large-scale changes in the future. First, the innovation will make it possible to control the quality of goods even before they go directly to the military. Second, it will allow open pricing for items most sensitive to value and quality. -The decision on the further deployment of the pilot project will be made based on the results of the first three months of its operation,- the MOU said. As reported by ArmyInform, the State Rear Operator of the Ministry of Defenseannounceda tender for the purchase of bottled water for the Ukrainian military for the first half of 2025.

Title: Volodymyr Zelenskyi called for active actions to free Ukrainians from Russian captivity
Description: He mentioned this in his Telegram channel. In his address, the head of state noted the world's insufficient reaction to Russia's crimes, in particular regarding the treatment of Ukrainian prisoners, the abduction of children, and destruction in the temporarily occupied territories of Ukraine. -We see how little the world reacts to what is being done to Ukrainian prisoners in Russia, and how few voices speak about kidnapped Ukrainian children. There is almost no reaction to what our occupied territories have turned into due to the Russian presence,- the head of state emphasized. The President thanked everyone who has already joined the work to restore human rights and peace in Ukraine, calling on the international community to be more active. -I ask everyone to be tireless and to involve in this work those who are still on the sidelines. States, organizations, leaders and communities that can help save people and ensure moral responsibility for Russia's crimes,- Volodymyr Zelenskyi said. As reported by ArmyInform, the President of Ukraine noted the importance of volunteers in the fight for the country's future.

Title: They have built logistical chains of people: the Russians have created a huge conveyor belt of death...
Description: Oleksandr Borodin, spokesman, told about this on the air of the -Edyny Novyni- telethon Third Assault Brigade. According to Oleksandr Borodin, the enemy clearly set the task of reaching the Oskil River. Another goal is the city of Borova. This is a common goal of invaders - such logistics centers are very important for the Russians. -They chose the tactics of daily assaults for the constant fatigue of our personnel. But if there is a possibility of rotation, and there are forces and means to ensure these rotations, it is possible to be in such conditions for a long time and protect people,- Oleksandr Borodin noted. The situation is extremely difficult. The occupiers have no problems with reserves, the spokesman of the Third Assault Division points out. The quality of training has fallen, but the infantry, albeit untrained, is sufficient. -They have built logistics chains of people. When one company is destroyed there, there is conditionally another, which stands on the second line of defense. And the third company, which is in the rear area,- said Oleksandr Borodin. How reported ArmyInform, in Kharkiv Oblast, the occupiers are digging underground cities to escape from Ukrainian FPV drones.

Title: In the Russian Federation, they are beginning to involve children in harmful industries
Description: About this informs the Foreign Intelligence Service of Ukraine. The Ministry of Industry and Trade of the Russian Federation believes that these changes -will allow enterprises to conclude agreements on paid internships with students of professional educational organizations.- In fact, the goal of such innovations is the desire of the Russian government to solve the problem of labor shortages, primarily at military-industrial complex enterprises. Such a deficit arose in the context of the war against Ukraine, mobilization and attempts to increase the volume of production of weapons and other military products. During the first half of this year, Russian employers sent job invitations to more than 3 million people aged 14 to 18. Propaganda of the Russian Federation tries to justify the involvement of teenagers in hazardous work with examples from the Second World War and the thesis that -work even in hazardous industries is safer for children than being on the street.- The actions of the Russian authorities once again proved the readiness of the Kremlin not to reckon with its own people, in particular with the interests of children, for the sake of aggressive goals in Ukraine.

Title: Military cars and administrative buildings were set on fire: five citizens were notified of suspicio...
Description: This is stated in message of the SBU. Among the participants: recidivists and unemployed seekers of -easy- money in Telegram channels. On the order of the occupiers, they tried to destroy two military vehicles and an administration building with the help of flammable mixtures. A 24-year-old resident of the capital, who previously served a prison term for drug trafficking, robbery and fraud, was arrested in Kyiv region on hot pursuit. After his release, he cooperated with the occupiers and agreed to perform a -test- task: to burn an SUV of the Armed Forces. Immediately after committing a new crime, he was detained by law enforcement officers. Two more suspects were found in one of the villages of Fastiv district, where they rented an apartment. Both were detained immediately after they set fire to an official SUV of the Air Force assault troops returning from the front line. They recorded the car fire on mobile phone cameras and sent a corresponding -report- to their Russian curator. According to the investigation, the perpetrators arrived in the capital region from Donetsk region as immigrants three years ago. One of them was already charged with robbery in 2018. In the Ternopil region, law enforcement officers detained two local residents, aged 20 and 23, who tried to destroy the administrative building of the village council near the regional center. First, the perpetrators broke the window of the state institution, and then poured a flammable mixture into the premises and set it on fire. Based on all the revealed facts, the detainees were notified of suspicion (according to the crimes committed) under two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: The suspects are in custody. They face up to 10 years in prison.

Title: The occupiers threw away FPV drones with their hands, threw machine guns at them and pretended to be...
Description: They published a video of combat work on December 5 on their channel. -The orcs try to shoot down the drones with their machine guns, pretend to be dead, pretend to be a tree and think that you can just throw away the ephivishka that didn't detonate immediately. But, fortunately, nothing helps them,- Ukrainian soldiers commented. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how fighters of the battalion of unmanned systems of the 63rd mechanized brigade -dron/->hit the occupier, who was carrying canisters with fuel.

Title: The Armed Forces said how many thousands of women are on the front lines
Description: About it in interview ArmyInform told Head of the Department of Humanitarian Support of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Diana Kopanytsia. Thus, as of October, the total number of women in the Armed Forces of Ukraine was almost 69,000, of which more than 48,000 were military personnel. -On the other hand, in January 2022, on the eve of a large-scale invasion, the total number of women in the Armed Forces of Ukraine was more than 52,000,- said Diana Kopanytsia. According to her, more than five and a half thousand women soldiers are currently on the front line. Let us remind you that on November 17, the anti-aircraft gunner of the anti-aircraft missile unit of the Galicia-Volyn radio engineering brigade Natalia Grabarchuk destroyed a MANPADS cruise missile -Needle-. It was her first combat launch and first hit.

Title: The forces of unmanned systems hit the Tor-M2 air defense system combat vehicle
Description: This was reported by the press service of the Unmanned Systems Forces. -BM 9A331M2 Tor-M2 is capable of firing on the move, without stopping, has an increased ammunition and is equipped with modern missiles that provide an extended target area and increased accuracy,- the message reads. The cost of the unit is estimated at approximately 27 million US dollars. As reported by ArmyInform, operators of the 73rd Marine Center and the 6th Ranger Regiment during a raid on enemy positions in the Kursk region destroyed 17 enemies and another 12 were captured.

Title: -Magnificent seven- on the border with Moldova: a drone intercepted an interesting company of violat...
Description: This is informed by /a> State Border Service of Ukraine. The movement of seven people heading to the state border was recorded by the operator of an unmanned aerial vehicle. Violators were detained near the border in the Podilsky district of the Odesa region. As it turned out, residents of Kyiv, Zhytomyr, Odesa, Kherson and Sumy regions tried to enter Moldova illegally. Their actions were coordinated by the Telegram channel administrator, who remotely managed the group. For a successful transfer, each of the detainees had to pay the organizer 3,000 USD. Administrative protocols were drawn up against the detained violators under Article 204-1 of the Code of Ukraine on Administrative Offenses. The cases have been referred to the court. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The President of Ukraine noted the importance of volunteers in the fight for the country's future
Description: He wrote about this on social networks on December 5. -Ukrainians from all parts of our country, friends from many countries, caring hearts that overcome everything. Today is International Volunteer Day. People who unite others and thereby help save everyone. I am grateful to everyone who helps our army, our people throughout this war,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy emphasized. Formerly the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov thankedvolunteers for tireless work, big hearts, indomitable faith in victory and assured that they have become a real support for our country. As reported by ArmyInform, the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, General Oleksandr Syrskyi congratulated Ukrainian volunteers on International Volunteer Day. In his address, he emphasized the important role of the volunteer movement in supporting the Ukrainian army.

Title: Organization of the resistance movement and internal control: the Ministry of Defense approved new m...
Description: The relevant order -On the approval of changes to the List of military accounting specialties of officers and the List of military accounting specialties, according to which the primary military rank of reserve junior lieutenant can be assigned- No. 691 dated 15.10.2024 year has already been entered into the Unified State Register of Regulatory Acts. In particular, new specialties have appeared: For example, there is no longer a -Political Science- specialty. Instead, -Moral support- was added. Some other accounting specialties of this group have received name changes. For the most part, the emphasis is on the organization of psychological support for personnel (psychological support). The full list of changes can be found in the document itself. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov signed the order, which introduces a new full-time position in each brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine — the authorized officer for procurement of goods, works and services

Title: Enemy troops attacked Chernihiv region, there is destruction
Description: informs the head of Chernihiv OVA Vyacheslav Chaus about this. -At night, the air-raid alarm sounded again. The enemy attacked Chernihiv Oblast. Previously, -Shakhedami-. It is known about the destruction in the village of Koryukiv district,- the message reads. According to Vyacheslav Chaus, the occupiers damaged the windows, doors and roof of a private house, as well as a barn. -Fortunately, no casualties. russia is a terrorist. Terrorists must be destroyed,- he emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of December 5, 2024, the enemy -oblastyah/->strike on Dniprovshchyna with two Iskander-M ballistic missiles from the Rostov region, also attacked Ukraine with 44 Shahed-type attack UAVs and other types of drones (launch areas: Orel, Kursk - Russian Federation).

Title: A complete failure - the fighters are left to survive without food and water: the attacks of the Rus...
Description: The spokesman of the operational and strategic group of troops -Khortytsia- lieutenant colonel Nazar Voloshyn. According to Nazar Voloshyn, everyone is thrown to storm. There is information about female stormtroopers. -For the most part, in the occupation army, women are recruited as medical personnel in the communication and supply units. Recently, they have been spotted taking part in some storm action. These are former prisoners, convicts from the -Storm- units,- said Lieutenant Colonel Nazar Voloshyn. The spokesperson of the Khortytsia operational-strategic grouping of troops notes that the attitude of the Russian leadership towards attack aircraft is a one-time waste. -Russian servicemen, especially from front-line units, complain about logistical support. They lack ammunition, food and water. This all became a pressing issue. The complete failure of the Russian army - the soldiers are left to survive without food and water,- said Nazar Voloshyn. As reported by /a> The Army informs that on the Eastern Front the enemy is -burning- strategic reserves in attacks - the most difficult on Pokrovsky, Kurakhiv and Vremiv directions.

Title: Organization of the resistance movement, moral support and internal control: the Ministry of Defense...
Description: The relevant order -On the approval of changes to the List of military accounting specialties of officers and the List of military accounting specialties, according to which the primary military rank of reserve junior lieutenant can be assigned- No. 691 dated 15.10.2024 year has already been entered into the Unified State Register of Regulatory Acts. In particular, new specialties have appeared: For example, there is no longer a -Political Science- specialty. Instead, -Moral support- was added. Some other accounting specialties of this group have received name changes. For the most part, the emphasis is on the organization of psychological support for personnel (psychological support). The full list of changes can be found in the document itself. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov signed the order, which introduces a new full-time position in each brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine — the authorized officer for procurement of goods, works and services

Title: They can put a battalion literally behind one house: the enemy is trying to press -with meat-
Description: This was told by the spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU on the broadcast of the -Edyny Novyni- telethon - Major Anastasia Bobovnikova. According to Anastasia Bobovnikova, the Russian army leadership considers its people expendable material that can be spent without limit. -They lose a mechanized battalion in a week, it's only in Toretsk alone. Yes, they are making progress, but very slowly. They can literally put an entire mechanized battalion behind the house,- the spokeswoman said. In place of the destroyed stormtroopers, others come. The offensive, says Anastasia Bobovnikova, is ongoing. -Unfortunately, they have a large resource of this meat. If the technique is used less in this area, then there is a lot of human resources there. With an emphasis on the word -very,- said the spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU.
