Previously ArmyInform reported that in the city of Toretsk, the week of urban battles is postponed in the Russian army of occupation up to half a thousand people.

Title: In Kurshchyna, the rangers captured 12 Russian marines and destroyed another 17
Description: published a video of combat work on their Special Operations Forces channel on December 5. In the video, the prisoners of war said that they were from the 810th Marine Brigade of the Russian Federation. Earlier, ArmiyaInform showed how the soldiers of the 6th Ranger Special Operations Forces regiment together with the adjacent units of the Defense Forces replenish the exchange fund in Kurshchyna, in particular, during aerial reconnaissance, the BPAK operatorsdiscovered 30 enemy infantrys, who made their way to the position in two groups. Also operators of the 73rd maritime center of the SSO carried out a raid on enemy positions in the Kursk region and successfully replenished the exchange fund with four servicemen of the Russian Federation.

Title: Escape in flippers: a Russian agent was building schemes for evaders
Description: informs the Security Service of Ukraine about this. It is noted that the 52-year-old resident of the Zhytomyr region, a former representative of the banned Derzhava party, was remotely recruited by the Kremlin's special services. At the behest of the FSB, he created a network of Telegram channels, where he provided conscripts with instructions to avoid mobilization, suggesting escape routes through forests and reservoirs outside checkpoints. The detainee was engaged in reconnaissance of border areas, marked routes on maps and handed them over to clients. After fleeing to the Russian Federation, he planned to participate in information and psychological operations against Ukraine, appearing on the airwaves of Russian propaganda media to discredit Ukrainian state institutions. SBU investigators informed the detainee of the suspicion for h. 2 Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason under martial law). He faces up to life in prison with forfeiture of property. Previously, his actions were qualified as: Operative measures were carried out by SBU employees in Chernihiv region together with the State Border Service under the procedural guidance of the Chernihiv regional prosecutor's office. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Numerous victims and large-scale destruction: the Russians do not stop shelling Donetsk region
Description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. Pokrovskyi district: Kramatorskyi district: Bakhmutskyi district: As a result of shelling, 237 people were evacuated, including 13 children. Work to eliminate the consequences of the attacks continues. As reported by ArmyInform, in Kharkiv Oblast through Russian shelling is new destruction and victims.

Title: -Shortening their age is the easiest way for them to end the war-: Russian attack aircraft en masse ...
Description: Yuriy Syrotyuk, the main a fire support company sergeant in the 5th Separate Assault Brigade. According to Yuriy Syrotyuk, well-constructed defenses make it possible to deter the enemy's daily attacks, but the enemy continues to throw infantrymen into -meat assaults-. -Sometimes it's surprising how mercilessly they use their infantry… They go into battle under the compulsion of death. They go without proper support. Imagine their psychological state. Therefore, it is clear that for many of them, shortening their age is the easiest way to end the war,- Yuriy Syrotyuk noted. How reported ArmyInform, in the Kramatorsk direction, the enemy continues to concentrate its main efforts around the city of Chasiv Yar, but the Defense Forces maintain their positions

Title: Over 120 novelties for the front: Ukraine is expanding its arsenal of weapons
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. In the list of codified OVT novelties in November, the most are unmanned aircraft complexes, ammunition (mainly UAVs), engineering means, EW/PER means, and communication. Most of them are also of Ukrainian design. In addition, the list of new anti-terrorist weapons, which were approved for use during November, includes new mobile rocket launchers (for individual units of the Defense Forces), a new armor-piercing cartridge, a sanitary-evacuation armored car of domestic production, etc. -Such a number of new codified samples of anti-aircraft weapons in just one month testifies to the significant dynamics of weapons development in Ukraine by individual nomenclature. Individual samples of Ukrainian weapons have unique characteristics. We are working to ensure that they end up with our military as soon as possible,- said Deputy Defense Minister of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. As reported by ArmyInform, The Ministry of Defense allowed the use of JCB HMEE excavators in troops.

Title: The President of Ukraine signed a decree on sanctions against the pro-Russian government of Georgia
Description: The President told this in his address on December 5. -These are sanctions against that part of the government now in Georgia, which is handing over Georgia to Putin. It is important that partners also now talk about their position, honestly declare what is happening. And we need to act,- he declared. According to him, this is what happens in international affairs: if you do not react in time, then decades will be lost, and countries will be deprived of their freedom. -You cannot lose anyone in this region - neither Georgia, nor Moldova, nor Ukraine. We must defend ourselves against Moscow together. Ukraine applied sanctions against Ivanishvili and his accomplices — 19 people. It is those who sell the interests of Georgia and the people. And we call on Europe, America, everyone in the world to act in the same way - to act on principle,- he stressed. Previously, Volodymyr Zelensky reported that the authorities in Georgia are pushing the country into obvious dependence on Russia. He noted that Ukraine's legal response to the events in Georgia is being prepared and work is underway with Europeans and other partners on specific actions.

Title: In the Kharkiv region, new destruction and victims appeared due to Russian shelling
Description: Oleg Synegubov, the head of the Kharkiv Regional Military Administration, informs about this. At 6:25 p.m. in the city of Kupyansk, the enemy damaged private houses as a result of shelling with guided aerial bombs. A 40-year-old man died. Two women aged 40 and 69 were also injured. Around 4:00 p.m., a private house was partially damaged in the village of Oleksandrivka, Zolochiv community, Bogodukhiv district, due to an unidentified drone strike. At 11:50 in Kupyansk, a Russian FPV drone hit a civilian car at the entrance to the city. As a result of the explosion, a 65-year-old man was injured. During the day, 72 people were evacuated from the Borivskyi and Kupyanskyi directions. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day the occupiers also 389 strikes on 10 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region. A 78-year-old woman was injured as a result of an enemy attack in Zaporizhzhya district.

Title: The forests burned, the mines stopped: the occupiers justify the failures in the Luhansk region
Description: This was reported by the head of the Luhansk OVA, Artem Lysohor. However, the real consequences of the activities of Russian investors, who received mines in the region back in February, remain doubtful. Among the -results- of the work are mass layoffs, salary delays, and dismantling of equipment. Meanwhile, the occupying authorities of Luhansk region blame the destruction of 4.3 thousand hectares of forests around Stanytsia Luhanska solely on climatic conditions. The local forest farm claims that the cause of the fires was an increase in air temperature. Other factors - the lack of preventive measures, the shortage of extinguishing agents and rescuers - are not taken into account by the occupiers. As well as the failure of the disaster relief campaign. Residents of the affected settlements, whose houses burned down, were mostly forced to evacuate on their own. Rescue units of the occupiers did not arrive at the site, leaving people to fight the fire alone. The situation in the occupied Luhansk region demonstrates that real assistance to the population and solving environmental problems remain on the margins of the occupation administration's attention. As reported by ArmyInform, the occupying authorities of Luhansk region intensified forced mobilization, directing efforts to attract young people to the army of the Russian Federation. Workers of military commissariats carry out inspections in public places and at addresses, forcing conscripts to sign contracts, bypassing their military service.

Title: Night shelling of Nikopol region: the enemy attacked with drones, rockets and artillery
Description: reported the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak. The enemy used rockets, kamikaze drones and artillery. As a result of the shelling, an agricultural company, several private houses, an outbuilding, a car, a gas pipeline and a power line were damaged. According to preliminary data, there were no casualties among the local population. Rescuers and utilities are working to clean up the aftermath of the attacks. We will remind, during the last day the Russian army 20 times attacked Nikopol region, as a result of the shelling one person was killed and one was injured. As reported by ArmyInform, almost 400 strikes per day: occupiers set fire to Zaporozhye.

Title: The defense forces attacked the enemy's control post
Description: This is reported in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 8 :00 December 5. Yesterday, the enemy hit the positions of Ukrainian units and populated areas with one missile attack using two missiles, and also 41 airstrikes, including 55 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, it carried out more than 4,800 attacks, 152 of them from rocket salvo fire systems, and engaged about 2,240 kamikaze drones for attacks. The aggressor also carried out airstrikes in the areas of Krasnopillya, Veterinarne, Vovchanski Khutory, Dvorichna, Petropavlivka, Lozova, Kostyantynivka, Gulyaipole, Novoandriivka. As reported by ArmyInform, the last day /->losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,580 people. Also, Ukrainian soldiers destroyed 13 tanks, 22 armored combat vehicles, 21 artillery systems, 31 UAVs of operational-tactical level, 97 units of automobile equipment and 2 units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: Two victims and dozens of destructions: the consequences of Russian strikes on the Kherson region
Description: informs about this, the head of Kherson OVA Oleksandr Prokudin. Antonivka, Beryslav, Ingulets, Poniativka, Mykilske, Prydniprovske, Priozerne, Tomyna Balka, Shiroka Balka, Veletenske, Red Lighthouse, Milove, Monastyrske, Bilozerka, Vysoke, Novovorontsovka, Nadezhdivka, Zelenivka, Novodmytrivka, Stanislav came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. and the city of Kherson. It is noted that the Russian military hit critical infrastructure. Also, the occupiers hit the residential quarters of the population centers of the region, in particular, they damaged 5 private houses. In addition, the occupiers mutilated gas pipelines, commercial buildings and private cars. As reported by ArmyInform, almost 400 strikes per day: occupiers set fire to Zaporozhye.

Title: The Netherlands will provide an additional 22 million euros to strengthen Ukrainian air defense
Description: reported this by the head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands Caspar Veldkamp following the results of the two-day NATO ministerial meeting in Brussels . -At the meeting of the Ukraine-NATO Council, I emphasized the importance of strengthening the military potential of Ukraine,- the message reads. He added that Russia's actions directly threaten NATO through massive military buildup, airspace incursions, and acts of sabotage. -At the meeting of the North Atlantic Council in Brussels, I emphasized that we must step up our efforts to confront this reckless and destabilizing behavior,- he noted. The minister emphasized that it is also necessary to pay attention to third countries that help the Russian war machine. -This requires a tougher and more coordinated response from NATO and allies. First of all, we must stay the course when it comes to supporting Ukraine. There is simply no alternative,- he emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, at the end of November the Netherlands announced about the transfer to Ukraine of three launchers of the Patriot anti-aircraft missile complex.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Russia's night strike: Ukraine repelled a drone attack in 11 regions
Description: The Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this. As of 08:30, units of anti-aircraft missile forces, EW and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and Defense Forces of Ukraine shot down 30 enemy UAVs in Kyiv, Kharkiv, Poltava, Sumy, Chernihiv, Cherkasy, Kirovohrad, Zhytomyr, Vinnytsia, Khmelnytsky and Odesa regions. It is noted that 12 drones were lost in location, 1 left the controlled airspace in the direction of Belarus. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kursk region, the enemy stormed the positions of our defenders 22 times.

Title: -Symbol of unity of Ukrainians-: Rustem Umyerov thanked the volunteers for their tireless work
Description: He wrote about this on December 5 in social networks. -Volunteers are the heart of Ukraine. Today, on International Volunteer Day, I want to address those who have become a real support for our country. You are our staunch allies. Your strength is in the actions that are not seen by the cameras, but are felt by our soldiers. Thanks to you, our army is stronger and our frontline is secure,- he declared. Rustem Umyerov emphasized that every camouflage net, every trench candle, every repaired drone is the daily work of volunteers, their contribution to victory. -You find ways to solve problems where it seems impossible. You are not afraid of distances, difficulties and dangers. The volunteer movement is not just about helping. It is a symbol of Ukrainian unity. A symbol of the fact that in the struggle for freedom each of us is ready to do everything possible and impossible. Kudos to our volunteers,- he concluded. As reported by ArmyInform, the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, General Oleksandr Syrskyi congratulated Ukrainian volunteers on International Volunteer Day. In his address, he emphasized the important role of the volunteer movement in supporting the Ukrainian army.

Title: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine: In the Kursk region, the enemy stormed the positio...
Description: About this going in operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 08:00 on December 5. N and the Kharkiv direction had seven enemy attacks in the areas of the settlements of Vovchansk, Visoka Yaruga, Hlyboke, in addition, the enemy actively engaged bomber aircraft. In the Kupyansk direction, 15 attacks by the occupiers took place during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults in the direction of Kucherivka, Synkivka, Petropavlivka, Pershotravnevo, Zeleny Gay and Lozova. On the Lymansky direction the enemy attacked 14 times. Tried to advance near Grekivka, Druzhelyubivka, Makiivka, Terni and Zarichny. On the Toretsk direction the enemy launched four attacks in the Toretsk area. On In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 41 assault and offensive actions of the aggressor in the direction of Myrolyubivka, Promeny, Lysivka, Dachenskyi, Zhovtoy, Shevchenko, Chumatskyi and Novopustinka. In the Kurakhiv direction Defense forces repelled 41 enemy assaults. The main offensive efforts of the enemy were concentrated in the areas of Sontsivka, Berestki, Zori, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhovo, Dalny, Dachny, Romanivka, Elizavetivka, and Uspenivka. In the Vremivka direction the enemy carried out 19 assaults on our positions not far from Zeleny Pol, Novodarivka, Kostyantynopolskyi and Suhy Yali. On In the Gulyaipil and Orihiv directions the invaders did not carry out offensive actions, but they actively used aviation. In the Dnieper direction the Russian invaders attacked our positions five times. They received a tough repulse and suffered losses. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. On the border with the Chernihiv and Sumy regions, the enemy with the territory of the Russian Federation uses artillery and aviation in the areas of Ukrainian settlements. The operation in the Kursk region is ongoing. Last day, the enemy stormed the positions of our defenders 22 times, launched 335 artillery strikes, 17 airstrikes, dropping 25 anti-aircraft missiles. Our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying troops and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. . In general, last day losses Russian invaders numbered 1580 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 13 tanks, 22 armored combat vehicles, 21 artillery systems, 31 operational-tactical UAVs, 97 vehicles and 2 special vehicles of the occupiers.

Title: Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces: The stability of the army is impossible without volunteer su...
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. Oleksandr Syrsky noted that it is symbolic that this day is celebrated on the eve of the Day of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The volunteer movement, which came to support the soldiers back in 2014, became the most powerful in the world during Russia's large-scale aggression. -Ukrainian volunteers work according to the principle: either you are in the army or you are for the army. Their help is the warmth of the hands and self-sacrifice that every soldier and unit feels,- Oleksandr Syrsky emphasized. He emphasized that the stability of the Ukrainian army in the face of the enemy, which prevails in terms of numbers and resources, would be impossible without the support of volunteers. Thanks to their efforts, the army receives the necessary drones, cars, first-aid kits, trench candles and other assistance. The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine expressed his sincere gratitude to each volunteer and wished good luck and health to all who join the joint struggle. -Let's win together!- - concluded the general. As reported by ArmyInform, Oleksandr Syrsky defined the task of stabilizing the situation in threatening directions.

Title: Almost a hundred vehicles and 1,580 occupants: the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine anno...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 05.12.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, fierce battles in the East: the General Staff of the Armed Forces named two the hottest directions of the front.

Title: The Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine said how many Russian missile carriers are in the Black Sea
Description: The Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. In the Mediterranean Sea, there are 6 enemy ships, 4 of them are carriers of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 41 missiles. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea of ​​1974 (SOLAS) by turning off automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, during the visit of a delegation of industry representatives of the Kingdom of Denmark to a meeting was held with Ukrainian military sailors and shipbuilding specialists.

Title: Propagandists attack the computer game: what they invented this time
Description: According to the propagandists, the game allegedly collects players' personal data, such as IP addresses, names, locations, even without their consent, passing this information to Ukrainian military commissariats. This fake was accompanied by the use of the Wired logo, which was supposed to give the information the appearance of authenticity. Propagandists also claim that the studio received funding from the Ukrainian government in exchange for such activities. About this writes Center for Strategic Communications and Information Security. In fact, the GSC Game World studio raised significant funds ($800,000) for the support of the Armed Forces with the help of crowdfunding and donated them to the Ukrainian charity -Return Alive-. In response, Russia started a campaign against the game, including statements about its possible ban. This case is another example of the spread of disinformation aimed at discrediting Ukrainian achievements, particularly in the field of video games. It's also a continuation of a campaign similar to Netflix's previously documented fake trailer disinformation campaign dubbed -Matryoshka-. The main goal of such fakes is to undermine trust in Ukraine and its initiatives on the world stage. Eugene Bouquet

Title: Almost 400 strikes per day: the occupiers covered Zaporozhye with fire
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhzhya OVA. Russian troops carried out 13 airstrikes on Gulyaipol, Novoandriivka and Novopavlivka. According to him, 236 UAVs of various modifications attacked Komyshuvakha, Kam'yansk, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghirya and Novodarivka. Also, 5 shellings from the RSZV were carried out on the territory of Gulyaipol, Novodanilivka and Malaya Tokmachka. In addition, 135 artillery strikes fell on Kam'yansk, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Malia Tokmachka, Biloghirya and Novodarivka. 8 reports were received about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day Russian Army 20 attacked Nikopolshchyna several times, as a result of the shelling, one person was killed and one was injured.

Title: Is there gender equality in the military: about the number of women in the army, body uniform and NA...
Description: The ArmiyaInform correspondent asked Diana Kopanytsia, the head of the Department of Humanitarian Support of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, about all this and more. — Ms. Diana, can you provide statistics on women in the Armed Forces of Ukraine? How many in total are in the ranks of the Armed Forces as of the beginning of December 2024, of which there are military personnel? What are the statistics on women in genera and species (number of women)? — Over the past three years, the number of women in the Armed Forces of Ukraine, compared to the data before the beginning of the large-scale invasion, has increased by more than 20%. As of October, the total number of women in the Armed Forces of Ukraine was almost 69,000, of which more than 48,000 were military personnel. Instead, in January 2022, on the eve of a large-scale invasion, the total number of women in the Armed Forces of Ukraine was more than 52,000. Currently, more than 5,500 women soldiers are on the front line. Among women in the Armed Forces of Ukraine, we now also have more than 10,000 officers, more than 13,000 sergeants, more than 23,000 soldiers and more than 1,500 cadets. The number of female servicemen in leadership positions is almost 7,000, and this figure shows a gradual trend towards growth. More than 1,000 servicewomen have been awarded state awards and more than 18,000 servicewomen have already received combatant status. As for the information in the breakdown of the number of women by military branch, the largest number of women is usually in the Ground Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as the largest branch of the military, where more than 18,000 women serve. The figures are somewhat lower in the Air Force and Medical Forces, where the number of women in each branch exceeds 6,000 servicemen. A fairly significant number of female military personnel is also observed in the Territorial Defense Forces, Support Forces and Logistics Forces, and the Naval Forces. After all, we also have hundreds of women successfully serving and performing combat missions in the Special Operations Forces and the Unmanned Systems Forces. — Ukrainian servicemen appeal attentionthat sexism in the army is a widespread phenomenon and lack of material support is one of its manifestations. In particular, it is about the form according to the size and shape of the body, anatomical body armor, underwear, etc. What coordinate system are we currently in to correct this situation? What is your administration doing for this? — Prior to the start of the large-scale invasion, security in the Armed Forces of Ukraine was predominantly male-oriented. In particular, at the level of regulatory documents of the Ministry of Defense, only a single uniform standard was approved - men's. The women's uniform was provided only for the formal one - a petticoat, a skirt and high-heeled shoes. There were also no requirements for personal protective equipment and other tactical items for female servicemen. This created problems for female military personnel, who were forced to wear men's uniforms that did not meet their physiological needs and anthropometric parameters. The situation with the material support of female servicemen in the Armed Forces of Ukraine is not ideal, but it has positive dynamics. Every day, with the joint efforts of the Ministry of Defense and the General Staff, we work to improve the material support of female servicemen, and at the moment we have the following results in this direction. In December 2023, for the first time, female servicemen received 50,000 sets of summer field suits, which are made taking into account female anthropometric parameters. Such uniform samples contain structural elements that allow female servicemen to feel comfortable while performing tasks in field conditions and permanent deployment points. Field trials of the women's demi-season uniform are currently underway, and the first samples of the winter uniform are ready for research testing. During 2023, women's underwear was also tested, which in 2024 was supplied to the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The supplied underwear samples cover a wide range of sizes, and also have a comfortable cut that does not restrict movement and is suitable for use in full equipment when performing combat tasks. Ultimately, in December 2023 and January 2024, the Ministry of Defense certified two bulletproof vests for female servicemen. The corresponding protective equipment has an outwardly curved armor plate, narrowed shoulders and an extended bottom, which helps to adjust the body armor to the anatomical features of a woman. — Where do you see a positive trend regarding gender policy in the Armed Forces during a large-scale war? Where is the critical situation, and where is the most needed point of effort? — A key achievement in ensuring gender equality in the Armed Forces of Ukraine is the removal of legal restrictions on the tenure of women in military positions. Since 2018, Ukraine has managed to significantly expand the range of combat positions for women: there are opportunities to be commanders of infantry units, female snipers, machine gunners, grenade launchers, scouts, and even drive armored vehicles or be a tank gunner. As of today, there are no regulatory obstacles to the occupation of positions by women in the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Women have the opportunity to serve in positions of their choosing, including typical combat specialties (recon, sniper, machine gunner, grenade launcher, gunner or UAV operator - ed.). And as practice shows, women in such positions are effective. At the same time, we periodically receive requests that, in fact, commanders do not admit female servicemen to combat positions, despite the high motivation of such women and the absence of objective obstacles to the performance of such tasks. We are working together with gender advisers and commanders of the types and separate branches of the Armed Forces of Ukraine to minimize such discrimination. — How do you cooperate with partners in the context of gender equality? What do they praise for, and what shortcomings do they point to? — Cooperation with international partners is one of the main areas of activity of the Office, as the direction of gender equality is an important direction. Most of the standards in the field of ensuring gender equality are borrowed from international documents in the field of human rights, as well as the practice of international courts. I also want to note the fruitful cooperation of the management with our Ukrainian partners and experts in the field of ensuring gender equality. Thus, during 2023-2024, more than 250 advisers on gender issues of the Ministry of Defense have already undergone educational training with the assistance of national and international public organizations. The Department also systematically and productively cooperates with the Government Commissioner for Gender Policy Kateryna Levchenko regarding the implementation of the -Women, peace, security- agenda. Thanks to the professional work of these organizations and experts, the advisers on gender issues had the opportunity to familiarize themselves with international approaches to the issues of preventing and combating manifestations of discrimination, gender-based and domestic violence, the foundations of international humanitarian law. - When we talk about -NATO's gender equality standards- - what exactly are we talking about? Explain in simple language. - Put simply, the NATO Gender Equality Standards are a set of rules, guidelines and principles that help ensure equal opportunities, in particular, for women and men in the armed forces of NATO member and partner countries. The goal of these standards is to create an environment where every service member, regardless of gender or gender identity, can fulfill their potential. At the same time, gender equality does not at all mean that we should allocate equal resources to meet the needs of women and men in the military, or fully equalize men and women in terms of rights and responsibilities during service. True gender equality involves the fair distribution of resources and the creation of equal conditions for people, taking into account their gender needs. After all, it is quite clear that the proper material support of a woman who performs combat tasks may require more resources than in the case of creating identical conditions for male servicemen. If we look at this issue from a practical perspective, then in this context we should also mention the initial requirements for the interoperability of Ukraine with NATO, which Ukraine must implement in the near future so that our Armed Forces can effectively interact with the military structures of the member countries of the Alliance and conduct joint military operations. Such requirements include, for example, the introduction of a clear system of gender advisers in the Ministry of Defense system, the removal of legal barriers that prevent the participation and representation of women in security and defense sector institutions, thematic training for gender advisers, the development of prevention policies and responding to sexual violence in the military, etc. — At the beginning of October 2024, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine announced that it plans to conduct a gender analysis and identify institutional obstacles to the implementation of equality programs in the ranks of the Armed Forces. As of the beginning of December - how are things going? - To begin with, it is worth finding out what gender analysis actually is. Simply put, it is the identification and assessment of barriers that exist in law or in practice that prevent equal rights and opportunities for service members because of their gender or gender identity. Gender analysis involves collecting and analyzing data (for example, the number of women and men in different units - ed.), identifying practices or rules that may create inequality (for example, women's limited access to certain military occupations), and ultimately, the preparation of recommendations or draft regulations designed to solve the identified problems. That is, effective gender analysis is a long and painstaking work that requires the processing of a large amount of diverse data. Another important area of ​​our work is the gender analysis of data on military positions held by women and the identification of barriers that prevent women from effectively performing their duties. Our strategic goal is to create all the necessary conditions for women to occupy leadership positions in the army, demonstrating their professional qualities and leadership skills. - What are you planning for 2025 in the context of gender policy in the Armed Forces? - One of the key priorities for the next year is the regulatory regulation of the status and powers of the gender advisor in the Ministry of Defense system in accordance with NATO standards and best practices. We will also continue the gender analysis of the current needs of female servicemen in the army and, based on its results, we will work on improving the physical and material support of female servicemen, in particular, in cooperation with international partners. And, as we have done this year, we will work hard to train our gender advisers so that they can get not only the legal status and powers written in the regulations, but also practical tools to carry out their daily activities, and in the future they can participate in joint operations involving NATO countries. A separate priority is for us to improve the language training of advisors on gender issues, because, as I mentioned earlier, gender issues are of a global nature and are based on international regulatory documents and NATO standards, most of which are written in English. Photo from Diana Kopanytsia's personal archive

Title: Fierce battles in the East: the General Staff of the Armed Forces named the two hottest areas of the...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The enemy carried out 25 airstrikes on the territory of Ukraine, shooting down 29 anti-aircraft missiles, and used 654 kamikaze drones to destroy them. He carried out almost 4,000 attacks on the positions of our troops and population centers. In the Kharkiv direction the enemy attacked five times near Vovchansk and Hlyboky. One battle is still going on. Veterinarne suffered an airstrike. On the Kupyansk direction the aggressor tried 15 times to advance to our positions near Kucherivka, Synkivka, Petropavlivka, Pershotravnevo, Zeleny Gay and Lozova. All enemy attacks were repelled by the Defense Forces. Also, the occupiers' aircraft struck Dvorichnaya with anti-aircraft missiles, and Lozova and Petropavlivka were attacked by anti-aircraft missiles. On the Lymansky direction the enemy attacked 13 times in the districts of Grekivka, Druzhelyubivka, Makiivka, Terniv, and Zarichny. Our soldiers stopped 11 attempts of the enemy to advance. Two clashes are still ongoing. In the Toretsk direction the enemy carried out offensive actions against the positions of our troops in the Toretsk area four times. Two attacks have already been repelled by Ukrainian soldiers, others are ongoing. Kostyantynivka was hit by KAB airstrikes. The enemy tried 39 times to wedge into our defenses on the Pokrovsky direction in the districts of Myrolyubivka, Promenya, Lysivka, Dachensky, Zhovto, Shevchenko, Pushkino and Novopustinka. Our units repelled thirty-six attacks, other battles are ongoing. the losses of the occupiers in the direction are more than 300 people killed and wounded, in addition, two armored combat vehicles, four cars were destroyed, also three guns, one armored combat vehicle and one unit of automotive equipment were damaged. In the Kurakhiv direction, the enemy attacked our positions 38 times. They were most active in the Sontsivka, Berestkiv, Zori, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhovo, Dalnyi, Dachnoi, Romanivka, Elizavetivka and Uspenivka districts, where Ukrainian defenders repelled 31 attacks, seven clashes are still ongoing. The settlement of Ulakly was hit by an air strike by KAB. In the Vremivsk direction our troops repelled ten enemy attacks near Zeleny Pol, Novodarivka, Kostiantynopolskyi and Sukhy Yaliv, two more clashes are still ongoing. On the Gulyaipole and Orihiv directions, the enemy carried out airstrikes on the areas of the settlements of Gulyaipole and Novoandriivka. In the Dnieper direction the enemy does not stop trying to knock our units out of their positions - they made two unsuccessful assaults. In Kurshchyna, Ukrainian defenders repelled 16 enemy attacks, fighting continues in six more locations. Soldiers of the 37th separate marine infantry brigade, 32nd separate mechanized brigade, 48th separate assault battalion, who effectively destroy the enemy, causing him losses in manpower and equipment, were recognized for their effective and professional combat work. As reported by ArmyInform, the occupiers suffer heavy losses, but again they are again throwing infantry on -meat- assaults, as if want the stormtroopers to be exhausted as soon as possible.

Title: It was not necessary to go far: the Finnish army ordered new mobile 120-mm mortar systems from a loc...
Description: As stated in the release, disclosed by the manufacturing company on the occasion of the conclusion of the relevant contract, the new mortar system integrates traditional heavy mortar weapons into a modular carriage, which is then mounted on a military truck, reports ArmyInform. The mortar complex, codified by the Finnish Army as the 120 KRH M3, was developed by Patria for the Finnish Land Forces. TREMOS is a modular carriage with a fire control system and recoil compensators. It can use any traditional 120mm mortar and mount on 4×4/6×6/8×8 trucks that have the appropriate container -locks- to secure the cargo. In case of machine malfunction, the weapon can be quickly transferred to another chassis. The module does not require any preparation before firing and can fire directly from the chassis of the vehicle, which greatly increases the mortar's mobility. -Patria has increased the mobility of heavy mortars in excellent cooperation with the Finnish Army and the Finnish Defense Forces Logistics Command, creating a new weapon system,- said Jussi Järvinen, executive vice president of Patria's Finnish division. He emphasized the significant tests carried out and pointed to Patria's legacy of innovative mortar systems, such as the famous AMOS (Advanced Mortar System) and NEMO (New Mortar) turrets, which are the basis of TREMOS development. The artillery system, by its characteristics, does not differ in any way from a similar trailed mortar, which would work traditionally on the ground. The main goal of the project is to increase the survivability of the mortar units of the Finnish ground forces due to better mobility in the conditions of war with an enemy that conducts counter-battery warfare and actively uses reconnaissance and strike drones. The Finnish military command is convinced that in the future heavy mortars will play an increasingly important role in the composition of ground troops as the main means of defeating from closed positions. Currently, the country's ground forces plan to gain experience in the use of such systems on ordered pre-production samples, and later make a decision on possible additional purchases of 120 KRH M3 complexes. -The goal is to start training conscripts with the new mortars during 2026,- said Colonel Ari Lehmuslehti of the Ground Forces Headquarters of the Finnish Armed Forces. However, the experts of the IKK defense website Defense Express (DE) were quite skeptical about this choice of soldiers' weapons countries of Suomi. According to their conclusions, it is a standard 120-mm mortar with manual loading, which was installed on the chassis of a truck, added a digitalized guidance system and a hydraulic recoil absorption mechanism. -The choice of this system may be surprising, because Patria has a much more advanced NEMO, which has a perfect fire control system, the possibility of a -fire raid-, when several mines that were fired from the same vehicle on different trajectories arrive at the same target, and also even the possibility of shooting on the move. It is also worth adding about the mechanization of charging and the fact that it is an armored chassis compared to TREMOS. At the same time, if the wheeled chassis can be replaced by a tracked one, for example, for the US Army, the NEMO mortar system was installed on the AMPV chassis,- noted the IKK DE. It should be recalled that our editors told in detail in one of his previous articles on the NEMO armored mortar system. By chance remind that in the order of the Minister of Defense of Ukraine dated August 28, 2023 on acceptance for armament The 120-mm mortar M/41D, the developer and manufacturer of which is the Finnish company Patria, is indicated in the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation of regular samples of foreign weapons. In turn, the authors of the portal European Defense Review indicate that the Ministry of Defense of the Republic of Finland concluded the above contract for the supply of a pre-production batch of TREMOS modular mortar systems, which are expected to be delivered to the troops in 2025. The number of ordered units is not named, but the contact amount is €4.7 million. Patria presented this new weapon system at the Future Mortar Systems conference in London on October 29, 2024

Title: F-16 against Russian cruise missiles: how many air targets were shot down -Battle Falcons-
Description: Since then, Russia has launched three massive combined air and missile strikes on Ukrainian territory — one in late August and two in November. F-16s participated in repelling these large-scale attacks as an air defense tool. Official information on the effectiveness of the use of F-16s against Russian cruise missiles and attack UAVs was collected and the number of enemy air targets shot down by Ukrainian -Battle Falcons- was calculated by ArmyInform. Full statistical information on Russian cruise missiles and attack drones shot down by the F-16 has not been officially made public. Therefore, approximate calculations of enemy targets destroyed by the -Battle Falcons- can be made only on the basis of separate official reports of the Air Force and the General Staff, as well as statements of the Supreme Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. For the first time, F-16s demonstrated their high efficiency in Ukrainian skies during the repulse of a Russian air-missile strike on August 26, 2024. Then the enemy launched 127 missiles of various types and 109 Shahed-131/136 attack UAVs on the territory of Ukraine. It was shot down 201 air targets - 102 missiles and 99 attack UAVs. Unfortunately, the military pilot Oleksiy Mes with the call sign -Moonfish- died in an aerial battle. In the notification of his death, the Command of the Air Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine noted that during the repulsion of the Russian of a massive combined air and missile strike, the pilot destroyed three cruise missiles and one attack UAV Instead, the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported, that -during the aerial combat, the F-16 aircraft demonstrated their high efficiency, four enemy cruise missiles were shot down by airborne weapons.- So, on August 26, 2024, F-16 fighters shot down at least four cruise missiles and one Shahed. Russia carried out the next large-scale combined air and missile attack on the objects of the energy sector of Ukraine with various types of air, land and sea-based missiles and Shahed type UAVs at night on November 17, 2024. Then, as reported President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi, F-16 pilots shot down about 10 enemy air targets. The Supreme Commander-in-Chief did not specify exactly which enemy aircraft the pilots of the Ukrainian -Fighting Falcons- destroyed, but their contribution was about 7% of all enemy air targets destroyed at that time. Finally, on the night of November 27-28, 2024, Russia struck Ukraine with 188 air strikes, including 91 missiles of various types and 97 Shahed attack UAVs. Among them the Defense Forces of Ukraine vorozhyh-bpla/->shot down 76 Kh-101/”Caliber- cruise missiles, 3 guided air missiles X-59/69 and 35 Shaheds. Seven enemy cruise missiles were destroyed by F-16 pilots. Volodymyr Zelenskyi reported this in an interview with the British broadcaster Sky News on November 29. -Seven cruise missiles were destroyed two nights ago. Seven missiles that flew over infrastructure, civilian infrastructure,- he said. Thus, for the second time, the President of Ukraine highly praised the effectiveness of F-16 fighter jets in repelling massive combined air and missile strikes from the Russian Federation. -How are the F-16s doing today? Very good. Great, for the most part,- he emphasized in an interview with Sky News. Also, Volodymyr Zelenskyi partially reported specific data on the effectiveness of the pilots of the -Fighting Falcons-, because it is not excluded that, in addition to cruise missiles, they also shot down several -Shakhed-. At the same time, the Head of State also noted the biggest problem of the F-16 as a Ukrainian air defense tool — their insufficient number. -We have very few F-16s,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy said in an interview with Sky News, emphasizing the need for the Defense Forces of Ukraine both for more of these fighters and for other types of modern weapons. However, despite their small numbers, the Ukrainian -Battle Falcons- undoubtedly proved their high efficiency as an air defense vehicle, destroying about 20 enemy air attack vehicles. Increasing the number of F-16s in the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine will be able to significantly improve this statistic.

Title: They are storming as if they want the attack aircraft to run out as soon as possible - the tactics o...
Description: Chief Sergeant Volodymyr of the 53rd Mechanized Brigade named after Prince Volodymyr Monomakh told on the ArmyTV stream about this. -There is an impression that the Russian leadership has a goal - to quickly wipe out their people, whom they send for meat. Then wait for some time, then type again and erase again. That is, they do not need to occupy some frontiers, but to put more of their people in,- said Volodymyr. As reported by ArmyInform, the 53rd brigade appealed to the servicemen who voluntarily left their units, with a call to return to service.

Title: The occupiers are preparing to launch fiber-optic drones at a distance of 15-20 kilometers
Description: About this on the ArmyTV stream, a serviceman of the 4th brigade of operational assignment of the National Guard -Rubizh- Andriy Otchenash, who is located in the Lymano-Kupian direction. -The adversary started using optical fiber. If you watch his telegram channels, the enemy says that he will use copters on fiber optics for 15-20 kilometers. This is a not very pleasant situation, because it will complicate our logistics, because EW devices do not work on fiber-optic drones,- said Andriy Otchenash. He also noted the progress of the Russians in the development of Lancet strike drones, as well as aircraft-type reconnaissance UAVs. -They don't stand still, and that's also a minus. But thanks to the fact that our guys are also trying to find a countermeasure, for example, knocking down their wings with epfivishkas, this nullifies the successes of the Russians,- noted Andriy Otchenash. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 4th battalion -Freedom Force- of the National Guard brigade -Rubizh- -motolyg/->spectacularly repulsed the desperate attack of the invaders.

Title: Stalin-era cannon and -lancets- — the occupiers assembled a special group against our artillery
Description: Major Ivan Dragan, Chief of Staff of Art Division 93 of the -Kholodny Yar- mechanized brigade, told on the ArmyTV stream about this. According to him, the enemy group includes pilots of reconnaissance UAVs, -lancets- and long-range M-46 guns, developed back in 1951. -Russian -lancets- work very clearly and mostly in tandem with artillery. If they find our firing positions, they launch the first -lancet-. Somewhere in 20-25 minutes, the second one flies, and then the counter-battery artillery, one or two long-range guns, or 2S19 or M-46 caliber 130 millimeters are connected,- said Ivan Dragan about the enemy's tactics. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the Signum 93 unit of the mechanized brigade -Cold Ravine- spectacularly destroyed an enemy tank that advanced towards our positions.

Title: In Nikopol region, 20 enemy shellings occurred during the day, a woman died
Description: This was reported by the head of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Serhiy Lysak. The occupiers killed an 88-year-old woman by striking Nikopol with a kamikaze drone. A 64-year-old man received a shrapnel wound and a bruise after being hit by a drone in Myrivska hromada. Russians targeted the district center, Marganetska, Mirivska and Pokrovsk communities. Attacked with kamikaze drones, artillery, and dropped ammunition from UAVs. Six private houses, two farm buildings, three greenhouses, and a gas pipeline were damaged. A company car and a passenger car were mutilated. As reported by ArmiyaInform, on December 4, the Russian military >carried out shelling of settlements in the Kherson region using artillery and drones.

Title: One UAZ and 4 fools — in Kurshchyna, our pilots recorded a comedy with Russians
Description: The video was released December 4 on the unit's channel. A car drove up to the hole where the occupiers were hiding. The Russians tried to load their comrade into it, who could not walk either because of injuries or because of alcohol intoxication. At that moment, the first arrival of our kamikaze drone took place, which broke through the Uaza roof. At this time, two Russians tried to pull up their non-walking comrade, but they did not succeed. Maybe also due to alcohol intoxication. Then the driver went down the slope. Down — not up, the Russians were able to get their comrade to the UAZ and load it. Everyone was going to leave, but the pride of the Russian automobile industry was stuck. The Russians tried to push when another drone arrived. Then the surviving Russians waved their hands, left the car with a non-walking comrade and went somewhere. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of The Ravens unit of the 129th brigade of the Territorial Defense Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces showed their next booty: 3 enemy armored personnel carriers and buggy.

Title: One person died as a result of the Russian bombing of Kupyansk
Description: This was reported in the evening of December 4 by the head of the Kharkiv Regional Military Administration Oleg Synegubov. According to his information, two women had an acute reaction to stress. At least five private houses were destroyed or damaged. Rescue services are working on the spot, the demolition of the debris is ongoing. According to preliminary data, the Russian army shelled the city with Uragan surface-to-air missiles. As reported by ArmyInform, in Kherson Oblast dead and nine injured due to Russian shelling.

Title: The head of the GUR reported to the President about the situation in Syria and Georgia
Description: The President spoke about this in his evening address. According to him, Kyrylo Budanov reported on Russian intentions for the near future and on the situation in Syria — how a change in the balance of forces in Syria can change global circumstances. -There was also a report on the situation in Georgia. And this in Georgia, of course, is not only a problem of one people and not only of our region - how today's authorities in Georgia are pushing the country to obvious dependence on Russia. It's just shameful what things they are going to now against their own people. And when Moscow praises this government in Georgia, it clearly outlines who they are currently working for in Tbilisi and for whom they are dispersing protests. Certainly not for Georgia,- noted Volodymyr Zelenskyi. He said that Ukraine's legal response to the events in Georgia is being prepared. We are also working with Europeans and other partners on specific actions. The President instructed to prepare relevant sanctions decisions. As reported by ArmyInform, President met with the Secretary General of the Council of Europe.

Title: Two artillery brigades received an honorary award -For courage and bravery-
Description: The corresponding decree is posted on the site of the head of state. The award -For Courage and Courage- was also awarded to the 15th separate -Black Forest- Artillery Reconnaissance Brigade of the Ground Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Both brigades were awarded in order to honor the courage and heroism shown during the defense of the state sovereignty, independence, and territorial integrity of Ukraine. The medal of honor - the ribbon -For Courage and Courage- - is a collective award of military units. As ArmiyaInform reported, on December 4, on the occasion of the Day of Missile Troops and Artillery of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, President Volodymyr Zelenskyi met with Ukrainian defenders and honored them with state awards.

Title: - And buy yourself a soldering iron - SBS told about the preparation of drones
Description: The video was released on December 4 on the SBS channel of the ZSU. They remind us that this is the first military branch in the world that uses air, sea surface and underwater, ground unmanned and robotic systems in its combat operations. But the most numerous are FPV drones, which help the Armed Forces to maintain defense in many areas of the front. As reported by ArmyInform, Unmanned Systems Forces hit an interesting military target a Russian worth $10 million.

Title: War crimes of the Russian Federation and the release of children deported by Russia: the President m...
Description: This is stated in the message of the head of state. -It is important to bring Russian war criminals to justice,- the President said. A separate topic of negotiations will be the release of prisoners and the return of Ukrainian children illegally deported by Russia. -We appreciate the role of the Council of Europe in creating the Register of Damages as a component of the international compensation mechanism. Ukraine is counting on the creation of the Commission for reviewing applications and the Compensation Fund, as well as the leadership of the Council of Europe in this process,- Volodymyr Zelenskyi said.

Title: -Pinocchio- for 10 million - in Zhytomyr Oblast, a fairy tale with an unhappy ending was exposed
Description: This was announced on December 4 by the Special Prosecutor's Office in the field of defense of the Central region. According to the investigation, the suspects seized state funds in the total amount of over UAH 10 million during the conclusion and execution of three contracts in 2022-2023. It is about the supply to KECH to provide military units with fuel wood at inflated prices. The director of the private enterprise ensured the organization of receiving price offers from business entities, which contributed to the victory in the public procurement of the specified LLC. In the future, the director of this limited liability company entered into contracts for the supply of firewood to KECH of the district at inflated prices. He received funds in his bank accounts and legalized them by transferring them to cash. The head of KEC of the district signed and approved unprofitable contracts, additional agreements and expense invoices without conducting price market monitoring. This led to wastage and misappropriation of budget funds. As reported by ArmyInform, the special prosecutor's office defended the interests Ministry of Defense in the case of illegal sale of real estate.

Title: He crossed himself and stabbed himself, shot himself, but he was breathing - the Russians surprise o...
Description: The videos were released on December 4. Aerial scouts of the 60th mechanized Ingulets brigade noticed a Russian lying on the ground with a weapon. When our drone flew up to him, the occupier pretended to shoot himself in the head and died. But it was cool outside, so steam came out of his mouth.   In another case, a wounded Russian soldier tried to cut his own life by stabbing himself in the heart. It is noteworthy that before the suicide attempt, the invader crossed himself, although Christianity considers suicide a terrible sin. However, either this Russian was offended by the dogmas of his own faith, or he also decided to deceive our pilots, who decided to help the occupier by airdropping.   As reported by ArmyInform,

Title: -Iron training ground-: a new service for access to weapons and equipment tests has started
Description: This is stated in messages on the Government Portal. -Iron Polygon- is an electronic service on which arms manufacturers can register, get their own electronic cabinet and through it submit applications for testing their own developments on a real test site and track their status. Such a digital solution removes a number of bureaucratic procedures and will allow manufacturers to test their promising samples faster. You can register and submit an application for testing your product right now through the form on the website. -From the first days of Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine, the Supreme Commander-in-Chief prioritized the protection of the state, which is the preservation of the lives of our soldiers. War is a constant competition with the enemy for superiority in weapons, technologies, and innovations. We need to shorten the time from the idea of ​​a new weapon to its appearance on the front as much as possible. It is for this purpose that we developed the -Iron Polygon- service. This is the military innovation that will preserve the lives of our soldiers,- said the Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Colonel Andriy Lebedenko. The service has been in test mode since August 2024.

Title: -Why are they coming at us?- - ordinary Russians believe that they have been attacked
Description: The conversation was made public 4 December by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. As if zombified, Russians enthusiastically discuss the next threats of their dictator and are surprised and indignant: -Why are they talking to us, huh?!-. In the end, in the search for an answer, they come up with an explanation that is no less indicative of the Russian fictional reality - they say, vile Europeans demanded to colonize Ukraine, and along with it, Russia. A vivid example of the results of the harmful influence of Putin's propaganda - listen to a fresh interception: How ArmyInform reported, soldiers of the GUR destroyed the enemy -Hurricane- in the Zaporozhye direction.

Title: In the Kherson region, one person died and nine were injured due to Russian shelling
Description: This was reported by the Kherson Regional Prosecutor's Office. As of 5:30 p.m., one person was killed and nine civilians were injured. A 67-year-old man died in the morning in Antonivka as a result of dropping explosives from a drone. As a result of the shelling of this village, three more people were wounded, one in the neighboring Kindiyka. In addition, as a result of enemy attacks, two men were injured - in Kherson, one - in the village of Mylove, two more - in Veletenskyi. Under the procedural leadership of the prosecutor's office of the Kherson region, an investigation into the facts of war crimes was launched (parts 1, 2 of article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). Prosecutors, together with investigators, take all necessary actions to document crimes committed by servicemen of the Soviet Union. As reported by ArmiyaInform, on the morning of December 4, the Russians dropped on the city Kostyantynivka's two guided aerial bombs. Three men were injured.

Title: The tank has arrived, the drone has arrived, there will be fire — hokku from the pilots of the Cold ...
Description: The video of the defeat was released on December 4 on the unit's channel. An enemy tank was driving along the road when it was assisted by our aerial reconnaissance. Our FPV drone flew towards enemy equipment. The tank caught fire brightly from the explosion and quickly turned into scrap. -1 drone — 1 tank,- the unit commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the Signum 93 unit of the mechanized brigade -Cold Ravine- showed selections of shooting down enemy reconnaissance UAVs with applied camouflage.

Title: The President awarded soldiers on the occasion of the Day of Missile Troops and Artillery
Description: This was reported by the Office of the President. -From this year, December 4 is your special day. It is a great pleasure for me today to personally congratulate, award some of the best and thank you, your brothers. And to thank your relatives and friends for the fact that they constantly support you. It is so important to support your spirit and strength, because your accuracy and the extent to which you can destroy the enemy depends on such support and on all of us,- the head of state said. He noted that Ukraine will always remember the feat of all those who gave their lives for its independence. Those present honored the memory of the fallen defenders with a moment of silence. The President thanked the soldiers of the missile troops and artillery of the Ukrainian Armed Forces for the defense of the country and honored them with state awards. Volodymyr Zelensky presented the -Cross of Combat Merit- award to three fighters. It was awarded to: Captain Serhiy Babak. He defended Ukraine in Zaporizhzhia and Sumy Oblast, since the first day of the Kursk operation, he has been performing combat missions on the territory of Kursk Oblast. He repeatedly carried out artillery training in the most difficult areas of the offensive. Organized the work of an artillery battery to destroy enemy defense structures. Under his leadership, it was possible to eliminate up to 2 platoons of Russian invaders and more than 10 firing points. Captain Maksym Shevel. Participated in the liberation of Kherson Region, where he performed 20-30 fire missions every day. Only during the period from August 30 to November 11, 2022, the assembled gun artillery platoon under his command destroyed 9 self-propelled guns, 8 howitzers, 2 Grad anti-aircraft guns, 3 BMPs, 2 BRDMs, 5 mortars, 2 MT-LB and about 8 units of automobile enemy equipment. Since June of this year, the cannon artillery battery under the leadership of Maxim Shevel has been performing combat missions in the Kherson region. Senior Lieutenant Oleksandr Shkriblyak. In March 2022, he repelled the attack of the Russian invaders on Mykolaiv. As part of a self-propelled artillery battery, he was surrounded, but was able to independently evacuate the damaged self-propelled artillery unit together with the crew. Under his command, a calculation of 122-mm self-propelled guns -Carnation- destroyed a field ammunition depot, a T-72 tank, as well as a platoon base, assault groups and a group of UAVs. Thanks to this, it was possible to eliminate more than 80 Russian invaders. The President also honored the defenders with the orders of Bohdan Khmelnytsky I-III degrees, the orders -For Courage- II-III degrees, the Order of Princess Olga III degree and the medal -For Military Service to Ukraine-.

Title: -We destroy more than one battalion in a month-: drones hold back waves of attacks by the invaders
Description: Andriy Otchenash, crew commander, told about this on the air of the -Espresso- TV channel. UAV -Kara Nebesna- of the 4th brigade of operational assignment -Rubizh- of the National Guard of Ukraine. According to Andrii Otchenash, the enemy is using a large number of FPV-copters, approximately 3 to 5 thousand only on the line where the -Rubizh- brigade is defending. However, this does not prevent Ukrainian drones from destroying attack aircraft in industrial quantities. -In a month, we destroy more enemy fighters than there are in principle in the battalion in terms of numbers, per state. But it doesn't mean anything to them, they just renew their resources and continue to carry out their assault actions,- said Andriy Otchenash. How ArmyInform reported, in the Kupyan region, the enemy encountered a tough defense and is now trying to bypass it.

Title: The fleet of mechanized demining machines has increased 26 times — Ministry of Defense
Description: About this reported on December 4 by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Currently, it is mainly foreign technology, in particular DOK–ING, Bažena, GCS, Hydrema and Scan Jack, as well as Ukrainian-made MP-3101 machines. This was announced by the head of the Main Department of Mine Action, Civil Protection and Environmental Safety of the Ministry of Defense, Colonel Ruslan Beregulya, during the Demine Ukraine Forum. The event gathered about 350 participants, including representatives of the government, international organizations, humanitarian demining experts, non-governmental organizations, businesses, equipment manufacturers and developers of innovative technologies. The main goal is to take stock of mine action for 2024 and outline challenges in the field of mine action next year. -An initial non-technical survey was carried out in 59 territorial communities, 4,219 contaminated or presumably contaminated sites with a total area of ​​4,219 were identified 558 km², during a non-technical survey, 35,000 km² of the territory was marked as not containing evidence of the presence of risks, in particular, this allowed to reduce the area of ​​potentially contaminated territories from 174,000 to 139,000 km²,- said Colonel Ruslan Beregulya. In turn, the head of the mine countermeasures department — the deputy head of the Main Directorate, Colonel Oleg Shuvarsky, invited the developers of the latest demining technologies to cooperate and emphasized that the Ministry of Defense is ready to conduct preliminary tests of innovative projects at its base that will increase the safety of sappers and the productivity of demining. -Our specialists will provide all the necessary practical assistance for the organization and conduct of tests and in the future, in case of successful results, will recommend these projects for certification,- said Colonel Oleg Shuvarskyi. As reported by ArmyInform, the MOU said how many explosive items destroyed since the beginning of the large-scale invasion of the Russian Federation.

Title: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine: fighting continues in the Pokrovsky and Kurakhivsk...
Description: This is stated in the operational information of the General Staff ZSU as of 16:00 December 4. Today, the areas of Oleksandivka, Novovasylivka, Maiske and Kamin were affected by enemy artillery fire from the territory of Russia in Sumy and Chernihiv regions. On the Kharkiv direction today, the Russian occupiers stormed five times in the area of ​​Vovchansk and Hlyboky, our defenders repelled four Russian attacks, another battle is ongoing. In the Kupyansk direction the enemy actively advanced 12 times on the positions of our units in the areas of Kucherivka, Synkivka, Petropavlivka, Pershotravnevo, Zeleny Gay and Lozova. Ukrainian soldiers are steadfastly defending, 10 skirmishes are still ongoing. In the Lyman direction, the invading army carried out nine attacks on Ukrainian positions near Grekivka, Druzhelyubivka, Makiivka, Terni, and Zarichny. There are six battles. On the Toretsk direction, the Russians tried to push our units out of their positions in the Toretsk area, where the Defense Forces repel four attacks. Since the beginning of the day in the Pokrovsky direction, the enemy has already made 29 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their occupied positions in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promeny, Lysivka, Dachensky, Zhovto, Shevchenko, Pushkino, and Novopustinka. The defense forces are holding back the onslaught and have repelled 25 enemy attacks so far. Enemy losses are being refined. The enemy carried out an air strike on Mirnograd. Battles continue near Sontsivka, Berestki, Zora, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhovo, Dalnyi, Dachnoy, Romanivka, Elizavetivka, and Uspenivka in the Kurakhivka direction. According to updated information, 18 attacks of the occupying army have been repulsed today, 12 attacks are ongoing. In the Vremivsk direction, four attacks by invaders are underway, today the enemy has made 10 attempts to advance in the vicinity of Zeleny Pol, Novodarivka, Kostyantynopolsky, and Suhy Yali. In the Dnieper direction, the enemy tried unsuccessfully three times to dislodge Ukrainian soldiers from their positions. In Kurshchyna, Ukrainian defenders repelled 12 attacks by invaders, eight clashes are ongoing. In the Siverskyi, Kramatorskyi, Gulyaipilskyi, Orihivskyi and Prydniprovskyi directions, the occupiers continue to shell the positions of our troops and civilian infrastructure, using available means.

Title: Chasing with defeat - our pilots in Kurshchyna did not let a pickup truck and an infantry fighting v...
Description: A video of drone combat operation appeared on December 4 on the brigade's channel. Most of the damage occurred when the enemy equipment was moving and then it was finished off. -As soon as the enemy tries to move, he immediately gets what he deserves. Therefore, there are no special changes in our area of ​​responsibility. All forces and means of the brigade are aimed at destroying the enemy and holding the section of the front,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, air reconnaissance units of the -God's Cause- unit of the 47th mechanized brigade finished off the remnants of the Russian landing, who tried to break through on an armored personnel carrier.

Title: - We drove into the village defiantly, in armor! - our stormtroopers cleared the village and took pr...
Description: The video of the combat work was published on the battalion's channel. The village of Rozdolne was occupied by the enemy as part of about a detachment. Two groups of our attack aircraft, 6 fighters each, were sent to clean up. But in the village, our fighters came under the influence of enemy EW, which deprived them of communication. Then the platoon commander advanced on foot to the groups and led the fighters into an attack. During the shooting battle, some of the Russians were killed, and two were captured. -The widespread thesis of the Katsaps, that the Russians do not surrender, is completely shattered by the -ROCK-, the battalion commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, 425 fighters of the Skala battalion showed their daily work with shturmovyky-vidbyvayut-ataky-pid-pokrovskom/->destruction of small infantry groups of the enemy who are constantly trying to advance in the area Novogrodovka.

Title: Ministry of Defense: 12 paper journals and personnel record books were reduced to one
Description: This was reported Defense Minister Rustem Umyerov. -We are ridding the army of paper bureaucracy. Our military should focus on the execution of combat tasks, and not waste time on filling out numerous paper journals,- the minister emphasized. What is changing? Rustem Umyerov emphasized that this decision will save the time of our military, make processes simpler and more efficient. -I sincerely thank Deputy Minister Kateryna Chernogorenko and the team of the Ministry of Defense for their great work. We will continue to implement progressive changes to modernize our army,- he added. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov signed the order, which introduces a new full-time position in each brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine - an authorized from purchases of goods, works and services.

Title: In the Kurakhiv direction, marines destroyed a column of armored vehicles of the occupiers
Description: This was reported to the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The next target for the Black Sea Marines was a whole column of armored vehicles, which included a tank, armored fighting vehicles and infantry fighting vehicles. All the equipment and its -cargo of meat- are destroyed and remain as fertilizer for the Donbas black earth. As reported by ArmyInform, one SSO operator destroyed 30 soldiers of the Russian Federation in two days before preparing the battlefield for direct action. In addition, in the Kupyansk direction, fighters from the -Revenge- brigade -vypalyuyut-okupantiv-na-kupyanskomu-napryamku/->destroyed four Russian tanks, BMP-2, cars and ATVs.

Title: Bucks, -barrels- and grenades: what in Dnipro -paid off- from mobilization
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. The scheme worked according to the following mechanism: the perpetrators entered false data about serious illnesses in the medical history of the evaders, after which they were issued with fictitious medical conclusions about unfitness for service. These documents were handed over to accomplices in the TCC, where the petitioners were -written off- from the military register or given a deferment from the draft. The price of -services- started at 12 thousand US dollars for one client. During the searches, false medical documentation, draft records, media, more than 2 million hryvnias in cash, as well as weapons were seized from the suspects. The detainees have been charged with a number of articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine, including: Currently, five organizers of the scheme are in custody. They face up to 10 years in prison with confiscation of property. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The Sichi left no chance - the scouts burned Russian cannons and means of communication
Description: The Main Directorate of Intelligence of the IOU showed the destroyed targets. The video shows successful fire strikes against camouflaged Russian guns, the occupiers' shelters, and their means of communication. As reported by ArmyInform, one SSO operator destroyed 30 servicemen of the Russian Federation in two days before preparing the battlefield before conducting direct actions. In addition, in the Kupyansk direction, fighters from the -Revenge- brigade -vypalyuyut-okupantiv-na-kupyanskomu-napryamku/->destroyed four Russian tanks, BMP-2, cars and ATVs.

Title: -They studied for a few days, died or were captured-: a short war of Russian soldiers in Kurshchyna
Description: Stanislav Krasnov, commander, told about this on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- platoon of the 95th separate amphibious assault brigade. According to Stanislav Krasnov, with that attack they tried to break through our defense line. The offensive was unsuccessful, but still the assaults are repeated every day. the Russians have serious losses, but throw people into assaults without stopping. Even those who have not recovered from their injuries are chased away. -Prisoners who are captured by us are completely unprepared people. Which are immediately thrown to the slaughter after they have undergone some minimal training. That is, they enlisted there, studied somewhere for a few days and died or were captured,- said Stanislav Krasnov. As reported ArmyInform, among the military personnel of the DPRK army stationed in the Kursk region of the Russian Federation, there was an increase dissatisfaction due to insufficient amount of food provided.

Title: One SSO pilot minus the enemy platoon: the special forces showed how they destroy the enemy
Description: The SSO of the Armed Forces of Ukraine showed successful work in destroying the enemy. The UAV operator with the call sign -Mowgli- says that the job of a pilot is not difficult, if by the time you became a pilot you stormed landings, held defenses, conducted ambushes, etc. A Ukrainian SOF UAV operator with a call sign -Maugli- has destroyed 30 Russian occupiers during two days of work. pic.twitter.com/9KACp4ot0K — SPECIAL OPERATIONS FORCES OF UKRAINE (@SOF_UKR) December 4, 2024 According to him, without such combat experience, it is dangerous to sit at the remote control, because you do not know what is in the first step must be done on the battlefield to help fellow soldiers. -The burden of responsibility that I personally feel is huge, emotions appear only when I see my own on the screen,- says Mowgli. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kupyansk direction, fighters from the -Revenge- brigade feniksy-vypalyuyut-okupantiv-na-kupyanskomu-napryamku/->destroyed four Russian tanks, BMP-2, cars and quad bikes

Title: NATO Secretary General: Ukraine needs to be provided with more ammunition and means of infrastructur...
Description: NATO Secretary General announced about this Mark Rutte following the results of the two-day ministerial meeting in Brussels. -Ukraine faces continuous shelling of civilian areas and critical infrastructure facilities. And Russia is making progress at the front, albeit at a high cost. This winter may be the hardest for Ukraine since 2022,- said Mark Rutte. He said the alliance members discussed what they could do to secure critical munitions and air defenses as Russia ramps up its attacks and uses the help of North Korean troops and weapons. In addition, the members of the Alliance are working to fulfill the financial commitment to provide Ukraine with security assistance in the amount of 40 billion euros by the end of 2024. -And I expect the new command in Wiesbaden, the NATO Security Assistance and Training Command for Ukraine, to be fully operational by the end of this year. But we must do more than just support Ukraine in the struggle. We must provide sufficient support to change the trajectory of this conflict once and for all,- emphasized Mark Rutte. The day before Mark Rutte emphasized the need to strengthen Ukraine's air defense with on the part of the partners.

Title: Air defense systems and missiles: Ukraine and Great Britain discussed new defense projects
Description: About this informs December 4 Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The British delegation was led by Will Green, Kindred Task Force Director and HIRST Task Force Deputy Policy Director. The delegation also included representatives of the UK Assets Enforcement Agency (DESA), the UK Defense Staff and the British Embassy. On the Ukrainian side, representatives of the Ministry of Finance of Ukraine and the Ministry of Strategic Industries of Ukraine also participated in the negotiations.
