Title: Rustem Umyerov: The Ministry of Defense and the Ministry of Health are launching a digital reform of...
Description: This reported Defense Minister Rustem Umyerov. You no longer need to contact the TCC — you can have a medical examination in a convenient place. The reform envisages that the medical examination will be carried out by civilian doctors, who will enter conclusions directly into the Electronic Health Care System (ECHS). Information from the ESOZ will automatically be sent to the electronic system of the Ministry of Defense in a matter of minutes. At the same time, military medical commissions will receive only medical data without personal identification. This ensures objectivity and impartiality when making fitness for duty decisions. Each stage of the process will have a digital footprint - the conclusions of doctors and VLK will be recorded with the help of electronic signatures and stored in the -Oberig- register. This approach will make it possible to quickly check the work of medical institutions in case of doubts about the results of medical examinations. -We are working to ensure that public services for conscripts and our defenders are convenient, transparent and free of unnecessary bureaucracy. The reform of the VLK is another important step on this path,- Rustem Umyerov emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine together with the Ministry of Health presented the reform project of military medical commissions (MMCs), designed to significantly change the outdated system. The reform will make it possible to divide the decisions of the military medical commission into two separate sets of data — medical and administrative. Some specialists will conduct a medical examination for VLC, and others will analyze the anonymized results of these medical examinations.

Title: They surrounded and destroyed - the clearing of a house from the Russians in the Kurakhovo area
Description: The video was published on December 3 on the unit's channel. -Unfortunately, as we can see, the Russians are succeeding in their offensive in Donetsk region. Breaking through our defenses, despite heavy losses, they try to land their infantry in our rear. If this infantry is fixed, then after a day or two reinforcements will go to it and it will already become a new line of battle. In order to prevent such a situation, our attack aircraft must knock out the enemy's landing force and prevent it from gaining a foothold,- commented the video -Sharp cartridges-. According to the pilots, the sweep was successful. -Ukrainian attack aircraft are real heroes,- our drones concluded. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the -Sharp Cartridges- unit of the National Guard filmed the combat operation of our tank, which was able to deceive enemy drones.

Title: American researchers have identified hundreds of Ukrainian children abducted by the occupiers — the ...
Description: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy wrote about this on the evening of December 3. -148 young Ukrainians are already in the Russian databases on placement of children, 42 of them are adopted, taken into custody or have an appointed Russian guardian. Another 166 children are placed in Russian families. The report shows the whole world what Russia is going to in order to erase Ukrainian identity. How systemic is its policy in this direction,- noted Volodymyr Zelenskyi. He reminded that Ukraine is constantly working to ensure that our children return home, and that all those guilty of the terrible crime of kidnapping are punished. -It is a difficult challenge, but we are doing everything necessary, and we are grateful to everyone who helps us. To every country, organization, leader — political and social. Only together can we restore justice, which Russia violated on such a scale, protect the future of Ukrainian children and bring them home,- the President said. As reported by ArmyInform, President held the Stavku which was discussed missile testing, artillery production and energy protection.

Title: It is planned to make military registration automatic from the age of 17
Description: This was reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. -This means that young people no longer need to go to the TCC or undergo a medical examination. It will be enough to pass the identification in Reserve+, after which the application itself will generate a military registration document,- explained the Minister of Defense Rustem Umyerov. According to him, this is another step in the transfer of military records into a convenient digital format. -We make public services as accessible and transparent as possible for Ukrainians. I thank the people's deputies for supporting this important initiative,- said Rustem Umyerov. As reported by ArmyInform, Rustem Umyerov held the first conversation with the new European defense commissioner.

Title: A night of successful drops — the destruction of the Russian assault group in Kurshchyna
Description: The video was released on December 3 on the battalion channel. A group of 6 Russians tried to storm our positions under the cover of night. The enemy advanced to our positions on foot, without the cover of armored vehicles. Our aerial scouts spotted the Russians and our bombers took off to meet the group. The Pentagon pilots acted according to a tried-and-tested scheme: they immobilized the enemy with the first reset, and finished them off with the second. Most of the group was destroyed in the field, and the rest were finished in the forest belt. -Here's the difference: our troops are the first to send drones, and the Russians send their own people without any chance of success. Draw your own conclusions,- the battalion commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, a fighter of the Black Swan strike group of the 225th assault battalion from call sign Marik destroyed already 20 units of enemy equipment.

Title: The Ministry of Defense reported how many military personnel agreed to be transferred to the Army+ a...
Description: This was notified in the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. -Relocating to Army+ breaks down bureaucratic barriers during transfers and gives service members the opportunity to serve where their skills are most needed. The large, irreversible transformation of the Ukrainian army into the army of the future thanks to digitalization continues. We have created a tool that helps brigades attract motivated soldiers. And with each feedback from the military, we will make it more effective,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko, Deputy Minister of Defense for Digitalization. To submit a report, you only need a military ID or an officer's ID and a letter of recommendation from the unit to which the soldier wants to transfer. In addition, an opinion of the VLK may be required. For example, if a soldier needs to be transferred from combat to the rear due to his health. The Personnel Center of the Armed Forces has 72 hours to review the report. The result is reported to the military via Army+. So far, 6,500 reports have been rejected, 70% of them for the following reasons: If the transfer is approved, the Personnel Center of the Armed Forces prepares an order, and the serviceman receives a notification with its number and date. This order is transmitted in parts through the system of electronic document circulation (ESDO).

Title: The VSP told how many servicemen returned from the SZCH under the new law
Description: According to the correspondent of ArmiyaInform, the deputy chief of the Main Directorate of the Military Law and Order Service, Colonel Oleksandr Grynchuk, told about this at the briefing. He reminded that on November 29, the law came into force, which allows servicemen who have committed suicide to return to service without punishment. And the commander of the military unit is obliged within 72 hours after the return of the serviceman to reinstate him in the service, restoring monetary, material and other types of security. A return to service mechanism has also been introduced. -The soldiers who have carried out the SZH will be allocated to the reserve battalions of the army corps, and then to the military units specified by the Minister of Defense. Except for those parts that they arbitrarily left. The list has already been determined - it is 17 military units,- said Oleksandr Grynchuk. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 30, the Military Law Enforcement Service clarification about the recent changes in the legislation of Ukraine regarding the one-month renewal of military servicemen who have Northwest Territories In particular, it refers to military personnel who voluntarily left the military units before November 29, 2024 and will voluntarily return to the place of service before January 1, 2025.

Title: They repulsed the assault of the Russians near Kupyansk, the Azov tanks near Toretsk: a stream from ...
Description: With the support of artillery and drones, the Russians were knocked out, the fighters of the 10th separate mountain assault brigade -Edelweiss- cleared the area. In the direction of Kurakhiv, our fighters stopped a convoy of Russian armored vehicles. The enemy tried to storm the positions of 71 individual hunting brigades. As a result, four combat vehicles of the occupiers were destroyed or damaged. Later, the fighters of NSU -Omega- finished off the equipment. Ronins from the 65th OMBr burned down the gas station where the Russian military refueled. A powerful explosion rang out near the city of Tokmak in the temporarily occupied part of the Zaporizhzhia region. Tanks with gasoline and diesel fuel exploded after the drone hit. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - Lieutenant Colonel Serhiy Misyura and Major Andriy Makarenko.

Title: Clear sky - shot down almost two hundred shot down enemy -wings- in a week
Description: reported this on December 3 Ground Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. In particular, destroyed: As reported by ArmyInform, the Ground Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine told about Oleksiy under the pseudonym -Loki-, who in October 2024 in the north shot down two MANPADS enemy UAV type Shahed-131/136. Only 15 minutes were enough for him.

Title: A calendar for the Day of Missile Troops and Artillery was presented in Kyiv
Description: A correspondent of ArmiyaInform attended the presentation. The calendar contains portraits of prominent artillerymen of the Heroes of Ukraine. The main goal of the project is to show the Ukrainian people and the world community the greatness and heroism of the Ukrainian army, because 90% of the enemy's fire damage falls on artillerymen. The calendar was created with the assistance of the Main Directorate of Communications of the Armed Forces of Ukraine , Command of Missile Forces and Artillery of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Command of Ground Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and photo studio R18 Studio in the person of Roman Nikolaev (photo artist, owner of a photo studio) who is also the official photographer of the non-governmental award -National Hero of Ukraine-. urgent needs of gunners. The proceeds from the sale at the auction will be used to help the artillery units. Therefore, the project will not only contribute to the popularization of artillery as a type of military and the recognition of the heroic deeds of servicemen, but will also initiate the provision of assistance in meeting the needs of the front. Author's photo

Title: A piece of paper against a reset, a grenade near the heart, self from a machine gun — they compiled ...
Description: The video was released December 3 on the battalion channel. In the footage, the Russians either destroy themselves (with a machine gun or grenades), realizing that they don't belong on foreign soil, or attack (foolishness and courage!) our FPV drones, with roughly the same result. I was especially amused by the Russian who tried to protect himself from our reset with some kind of paper. It was not possible to make out what it was. A portrait of Putin? Prayer? Any help? The only thing we can say for sure is that it didn't help.   As reported by ArmyInform, UAV operators of the 4th mechanized battalion of the Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytskyi showed in the video what composes them combat work.

Title: The enemy hit a residential building in Kostyantynivka with artillery: report
Description: ArmiyaInform correspondents visited the scene. The shells hit between an apartment building and a kindergarten. As the local residents said, at that time a taxi arrived in the courtyard of the house, in which two passengers got on. According to the official information of Donetsk OVA, as a result of the explosion, the taxi driver died on the spot, and three local residents were injured. The shelling damaged three high-rise buildings, a kindergarten building, a gas pipeline and a car. The crater from the explosion was up to half a meter deep, and traces of the debris were clearly visible on the house (in many apartments, windows were broken, plywood sheets were cut, which were used to cover part of the windows, deep holes in the concrete panels of the walls) and nearby trees, where the debris stripped large pieces of bark. Pools of blood, pieces of clothing and a bloodied, never-used tourniquet were left at the place where the taxi had parked. The Donetsk regional military administration reminds that this morning the Russians also killed two people and wounded two more in the Pokrovsk community. -Take care of yourself! Evacuate in a timely manner!-, - urges the regional authorities of Donetsk region.

Title: She betrayed the location of the Defense Forces to the enemy: a resident of front-line Kostyantynivk...
Description: This was informed in the SBU. According to the case file, the 51-year-old unemployed woman tried to identify and hand over the locations of fortified areas and artillery positions of Ukrainian troops fighting for Chasiv Yar to the Russian army. In the future, the Russian Federation planned to carry out air attacks on these units of the Armed Forces and in this way create conditions for a breakthrough in the defense of the city. SBU counter-intelligence uncovered the enemy's plans and detained the woman at her place of residence. At the same time, comprehensive measures were taken to secure the relevant units of the Defense Forces. During the search, computer equipment and a mobile phone with evidence of working for the enemy were seized from the detainee. Investigators of the Security Service informed her about the suspicion of h. 2 Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). The detainee is in custody. She faces life imprisonment with confiscation of property.

Title: Russian troops hit Bilozerka and Beryslav in the Kherson region, there are dead and wounded
Description: This was reported by the regional prosecutor's office. As a result of the shelling, a 44-year-old man died, two more men aged 45 and 48 were injured. Under the procedural leadership of the Oleshkiv District Prosecutor's Office, a pre-trial investigation was launched into the fact of committing a war crime related to intentional murder (Part 2 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). In addition, on December 3, around 1:15 p.m., the Russian military attacked one of the streets in Berislav using a drone. A 43-year-old woman who was on the street died as a result of dropping the explosives. As ArmiyaInform reported, on December 3, the enemy several times targeted residential neighborhoods of the city of Pokrovsk, Donetsk region. As a result of shelling a local resident died. Two more people were injured.

Title: -90% of the enemy group is destroyed - another one enters-: the occupiers do not stop the assaults i...
Description: Mykola Koval, head of the press service, told about this on the air -Suspilne Novosti- 14th Brigade of the Chervona Kalina NSU. According to Mykola Koval, earlier the occupiers could send 50 people on assaults, now the number of assault groups has significantly decreased. -If we repel the assault, we destroy 90% of the group. Another group enters after her. If we take the past week, our brigade — aerial reconnaissance and artillery — destroyed more than 200 enemy personnel,- said Mykola Koval. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Pokrovsky area since the beginning of the day on December 3, the occupiers provodyt-na-dvoh-napryamkah/->have already carried out 28 attacks on the positions of our defenders in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Lysivka, Promenya, Dachenskyi, Chumatskyi and Novopustinka. The defense forces, restraining the enemy onslaught, repelled 24 enemy attacks. Four clashes are ongoing. The enemy dropped aerial bombs on Myrnograd.

Title: Spreading information about the deployment of Ukrainian defenders: the man from Kharkiv was sentence...
Description: This was reported by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. Prosecutors proved that the pro-Russian resident of Kharkiv had been collecting information about the Ukrainian military since April of this year, which was not publicly available. Disguising himself as an -ordinary citizen-, during -walks- around Kharkiv, the man scouted out the locations of units of Ukrainian servicemen and the movement routes of mobile air defense fire groups that defend the city. In order for the data to be more accurate, the accused even purchased special equipment, including a monocular and a mini video camera. The man transmitted the collected data to his interlocutor in text messages, accompanying them with images of maps of the area with appropriate markings. The man from Kharkiv was detained in his own apartment. During the search, a mobile phone with evidence of illegal activity was found in the man's possession. The accused admitted his guilt. The guilty verdict was handed down by the Chervonozavod District Court. Kharkiv There is currently an appeal period.

Title: The General Staff of the Armed Forces: almost half of all enemy attacks are carried out in two direc...
Description: This is stated in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 4:00 p.m. on December 3. The settlements of Porozok, Liskivshchyna, Leonivka, Stara Huta and Bila Bereza were affected by Russian artillery shelling in Sumy Oblast and Chernihiv Oblast. Today in the direction of Kharkiv, Russian terrorists near Vovchansk, Hlyboky and in the direction of Kozachai Lopan tried five times to carry out offensive actions, but were repulsed. Enemy aircraft attacked Odnorobivka, Vysoka Yaruza and Hlyboky with anti-aircraft missiles. Once the enemy attacked our positions on the Kupyansk direction. Ukrainian defenders repelled an enemy assault near Kolisnykyvka. In the Lyman direction enemy units do not stop attacking in the areas of Pershotravneve, Novoyehorivka, Grekivka, Yampolivka and Terny settlements. Since the beginning of the day, Ukrainian soldiers have already repelled four out of eight enemy attacks in this direction. The fighting continues. Currently, two enemy attacks took place in the Toretsk direction. The enemy is active in the Toretsk area. Our defenders put up a decent fightback, one attack was stopped, and the battle continues. In the Pokrovsky direction, since the beginning of the day, the occupiers have already carried out 28 attacks on the positions of our defenders in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Lysivka, Promeny, Dachenskyi, Chumatskyi and Novopustinka. The defense forces, restraining the enemy onslaught, repelled 24 enemy attacks. Four clashes are ongoing. The enemy dropped aerial bombs on Myrnograd. It is the hottest today in the Kurakhivka direction, where there are currently 30 combat clashes, the invaders are most actively trying to advance in the areas of Sontsivka, Zori, Dalnyi, Kurakhovo, Elizavetivka and Hannivka. Thirteen clashes are still ongoing. Ulakli and Dachne were attacked by Russian anti-terrorist forces. In the Vremivsk direction, the invaders attacked the positions of the Ukrainian troops 14 times near Kostyantynopolskyi, Suhy Yalyi, Rozdolnyi, and Novodarivka, two skirmishes are still ongoing. The enemy carried out offensive actions in the areas of Robotyny, Novodanilivka and Novoandriivka in the Orichivsk direction, one battle is currently ongoing. In the Dnieper direction the occupiers made five fruitless attempts to attack the positions of Ukrainian troops. In Kurshchyna, our defenders repelled 17 attacks by invaders today, nine clashes are ongoing. At the moment, no significant changes have been noted in other areas

Title: The occupiers shelled Pokrovsk, a local woman died
Description: This was notified by the head of the Pokrovsk MBA Serhiy Dobryak. As a result of shelling, a local resident died. Two more people were injured. In addition, today the driver of an excavator, a civilian, who was in a special vehicle during the shelling, came under fire. -Aggressive terror on the part of the Russians continues, the intensity of shelling is increasing. Eleven and a half thousand people still remain in the city, so I urge people to evacuate as soon as possible! And I thank those who have already left for safer regions, because it is very dangerous to stay in the community!- added Serhiy Dobryak. He added that the number and intensity of shelling is increasing every day. Russian troops continue to hunt civilians, in the middle of the day they hit civilian cars and residential buildings of community residents.

Title: They carried out a sweep and took prisoners: in Kurshchyna, the rangers found 30 Russian infantrymen
Description: They published the corresponding video on their channel. -The rangers gave the coordinates to their gunners, who met the enemy with accurate shots from the cannon. After that, the soldiers of the SSO conducted a sweep of the positions and forced the surrender of the remaining enemies who managed to survive. We continue to work,- the fighters said. Earlier ArmyInform showed how the operators of the 73rd Maritime Center of the SSOcarried out a raid on enemy positions in the Kursk region and successfully replenished the exchange fund from four military personnel of the Russian Federation As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the UA_REG Team unit of the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine during a raid on the rear of Russian troops also were able to takerich booty in the form of prisoners

Title: Laureates of the Paton Prize: Ukrainian military medics received a prestigious scientific award
Description: The relevant decree is posted on the site head of state. Eduard Khoroshun is the head of the hospital, Hero of Ukraine, Candidate of Medical Sciences. Serhiy Shipilov is the leading surgeon of the hospital, candidate of medical sciences. They became co-authors of the scientific work -Multimodal technologies in thoraco-abdominal surgery in the conditions of modern war-. A total of eight authors from different medical institutions worked on the work. The work is devoted to the implementation of the latest technologies in the treatment of patients in the extremely difficult conditions of modern warfare. The award committee noted her innovation, especially in anesthesia and surgical care, which allowed for significant improvements in treatment outcomes. This is an important recognition of the contribution of Ukrainian doctors to the development of science and medicine during the war.

Title: The President conducted the Stavka: missile testing, artillery production and energy protection
Description: This is stated in the message of the head of state. -A significant volume of new and long-term orders for drones: FPV, as well as reconnaissance drones, long-range drones, missile drones. Separately and carefully - regarding our missile program. Development, order, supply,- the President noted. Volodymyr Zelenskyy said that there was also a report on the testing of new types of missiles. -We can thank our Ukrainian missile developers. We are speeding up production,- he added. At Stavka, the task of contracts for the production of artillery was also discussed today. Today, the President also held a meeting with the Prime Minister of Ukraine, the Minister of Energy and the Commander of the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -They reported on the protection of energy facilities and restoration works. Additional priorities have been identified in negotiations with partners regarding air defense for Ukraine,- Volodymyr Zelenskyi said. As reported by ArmyInform, President Volodymyr Zelensky listened to the report of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces, General Oleksandr Syrsky, regarding the general situation at the front and the defense of our positions.

Title: Army in a smartphone: updated transfer capabilities, new courses and reports
Description: Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine from issues of digitization Kateryna Chernogorenko. According to Kateryna Chernogorenko, first the opportunity to -transfer in a few clicks- will appear to the National Guardsmen, then to the border guards, and then to all representatives of the Defense Forces. But that's not all. -We are adding online training, our courses are in very high demand, the latest course added is “Communication on the Battlefield” — a very popular course, and a course on unmanned aerial vehicles. We are adding new reports, about 300. There will be a serviceman's certificate, an officer's certificate,- said the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for Digitalization. As reported by ArmyInform, almost 200 thousand conscripts received a postponement to Reserve+.

Title: Reparations for destroyed property and health damage: The damage register will be complete in 2025
Description: reported Deputy Prime Minister of Ukraine Mykhailo Fedorov. Since April of this year, applications for destroyed housing have already been submitted to the Register, mostly from the Donetsk, Kharkiv and Kherson regions. According to Mykhailo Fedorov, this mechanism is the basis for future reparations and an important tool for demonstrating to the world the extent of the damage caused by Russia to Ukraine. The main causes of losses, due to which applications are submitted: Mykhailo Fedorov noted that the team of the International Register of Losses is working on strengthening the organizational and technical base so that in the first half of 2025 all categories of applications will become available. Ukrainians affected by Russia's actions are encouraged to submit applications through the Diya portal. This will allow the crimes of the aggressor country to be recorded, creating a clear picture of the damage done for future reparations. As reported by ArmyInform, from December 1 in the application -Action- restored the possibility of booking employees for critical enterprises.

Title: -Prisons are empty, women are involved in assaults-: in the East, Russians enroll everyone in stormt...
Description: About this told on the telethon -Edyny Novyvy- the spokesman of the operational and strategic group of troops -Khortytsia- lieutenant colonel Nazar Voloshyn. In addition, according to Nazar Voloshin, almost 40 tanks were destroyed, and 45 Russians surrendered. The enemy is forced to pull up reserves. -There is information that prisons in Russia are almost empty. Freshly mobilized and former prisoners were seen in the ranks of the Russian troops. And recently, women have been involved in storm operations, they are former convicts from the -storm- units, - said Nazar Voloshyn. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russian occupying army was in the area of ​​responsibility of the Khortytsia air defense system in November lost more than 35 thousand servicemen. Last week, the enemy made 1,156 assaults on Defense Force positions, compared to 921 enemy attacks the week before.

Title: Soldiers of the HUR destroyed the enemy -Hurricane- in the Zaporozhye direction
Description: This was reported to GUR MOU. During the day, a group of scouts in the Zaporizhia region discovered and destroyed a number of vehicles used by the occupiers, as well as a Russian BM-27 -Hurricane- multiple rocket launcher system. After being hit by an FPV drone, the enemy's MLRS detonated the ammunition. As reported by ArmyInform, President Volodymyr Zelensky informed about the defensive results in the Zaporozhye direction.

Title: NATO Secretary General: Putin is not interested in peace, we need to strengthen support for Ukraine
Description: This was announced by NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte before the start of the two-day ministerial meeting in Brussels. -On the contrary, Putin is intensifying his rhetoric and reckless actions. He is using Ukraine as a testing ground for experimental missiles and deploying North Korean soldiers in this illegal war,- Mark Rutte said. He emphasized that the Russian dictator is not interested in peace. -He is advancing, trying to seize more territory. Because he thinks he can break Ukraine's resolve. And ours. But he is wrong,- the NATO Secretary General stressed. Mark Rutte said that a meeting of the Ukraine-NATO Council will take place tonight, for the first time with the participation of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine Andrii Sybiga. The meeting will also be joined by the new High Representative of the EU, Kaya Callas. -Ukraine has the right to defend itself. And we have a duty to help her. Therefore, we must continue our unwavering support. The stronger our military support for Ukraine will be, the stronger their hand will be at the negotiating table. And the sooner we can put an end to Russian aggression in Ukraine once and for all,- the NATO Secretary General stressed. As reported by ArmyInform, the United States on December 2. -dlya-ukrayiny/->announced the provision of another aid package to Ukraine with a total cost of 725 million dollars.

Title: A buggy, a tank and 2 BMPs — a powerful assault on the Kharkiv Region cost the enemy dearly
Description: The video of the battle appeared on December 3 on the battalion channel. The occupiers advanced an armored group consisting of 2 BMPs and an assault group on buggies, which were covered by a tank, towards our positions. Our aerial scouts noticed the approach of the enemy in advance and began to attack him. -As a result of the enemy assault, an enemy tank was damaged, two BMPs were damaged and destroyed, and enemy assault groups along with buggies were eliminated,- the personnel in the battalion commented. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 4th guard battalion of the 101st guard brigade of the General Staff named after Colonel General Gennady Vorobyov destroyed up to ten Russians, who were hiding in an abandoned residential building.

Title: A pro-Russian propagandist was detained in Kharkiv, who urged Ukrainians to -pray- for Putin
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs you about this. According to the investigation, the woman, who is a supporter of the so-called -Russian peace-, left comments in pro-Russian Telegram channels, claiming that -Kharkiv is a Russian city-, and called on Ukrainians to -pray- for the president of the Russian Federation. She also spread misinformation that Russian troops allegedly attack only -military objects- and disparaged Ukrainian patriots. The law enforcement officers gathered evidence, and a forensic linguistic examination confirmed the illegal nature of the woman's statements. The accused is currently in custody and is awaiting trial in the Chervonozavod District Court of Kharkiv. She faces up to five years in prison. As reported by ArmyInform, malolitni recidivists on the order of Russia blew up a thermos near the police station in the Kyiv region.

Title: The occupier wanted to kill others with a grenade, but it killed him: SSO soldiers raided Russian po...
Description: They published a video of combat work on their channel. The commander of the group under the pseudonym -Smola- said that he was informed about the discovery of five people, probably Russian invaders, who were sitting in the dugouts. -We were ordered to stay there until the morning and carry out a sweep and raid. In the morning we advanced to the dugouts. Our mortar worked very well so that the enemy could not advance to detect us. Approaching quietly, I told them to provide us with a permanent UAV that would hang low over them, so that they would be afraid to come forward,- Smola said. According to him, SSO fighters approached the enemy dugouts. -They saw a dugout with a blanket. They opened the blanket, saw four gays and told them to get out. They thought we were theirs. We said loudly a second time, -Get out.- Then their faces changed. They understood that we were not their own,- he recalled. The fifth occupant was not there. the Russians refused to say where he was. -I ordered the other dugouts to be cleared. They found the fifth. He did not come out of the dugout. Yelled that he was 19 years old, which he thought. Then he threw the weapon not far, to the entrance to the dugout. He tried to throw a grenade, it hit his dugout and it bounced back. I killed him. Therefore, Russians, do not make mistakes, but give up and you will be alive,- Smola assured. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the UA_REG Team unit of the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine during a raid on the rear of Russian troops also were able to takerich booty in the form of prisoners

Title: - Kharkiv is a Russian city- and - pray for Putin-: the SBU detained a pro-Russian propagandist
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs you about this. According to the investigation, the woman, who is a supporter of the so-called -Russian peace-, left comments in pro-Russian Telegram channels, claiming that -Kharkiv is a Russian city-, and called on Ukrainians to -pray- for the president of the Russian Federation. She also spread misinformation that Russian troops allegedly attack only -military objects- and disparaged Ukrainian patriots. The law enforcement officers gathered evidence, and a forensic linguistic examination confirmed the illegal nature of the woman's statements. The accused is currently in custody and is awaiting trial in the Chervonozavod District Court of Kharkiv. She faces up to five years in prison. As reported by ArmyInform, malolitni recidivists on the order of Russia blew up a thermos near the police station in the Kyiv region.

Title: The DOT of the Ministry of Defense announced the purchase of water for the military for the first ha...
Description: This is stated in messages MOU. The total announced value of the purchase is more than UAH 727 million. -Water is one of the main needs of our military. Due to large volumes, as well as specific requirements for transportation and storage, its supply is organized by region. This makes it possible to regularly deliver water to various military units, supporting continuous supply of our defenders,- said Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. The Ministry of Defense continues to work on creating comfortable and safe conditions for our military, providing them with everything they need to perform important tasks for the defense of the country. As reported by ArmyInform, DOT announced the purchase of tangible property for the Armed Forces of Ukraine for 2025. For the first time, purchases are announced in advance — this became possible thanks to the joint work of the State Rear Operator, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine and the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The expected cost of purchases is more than UAH 2.5 billion.

Title: President: There are good defensive results in the Zaporozhye region, we are continuing the operatio...
Description: This is stated in the message of the head of state. -The Kurakhiv and Pokrovsky directions remain the most difficult. Grateful to every unit that destroys the occupier and restrains the Russian advance. Our defensive results in the Zaporozhye region are not bad,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. The President discussed with the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces the actions of our units in the areas of the Kursk operation. -We continue to cause significant losses to Russia on its territory,- he added. Separately, the head of state noted that they are already starting to fulfill their tasks -zsu/->recently appointed commander of the Ground Forces Major General Mykhailo Drapaty and Deputy Commander-in-Chief Colonel Oleg Apostol. -We expect the effectiveness of their service in new positions, and this will directly affect the increase in the combat capability of the Armed Forces of Ukraine,- the President said.

Title: The invaders repelled the drone attack and drove down the -death road-, but they were defeated by Ru...
Description: They published a video of combat work on their channel. -As a result: minus the sweet couple who crushed the drone with an EW, then shot down the drone with a duck gun, and the bottom line is -dad, mom, I'm alive, I'm fine, I'm in Donbass.- This is what Rusoriz read in the eyes of the occupier at the last moment,- defenders commented. Previously, ArmyInform showed how the pilots of the Muramasa 109th unmanned attack aircraft company of a separate brigade of the Terro-Defense Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine nashyh-dronariv/->destroy enemy logistics on Pokrovsky direction

Title: As Stalin commanded: the enemy began to storm Ukrainian positions head-on
Description: About it on the air of the Espresso TV channel told representative Andriy Polukhin of the press service of the 24th separate mechanized brigade named after King Danylo. According to Andriy Polukhin, in addition to his usual tactics of small groups, the enemy began to use another, more straightforward one. -I began to storm the positions of our guys head on again, that is, to try openly to break through our defense right in the afternoon or evening. At the moment, he has not succeeded, his tactics are not successful. Our guys are holding the line,- said Andriy Polukhin. ArmyInform has already reported that in the area of ​​the city of Chasiv Yar, the enemy does not use armored vehicles in assaults, at most - for logistics to the frontline.

Title: Online reservists increased: 190,000 tested the new Reserve+ function
Description: Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine from issues of digitization Kateryna Chernogorenko. According to Kateryna Chernogorenko, this function was launched for people with disabilities, graduate students and parents with many children. In the three weeks since the launch, 190,000 people have received such a deferment - literally in a few clicks. -This is an incredible number. Although it may seem that it is small. But imagine that 190,000 people did not go to the TCC, did not stand in lines, did not submit paper documents, did not overload TCC employees. Currently, we also receive words of gratitude from TCC employees,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko. As reported by ArmyInform, Ministry of Defense has already conducted four surveys in the Army+ mobile application and received almost 50,000 verified reviews

Title: In Diya, the booking of employees has been restored: the request takes only 20 minutes
Description: reported Deputy Prime Minister of Ukraine Mykhailo Fedorov about this, hundreds of companies are already actively using this service The system works as automated as possible: -Diya- independently receives up-to-date information about employees available for booking, checks their compliance with the requirements and transmits the data to the -Oberig- registry. This allows you to avoid paper bureaucracy, queues in state institutions and TCCs. A positive booking result is automatically displayed in the -Reserve+- system. It only takes 20 minutes to submit an application, which allows entrepreneurs to focus on their business while Diya processes their requests. -Technology from the state is when the system works for you,- noted Mykhailo Fedorov.

Title: Donechchyna under fire: there are civilian casualties, 8 high-rise buildings were damaged
Description: informs the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin about this. -In Kotlyny, as a result of a drone strike, 1 person died and 1 was injured, a car was damaged. In Pokrovsk, 8 high-rise buildings and 2 cars were damaged. Information about victims in the city has not yet been received. -Both under the cover of night and in broad daylight, the Russians continue to target civilians,- he said. As reported by ArmyInform, as of the morning of December 3, the Russians shelled populated areas of Donetsk region 11 times during the day, as a result of which one person died, three were wounded .

Title: We destroy a third of the assault units: the drones of the -Rubizh- brigade arrange -rusoriz-
Description: Andriy Otchenash, commander, told about this on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- the crew of the UAV -Kara Nebesna- of the fourth brigade of operational assignment -Rubizh-. According to Andrii Otchenash, the assault actions of the Russians are often so senseless that the drones of the -Rubizh- brigade can destroy 40-50 people in a few days. At the same time having zero losses. -This is quite a large number of the enemy. We destroy the third part of the assault units, which are going to the line, where the fighters of the Rubizh brigade are holding the defense. For any adequate army, this would be a reason to stop these offensive actions,- said Andriy Otchenash. As reported by ArmyInform, on In the Seversky direction, the UAV operators of the 4th operational battalion -Freedom Force- of the -Rubizh- Brigade destroyed the dugout, where the invaders were hiding.

Title: Juvenile recidivists at the behest of Russia blew up a thermos near the police station in Kyiv regio...
Description: informs the Security Service of Ukraine about this. On November 28, young men detonated an improvised explosive device near the district police department in Vyshgorod district. No one was injured in the explosion. The perpetrators were exposed -on a hot trail-. According to the investigation, the young men were recruited through Telegram channels, which were disguised as platforms for the search for quick earnings. The explosive device, disguised as a thermos, was previously planted in a cache in the Kyiv region. According to the instructions of the Russian curators, to increase the impressive effect, the device was stuffed with nuts and bolts. The terrorist attack was planned with the help of two mobile phones: one was used for remote detonation through a special program, the other for covert broadcasting of the explosion in real time. The actions of the teenagers were directed by a representative of the special services of the Russian Federation, who disguised himself as the girl's account and promised a reward for completing the task. However, the participants never received the promised funds. During the searches, mobile phones and other evidence of their subversive activities were seized from the detainees. The young men were informed of the suspicion for h. 2 Art. 258 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (terrorist act). For committing a particularly serious crime, they face up to 12 years in prison. The investigation is being conducted under the procedural guidance of the Kyiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. As reported by ArmyInform, meshkanku Chernigov is suspected of pointing Russian Kh-59 missiles at the city.

Title: The consequences of the night attack in Ternopil region and Rivne region: the Russians hit an energy...
Description: The State Emergency Service of Ukraine informs about this. -Thanks to the prompt and coordinated actions of emergency personnel, the fire was extinguished. 34 rescuers and 11 units of special equipment worked at the site,- the report said. According to preliminary information, there are no dead or injured. Head of the Ternopil State Administration Vyacheslav Negoda noted that during the night attack of the enemy on the Ternopil Region hitting an energy supply facility, which caused a fire. -There were problems with the energy supply of several settlements. We are working on solving the problem with the light,- he said. In addition, the DSNS announced that in Rivne Oblast tonight as a result of an enemy attack on a fire broke out in an infrastructure facility. 50 firefighters and 12 pieces of equipment were involved in its liquidation. Previously, the Air Force declared , that several hits were recorded at night on critical infrastructure facilities in Ternopil region and Rivne region. In total, the enemy attacked Ukraine with 28 attack UAVs of the Shahed type and drones of other types. As reported by ArmyInform, that on the night of December 2, during an air alert, the enemy also -zagyblyj/->attacked Ternopil and damaged a residential building.

Title: They wanted to storm, but lost 4 BMP: the paratroopers stopped the Russian column
Description: A video of combat work appearedon the unit's page. -The enemy in the Kurakhiv direction threw a whole column of armored vehicles to storm the positions of the 71st separate hunting brigade. Thanks to the joint work of UAV pilots and gunners, the occupiers' equipment was stopped. At least four combat vehicles of the occupiers were destroyed or damaged,- the paratroopers said.

Title: The enemy attacked Donetsk region: dozens of houses were damaged, there were dead and wounded
Description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. Pokrovsky district: In Kurakhovo and nearby villages, numerous high-rise buildings and private houses were damaged. In Pokrovsk, 1 person died and 1 was injured, 4 houses were damaged; 2 people were injured in Shevchenko; a house in Rodinsky and a house in Leontovychy were damaged. The Grodivsk and Myrnograd communities are under fire. Kramatorsk district: 6 objects were damaged in Stara Mykolaivka of the Illinivska community. The outskirts of Kostyantynivska and Lymanska communities were shelled. Bakhmut district: In Seversk, 6 houses were damaged. In the Chasovoyarsk community, 10 private houses, 2 multi-storey buildings and an industrial building were damaged. 192 people, including 18 children, were evacuated from the front line. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kherson region as a result of Russian shelling last day /->three people were injured. Also the enemy made about 500 strikes on Zaporizhzhia , there is the destruction of residential buildings.

Title: -Terrible conditions, -no greenery-, difficult logistics, but they continue to climb-: winter only s...
Description: Mykola Volokhov, commander, told about this on the air of the -Edyny Novyni- telethon. of the -Terra- unit of the 3rd separate assault brigade According to Mykola Volokhov, the Russians continue to be extremely active. The only thing is that they have difficulties with logistics. It is more difficult to bring up armored vehicles and accumulate forces for mass attacks. -For some reason, the Russians love to fight in the winter, the conditions are terrible, there is no -green house-, very difficult logistics, but they continue to climb. In principle, everything is fine with their human resources. And they could afford to hire a company of soldiers during the day. A company is 100 men, for a second. Now this trend continues,- Mykola Volokhov said. As reported by ArmyInform , the fighters of the 3rd Assault Brigade hit the enemy self-propelled anti-tank missile complex -Bulsae-4-, which was placed by the Russian North korea

Title: Rescuers record the consequences of the drone attack in the Kyiv region: there is significant destru...
Description: This was reported by the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. As a result of falling debris, a fire broke out in a private yard: a gas riser near the house and a car in the garage were on fire. Firefighters extinguished the fire. In addition, the garage building was destroyed, windows, the roof of the house and the fence were damaged. Fortunately, there were no casualties. 6 rescuers and 2 units of equipment worked at the scene.

Title: Coal only on Christmas trees: the mines of Luhansk Region are a thing of the past
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysohor, the head of the Luhansk Regional Military Administration. In the area of ​​the former -GTV- plant, there are still places where you can catch a signal. However, local residents spread this information cautiously, fearing a repeat of the situation in Siverskodonetsk. There, the occupiers discovered similar -islands of communication- and deprived people of the opportunity to use them. Meanwhile, in Luhansk, the Russian invaders installed Christmas trees that symbolize the administrative-territorial units of the so-called LNR. They are decorated, trying to take into account the -unique features- of each municipality. The Christmas tree from Sokologhirsk (formerly Pervomaisk) was decorated with toys in the form of coal - a symbol of the coal industry, which was once the pride of the city. However, during the years of occupation, all mines in the region were closed, as confirmed even by representatives of the occupation administration. Coal remained only in the form of decorative ornaments. As reported by ArmyInform, the occupation authorities of the so-called LNR are trying to control inflation by putting pressure on entrepreneurs.

Title: The occupiers shelled Kharkiv Oblast with anti-aircraft missiles: a civilian was injured
Description: informs the head of Kharkiv OVA Oleg Synegubov about this. Also at 22:00, the enemy shelled the city of Kupyansk with rocket launchers, as a result of which 7 private houses were damaged. During the day, 49 people were evacuated from the Borivskyi and Kupyanskyi directions. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kherson region as a result of Russian shelling last day /->three people were injured. Also the enemy made about 500 strikes on Zaporizhzhia , there is the destruction of residential buildings.

Title: Heroic operation in Kharkiv region: -Edelweiss- liberated Novomlynsk
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. It is noted that, having an advantage in forces, the enemy even crossed a water obstacle. At the same time, Ukrainian defenders, with the support of artillery and UAV units, knocked the enemy out of the bridgehead. In particular, soldiers of the 8th separate assault battalion of the 10th separate mountain assault brigade -Edelweiss- cleared the area in the vicinity of Novomlynsk from enemy forces. As a result of a successful operation, the enemy was destroyed. The right bank of Oskol is under the control of the Defense Forces. Ukrainian flags fly over Novomlynsk. As reported by ArmyInform, The Ukrainian Armed Forces held back more than 200 enemy assaults: the Russians are aggressively going on the offensive in two directions.

Title: Our aircraft struck areas where Russians were concentrated
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In addition, he fired more than five thousand shots, 141 of them from rocket salvo fire systems. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of Oleksandrivka and Lynove settlements of the Sumy region; Hlushkivka, Kharkiv region; Dachenske, Kurakhove, Andriivka, Uspenivka of the Donetsk region, Gulyaipole of the Zaporizhzhia region. However, our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying troops and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. Over the past day, aviation, missile forces and artillery of the Defense Forces hit six areas of concentration of personnel, weapons and military equipment. We will remind you that last The loss of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,780 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 8 tanks, 22 armored combat vehicles, 23 artillery systems, 31 operational-tactical UAVs, 3 cruise missiles, 60 cars and 8 units of special equipment of the occupiers. As reported by ArmiyaInform, The Ukrainian Armed Forces held back more than 200 enemy assaults: the Russians are aggressively going on the offensive in two directions.

Title: Breakdown of the infantry position at close range: how tankmen destroy the invaders with direct guid...
Description: They published a video of combat work on their channel. -The tankers of the 17th OVMBr go on direct fire and destroy the enemy's infantry positions. The positions where the occupiers were hiding were destroyed along with the enemy. Every occupier will feel the power of Ukrainian armor! Glory to Ukraine! Trucks are a force!- - commented the fighters. Previously, ArmyInform showed how, after successfully completing a combat mission, on the way back, Ukrainian soldiers encountered with enemy attacks of FPV drones and Lancets, but thanks to timely reaction and clear diam crew extinguished the tank and returned to the place of deployment without losses.

Title: The enemy shelled Nikopol with heavy artillery: mutilated houses, gymnasium, sanatorium
Description: informs the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak about this. -The gymnasium, sanatorium, 7 private houses, 3 outbuildings, 2 garages, 3 cars and a trailer were damaged. Damaged power lines and gas burners. There are no casualties or injuries,- the report said. Also, in the morning, the occupiers struck the city again. They kissed with a kamikaze drone. -The consequences are being clarified,- noted Serhii Lysak. As reported by ArmyInform, during the past 24 hours, Nikopol region suffered almost 20 enemy attacks. The occupiers fired at the district center, Marganetska and Myrivsk communities , using kamikaze drones, artillery and ammunition dropped from drones.

Title: Night attack -Shakhediv-: hits were recorded in Rivne region and Ternopil region
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As of 9:00 a.m., units of anti-aircraft missile forces, EW and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and Defense Forces of Ukraine shot down 22 enemy UAVs in Kyiv, Chernihiv, Vinnytsia, Khmelnytskyi, Zhytomyr, Sumy, Odesa, Mykolaiv, and Dnipropetrovsk regions. The department noted that 1 drone was lost in location, 2 left the controlled airspace in the direction of Belarus and the temporarily occupied territory. Several hits on critical infrastructure facilities in Ternopil region and Rivne region were also recorded. As reported by ArmyInform, The Ukrainian Armed Forces held back more than 200 enemy assaults: the Russians are aggressively going on the offensive in two directions.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Ukraine and Germany strengthen cooperation in defense tech: artificial intelligence and robotic syst...
Description: reported this by the Minister of Strategic Industries Herman Smetanin during the presentation of new defense tech products . President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi and Federal Chancellor of Germany Olaf Scholz inspected 12 samples of equipment from 11 Ukrainian manufacturers. Among the presented are kamikaze drones, drone swarms, as well as ground robotic complexes with turrets. Two products were created in cooperation with German companies: -This is an example of powerful cooperation between two strong players - Ukraine and Germany. Its results are already visible, and the further deepening of the partnership promises even greater achievements,- emphasized Herman Smetanin. The President of Ukraine thanked Chancellor Scholz and the German government for their support and participation in the development of the Ukrainian defense and industrial complex. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine for the first time took part in the defense and security exhibition NEDS, held in Rotterdam.

Title: The Armed Forces held back more than 200 enemy assaults: the Russians are aggressively going on the ...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. With the support of aviation in the Kharkiv direction, the enemy stormed eight times in the areas of the settlements of Vovchansk and Staritsa. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Dvorichna, Petropavlivka, Zeleny Gay, Kolisnykyvka and Lozova in the Kupyansk direction, where seven attacks by the occupiers took place during the day. Last day, the enemy attacked on the Lyman direction eleven times. Tried to penetrate our defenses near Grekivka, Cherneshchyna, Kopanka, Yampolivka and Terni. One assault of the enemy was repulsed by our defenders in the region of Belogorivka in the Seversky direction. In the Kramatorsk direction the occupiers attacked four times in the Hryhorivka and Chasovoy Yar districts. Nine attacks were carried out by the enemy in the Toretsk direction near the settlements of Toretsk, Nelipivka and Shcherbinivka. Most of the enemy's attacks were directed at Toretsk. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 40 offensive actions of the aggressor in the direction of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Lysivka, Krasniy Yar, Dachenske, Zhovte, Chumatske and Novy Trud settlements. The defense forces repelled 67 enemy attacks on the Kurakhiv direction. The occupiers most actively tried to advance in the areas of the settlements of Berestki, Stari Terny, Sontsivka, Novodmytrivka, Zorya, Kurakhove, Dalne, Katerynivka, Antonivka, and Hanivka. In the districts of Kostiantynopolsky, Rozdolny, Velika Novosilka, Novoandriivka, Novosilka and Novopil in the Vremivsk direction, the enemy carried out 30 assaults on our positions. In the Gulyaipil direction, the enemy launched an air strike with attack aircraft in the area of ​​the Gulyai Pole settlement. In the Orikhov direction, the enemy did not conduct active operations last day. Near Kozatsky Island in the Dnieper direction our troops repelled three enemy attacks, the enemy was unsuccessful. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of offensive groups of the occupiers were detected. Last day, 15 skirmishes took place in the Kursk direction, the enemy carried out 14 airstrikes with 30 guided bombs and launched 381 artillery strikes, including three from rocket salvo systems. We will remind you that last The loss of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,780 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 8 tanks, 22 armored combat vehicles, 23 artillery systems, 31 operational-tactical UAVs, 3 cruise missiles, 60 vehicles and 8 units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: 40 thousand mobilized Russians, the 125th caliber and the Kursk bridgehead: an expert on the unprece...
Description: Why is this happening now? But will the Russians increase the mobilization norms in the near future? Military expert Petro Chernyk answered these questions: -Recently, there have been huge losses of Russians at the front: more than 1,700 people per day. And this indicator is not decreasing. A logical question arises: why are the Russians so reluctant to count on losses right now? And they really do not count with them. And the month of November is an indicator that the losses are truly incredible. An absolute record was set - more than 45,000 people were confirmed killed and wounded. These are unprecedented losses since World War II. Not only the Russian Federation as such, but in general in the universal sense of the word. Why so? It all boils down to big geopolitics. On January 20, President Trump takes office. And very, very much will depend on his position: what will be our battle. And by this time, Putin has two tasks, as he understands them: to knock us out of the Kursk region. This is moment one. And the second point is to end the full-fledged occupation of Donetsk region. Will they be able to make it happen? In my opinion, they will not be able to. In order for them to realize this task, it is necessary to increase the monthly mobilization rates to 50 thousand people. So far, there is no reliable information that they worked that way. According to my own calculations, they mobilize 40-42 thousand per month. We have the so-called anticipatory extermination, when the enemy's losses are greater than he recruits. In a general sense, do the Russians have mobilization potential? Yes, there is. Unfortunately, it is quite large. They have 2 to 3 million trained men who know how to use a Kalashnikov assault rifle. And if we also take into account the unprepared component, then this number can be safely multiplied by two. In their opinion, learning how to use a Kalashnikov assault rifle takes about five to six days. And for the Russians, the MPL-50, what we call a minesweeper, is also a weapon. There is no mention of the equipment with which they could provide their personnel. The maximum they can do is 25 T-90 tanks per month. So far, there are between 3,000 and 6,000 different armored vehicles in warehouses, along with PT-76. What is PT-76? This is such a small irony: this is the predecessor of the BMP-1. If necessary, they will reach them. And there is an already confirmed, personally verified option, when, say, in the same Kurshchyna, tanks go into battle with almost no ammunition, they are used as a kind of armored vehicle that drops personnel. So, even with a 125 mm shell, they already had a problem. But in no way should the opponent be underestimated. They will also now count all their losses for the month of November. And my personal version is that closer to the New Year, considering that they have a holiday mentality, as they say, Putin may dare to raise the mobilization rates. Our task is to hold both the Kursk bridgehead and Donetsk region before the cycle of dry weather.-

Title: Russian attacks in the Kherson region: civilians and infrastructure suffered
Description: This was notified by Oleksandr Prokudin, head of Kherson OVA. Last day, Sadovye, Stanislav, Prydniprovske, Bilozerka, Antonivka, Mykilske, Ponyativka, Beryslav, Novovorontsovka, Osokorivka, Zolota Balka, Havrylivka and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes. According to the head of the OVA, the Russian military attacked critical infrastructure. In addition, the occupiers attacked the residential quarters of the population centers of the region, in particular damaged a high-rise building and 12 private houses. The occupiers also mutilated a gas pipeline, an outbuilding, a garage and private cars. As reported by ArmyInform, enemy inflicted about 500 blows on Zaporizhzhia, there is destruction of residential buildings.

Title: The enemy keeps a missile carrier in the Black Sea: there is a threat of a strike
Description: About this informs Navy Armed Forces of Ukraine. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. There are 5 enemy ships in the Mediterranean Sea, 4 of them are Caliber cruise missile carriers. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, during the visit of a delegation of industry representatives of the Kingdom of Denmark, meeting with Ukrainian military sailors and shipbuilding specialists.

Title: Tanks, anti-aircraft missiles, artillery systems and almost 1,800 invaders: the General Staff of the...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 03.12.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, 193 combat clashes at the front : Armed forces repulse enemy attacks in all directions.

Title: Ammunition for HIMARS, anti-personnel mines and projectiles: the new US aid package for Ukraine
Description: This is stated in statements of the Pentagon. It is noted that the new aid will provide Ukraine with additional opportunities to meet its most urgent needs, in particular: air defense equipment, ammunition for missile systems and artillery, and anti-tank equipment. It is provided within the limits of the previously applied authority of the President of the United States for the use of stocks of the Ministry of Defense (PDA program). The package includes: -The United States will continue to work together with about 50 members of the Alliance and partners within the framework of the Contact Group on the Defense of Ukraine and related coalitions of forces and means to meet Ukraine's urgent needs on the battlefield and to protect against Russian aggression-, – the message says.

Title: The enemy struck about 500 blows on Zaporozhye, there is destruction of residential buildings
Description: informs about this on December 3, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA Ivan Fedorov. In particular, Russian troops carried out 3 air strikes on Malinivka and Zaliznychny. 299 Russian UAVs of various modifications attacked Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghirya, Malynivka, Novodarivka and Olhivske. Also, the occupiers fired 15 rounds of anti-aircraft missiles on the territory of Malaya Tokmachka, Novodanilivka, and Novoandriivka. -179 artillery strikes hit Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Malia Tokmachka, Biloghiru, Malynivka, Novodarivka, and Olhivka. 3 reports were received about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. Civilians were not harmed,- Ivan Fedorov said. As reported by ArmyInform, yesterday during the day the occupiers /->made 342 strikes on 11 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: Dnipropetrovsk recovers from shelling: the consequences of Russian attacks
Description: This was notified by the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak. A 21-year-old boy was injured as a result of the shelling. He was given medical assistance, and treatment will continue on an outpatient basis. Among the damages: a high-rise building, 8 private houses, 4 outbuildings, a garage, a car and a minibus. A gymnasium, a shop and a gas station were also hit. Partially destroyed power lines and a gas pipeline. In the evening, during the attack on the Kryvorizka district, three country houses were occupied, two people were injured. According to the head of the OVA, the 85-year-old man was hospitalized in a moderate condition. The 53-year-old was treated at the scene. As a result of shelling, two country houses were destroyed, another one was damaged. A minibus was also mutilated. Rescuers continue to examine the area and eliminate the consequences of shelling. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy hit Kryvyi Rih three rockets, all shot down.

Title: Why the Russians are afraid of our drones: a DSH combatant told where the enemy assault groups disap...
Description: But with the beginning of the invasion chose the way of the paratrooper. Now the lieutenant colonel is the commander of one of the battalions of the 46th separate air mobile brigade. His combat career in the role of a combatant began in the Zaporizhzhia region. It was near Robotyny and Verbovoy. All forest strips located between these settlements were liberated by the 46th brigade. Serhiy recalls that at that time the latest developments were actively used in the battles, and this gave results: -It was then, during the battles in the Zaporizhzhia region, that we actively began to develop UAVs. FPV drones and -drops- were used. At that time, the enemy had not yet caught up with us. The guys were all prepared, intelligent. There were moments when we carried out assault actions without a single loss. No casualties or injuries.- After the battles in Zaporozhye region, the paratroopers were transferred to Donetsk region. The unit got to the outskirts of Maryanka. At that time, the settlement was almost entirely occupied. Only scraps of Ukrainian land remained, where the paratroopers were forced to hold the ruins. And they suffered losses there. -It was decided to prepare a defense line. Everyone who could was sent to equip the fortifications. This is a technical support platoon, a material support platoon, even signalmen were equipping positions at that time. They worked by hand - with shovels, peels. Logs and other materials that were needed were transported at a risk. The task was completed. They built a line, which was then held for more than six months. But, despite their heroism and all their skills, the situation on the front line was such that they were forced to retreat to a certain distance and occupy a more advantageous line,- says the serviceman. Before that, paratroopers did not take part in defensive operations. So I had to study. And learn fast. -We understood how to work in defense, what to do. Fortifications were constantly being built to move personnel to preserve life. Dugouts were dug at a certain distance so that a serviceman could move from shelter to shelter when artillery fire was being fired at him,- recalls Serhiy. In the unit, the UAV group was constantly developing. Both FPVers and Mavic pilots with resets. -There were times when we heard from interceptions that the enemy complained about them very much. And the prisoners also complained: -your drones with skids stole us.- That is, the Russians are very afraid of our drones. But, as they say, enemies do not sleep either. They also began to actively use FPV drones, drops from Mavics, and now with the enemy, you can say, we are on the same level.- However, the enemy has an advantage in the number of personnel. And they do not protect their soldiers, constantly throwing them into crazy assaults. -When we took prisoners, they often complained that their assault groups, which left on armored vehicles, simply disappeared. They reached a certain area and disappeared. Well, they didn't know the truth that we simply destroyed them after they landed,- says Serhiy. Sometimes the paratroopers had to secretly take out the prisoners so that they would not be destroyed by their comrades. In particular, after artillery and drones destroyed the main mass of enemy attack aircraft, paratroopers went out in small groups to clear the area and, if possible, take prisoners. -But the enemy does not spare his own. Even when ours were already leading prisoners, and the Russians saw it, they themselves destroyed these people so that we could not interrogate them. So, people are indifferent to Russians. Therefore, during the assaults carried out by the paratroopers, the prisoners were already taken out secretly, trying to save their lives,- recalls Serhiy. To the question of what he is proud of in his battalion, Serhiy answered without hesitation: -The DSHV is the highlight of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. But I will say that in our country each battalion works in its own way. I am proud of the fact that we still have many of those servicemen who arrived on February 24, 2022. We are all mobilized, few are full-time. We became friends, became one. Basically, we are one fighting family. We have many experienced soldiers, sergeants. If we saw that a sergeant was being followed by soldiers, we suggested that he become an officer. After all, servicemen always follow those officers who were soldiers yesterday.- And we have many such officers now. Photo by the author and from the photo archive of Sergey Kuzheluk

Title: 193 combat encounters at the front: the Armed Forces repel enemy attacks in all directions
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The invaders launched one missile and 25 air strikes on the territory of Ukraine, using one guided missile and 36 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, the Russians used 717 kamikaze drones to strike and fired more than four thousand shots at the positions of our troops and populated areas. In the Kharkiv direction, our troops repelled 6 enemy attacks in the Vovchansk and Staritsa regions - four attacks were repelled, two clashes are still ongoing. The enemy carried out airstrikes on the settlements of Neskuchne and Kozacha Lopan, using eight air defense systems. In the Kupyansk direction the enemy stormed the positions of our defenders seven times in the Dvorichna, Petropavlivka, Zeleny Gay, Kolisnikivka and Lozova districts. Ukrainian defenders repulsed six attacks, one more battle is currently underway. In the Lyman direction Russian invaders attacked Ukrainian positions 11 times near the settlements of Grekivka, Cherneshchyna, Kopanky, Yampolivka and Terny. On the Seversky direction the enemy launched one assault on the positions of our defenders in the Beilohorivka area. In the Kramatorsk direction, four combat clashes have been recorded near Hryhorivka and Chasovoy Yar, which were successfully repelled by our defenders. In the Toretsk direction the Russians attacked the positions of the defense forces eight times. The occupiers concentrated their main offensive efforts near the settlements of Toretsk, Nelipivka and Shcherbynivka. Currently, three military clashes are ongoing. With the support of bomber aircraft in the Pokrovsky direction, the Russians tried 40 times to break through our defense near the settlements of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Lysivka, Krasny Yar, Dachenske, Zhovte, Chumatske and Novy Trud. So far, one battle is ongoing. The opponent suffers significant losses - more than 411 occupants were neutralized on this route, 200 of them irretrievably. One vehicle and an enemy mortar were also destroyed. In the Kurakhiv direction the enemy attacked our positions 67 times near the settlements of Berestki, Stari Terny, Sontsivka, Novodmytrivka, Zorya, Kurakhove, Dalne, Katerynivka, Antonivka and Ganivka, two skirmishes - ongoing. 100 occupiers were neutralized, 45 of them irretrievably, in addition, two motorcycles and two portable radio electronic warfare stations of the enemy were destroyed. Rozdolny, Velika Novosilka, Novoandriivka, Novosilka and Novopol. Five clashes continue until now. The enemy launched an air strike with one guided bomb in the Andriivka area. In the Gulyaipil direction the enemy carried out an air strike, using attack aircraft in the area of ​​the Gulyai Pole settlement. In the Dnieper direction our troops repelled two enemy attacks near the Dnieper and Kozatsky Islands, the enemy was unsuccessful. In other areas, the situation has not undergone significant changes. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the -Kryla- unit of the 95th Polish Airborne Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces destroyed 9 Russian armored vehicles at once in Kurshchyna.

Title: Black hornets will come in handy: the US military will be armed with new personal nanodrones
Description: How reported the official portal of this firm, in addition to the supply of the miniature drones themselves, the deal, which is valued in $91 million, provision is made for the transfer of relevant controllers, spare parts and training with personnel to the army, ArmiyaInform reports. These advanced nano-unmanned aerial systems (UAS) will be acquired as part of the second phase of the US Army's Soldier Borne Sensor (SBS), Individual Airborne Reconnaissance System program. According to the company, the US military is currently using previous versions of the Black Hornet system (-Чорный шерный- in Ukrainian), which have been supplied to the US Army since 2018. And the total amount of investment in the SBS project by 2030 is expected to exceed $250 million. By the way, it is worth reminding that miniature drones from Teledyne FLIR are well known in the Defense Forces of Ukraine. As our agency reported with reference to -_blank- rel=-nofollow- href=-https://www-regjeringen-no.translate.goog/en/aktuelt/droner/id2924942/?_x_tr_sl=auto&_x_tr_tl=uk&_x_tr_hl=uk&_x_tr_pto=op-> statement Ministry of Defense The Kingdom of Norway, in August 2022, Norway and Great Britain decided to purchase a batch of Black Hornet microdrones for the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the amount of more than $9 million. Today's latest variant of this nanodrone builds on the previous version and retains the concept of -infantry tool for reconnaissance and surveillance beyond direct line of sight-, but at the same time has received a better payload compared to the Black Hornet 3, tell the authors of the EDR Magazine site. The drone received an updated 12-megapixel camera with day, night and thermal video and photo channels. With a weight of only 70 grams, the Black Hornet 4 can stay in the air for more than 30 minutes, and the range of the UAV is more than 2 kilometers. The Nanodrone can fly confidently in winds up to 25 knots. Flight performance has been improved with new obstacle avoidance capabilities and an improved battery. Compared to small quadcopters, the single-rotor Black Hornet 4 has extremely low visual and acoustic visibility, allowing it to detect threats day and night without being detected. According to information of the experts of the IKK Defense Express portal, in order to implement the idea of ​​improving the capabilities of the drone into a concept, the developers had to slightly increase its dimensions. Yes, the weight has almost doubled, from 33 grams to about 70 grams. Rotor diameter - from 123 mm to 190 mm, length - from 168 mm to 255 mm. That is, the drone still remains quite small, and the entire unmanned aircraft complex, which weighs 1.3 kg, can still be carried in a bag on a body armor. The drone is able to launch in less than 20 seconds, well suited for missions in the absence of GPS. The Black Hornet 4 can be used to rapidly detect targets outside of line of sight and assess fire damage results in real time. -Black Hornet 4 takes the features and capabilities that made the Black Hornet 3 world-renowned to the next level,- said Jifen Lei, executive vice president and general manager of Teledyne FLIR Defense. In total, FLIR Defense delivered more than 20,000 various modifications of Black Hornet PRS to military and security services in more than 40 countries of the world. The Black Hornet 4 is designed and manufactured by Teledyne FLIR Defense in Norway. -We have worked closely with customers and end users to make this system even more valuable to reservists who need situational awareness or are involved in covert operations where accurate and operational information is critical. Black Hornet 4 is a promising nano-drone technology,- Lei added. It is also emphasized that the basis for artificial intelligence systems has been laid in the drone - thanks to this, the drone can be improved so that it is even easier for the military to operate it on the battlefield. Black Hornet 4 personal reconnaissance nanosystem. Video: Teledyne FLIR

Title: -5 FPVs fell, none hit the -beha--. How does the EW-laboratory of the DSHV work near the front line
Description: Actually, this industry is developing very quickly, and the 77th separate airmobile Naddnipryan brigade even managed to create its own EW laboratory near the front - in order to quickly produce and repair equipment for its fighters on the front line. Correspondent ArmyInform visited such a secret laboratory and asked paratroopers about what electronic devices can be made in such difficult conditions, where to get spare parts and how to keep up with know-how on the battlefield. Roman, a soldier of the 77th OAeMBr, conducts a tour of the laboratory.
