The occupiers also mutilated buses and a private car. As reported by ArmyInform, in Ternopil as a result of a strike drone hitting a residential building died person.

Title: Defense forces repelled dozens of attacks in the Pokrovsky and Kurakhiv directions
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff Armed Forces as of 08:00 on December 2. According to detailed information, yesterday the enemy carried out 18 airstrikes on the positions of Ukrainian units and populated areas, dropped 25 anti-aircraft missiles, and used 1,635 kamikaze drones. In addition, he fired 5,079 rounds, 145 of which were from RSV. In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy stormed 10 times in the areas of the settlements of Staritsa, Tykh, Vovchansk and in the direction of Kozachai Lopan. In the Kupyansk direction, there were nine attacks by the occupiers during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Lozova, Kruglyakivka, Hlushkivka, and Zeleny Gayu. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked eight times. Tried to move forward near Druzhelyubivka, Grekivka, Hryhorivka, Terni and Torskyi. In the Kramatorsk direction, three clashes were recorded in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar. In the direction of Toretsk the enemy launched eight attacks near Toretsk and in the direction of Shcherbinivka. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 33 assault and offensive actions of the aggressor in Myrolyubivka, Promeny, Lysivka, Dachensky, Zhovtoy and Chumatsky districts. In the Kurakhivka direction Defense forces repelled 48 attacks on the positions of our troops near Berestki, Sontsivka, Zora, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhovo, Dalnyi, Elizavetivka, and Hannivka. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy carried out 24 offensive actions against the positions of Ukrainian units in the districts of Kostyantynopolsky, Trudovoy, Velika Novosilka, Novosilka, Novy Komar and Novodarivka. In the Dnieper direction, the Russian invaders tried to storm the positions of our units four times, but these actions did not bring them success. In the operational zone in Kurshchyna, units of the Defense Forces of Ukraine repelled 16 attacks by Russian invaders over the past day. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. On the border with the Chernihiv and Sumy regions, the enemy from the territory of the Russian Federation uses artillery and aviation in the areas of Ukrainian settlements. In general, the losses of the Russian invaders last day made up 1790 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed nine tanks, 28 armored combat vehicles, 30 artillery systems, 83 operational-tactical UAVs and 99 vehicles.

Title: The occupiers inflicted more than 340 blows on 11 settlements in Zaporozhye
Description: This was announced by Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA. Russian troops carried out two airstrikes on Gulyaipilsk. 195 UAVs of various modifications attacked Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghira, Malynivka, Novodarivka, and Olgivske. 13 shellings from MLRS were carried out on the territory of Mala Tokmachka, Novodanilivka, Novodarivka and Novoandriivka. 132 artillery strikes fell on Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Malia Tokmachka, Biloghir, Malynivka, Novodarivka, and Olhivskyi. There were no reports of the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. Civilians were not injured. As reported by ArmyInform, in Ternopil as a result of an attack drone hitting a residential building died person.

Title: Russian losses per day: 1,790 occupiers, tanks, artillery systems and armored vehicles
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 02.12.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, on December 1 at the front 158 combat clashes took place. The enemy attacks the most in the Kurakhiv and Pokrovsky directions.

Title: Missile threat from the Black Sea: two Caliber carriers in position
Description: reported this by the Naval Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Also during the day, in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: -the Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Human Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems,- the Navy said. As reported by ArmyInform, during the visit of a delegation of industry representatives of the Kingdom of Denmark, meeting with Ukrainian military sailors and shipbuilding specialists.

Title: In Ternopil, a drone hit a residential building, one person was killed
Description: This was reported by the head of the Ternopil State Administration Vyacheslav Negoda. -Unfortunately, there are victims: there are seriously injured, one person died. My sincere condolences to the relatives,- he wrote. Relevant services are working on the spot: extinguishing the fire and carrying out evacuation.

Title: There will be no total immersion in darkness: an expert on mass air strikes of the Russian Federatio...
Description: Military expert Petro Chernyk told why there have been more mass attacks and what to expect in our country in winter: -Such a number of Shaheds: is it a lot or a little (November 28 of this year - ed.)? In fact, it is very, very much. That is, the Russians managed to raise the level of their composition. But not production. The only thing they produce is the body itself. Two-stroke petrol engine is either Iranian or Chinese. Microelectronics - from other countries. But there is a nuance. Despite the fact that these are really very high figures (the number of launched enemy UAVs - ed.), the rate of shooting down or location deviation is in the range of 90 to 98%, and sometimes 100%. This is a very serious indicator of the performance of our air defenses. Regarding indicators of locational deviation. This means that we already have such a level of radio-electronic warfare that allows -shaheda- not just to plant, but even to deploy back to Russia and Belarus. Will the Russians continue this work? One hundred percent, will not stop. But there is also an important point here: because there are again huge fears that, say, 200 Kh-101 missiles Russia has made. And it is supposedly something incredibly huge. Let me remind you that the largest volley they launched in August was 127 rockets simultaneously. And they still haven't repeated it. And they produce no more than 150-170 rockets per month. Do they have the task of destroying our energy infrastructure? THERE ARE. But again, we are a big country in terms of electricity generation, specifically in the nuclear aspect. And our network has been closed to the European network for at least two years. Despite the fact that there will be difficulties with turning off the light, I am 100% sure that there will be no total immersion in darkness. And our air defense forces will continue to demonstrate such high performance.-

Title: The defense forces repelled 15 attacks in Kurshchyna, the enemy became more active in the Vremivsk d...
Description: This is stated in the operational information of the General Staff ZSU as of 22:00 December 1. In the Kharkiv direction, our troops repelled 10 enemy attacks near Staritsa, Tykhoi, Vovchansk and in the direction of Kozachoa Lopan. According to preliminary estimates, yesterday the enemy lost 130 servicemen killed and wounded, Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed two tanks, six armored combat vehicles, 13 UAVs, eight vehicles and one special equipment; three tanks and four cars of the occupiers suffered significant damage. The enemy launched nine attacks on our fortifications in the Kupyan direction. At this time, four clashes in the districts of Lozova, Kruglyakivka, Hlushkivka and Zeleny Gayu have ended. On the Lymanskyi direction during the day, Russian troops stormed the positions of Ukrainian defenders eight times in the areas of Druzhelyubivka, Grekivka, Hryhorivka, Terniv, and Torskyi. All enemy attacks are repelled. In the Siversk direction, the enemy did not conduct active operations, the enemy aircraft struck Siversk with three aerial bombs. In the Kramatorsk direction, the invaders' attempt to advance near Chasovoy Yar ended in failure. In the direction of Toretsk the occupiers stormed seven times today in the areas of Toretsk and in the direction of Shcherbinivka. Enemy bomber aircraft were active in the areas of Kostyantynivka and Petrivka. The battle continues in one location. In the Pokrovsky direction during the day, the enemy carried out 33 assault and offensive actions. The Russian occupiers are most active in Myrolyubivka, Promeny, Lysivka, Dachensky, Zhovtoy, and Chumatsky districts. The enemy used aviation means of destruction in the areas of Panteleimonivka, Grodivka, Dachenske, and Novopustinka settlements. According to preliminary calculations, today our soldiers eliminated 173 and wounded 210 occupiers in this direction; destroyed a tank, three armored combat vehicles, three mortars and seven vehicles, and damaged two artillery systems. The enemy is also attacking intensively in the Kurakhiv direction, 48 skirmishes took place yesterday. The enemy's attacks were repelled by our soldiers near Berestki, Sontsivka, Zori, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhovo, Dalny, Elizavetivka, and Hannivka. The occupiers dropped anti-aircraft guns in the areas of Ulakla and Elizavetivka settlements. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy tried 24 times to break through near Kostiantynopolsky, Trudovoy, Velika Novosilka, Novosilka, Novy Komar, and Novodarivka, but our defenders stood in the way of this, one skirmish is still ongoing. The enemy conducted four unsuccessful assaults in the Dnieper direction. In Kurshchyna, Ukrainian defenders have repelled 15 attacks by the occupiers today, one battle is ongoing. There were no significant changes in the situation in other directions.

Title: A new batch of aerial scouts for the Armed Forces: Germany included UAVs, which Luke Skywalker raise...
Description: As the official portal of the German government informs, these UAVs were included in the November tranche of military support of our country, reported ArmyInform. It should be noted that the RQ-35 Heidrun aerial reconnaissance aircraft have been well known in the Defense Forces of Ukraine for many years. In particular, as told ArmyInform, back in December 2022, the legendary American actor, known for the role of the Jedi Luke Skywalker from the epic film -Star Wars- and United24 ambassador Mark Hamill, was going to donate exactly 10 powerful RQ-35 Heidrun reconnaissance drones for the Armed Forces. Manufactured by the Danish company Sky-Watch, these UAVs offer advanced capabilities for reconnaissance, surveillance and reconnaissance ( ISR). In addition, Sky-Watch engineers subsequently incorporated technical improvements into the UAV based on operational experience in Ukraine, increasing their resistance to radio-electronic warfare and the ability to navigate in airspace where there is no GNSS. The RQ-35 Heidrun is a fixed-wing mini-unmanned aerial system (UAS) designed primarily for video surveillance and low-altitude reconnaissance. The drone is equipped with a three-lens camera system, including visible and thermal imaging capabilities. Heidrun can transmit real-time video over 30km away, providing live situational awareness. This allows intelligence to be obtained without endangering the operator. This UAV has a flight time of up to 100 minutes, maximum wind resistance of 12 meters per second, and a maximum altitude of 5,200 meters above sea level. The camera payload platform features stabilized gimbals that offer 20x to 40x optical zoom and additional digital zoom options. In addition, radio frequency transmission operating in the 2.2 to 2.5 GHz range ensures secure data transmission. The fixed-wing RQ-35 Heidrun is hand-launched and rapidly collects data on enemy positions. This is extremely important when operating a UAV in the field. The compact ground station has an IP68 enclosure rating and universal mounting for a short- or long-range antenna. The short-range patch antenna allows you to communicate with the UAV at a distance of up to 25 km. For communication at a distance of more than 30 km (beyond direct line of sight), a long-range patch antenna is used, which constantly tracks the UAV. The RQ-35 Heidrun UAV platform has a multi-purpose design that allows for different payload options. RQ-35 Heidrun is supplied by the manufacturer in a set with a tablet for manual control and special software. Sky Watch claims that it is able to function properly in conditions of suppression of satellite navigation with the help of EW tools. This unmanned system was also delivered to Poland. In the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, this drone was designed to fill the gap between small (micro) quadcopters and conventional fixed-wing mini-class UAVs. Specifications: Heidrun Drones. Video: Sky-Watch

Title: How the F-16 -learned- to shoot down the Shaheds: the cost of the question and what remains the most...
Description: ArmiyaInform tells about the limitations and difficulties that the military managed to overcome and has to overcome, as well as about one of the test episodes, during which the task of the F-16 was to destroy a UAV imitating a cruise missile. F-16C fighter launches an APKWS missile at a small maneuverable air target flying at low altitude (December 19, 2019) / source: U.S. The Air Force's cruise missiles have been in service since the 1970s, but for a long time the only country that used them on the battlefield was the United States of America. This created a false impression of the absolute dominance of the US and other NATO countries in this area of ​​armaments. The situation changed in 2017, when the Russian Federation launched cruise missile strikes on targets in Syria. Soon, in 2019, Iran struck Saudi Arabia with kamikaze drones and cruise missiles. This made the military countries of NATO to worry about the possibility of using such weapons also against Western countries and to be more actively engaged in the development and testing of air defense equipment capable of countering enemy cruise missiles and UAVs. Among other things, attention was also paid to the possibility of shooting down small air targets with the help of fighters, including the F-16 Fighting Falcon. An important advantage of using aircraft as air defense means is high mobility, so they were considered as an important addition to other means of air defense. The obvious solution to the task is the use of air-to-air guided missiles by fighters. However, the expected problem was the ratio of the cost of the missile used to shoot down the enemy's ammunition with the price of the cruise missile itself or the enemy's unmanned aerial vehicle. For example, the AIM-120 AMRAAM (Advanced Medium-Range Air-to-Air Missile) all-weather guided missile of the air-to-air class costs more than one million dollars. On the other hand, a kamikaze drone to shoot down can cost only a few tens of thousands of dollars. In view of this, one of the main problems that gunsmiths had to deal with was the creation of an effective and at the same time cheap means of defeat. It was possible to solve it thanks to the use against air targets of the modernized Hydra-70 missile - a 70-mm unguided air missile adopted for armament in the distant 1948. At the beginning of 2010, BAE Systems created the APKWS (Advanced Precision Kill Weapon System) guided missile based on the unguided Hydra, a high-precision air munition with a laser targeting system. The modernization was carried out by installing between the warhead and the rocket engine the WGU-59/B module with laser sensors and rotary vanes, which allow precise guidance on the target. The creation of a high-precision APKWS missile based on the Hydra-70 allowed the US Army to close the need for an inexpensive compact munition that would occupy an intermediate position between unguided aircraft missiles and high-precision missiles of a larger caliber, which would be irrational to use against small, cheap targets. The US Marine Corps is modernizing the Hydra-70, creating APKWS II based on it, and installing missiles on the launcher of the Bell AH-1Z Viper attack helicopter In 2012, APKWS was adopted by the US Navy, upgrading the existing Hydra missiles -70. Since 2014, serial production of the Advanced Precision Kill Weapon System has begun and they have reached other structures of the armed forces of the United States of America. First of all, APKWS entered the armament of the MH-60R Seahawk and MH-60S Knighthawk helicopters. Later, they were also installed on the AV-8B Harrier II vertical takeoff and landing attack aircraft of the US Air Force. In 2016, the U.S. Air Force purchased APKWS missiles for use in ongoing operations in Afghanistan and Iraq, where they were used in combat operations from A-10 Thunderbolt II and F-16 Fighting Falcon aircraft. This was the first example of the use of APKWS in combat operations from fixed-wing aerial platforms, as previously they had been used exclusively from Apache attack helicopters. Opponents of the US army in Iraq and Afghanistan did not have combat manned aircraft, unmanned aerial systems and cruise missiles. So, dominating the air space, the US Air Force used APKWS missiles exclusively to strike ground targets. The use of cruise missiles and kamikaze drones by Russia and Iran has prompted the US military to consider using APKWS to also shoot down these small, maneuverable low-altitude air targets. There are several arguments in favor of such a solution - APKWS are not only effective, but also cheap, compact, versatile and easy to use. They do not need to capture the target before launch - the ammunition is guided by a laser guidance system that is activated during launch. Thanks to the new contactless detonator, a direct hit on the target was unnecessary - it was destroyed by an explosive wave and fragments. The cost of one missile is about 25 thousand dollars, which is not only significantly cheaper than the cost of a cruise missile, but also quite commensurate with the cost of most long-range UAVs. For example, it is about half the price of Iran's Shahed kamikaze drone. The versatility of the APKWS lies in its ability to be used as an air-to-surface, air-to-air, surface-to-air and even surface-to-surface missile thanks to the installation of launchers on various types of air, ground and surface platforms. The Hydra-70 missile launcher for air platforms contains 19 munitions and weighs 225 kg. In view of this, most helicopters and airplanes can carry 2-4 such launchers. Specifically, the F-16 can simultaneously carry 4 LAU-61/LAU-68 missile pods, each containing 19 Hydra missiles or 7 APKWS missiles, respectively. Ground platforms like a missile system VAMPIRE by L3Harris in general practically not limited to the number of missiles, as it depends only on the size of the body of the vehicle where they will be loaded. The only limitation is the availability of roads, the ability to move freely along them, and the maximum possible speed of the car in real conditions. Overcoming these land transport limitations allows the installation of APKWS missile launchers on high-speed air platforms such as the F-16 Fighting Falcon multirole fighters. About the successful shooting down of a small-sized aircraft at low altitude by an APKWS missile launched from the F-16 during tests on December 19, 2019 reports Air & Space Forces Magazine. Then, a test pilot of the 85th Flight Test Squadron of the US Air Force, Major Jeffrey Entine, shot down a small drone that imitated a cruise missile over the Gulf of Mexico during a training exercise at Eglin Air Force Base, Florida. APKWS was guided to the target by the aircraft's on-board targeting platform. The exercises proved that the F-16 can relatively easily shoot down small air targets, such as enemy UAVs or cruise missiles flying at low altitudes, with low-cost weapons — APKWS guided air missiles based on upgraded Hydra-70 unguided air missiles. As the US Air Force reported at the time, the use of APKWS to protect against cruise missiles and UAVs is a promising step, as the cheap high-precision munition allows to achieve the same successful result as the much more expensive AIM-120 AMRAAM missile. However, there is also a difficult part of the task - it consists in detecting an enemy small-sized air target flying along a complex trajectory. It is possible to cope with it thanks to the complex cooperation of all forces and means of air defense.

Title: Harry Potter and the -Rabbit's Ear-: How to Spot Landmines and Avoid Moles at Interflex UK
Description: The correspondent of ArmiyaInform tells about how the Ukrainian military is trained to detect mines and other explosive objects during the BZVP within the borders of the Interflex multinational training mission on the territory of Great Britain. We practice the disposal of explosive objects dozens of times. The first and most important thing to learn is to detect mines of different purpose, method of activation, detonation mechanism and type of damage, as well as improvised explosive devices, stretchers using grenades and unexploded ammunition. The lion's share of classes are devoted to the detection of explosive objects and their subsequent actions. We are infantry, so demining or demining by detonation in place is not our first priority - that should be done by specially trained detonators. The algorithm of our actions is reduced to a few simple steps that can be reliably remembered by the rule of five -Ps-: Marking a mine and informing about its presence can be done in different ways at the same time or in different sequences depending on specific circumstances. However, both actions must be performed in one way or another, because this is the only way to protect those who can potentially activate an explosive object to action or find themselves in the affected area. The most difficult, of course, is the first point - to detect a mine that is specially made, installed and camouflaged in such a way that it is as difficult as possible to notice. Therefore, this is what we work on the most, for the longest time, under different conditions and in different ways. We need to be able to detect mines under any conditions - in the twilight or even complete darkness, in the rain and in the fog, in the forest thicket, among the grass and leaves, or in the dirt and among the debris of construction debris on a city street or in a building. This can be learned through knowledge of a number of basic principles and long-term practice, which trains the eye to notice the slightest signs of the presence of an explosive object. So it is not surprising that this is what we have been doing for the longest time and in different ways. Physically, the most difficult thing is to detect underground and well-disguised mines with the help of a minesweeper kit. This should be done crawling in full protective gear, with legs crossed and constantly feeling the ground in front of you. It is necessary to wield a sapper's probe like a conductor's wand of a wizard from the Harry Potter books - strongly and confidently, but at the same time gently and gracefully, holding the probe with a bunch of fingers and pressing only with the wrist. It is extremely difficult to cover even a small distance in this way, some 3‒4 meters on grass completely wet from several days of rain. Already after the first few dozen dives, the probe starts to hurt my wrist mercilessly, the helmet becomes heavy as a bell, and the bulletproof vest sticks into the Georgian soil. The only thing in my head is the Avada Kedavra spell. It is directed not so much against the mine, which the instructors disguised under the turf, as against numerous fragments of flint. There are a lot of these stones here, so every 3-4 dives the probe gets stuck in them, confusing and giving false hope that it is a mine. It is possible to detect a mine as far as the beginning of the third meter of the site. From under the probe, instead of the usual ticking or a light grinding against the flint, a dull blow to the hollow plastic can be heard. -Mina, finally definitely Mina!-, I think and crawl back. Now it should be marked and reported to the instructor about the completion of the task. Before doing this, I cheat a little and rest for a few minutes, kneading my wrists. Only then do I raise my voice and raise my hand. After listening to the comments, I move to one of the neighboring areas - and so three times in a row during one class. However, the result seems good to me only until I find out that during the time I detected three mines, some managed to detect 5-6. -I need to work faster,- I think, and I remember the spell from Harry Potter again. -And instead of -Avada Kedavra- you should use -Accio- - I know that I'm looking for a mine.- Such jokes with yourself allow you to relax a little and rest before the next class. Fortunately, it is much less physically demanding and requires observation rather than action and effort. We examine a large square, 20 by 20 meters, in order to detect at a great distance a place where a careless enemy may have planted a mine. Traces of human movement and presence are immediately visible. It is produced by crumpled grass and broken plants, shifted soil, abandoned garbage, elements transferred from another area, symmetries that do not belong to the natural area, changes in color, and many other things. There was definitely a person here relatively recently, which means there may be a dangerous surprise. Then we practice these same skills many times in pairs, moving along forest routes, on each of which the instructors have set several mines. However, in the forest, we are quite often misled by moles who managed to work in the middle of the trails after the instructors. Freshly excavated earth is not a sign of a recently laid mine, but traces of the life of forest animals. -Look for a combination of at least two signs of a possible mine, because one is not enough,- the instructors explain. And in most cases, we all complete the task successfully. The most difficult thing is to detect stretch marks - a barely noticeable fishing line crosses the path at different heights, and we can't always notice it in time. Often, of course, the play of light and water droplets helps, and sometimes a light web, which the spider has already managed to attach to the stretch, but it is not always so lucky. In the end, at one of the classes, the instructors reveal to us another interesting way to detect a stretched fishing line - with the help of a -rabbit ear-. This is a simple tool that can be made from things at hand, such as wire and light cloth. To do this, an oblong wire similar in shape to a real rabbit's ear or a similar base should be wrapped with white fabric, film or tape. The technology of using this product is as simple as the product itself. Having put the -rabbit ear- in front of you, it should be slowly raised from the ground level to the highest point above your head, describing a semicircle in the air. On its white background, it will be easy to see the thinnest stretch line. The main thing is not to rush, not to miss any section, not to step forward and to raise the tool from the lowest level above the ground as high as possible, because the fishing line can be pulled at any height.

Title: Neither people nor equipment are spared - no losses stop the Russians in Kurshchyna
Description: About this on the ArmyTV stream the chief sergeant of the 36th platoon of the marine infantry brigade named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Bilinsky with the call sign - Solomon-. -When Russian attack aircraft go, they are always accompanied by equipment. It can be armored: APC, BRDM plus a tank for cover. But they also use a lot of light vehicles such as ATVs and motorcycles to quickly reach our positions and land infantry. They can go further, or they can simply leave the equipment, they don't count on it,- said Solomon. According to him, our marines are trying to respond to the attack aircraft as soon as possible. -When we spot this column, our artillery and FPV drones start working on it. When they approach, then the Maviks with resets are turned on, which fly no more than 4 kilometers. We work, then conduct preliminary reconnaissance and strike the survivors, if there are any,- said Solomon. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the soldiers of the 36th Marine Brigade named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Bilinsky, together with the soldiers of the 73rd Battalion of the Territorial Defense Forces repelled the assault of superior numbers Russian elite units in the Kursk region.

Title: To see New York and die - Azov fulfills the last wishes of the occupiers
Description: The video appeared on December 1 on the brigade channel. Azov pilots have achieved remarkable accuracy: they often hit several invaders with one shot, causing their helmets to crack and their uniforms to catch fire. -Constant meat assaults in the Toretsk direction are stopped by the steadfastness of the infantry, combined with the skill of the pilots. And the enemy personnel remains motionless on the way to the positions of the defenders,- Azov commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the 12th Azov Special Forces Brigade of the National Guard organized nocturnal splitting of the occupiers into atoms in the Toretsk direction.

Title: - They send a video: they flew right into the barrel of a mortar! - Edelweiss pilots about their eve...
Description: It was released on December 1 on the brigade channel. -You are used to seeing how our FPV drones destroy the enemy: infantry, equipment, fortifications. This is what always remains in the frame. But today we will show you the other side of this work - the life and daily combat of FPV pilots,- commented the video in the brigade. The work of pilots is not only accurate hits, but also endless hours of preparation, collection, adjustments and planning. This is a struggle not only with the enemy, but also with the conditions in which they work. A life bordering on war, but filled with determination and confidence. Each sortie is a risk, but also a chance to change the course of the battle. -See what life looks like for those who work for victory, staying behind the scenes, but always on the front line!-, the brigade urged. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the motorized infantry battalion of the 10th mountain assault brigade -Edelvejsy- made a selection of Russian -armor- burning in front of our positions.

Title: Flying occupier, -loaf- instead of a coffin, quadrober hunting — -Birds of Magyar- work
Description: The video of the combat work was released on December 1 on the battalion channel. After hitting our kamikaze drone, the occupier flew up, but soon fell to the ground, already lifeless. Another Russian wanted to be buried in a -loaf-. Our drones went to the meeting. Another invader, moving on four, wanted to climb into the pipe, but did not have time. -Children should be restricted from watching!- - warned the commander of -Birds of Magyar- Major Robert Brovdi.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 414th battalion of unmanned aerial systems -Birds of Magyar- as part of the Marine Corps -madyara-prodovzhuyut-vydovyshhno-nyshhyty-voroga/->made another a selection of enemy infantry damage in Donetsk region.

Title: Residents of the frontline areas are taught how to escape from enemy drones with explosives
Description: reported this on December 1 Ministry of Reintegration The targets of Russian aggressors near the front line are often rescuers, volunteers and caring people who help local residents overcome the consequences of shelling. The enemy can attack them with FPV drones or drop explosives. Experts advise: As reported by ArmyInform, in Kherson Russians hit public transport with a drone, there are dead and wounded.

Title: A video of a 5-second hit, followed by hours of preparation - the presidential drones talked about t...
Description: The video was released December 1 on the battalion channel. Behind the videos of effective drone strikes - daily dangerous and painstaking work, searching for targets and new technological solutions, ammeters and soldering irons, electronics and explosives, trials and errors. From the road to the position to combat work, from a long boring wait to the adrenaline of chasing the target. -We will show how many hours of work are hidden behind a 5-second video of hitting a target. Look at the inconspicuous, but such important work - adjusting and repairing drones, creating a combat unit and finding targets where to deliver these explosives,- the battalion commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters The presidential brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytsky showed the results of their night work after clearing Toretsk from the occupiers.

Title: The enemy began offensive operations in Kharkiv region: the first results
Description: Videos of the battles were published on on the brigade's channel. -They were ready for the offensive. We fight back. Fighting continues. The minimum confirmed losses of the enemy were: – 13-200 – 27-300 – 2 T-62 tanks destroyed – 2 T-62 tanks damaged – 2 BMP-3 destroyed – 1 armored personnel carrier damaged. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the unmanned systems battalion -Perun- of the 42nd mechanized brigade were able to hit Russian anti-aircraft missile complex -Tor-.

Title: The Battle of Kursk - Sheptytskyi's Teroboronmen defeated enemies and equipment
Description: The video of the lesions was released on December 1 on the unit's channel. Our pilots used kamikaze drones to launch strikes. In one of the cases, our FPV drone flew to the Russians by surprise, they tried to escape to the dugout, but did not have time. The strike drones were provided to the Teroboron by one of the volunteer communities. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the -Wings to Hell- unit of the 103rd Territorial Defense Brigade named after of Metropolitan Andrey Sheptytsky destroyed Russian anti-aircraft missile complex -Arrow-10-.

Title: The General Staff of the Armed Forces named the directions on which the enemy is concentrating its e...
Description: Operational information as of 16.00 on December 1 was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces . The border regions of Chernihiv and Sumy regions continue to suffer from Russian artillery shelling. Today, a number of settlements were affected, including Novovasylivka, Bleshnya, Gremyachka, Bachivsk, Leonivka, and Karpovychi. In the Kharkiv direction, the Defense Forces repelled six assaults by enemy troops near Staritsa, Tykhi, and Vovchansk, one battle is ongoing. In the Kupyansk direction, the enemy tried to advance to our positions six times during the day in the areas of Lozova, Kruglyakivka, and Zeleny Gayu. Two skirmishes continue. The aggressor also increased the number of attacks to six in the Lyman direction. Attacked in the vicinity of Druzhelyubivka, Grekivka, Hryhorivka, Terni and Torskyi. Two skirmishes are currently ongoing. In the Kramatorsk direction, our defenders repelled one attack by the occupiers in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar. In the direction of Toretsk, the enemy tried to advance five times in the area of ​​Toretsk and in the direction of Shcherbinivka. The battle is currently underway. Enemy activity continues in the Pokrovsky direction. Clashes of varying intensity have started here 22 times today. Enemy attacks were repulsed in Myrolyubivka, Promenya, Lysivka, Dachenskyi, Zhovtoi and Chumatskyi districts. Five clashes are still ongoing. Fierce fighting continues in the Kurakhiv direction. In the vicinity of Berestki, Sontsivka, Zori, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhovo, Dalnyi, Elizavetivka and Hannivka, 33 combat clashes took place during the day, 14 attacks by the occupiers are ongoing. In the Vremivsk direction, the aggressor attacked the positions of our defenders 19 times in the area of ​​Kostiantynopolskyi, Trudovoy, Velika Novosilka, Novosilka, Novy Komar and Novodarivka, nine clashes are ongoing. In Kurshchyna, Ukrainian defenders repulsed six attacks by the invaders, a total of 12 skirmishes took place in the direction today. There were no significant changes in the situation in the rest of the directions. Ukrainian troops are exhausting the enemy along the entire line of battle and in the rear. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kurakhiv and Pokrovsky directions of the Defense Forces repelled more than a hundred Russian assaults.

Title: The number of enemy drones on optical fiber has increased in Kurshchyna
Description: About this on the Army TV stream the chief sergeant of the platoon of the 36th marine brigade named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Bilinsky with the call sign Solomon . -Often, they send a drone along the route to be on duty, and if they don't find our target, they direct the drone straight towards our positions. The Russians don't count on losses at all,- Solomon noted. According to him, although fiber-optic drones have a shorter range than conventional drones, they are insensitive to the effects of ERB, and therefore can operate where conventional drones lose contact with the operator. Solomon also talked about what drones are used for different tasks. -In my opinion, FPV drones are more useful for destroying equipment, as well as manpower, -maviks- are used for more static purposes, because it is not easy to hit infantry with a grenade. Accordingly, equipment can also be hit by drops, there is cumulative ammunition, but it should be more static equipment: damaged, abandoned,- said Solomon. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the soldiers of the 36th Marine Brigade named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Bilinsky, together with the soldiers of the 73rd Battalion of the Territorial Defense Forces repelled the assault of superior numbers Russian elite units in the Kursk region.

Title: Oh, whose tank is on fire - the marine drones burned the Russian armor
Description: The video of the burning was published on December 1 on the brigade's channel. Marine aerial scouts spotted a Russian tank. As it turned out, his crew ran away and also hospitably forgot to close the hatches. The marines could not pass by such a gift and sent an FPV drone to the place. Because enemy equipment has chambers. Our kamikaze drone hit the hatch directly, a few seconds delay - and thick smoke fell from the tank. The marines did not stop there and made a -control- drop from the bomber. -In the end, minus an enemy tank that will no longer shoot at our soldiers,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the 35th brigade of marines named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Ostrogradsky was first wounded, and then took it away T-72 tank of the Russian occupation forces.

Title: The enemy has tactical advances near Velika Novosilka and is threatening with a major offensive on t...
Description: Serhiy Bratchuk, spokesman for the volunteer Ukrainian army -South-, said this on the ArmyTV stream. -Velika Novosilka, although a settlement of the Donetsk region, is located on the border of the Dnipropetrovsk and Zaporizhia regions, and there is a lot of information support from our enemy here. The enemy is spreading the idea that the offensive on Velika Novosilka is not about Kurakhov and Donetsk region in general, but about the Dnipropetrovsk region. Even more about the city of Dnipro and Zaporizhzhia. The information efforts made by the enemy are very powerful,- said Serhii Bratchuk. According to him, the situation in the area of ​​Velika Novosilka has worsened, our command is taking certain measures in order to stabilize the situation as much as possible, because the enemy has tactical advances. -We understand that Velika Novosilka is a continuation of the events taking place in the Kurakhivsko-Pokrov region. This is a logistics hub that also helps our Kurakhiv garrison,- Serhiy Bratchuk explained. He assured that the Russians currently do not have the strength for a large-scale offensive on the Dnipro and Zaporozhye, no matter what the enemy propagandists say. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Defense Forces of Ukraine commented on rumors that the enemy is probably preparing a large-scale massive offensive on the city of Zaporizhzhia.

Title: Mines, skids, FPV — footage of the exemplary destruction of the assault column of the Russians appea...
Description: The video was released on December 1 on the -Khartiia- channel. Our aerial reconnaissance spotted a convoy of 3 enemy BMPs, which, together with the landing party, went to our positions. But mines were laid on the path of the assault column, so all 3 BMPs, one by one, were immobilized. Bombers and FPV drones immediately flew to them, finishing off the equipment so that it caught fire brightly. Then the training for the landing party, which hid in the forest strip, began. They have been working on them for a long time. When the Russians lost their nerve and tried to escape, our FPV drones finished them off in an open area. According to -Charter- data, the loss of the enemy amounted to 45 fighters (of which 29 were killed) and 3 BMP. As reported by ArmyInform, the -Charter- brigade said that in the north of Kharkiv Oblast, most of the airspace controlled by Ukrainian drone operators that destroy the occupiers.

Title: The occupiers are trying to surround Velika Novosilka, the Armed Forces told about the enemy's actio...
Description: Bohdan Petrenko, the head of the communications department of the 48th separate artillery brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, told about this on the air of the telethon on December 1. -This is happening, in particular, by surrounding Novosilka. The enemy is also using artillery, aviation, unmanned systems,- said Bohdan Petrenko. According to OSINT maps, the enemy is trying to attack from the east from Rozdilny and from the south, from Staromayorsky. The presenter asked on which of these vectors the enemy pressure is stronger. -What is happening from the east, the advance is greater and the enemy there is making much more effort today. The enemy is trying to develop an offensive in the direction. Now both the artillerymen of the brigade and the adjacent units are working to stop the enemy and prevent his further advance. What you see now on the battle maps, what is in the open maps, what is marked in red, is in fact the Russians advancing on their blood. Because in fact there is a battle for every landing, for every street, and in fact in every battle the enemy loses his strength,- Bohdan Petrenko explained. As ArmyInform wrote, in zone of responsibility 5 of a separate assault brigade in the area of ​​combat missions the enemy arranges frequent assaults , but taking into account the time of day.

Title: An ideal meeting - enemy attack aircraft gathered for an attack, and here came the -Vampire-
Description: The video of the defeat was published on December 1 on the brigade's channel. Aerial reconnaissance recorded the movement and accumulation of small enemy assault groups in the dugout, after which it transmitted information about it. The crew of -Baba Yaga-, as the enemy UAVs are called, flew to the spot and threw a gift to the Russians right in the -apple-. -We were so impressed that fiery cheers flew out of all their molehills.- To survive after such a bach is almost unreal. We destroy the invaders every day and night. they will not feel safe anywhere on our land!-, the mouth assured. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the company of unmanned attack aircraft complexes of the 65th mechanized brigade recorded the destruction of the occupier, who went to storm our positions

Title: The Defense Forces explained how the intensity of enemy assaults depends on the weather
Description: Such observations were shared on the telethon on December 1 by the commander of the fire support company of the 5th separate assault brigade, Mykola Zinko. -We have frequent assaults, as well as along the entire contact line, the enemy is probing our defenses, trying to find a weak point to then storm with greater forces. Mostly, it is a light time of day, or morning or evening grayness, when visibility is weaker, fog. Then small infantry groups try to find a gap in our defense somewhere. Much depends on the weather and visibility, and the enemy takes advantage of this. Well, we also enjoy such advantages,- Mykola Zinko told about the intensity of hostilities. When asked by the presenter whether we have parity in artillery, the military man answered in the affirmative. -There is a certain parity, the enemy has a little more artillery, but I can say that our artillery works better. On the other hand, in aviation, the enemy has an advantage and gives us a little trouble, in particular, with KABs, which they have enough of.- - summed up the interlocutor. As ArmiyaInform wrote, in the Pokrovsky direction the enemy continues to press in the area of ​​Zhovte and Lysivka settlements. The enemy grabs some linear object (a building in a settlement or a railroad) and tries to advance along it.

Title: Animals instead of animals — at the border, representatives of nature fell into video traps for evad...
Description: About this reported on December 1 State Border Service of Ukraine. Graceful red foxes, timid pheasants and powerful wild boars got into the lens - the real masters of the forest. -Despite the natural beauty, encounters with some animals can be a serious test for a person. Aggressive behavior of wild boars or the risk of contracting dangerous diseases from foxes are not the only threats. In view of this, we urge you to avoid walking in the border areas to reduce the risk of dangerous encounters with wild animals,- the DPSU urged. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or not to risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Ministry of Defense: in November, the Russian army suffered the largest losses since the beginning o...
Description: About this notified the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. This number of casualties corresponds to the number of conditionally more than three motorized rifle divisions of the ground troops of the Russian Army. According to the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, in November, during one day, our soldiers -two hundred- and -three hundred- killed 2,030 enemy soldiers. This is also the highest daily enemy loss rate since February 24, 2022. Also, during November, our soldiers hit 307 enemy tanks. This is the highest figure this fall (291 enemy tanks were destroyed or knocked out in September, 279 in October). There are 31 vehicles in the tank battalion of the Russian Federation, so in the last month of autumn 2024, the Kremlin army lost almost 10 tank battalions destroyed and knocked out. The estimated cost of this amount of equipment is equivalent to 450 million US dollars. As a result of the active combat work of the soldiers of the Defense Forces in November 2024, 899 enemy armored combat vehicles were damaged. Conventionally, this is the number of BBMs of almost four motorized rifle divisions. Such a number of armored combat vehicles cost the budget of the aggressor country approximately at least half a billion US dollars. Last month, Ukrainian soldiers also hit 884 units of enemy artillery. One artillery division of the occupying army has 18 self-propelled artillery installations. In this way, our soldiers deprived 49 artillery divisions of the opportunity to conduct combat operations the previous month. The cost of such a number of artillery installations is about 700 million dollars. If we talk about the total losses of the enemy in weapons and equipment in November 2024, then their estimated cost reaches more than 3 billion US dollars. In September and October, this number was lower. Therefore, the Kremlin continues to spend wildly on the continuation of the war.

Title: Assaults only under EW — in Kurshchyna, the enemy is making life difficult for our drones
Description: About on the ArmyTV stream platoon sergeant of the 36th marine brigade named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Bilinsky with the call sign -Solomon-. -The adversary uses powerful EW means where hostilities are taking place. Unfortunately, they are head and shoulders above us in this regard. Assaults include these devices that suppress the frequencies of both FPV drones and Mavics. That's why it's very hard to work, you have to invent your own know-how in order to bypass the REB,- said Solomon. According to him, to avoid REB, you can use optics, which, unfortunately, are not yet represented in the Armed Forces. -Or install two antennas on Maviks, work from different points to bypass the suppression zone and conduct reconnaissance and impression of the enemy,- Solomon noted. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the soldiers of the 36th Marine Brigade named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Bilinsky, together with the soldiers of the 73rd Battalion of the Territorial Defense Forces repelled the assault of superior numbers Russian elite units in the Kursk region.

Title: Spectacular landing in the air - hunters showed the work of their sappers
Description: The video of combat work appeared on December 1 on the brigade's channel. In the first case, a powerful explosion destroyed part of the road and the surrounding area. In the second case, a railway overpass was blown up. The third explosion destroyed the dam supporting a large artificial reservoir. -Powerful results of the work of our sappers,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 68th hunting brigade named after Oleksa Dovbush hit a whole group of invaders, some of which caught fire.

Title: In the Pokrovsky direction, one of our brigades can oppose four Russian ones at once
Description: This was told on the Army TV stream by the spokeswoman of the brigade, junior lieutenant Olena Solonina. -We are facing four motorized rifle personnel brigades of the Russian army, in particular the 74th motorized rifle brigade from the Kemerovo region,- said Olena Solonyna. According to her, among the personnel of the enemy there are also mobilized and recruited under a contract, but all are destroyed. An important role in this is played by drones from the battalion of unmanned attack aircraft systems, which find and destroy groups of Russian attack aircraft with drops. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 38th Marine Brigade recorded the strange behavior of a Russian who froze in the middle of the field like a scarecrow, or only to deceive our aerial scouts.

Title: The Defense Forces spoke about the difference between Russian marines and paratroopers in Kurshchyna
Description: About this on the air of the telethon on December 1 told marines We can say that they live richly. They quite a lot use meat assaults, columns of armored vehicles, now the 155th has pulled back, is resting, then we are working with the Russian Airborne Forces. These guys are 100% poorer, because the assaults began on “rivers,”, ATVs, and motorcycles. Is this a tactic? It's hard for me to say. It seems more that this is the poverty and weakness of these units,- said -Enei-. When asked by the presenter about the level of training of the Russian marines, the soldier replied: -Standard. I will not say that these are elite troops. For the fact that they fire at our brothers, the enemy will be punished: both by God and by the sword of the Ukrainian marines.- href=-https://armyinform.com.ua/2024/11/29/vse-chudovo-myasni-shturmy-i-kolony-tehniky-nas-vlashtovuyut-na-kurshhyni-morpihy-peremololy-ochyen-gniluyu-brygadu /->commented that the basis of the tactics of the occupiers in Kurshchyna remains unchanged — attacks from with a large amount of equipment, tanks, BRDM and BMP.

Title: His name is Marik - he used to repair iPhones, and now he has already destroyed more than a hundred ...
Description: The story about the fighter was published on December 1 on the battalion channel. -It was difficult to sit at home and do nothing - I went to the military commissariat,- recalls Marik, who was engaged in repairing telephones in 2023, and before that he was a turner. He worked in the infantry for half a year, and when the FPV unit was created in the company, he transferred there. But not in vain: on Marik's account there are 20 units of damaged enemy equipment worth more than 10 million dollars and more than a hundred occupants. You can see an example of his work here: As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the Black Swan strike group of 225 assault battalion made a photo report from a drone over one of the roads of the Kursk region.

Title: The defense forces repelled the assault in the Kharkiv region: they destroyed 3 BMPs and 45 occupant...
Description: This was reported by the commander of the NGU, Brigadier General Oleksandr Pivnenko. The enemy, with more than a platoon of infantry, supported by three BMP-3 units, tried to attack units of the -Charter- brigade. Thanks to the organization of the intelligence system of the Defense Forces of Ukraine as part of the Charter and the 92nd OSHBR, the column was detected in advance and inflicted fire damage with artillery and attack drones. The infantry fighting vehicles were destroyed, and the remnants of the surviving infantry were finished off by UAVs and artillery. Enemy losses in the morning amounted to three BMPs, 29 dead and 16 wounded. As ArmyInform reported, in the Kharkiv direction the enemy -shturmiv/?utm_source=mainnews&utm_medium=article&utm_campaign=traficsource->nine times tried to advance in the districts of Vovchansk, Kozachoi Lopan and Hoptivka. Seven attacks by the occupiers took place in the Kupyansk direction in the past day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Pishchany, Kolisnikivka, Lozova and Zagryzovo.

Title: More than 5,600 occupiers and dozens of pieces of equipment: the Navy of the Armed Forces of the Ukr...
Description: This was notified in the Navy of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. As a result of successful combat operations, the enemy's total losses from 01.11.24 to 30.11.24 approximately amounted to: -The enemy continues to bear losses among personnel and equipment. The data is being verified,- the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine noted.

Title: -20 Russians were destroyed, a new group of invaders arrived in half an hour-: the enemy attacks non...
Description: The commander told about this on the air of the telethon -Only News- of the artillery reconnaissance division of the separate artillery brigade of Hero of Ukraine Vitaly Lytvyn. He explained that there is a railway in the vicinity of the settlement, the enemy wants to advance along it to the settlement of Pokrovsk. The enemy grabs some linear object (a building in a settlement or a railway) and tries to advance along it. -Just so you understand, there are situations where 30 enemy personnel were discovered, they launched an artillery strike, killing about 20 enemies at once, and 10 were wounded. And after 30-40 minutes, a group of 20-30 Russian servicemen arrived again, who simply stepped over the bodies and went on to storm the Defense and Security Forces of Ukraine. But then they were also destroyed,- Vitaly Lytvyn said. According to him, sometimes the Russians use small tactical groups, and sometimes assaults take place with the participation of, for example, 30 Russian soldiers. -And we are not counting the equipment, artillery and aviation - and they use them all the time. That is, aviation in this direction strikes not only on the front edge, but also drops guided aerial bombs on logistical routes, on the Pokrovske settlement itself, using anti-aircraft missiles... Defense is very difficult,- the serviceman emphasized. He also emphasized that the difficult weather conditions also do not contribute to the conduct of defensive operations by our Security and Defense Forces of Ukraine, in particular, to the work of aerial reconnaissance. -Cloud cover is often low, making the use of UAVs difficult.- As ArmyInform wrote, the occupying Russian army increases the number of assaults by small groups near Toretsk on Daughters

Title: Resignation of the commander, losses, entourage: the GUR spoke about the situation of the Russians i...
Description: This was reported by the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the IOM. Earlier, General Kissel distinguished himself by unsuccessful actions for the aggressor state during a large-scale invasion of Ukraine, for which he was also dismissed from his post, and then sent on a Syrian mission. To replace Kissel and help Bashar Assad's regime, Moscow sent another military commander — General Alexander Chaiko, who commanded a group of Russian troops in Syria in 2017-2019, has already arrived on the territory of the Arab country. The commander of the Russian Navy, Admiral Alexander Moiseev, also appeared at the naval base in the city of Tartus. GUR MOU reported that after three days of successful offensive actions by pro-Turkish forces in Syria, Russian troops suffered significant losses, some units of the aggressor state are surrounded. Hundreds of Muscovites are listed as missing in Syria.

Title: Special operation T-80: our soldiers took an enemy tank from under the nose of the Russians
Description: Video shown December 1 in the 60th separate mechanized Ingulets brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -This story was waiting for its time to be told. It all started with the fact that our aerial reconnaissance discovered an enemy T-80 tank that had been knocked down, but was in quite decent condition. He was standing in a place where he could be taken away. After that, there are hours of intense planning,- says the video description. Servicemen from the 60th OMBR tank battalion told more about this operation. -My motivation for stealing the tank was as follows: the gypsies stole it, but we, who are worse than the gypsies, can't do it?- And they were able to, they stole it,- says a military man with the call sign -Khmel-. His brother with the call sign -Ahmed- adds: -First of all, there was a task. To begin with, we entered into interaction with the infantry battalion. By the way, great job, well done guys. First, their engineers went through, removed the mines, then our guys went out and inspected the tank.- The difficulty of the operation, according to the military, was that the tank was in a -mine pocket-. -It was very difficult to approach him. We went with the cables at night, when we got there, we saw that some of our spare parts did not fit. Standard tank formations did not fit, so we started using BMP-1 formations,- says -Ahmed-.

Title: President: Russia used almost 660 attack drones and about 120 missiles in a week
Description: reported this by President Volodymyr Zelensky. -This night and this week, our air defense forces, mobile fire groups, all sky defense units worked to protect Ukrainians from Russian air terror. During the night, more than 30 attack drones,- the message reads. The head of state emphasized that no country in the world faced such attacks every day for such a long time. -Our state stood firm, our Armed Forces continue to fight the aggressor, our people work for a strong Ukraine, and our partners support us. And together we are a force that will force Russia to a just peace and restoration of peace and security in Europe,- added the President of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, on the morning of December 1, the Russian military ta-poraneni/-> attacked with UAVs public transport in the Dnipro district of Kherson, there are dead and wounded.

Title: The defense forces repelled the assault in the Kharkiv region: destroyed 3 BMPs and 45 crew members
Description: This was reported by the commander of the NGU, Brigadier General Oleksandr Pivnenko. The enemy, with more than a platoon of infantry, supported by three BMP-3 units, tried to attack units of the -Charter- brigade. Thanks to the organization of the intelligence system of the Defense Forces of Ukraine as part of the Charter and the 92nd OSHBR, the convoy was detected early and inflicted fire damage with artillery and attack drones. The infantry fighting vehicles were destroyed, and the remnants of the surviving infantry were finished off by UAVs and artillery. Enemy losses in the morning amounted to three BMPs, 29 dead and 16 wounded. As ArmyInform reported, in the Kharkiv direction the enemy -shturmiv/?utm_source=mainnews&utm_medium=article&utm_campaign=traficsource->nine times tried to advance in the districts of Vovchansk, Kozachoi Lopan and Hoptivka. Seven attacks by the occupiers took place in the Kupyansk direction in the past day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Pishchany, Kolisnikivka, Lozova and Zagryzovo.

Title: European landing force: high-ranking EU officials arrived in Kyiv on an unannounced visit
Description: This was reported by Antonio Kosta on the social network Kh. -From the first day of the war, the EU has stood by Ukraine. From the first day of our mandate, we confirm our unwavering support to the Ukrainian people. I am proud to be in Kyiv together with Kaya Kallas and Marta Kos,- the message reads. Kaja Kallas in her post emphasized that during the first visit since joining the position, her message is clear: the European Union wants Ukraine to win this war. -We will do everything possible for this,- she stressed. It should be noted that on November 29, the President of the European Council, Charles Michel, officially handed over his powers to the former Prime Minister of Portugal, Antonio Costa. At its meeting on November 27, the European Parliament approved the new composition of the European Commission headed by Ursula von der Leyen, formed after the European elections in 2024. It included, in particular, the former Prime Minister of Estonia Kaia Kallas, who replaced Josep Borrell as the EU's chief diplomat. From now on, the issue of enlargement will be handled by the Slovenian journalist and diplomat Marta Kos, who got the position instead of the Hungarian Oliver Vargei.

Title: In Chernihiv Oblast, there were attacks by Shaheds and shelling of the border, a bridge was destroye...
Description: This was reported by the head of Chernihiv OVA Vyacheslav Chaus. A 58-year-old local resident managed to escape from the burning house and received minor burns. All specialized services are working at the scene. According to the information of OK -Pivnich-, the enemy shelled the Horodnyansk and Semenivsk communities of the Chernihiv Oblast last day. Russian troops used drones, artillery, drops from UAVs and mortars. In the village of Karpovichi near the border with Russia, a bridge was destroyed as a result of shelling. As reported by ArmyInform, on the morning of December 1, the Russian military ta-poraneni/-> attacked with UAV public transport in the Dnipro district of Kherson, there are dead and wounded.

Title: In Kherson, the Russians hit public transport with a drone, there are dead and wounded
Description: This reported the head of the Kherson Regional State Administration, Oleksandr Prokudin. According to preliminary information, another terrorist attack by the enemy took the lives of three civilians. More detailed information is being clarified. Another 7 people from Kherson were wounded. All the victims were taken to the hospital. Doctors examine them and provide all the necessary assistance. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces discovered and neutralized about a dozen attack UAVs that attacked Kyiv at night. Previously, as a result of this attack, falling debris was recorded in the Holosiiv district of the capital.

Title: Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine: 32 enemy fighters shot down, 45 drones lost in location
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The air attack was repulsed by anti-aircraft missile forces, electronic warfare units and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine. Anti-aircraft defense worked in Kyiv, Cherkasy, Chernihiv, Zhytomyr, Sumy and Poltava regions. As of 09:00, 32 enemy UAVs were confirmed to have been shot down, 45 Russian drones were lost in location, presumably as a result of countermeasures by the Defense Forces' EW means, and one more was in the air. Information is being clarified and updated. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces discovered and neutralized about a dozen attack UAVs that attacked Kyiv at night. Previously, as a result of this attack, falling debris was recorded in the Holosiiv district of the capital.

Title: In Toretsk, the enemy is intensifying assaults, trying to complicate the logistics of the Defense Fo...
Description: About this on the air -Society.News- December 1 Yevhen Alkhimov, spokesman for the 28th separate mechanized brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, said. -There are more and more assaults, but they are also small groups, i.e. no more than 5-8 people try to accumulate in one assault and come close to our trenches,- Yevhen Alkhimov said. According to him, the Russians are trying to complicate logistics -quite a lot- for Ukrainian units. -To make it more difficult for the infantry to rotate, bring in ammunition, food. Artillery was used literally in the morning. Cluster shells are being used quite powerfully, even now,- said the spokesman of the 28th OMBR. As ArmyInform wrote, according to the data of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine last day in the Toretsk direction took place 16 combat clashes near the settlements of Toretsk, Nelipivka and Shcherbynivka.

Title: Attack UAVs attacked Kyiv at night: consequences
Description: This was reported by the Kyiv City Military Administration. Previously, as a result of this attack, falling debris was recorded in the Holosiiv district of the capital. Six cars were damaged, in one of the residential buildings the windows were blown out by the blast wave. According to the operational report, there were no casualties in the city. But the information is constantly updated and clarified. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kherson region last day as a result of Russian aggression -poraneni/->two people died, another 15 people were injured.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Two people died and 15 were injured in Kherson Oblast due to Russian shelling
Description: This reported the head of the Kherson Regional State Administration Oleksandr Prokudin. Antonivka, Prydniprovske, Sadovye, Inzhenerne, Bilozerka, Stanislav, Beryslav, Zolota Balka, Novovorontsovka, Havrylivka, Odradokam’yanka, Khreshchenivka, Burgunka and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire last night. the Russian military attacked educational institutions, residential quarters of populated areas of the region, in particular damaged 11 private houses. The occupiers also mutilated gas pipelines, warehouses and garages, a bus, and private cars. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day the occupiers made 315 blows in 8 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: The Ministry of Defense presented the concept of reform of military medical commissions
Description: This was reported in MoU. The presentation took place during the thematic meeting of the Council of Donors of Institutional Reforms of the MoU, which was attended by Deputy Minister of Defense Brigadier General of Justice Serhiy Melnyk, Deputy Minister of Defense Kateryna Chernogorenko and Deputy Minister of Health Edem Adamanov. -The principles of the VLK have not changed for decades. The system that exists now is a vestige of the old administrative approach. It is full of shortcomings, unnecessary bureaucratic complications, and corruption risks. We must significantly reduce these risks. Therefore, I am grateful for the support of the reform to all partners and public organizations that were involved in the launch of this project,- emphasized Serhii Melnyk. The participants of the meeting noted that the modern system of military medical commissions has two-sided shortcomings. On the one hand, it allows individuals to avoid military service without legal grounds, and on the other hand, it does not prevent people with serious illnesses from entering the service, which creates additional difficulties for the Armed Forces. The reform will make it possible to divide the decision of the military medical commission into two separate sets of data — medical and administrative. Some specialists will conduct a medical examination for VLC, and others will analyze the anonymized results of these medical examinations. To pass the military medical commission, it will no longer be necessary to go to the TCC. Conscripts will be able to independently choose the hospital where they will undergo a medical examination. Data from there will enter the Electronic Health Care System (ECHS). Over time, data from the ESOZ will enter the medical information system of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, which will be modernized under this reform: in particular, the technical possibility to receive data from the ESOZ and the electronic office of the VLK will be created. The military medical commission will receive data about the person, get acquainted with them, and make its administrative decision. Anonymized data will be sent to a random commission whose members will not know whose documents they are reviewing. This will prevent manipulation and abuse. -As of today, in the context of the VLK, we have old bureaucratic norms that work slowly and do not inspire confidence among citizens. This reform is needed so that conscripts can trust the system. To undergo a medical examination in civilian institutions. To feel that their rights are protected and that after a medical examination they are not immediately declared fit if they actually have some diseases. Our proposal is to create a transparent and clear path that will create the basis for trusting relations and ensure that fair conclusions are drawn,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko. After each decision, a digital trail will be visible - electronic signatures of both the doctor and the VLK employee. The conclusions of the commissions will be kept. All this will simplify the verification and monitoring of the activities of the VLK by law enforcement agencies. The reform will be implemented in three stages and should be completed in November 2025. The Council of Institutional Reform Donors of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine is a platform for coordination and communication between the Ministry of Defense and donors regarding the development and implementation of defense sector reforms. Thematic meetings of the Council of Donors of the Ministry of Education and Culture are held with the aim of attracting donors to the implementation of projects in the directions of the strategic priorities of the Ministry of Education and Culture.

Title: In the Dnipropetrovsk region, the number of victims as a result of yesterday's rocket attack has inc...
Description: This was reported by the head of Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Serhiy Lysak. 18 victims are in hospitals, the condition of seven remains serious. The enemy strike claimed four lives. In addition, Nikopol suffered from Russian terror at night. The aggressor fired heavy artillery at Chervonogrigorivsk community. The consequences are clarified. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 30, the Russians launched a missile attack in the village of Tsarichanka. Normal civilian buildings were damaged by shelling: a residential building, a shop in the village of Tsarichanka

Title: In the Kurakhiv and Pokrovsky directions, the Defense Forces repelled more than a hundred Russian as...
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff ZSU as of 08:00 1 December Yesterday, the enemy hit the positions of Ukrainian units and populated areas with two missile strikes using two missiles, and also used 1,682 kamikaze drones to destroy them. It also carried out 4,271 artillery barrages, including 142 from rocket salvo systems. Over the past day, missile troops and artillery of the Defense Forces hit three areas of concentration of personnel and equipment of the Russian invaders. On the Kharkiv direction the enemy tried nine times to advance in the areas of Vovchansk, Kozachai Lopan and Hoptivka. In the Kupyansk direction, seven attacks by the occupiers took place in the past day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Pishchany, Kolisnikivka, Lozova and Zagryzovo. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked 20 times. Tried to move forward near Grekivka, Druzhelyubivka, Novoehorivka, Zarichny, Terni and Torsky. In the Kramatorsk direction, the enemy made 17 attacks on the positions of our troops in the area of ​​the settlements of Chasiv Yar, Predtechine and Stupochki. Last day, 16 combat clashes took place in the Toretsk direction near the settlements of Toretsk, Nelipivka and Shcherbynivka. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 47 assault and offensive actions of the aggressor in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Myrnograd, Lysivka, Krasny Yar, Dachenske, Zhovte, Chumatske, Elizavetivka and Novy Trud settlements. Yesterday, the defense forces repelled 54 attacks on positions of our troops in the Kurakhiv direction near Sontsivka, Berestki, Zora, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhovo, Dachny, Dalny, Katerynivka, Romanivka, Antonivka, Hanivka, Elizavetivka, and Uspenivka. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy carried out 18 assaults on our positions in the areas of Vesely Gay, Kostyantynopolske, Rozlyv, Velyka Novosilka, Novodarivka and Novopil settlements. In the Dnieper direction Defense forces repelled four enemy assaults. On the Siverskyi, Orichivskyi and Gulyaipilskyi directions yesterday, the enemy did not conduct active operations. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of offensive groups of occupiers were detected. The enemy is actively using artillery from the territory of the Russian Federation in the areas of Ukrainian settlements. Areas of settlements of Velyka Berizka, Porozok, Bachivsk, Oleksandrivka of the Sumy region were affected by the fire of barrel artillery and anti-aircraft missiles; Senkivka, Semenivka, Bleshnya and Mykolaivka of Chernihiv region; Tymofiivka, Kharkiv region. The operation in the Kursk region is ongoing, 22 skirmishes took place last day, enemy artillery fired 353 shots at populated areas and positions of our troops. Our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying forces and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. In general, last day losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1730 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 6 tanks, 14 armored combat vehicles, 14 artillery systems, 11 operational-tactical UAVs, one cruise missile, 76 cars and two units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: There are enemy missile carriers in the Black Sea: the Navy of the Ukrainian Armed Forces reported t...
Description: reported this to the military - Naval Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. There are no enemy ships in the Azov and Mediterranean seas. During the day, in the interests of the Russian Federation, four ships passed through the Kerch Strait to the Black Sea, all of them continued their movement in the direction of the Bosphorus Strait. Three ships were heading to the Sea of ​​Azov, none of them continued their movement from the Bosphorus Strait. -Russia continues to violate the International Convention for the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS), turning off automatic identification systems,- the Navy of the Armed Forces emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, in the GUR MOU talked about the tactics of using Magura V5 attack sea drones and disclosed previously unknown details of operations to destroy warships of the aggressor state Russia

Title: Defense forces destroyed 1,730 occupiers and dozens of pieces of equipment: enemy losses per day
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 01.12.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, on November 30 at the front happened 211 combat encounters. The enemy made two missile strikes on the territory of Ukraine with two missiles, used to destroy 503 kamikaze drones. He carried out more than three thousand shelling of the positions of our troops and settlements.

Title: Over 300 enemy shelling per day in Zaporizhzhia
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA. A 50-year-old man was injured as a result of Russian attacks in Pologiv district. 191 UAVs of various modifications attacked Kamyansk, Gulyaipole, Novoandriivka, Shcherbaki, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghir and Novodarivka. 124 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Kamyansk, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Malaya Tokmachka, Biloghir, and Novodarivka. Two reports were received about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities.

Title: 211 combat clashes at the front: what is known about the situation on the front lines
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff ZSU as of 22:00 November 30. In the Kharkiv direction, the aggressor attacked nine times near Vovchansk, Kozachai Lopan and Hoptivka, one battle is still ongoing. On the Kupyansk direction during the day, the enemy tried seven times to advance to our positions near Pishchany, Kolisnykyvka, Lozova, and Zagryzovy. In the Lyman direction, the invading army attacked 19 times in the areas of Grekivka, Druzhelyubivka, Novoyehorivka, Zarichny, Terni and Torsky. In the Kramatorsk direction, enemy activity resulted in 16 combat encounters near the settlements of Chasiv Yar, Predtechine and Stupochki. In the Toretsk direction, 10 skirmishes continue near the settlements of Toretsk, Nelipivka and Shcherbynovka, six enemy assaults were stopped by our defenders. The enemy tried 46 times to penetrate our defense in the Pokrovsky direction. Since the beginning of the day, the occupiers attacked in the areas of the settlements of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Myrnograd, Lysivka, Krasny Yar, Dachenske, Zhovte, Chumatske, Elizavetivka and Novy Trud. 39 offensive actions of the enemy were stopped by the Defense Forces, seven attacks are still ongoing. The enemy is suffering significant losses - according to preliminary information, today our soldiers neutralized more than 250 occupiers in this direction, 160 of them - irreversibly. One armored combat vehicle, two units of vehicles and three units of motor vehicles of the occupiers were destroyed, and one unit of vehicles and one buggy were also damaged. On the Kurakhivka direction the enemy attacked our positions near Sontsivka, Berestki, Zora, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhovo, Dachny, Dalny, Katerynivka, Romanivka, Antonivka, Hanivka, Elizavetivka, and Uspenivka.
