Ukrainian soldiers repelled 37 attacks, 11 clashes are still ongoing. The losses of the enemy in this direction since the beginning of the day amounted to 43 occupiers killed and 64 wounded, two armored personnel carriers, 4 units of motor vehicles and one portable electronic warfare station were destroyed. In the Vremivsk direction, our troops repelled enemy attacks near the settlements of Vesely Gai, Kostiantynopolske, Rozlyv, Velyka Novosilka, Novodarivka and Novopil - eight attacks were repelled, seven assaults are still ongoing. In the Dnieper direction Defense forces repelled three enemy assaults. On the Siverskyi, Orihivskyi and Gulyaipilskyi directions today, the enemy did not conduct active operations. The Defense Forces of Ukraine continue to conduct operations in the Kursk region, at this time we know of 22 skirmishes, 299 shelling of populated areas and positions of our units.

Title: Blood from the ears after shelling, a broken mortar and trophies of the Kharkiv operation. -Why here...
Description: How a knee-deep trench can save lives and why 2-3 minutes at the front sometimes make a big difference? Vladislav told our correspondents about this: -On February 26, 2022, I came to Obukhiv TCC. He told his wife that I was called, but in fact, of course, he rushed there himself. Eventually got to the 30th separate mechanized brigade. I was immediately appointed mortar commander. There were 10 days of training. There is nothing super complicated like that. The 82-millimeter mortar was fully mastered. By the way, it so coincided that in the calculation, everyone, like me, was born in 1975. The only thing is that I had ATO experience - I served in the -Donbas- battalion, and the boys did not. And then they went to Donetsk to perform combat missions. Our position was called -Depot-, it was immediately behind Toretsk. We were there for more than 4 months. They usually worked as a counter-battery. It's funny, of course, but everything fell on our 82nd mortar: the enemy was working on us with both 120- and 152-caliber mortars. But, I remember, we once hit the enemy's 120th mortar quite well. We detected it and worked on it: we damaged the mortar itself, and the BC warehouse that was near it was also blown up. And, of course, they always worked on the infantry, they didn't let it take hold. Then they left again for recovery. And then there was Kharkiv Region, where we were standing near Izyum. Then their 20th army started towards us. Their paratroopers were attacking us. Well, they were loaded… Also, the Russians were working there even then with T-90 tanks, and they are really strong - they could withstand even 7 hits from RPG, LNG… Yes, he had a turret wedged after that, but at least he could move away. By the way, there our colleagues on the 120th T-90 mortar hit and knocked down his goose. It was like this. But on August 14, the Russians already stepped on us in a serious way. Everything flew at us: both -tornadoes- and -hail-. In the morning, the command -To the battle- arrived, because the enemy had gone to break through. We then covered one of our mouths. And at one point… The exits of enemy artillery can be heard, and when the cassette is opened, there is such a click. I just managed to shout -Lie down- to the boys! We had a small trench even then, knee-deep: this is what saved us. In general, everything went well, but contusions were received, of course. My ears were bleeding, but I didn't pay attention to it at the time. Not before that. We were lucky that then two tanks of our reserves had time to remove from the echelon. And they gave the enemy T-90 a serious fight… We had one tank driver there, call sign -Kipish-. So he burned the T-90 on his T-64, which started working for us. And when an enemy tank is working on you, you just lie in the trench and read the Our Father. The -Kipisha- tank never hit the enemy, although it spent a lot of shells on him. -Kipish- is a young man. Pity him, he died later near Soledar… By the way, it is true that the Russians left a lot of equipment in Kharkiv region. It got to the point that our brigades there even started sorting through the trophies: -I don't want the 72, phew, I only want the T-80.- First, the brand new ones that still smelled of paint won trophies. Then it was restored again and we already had the Bakhmut direction: Klishchiivka, Andriivka, Kurdyumivka, Zaliznyanske. I remember how we left Zaliznyanskyi… One of our drivers arrives and says: -Run, we're leaving here quickly-! And we were no longer even on the road, but on the field from there. And you look back, at the place where we stood, and everything that is begins to fly there. Literally about 2-3 minutes everything was solved then… Eventually, injuries and other ailments left me with limited fitness. Now I work in the TCC. Yes, it happens that civilians make some kind of claims: why are you here and not there. But, honestly, there is no desire to explain to people what I went through and what I experienced at the front. Why do I have to prove anything to anyone? I also have a wife, children. But the guys who are still at the front should be replaced. They are really exhausted. Photo by Vitaly Pavlenko and from Vladyslav's personal archive

Title: Will burn a tank with a meter of armor: the Brazilian defense company is developing an anti-tank mis...
Description: Authors of the online military publication Army Recognition inform that as this platform develops, it will change the perception of anti-tank and high-precision strike capabilities of the Brazilian ground forces, becoming the most important element of the future combat operations of the Brazilian army, ArmyInform notes. In addition to the development of the latest MSS (Míssil Superficie-Superfície) anti-tank missile complex (ATGM), the Sistemas Integrados de Alto Teor Tecnológico (SIATT) company is also working on a new anti-tank guided missile (ATGM) with the -shoot-forget- technology. Such technology allows operators to immediately change position after launching a missile, which drastically minimizes damage to the military by enemy counterfire. The new complex is expected to penetrate more than 1000 mm of rolled homogeneous armor (RHA ). At the same time, effectively neutralizing a wide range of modern main battle tanks (MBTs) and armored vehicles, including those with dynamic protection. Thanks to this level of armor penetration, the MSS ATGM is in the same class as some of the most powerful anti-tank missile systems in the world. In addition to high penetration capacity, the future MSS ATGM model will have a range of more than four kilometers. This is very important for fighting in open or rugged terrain, where the ability to engage in long-range combat is essential for tactical advantage. The portable version of the product consists of a launcher with a tripod and sights weighing about 30 kg, a container with ammunition weighing less than 25 kg. The missile design includes a laser guidance system. In addition to the development of a new ATGM, the company is working on the creation of an anti-tank missile with laser guidance and an increased range. This variant of the ATGM is designed to increase the accuracy and range of the Brazilian army's anti-tank weapons, providing effective combat against targets at significant distances. The laser guidance system allows the missile to be precisely aimed at both static and moving targets, giving operators more control over the missile's flight path and reducing the chance that it will deviate from the target or be intercepted. -The MSS anti-tank missile complex platform marks an important milestone in Brazil's efforts to develop its own highly effective defense solutions, reducing dependence on foreign technologies,- the Army Recognition publication emphasized. In addition, the MSS complex is being developed in such a way that it can be used as an individual means of defeating armored vehicles, and can be installed on various platforms and vehicles. The MSS system is also planned to include a firing simulator with a very accurate representation of the real environment, so it will be possible to train anti-tank troops without the need to use real missiles, as well as test equipment to measure and align the direction of fire. -These capabilities increase the export potential of the system, as countries seeking to strengthen their anti-tank defense are likely to pay attention to the improved characteristics of the MSS anti-tank missile complex and its flexibility in integration with various platforms,- ​​the authors of the publication note. Presentation of the prototype of the MSS 1.2 AC anti-tank missile system. Video: SIATT

Title: Mirroring the facts in action: the Russian Federation accuses Ukraine of its own war crimes
Description: Specialists of the Center for Strategic Communications and Information Security emphasize that, in fact, Ukraine strictly adheres to International Humanitarian Law, while Russia systematically attacks civilian infrastructure. Since the beginning of the large-scale invasion, Russia has destroyed 227 medical facilities and damaged 1,714. Also, 3,798 educational facilities have been seriously damaged, of which 365 have been completely destroyed. Particularly egregious examples are the airstrike on the maternity hospital and children's hospital in Mariupol on March 9, 2022, the rocket attack on the Okhmatdyt Children's Hospital in Kyiv on July 8, 2024, when 627 children were in the hospital. Russia uses attacks on civilian infrastructure as a tool to intimidate the population, which is a violation of the laws of war. Russia is trying to create the impression that its actions in Ukraine are -defense- or -response- to Ukraine's actions, despite real evidence to the contrary. Statements about attacks on civilian objects are designed to show Ukraine as a violator of international law in order to undermine its support from the world community. Disinformation is used to bolster domestic propaganda, motivate Russian citizens, and justify the continuation of the war. The distortion of facts is aimed at causing doubts among Ukraine's allies about the provision of further military and humanitarian aid.

Title: The Supreme Court explained who is affected by the changes in the legislation on the SZH
Description: The video was published on the evening of November 30 on the page of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The Service explained which categories of persons can benefit from the changes that have taken place. As reported by ArmyInform, the SDF explained how much time the military has to return from the SZH.

Title: -Spetsnaz- flushed down the toilet — a detachment of Russian special forces was destroyed in Kurshch...
Description: The video of the battle was published on the brigade channel. Two groups of Russian special forces occupied the trenches and tried to attack the positions of our soldiers from them. Having a great advantage in manpower, the Russians counted on a quick victory. But at first our drones worked on them, then artillery joined in, which partially destroyed the enemy, while others were forced to crawl back. On the way to the Russians, our drones worked again. -Continuing to stuff Putin's meat!-, the team commented on the video. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the fighters of the 36th Marine Brigade named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Bilinskyi destroyed 341 enemies and wounded 667.

Title: Four people were killed by a Russian attack on Dnipro Oblast — the President
Description: The appeal was published in the evening of November 30. -There is now a rescue operation in Dnipro Oblast after a missile strike. Ordinary civilian buildings were damaged: a residential building, a shop in the village of Tsarichanka. At this time, it is known that four people were killed by this Russian strike. My condolences,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. He reminded that today the Russians once again continued the extremely vile terror against the people of Kherson, when they dropped a drone on a bus, as a result of which 4 people were injured. -And so almost every day. Ukraine defends itself against this absolutely inhumane pressure. I am grateful to everyone who helps us go through all this, protect ourselves from terror and save people's lives,- the President said. According to him, Lithuania should be especially noted this week, which provided a new batch of military aid. -Weapons, there are ammunition, spare parts for armored vehicles. Also the Netherlands - thank you very much for the launchers for the Patriot. The United States is preparing an important strong military package of $725 million. This is something that will significantly support our boys at the front,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. According to his information, there is also a readiness of the Scandinavians and the Baltic states to increase investments in our defense industry, in particular in the production of our domestic drones. The President reminded that Norway has decided on financial support for Ukraine for the next year of more than three billion. There is also Luxembourg's decision on funds for the purchase of weapons for our Defense Forces of Ukraine. -We also appreciate Britain's decision regarding sanctions against the Russian shadow tanker fleet. It is what keeps the whole world on course for justice. For Russia to feel its responsibility for this war, for its consequences, and for Russia to be forced into peace. The world is capable of ensuring this,- the President said. He also said that he listened to the report of the Commander-in-Chief of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, General Oleksandr Syrskyi, on the situation at the front and in the areas of the Kursk operation. -I want to thank our brigades that defend the positions that destroy the occupier. And today I want to especially recognize the 38th Marine Corps Brigade, the 68th Hunting Brigade and the 14th National Guard Operational Task Force brigade for this week's battles. Thank you, warriors! Thank you for your bravery in the Pokrovsky direction,- Volodymyr Zelenskyi said. He informed that the team is preparing for quite active work in December: work with partners: negotiations, meetings. -There are solutions that can be implemented precisely in these weeks and months for the sake of our common security — for the sake of Ukraine and everyone who really wants this war to end as soon as possible and, very importantly, justly,- the President noted. As reported by ArmyInform, the President honored our drones in Kurshchyna.

Title: Seven — 200, eight — in captivity: our special forces conducted a very successful raid in Kurshchyna
Description: Photos of combat work were published on the unit's channel. A group of our special forces imperceptibly entered the advanced positions of the enemy and caught by surprise 8 sleeping Russians in their dugouts. In addition, returning by a different route, the insolent operators destroyed another SP of the enemy. -As a result, the enemy suffered losses: 7 — 200, 8 — prisoners. Regular training, training, self-sacrifice, desire - give quite obvious results. We remember those who are in captivity, we are replenishing the exchange fund,- the unit commented on the photo. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the UA_REG Team unit of the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces destroyed a dozen Russians during a shooting battle in the forest on Kurshchyna

Title: Knock out with resets, fire with a dragon drone — GUR showed its work in the South
Description: Video of combat work released on November 30 Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. These shots show the results of a week of combat work by scouts on the front lines in the Zaporizhzhia region: the destruction of enemy military equipment, the dropping of jewelry at the places where the occupiers gather, and also the good -drone-dragon- that burns Moscow's evil spirits, their laches and creeps in Ukrainian forest strips . -Thermal treatment of the Russian invaders continues!-, the GUR commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, intelligence conducted an atypical evacuation cats from Zmiiny Island.

Title: -If out of 10 launched drones, 5 hit the enemy, then this is a good indicator- - the Defense Forces ...
Description: This was told on the ArmyTV stream by the commander of the battalion of attack unmanned aerial systems -Achilles- of the 92nd assault brigade named after Koshovo captain of Ivan Sirk, captain Yury Fedorenko. -It happens in different ways. It can be 30 to 70, and it can be 70 to 30. It depends on the lane, weather conditions and many other aspects,- Yuriy Fedorenko said. According to him, now, with the deterioration of weather conditions in the Kupyan direction, the use of reconnaissance drones of the -Krylo- type has decreased, and the main reconnaissance work falls on the -Mavik- type copters. As reported by ArmyInform, from 10 occupiers to the front line -protyvnyka-pomyrayut-abo-shodyat-z-marshrutu/->two arrive: enemy attack aircraft are destroyed in the Kupyan region.

Title: The enemy immediately threw airborne and mechanized units at Chasiv Yar
Description: About it on the air -Society. News- said Andrii Polukhin, a representative of the press service of the 24th mechanized brigade named after King Danylo, on November 30. According to him, assaults take place several times a day. The enemy is trying to slip through the positions of our infantry to the rear and impose a battle there. The Royal Brigade, together with adjacent units, opposes at least two military units. -One amphibious unit and one mechanized unit. I cannot tell you the exact number. But I can say for sure that their number is decreasing every day,- said Andriy Polukhin. Recently, the enemy used 7 BMD in this direction, which were supposed to transport and land the maximum number of infantry near the positions of the Defense Forces. -They were stopped by mine barriers. And then they were set on fire by our and neighboring drones,- added Andriy Polukhin. The representative of the press service of the 24th brigade also said that the logistics to Chasy Yaru are currently complicated, but despite this, the servicemen are being supplied with everything they need, and they have something to fight for. As ArmyInform reported, near Chasovoy Yar, the occupiers wanted to take advantage of the difficult weather conditions for an assault, but when they tried to cross the Siverskyi Donets-Donbas channel, they were -kindly- meetings mines of 24 separate mechanized brigades named after King Danylo.

Title: The Black Mile is a road section in Kurshchyna, clogged with destroyed enemy equipment
Description: The footage was released on November 30 on the unit's channel. The photo shows dozens of various Russian vehicles, from tanks to pickup trucks. -When you hear that the Russians are suffering heavy losses in the Kursk direction, this is what it looks like. We flew the drone along only one road. Defense forces are power!-, the battalion commented on the photo. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the Black Swan strike group of the 225th assault battalion spent 13 resets on a Russian attack aircraft that did not want to die.

Title: Two marathoners ran across the icy Tisza without watercraft
Description: This is informed by /a> DPSU. The squad included cadets of the 4th year of the National Academy of the State Border Service of Ukraine named after Bohdan Khmelnytskyi, who are undergoing training in border guard units. They stopped the violators 50 meters from the state border. The detainees were residents of Kyiv and Vinnytsia regions. The men admitted that they planned to swim across the icy Tisza without watercraft. One of them paid the organizers of the escape $13,000, the other $6,000. Administrative offense protocols were drawn up against the detainees under Articles 204-1 and 185.10 of the Code of Ukraine on Administrative Offenses. Further legal evaluation of their actions will be provided by the court. At present, operatives of the Border Squad are identifying persons involved in the organization of illegal border crossing. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: In Zhytomyr, a recruiting center of the State Security Service was opened
Description: This was reported by the Airborne Assault Troops of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The recruiting center is designed to provide improved conditions for a quick and efficient search for a position in the military units of the Airborne Assault Forces. -This is an important step in the development of the Airborne Assault Forces. We strive to create comfortable conditions for future soldiers, so that everyone who wants to join the ranks of the Armed Forces can do so easily and quickly,- noted the commander of the Airborne Assault Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Brigadier General Ihor Skybyuk. Ukrainians who wish to serve in the Airborne Assault Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces now have even more opportunities to quickly and conveniently choose a future position in a specific military unit, complete the necessary documents, receive consultations and comprehensive support. Consultations of potential recruits are conducted by managers directly on the spot, as well as over the phone — calls are accepted from anywhere in Ukraine. Currently, the new office is staffed by servicemen who are ready to share their own experience of service, and most importantly, to provide qualified advice to all those who want to find themselves in the ranks of the Armed Forces. The opening of the center is another evidence that the Armed Forces are actively improving the recruiting system, making it more modern and accessible. As reported by ArmyInform, the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, General Oleksandr Syrsky, assigned each brigade commander create a full-time recruiting unit.

Title: The cat against the Russians — while the animals are engaged in personnel, drones destroy enemy equi...
Description: The video of combat work was released on November 30 on the unit's channel. In the very first frames, a feral cat dined on the occupier's leg. Then there were completely traditional defeats of Russian armored vehicles. In particular, an armored personnel carrier and one armored fighting vehicle were destroyed, an enemy tank and BMP were damaged. -For all war-weary people, we demonstrate how our combat crews effectively destroy the enemy every day in the war,- Perun Group commented on the video. ArmyInform talked about fighter with the call sign -Prytsil- , who is fighting in a company of unmanned aircraft systems of Perun Group 79 of the Taurian Brigade.

Title: Sevastopol-Kurshchyna-hell - Russian marines went along the route
Description: The video was published on November 30 on the brigade's channel. The occupiers attacked with armored vehicles, which were destroyed. The landing party tried to hide in a forest strip or behind burned armored vehicles, but even there the Russians were struck by our discharges. -We continue to successfully destroy the enemies. The Kursk operation continues! Glory to Ukraine! Glory to the heroes!-, the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 41st mechanized brigade we hit enemy armored vehicles — and thus foiled the assault attempt our positions.

Title: In a week, sappers removed more than a thousand explosive objects
Description: notifies the Main Administration of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security. During the last week from November 22 to 29, 2024, 3,938.51 hectares of terrain were surveyed and cleared: The work is carried out with the involvement of special equipment for mechanized demining. Per week 1,025 GNPs were recovered and destroyed. In total, sappers of the units of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine discovered and destroyed 415,681 explosive remnants of war (data for the previous period have been clarified). As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense works on creating two new environmental standards for the military that will meet the requirements of NATO and take into account the unique experience of the country in overcoming the consequences of military actions.

Title: The President celebrated our drones in Kurshchyna
Description: The President wrote about this on the evening of November 30. The regiment was formed already after a large-scale invasion, and has been active for a year and a half. -And there is already something to thank this unit for. Soldiers of the regiment provided good results for Ukraine in various areas of the front, and now, in particular, in the areas of the Kursk operation. Thirty soldiers of the regiment have already been awarded state awards for bravery and heroism. Together with other units of our Defense and Security Forces of Ukraine, the soldiers of the regiment significantly reduce Russian capabilities and protect Ukraine. Thank you to every soldier!- Volodymyr Zelenskyi said. As ArmiyaInform reported, Volodymyr Zelenskyy assessed the effectiveness of the permission to strike on Russian territory.

Title: They tore the flag of the Kadyrivians - under Chasov Yar, our drones have many interesting targets
Description: The video of combat work appeared on the battalion channel. Also among the hit targets was an enemy motorcyclist, 3 occupants on a quad bike at once, two Russians who wanted to play air defense and shot down a drone with them, as well as a burned enemy car. And the icing on the cake is the destroyed flag with the portrait of Akhmat Kadyrov. -The occupier with a soft toy on his backpack. Doesn't move you? And not us,- commented the video in the battalion, which is holding a meeting on its channel. As reported by ArmyInform, soldiers of the -Rarog- unmanned systems battalion of the 24th mechanized brigade named after King Danylo hit a significant amount of Russian - armor-.

Title: Three more children from the Kherson Region were rescued from the occupied territory
Description: This is informs the head of Kherson OVA Oleksandr Prokudin. The children are now safe and receiving the necessary medical and psychological assistance. The rescue was made possible thanks to the hard work of the Office of the Commissioner for Human Rights of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine. Since the beginning of the year, 233 children from the temporarily occupied Left Bank have returned to the territory controlled by Ukraine. Of them, 201 children are with their parents, and 32 are orphans or deprived of parental care. -Thank you to everyone who helps return our children to the Motherland,- he noted. As reported by ArmyInform, eight children from Luhansk, Donetsk, Zaporizhzhya, The people of Kherson Oblast and Crimea, who lived under the pressure of the Russian occupation, finally broke free.

Title: Mannequins on armored vehicles, crawling under the caremat — the enemy storms Belogorivka with fabri...
Description: About it in ethers ArmiyaTV said the commander of the platoon of unmanned aircraft complexes of the 81st airmobile brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Denis Volokh. According to him, the assaults take place both in small groups on foot and with the use of armored vehicles - tanks and BMPs. But there is no success. Because of this, Russians often resort to various tricks. -They used smoke that engulfed the whole of Bilogorivka. Dummies were placed on armored vehicles. There was a case when they took bunkers, threw garbage on them, and tried to crawl under the cover of these bunkers to our positions,- said Denys Voloh. Also, about a week ago, there were the first cases of the use of drones on fiber optics. As reported by ArmyInform, the paratroopers of the 81st separate airmobile Slobozhan brigade of the DSHV of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine /->repelled a powerful attack of Russian forces near Belogorivka.

Title: Volodymyr Zelenskyi assessed the effectiveness of the permission to strike on Russian territory
Description: The President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi told Sky news about this in an interview Sky news. He compared it with how Ukraine is provided with air defense systems. -This is how it was with air defense. Is Patriot effective? Yes. Are they enough to protect the entire power system? No. Is the energy situation more or less normal in the regions where they are installed? Yes. Therefore, we need more such systems,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. According to the President, long-range weapons are very important for our country. And it was needed even earlier. In particular, during the counteroffensive more than a year ago. -the Russians knew that we could not destroy them. We lost people, territories, initiative at a certain point. Before this decision was made. Is it good? Yes. Is it overdue? Yes. Do we have enough of such complexes? Not enough. And we have the right to attack only military objects,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy added. According to him, there are calculations - how many rockets are needed. The number of targets and their distance are determined. Everything is recorded in the Victory Plan, which has already been presented to Western partners. As reported by ArmyInform, the President said, ostannoyi-ataky/->how many cruise missiles were destroyed by F-16s during the last attack.

Title: More than 150 battles took place at the front - General Staff of the Armed Forces
Description: Operational information as of 16.00 on November 30 was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces . Areas of settlements of Velyka Berizka, Porozok, Bachivsk, Sumy Oblast were affected by barrel artillery fire and anti-aircraft missiles; Senkivka, Chernihiv region; Tymofiivka, Kharkiv region. In addition, in the Kharkiv direction, the Russian occupiers attacked the defensive lines of Ukrainian units near Vovchansk, Kozachoa Lopan and Hoptivka eight times in vain. In the Kupyansk direction, Ukrainian soldiers repelled three enemy attacks near Pishchany, Kolisnykyvka, Lozova, Zagryzovy, Novoyehorivka, and three more clashes are still ongoing. In the Lymansky direction, during the day the invading army carried out 13 assaults and offensive actions near Grekivka, Druzhelyubivka, Novoyehorivka, Zarichny, Terni and Torsky, three clashes are still ongoing. Our defenders repulsed ten enemy assaults, and two more clashes are continuing, in the Kramatorsk direction, near the settlements of Chasiv Yar, Predtechine and Stupochki. 12 clashes continue near the settlements of Toretsk, Nelipivka and Shcherbynivka in the Toretsk direction. In the Pokrovsky direction, since the beginning of the day, the occupiers have made 28 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their occupied positions in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Myrnograd, Lysivka, Krasniy Yar, Dachenske, Zhovte, Chumatske, and Novy Trud settlements. The defense forces restrained the onslaught and repelled 26 enemy attacks, 2 clashes are still ongoing. Enemy losses are being refined. In the Kurakhivka direction, the occupiers carried out 38 attacks near Sontsivka, Berestki, Zora, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhovo, Dachny, Dalny, Katerynivka, Romanivka, Antonivka, Hanivka, and Uspenivka, 12 clashes are still ongoing. Fifteen times, our defenders repelled enemy attacks in the Vremivsk direction near the settlements of Vesely Gay, Kostyantynopolske, Rozlyv, Velyka Novosilka, and Novopil. In the Siverskyi, Orihivskyi, Gulyaipilskyi, and Prydniprovskyi directions, the enemy has not carried out any active actions at this time of the day. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy intensified the offensive in three directions of the front.

Title: The fiery roads of Kurshchyna — our drones leave the enemy without transport
Description: The video of the combat operation was released on November 30. In total, our drones destroyed: — 7 loaves; — several UAZs; — several trucks; — enemy infantry at a halt; — Kamaz with the occupant jumping out; — SUV and ATV; — a whole group of infantry near the affected car. As reported by ArmyInform, the crew of the -Vampire- UAV of the -Flying Skull- battalion demonstrated accurate drops on the enemy day and night.

Title: Battles for Chasiv Yar, Russian convoys destroyed in Kurshchyna, GUR attacks Crimea: stream from a f...
Description: Fighters of the 3rd Assault Brigade hit the North Korean Bulsae-4 ATGM in the Kharkiv region. In addition, the brigade's drones burned a Russian Ural truck, hit a hidden KamAZ, bombed a house with occupants inside and their camouflaged shelters. The GUR of the Ministry of Defense hit three radars of the occupiers in Crimea. As a result of the operation, the Kasta-2e2 radar and two Podlyot radars were damaged. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - Lieutenant Colonel Serhiy Misyura and Major Andriy Makarenko.

Title: The enemy uses fiber-optic drones in Donetsk region, Kursk region and Kharkiv region
Description: This was told on the ArmyTV stream by the commander of the battalion of attack unmanned aerial systems -Achilles- of the 92nd assault brigade named after Koshovo captain of Ivan Sirk, captain Yury Fedorenko. -Unfortunately, the enemy has lost ground on fiber-optic drones, I apologize for such a word, the first,- Yuriy Fedorenko said. According to him, the Defense Forces of Ukraine are also actively testing fiber-optic drones, the advantage of which is insensitivity to EW devices. -I want to say right away that these drones cannot completely replace wireless drones. This is unreal. But they occupy their own segment,- said Yuriy Fedorenko. According to his forecast, already in the spring of next year, most units of the Defense Forces will actively use fiber-optic drones. -There will be regular FPV drones, homing drones and fiber-optic drones, which will be used for different tasks and at different distances,- Yuriy Fedorenko said. As ArmyInform reported, from 10 occupiers to the front line -protyvnyka-pomyrayut-abo-shodyat-z-marshrutu/->two arrive: enemy attack aircraft are destroyed in the Kupyan region.

Title: The Russian army relentlessly attacks the Kherson region: there are numerous victims among the local...
Description: This is reported by Khersonska ODA. Dnipro district of Kherson: Antonivka: Bilozerka: In general, Russian drone and artillery attacks left many civilians with serious injuries. Rescuers and medics work at the scene of incidents, providing assistance to the victims. As reported by ArmyInform, in Kherson Oblast as a result of Russian shelling last day, one person died, six more were injured.

Title: Let's protect the charge - our drones used a new ambush tactic in Kurshchyna
Description: The video of the combat operation was released on November 30. The special forces FPV drone landed on the side of the road and waited. When an enemy -loaf- drove by, the drone started chasing and hit it. Also, several more -loaves-, trucks and an MTLB, from which the Russian had to jump out on the move, were also destroyed. As reported by ArmyInform, a dozen killed Russian soldiers found our fighters in the forest on the territory of the Kursk region.

Title: The president said how many cruise missiles were destroyed by F-16s during the latest attack
Description: The President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky reported this in an interview with Sky News. -Two nights ago, our F-16s destroyed seven missiles that were aimed at the energy infrastructure of Ukraine. Although we have very few of these aircraft, they are already showing extraordinary results,- the President emphasized. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also emphasized that the decision to provide Ukraine with F-16s, as well as HIMARS at the time, was made with a delay due to fears that it could involve NATO in the war. However, now, according to him, the effectiveness of these decisions is obvious.

Title: Kim Jong-un's toy was burned — a North Korean self-propelled gun was destroyed in Kharkiv region
Description: The video of the defeat appeared on November 30 on the brigade channel. The enemy ATGM was moving between positions and was hit by our FPV drone, after which it began to explode with ammunition. The hunt was carried out by drones of the Vitrol unit of the brigade's unmanned systems battalion. In addition to the -miracle- of North Korean equipment, several trucks were burned, as well as up to a dozen hiding places of Russians. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 3rd Assault Brigade cleared the village of Kopanka, into which they broke occupiers in Kharkiv region. During the sweep, some of the Russians were destroyed, and some were captured.

Title: Without NATO, Ukraine will not have real independence - the President
Description: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi told about this in an interview with Skynews. According to him, for this Ukraine needs to join NATO. In particular, first of all, the part of the territory controlled by Ukraine should be covered with the NATO umbrella as soon as possible. And then deal with the return of the occupied territories by diplomatic means. Without NATO, Ukraine will face serious dangers. -Putin does not want peace. For him, our independence is equal to losing this war. Without NATO, there will be no real independence in Ukraine. He will be back. In the next 10 years,- Volodymyr Zelenskyi believes. The President also added that Ukraine should receive an invitation to NATO within internationally recognized borders. After all, the acceptance of only part of the territory will indicate the recognition of the occupied territories as Russian. Ukraine cannot do this. Volodymyr Zelensky also does not see an alternative to joining NATO. -We don't have nuclear weapons. We gave it to the fact that the most influential leaders of the countries guaranteed the security of Ukraine. But it didn't work and we lost a lot. Maybe there is some alternative besides NATO. But I can't see her. I've heard about security guarantees. And I talked about it with many leaders of countries. Such agreements should include humanitarian, economic aid, weapons, etc. But this is not NATO. And that doesn't equate to security guarantees. We had the Budapest Memorandum. But this did not stop Putin,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. The President also calls the principle that no decision should be made without Ukraine as an important point in any agreements. As reported by ArmyInform, the Presidents of Ukraine and France discussed acceleration of Mirage aircraft transfer process.

Title: 40 armored personnel carriers, 240 mine detectors and international support: the results of the Mine...
Description: How informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, this was discussed at the ninth meeting of the Coalition, which was held under the chairmanship of the Republic of Lithuania and Iceland. Ukraine was presented by the head of the Main Department of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security, Colonel Ruslan Beregulya, Commander of the Armed Forces Support Forces, Major General Dmytro Gerega, and Deputy Head of the Administration of the State Special Transport Service, Colonel Maksym Komisarov. In total, the event gathered representatives of 14 countries, as well as officials of the NATO Assistance Structure for Ukraine (NSATU) and the Security Assistance Group of Ukraine (SAG-U). Representatives of Lithuania and Iceland announced the continuation of support for Ukraine and further coordination of partners' efforts within the framework of the Coalition. Ruslan Beregulya, Dmytro Gerega and Maxim Komisarov thanked international partners for systematic and sustainable support in the fight against the consequences of the war. -Contamination of the lands of Ukraine with explosive objects and explosive remnants of war is one of the biggest threats to the civilian population. Decisive actions and additional efforts are needed to clear territories, protect people and ensure stability in the post-conflict period,- said Colonel Ruslan Beregulya and called on those who are not yet members to join the Coalition for demining the country. He also informed about the current and prospective state of procurement in accordance with the expressed needs. It was about clarifying the proposals of the Coalition participants regarding contributions to the preparation and equipping of demining units, discussing the list of critical needs for material and technical means. Major General Dmytro Gerega emphasized the importance of international assistance: -Thanks to the help of foreign partners, we are strengthening the capabilities of the Armed Forces of Ukraine to effectively conduct hostilities and repel Russia's armed aggression. By joint efforts, we are getting closer to our victory and, ultimately, a peaceful and safe future for Ukraine.- According to the results of 2024, within the framework of the Coalition, 40 M113 armored personnel carriers, more than 200 anti-drone systems, 118 off-road vehicles and 240 mine detectors were purchased and transferred to the engineering units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine for combat demining tasks. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense is working on the creation of two new environmental standards for the military, which will meet NATO requirements and take into account the country's unique experience in overcoming the consequences of military operations.

Title: A Russian attack on Mirnograd killed one person and injured others
Description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. The shelling damaged a private house, a business, a coffee shop and a car. Rescue workers, medics and other responsible services are working at the site, eliminating the consequences of shelling and providing assistance to the victims. As reported by ArmyInform, during the past day, the Russian occupiers carried out 9 shelling of populated areas of Donetsk region, causing the destruction of residential buildings, infrastructure and loss of life.

Title: November's top targets: Defense forces named their -fattest- targets for the month
Description: About this reported on November 30 by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. So, at the beginning of the month, Ukrainian drone operators hit the launcher of the Buk-M2 air defense system on a tracked chassis. During combat operation, this air defense system can hit targets both as part of an anti-aircraft missile system when aiming from a command post, and autonomously, in a predetermined sector. A little later, on November 16, 19 and 29, our soldiers hit three more Russian Buk air defense systems of various modifications. The Ukrainian defenders also hunted down the Tor -. It is a land-based -twin- of the Russian sea-based -Kinzhal- air defense system. It is designed to solve the tasks of anti-aircraft and anti-missile defense at the level of a divisional link. In November, one of our ground units added to the list of hit enemy targets at once with two heavy flame-throwing systems of TOS salvo fire -1A -Sunflower-. Also last month, our soldiers struck Russian electronic warfare complex -Borisoglebsk-2-. The main task of the complex is to detect and suppress various communication channels and other systems that use radio signals. First of all, these are tactical link communication and control systems, in particular satellite. The last decade of November was particularly productive in terms of destroying enemy weapons and equipment. In particular, during the repulse of an enemy assault in the Donetsk direction, units of the Defense Forces hit 7 Russian BMD-4s with a crew and a landing party within one day. BMD-4 is the latest version of the Russian Army's amphibious assault vehicles. Units of the Armed Forces also launched a missile attack on the deployment site of the expensive Russian S-400 -Triumph- anti-aircraft missile system. As a result, the radar station was damaged. Let us emphasize that the functionality of the radar station depends on the combat work of other components of the air defense system. At the end of November, in the temporarily occupied Crimea, our scouts destroyed two (!) Russian radar Podlyot complexes. This is a mobile radar, which is used by the enemy to detect air targets at low and extremely low altitudes in a complex obstacle environment. In particular, this radar is involved in the targeting system for S-300 and S-400 anti-aircraft missile systems. in November there is a Russian radar -Zoopark- - a mobile means of counter-battery combat. The main purpose of the complex is the reconnaissance of the enemy's firepower and the adjustment of fire. And another expensive target of our soldiers was the Russian mobile low-altitude radar station -Kasta 2E2-. Its purpose is airspace control, determination of coordinates and recognition of air targets, including at extremely low altitudes. It transmits coordinates and movement parameters of air targets to air defense systems. However, it can also be used as an air traffic control radar. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 28, as a result of a successful operation of the GUR of the MoU in the territory of temporarily occupied Crimea Russian radar complex -podlyot- destroyed.

Title: Panic in the jungle -lnr-: inflation, repression against business and -meat assaults- mobilized
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysohor, the head of the Luhansk Regional Military Administration. According to him, more than a year ago, the invaders forced the business to reduce the prices of food and goods, limiting the markup to 5%. This was explained by the holding of the so-called -first elections- and preparations for the re-election of Putin. Now the situation has worsened: due to the rise in prices, entrepreneurs have been accused of cartel conspiracy and issued warnings. The pressure on businesses continues, creating additional challenges for local residents. In addition, the invaders treat the forcibly mobilized residents of Luhansk region with disdain. Those mobilized are often the first to be sent on dangerous -meat assaults-. In the 13th tank regiment of the Russian army, the command forced soldiers from the -LNR- to give 50% of their pay. Those who refused were punished by being sent to the basement in Zaytsevo, known for its brutal conditions of detention. These facts testify to the deterioration of the situation in the occupied territory, both for the local population and for those who were mobilized to the ranks of the Russian army. As reported by ArmyInform, at the TOT of Luhansk Oblast, the occupiers are terrorizing the population: even a Russian passport does not help.

Title: An excavator exploded like a tank - a spectacular destruction of enemy engineering equipment
Description: The video of the combat work was released on the unit's channel. The Russian excavator was digging trenches under the forest strip when it was spotted by our aerial scouts. Our FPV drone was dispatched on site. After the maneuver, he hit the excavator exactly, which exploded with unexpected spectacle. The excavator also caught fire. -A female engineer in the scrap,- commented the video in -Totem-. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the platoon of unmanned aerial systems -Totem- of the 3rd mechanized battalion 72 mechanized brigades named after the Black Zaporozhets were able to track down and destroy the enemy pilots.

Title: Patronage in military education: NUOU launches a new international cooperation initiative
Description: About it in interview with ArmyInform was told by the head of the educational and scientific center of foreign languages ​​of the National Defense University of Ukraine, candidate of philological sciences, colonel Nataliya Vasyukova. -We are knocking on all the doors of our partners. In particular, within the framework of the strategy of internationalization in military educational institutions, the idea of ​​creating a system of patronage is laid: when a certain educational institution of partner countries or members of NATO takes a kind of patronage over a certain military educational institution,- Nataliya Vasyukova said. She also added that the implementation of this would help to create a partnership network between various educational institutions that would work not only in the direction of studying general English (General English), but also - what is extremely important today - specialized narrow-profile terminology (English for Specific Purposes). As reported by ArmyInform, one of the capital's military universities has become a leader in the study of foreign languages among defenders.

Title: A six-year-old girl was among the dead: the SBU exposed the Russian general who ordered the shelling...
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. It is noted that on August 19, 2023, on his order, the occupiers launched a rocket attack on the Taras Shevchenko Academic Music and Drama Theater of Chernihiv. During the air attack, the enemy used an Iskander-M cruise missile, which was launched from the territory of the Kursk region of Russia. As a result of the enemy attack, seven local residents died, including a six-year-old child. More than 200 people were injured in varying degrees of severity. The large number of dead and injured is due to the fact that the Rashist rocket attack took place in the central part of the city. In addition, apartment buildings, administrative buildings and citizens' cars were damaged during the explosion. On the basis of the collected evidence, the investigators of the Security Service informed Nikiforov in absentia about the suspicion for h. 2 Art. 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (violation of the laws and customs of war, combined with intentional murder). Comprehensive measures are underway to bring him to justice for crimes against our state. The investigation was conducted by SBU employees in Chernihiv region under the procedural guidance of the Chernihiv regional prosecutor's office.

Title: The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces awarded -Birds of Magyar-
Description: The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces reported this on November 30. -They demonstrate innovative and technological superiority over the enemy on the battlefield. Their skill in protecting Ukraine is recognized both by the citizens of our country and at the international level — by partners and allies. I am grateful for personal achievements and overall efficiency in the battles with the Russian invaders,- said Oleksandr Syrskyi. He expressed his belief that in the future the soldiers of -Birds of Magyar- will continue to apply innovative approaches and exchange advanced experience with other Ukrainian servicemen for the Victory over the Russian invaders. As reported by ArmyInform, Oleksandr Syrsky visited subdivisions in the Pokrovsky and Kurakhiv directions.

Title: Ukrainian Lannisters on the Polish border: a man married a sister with a disability
Description: About this informs DPSU. The man initially stated that he was taking his -wife- to Warsaw to introduce her to her parents. However, realizing that the real motives were exposed, he confessed to organizing a sham marriage. As it became known, the marriage was concluded in the middle of November. For participating in the scheme, the woman's mother was to receive a reward in the amount of 2 to 5 thousand US dollars. Border guards discovered signs of a criminal offense under Art. 332 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (-Illegal transportation of persons across the state border of Ukraine-) and transferred the case to the National Police for further investigation. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Russian shelling in Donetsk region: dozens of houses were damaged, one person died
Description: reported this by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. Pokrovsky district: In Kurakhovo, numerous houses were damaged. In Uspenivka, one house was destroyed, seven others were damaged. One house was destroyed in Merry Grove. One house each was damaged in Myrnograd and Pokrovsk, and two administrative buildings were also damaged in the latter. Kramatorsk district: One person died as a result of shelling in the village of Zarichne of the Lyman community, and a residential building was damaged. In Kostyantynivka, a private house, two industrial premises and a power line were damaged. Bakhmut district: In Seversk, a two-story building was damaged. In the Chasovoyarsk community, six private houses and two high-rise buildings were damaged. One residential building was damaged in Shcherbynivka of the Torecki community. As reported by ArmyInform, in Kharkiv Oblast, the evacuation of all children of the front-line settlements.

Title: He handed over 120,000 liters of diesel fuel to the occupiers, instead of pouring and burning them: ...
Description: Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this. According to the court's decision, the man was sentenced to 10 years in prison with confiscation of property and a ban on holding positions in state authorities, local self-government and state-owned railway transport enterprises for 12 years. It is noted that the defendant voluntarily cooperated with the Russian military during the occupation of Kupyansk. He became the -head of the base of fuel and petroleum products- at the enterprise -Kupyansk railway- captured by the enemy. In June 2022, the man handed over 120,000 liters of diesel fuel to the occupiers, which was used to provide logistics and strengthen the combat positions of Russian troops near the front line. The enemy's accomplice was detained in March 2023. During the trial, he pleaded not guilty, claiming that he acted under duress. However, the prosecution presented convincing evidence that proved his voluntary cooperation with the occupiers. The decision of the Chervonozavod District Court of Kharkiv on the perpetrator's guilt was appealed by the defense, but the appellate court fully upheld the verdict. As reported by ArmyInform, inclined to cooperation with the Russians and persecuted patriots: four traitors were convicted.

Title: Conversation clubs with attachés: how the Ukrainian military overcomes the language barrier
Description: About it in interview with ArmyInform was told by the head of the educational and scientific center of foreign languages ​​of the National Defense University of Ukraine, candidate of philological sciences, colonel Nataliya Vasyukova. -Last year, we started the practice of speaking clubs for students of foreign language courses with the participation of defense attachés of the Kyiv Association of Military Attachés. Classes were held 2-3 times a month in the form of interviews, discussions with students according to their level of training,- Nataliya Vasyukova said. The goal is to consolidate the learned vocabulary and grammatical constructions in speech practice, as well as simply the opportunity to practice speaking, practicing typical communicative situations as close as possible to real ones with the participation of a native speaker (even if it is not his native language). -During such classes, students learn to overcome the psychological barrier to start speaking a foreign language, because just as it is sometimes difficult to dare to take the first step, it is also difficult to pronounce the first word, the first phrase in English (-will they understand me-, -will I not I made a mistake'', says Nataliya Vasyukova. She also emphasized that this practice of conversation clubs has spread to other higher military educational institutions that conduct foreign language courses. We will remind, create patronage between types of military educational institutions are offered at the National University of Defense of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, one of the capital's military institutes became a leader in the study of foreign languages ​​among defenders.

Title: -Resetting- instead of rotation: the Russians are spreading the tactics of zombie attacks in Kurshch...
Description: The chief sergeant of the company of the 47th brigade told about this on the air of -Social News- Magura with the call sign -Azimuth-. -Currently, they have stopped using mechanized equipment. They started coming to us on quad bikes, motorcycles, and buggies. They try to do it quickly and inconspicuously. In small groups. Of course, they continue their assaults on foot in numbers of 3 to 5 people. They are trying to reach, to gain a foothold. Our artillery and our drones are doing a great job with this issue,- Azimut said. Also, according to him, the enemy is currently accumulating reserves in order to create a shock fist. Forms units at a distance of 5-7 kilometers from the contact line and tries to bring them into position. -But they have a problem with rotations. Our fire system is built in such a way that it is difficult for them to rotate. It is easier for them to simply replenish these positions. They have such a situation that they often simply -reset- their servicemen if they refuse an order or want to go back from their position,- said the serviceman. Earlier, ArmiyaInform reported on similar tactics of Russian troops, but in a different direction - Kharkiv. There go in a zombie- the assaults of the Russians compel's commanders. Those who refuse are simply killed.

Title: In Kharkiv Oblast, the evacuation of all children from a front-line village has been completed
Description: informed the head of Kharkiv OVA Oleg Synegubov about this. In particular, a 74-year-old man died as a result of a guided aerial bomb hitting his home in the village of Kivsharivka in the Kupyan district. And in the village of Podyla, a fence and three farm buildings were damaged due to shelling by the Russian army. In addition, in the city of Lubotyn and in the village of Kramarivka, Air Defense Forces shot down enemy drones. Also, 54 people, including one child, were evacuated from the Borivskyi and Kupyanskyi directions. The forced evacuation of children and their families from the village of Borova has been completed. All 119 children were evacuated.

Title: Oleksandr Syrskyi: The radio engineering troops are guarding the peace of millions of Ukrainians
Description: He wrote about this in his Telegram channel. -The radio engineering troops of the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine are the eyes of our air defense. They are the ones who guard Ukraine's airspace around the clock, detecting and tracking enemy planes, missiles, drones and other threats,- the general stressed. He emphasized that thanks to the work of these units, since the beginning of the large-scale invasion, hundreds of enemy planes, thousands of missiles and drones have been shot down. Most importantly, many lives of Ukrainians were saved. -Thank you for your service, courage and devotion to the Ukrainian people. Your work is a guarantee of security and peace of mind for millions of citizens,- Oleksandr Syrsky noted in his address. Radio engineering troops continue to be an important element of Ukraine's defense capabilities, remaining a reliable shield in the struggle for freedom and independence. As reported by ArmyInform, since the beginning of the large-scale invasion of Russia RTV servicemen recorded and accompanied more than 345,000 enemy targets, including 175,000 aircraft, 100,000 helicopters, 57,000 drones and more than 13,000 missiles.

Title: -They flew in for the money-: Scouts eliminated three more state-of-the-art radars of the Russians
Description: This was reported by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. In particular, the following units were affected: Fire work on the military facilities of the Russian occupiers continues. We will remind, on November 28 reconnaissance destroyed the Russian -podlyot- radar complex in Crimea, worth 5 million dollars. As reported by ArmyInform, at night on On November 29, an attack was made on the -Atlas- oil depot in the Rostov region of the Russian Federation. As a result of the damage, a fire broke out on the territory of the object, at least two sources of ignition were recorded.

Title: The enemy hit the Mykolaiv region with ballistic missiles: rescuers extinguished the fire
Description: This was informed by the head of Mykolaivska OVA Vitaly Kim. In the Kutsurub community, the enemy attacked twice with FPV drones. The shelling passed without casualties. In addition, the village of Dmitrivka, which is part of the Kutsurub community, came under artillery fire. As a result of the impact, the farm building was damaged, there were no victims. Also in the evening, the Mykolaiv district was hit by a ballistic missile. A straw fire broke out on the territory of the agricultural enterprise, which was quickly extinguished by rescuers. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kherson region as a result of Russian shelling last day one person died, another six were injured.

Title: Night attack by drones: Air defense forces shot down most of the Shaheds
Description: The Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this. As a result of air combat in Kyiv, Cherkasy, Kirovohrad, Dnipropetrovsk and Kherson regions, eight enemy drones were shot down. One UAV was lost in location, another one flew into the occupied territory. As reported by ArmyInform, since the beginning of the large-scale invasion of Russia RTV servicemen recorded and accompanied more than 345,000 enemy targets, including 175,000 aircraft, 100,000 helicopters, 57,000 drones and more than 13,000 missiles.

Title: 175,000 aircraft and 57,000 drones: Radio engineering troops keep the sky under control
Description: The Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this. Radio engineering troops work around the clock throughout the territory of Ukraine, detecting aerial threats and transmitting information to command posts. Their work ensures the effective interaction of aviation, anti-aircraft missile forces, mobile fire groups and electronic warfare units, as well as timely warning of danger to the population. -When we write in the morning summaries: ``this night the radio engineering troops detected more than 150 aerial targets,'' know that behind this phrase lies the difficult and dangerous work of radar units scattered throughout the territory of Ukraine,- the message reads. <iframe loading=-lazy- title=-Day of radio engineering troops of the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine_2024!- width=-640- height=-360- src=-https://www.youtube.com/embed/udfQdvjIKTc?feature=oembed- frameborder=-0- allow=-accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media ; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share- referrerpolicy=-strict-origin-when-cross-origin- During enemy attacks, RTV remains on positions to quickly identify targets and coordinate their destruction. Many of them are now defending the country side by side with other units, actively participating in the destruction of enemy drones and missiles. -We thank the soldiers of RTV for their protection and professionalism, we honor those who have gone to eternity,- the department emphasized.

Title: Kherson region under fire: rockets, drones and enemy artillery
Description: This was notified by the head of Kherson OVA Oleksandr Prokudin. Last day, Red Lighthouse, Bilozerka, Tyaginka, Osokorivka, Petropavlivka, Stanislav, Antonivka, Kozatske, Mykilske, Odradokamyanka, Shiroka Balka, Novovorontsovka, Zmiivka, Monastyrske, Novoberislav, Romashkove, Dudchany, Zimivnyk, Prydniprovske, Dar' came under enemy fire. Yevka, Komysany, Sadov and the city of Kherson. Also, the enemy launched a ballistic missile attack on Beryslav district. The occupiers also mutilated a garage, a communal building, a store, an outbuilding, and private cars. He added that during a nighttime drone attack, the Air Defense Forces destroyed one Shahed-131/136 over the territory of the region. Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: The enemy has taken missile carriers to the Black Sea: there is a threat of using -Calibers-
Description: notified the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. There are no enemy ships in the Azov and Mediterranean seas. For a day, in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention for the Protection of Human Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. We will remind, The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine awarded marines. As reported by ArmyInform, tests were planned, and combat launches were carried out: the commander of the Navy told about the first attack by -Neptune-.

Title: Attack on Nikopol region: a man was killed, houses and infrastructure were damaged

As a result of the attack, seven private houses were damaged, one of which caught fire, but rescuers promptly extinguished the fire. As ArmyInform reported, the occupiers are heavily shelling Zaporizhzhia: more than 500 hits per day.

Title: Defense forces damaged another important enemy object
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. However, the Defense Forces of Ukraine inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying forces and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. Yesterday, aviation and missile forces and artillery of the Defense Forces made two strikes on the areas of concentration of personnel and OVT, a control post and one other important enemy object. We will remind, last day of the loss of the Russian invaders made 1740 persons. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed five tanks, 12 armored combat vehicles, 23 artillery systems, two air defense systems, 42 UAVs of the operational-tactical level, 72 units of automobile equipment and two units of special equipment of the occupiers. As reported by ArmyInform, almost 200 assaults per day: the enemy intensified the offensive in three directions of the front.

Title: Almost 200 assaults per day: the enemy intensified the offensive in three directions of the front
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In addition, it carried out 4,663 attacks, 99 of them from rocket salvo fire systems, and used about 1,400 kamikaze drones for damage. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular, in the areas of the settlements of Kivsharivka, Oleksandro-Kalynov, Novoosynov, Hlushkivka, Hryhorivka, Serebryanka, Kostyantynivka, Uspenivka, Ulakly, Velyka Novosilka, Makarivka, Orihiv, and Kozatske. On the Kharkiv direction, seven enemy attacks took place in the districts of Kudiivka, Hlybokoy, Vovchansk and Tikhoi. In the Kupyan direction, there were eight attacks by the occupiers during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Kolisnikivka, Lozova, Pershotravnevoy and Zeleny Gayu. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked 20 times. Tried to advance near Grekivka, Novoehorivka, Terniv, Yampolivka, Dibrova, Torsky, Zarichny, Hryhorivka and in the Serebryansky Forest. In the Kramatorsk direction the occupiers attacked four times in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar and in the direction of White Mountain. On the Toretsk direction the enemy launched two attacks near Druzhba and Toretsk. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 41 assault and offensive actions of the aggressor in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Lysivka, Dachenske, Chumatske, Novy Trud and Zhovte settlements. In the Kurakhiv direction the defense forces repelled 46 attacks. The main efforts of the enemy were made in the districts of Sontsivka, Berestki, Novodmytrivka, Zori, Kurakhovo, Dachny, Dalny, Elizavetivka, Hannivka, and Uspenivka. In the Vremivsk direction the enemy carried out 26 assaults on our positions near Vesely Gay, Kostyantynopolskyi, Suhy Yalyi, Rozdolnyi and Novodarivka. It was actively used for strikes in the direction of attack and bomber aircraft. In the Dnieper direction Russian invaders attacked our positions five times. They were repulsed and suffered losses. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. Operation in Kursk Oblast is ongoing. Over the past day, our soldiers repelled 23 enemy attacks in this direction. We will remind, last day of the loss of the Russian invaders made 1740 persons. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed five tanks, 12 armored combat vehicles, 23 artillery systems, two air defense systems, 42 UAVs of the operational-tactical level, 72 units of automobile equipment and two units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Civilians were not harmed,- he added. As reported by ArmyInform, more than two dozen times a day the Russian chymalo-rujnuvan/->the aggressor hit Nikopolshchyna with artillery and drones.

Title: ARVs, artillery systems and 1,740 occupants: the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine announ...

The total figure has been adjusted, and daily losses are reported as normal,- the agency said. Title: One of the capital's military institutes has become a leader in the study of foreign languages ​​amo...
Description: About it in interview with ArmyInform was told by the head of the educational and scientific center of foreign languages ​​of the National Defense University of Ukraine, candidate of philological sciences, colonel Nataliya Vasyukova. -We will not talk about statistics. However, a large-scale invasion became an obvious challenge, because we had to train soldiers who spoke English because of the importance of working with partners, learning western technology, etc. With the beginning of a large-scale invasion, language training was somewhat suspended, as it was necessary to figure out how to deal with the current situation, where to go next. But studies at the NUOU were not stopped: the educational process continued, graduations took place, and, of course, the emphasis was placed on disciplines that involved the direct repulsion of aggression. But in the same year, two foreign language courses were held. One was completed at the beginning of February 2022, the second started in October 2022,- Nataliya Vasyukova said. She emphasized that it is not just about NUOU, as foreign language courses are available in all higher military educational institutions and military educational units of higher education institutions. -And this shows that since the beginning of large-scale aggression, these processes have not just stopped, they have even become more emphasized, thus emphasizing the importance of learning foreign languages. The only question was which institution, depending on the number of scientific and pedagogical workers and teachers, could afford a certain number of groups. Let's add that NUOU is the leader in terms of the number of students,- the interlocutor emphasizes. If we compare the year 2024 with 2022 in the context of learning foreign languages, Nataliya Vasyukova draws attention to not just listener interest, but -motivated interest.- -Because people, in accordance with their positions, which require knowledge of the language or in accordance with the range of tasks performed, understand the complete dependence in certain official situations on the level of English proficiency. And there is also the realization that taking the next step in one's professional development and career growth without knowing the language will be difficult, and sometimes completely impossible,- Nataliya Vasyukova summed up. As ArmyInform wrote, from 2024 in military universities three new specialization. Previously ArmyInform informed that at military universities this year the most popular specialties among women were and specializations that train commanders of mechanized units, units of Airborne Assault Forces and Special Operations Forces.

Title: The General Staff of the Armed Forces named three areas where the enemy concentrated its main effort...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In addition, the occupiers are actively attacking in the Lyman and Kupyan directions. The terrorist state launched a missile strike with one missile, 31 airstrikes, dropping 53 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, the invaders used 581 kamikaze drones for strikes and fired more than 3,000 shots at the positions of our troops and populated areas. On the Kharkiv direction, Russian terrorists stormed the positions of our units five times in the Kudiivka, Vovchansk, and Tikhoi districts. Two skirmishes are ongoing. Seven times the enemy attacked our positions in the Kupyan direction. In the vicinity of Kolisnikivka, Lozova, Pershotravnevoy and Zeleny Gayu, units of the Defense Forces repelled all enemy attacks. In the Lyman direction, Russian troops attacked Ukrainian defenders 20 times in the districts of Grekivka, Novoyehorivka, Terniv, Yampolivka, Dibrova, Torsky, Zarichny, Hryhorivka and in the Serebryansky forest. Our soldiers repelled 18 enemy attacks, two battles are ongoing. In the Kramatorsk direction Ukrainian soldiers repelled three attempts by the invaders to capture our positions in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar and in the direction of Bila Hora. In the Toretsk direction, the occupiers twice tried to advance in the Druzhba and Toretsk districts, but were repulsed. In the Pokrovsky direction, the aggressor attacked our positions 34 times in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Lysivka, Dachenske, Chumatske, Novy Trud and Zhovte settlements. Ten clashes are still going on. In the Kurakhiv direction, the invaders made 43 attempts to advance. 11 attacks continue. The main battles are taking place near Sontsivka, Berestki, Novodmytrivka, Zori, Kurakhovo, Dachny, Dalny, Elizavetivka, Hannivka, and Uspenivka. In the Vremivsk direction the aggressor stormed the front edge of our defense 24 times in the area of ​​Vesely Gay, Kostyantynopolskyi, Suhy Yali, Rozdolnyi and Novodarivka, currently three skirmishes are ongoing. In the Dnieper direction, the enemy made three unsuccessful attempts to storm the positions of Ukrainian units. The Defense Forces of Ukraine continue the operation in the Kursk direction. Ukrainian soldiers repelled 22 attacks of the invading army in this direction. Soldiers of the 68th Separate Hunter Brigade named after Oleksa Dovbush, the 92nd Separate Assault Brigade named after Kosh Ataman Ivan Sirk, and the 71st Separate Hunter Brigade of the DSHV were awarded for their effective combat work. As reported by ArmyInform, on the Kramatorsk direction, the enemy will continue to concentrate its main efforts around the town of Chasiv Yar, but the Defense Forces are holding their positions.

Title: Army English: about motivated new -blood-, conversation clubs with an attache... and not only
Description: About all this and not only the correspondent of ArmiyaInform asked in an interview the head of the educational and scientific center of foreign languages ​​of the National Defense University of Ukraine (hereinafter - NUOU), candidate of philological sciences, Colonel Nataliya Vasyukova. —How many military personnel did the specialists of your university manage to train since the beginning of the large-scale invasion? And during 2024? - We will not talk about statistics. However, a large-scale invasion became an obvious challenge, because we had to train soldiers who spoke English because of the importance of working with partners, learning western technology, etc. With the beginning of a large-scale invasion, language training was somewhat suspended, as it was necessary to figure out how to deal with the current situation, where to go next. But studies at the NUOU were not stopped: the educational process continued, graduations took place, and, of course, the emphasis was placed on disciplines that involved the direct repulsion of aggression. But in the same year, two foreign language courses were held. One was completed in early February 2022, the second started in October 2022. But it is not only about NUOU, because foreign language courses are available in all higher military educational institutions and military educational units of higher education institutions. And this testifies to the fact that since the beginning of large-scale aggression, these processes have not simply stopped, they have even become more emphasized, thus emphasizing the importance of learning foreign languages. The only question was which institution, depending on the number of scientific and pedagogical workers and teachers, could afford a certain number of groups. Let's add that NUOU is the leader in terms of the number of students. If we compare the year 2024 with 2022, it is worth paying attention to not just the interest of listeners, but motivated interest, because people, in accordance with their positions, which require knowledge of the language or in accordance with the range of tasks performed, understand complete dependence in certain official situations from the level of English proficiency. There is also the realization that taking the next step in your professional development and career growth without knowing the language will be difficult, and sometimes impossible. - Is the training of the military to learn a foreign language now about quantity or quality? - This is a provocative question, because the process of studying, mastering, gaining a new level in a certain direction, including a foreign language, is always a transition to a qualitatively new level. Therefore, it cannot be said that it is only about quantity. Let's talk about quality quantity in this context(smiles - ed.). - How do partners get involved in this training? - We knock on everyone. I can comment on the period of my two years in office. The initiative should always come from the interested party. And in this context, it is about creating a partnership network, first of all, within the Defense Forces. Yes, we try to communicate with all departments involved in foreign language education. We exchange materials, share experience, look for ways to improve educational and methodological support, etc. That is, it is an internal affiliate network. But we also knock on all the doors of our partners. In particular, within the framework of the strategy of internationalization in military educational institutions, the idea of ​​creating a patronage system is laid: when a certain educational institution of partner countries or NATO members takes a kind of patronage over a certain military educational institution. The implementation of this would help to create a partnership network between various educational institutions, which would work not only in the direction of studying general English (General English), but also - what is extremely important today - specialized narrow-profile terminology (English for Specific Purposes). In addition, last year we started the practice of conversation clubs for students of foreign language courses with the participation of defense attachés of the Kyiv Association of Military Attachés. Classes were held 2-3 times a month in the form of interviews, discussions with students according to their level of training.
