But our delegation, headed by T.V.O. the permanent representative of Ukraine to international organizations in Vienna, Victoria Kuvshinnikova, who initiated consideration of the issue of the ongoing Russian aggressive war against Ukraine, nevertheless gave her speech on this occasion. -Ukraine, Europe and the whole world need a comprehensive, just and durable peace. Ukraine, as the main victim of Russian aggression, wants an end to this war more than any other country. But this must be real peace, not appeasement of the aggressor. Ukraine is open to diplomacy, but from an honest, strong position. That is why we have the Peace Formula - it is a guarantee of negotiations without forcing Ukraine to commit injustice. Ukrainians deserve a just peace and we must do everything to end the war next year. Unfortunately, the Russian Federation continues to reject all peace initiatives aimed at restoring justice in accordance with the norms and principles of international law. The criminal regime in the Kremlin still believes that it can achieve victory and change the international order according to its own vision. However, despite repeated claims that Russia has one of the most powerful armies in the world, it is still far from military success even after 1,000 days of intense fighting against a country 28 times smaller in size and almost four times smaller in population.- — said the representative of Ukraine. She also emphasized that the successes of the Russian army are based only on a complete disregard for the rules of warfare and a huge amount of -cannon fodder-. Therefore, the Russian army can be defeated, and the international order can be restored. This goal can be achieved only under the condition that all peace-loving states join forces to force the Russian Federation to end the war and recognize its responsibility for the crimes committed. Statements were also made by Great Britain and the EU, and statements by the United States and Canada were distributed in writing. Thus, for the second time, the Danish chairmanship of the FBS decided to ignore Russia's demands and limited the Russian delegation's ability to speak at the Forum. Such a position, in the opinion of the Embassy of Ukraine, corresponds to the interests of our state, since the actions of the chairmanship emphasize Russia's isolation and the weakness of the aggressor's position in the OSCE arena. In addition, the Danish reaction to Russia's actions caused significant damage to the image of the Russian Federation, emphasizing the destructive nature of its actions and the illegality of its demands.

Title: Forged documents for almost half a thousand evaders: a man was exposed who made false orders of the ...
Description: About this informsNovember 29 State Bureau of Investigation. It is noted that the intruder, having access to the orders of the Ministry of Economy, according to which decisions were made regarding the reservation of conscripts, made fake extracts from the relevant orders. -He provided them with unreliable information that these citizens allegedly work for various critical infrastructure enterprises and are subject to a 6-month deferment from being called up for military service during mobilization,- the report said. In addition, he produced forged documents regarding the belonging of this or that enterprise to the category of critical importance for the functioning of the economy and ensuring the livelihood of the population in a special period, as well as regarding the reservation of their employees. It was established that documents related to employees of 12 enterprises, in total, related to 454 citizens, were forged. Depending on the complexity, the -service- cost between $200 and $2,000. The documents produced by the attacker were used during the verification of military registration documents of citizens, were entered into the Unified State Register of conscripts, conscripts and reservists, and were also used when crossing the state border of Ukraine. Such machinations harmed the legitimate activities of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and other military formations during martial law. Law enforcement officers conducted 20 searches, during which computers, media, forged documents and lists of persons who used the illegal scheme were seized. The leading engineer was informed of the suspicion of obstructing the legal activities of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and other military formations (Part 1, Article 114-1 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). A petition was submitted regarding the selection of a preventive measure in the form of detention. Investigative actions are currently underway to identify other citizens and legal entities whose documents were forged. The possible involvement in illegal actions of other persons, in particular officials of ministries, RTCC and SP, is also being checked. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: He put his love for defenders on the altar: Stepan Giga thanked the Defense Forces
Description: About informs DPSU. In particular, the artist thanked the border guards for their selfless service and heroism in protecting the country. -Thank you for Ukraine!- said the singer from the stage. Stepan Giga, People's Artist of Ukraine, is one of the most popular performers in the country. His songs, which have become real hits, find a response among both the youth and the older generation, collecting millions of listens on streaming platforms. As reported by ArmyInform, the border guard of the Lviv detachment became the hero of Nicholas Karma's column -How much is Look worth-.

Title: The occupiers lead a cockroach lifestyle: the Russians turn cities into wasteland and do not think o...
Description: About this told on the broadcast of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- Lieutenant Colonel Nazar Voloshyn, spokesman of the Khortytsia operational-strategic troop grouping. According to Nazar Voloshyn, Russian propagandists tell the locals after the occupation that life will soon be restored in the devastated cities. But in fact, the Russian army uses all the captured infrastructure for further hostilities. -They are scattered over destroyed buildings, shelters, crevices. They lead a so-called cockroach lifestyle. First of all, high-rise buildings are used as observation posts - they install communication antennas and various types of transmitters. They use administrative buildings, schools, kindergartens, that is, everything that survived. First of all, as a shelter,- said Nazar Voloshyn. Previously ArmyInform reported that in ten days 50 occupiers raised a white flag: the Russians are fleeing from the killer commanders, despite the fear of capture.

Title: And he put his love for the Defense Forces on the altar: Stepan Giga thanked the defenders
Description: About informs DPSU. In particular, the artist thanked the border guards for their selfless service and heroism in protecting the country. -Thank you for Ukraine!- said the singer from the stage. Stepan Giga, People's Artist of Ukraine, is one of the most popular performers in the country. His songs, which have become real hits, find a response among both the youth and the older generation, collecting millions of listens on streaming platforms. As reported by ArmyInform, the border guard of the Lviv detachment became the hero of Nicholas Karma's column -How much is Look worth-.

Title: President: War and children are two realities that should not exist side by side
Description: He wrote about this in his Telegram channel. -Unfortunately, in today's world there are those who choose war over development, destruction over concern for future generations. Violation of children's rights has become the most painful aspect of this war,- the head of state said. Despite all the difficulties - power outages and massive attacks - Ukrainian children continue to study, showing incredible resilience. The President expressed his gratitude to parents, teachers and everyone who supports children in this difficult time. -We are proud of our children. Their perseverance and strength of spirit is an example for all of us,- emphasized Volodymyr Zelensky. As reported by ArmyInform, in one of the districts of Kyiv, an unmanned aerial vehicle fell on an open area near a two-story building of a children's polyclinic, causing significant damage.

Title: They encouraged cooperation with the Russians and persecuted patriots: four traitors were convicted
Description: About informsNovember 29 State Bureau of Investigation. Among the traitors is a former law enforcement officer from the village of Shevchenkove, Kharkiv region, who during the temporary occupation of the settlement provided information to the occupying authorities in writing about local ATO participants and law enforcement officers. First, he was appointed a precinct inspector in the so-called people's militia, then he was promoted to an authorized criminal investigation group. For his work, he received 45,000 from the occupiers. rubles every month. -He -earned- money by patrolling the streets and detaining local patriots. During the liberation of the region, the man fled to Russia. He was found guilty of treason,- the message reads. A former law enforcement officer from Yakymivka, Zaporizhzhia region was also found guilty of treason. In April-March 2022, the man voluntarily joined the ranks of the -people's militia-. The defector carried out -patrols-, searched for and delivered to the illegally created -law enforcement body- persons who did not support the occupiers, and encouraged colleagues and local residents to cooperate with the Russians. A resident of Kherson, who got a job at the so-called expert forensic center of the occupation police in the captured city, received 15 years with confiscation of property, also by court decision. The woman started working for the occupiers in July 2022. She studied in Moscow and held the position of -expert of the physical and chemical research department of the Ministry of Interior of the Kherson region.- After the liberation of the city, the collaborator escaped with the Russians. A former law enforcement officer from Kherson was also found guilty. After the capture of the city by the Russians, he voluntarily went to them and joined the -thunder- punitive squad. This unit was created by the invaders to persecute Ukrainians in the occupied territories. The defector carried out the criminal orders of the invaders, defended the Russian authorities in the temporarily occupied territories of Ukraine. After the liberation of the city, he fled with the occupiers. The public prosecution in court was supported by the Zaporizhia, Kharkiv, Kherson and Chernihiv regional prosecutor's offices. As reported by ArmyInform, DBR employees in cooperation with the State Border Service reported the suspicion to the capital's law enforcement officer, who do-ugorshhyny-cholovikiv-pryzovnogo-viku/-> crossed across the border of men of conscription age.

Title: Provocative videos on TikTok and the heroization of Putin: the SBU exposed yet another supporter of ...
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. A 51-year-old blogger who was previously convicted for spreading Kremlin propaganda was detained in Kyiv. During his probationary period, he again began posting provocative videos on TikTok, praising the leadership of the Russian Federation and justifying the war. In Kharkiv, a local resident who spread fakes about the Ukrainian military in pro-Russian Telegram channels, justified rocket attacks on the city and called for the occupation of the region was suspected. Three women were detained in Donetsk region, who used the banned Odnoklassniki and VKontakte social networks to heroize Putin and the leaders of terrorist groups. During the searches, mobile phones and equipment with evidence of their subversive activities were seized from the detainees. Operational actions were carried out by SBU employees in cooperation with the prosecutor's offices of Kyiv, Kharkiv and Donetsk regions. As reported by ArmyInform, SBU detained Mykolayivskogo -babaya-, who filmed Ukrainian positions from the attic.

Title: Military units will be able to report substandard products in the DOT-Chain IT system
Description: About this informs The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. It is noted that this will allow to significantly reduce the time of formation and processing of such complaints, and, most importantly, to further improve the level of food supply to the Armed Forces. -Previously, the procedure took place exclusively in paper form, which required a lot of time and effort from military units and DOT. Now DOT-Chain automatically pulls up information from the order, so the military unit only needs to add data about low-quality goods,- Deputy Minister of Defense Dmytro Klimenkov emphasized. According to him, the system forms an electronic document, reducing the time of working on complaints by 2-3 times. Currently, in addition to convenience, the new functionality makes the process much more transparent. After all, thanks to the structuring of information and quick analysis, the system helps to detect abuse by unscrupulous suppliers, which significantly increases the overall efficiency of work. The MOU emphasized that DOT continues to work on further expansion of functionality. As early as next year, the system will be able to submit complaints about completeness and delivery times electronically. As reported by ArmyInform, a quarter of the Armed Forces support the introduction of inclusive dry rations.

Title: At the TOT of Luhansk Oblast, the occupiers are terrorizing the population: even a Russian passport ...
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysohor, the head of the Luhansk Regional Military Administration. It is noted that repressive measures do not depend on the presence or absence of Russian passports of local residents. People are accused of working for the Ukrainian special services, participating in terrorist organizations, inciting hatred, or failing to report so-called crimes under Russian law. Especially vulnerable are those who remain in the occupied territories, where the majority of the population does not have access to the Internet and cannot follow the constant changes in Russian laws. Over the past two months, 68 criminal proceedings on such charges have been opened in Luhansk region. These measures have become a tool for Russian security forces, who are trying to demonstrate their effectiveness while ignoring human lives. Simultaneously with the repressions, the occupiers continue to militarize the youth. In Luhansk, the Russian military is actively instilling in the young generation loyalty to the occupation authorities and hatred of Ukraine. Thus, recently the students of the Luhansk economic and legal lyceum-boarding school named after the heroes of the -Young Guard- were awarded the rank of vice sergeants after taking an oath of loyalty to Russia. The ceremony took place in the local history museum, decorated according to the canons of Kremlin propaganda. The situation in the region remains tense due to the constant escalation of repression and military militarization aimed at forming a generation that supports the occupation regime. As reported by ArmyInform, Novodruzhesk and Pryvilya, located near Lysychansk, -mistah-okupovanyh-terytorij/->actually neglected by the Russian occupying forces.

Title: The bodies of 502 fallen Ukrainian Defenders were returned to the controlled territory
Description: This was reported by on November 29 Coordinating Headquarters for the Treatment of Prisoners of War. From the number of returned fallen Defenders of Ukraine: It is noted that together with expert institutions, the identities of the dead will be established as soon as possible. The fallen Defenders of Ukraine were brought back as a result of the joint work of many structures of the Security and Defense Sector of Ukraine. -We are grateful for the assistance of the International Committee of the Red Cross. A special thanks to the personnel of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, who carry out the transportation of repatriated fallen Heroes to certain state specialized institutions, organize the transfer of the dead to representatives of law enforcement agencies and forensic medical examination,- the message reads. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy intensified attempts to influence the relatives of prisoners of war and under the time of personal communication provokes destructive actions and crimes.

Title: Oleksandr Syrskyi visited units in the Donetsk, Pokrovsky and Kurakhiv directions
Description: He informs about this on November 29 in social networks. According to him, based on the results of the work, all the necessary decisions have been made to strengthen the units with reserves, additional ammunition, weapons and military equipment. Oleksandr Syrsky noted that we continue to restrain the enemy and inflict heavy losses on manpower and equipment. -The steadfastness and courage of our defenders break the enemy's plans that go far beyond these directions. I am grateful to our soldiers for their steadfastness and bravery in the fight against the Russian aggressor,- he emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine General Oleksandr Syrsky honored with awards military personnel of 38 separate brigades of marines and 503 separate marine infantry battalion.

Title: Massive strikes in the Kherson region: there are victims
Description: This reported the head of the Kherson OVA Oleksandr Prokudin. Unfortunately, as a result of the explosion, she received fatal injuries. The woman died on the spot. According to the head of the OVA, Russian troops launched a missile attack on the Berislavsky district. -Currently, we know of one victim: a 59-year-old woman received a landmine-explosive injury and a shrapnel injury to her leg,- the message reads. The victim was taken to the hospital. Doctors assess her condition as moderate. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kherson region as a result of Russian shelling last day one person died, nine more were injured.

Title: The Chancellor of Germany told the President of Ukraine the details of his call to Putin
Description: He wrote about this on social networks on November 29. -I am grateful to the chancellor for his willingness to continue to support Ukraine, in particular our defense against Russian aggression and our stability. We discussed which of our bilateral steps and the steps of our partners can strengthen Ukraine,- the head of state said. According to him, it is important that the pressure on Russia increases and that Ukrainian positions become stronger, because this will force Russia towards real peace. -The Chancellor of Germany spoke about the details of his call to Putin. It is obvious that only the force of arms and the force of diplomacy together can force the perpetrator of the war to peace, and that peace is possible only through force,- the President of Ukraine said. As reported by ArmyInform, the Kremlin dictator Volodymyr Putin is trying in every way -trampa/-> to frustrate efforts to end the war, which is why he resorted to striking a new ballistic missile. It will be recalled that on November 21, the Russians hit the Dnipro with a new medium-range ballistic missile based on the older Rubezh ICBM, which is a potential carrier of a nuclear warhead. GUR IOU reported that Russia struck by using a ballistic missile vdaryla-po-dnipru/->probably from the -Kedr- missile complex.

Title: Practically wiped off the face of the earth: the frontline villages of Luhansk region suffer from da...
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysohor, the head of the Luhansk Regional Military Administration. Only in the last day, the enemy used artillery 15 times and launched 28 drones in the direction of Ukrainian positions. In addition, the enemy tried to carry out offensive actions in the districts of Raihorodka, Grekivka and Tverdokhlibovo. The situation in the Luhansk region remains tense, the population centers of the region are subject to significant destruction due to continuous hostilities. As reported by ArmyInform, artillery and KAB the enemy attacked Sumyshchyna, there is destruction and wounded.

Title: The enemy, that is, Putin, is in a hurry: in the Pokrovsky direction, the intensity of offensive act...
Description: Serhii Tsehotskyi, officer 59, told about this on the air of -Social News-. of a separate mechanized brigade named after Yakov Handziuk. According to Serhii Tsehotskyi, the fact that 249 occupiers were killed or wounded in the past day alone shows the intensity of the fighting. Losses of the Russian infantry are really crazy. -In some areas, up to 30 people go out, but in most cases, it's a movement of 3-4 people at night. They try to go through some forest strip there, get a foothold somewhere, then accumulate and move on. Our task is to spot them far from the line of battle and inflict fire damage,- said Serhii Tsehotskyi. As reported by /a> ArmyInform, in the Pokrovsky direction, more than a hundred attack aircraft are eliminated every day at the positions of only one brigade.

Title: The Ministry of Defense allowed the use of JCB HMEE excavators in the military
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine informs about this. The JCB HMEE excavator (High Mobility Engineer Excavator) is an armored special vehicle designed to perform a wide range of tasks. -JCB HMEE excavators have proven themselves well during the performance of special works in difficult conditions and are in service with many advanced armies of the world,- said Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. JCB HMEE weighs about 16 tons. Develops a speed of up to 100 km/h, provides full crew protection, compatible with STANAG standards for damage protection. Its four-wheel drive system, control of all four wheels, locking differentials ensure high performance on off-road. Suspension and brakes specially reinforced for military needs ensure controlled and safe operation. The cabin of the armored excavator is ergonomically designed for maximum operator productivity, equipped with air conditioning. The agency reminded that manufacturers and developers of samples of weapons and military equipment who have questions about the codification process can contact the Main Directorate for Life Cycle Support of Weapons and Military Equipment by e-mail: mdalc@mil.ua. As reported by ArmyInform, Ministry of Defense codified and put into operation domestic armored personnel carrier.

Title: The SBU detained a man from Mykolaiv who was filming Ukrainian positions from the attic
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. The attacker organized an observation post in the attic of a high-rise building, where he installed a hidden video camera. With her help, the agent tried to record the location of Ukrainian air defense systems, combat positions and the movement of weapons of the Defense Forces. Its purpose was to transmit data to circumvent Ukrainian air defense systems. The SBU documented the attacker's activities and detained him at his place of residence. During the searches, a mobile phone, a video camera and media containing evidence of his cooperation with the Russian special services were seized. According to the investigation, the FSB agent was recruited because of the anti-Ukrainian comments he left on Russian Telegram channels. Further communication with the curator was carried out through an intermediary from the occupied part of Donetsk region. Suspicion was announced to the intruder for h. 2 Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason under martial law). He is currently in custody, facing life in prison with forfeiture of assets. As reported by ArmyInform, on In Kharkiv Oblast, a very greedy schoolboy has a chance to face eternity in prison.

Title: Another day of heavy strikes in Donetsk region: significant destruction and injuries in the region
Description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. In the Pokrovsky district in the city of Kurakhove, two people were injured, seven houses were damaged in the village of Uspenivka, and four in Hannivka. In Pokrovsk, two houses were destroyed, another ten were damaged. Damage to one house was recorded in Rivne of the Myrnograd community. In Kramatorsk district, the village of Zarichne of Lymanska hromada suffered damage to two houses, and in Kostyantynivka shelling damaged eight private houses. In Bakhmut District shelling affected the Chasovoyarsk community, where six private houses, a high-rise building and a non-residential building were damaged. Four houses were destroyed in Siversk, and one person was injured and two houses were damaged in Toretsk. Over the past 24 hours, Russian troops have carried out eight attacks on populated areas of Donetsk region. 159 people, including 17 children, were evacuated from the front line. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of November 29 Russian troops carried out a mass attack with kamikaze drones in Odesa. As a result of the strikes, private houses, farm buildings and cars were damaged in the Odessa region.

Title: The infantry has to walk many kilometers, almost from the border: in the Kharkiv region, the occupie...
Description: A representative of the public relations service of the -Charter- brigade told - Sergeant Volodymyr Degtyarev of the National Guard of Ukraine. Drones, according to Volodymyr Degtyarev, contributed a lot to the fact that month after month the -Charter- brigade pushes the enemy from Kharkiv towards the border. -Infantry has to go many kilometers away, almost from the border, on foot. Because most of the airspace is controlled by our drone operators and related units. Therefore, very little equipment is used on their part,- said the representative of the public relations service of the -Charter- brigade. As reported ArmyInform, in the north of the Kharkiv region, in the Liptsi district, Ukrainian troops are fixed in new, conquered positions.

Title: The enemy attacked Sumy Oblast with artillery and anti-aircraft guns, causing destruction and wounde...
Description: informs Sumy OVA about this. Velikopysariv community: the enemy fired artillery, 4 explosions were recorded. Khotinsk community: a Russian plane struck with air bombs of the KAB type (3 explosions). 10 private residential buildings were damaged, an outbuilding was destroyed. Esmansk community: one KAB airstrike damaged an apartment building. As a result of the attack, a civilian was injured. However, air defense units of the Sumy Oblast shot down 6 enemy drones of the Shahed type today. The situation remains tense, rescue services are working at the sites of shelling to eliminate the consequences. As reported by ArmyInform, the army of the Russian Federation from -Gradiv- and Nikopol was shelled by drones.

Title: Environmental safety: The Ministry of Defense is working on new standards for landfills
Description: This was reported by the head of the environmental security department, Colonel Yuriy Sytnyk, during the 27th meeting of the working group NATO Environmental Protection Group (EPWG) in Brussels. The first standard, entitled -Best Environmental Protection Practices for the Rational Use of Military Training Ranges-, will define environmental requirements for basic military training. The second standard - -Ensuring environmental safety of troops (forces) in military field camps- - will be aimed at minimizing the environmental consequences of the operation of military camps. Both documents are currently in the stage of approval of the second edition. Their implementation will help not only to reduce environmental damage caused by the war, but also to strengthen Ukraine's cooperation with NATO countries. We will remind that before the beginning of the large-scale invasion of Russia, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine had already developed four military environmental standards according to the requirements of the Alliance. Now some of them need to be updated taking into account the realities of the war. As reported by ArmyInform, demining and port protection: Ukraine and Denmark strengthen naval cooperation.

Title: And again the Russian oil base: the Armed Forces entertained the residents of the Rostov region with...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. It should be noted that in the summer of this year, the specified oil depot was already attacked by the Defense Forces. -Atlas- is a part of the Russian military-industrial complex, which provides the supply of oil products for the army of the Russian Federation. In addition, as part of the task of detecting and eliminating the enemy's anti-aircraft defenses, the radar station of the Buk-M3 anti-aircraft missile system of the Russian invaders was destroyed. The target was located in the temporarily occupied territory of the Zaporizhzhia region. The tasks were carried out by units of the Unmanned Systems Forces, Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine in cooperation with other components of the Defense Forces. Joint combat work on important military targets of the Russian occupiers continues.

Title: The enemy has set himself the task of entering the Zaporozhye-Donetsk highway: the occupiers seek to...
Description: Dmytro with the call sign -Dynamo-, an officer of the 148th separate artillery brigade of the Zhytomyr DSHV of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, told about this on the air of the Yedyni Novyni telethon. According to Dynamo, the enemy wants to -make it impossible- for Ukrainian logistics on the Kurakhiv and Vremiv directions. That is why it is so hot there now - the invaders use aviation and heavy armored vehicles and do not count losses. -Where the enemy does not manage to advance on armored vehicles, he uses infantry groups on motorcycles, buggies. It seems that this resource simply does not run out. However, every meter of Ukrainian land is given to him with incredible losses,- Dynamo said. As reported ArmyInform, the operation of the Ukrainian army continues in the Kursk region of the Russian Federation - now the defenders repulse the attacks of the enemy who attacks with columns of armored vehicles.

Title: Odesa is on fire: the consequences of an attack by drones on residential areas
Description: This was reported by the Prosecutor General's Office. Seven civilians were injured and suffered acute stress reactions. In addition, enemy attacks damaged the port and transport infrastructure of the region. An inspection of the damaged objects is currently underway, and the scale of the destruction is being clarified. Prosecutors, together with law enforcement officers, are documenting the consequences of the attack, and the investigation is being conducted by investigators of the SBU Office in the Odesa region. It is noted that this is another mass attack directed against civilians and critical infrastructure in the region. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kherson region as a result of Russian shelling last day one person died, nine more were injured.

Title: And the snow didn't help: three cunning tourists left too many traces
Description: About this informs State border service of Ukraine. After a chase, with the help of a service dog, the offenders were apprehended near the border. The detainees turned out to be three residents of the Poltava region who decided to take advantage of the difficult weather conditions to avoid the attention of the border guards. Now the men will have to answer for their actions in accordance with Part 2 of Article 204-1 of the Code of Ukraine on Administrative Offenses. This case once again confirms the importance of constant control at the state border, even in adverse weather conditions. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Tragic consequences of shelling in Kherson region: one dead and nine wounded
Description: This was reported by the head of Kherson OVA Oleksandr Prokudin. Last day, Antonivka, Prydniprovske, Bilozerka, Komyshany, Sadov, Romashkov, Tomyna Balka, Stanislav, Berislav, Shlyakhov, Zolota Balka, Monastyrske, Novovorontsovka, Odradokamyanka and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes. According to the head of the OVA, the Russian military attacked the residential quarters of the populated areas of the region, in particular damaged 7 private houses and an administrative building. The occupiers also mutilated a generator, buses and private cars. As reported by ArmyInform, over the course of a day, the occupiers struck 350 attacks on 8 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: Conference of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and OVA: the focus is on the supply o...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The specified meeting, in the format of a video conference, was devoted to the issues of synchronizing the actions of local authorities in support of units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In particular, during the meeting, the possibility of supplying combat units of the Defense Forces of Ukraine with a wide range of UAVs was discussed. Such measures make it possible to quickly and effectively respond to the urgent needs of units in the most difficult areas of the front. As reported by ArmyInform, soldiers of the unit - -Kryla-, which is part of the active operations department of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine's GUR, detected and struck the radar complex of the Russian occupiers -Zoo-.

Title: - Everything is great - meat assaults and convoys of equipment suit us-: in Kurshchyna, the marines ...
Description: About this on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novy- Aeneas, spokesperson 36 of a separate marine infantry brigade named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Bilinskyi. According to Aeneas, meat assaults on the Russians are always a priority. But the basis of the tactics of the occupiers in Kurshchyna remains unchanged — attacks with a large amount of equipment, tanks, BRDM and BMP. -Everything is great! In principle, this suits us. When there are many of them and they are together, it is a little easier to deal with them. The 155th brigade stood against us, but now it was a little -tired- and Russian airborne troops entered. Their tactics -on ATVs and motorcycles- are even more cool than armored vehicles,- said the spokesman of the 36th separate marine infantry brigade. As reported by ArmyInform , soldiers of the Special Operations Forces during special operations in the Kursk direction inflicted significant losses in manpower to the enemy.

Title: Our anti-aircraft defense liquidated 88 Russian Shaheds
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Aviation, anti-aircraft missile units, electronic warfare equipment and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine were involved in repelling the attack. As of 09:00, air defense shot down 88 enemy drones in Kyiv, Chernihiv, Cherkasy, Sumy, Kharkiv, Poltava, Zhytomyr, Dnipropetrovsk, Zaporizhia, and Odesa regions. It is noted that 41 UAVs were lost in location, presumably due to the active anti-aircraft defense of the Defense Forces, 1 drone returned to Russia. As a result of the Russian attack, infrastructure, cars, private and multi-apartment buildings were damaged in several regions of Ukraine, and the victims are being provided with assistance. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Air Force The Armed Forces showed a missile shot down in the center of Ukraine.

Title: Aviation of the Defense Forces struck a concentration of enemy personnel
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. However, the Defense Forces of Ukraine continue to conduct operations in the Kursk region. According to the available information, the enemy carried out 19 airstrikes using 30 guided air bombs on its territory over the past day. Yesterday, aviation, missile forces and artillery of the Defense Forces carried out nine strikes on the areas of concentration of personnel and anti-aircraft defenses of the enemy. We will remind, last day the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 2030 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 8 tanks, 33 armored combat vehicles, 34 artillery systems, 89 UAVs of operational-tactical level, 86 cruise missiles, 86 vehicles and 3 units of special equipment of the occupiers. As reported by ArmyInform, The defense forces stopped 207 Russian assaults, half of which were in two directions.

Title: The occupiers are complaining, our scouts are throwing up their hands: the Russians are left without...
Description: This is reported by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The cost of such a complex is roughly 1 billion hryvnias. To destroy the Russian -Zoo- scouts used four long-range FPV drones worth 100 thousand hryvnias. The ratio is 1:10,000. As reported by ArmyInform, last day the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 2030 persons. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 8 tanks, 33 armored combat vehicles, 34 artillery systems, 89 operational-tactical UAVs, 86 cruise missiles, 86 vehicles and 3 units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: The Russian army from Grady and drones bombarded Nikopol
Description: reported this by the head of Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Serhiy Lysak. Yesterday evening, Russian troops struck the Nikopol district with the Grad anti-aircraft missile system. According to preliminary information, there were no casualties or injuries. No enemy attacks were recorded on the territory of the region during the night. This morning, the aggressor attacked Nikopol with a kamikaze drone. The consequences of the impact are currently being clarified. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day of November 28, the Russian army attacked Nikopolshchyna — district center, Pokrovsk, Mirivska, Marganetska, Chervonogrigorivska communities.

Title: The occupiers are in trouble, the GUR throws up its hands: the Russians are left without -Zoopark-
Description: This is reported by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The cost of such a complex is roughly 1 billion hryvnias. To destroy the Russian -zoo-, intelligence officers used four long-range FPV drones, worth 100 thousand hryvnias. The ratio is 1:10,000. As reported by ArmyInform, last day the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 2030 persons. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 8 tanks, 33 armored combat vehicles, 34 artillery systems, 89 UAVs of operational-tactical level, 86 cruise missiles, 86 vehicles and 3 units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: The defense forces stopped 207 Russian assaults, half of which were in two directions
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. In addition, it carried out more than 4,800 attacks, including 126 from multiple rocket launchers, and used more than 1,700 kamikaze drones for damage. The enemy attacked the areas of the settlements of Oleksandria and Esman of the Sumy region with means of bombing and attack aircraft. 12 combat clashes took place in the Kharkiv direction. The fighting took place in the areas of the settlements of Vovchansk, Tykh and Hlyboke. In addition, enemy aircraft struck the settlements of Liptsi and Neskuchne, dropping 4 guided aerial bombs. In the Kupyansk direction, the number of combat clashes per day reached 25. The defense forces repelled attacks in the areas of Figolivka, Kolisnykyvka, Zagryzovo, Golubivka, Kindrashivka, Zeleny Gayu, Raigorodka, Lozova, and Kruglyakivka. The enemy carried out an airstrike with three air defense systems on the settlement of Kupyansk. In the Lyman direction, our troops stopped six enemy attacks in Tverdokhlibovo, Grekivka, Pershotravnevo, Torsky, Yampolivka, and Terni districts. The areas of Ivanovka and Serebryansky Forest were hit by attack and bomber aircraft. In the Seversky direction, the enemy carried out airstrikes with three air defense systems in the Zakitny region. In the Kramatorsk direction, Ukrainian soldiers nullified five attempts by the enemy to break through our defenses in the areas of Chasovoy Yar, Bila Hora and Stupochky. Five times the enemy tried to advance in the Toretsk direction, operating in the area of ​​Toretsk and Dilyivka. At the same time, the enemy launched an airstrike on the settlement of Shcherbynivka. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders repelled 61 enemy attacks in Myrolyubivka, Promenya, Lysivka, Krutoy Yar, Dachensky, Zhovtoy, Chumatsky, Novy Trud and Pustinka districts. The enemy dropped five guided aerial bombs on the settlements of Myrolyubivka, Dachenske and Lysivka. In the Kurakhivka direction Defense forces continue to hold back the enemy in the areas of Sontsivka, Berestka, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhove, Dalnye, Elizavetivka, Romanivka, Antonivka, Uspenivka and Dachne, where the occupiers tried to break through Ukrainian defense lines 43 times. In the Vremivsk direction the enemy made 20 attempts to capture our positions near the settlements of Trudove, Vesely Hay, Kostyantynopolske, Novopil, Rozlyv, Rozdolne, Suhi Yaly and Novodarivka. The enemy did not conduct active operations in the Orikhov and Gulyajpil directions, but launched a rocket attack with three cruise missiles in the area of ​​the settlement of Novooleksandrivka. In the Dnieper direction, the occupiers carried out four unsuccessful offensives. In the Volyn and Poliske directions, the operational situation has not changed significantly. No sign of the formation of offensive groups of the Russian occupiers was detected. We will remind, last day the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 2030 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 8 tanks, 33 armored combat vehicles, 34 artillery systems, 89 UAVs of operational-tactical level, 86 cruise missiles, 86 vehicles and 3 units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: More than two thousand infantrymen, dozens of anti-aircraft guns and artillery systems: the General ...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 29.11.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, 188 enemy assaults at the front: The enemy concentrates its efforts in two directions.

Title: The Navy of the Ukrainian Armed Forces reported how many enemy missile carriers are in the Black Sea
Description: This was reported by the Navy of Ukraine. There are no enemy ships in the Azov and Mediterranean seas. For a day, in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Human Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. We will remind, The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine awarded marines. As reported by ArmyInform, tests were planned, and combat launches were carried out: the commander of the Navy told about the first attack by -Neptune-.

Title: MLRS, drones and artillery: 350 strikes by the occupiers in the Zaporizhzhia region per day
Description: informs about this, Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA. In particular, 212 UAVs of various modifications attacked Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Novoandriivka, Shcherbaki, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghirya and Novodarivka. According to the head of the OVA, 8 shelling from the RSZV covered Lobkovo, Novodarivka, Novoandriivka, and Novodanilivka. In addition, 130 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Malaya Tokmachka, Biloghirya, Novodarivka. -We received 4 reports about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. Civilians were not harmed,- added Ivan Fedorov. As reported by ArmyInform, consequences of a drone strike at a children's polyclinic in Kyiv: there is destruction and a victim.

Title: On the front 188 enemy assaults: the enemy concentrates efforts in two directions
Description: This is discussed in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 22:00 on November 28. The terrorist state launched two missile strikes using 97 missiles, 23 airstrikes, dropping 44 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, the invaders used more than seven hundred kamikaze drones for strikes and carried out about 3,900 attacks on the positions of our troops and populated areas. On the Kharkiv direction, Russian terrorists stormed the positions of our units in the Vovchansk, Tykhoi, and Hlyboky districts 11 times. In addition, the aircraft of the occupiers struck the settlements of Liptsi and Neskuchne, using four aerial bombs. Twenty-four times the enemy attacked our positions on the Kupyansk direction near Figolivka, Kolisnykyvka, Zagryzovy, Golubivka, Kindrashyvka, Zeleny Gay, Raihorodka, Lozova, and Kruglyakivka. Three enemy attacks have been going on so far. On the Lymanskyi direction Russian troops attacked Ukrainian defenders seven times in the areas of Tverdokhlibovo, Grekivka, Pershotravnevo, Torsky, Yampolivka and Terni. In the Kramatorsk direction, Ukrainian soldiers repelled five attempts by the invaders to advance in the areas of Chasovoy Yar, Bila Hora and Stupochky. In the Toretsk direction our troops repelled five enemy attacks in the Toretsk and Dilyivka area. During the day in the Pokrovsky direction the occupiers attacked our positions 50 times in the Myrolyubivka, Promenya, Lysivka, Krutoy Yar, Dachensky, Zhovtoy, Chumatsky, Novy Trud and Pustinka districts. There are 18 ongoing clashes so far. In the Kurakhiv direction, the invaders made 42 attempts to advance. The fighting is mainly taking place near the settlements of Sontsivka, Berestka, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhove, Dalnye, Elizavetivka, Romanivka, Antonivka, Uspenivka and Dachne. In the Vremivsk direction the aggressor stormed the front edge of our defense 20 times in the area of ​​Trudove, Vesely Gay, Kostiantynopilske, Novopil, Rozlyv, Rozdolne, Suhi Yaly and Novodarivka settlements. The enemy did not conduct active operations in the Orihiv and Gulyajpil directions. In the Dnieper direction the enemy carried out three unsuccessful assaults on the positions of Ukrainian units. The Defense Forces of Ukraine continue the operation in the Kursk direction. Enemy aviation today carried out 12 airstrikes on Kurshchyna with the use of 22 anti-aircraft missiles. At the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the soldiers of the 28th Separate Transcarpathian Mountain Assault Brigade, the 124th Separate Territorial Defense Brigade, the 37th Separate Marine Corps Brigade, the 100th Separate Mechanized Brigade, and the 71st Separate Hunter Brigade were awarded for effective combat work. the enemy, cause him irreparable losses in manpower and techniques As reported by ArmyInform, the operators of the border guards' attack UAVs 8 vehicles, a boat and a fuel tanker were destroyed and damaged in Luhansk Region.

Title: Consequences of a drone strike at a children's clinic in Kyiv: there is destruction and a victim
Description: notifies of the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. In particular, there was damage to the exterior cladding of the facade, the entrance group of the building and the windows. At the scene, an injured polyclinic guard was found with a closed fracture of the left femur and a contusion. In addition, in the Dnipro district, near the damaged polyclinic, the destruction of facades and glazing of windows in three multi-story residential buildings was recorded. Rescuers and medics continue to work at the site, assessing the consequences and providing assistance to the victims. As reported by ArmyInform, specialists of the pyrotechnic division of the Mobile Rescue Center of Rapid Response of the State Emergency Service of Ukraine remains of the Kh-55 aviation cruise missile were discovered in one of the districts of the capital.

Title: There is no translation for the -Cossack- family: how to improve the armored car -Cossack-
Description: Andriy Kharuk, a well-known researcher of military equipment and armaments, doctor of historical sciences, professor of the Department of Humanities at the National Academy of Land Forces named after Hetman Petr Sagaidachny, told the ArmiyaInform correspondent about the history of the creation of this vehicle. Today is the continuation of the conversation, and the first part of the interview can be read at link. — Andriy Ivanovych, at the beginning of our conversation, you mentioned that the premiere sample of this armored car has already attracted the interest of potential foreign buyers. As far as I know, the manufacturer of this type of special equipment had further plans to enter the international market. What did they consist of? — In addition to the basic version, the Praktika company created a modification of the Kozak-2M2, which was offered for export. In particular, with the optional replacement of the Iveco engine with Deutz or Caterpillar, as well as the manual gearbox with an automatic one. This variant could be equipped with a three-door or five-door body. It was planned to establish the licensed production of Kozak-2M2 in Indonesia. In December 2021, the first Indonesian prototype was demonstrated, but there is currently no information on the further development of this project. —And then the third and subsequent generations of -Cossacks- appeared. What can you tell us about them? — BBM -Kozak-3- is a Land Rover Defender all-terrain vehicle booked by -Practice-. The work was carried out on the order of the State Border Service of Ukraine, and the batch of manufactured machines probably does not exceed several dozen copies. Very little is known about the Kozak-4 - it is described as a 15-passenger transport vehicle that was tested in the National Guard. An alternative to Iveco units was the use of the chassis of the American Ford F-550 car. The Kozak-5 prototype, built on this basis, was presented at the -Weapons and Security-2016- exhibition. Unlike Kozak-2, this car was positioned not as an army armored vehicle, but as a police vehicle, including for special-purpose units of the Ministry of Internal Affairs and Communications. The chassis of the Ford F-550 specially modified for the construction of an armored car by the company - an official converter (reinforced front axle, brakes and suspension elements replaced with stronger ones, installed large 335/80 R20 wheels, replaced gear pairs in the bridges - ed.). The eight-cylinder Power Stroke turbodiesel with a working volume of 6.7 liters develops a power of 390 hp. The transmission is a Ford TorqShift six-speed automatic. -Kozak-5- is lighter than -Kozak-2- - it weighs 10 tons. In the basic version, the armored car accommodates eight people. The design of the body is generally similar to -Kosaku-2-, but in the rear wall, instead of double-leaf doors, single-leaf doors are installed. — But the -fifth- -Cossack-, figuratively speaking, somehow did not go well with the service in the Armed Forces. What, in your opinion, is the reason? — The basic version of the Kozak-5 does not have weapons, but it can be equipped with a machine gun on a turret. And in October 2017, at another -Weapons and Security- exhibition, a variant with a BPU-1 tower from BRDM-2 was demonstrated, in which KPVT (caliber 14.5 mm) and PKT (7.62 mm) machine guns were installed. Unlike Kozak-2 and Kozak-2M armored vehicles, Kozak-5 did not arouse much interest in the Ukrainian military. Only one vehicle is believed to have been transferred to the National Guard in the spring of 2017. She was received by the special forces unit -Vega-. The Armed Forces of Ukraine did not purchase a single armored vehicle of this type before the beginning of the Russian large-scale invasion. Instead, Praktika managed to get an order from Saudi Arabia for 60 armored vehicles. The first batch was ready to be shipped to the customer in April 2021. However, apparently not all Kozak-5 armored vehicles were delivered to Saudi Arabia by February 2022 - photos of such vehicles at the front appeared in the spring and summer. They differ from the armored car given to the National Guard in some details, in particular, the design of the headlights. — However, one of the variants of the Kozak-5 BBM turned out to be a valuable acquisition for Ukrainian sappers, for whom, unfortunately, jobs are constantly being added… — A special variant of the Kozak-5MPL is intended for demining groups State service for emergency situations. It serves to transport unexploded mines and improvised explosive devices. The difference is a longer wheelbase and a special body design designed to detonate mines/improvised explosive devices that are transported. In addition, the car is equipped with a compartment for a special tool of the pyrotechnic team. In June 2018, the State Emergency Service received eight Kozak-5MPL armored vehicles. — There was an attempt by the manufacturer to create a Kozak-6 special vehicle — In the summer of 2021, the Kozak-6 was produced and tested, a car with a four-door body without a roof. She was appointed to participate in military parades and even took part in the rehearsal of solemn events in August 2021. The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine planned to purchase three -armored convertibles-, but this idea was quickly abandoned, so the Kozak-6 prototype was returned to the manufacturer. — However, the -Cossack- manufacturers did not abandon the idea of ​​providing the Ukrainian army with their armored vehicles. What did the -seventh- Kozak turn out to be? — Yes, the last representative of the BBM data line is the Kozak-7 armored car. Unlike the -policeman- -Cossack-5-, it is positioned as a purely military vehicle. The base chassis of the Ford F-550 has been significantly strengthened - wheel hubs from the US Army JLTV vehicle, reinforced axles and new springs have been installed. The body became three-door. The mass increased to almost 12 tons. Compared to Kozak-2M1, the armored car has better ergonomics, improved dynamic characteristics, as well as lower cost and simpler production technology. On the other hand, it has a frame structure, which was considered the main drawback of the Kozak-2 and became the reason for the appearance of the Kozak-2M1 machine with a supporting body. - This model of armored car has its own -export- history of creation. - Kozak-7 armored car was created for an unnamed foreign customer according to an individual technical task. On January 25, 2022, this machine was demonstrated to the command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Under the conditions of a large-scale Russian invasion, exports were out of the question. However, a certain number of Kozak-7 armored cars were still produced. Since January 2023, their appearance at the front has been recorded, and in May 2023, information appeared about the use of such armored vehicles by the Airborne Assault Troops. Taking into account all of the above, it can be concluded that the Praktika company has created a fairly extensive line of armored vehicles with a 4×4 wheel formula, which are based on the use of imported civilian units. These machines, primarily Kozak-2 and Kozak-2M1, are widely used by the Defense Forces of Ukraine to ensure the mobility of light infantry units (primarily Airborne Assault Forces, Marines and National Guard - ed.), as well as to support the actions of Special Operations Forces . —Mr. Professor, with this conclusion you have effectively summed up the creation and development of the -Cossack- line of BBM in the period before the large-scale invasion of the aggressors. But the manufacturers of Kozak machines continued their improvement after the start of the great war. — In August 2023, a video appeared of the Kozak-2M1 with a new weapon option — a remote-controlled module with a 14.5-mm KPVT machine gun. In June, this module was already spotted on another carrier - MT-LBu, converted into an ersatz BMP (the designation BMP-1LB is found - ed.). The origin of the remote-controlled installation is unknown, but some conclusions can be drawn from its image. Several lenses of the optical station suggest the presence of a night channel (infrared or thermal imaging - ed.). The module is also equipped with a protective shield in the front projection, which hints at the lack of adequate bulletproofing of the installation itself. The gunner controls the module using a joystick. The level of execution of the combat module suggests that it was produced in Ukraine by one of the defense enterprises already during the large-scale invasion. Its weapons are powerful enough to destroy light armored vehicles - Soviet BMP models or armored personnel carriers. However, in my opinion, it would be desirable to supplement the KPVT with a 7.62 mm machine gun for effective damage to manpower. At this time, it is not clear to me personally whether this armored car is a new production, or perhaps repaired after damage. However, the improvements were not limited to a new weapons module - the car also received a digital TV camera for the driver. The production of -Cossacks- continues. Yes, at the end of April with the participation of the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov the transfer of 40 vehicles of this type to the 225th separate assault battalion took place at once (15 Kozak-2M1 and 25 Kozak-5). In my opinion, this is a very revealing event against the background of the failure of the German company to supply 400 ordered armored vehicles of the same class. Ukrainian manufacturers manage to increase production even under the conditions of war. This fact cannot help but infuriate our enemies, because photos from this event have already been posted on anti-Russian websites. - Over the years of service, -Cossacks- have become in demand in various units of the Defense Forces. - Indeed, the family of -Cossacks- continues to grow. The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine in July notified about the codification of the medical evacuation armored car -Kozak-5MED-. Like the standard Kozak-5, it has a frame construction and uses the chassis of the Ford F550 pickup truck. The car is equipped with a 330 hp diesel engine. and automatic transmission. -Kozak-5MED- accommodates four wounded on stretchers, or six seated, as well as the driver and the personnel of the medical evacuation group. —The category of these machines for direct combat use continues to develop. What innovations are you aware of in this direction? — I would like to note that the Ukrainian Kozak-5 armored vehicles received a combat module from the company Escribano Mechanical & Engineering for a 12.7-mm machine gun. The module has day and infrared cameras with autofocus, as well as a laser rangefinder. The combat module can automatically follow the target taking into account corrections and fire in several modes. — Protecting armored vehicles from combat drones today poses relevant challenges to the manufacturers and operators of BBM. What has been done to protect the crews of the armored vehicles we are discussing? - Recently, a message was published on the page of one of the domestic manufacturers about a new development - a set of protective anti-drone screens for the Kozak armored vehicles. As you can see from the photo, the design of the screens is well thought out and protects the car from all angles. It is reported that different versions of the kit developed are adapted to specific modifications of the Cossacks. The first 18 kits will be transferred to the 46th Separate Assault Brigade.

Title: 50 thousand -British-, -The Sun- and death for Ukraine: what Valery Zaluzhnyi actually said at Inter...
Description: The British government made this firm and factual statement on the occasion of the 1,000th day of the Russian Federation's large-scale attack on Ukraine. She quite worried the Russian propaganda, which tried to interrupt the information agenda. ArmiyaInform tells about how Russian propagandists tried to use the authority of the -Iron General- and now the Ambassador of Ukraine to Great Britain Valery Zaluzhny and the Western media with the aim of spreading anti-Ukrainian narratives. More than 50,000 Ukrainian military personnel have been trained within the framework of Operation Interflex, a training program for recruits with no or little military experience according to NATO standards on the territory of Great Britain. About reported in the Ministry of Defense of the United Kingdom. -The UK has stood shoulder-to-shoulder with our Ukrainian allies since day one of Putin's illegal full-scale invasion - providing international support, training 50,000 new recruits and supplying weapons, drones and other critical military equipment,- UK Defense Secretary John Gealey said. The press release of the Ministry of Defense of Great Britain was published on the occasion of 1000 days of large-scale war. It contains an assurance of the United Kingdom's unwavering support for Ukraine and a firm promise to help the Ukrainian people in their just struggle as much and as long as it is necessary. On the same day, British Deputy Defense Minister Luke Pollard together with Ambassador of Ukraine to the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland Valery Zaluzhny met with the Ukrainian military who are training on the territory of STANTA - Stanford Training Area in the county of Norfolk in the north east of england -The training of over 50,000 Ukrainian recruits on UK soil since the start of Putin's full-scale invasion of Ukraine in 2022 is an achievement that cannot be overstated,- said Luke Pollard. During the meeting, Valery Zaluzhnyi addressed the Ukrainian military personnel undergoing training with a short motivational speech. He emphasized the importance of the training mission in Great Britain for the high-quality training of the Ukrainian military and urged them to learn the main things every soldier needs here. Valery Zaluzhny's speech was generally correctly reported by the well-known British media -The Sun-, although the publication about the address to the Ukrainian military came out with a somewhat provocative headline characteristic of a tabloid: -KILL OR BE KILLED. Watch how Ukrainian troops training in Great Britain are told to -kill without hesitation- in a moving speech by the former -Iron General-. Recruits of the heroic army of Ukraine must learn to kill Russians -without hesitation-, The Sun clarified the words of the former Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The publication cited a direct quote from Valery Zaluzhny's speech: -When you see the enemy, kill him before he tries to kill you or your comrade.- The Sun also published video report about the visit of high-ranking officials to the training base on the territory of STANTA. It also contains a video recording of Valery Zaluzhny's speech to Ukrainian soldiers, which allows you to hear exactly what he said in his address to the Ukrainian military. The -Iron General- began his speech by stating that modern warfare is becoming more brutal every day and leaves very little chance of survival on the battlefield. Valery Zaluzhny emphasized that fighters should learn not to be afraid of death and bravely look the enemy in the eye. It was these words that Russian propaganda tried to falsely present as a statement that Ukrainian fighters on the battlefield seem to face only inevitable death and the only thing they should learn is the absence of fear of imminent death. This is how the Russians tried to devalue Great Britain's undeniable colossal contribution to Ukraine's support, including the training and full equipping of more than 50,000 soldiers. To promote a false thesis, the Russians traditionally resorted to the usual propaganda techniques - pulling out of context, focusing on a part of the information and silencing everything else, manipulative statements and appeals to the authority of the Western media - this time they massively referred to -The Sun-. Instead, by looking at the video recording and the full text of Valery Zaluzhny's speech, it is not difficult to make sure that he was talking about completely different things that are completely unfavorable to Russian propaganda. He called the main tasks during training in Great Britain the need to learn how to survive on the battlefield, to take care of one's own safety and to save one's comrades, and to carry out a combat mission by killing the enemy without any extra thought. The -Iron General- urged not to die, but to kill for Ukraine and to survive himself and to help a comrade in arms survive. After all, to be ready to die for the Ukrainian people does not at all mean to be doomed to death, and death should be accepted first of all by the Russian occupiers.

Title: The Ministry of Defense reported what new specializations appeared in military universities
Description: The Department of Military Education and Science of the Ministry of Defense informed ArmiyaInform about this. -According to the decisions of the leadership of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and on the basis of detailed applications for the training of military specialists with higher education, sent by customers for the training of military specialists, new specializations have been introduced since 2024: -International cooperation in the field of defense and the military sphere-, -Management of the actions of units marine unmanned systems (complexes)-, -Operation and repair of marine unmanned systems (complexes),- the agency said. The greatest competition for admission to training in 2024 was observed in specialties that train commanders of mechanized units, units of Airborne Assault Forces and Special Operations Forces, computer technology specialists, military lawyers, military psychologists, and specialists in international relations. The listed specialties were popular among both boys and girls. At the same time, girls were enrolled in all specialties on equal terms with boys. The agency noted that during this year's induction campaign, the percentage of combatants from the total number of enlisted servicemen in 2023 was 30.5%, in 2024 it was 36.2%. Previously ArmyInform reported that at military universities this year the most popular among women were majors and specializations, according to which prepare commanders of mechanized units, units of Airborne Assault Forces and Special Operations Forces.

Title: the Russians mirror their crimes: they invented a fake about looting in Kurshchyna
Description: Yes, now they are reproducing a photo of a box with allegedly Russian products that fighters in the Kharkiv region received. Such a gift was apparently given to them by the military 154 OMBr from the Kursk region. However, this is not true. Ukrainian names of products are visible in the photo, they are not sold in the Kursk region. These photos were probably taken by Ukrainian volunteers to report on the aid given to the Defense Forces. Such fakes are aimed both at the domestic Russian consumer, to whom they are trying to prove that it is the norm for any military to rob stores, that it is not only the soldiers of Putin's army who do it, and at the Ukrainian, to whom the enemy is trying to show that the Armed Forces have problems with provision

Title: The Air Force of the Ukrainian Armed Forces showed a missile shot down in the center of Ukraine
Description: wrote and published the corresponding photo about this with the public of the Command Colonel Yuriy Ignat of the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -A cruise missile shot down during a Russian attack on November 28, 2024 in central Ukraine,- reads the caption of the photo with the debris. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of November 28, the enemy -i-35-vorozhyh-bpla/->struck Ukraine with various types of missiles and attack drones. In general, several areas were hit by Kalibr rockets using cluster munitions, which significantly complicate the elimination of consequences for rescuers and energy workers. As a result of the anti-aircraft battle, almost 90% of Kalibr and X-101 cruise missiles. Also, three guided air missiles and 35 enemy UAVs were shot down, more than 60 were lost in location. A total of 12 hits were recorded, mainly at the facilities of the fuel and energy sector.

Title: Minus four tanks, BMPs and ATVs: how -Phoenixes- fire the invaders in the Kupyan direction
Description: Video of combat work they published on their channel. -Kupyansk direction: four destroyed tanks, two cars of the occupiers, 2 ATVs and BMP-2, and 2 warehouses of fuel and lubricants were also burned - the work of the operators of the attack UAVs of the RUBpAK -Fenix- command of the -Pomsta- brigade in the Kharkiv region,- they said Ukrainian defenders. Previously, ArmyInform showed, as before, night FPV drones of the 92nd Assault Brigade of the Basket Ataman Ivan Sirk of the Kharkiv Oblast shock battalion -Achilles- destroyed a Russian T-72 tank, two -Loaves- and a gun, as well as hit BREM, 3 Ural-4320 and BMP-2.

Title: Was in a complete environment, but destroyed the enemy group: the story of a fighter on the pseudo-B...
Description: Ammunition was replenished at a neighboring position abandoned by the enemy. After a short rest, the battle continued, with a firefight lasting about three hours. As a result, the enemy group that crossed the border was destroyed. -Valery has been serving in the Armed Forces since February 2023. He joined the army voluntarily. There are episodes in his fighting days that will one day be told as heroic deeds, but Valery himself believes that he is no braver than an ordinary person. Four children are waiting for him at home,- said the Ground Forces. As reported by ArmyInform, the combat training instructor of the 79th separate amphibious assault brigade of the Taurian brigade with the call sign -Luna- told about contact battles with the occupiers in Mariintka and the first meeting with enemy FPV drones.

Title: The president awarded another 497 servicemen, 435 of them posthumously
Description: The corresponding decree is posted on the website of the head of state. According to the document, the defenders were awarded for personal courage shown in the defense of state sovereignty, territorial integrity of Ukraine and selfless performance of military duty. The head of state awarded the Cross of Combat Merit to Major Robert Brovdi, Chief Sergeant Mykhailo Gerneshiy, Junior Lieutenant Valery Horyanskyi, Senior Lieutenant Oleksandr Zhuk and Sergeant Oleksiy Solyanik. The defenders were also awarded the orders of Bohdan Khmelnytsky, -For Courage-, -For Military Service to Ukraine- and -Defender of the Fatherland- medals. As reported by ArmyInform, the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, General Oleksandr Syrsky honored with awards servicemen of 38 separate marine brigades and 503 separate marine battalion infantry

Title: The priority of the 2025 state budget will be security and defense: Rustem Umyerov cited key figures
Description: reported this by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. In particular, in 2025, 26.3% of the country's GDP or UAH 2.23 trillion will be allocated to defense, which is UAH 47.6 billion more than in 2024. Among them: 1.16 trillion hryvnias are provided for the financial support of our soldiers, which is 10 billion hryvnias more than in 2024. UAH 739 billion will be allocated for the purchase and renewal of weapons — this will allow the army to be modernized, providing it with modern weapons systems for conducting effective combat operations. UAH 55.1 billion will be used to modernize production capacities of the defense industry and develop the latest technologies. Funding for the purchase of unmanned systems, in particular DeepStrike, has also been significantly increased. -This budget is our response to the challenges of war. It is aimed at strengthening the country's defense capabilities, supporting our defenders, and developing the defense-industrial complex. Every hryvnia is an investment in the victory and peaceful future of Ukraine,- Rustem Umyerov concluded.

Title: In Donetsk region, the occupiers shot four more Ukrainian prisoners of war
Description: This was reported by the Prosecutor General's Office. On November 22, representatives of the Soviet Union launched an attack on the position of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, located near the village of Petrivka, Pokrovsky district. During the enemy assault, four servicemen of the Armed Forces of Ukraine were forced to surrender. Immediately after that, the occupiers opened fire on them with automatic weapons. Deliberate killing of prisoners of war is a gross violation of the Geneva Conventions and is classified as a grave international crime. Currently, investigative actions are underway to establish all the circumstances of the crime and the persons involved in its commission. Under the procedural guidance of the Donetsk regional prosecutor's office, a pre-trial investigation was started on the fact of violation of laws and customs, combined with intentional murder (Part 2 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). As reported by ArmiyaInform, the Zaporizhia Regional Prosecutor's Office opened criminal proceedings on the fact of the shooting of Ukrainian prisoners of war near Novodarivka, Zaporizhia Region. According to preliminary data, on November 24, 2024, in the area of ​​active hostilities near Novodarivka, servicemen of the Russian Armed Forces shot five of the six Ukrainian defenders taken prisoner.

Title: KamAZs and Loaves are burning: how our fighters drive the Russians out of Kharkiv Oblast
Description: The video of the combat operation appeared on November 28 on the unit's page. -Fast, accurate, uncompromising - this is how the crews of the night FPV drones of the Achilles BpAK battalion in Kharkiv region work,- the defenders noted. AT THE START, ATTENTION...THERE IS A GIVING Fast, accurate, uncompromising - this is how the night FPV drone crews of the ACHILLES assault battalion in the Kharkiv Region work. DESTROYED: T-72 tank, Kamaz, -Buhanku-. AFFECTED: motorcycle, Buhanky (2 units), Kamaz, Ural-4320. OS: 2 persons. liquidated pic.twitter.com/JhPLZwLHVy — BUBpAK “ACHILLES” 92 OSHBr (@achilles_92osbr) November 28, 2024 Previously, ArmyInform showed how in Kharkiv Oblast the night FPV drones of the -Achilles- assault battalion of the 92nd assault brigade named after the basket chieftain Ivan Sirk destroyeda Russian tank T-72, two Loaves and a cannon, as well as BREM, 3 Ural-4320 and BMP-2 were hit.

Title: Volodymyr Zelenskyi: Putin is brandishing his -oreshnik- to frustrate Donald Trump's efforts
Description: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi said this in his evening address. -He can wave his -nutcracker- now only in order to frustrate President Trump's efforts, which will definitely take place after the inauguration. Putin wants to escalate the situation now so that President Trump will not be able to end the war,- Volodymyr Zelenskyi said. The president added that today in Kazakhstan, Putin again advertised his missiles — his readiness to kill and destroy. -Putin obviously wants to add thousands more to the thousands of missiles that have already hit Ukraine. He does not need the end of this war. Moreover, Putin wants to prevent others from ending this war,- the head of state said. He emphasized that Putin is the only culprit of this war and the only one who believes in the war. And that is why Putin's escalation now is a pressure to later force the US president to agree to Russia's terms. As ArmiyaInform reported, on November 21, the Russians hit the Dnipro with a new medium-range ballistic missile based on the older Rubezh ICBM, which is a potential carrier of a nuclear warhead. GUR IOU reported that Russia struck by using a ballistic missile, probably from the -Kedr- missile complex. The flight time of this Russian missile from the moment of launch in the Astrakhan region to the impact in the city of Dnipro was 15 minutes. Six combat units were installed on the rocket: each one was equipped with six sub-munitions. The speed on the final part of the trajectory is more than Mach 11. As of October of this year, Russia was supposed to produce two experimental rocket samples from the -Kedr- missile complex.

Title: The occupiers have attacked Nikopolshchyna more than 20 times, there is one injured
Description: reported this by the head of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Serhii Lysak. In total, more than 20 shellings were recorded, the enemy used drones and artillery. A 33-year-old man was injured as a result of the shelling. He was hospitalized in moderate condition. 11 private houses, six outbuildings, a garage, and a moped were damaged. The infrastructure and utility company were also damaged. Power lines and gas lines were affected. In the evening, air defense was working in the region. As ArmyInform reported, as a result of enemy shelling in Kherson Oblast on November 28 at least one person died and three people were injured.

Title: Fighter -Luna- took part in contact battles in Maryinka and met with 9 enemy FPV drones
Description: An interview with himappearedon the unit page. -After training in training centers, our recruits undergo additional training already in the combat zone. Combat training, says the sergeant, is constant and systematic work on oneself. And it is impossible to achieve perfection in it. Because war changes every day. That's why training never stops,- the paratroopers said. How to act in the most difficult situations and under fire, how to move during the operation of enemy attack and reconnaissance drones - all this -Luna- knows not from books, but from its own, real, experience. And shares it with those who go into battle. -When we entered Maryinka, it was already difficult there. The hardest thing was not to hold the position, but to get in and out of it. Everyone mostly moved along the roads. Wherever possible, they went around houses and foundations, but mostly it was roads, and they were shot at, birds are constantly flying, constant resets,- said -Luna-. He remembered how once he and the boys left the position with two three hundredths, and the Russians, who were 154 meters away, opened fire on them. -We helped ours, ours helped ours, and it turned out as it should. Sitting with three hundred all day is not an option. And they started running. So they ran from funnel to funnel, to the first foundation, to the first building. It's hard,- he shared his memories. The paratrooper also described his first encounter with enemy FPV drones. -9 FPVs flew to us in 15 minutes.
