There was a structure, and a hole was punched at the bottom and, as in a dugout, a descent into the basement. And we started jumping in there, miraculously without loss. This was my first experience with these FPVs. We were used to resets then, and here half the house is gone. -Mainly the loss is due to the fact that people are not trained,- he emphasized. According to him, in order to save life, one must constantly learn. -Luna- works every day with those who join the ranks of the Tavrian paratroopers. Earlier, ArmiyaInform told about the story of a fighter with the call sign -Prytsyl-. He fights in the drone battalion air complexes of the Perun Group of the 79th Tavrian Assault Brigade. On his account - to a battalion of destroyed enemy infantry.

Title: - They filtered out patriots and intimidated the people of Azov: the suspicion was reported to ex-la...
Description: The Donetsk regional prosecutor's office reported this on November 28. According to the investigation, in 2014, four employees of the State Department of Internal Affairs in the Donetsk region defected to the enemy. The men found employment in the city created by the occupation authorities. Donetsk -Department for Combating Organized Crime of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the DNR-. In April 2022, the so-called acting head of the pseudo-law enforcement agency together with the -head of the strategic intelligence department- and two -authorized officers- were engaged in the organization of a system of checkpoints and carried out -filtering measures- in order to identify among the population participants in hostilities and citizens with a pro-Ukrainian position in Mariupol . Later, acting on the instructions of Russian curators, the members of the group fabricated -criminal proceedings- against servicemen of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, soldiers of the -Azov- unit and their former colleagues. During interrogations of at least four citizens, who were illegally detained in the correctional colony of the village of Olenivka of the Volnova district and were taken to the -poor house-, the suspects tried to recruit them and demanded that they give false testimonies. At the same time, they threatened the detainees with physical violence. The suspects face 15 years behind bars with deprivation of the right to hold certain positions or engage in certain activities for a period of 15 years with confiscation of property. As reported by ArmyInform, a traitor in the ranks condemned for cooperation with the occupiers.

Title: The tank directly aimed at the Russians
Description: Theypublished a video of combat work on their channel. -Our tank is directly aimed at the occupiers - first with a machine gun, and then with a cannon. This video is scary to watch. And imagine what the katsaps felt in the positions,- the Ukrainian defenders commented. Earlier ArmyInform showed how the occupier climbedto the Ukrainian positions, but the soldiers of the 63rd mechanized brigade eliminated them in close combat his

Title: Warehouses and a fuel truck of the Russians are on fire, and transport is fleeing: hunting -Phoenixe...
Description: Video of combat operation appearedon the page of the State Border Service of Ukraine. -3 occupiers were eliminated and another 4 wounded, 2 field warehouses of ammunition and 2 warehouses of fuel and lubricants were burned - the results of the work of the operators of the attack UAVs of the RUBpAK -Fenix- command of the -Revenge- brigade in the Kreminnaya area for three days,- the border guards said. As reported by ArmyInform, the bomber operators of the RUBpAK -Phoenix- command post of the -Revenge- brigade in Luhansk region eliminated many enemy targets in a few days, in particular destroyed the Russian field warehouse of ammunition, and also damaged engineering and fortification structures occupiers

Title: A Russian reached our trenches and died, a Magyar sting against the occupiers: a stream from a front...
Description: Most of the occupiers were eliminated on the approach to our positions. The last Russian could have met the same fate, but the drone that attacked him did not work. The occupier decided to continue the assault on his own, but the guys in the trench immediately engaged in direct combat and eliminated him. In the Kharkiv Region, the Russians attacked the positions of the 3rd Assault Brigade. For this assault, the enemy used three BMPs and a tank. The FPV drone hit one BMP, the tank got stuck in the mud, the surviving BMP tried to escape, but the drones of the 3rd assault group caught up with them and blew them up. Fighters of the -Rubizh- brigade shot down a rare Russian -Merlin-VR- drone. According to the occupiers, it was supposed to be a -technological breakthrough- thanks to its silence, modern surveillance equipment and long flight range. By the way, this is already the second downed enemy -Merlin-VR- on the account of the -Rubizh- brigade. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - Captain Artem Golub and Major Andriy Makarenko.

Title: Enemy shelling of the Kherson region: among the victims are elderly people, damaged houses
Description: This is reported by Kherson Regional Military Administration -Enemy drone strikes in Kherson do not stop. Two more people were taken to the hospital, who were injured due to the attack of the Russian drone in the Dnipro district. The women, 56 and 68 years old, suffered mine-explosive injuries,- said the Kherson OVA. In addition, a 59-year-old man was mortally wounded in the Dnipro district due to enemy shelling. -The Russian army again attacked a civilian in the Dnipro district with a UAV. A 69-year-old man was hit by an enemy drone. He went to the hospital on his own. The victim has a mine-explosive injury and a fragmentary wound to the forearm. He was hospitalized for medical assistance,- the report said. It is noted that in the morning Russian troops also shelled Shlyakhove. As a result of the -arrivals-, private houses were damaged. Houses have broken roofs and windows. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kherson region as a result of Russian shelling last day -sered-misczevyh/->one person died, another 14 were injured.

Title: The President signed a draft law on the permission to return to military service for those who first...
Description: The relevant information is indicated in the bill card on the site of the Verkhovna Rada . The document stipulates that during the period of martial law, military service and the validity of the contract will continue for military servicemen who voluntarily left military units or places of service for the first time or deserted and voluntarily arrived at the place of service and expressed their willingness to continue military service. Also, after the return, monetary payments and implementation of food, material, other types of security, benefits and social guarantees are resumed. In addition, initiated criminal proceedings regarding criminal offenses provided for in Articles 407 and 408 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine against servicemen who for the first time voluntarily left military units or places of service or deserted and voluntarily arrived and expressed readiness to continue military service are not grounds for refusal of extended military service of such servicemen and the validity of their contract. It should be noted that on August 20, the Verkhovna Rada supported the draft law, which was supposed not to punish the first voluntary abandonment of a military unit or desertion, if the soldier himself returned, and the commander allows him to continue his service. As reported by ArmyInform, servicemen who voluntarily left their units for the first time instead of imprisonment start return to the front. ArmyInform explained about SZH and desertion: how to return to the service and not go behind bars.

Title: In Kyiv, sappers removed the wreckage of the Russian Kh-55 missile
Description: This was reported to the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. These debris did not pose a direct threat to the population, but their prompt removal and disposal is an important part of the measures aimed at guaranteeing the safety of citizens. -Dear citizens! If you notice a suspicious object, do not approach or touch it! What seems safe can hide deadly danger. Report the find to specialists by dialing 101 or 102. Let the professionals do their job, and save your life and those around you,- the rescuers reminded. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of November 28, the enemy -i-35-vorozhyh-bpla/->struck Ukraine with various types of missiles and attack drones. As a result of the anti-aircraft battle, almost 90% of Kalibr and X-101 cruise missiles. Also, three guided air missiles and 35 enemy UAVs were shot down, more than 60 were lost in location. A total of 12 hits were recorded, mainly at the facilities of the fuel and energy sector.

Title: Kings of the Swamp: The Russians wanted to storm, but their tank got stuck in the mud
Description: The video of the combat operation is published on the channel of the Third Assault. -Armor destroyed, infantry eliminated - enemy roll fiasco! We raise the FPV to the sky - and one of the bays is smoking. The tank gets stuck in the mud,- the fighters say. The surviving BMPs tried to escape, but the drones of the Third Assault Brigade caught up and blew up the equipment of the occupants. -Enemy infantry are epically burned out amidst a field of art, FPV and drops. Not a single occupier was left without a control hit,- the military said. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the Third Assault Brigade cleared the village of Kopanka, into which the occupiers broke through in Kharkiv Oblast. During the sweep, part of the Russians was destroyed, a part is taken prisoner.

Title: A traitor who pointed Russian missiles at Zhytomyr region received 15 years in prison
Description: This is stated in message of the SBU. According to the case materials, the defendant tried to find out the locations of repair bases for heavy weapons of the Armed Forces. SBU employees detained the agent in August 2023, when she was preparing to flee to Russia. At that time, the Russian game planned to -evacuate- its accomplice to the Russian Federation by transiting through third countries. As the investigation established, the agent turned out to be a 43-year-old immigrant from Donetsk region. After the start of the full-scale war, the woman first moved to Kyiv, and then rented an apartment in the Zhytomyr region. She was looking for -exits- to Russian military intelligence through Russian social networks. There, the traitor left a message offering her services as an informant. The perpetrator also used her personal page in the banned Odnoklasnyk to glorify the militants of the Russian private military company Wagner and justified their crimes. After remote recruitment, the agent received an operational nickname and instructions for further actions in the region. She passed on the information she received to the Russian curator through anonymous instant messenger chats and e-mail. Based on the evidence collected by the investigators of the Security Service, the court found the perpetrator guilty under two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: The investigation was conducted under the procedural guidance of the Zhytomyr Regional Prosecutor's Office.

Title: Ukraine's experience and NATO principles: IOU is developing new environmental standards
Description: About this informs November 28 Ministry of Defense. Representatives of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine discussed with NATO representatives the existing military environmental standards and the possibility of developing new ones, taking into account the experience of Ukraine. During the 27th meeting of the NATO working group on environmental protection (EPWG) at the Alliance headquarters in Brussels, the head of the environmental security department of the Main Directorate of Mine Action, Civil Protection and Environmental Security, Colonel Yuriy Sytnyk, emphasized the unique experience of Ukraine. -Our country has a unique experience in overcoming environmental consequences caused by military actions. That is why the Ministry of Defense is actively working on the creation of two new military environmental standards that meet NATO requirements. This experience will be valuable for the Alliance as well,- he noted. According to him, the first of the new standards - -Best environmental protection practices for the rational use of military training grounds- - will establish environmental requirements for the accommodation of personnel undergoing basic military training. The second standard - -Ensuring the environmental safety of troops (forces) in the field camps of military activity- - will be aimed at reducing the environmental impact of the activities of such facilities. Both documents are currently in the stage of approval of the second edition. Their introduction will not only contribute to reducing the consequences of environmental damage caused by the war, but will also strengthen Ukraine's cooperation with NATO member countries. -It should be noted that before the beginning of the large-scale Russian invasion of Ukraine, the Ministry of Defense developed and adopted 4 military environmental standards in accordance with NATO requirements. Some of them need to be updated in connection with the conduct of hostilities on the territory of our state,- the MOU emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, Rustem Umyerov informed about key decisions of allies regarding military aid to Ukraine by 2025.

Title: Out of 100 occupiers, 10 reach the line: the Defense Forces spoke about the battles on the Oskil Riv...
Description: The deputy commander of the shock battalion told about this on the air of the -Suspilne Novosti- TV channel. BPAK -Achilles- of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after the basket chieftain Ivan Sirk Oles Malyarevich. According to Oles Malyarevich, a small group of enemy infantry managed to cross to the right bank of the Oskil River - now the issue of liquidation of this landing is being resolved. Defenders are already used to such suicidal attacks. -Out of a hundred people, about 10 reach the line, and the rest die. They do not save manpower. Life is worth nothing to them. They throw them forward in order to grab something,- said Oles Malyarevich, deputy commander of the Achilles air defense missile battalion. Earlier, ArmiyaInform said that during an attempt to jump into the left-bank part of Kupyansk, the military of the Russian army managed to take advantage of the thick fog. However, the mission became suicidal for the Russians, because after the enemy was discovered, it was destroyed.

Title: -Flying- in -flying- — GUR in Crimea burned the radar for $5 million
Description: This was reported by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine on November 28. The 48Я6-K1 -flying- mobile radar is used by the enemy to detect air targets at low and extremely low altitudes in a difficult obstacle environment. The approximate value of the destroyed enemy radar complex -podlyot-, intended, in particular, for issuing target designations for the S-300 and S-400 air defense systems, is, according to the GUR, $5 million. As reported by ArmyInform, the Armed Forces told about the effectiveness of strikes on enemy territory.

Title: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine: the occupiers are actively operating in the Lyman,...
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff ZSU as of 16:00 November 28. The main efforts of the occupiers will continue to be made in the Pokrovsky and Kurakhiv directions, where more than half of all attacks on the territory of Ukraine were carried out. In addition, the occupiers are actively operating in the Lyman, Kupyan and Vremiv directions. Today, the areas of Popivka, Progress and Chuykivka settlements in Sumy Oblast were hit by enemy artillery fire from Russian territory. In the Kharkiv direction, the occupiers stormed the positions of our units in the Vovchansk, Tykhi and Hlyboky areas eight times. The situation is under control. Nine times the enemy attacked our positions in the Kupyan direction. Ukrainian defenders repelled enemy assaults in the districts of Golubivka, Kindrashyvka, Zeleny Gayu, Raigorodka, Lozova, and Kruglyakivka. Battles are currently taking place in three locations. In the Lyman direction, enemy units attacked in the areas of Tverdokhlibovo, Grekivka, Pershotravnevo, Yampolivka, and Terni. Since the beginning of the day, Ukrainian soldiers have repelled two attacks, and five clashes have continued until now. In the Siverskyi direction, the enemy carried out airstrikes with three air defense systems in the Zakitny region. In the Kramatorsk direction, the invaders carried out three assaults near Bila Hora and Stupochy. One attack by the occupiers continues so far. In the Toretsk direction Ukrainian defenders repulse three enemy attacks in the Toretsk area. In the Pokrovsky direction since the beginning of the day, the occupiers have already made 31 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their occupied positions in the Myrolyubivka, Promeny, Lysivka, Krutoy Yar, Dachensky, Zhovtoy, Chumatsky, Novy Trud and Pustinka districts. The defense forces, restraining the enemy onslaught, have already repelled a total of 21 enemy attacks in the direction. In the Kurakhiv direction, the invaders attacked our units 31 times, trying to advance in the areas of the settlements of Sontsivka, Berestka, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhove, Dalnye, Elizavetivka, Romanivka, Antonivka, and Hnativka. At present, there are eight clashes. In the Vremivsk direction, the invaders carried out 14 attacks on the positions of Ukrainian troops near Trudovoy, Vesely Gay, Kostyantynopolskyi, Rozdolnyi, Suhy Yaliv and Novodarivka. Seven skirmishes are ongoing. On the Orihiv and Gulyaipil directions the enemy did not conduct active operations. In the Dnieper direction, the occupiers carried out two futile assaults on the positions of Ukrainian units.

Title: The President signed the budget for next year: UAH 2.23 trillion for defense
Description: This was announced by Prime Minister of Ukraine Denys Shmyhal. The priority of the estimate remains the protection of our state. Funding of Security and Defense Forces, procurement and production of weapons, drones and equipment. UAH 2.23 trillion will be allocated for this. In addition, UAH 420.9 billion will be allocated to social protection, UAH 217 billion to health care, and UAH 199 billion to education. In general, next year's expenditures are planned at the level of UAH 3.6 trillion. Revenues — UAH 2.05 trillion. -The government clearly understands that we will pass the next financial year confidently. We have the coherence of the branches of government and the strong support of our partners,- stressed Denys Shmyhal. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine received 4 .8 billion dollars from the World Bank within the framework of the PEACE project.

Title: The occupiers tried to play -Hedgehog in the fog- - they burned
Description: The video of the fight was released on November 28 on the brigade's channel. The occupiers decided to attack into the dense fog, hoping that it would provide protection from our drones. A whole column of armored vehicles, led by a tank, went on the attack. But our pilots were able to successfully hit the invaders. -The enemy does not stop trying to advance with equipment and believes that we are not able to fight back in the thick fog. But for some reason, the enemy did not take into account that our shock bombers also use the weather. The -Night Ghosts- unit works even during the day,- the battalion commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of strike drones of the Vidarr 60 unmanned systems battalion of the Ingulets mechanized brigade vysnazhyly-rosiyanyna-a-potim-urazyly/->shot a short meter about an occupier who had to move a lot before his death.

Title: Rustem Umyerov reported on the key decisions of allies regarding military aid to Ukraine for 2025
Description: About this notified the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov on his page in Facebook. -In recent weeks alone, we have held a number of important meetings with allies aimed at identifying key defense needs, analyzing advance assistance and developing new formats of cooperation,- the statement said. Key results that will strengthen our position in 2025: One example of new alliances was the coalition Northern group+Ukraine: 12 countries — Denmark, Sweden, Finland, Norway, Iceland, Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania, Germany, the Netherlands, Poland and Great Britain are joining forces to strengthen the security of Ukraine. Active work within capacity coalitions in the Rammstein format is also underway. A separate direction is the development of the Ukrainian defense industry. In Ukraine, conditions have already been created for: the -Danish model- of purchasing Ukrainian products for the needs of the Defense Forces has proven its effectiveness by investing in our defense sector. Ukraine is confidently strengthening its positions on all fronts thanks to the heroism of our soldiers and the steadfast support of our allies. Together, we are bringing victory over the Russian invaders and guaranteeing security in Europe,- Rustem Umyerov concluded.

Title: Consequences of a rocket attack on Ivano-Frankivsk: more than 30 buildings were damaged
Description: The Prosecutor General's Office informs about this. According to preliminary information, at least 32 private houses, two farm buildings and power lines were damaged as a result of shelling. Fortunately, there were no casualties. An inspection of the scene is currently underway. A complete list of damages is established. Emergency services and law enforcement officers are on the scene documenting the aftermath of the attack. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of November 28, 2024 as a result of anti-aircraft combat, almost 90 percent of Kalibr cruise missiles were shot down and X-101.

Title: A $10 million embezzlement was exposed during the procurement of uniforms for the Armed Forces in 20...
Description: This was announced on November 28 by the Prosecutor General's Office. According to the investigation, the fraudulent scheme was organized in 2022 by the former adviser to the ex-deputy Minister of Defense, People's Deputy of Ukraine of the II-IV convocations and his son. A foreigner, who was previously brought to criminal responsibility in France, Spain and other countries, was involved in the investigation. A foreigner, on behalf of his controlled company, agreed with a Turkish textile holding on the production of more than 1 million sets of military uniforms for $25.6 million, using connections with Ukrainian officials and politicians. In 2022, this company concluded agreements with the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine at an inflated price in the amount of more than $35 million. The participants planned to divide the difference of $10 million among themselves. After receiving an advance in the amount of $10 million, the Turkish side fulfilled the order and delivered the form to Ukraine. However, the foreigner stopped contacting and did not pay the balance. The participants of the fraudulent scheme spent the funds on their own needs. 38 searches were conducted at the place of residence of the defendants, documents, equipment and other evidence of their illegal activities were seized. Currently, the former adviser to the ex-deputy Minister of Defense, People's Deputy of Ukraine of the II-IV convocations and his son have been notified of the suspicion of taking possession of someone else's property by deception in particularly large amounts (Part 4 of Article 190 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). The question of choosing preventive measures for the suspect is being resolved As reported by ArmyInform, the People's Deputy of Ukraine notified about the suspicion of treason.

Title: In the Kharkiv region, a very greedy schoolboy has a chance to spend eternity in prison
Description: This was reported on November 28 by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. The accused is a resident of the village of Blyznyuki, who studied at the local lyceum. According to the investigation, a man contacted the young man, who was 17 years old at the time, through the Telegram messenger with an offer to earn extra money. The -employer- set a task - to set fire to relay cabinets of Ukrzaliznytsia in the territory of Loziv district for a monetary reward. The curator instructed the accused how exactly to act. One of the conditions of cooperation was the mandatory sending of a photo that the cabinet was really destroyed. In mid-August of this year, a young man managed to set fire to several relay cabinets, but during another -work shift- the arsonist was detained by law enforcement officers. It has been previously established that the young man was recruited by the special services of the Russian Federation to destabilize the situation in the region. The young man is awaiting trial while in custody. He will be tried in the Loziv city-district court of the Kharkiv region. The accused faces life imprisonment. As reported by ArmyInform, a Russian agent wanted to leave the military airfield without electricity.

Title: The enemy is afraid of landing an amphibious assault on the Kinburn spit: the Russians are strengthe...
Description: Colonel Vladyslav Voloshyn told about this on the broadcast of the -Edyny Novyny- telethon spokesman for the Defense Forces of the South. According to Vladyslav Voloshyn, the Russians relocated a division of river boats from Sevastopol for the defense of Kinburnskaya and Tendrivskaya spits. -Now these boats are taking part in preventing our forces from landing on these spits, occupying bridgeheads there. Because the enemy understands the importance of these positions,- Vladyslav Voloshyn noted. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the Kherson region, the enemy is preparing for the start of active assaults, for active forcing of the straits and is trying to take control of the island zone.

Title: The evasive eight — exposed group administrators, an uncle with a knife and a lawyer who thwarted th...
Description: About this reported on November 28 by the Security Service of Ukraine. Among the attackers was a resident of the capital who attacked with a knife on the representatives of the TCC during the delivery of the summons to the conscript Also detained in Kyiv were three Telegram channel and Viber group members who posted geolocations of the TCC in the capital's Pechersk, Dnipro and Solomian districts two administrators of anonymous messenger groups were exposed, who -merged- on the Internet the coordinates of mobile checkpoints in the region Equally suspicious was the owner of a closed Viber group, who daily -posted- geolocations of Ukrainian servicemen, in particular representatives of the TCC. Based on all the revealed facts, the investigators of the Security Service notified the detainees of suspicion (according to the crimes committed) under several articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: The perpetrators face up to 8 years of imprisonment. As reported by ArmyInform, the Security Service neutralized agent group of Russian military intelligence (better known as the game), which operated in Kharkiv.

Title: Greed led to life - in the Kharkiv region, a very greedy schoolboy went to trial
Description: This was reported on November 28 by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. The accused is a resident of the village of Blyznyuki, who studied at the local lyceum. According to the investigation, a man contacted the young man, who was 17 years old at the time, through the Telegram messenger with an offer to earn extra money. The -employer- set a task - to set fire to relay cabinets of Ukrzaliznytsia in the territory of Loziv district for a monetary reward. The curator instructed the accused how exactly to act. One of the conditions of cooperation was the mandatory sending of a photo that the cabinet was really destroyed. In mid-August of this year, a young man managed to set fire to several relay cabinets, but during another -work shift- the arsonist was detained by law enforcement officers. It has been previously established that the young man was recruited by the special services of the Russian Federation to destabilize the situation in the region. The young man is awaiting trial while in custody. He will be tried in the Loziv city-district court of the Kharkiv region. The accused faces life imprisonment. As reported by ArmyInform, a Russian agent wanted to leave the military airfield without electricity.

Title: -Everything that comes will remain here as burnt scrap metal-: near Vovchansk, enemy equipment and a...
Description: About this on the broadcast of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- the spokesman of the OTU -Kharkiv- told - lieutenant colonel Yevhenii Romanov. According to Romanov, the enemy attacked Ukrainian positions near Vovchansk and Tikhoi - and all assaults were repulsed. In particular, one combat vehicle, three artillery systems, eight cars, eight units of special equipment, and 20 drones were destroyed. -The enemy can use anything. But the efficiency, if you can talk about war like that, is zero. Everything that comes here will stay here, as burnt scrap metal,- Yevhenii Romanov stated. Earlier ArmyInform reported that in Kharkiv Oblast the occupiers stormed Ukrainian positions 35 times - 118 were killed as a result of Ukrainian defenders and wounded, 46 of them prematurely terminated their contract with the Russian army.

Title: At the same time, they toasted — our pilots turned the BMP-shed into the BMP-barbecue
Description: The video was published on November 28 on the brigade's channel. The enemy BMP was spotted by our aerial scouts, who sent an FPV drone to the spot. Its pilot made a well-aimed strike, although an entire anti-drone shed was built on the BMP. Our second drone recorded that the BMP was burning well, hopefully with the crew. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the -Alastor- unit of the 25th Sicheslav Airborne Brigade, who literally fired positions before their assault.

Title: Combined strike of the Russian Federation: the Air Force of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of ...
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. -The enemy attacked critical infrastructure — electrical substations in various regions of Ukraine. Unfortunately, there is a hit,- the message reads. In addition to cruise missiles three guided air missiles and 35 enemy UAVs were shot down, more than 60 were lost in location. A total of 12 hits were recorded, mainly at the facilities of the fuel and energy sector. The PS of the Armed Forces reported that recently, during air attacks, the enemy has been using a large number of missiles and drones. Their massive use in certain directions often exceeds the number of means of cover. In addition, the enemy uses modern means of air attack, constantly improving them. It is about the firing of thermal and radar traps, and also uses EW means of personal protection installed directly on the missiles. -All this significantly complicates the operation of Soviet-made anti-aircraft missile systems that are in service with the Air Force. Western systems work much more effectively in such conditions, which in Ukraine are not sufficient to reliably cover hundreds of critical infrastructure facilities. That is why, during massive enemy attacks, maximum forces and means are used, including aviation, electronic warfare, anti-aircraft defense and mobile fire groups,- the Air Force said. It is also noted that on the eve of attacks, the enemy takes into account meteorological conditions, which significantly affect the work of mobile fire groups and fighter aircraft. Dense fog and cloud cover, which were observed in many regions at the time of the attack, did not allow the pilots and calculations of the MVG to effectively perform their tasks.

Title: He returned to the wrong place: the border guard - was taken - while receiving an advance from the e...
Description: informs the Special Prosecutor's Office of the Western Region about this. The border guard helped conscripts cross the border outside official checkpoints, violating legal restrictions. He personally delivered -clients- in his own car to the starting point of the route and indicated a safe path along the border. The services cost 10,000 US dollars per person: he received part of the money in advance, the rest — after successfully crossing the border. Two cases of illegal transfer have been documented so far. The border guard was detained, and a preventive measure was chosen for him. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The Ministry of Defense named the leaders of the Army+ application integration
Description: The Ministry of Defense informed about this of Ukraine. The military units of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation all, without exception, processed at least one electronic report, which was further approved or rejected with an indication of the reason in Army+. In addition to the Navy, the top three in the use of Army+ are the Special Operations Forces (96% of units that process electronic reports) and the Airborne Assault Forces — 93%. The first place overall in the Armed Forces in terms of the number of processed electronic reports /->continues to hold the 148th separate Zhytomyr Artillery Brigade, which has already crossed the mark in 700 reports through Army+. -In less than a month, our top three leaders in terms of Army+ integration have changed. And it's like a real competition in the Armed Forces, who will be the first to transfer all their parts to work in digital format. I would also like to note the Operational Command -West- of the Ground Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Like the Navy, all their military units have started processing reports through the application,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko, Deputy Minister of Defense for Digitalization. The Army+ application was launched at the beginning of August. During this time, 450,000 military personnel were authorized in it, and the number of submitted reports exceeded 35,000.

Title: 500 rubles for the Internet: privileges for selected people in the forgotten cities of the occupied ...
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysohor, the head of the Luhansk Regional Military Administration. The local population lives without electricity, water supply and heating. The promises of the occupiers to restore public services, which were last made in the fall of 2023, were never fulfilled. There is practically no transport connection with Lysychansk, which makes the life of local residents even more difficult. The Internet in these cities is available only to the chosen ones: representatives of the occupation authorities and the military of the Russian Federation. In Rubizhny, for 500 rubles per hour, you can connect to the WI-FI network only in a special facility available to Russian military personnel. Local residents no longer trust the promises of the occupiers, which are made from election to election. The situation in the cities remains critical, and the life of the population remains outside the attention of the occupation administration. As reported by ArmyInform, in Luhansk, the Polyclinic of the Clinical Hospital is running at capacity, seeing up to 800 patients a day instead of the planned 480.

Title: The Netherlands handed over Patriot air defense launchers to Ukraine
Description: This is stated in his message on the social network X. The minister noted that Ukrainians are in for a hard winter, because Russia's destructive airstrikes on Ukrainian energy industry continue. -That's why we handed over three Patriot launchers. They save lives and protect vital infrastructure. Stopping Russian aggression was and remains in our common interests,- the message reads. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of November 28 the enemy attacked Ukraine with missiles of various types and attack drones. In total, radio engineering forces of the Air Force detected 188 air attack devices. 76 Kh-101/Kalibr cruise missiles were confirmed to have been shot down; 3 Kh-59/69 guided air missiles; 35 attack UAVs of the Shahed type and drones of an unknown type (62 enemy drones were lost in location).

Title: The Ministry of Defense answered the most common questions from UAV manufacturers
Description: About this reported on November 28 by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Specialists of the Main Directorate for Life Cycle Support of Weapons and Military Equipment answered the most common questions from manufacturers regarding the codification of unmanned aircraft systems. – Issues of codification of new models of weapons and military equipment in the structure of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine are handled by the Main Directorate for Life Cycle Support of Weapons and Military Equipment. – This is the Resolution of the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine dated February 25, 2015. No. 345 -On approval of the Order of Supply defense goods during a special period, introduction of a state of emergency, implementation of measures to ensure national security and defense, repel and deter armed aggression and during the period of anti-terrorist operation-; – Resolution of the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine dated July 21, 2023 No. 763 -On the implementation of an experimental project on the production, procurement and supply of ammunition-; – Resolution of the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine dated March 24, 2023 No. 256 -On the implementation of an experimental project regarding the implementation of defense purchases of unmanned systems, means of radio-electronic warfare and active means of countering technical intelligence of domestic production-; – Order of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine No. 673 dated 18.12.2017 -About the approval of the Procedure for codification of items of supply-. And the order of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine No. 354/nm dated May 28, 2024 -On approval of the Instruction on organization of the supply of weapons, military and special equipment in the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine during the legal regime of martial law-. 5. Are there technical support or consultation mechanisms for manufacturers during the codification process? OVT manufacturers can apply to GUZSZHTSOVT for consultations on codification issues by sending a letter to e-mail mdalc@mil.ua As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense prepared a typical package documents for developers and manufacturers.

Title: -I know that God protects me-: a soldier -Partizan- from Colombia fights for Ukraine
Description: The conversation with the defender was published on November 28 on the brigade channel. Arriving in Ukraine, Partizan left everything behind, because he could not stand aside in the face of injustice. Fear is always there, but with prayer in his heart and faith in God, he boldly goes forward. -I know that God will protect me and I will return home alive. It's not just hope, it's confidence,- Partizan told. His path is an example of dedication, courage and unshakable faith, the brigade emphasizes. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the 60th mechanized Ingulets brigade demonstrated an example of multitasking when during airdrops on enemy stormtroopers managed to ram and enemy reconnaissance UAV.

Title: Jumped out of the -loaf- and fell under the skids - our Teroboronmen are destroying enemy attack air...
Description: The video of the combat operation was published on the unit's channel. The bombers of the brigade closely monitor the movements of the enemy and strike as soon as they notice. It was especially vivid when a group of enemy attack aircraft jumped out of a bus and immediately fell under a couple of skids. Part of the Russians remained on the ground, waiting for the bus to evacuate. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the fighters of the 425th -Skala- battalion showed their daily work with destruction of small infantry groups of the enemy who are constantly trying to advance in the area of ​​Novohrodivka.

Title: Ukraine and Denmark strengthen naval cooperation
Description: This was announced on November 28 by the Naval Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. As the commander of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Vice Admiral Oleksiy Neizhpapa, said, key areas of cooperation were discussed during the event, including the safe functioning of the -grain corridor-, demining, protection of port infrastructure and the creation of a modern fleet. Oleksiy Neizhpapa thanked the Danish side for constant support and significant military assistance to strengthen our defense capabilities. In addition, the delegation was briefed on the current security situation at sea, including threats posed by the Russian aggressor. They also demonstrated the technical capabilities of boats, their equipment for patrolling and effective performance of tasks. -We have a common vision regarding the need for technology development and exchange of experience. Thanks to the partners for their work,- added Oleksiy Neizhpapa. As reported by ArmyInform, the government approved the plan implementation of the Maritime Security Strategy of Ukraine, developed by the Ministry of Defense.

Title: A new level of partnership: Ukraine and Great Britain are preparing an agreement for 100 years
Description: The head of state wrote about this in his Telegram channel. During the conversation, special attention was paid to issues of defense cooperation. The President expressed gratitude to Great Britain for its large-scale support, in particular for its willingness to allocate at least 3 billion pounds annually to help Ukraine. The parties agreed to remain in close contact with European leaders regarding steps to ensure Ukraine's strongest position in wartime conditions. Volodymyr Zelenskyi emphasized the importance of Ukraine receiving an invitation to NATO and building up long-range defense capabilities. During the conversation, Ukraine's participation in the Joint Expeditionary Force summit, which will be held next month in Tallinn, was also discussed. The President recalled that this year Ukraine was the only observer country at the JEF Joint Protector 2024 exercises, and expressed interest in deepening cooperation with the association. Separately, it was agreed to accelerate the preparation of an agreement on a one-year partnership between Ukraine and Great Britain. As reported by ArmyInform, Kalibr missiles - with cluster munitions: The President reacted to Russia's attack.

Title: In ten days, 50 occupiers raised the white flag: Russians are fleeing from murderous commanders, des...
Description: About this told on the broadcast of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- Lieutenant Colonel Nazar Voloshyn, spokesman of the Khortytsia operational-strategic troop grouping. According to Nazar Voloshin, Russian commanders constantly talk about this. However, prisoners are increasingly choosing life in captivity over the real prospect of death at the hands of their commanders. -In the last ten days, according to estimates, about 50 occupiers surrendered in our direction. They don't seem to be groups, but several people each,- said the spokesman of the Khortytsia operational-strategic group of troops. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the enemy has turned occupied Bakhmut into a huge warehouse of weapons, equipment and fuel - they are hiding everything in the mines.

Title: Terrible crime of the Russian Federation: five Ukrainian prisoners of war were shot in Zaporizhzhia
Description: This is reported by the Office of the Prosecutor General. According to preliminary data, on November 24, 2024, in the area of ​​active hostilities near Novodarivka, servicemen of the Russian Armed Forces shot five of the six Ukrainian defenders taken prisoner. The law enforcement officers established a unit of the occupying army, whose servicemen are currently being investigated for involvement in this crime. The investigators also received a video recording of the moment of the shooting. Shooting prisoners of war is a gross violation of the Geneva Conventions and is classified as a serious international crime. The pre-trial investigation is ongoing, law enforcement officers are taking measures to establish all the circumstances of the crime and bring the perpetrators to justice. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Pokrovsky direction Russian military shot five prisoners of the Armed Forces.

Title: Ten-hour alarm in Kyiv region: injured as a result of the attack
Description: This was reported by the head of the Kyiv Regional Military Administration, Ruslan Kravchenko. As a result of the attack, two people received minor injuries and went to the hospital on their own. Doctors provided them with the necessary assistance. In addition, in one of the regions of the region, an infrastructural object was damaged, a fire broke out there, which was promptly extinguished. A building and two cars were also damaged. It is noted that in another area, damage was recorded to a private house, a non-residential building and a hangar. Due to the attack, emergency power cuts were introduced at the direction of Ukrenergo. In the region, there are 466 points of invincibility to support the population. As reported by ArmyInform, pieces of rockets fell in Kyiv on enterprise: there is damage.

Title: Two - Berkut residents - and one wife - Russian -chronologists- were detained in Kharkiv
Description: The Security Service of Ukraine reported this on November 28. The attackers set up caches with money and grenades on the outskirts of the city. In this way, those involved were supposed to create a -reserve- for other agents and saboteurs of the Russian Federation for subversive activities in the region. According to the instructions of the military intelligence of the Russian Federation, the attackers made hideouts mainly in forest plantations, and then sent the coordinates of the hideouts to their Russian curator via messenger. In addition, the agents collected intelligence on the bases of the Defense Forces. To do this, they bypassed the territory of Kharkiv and the surrounding area, where they conducted preliminary reconnaissance based on the coordinates received from the occupiers. According to the investigation, the agent group included two former employees of the disbanded Berkut police special unit and the wife of one of them - all residents of Kharkiv. The extras got into the aggressor's field of vision because of a former -Berkutov resident- who fled to the Russian Federation even before the start of a full-scale war and began working for the occupiers. SBU counter-intelligence exposed the intelligence group early, documented its crimes and detained all three of its members in Kharkiv. During the searches, they seized mobile phones with evidence of cooperation with the Russian game, as well as RGD-5 combat grenades. The investigators of the Security Service informed the detainees about the suspicion (according to the crimes committed) under several articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: The perpetrators are in custody. They face life imprisonment with confiscation of property. As reported by ArmyInform, a Russian agent is in Kirovohrad Oblast /-> wanted to leave the military airfield without electricity.

Title: Ministry of Strategy and Industry: The manufacturer replaces a low-quality batch of 120-mm min
Description: informed Minister of Strategic Industries of Ukraine Herman Smetanin. The Minister reported that on November 20 of this year, one of the manufacturing plants received a claim for 120-mm mines from the Logistics Forces Command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in accordance with the established procedure. -At the same time, due to the effective cooperation of the Ministry of Strategy and Industry and the Ministry of Defense, the working out of the mentioned shortcomings was already underway - the mines of the last batches were being re-checked. Since domestic defense and military enterprises constantly and effectively cooperate with military units within the framework of the use of supplied products, information about this was received in time,- the Ministry of Strategy and Industry said in a statement. As early as November 8, the Ministry of Strategic and Industrial Production issued an order to conduct an inspection involving officials of the Ministry of Strategic and Industrial Production, the Ministry of Defense, the manufacturing plant, the Central Research Institute of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, and the Security Service of Ukraine. The working group worked during November 11-15 and came to the conclusion that there is indeed an abnormal operation of several components of the product. As a result, some of the shots turned out to be of inadequate quality. In accordance with the Act of the commission's work, the following measures are taken, including: Today, the Ministry of Defense is removing products from the specified batch in accordance with the established procedure, and the manufacturing plant is replacing them with high-quality samples. -At the same time, all enterprises of the Ukrainian defense industry continue to work as usual: to manufacture and supply high-quality weapons and military equipment to the Defense Forces. The situation surrounding low-quality mines has also become an additional incentive for all manufacturers to be more careful about quality control of their products at all stages of production,- the statement reads. As ArmiyaInform reported, on November 26, the Ministry of Defense noted that for the third week it is actively engaged in -rozsliduye-mizhvidomcha-komisiya/->investigating the causes of the abnormal activation of 120 mm mines.

Title: Caliber rockets with cluster munitions: the President reacted to Russia's attack
Description: He wrote about this in his Telegram channel. According to him, meetings were held in the morning with the commander of the Air Force, the ministers of internal affairs and energy to coordinate actions in response to the Russian attack. In total, about 100 attack drones and more than 90 missiles of various types were used. In several regions, strikes by -Caliber- rockets using cluster munitions were recorded, which significantly complicate the elimination of consequences for rescuers and energy workers. In the regions affected by shelling, all necessary services were involved. Power engineers and rescue workers are working to restore power supply. Invincibility points have been deployed to help the population. The president emphasized that each such attack emphasizes Ukraine's urgent need for air defense systems. He called on international partners to promptly supply the necessary weapons that protect the lives of Ukrainians and infrastructure, especially in the winter period. -Air defense systems should work where they save lives, and not stay at storage bases,- emphasized Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

Title: Air Force of the Ukrainian Armed Forces: shot down 76 cruise missiles, 3 guided air missiles and 35 ...
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. In total, 188 means of air attack were detected by the radio engineering forces of the Air Force: the air attack was repulsed by anti-aircraft missile troops, aviation, EW units, mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine. As of 10:30 a.m., the downing was confirmed: the enemy's missile-drone strike was aimed at Ukrainian energy facilities.

Title: -Contact at arm's length-: the Defense Forces told about the battles in Toretsk
Description: This was told by the spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU on the broadcast of the -Edyny Novyni- telethon - Major Anastasia Bobovnikova. According to Anastasia Bobovnikova, up to a hundred or more occupiers die in the city every day. -If we talk about urban battles, then contact is always at arm's length. That is, the enemy may be around the corner, may be on the second floor when ours are on the first, or vice versa. That is, these are always close shooting battles,- Anastasia Bobovnikova said. As reported by > ArmyInform, occupying Russian troops continue to storm Toretsk, sparing no personnel.

Title: Residential blocks of the Kherson region were hit by Russia: there are victims among the locals
Description: This was notified by the head of Kherson OVA Oleksandr Prokudin. Berislav, Antonivka, Zolota Balka, Stanislav, Vesele, Bilozerka, Mylove, Dudchany, Zmiivka, Komysany and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. According to the head of the OVA, the Russian military attacked critical and social infrastructure. In addition, the occupiers hit the residential quarters of the population centers of the region, in particular damaged 7 high-rise buildings and 14 private houses. The occupiers also mutilated garages and private cars. According to information of Khersonska ODA, a resident of Berislav, who was injured as a result of Russian artillery shelling on November 26, turned to the hospital . A 59-year-old woman was diagnosed with a mine-explosive injury and contusion. In addition, a resident of Kherson, who was hit by a Russian drone the day before, asked for medical help. A 42-year-old man received a mine-explosive injury. Also yesterday evening in the Dnipro district of Kherson, the occupiers dropped explosives from a drone on a civilian. A 55-year-old man went to the hospital on his own. He has a landmine injury and a contusion. It became known that around nine o'clock in the morning in the Dnipro district of Kherson, the Russian military attacked a person with a UAV. A 33-year-old man was injured as a result of dropping ammunition from the drone. The victim was taken to the hospital with a mine-explosive injury. Yesterday at approximately 18:00, the Russian army dropped explosives from a drone on a 50-year-old man in the Dnipro district. The victim received an explosive injury and a head injury. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day the occupiers inflicted 349 strikes on 12 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region. A 61-year-old woman and 29- and 58-year-old men were wounded as a result of Russian attacks in the Vasyliv district.

Title: Here we can only offer ZHMURki! — -Birds of Magyar- continue to spectacularly destroy the enemy
Description: The video was published on the battalion channel. A special feature of this plot was the fact that Russian soldiers were blown to pieces after being hit by our drones. -The meat grinder is tough in this part. I do not recommend for the faint of heart. Everyone else, sweet to the exhalation of worms, should get back to normal. If I overdid something, I'm sorry,- battalion commander Robert Brovdy honestly warned before watching the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 414th battalion of unmanned aerial systems -Birds of Magyar- as part of the marines demonstrated various deaths of Russian attack aircraft from Ukrainian drones

Title: Rehabilitation of the future: challenges and innovations in the field of medicine were discussed in ...
Description: The conference was held for the second time by RECOVERY, a national network of rehabilitation centers for wounded soldiers. More than 350 participants - representatives of 70 medical institutions, military, government officials, philanthropists - gathered at the event for a professional discussion on evidence-based methods of recovery after combat injuries and an exchange of experiences on the possibilities of implementing innovative solutions in the field of medicine and rehabilitation. Addressing the conference participants, the founder of the project emphasized the importance of educational initiatives for the development of the rehabilitation industry. -RECOVERY centers are the best in terms of equipment and interior, and the specialists, in my opinion, are good in all centers. We invite everyone, not just RECOVERY network specialists, to the training. Our responsibility is to train all rehabilitation professionals, both from the private sector and from public institutions. We will also start a new project on psychological rehabilitation, and it will be powerful. We will not stop there, I promise,- he noted. The first day of the event was devoted to discussing how the state organizes military rehabilitation, how patients go from injury to recovery, as well as ensuring the quality of rehabilitation services. Reports were made by representatives of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Ukraine, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, the Ministry of Health of Ukraine, the Ministry of Veterans Affairs of Ukraine and the National Health Service of Ukraine. -Earlier there were specialists in Ukraine, but there were only a few of them. The 2014 war gave impetus to rehabilitation in Ukraine. In 2020, the rehabilitation law came into force, multidisciplinary rehabilitation teams appeared, and finally full-fledged development began. We entered 2022 with a completely different rehabilitation than it was in 2014, and today we continue to grow. Such measures, in particular, give rise to a professional discussion about what the rehabilitation of the future should be,- said Oksana Sukhorukova, head of the Department of Health Protection at the Ministry of Defense. The experience of military personnel who suffered a combat injury and the process of returning to service or reintegration into civilian society were discussed separately. Attention was also paid to the psychological support of military personnel, in particular, consideration was given to how to help them avoid repeated injuries and restore their personal lives. -We strive to make the recovery process after an injury as comfortable and full of care as possible. We want our defenders to feel the fullness of life again in all its areas: physical activity, emotional stability and in the restoration of sexual life,- said the founder of the RECOVERY project. On the second day, experts discussed the importance of early detection and comprehensive treatment of peripheral nervous system injuries for the preservation and restoration of limb functions in military personnel. We emphasized the importance of reconstructive maxillofacial surgery after combat injuries for the further recovery and full life of our defenders. Considerable attention was paid to the systematic approach to the return of mental health, including the assessment of the psychological state, methods of correcting sleep disorders, and features of the rehabilitation of defenders released from captivity. The representatives of the network shared their experience of working with multiple injuries, which are often accompanied by significant bone defects, deep burns, vision and hearing impairments. The program of the event included master classes, in particular, on the methods of electroneuromyography for nerve injuries, and mirror therapy for the treatment of pain. Special attention was paid to the training of personnel and the level of postgraduate education in the field of rehabilitation medicine, which is a key element of quality care. The international experience of training doctors was analyzed together with experts from the USA, Israel and Singapore. The issue of management in rehabilitation medicine was separately considered, in particular the experience of Russian-Ukrainian war veteran Oleksandr Teren, who emphasized the importance of correct communication during military recovery. Emphasizing the partnership between the state and the private sector, Nataliya Husak, head of the National Health Service of Ukraine, noted: -Building the rehabilitation system in Ukraine, we clearly understand that we are not alone. The state is not alone, medical professionals, defenders are certainly not alone. We have a large number of international partners, public figures and benefactors. We and the RECOVERY network share common values ​​- people-centeredness and dignity, so I am sure that together we can improve the quality and accessibility of the medical field in Ukraine.- The RECOVERY national network envisages the development of a professional community, which is why it regularly organizes professional programs to acquire new knowledge and practical skills. Thus, doctors have the opportunity to exchange practical experience with colleagues, to master modern and innovative methods of rehabilitation. To date, more than 3,000 doctors have already participated in various events aimed at improving their qualifications, and continue their continuous professional development with the aim of increasing efficiency in the provision of medical, consultative and rehabilitation services. As reported by ArmyInform, u The largest center for wounded soldiers of the RECOVERY national network has opened in Chernivtsi.

Title: -They took off their shoes to cross the Tisza - they were told that it was shallow there-: how -sche...
Description: This was reported by the spokesman of the State Border Service on the broadcast of the -Edyny Novyny- telethon Andriy Demchenko of Ukraine. However, according to Andrii Demchenko, some cases of illegal crossing of state borders still happen. And they impress even border guards who have already seen a lot. -There was a case when people took off their shoes to cross the Tisza River. Those who promised them assistance assured them that it was shallow. People were washed away by the current, and they were saved by the fact that they were able to cling to the driftwood and reach the island. From there, they were already calling to save them,- Andriy Demchenko said. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Russian missiles in Odessa: a non-residential building caught fire in the city
Description: This was informed Oleg Kiper, the head of Odesa OVA. One person was injured and his condition is being confirmed. According to him, a fire broke out in a garage in Odesa as a result of shelling. Rescuers are working to eliminate the consequences of the impact. In addition, due to the fall of fragments of one of the rockets, dry grass caught fire on the territory of the region, which was extinguished independently, without the involvement of units of the State Emergency Service. Law enforcement and emergency services continue to record the aftermath of the Russian attack. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day the occupiers inflicted 349 blows on 12 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region. A 61-year-old woman and 29- and 58-year-old men were injured as a result of Russian attacks in the Vasyliv district.

Title: In Volyn, more than 200,000 people are without electricity after the Russian missile attack
Description: This was reported by the head of Volynska OVA, Ivan Rudnytskyi. -Missiles were directed at critical infrastructure. Fortunately, there were no casualties. There are damaged private farm buildings. It will also affect power outages in Volyn,- the report says. All important infrastructure, which remained without electricity, has been transferred to generators. The headquarters of the TPP and National Emergency were assembled to eliminate the consequences of the enemy attack. The fire has already been extinguished. All relevant services are working to restore heat, water and electricity supply as soon as possible. -We are putting into operation additional unbreakable points, where there will be light, internet and heat,- added the head of OVA. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russian troops > struck Kharkiv Oblast, causing damage to infrastructure and the death of civilians.

Title: The water is rising in a unique area: in the north of Kharkiv Oblast, defenders are resisting the oc...
Description: The commander of the UAV platoon of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after the Kosh Ataman spoke about this on the broadcast of the -Edyny Novyni- telethon Ivan Sirka with the call sign -Cat-. — With the deterioration of weather conditions, the situation became more complicated, the enemy has now pulled up reserves, active assault actions have been renewed. The enemy is advancing in small groups of infantry, in this they are stable, nothing changes. Heavy armored vehicles are not applicable, he said. The military explained what makes the area in the Liptsi district unique. — This location is unique in that we have a forest-steppe zone intersected with the SMT development of a small urban-type village. The reservoir adds its uniqueness — it is small, located in a lowland, and makes very [significant] corrections, the drone commander said. The high water level makes it difficult for the Ukrainian military to stay at their positions and carry out logistics. - Now everything is complicated by the fact that we are facing not only the enemy, but also weather and natural phenomena. It is because of this reservoir that the water is rising now, and in our positions it makes it very difficult for our maximally coordinated movement actions, and in general, the presence of personnel directly in these lowlands. The situation is very difficult and the water level is very high, - said the defender. He assured that the Ukrainian military knows how to solve the mentioned problems, because this is not their first military winter, and they respond promptly and professionally to challenges from nature. Voyyskovyi also explained the significance of Liptsi for the defense of Kharkiv. — As for Liptsi, their geographical position is a very strategic settlement, on its outskirts there are operational heights that, if God forbid, will be lost, then this will give a direct view of the city of Kharkiv itself and the approaches to it. This will make our logistics very difficult. If the enemy starts to use direct strikes with artillery systems, it will be very difficult for us to move, to store our ammunition, - explained the fighter with the call sign -Cat-. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Kharkiv Oblast the enemy is -covered- by fog, but artificial intelligence helps to detect it, the -Charter- brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine carried out a successful offensive and is entrenched in new positions.

Title: Ukrainian aviation struck the enemy's personnel
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. However, our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying troops and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. Yesterday, the aviation, missile forces and artillery of the Defense Forces made two strikes on the areas of concentration of personnel and anti-aircraft defense systems of the enemy. We will remind you that last The loss of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,220 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed a tank, two armored fighting vehicles, 22 artillery systems, 45 UAVs of the operational-tactical level, 60 vehicles and 10 units of special equipment of the occupiers. As ArmiyaInform reported, The Armed Forces of the Russian Federation stopped 157 attacks of Russia: the enemy is aggressively advancing in the East.

Title: Rocket attack on Kharkiv: industrial buildings were destroyed and residential buildings were damaged
Description: reported the head of Kharkiv OVA Oleg Synegubov about this. Today, as a result of a rocket attack on Kharkiv, the production buildings of the enterprise and the glazing of the windows of a multi-storey residential building were damaged. According to the head of the OVA, yesterday in the village of Bily Kolodyaz, an FPV drone hit a T-150 tractor that was in a field. Two men, aged 38 and 42, died as a result of the impact, and three more - aged 39, 44 and 61 - were injured. In addition, an FPV drone with a fuse fell in the city of Kupyansk, but did not detonate. A car was also damaged as a result of dropping ammunition from the drone. As Oleg Synegubov noted, two private houses were damaged as a result of the fire by FPV drones. In response to the threat of shelling, 121 people were evacuated from Kupyansk and Borivsk directions. As reported by ArmyInform, pieces of rockets fell in Kyiv on enterprise: there is damage.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: In Kyiv, pieces of rockets fell on an enterprise: there is damage
Description: This was reported by the head of the KMVA, Serhii Popko. Previously, several farm buildings and a truck were damaged. The fire was contained, and there were no reports of casualties. We will remind, Russian troops launched a missile attack on Kyiv. In the Dnipro district of the capital, debris was recorded falling onto an open area. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy took 14 ships to the Black Sea: there is a high threat of a missile attack.

Title: More than two dozen artillery systems and 1,220 infantrymen: the General Staff of the Armed Forces o...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 28.11.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, The Armed Forces of Ukraine deterred 157 Russian attacks: the enemy strongly advances in the East.

Title: Very accurate, very strong, very bright - powerful bomb attacks on the enemy in the South
Description: Mykola Kolesnyk, commander of the 422nd Luftwaffe unmanned systems battalion of the Unmanned Systems Forces, told on the Army TV stream. -Weather conditions do not allow us to use our capacity in full force. This is reconnaissance, corrections, the task of striking deep into the enemy to beat his logistics... We will wait for the sun, and then we will see. He showed a video of the strikes of our aviation, when the enemy's command posts and command and observation posts were destroyed with high-precision bombs. In the last weather, we participated in the confirmation of these strikes. Very accurate, very strong, very bright, and most importantly - effective,- noted Mykola Kolesnyk. According to him, the tactics of enemy assaults have not changed. -We are working on a technique that throws the infantry closer to our positions. There they hide in holes and then try to storm our infantry. So the main task is to prevent them from accumulating and conducting active assault actions,- said Mykola Kolisnyk. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the 114th tactical aviation brigade interacted with the drones of the 422nd battalion of unmanned systems of the SBS of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces strike on places where equipment is stored and shelters of the occupiers on one of the operational directions.

Title: Debris of the rocket fell in one of the districts of the capital
Description: This was reported by the head of KMVA Serhiy Popko. According to preliminary information, there were no injuries or damage. The operational summary data is currently being refined. Serhii Popko also called on the city's residents to stay in shelters until the end of the air raid alert.

Title: The Armed Forces of Ukraine repelled 157 Russian attacks: the enemy is aggressively advancing in the...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. In addition, it carried out almost 4,800 attacks, of which 154 were from anti-aircraft guns, and used 1,672 kamikaze drones for strikes. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of Ivanivka, Torske, Vasyukivka, Nikiforivka, Markove, Toretsk, Panteleimonivka, Myrolyubivka, Velyka Novosilka, Novosilka, Stupochki, Dovga Balka and Minkivka. In the areas of the settlements of Vovchansk and Tyche on the Kharkiv direction, over the past day, there have been five enemy assaults on the positions of our defenders. 17 attacks by occupiers were recorded in the Kupyansk direction. The defense forces repulsed offensive actions near Kolisnikivka, Zagryzovy, Zeleny Gay and Kruglyakivka. The enemy attacked four times in the Lyman direction. The main offensive efforts of the enemy were concentrated in the districts of Grekivka, Novoehorivka, and Torsky. In the Kramatorsk direction, the occupiers attacked once in the Bila Hora area. On the Toretsk direction the enemy made six attacks near Toretsk, while the enemy actively used bomber aircraft, dropping up to ten guided bombs. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 37 offensive actions of the aggressor near Myrolyubivka, Promen, Lysivka, Dachensky, Zhovto and Chumatsky. On the Kurakhiv direction, the defense forces repelled 39 attacks. The main efforts of the enemy were concentrated in Sontsivka, Berestki, Kurakhovo, Dalnyi, Elizavetivka, Antonivka and Hanivka districts. With the support of aviation in the Vremivsk direction, the enemy carried out 18 attacks on our positions near Trudovoy, Kostyantynopolsky, Rozlyv, Rozdolny, Suhy Yali and Novodarivka. In the Dnieper direction Russian invaders attacked our positions six times. They were fiercely repulsed and suffered losses. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. An operation is underway in the Kursk region, where during the day Ukrainian defenders repelled 18 attacks by invaders. It will be recalled that the Russian invaders lost 1,220 people last day. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed a tank, two armored fighting vehicles, 22 artillery systems, 45 UAVs of the operational-tactical level, 60 vehicles and 10 units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: After that, an incendiary munition flies into the enemy's trench - our attack aircraft repel attacks...
Description: The video of the battles was published on the battalion channel. In one of the scenes, our FPV drone hits an occupant, but the wounded one continues to walk towards our dugout. He has to be stopped by a well-placed throw of a grenade. In the second scene, three Russians are driven into a hole, a drone flies over them, and then an incendiary munition is dropped there. Movement is no longer observed. -Near Novogrodivka, Russians die in whole groups, but they continue their attempts to climb the -Rock-. However, as always, it ends with sure death for the occupiers. It seems that the enemy finally realized that hiding from the eyes of the -Rock- is a waste of time, so we show you another cut of the destruction of the occupiers in the open area near Pokrovsk,- the battalion commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 425th assault battalion -Skala- shkolu/-> threw thermobaric grenades into the dugout with the occupants, having completed the work that is now usually assigned drones

Title: The enemy has taken 14 ships into the Black Sea: there is a high threat of a missile attack
Description: The Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine inform about this. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. There are no enemy ships in the Mediterranean. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, tests were planned, and combat launches were carried out: the commander of the Navy told about the first attack by -Neptune-.

Title: Almost 350 Russian strikes per day on Zaporozhye: people were injured
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA. Russian troops carried out an air strike on Novodarivka. In addition, 194 UAVs of various modifications attacked Bilenka, Stepnohirsk, Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Novoandriivka, Shcherbaki, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Malynivka, Biloghirya, Novodarivka, and Olgivske. According to the head of the OVA, 7 shellings from the RSZV covered Shcherbaki, Novodarivka and Novodanilivka. Also, 147 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Malaya Tokmachka, Malynyvka, Biloghirya, Novodarivka, and Olhivsko. -We received 6 reports about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure,- added Ivan Fedorov. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day the Russians attacked Nikopol region 14 times, the enemy attacked with artillery, kamikaze drones and dropped ammunition from UAV

Title: The fiercest battles continue in the Pokrovsky direction: our soldiers are not giving up their posit...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The enemy carried out 11 airstrikes on the territory of Ukraine, shooting down 22 anti-aircraft missiles, and used 648 kamikaze drones to destroy them. He carried out almost 4,000 attacks on the positions of our troops and population centers. On the Kharkiv direction, the enemy attacked five times near Vovchansk and Tikhoi. One battle is still going on. In the Kupyansk direction, the enemy tried to advance to our positions near Kolisnykyvka, Zagryzovy, Zeleny Gay and Kruglyakivka 17 times during the day. All enemy attacks were repelled by the Defense Forces. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked four times in the Grekivka, Novoyehorivka, and Torsky areas. Our soldiers stopped all the enemy's efforts. In addition, the occupiers' aviation carried out anti-aircraft missile strikes on Ivanovka and Torsk. In the Kramatorsk direction the enemy was active in the area of ​​White Mountain. Ukrainian units repelled one assault of the invaders. Vasyukivka, Nikiforivka and Markove were hit by Russian aerial bombs. In the Toretsk direction, with the support of aviation, the enemy carried out offensive actions against the positions of our troops six times. All attacks were repelled by Ukrainian soldiers. Also, the enemy tried 35 times to wedge into our defenses in the Pokrovsky direction in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Lysivka, Dachenske, Zhovte and Chumatske settlements. Our units repelled twenty-six attacks, the fighting continues, the enemy's losses are being verified. On the Kurakhiv direction, the enemy attacked our positions 36 times. The most active was in the Sontsivka, Berestki, Kurakhovo, Dalnyi, Elizavetivka, Antonivka and Hanivka districts, where Ukrainian defenders repelled 30 attacks, six clashes are still ongoing. In the Vremivsk direction, our troops repelled fourteen enemy attacks near Trudovo, Kostiantynopolsky, Rozlyv, Rozdolny, Suhy Yaliv, and Novodarivka, and four more clashes are still ongoing. The occupiers actively used aviation: they dropped the KAB on Novosilka, and also hit Velika Novosilka with unguided air missiles. In the Dnieper direction, the enemy does not stop trying to knock our units out of their positions, where during the day they carried out six unsuccessful assaults on the positions of Ukrainian soldiers. In Kurshchyna, Ukrainian defenders repelled 16 enemy attacks, the fighting continues.
