Aviation, anti-aircraft missile units, electronic warfare equipment and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine were involved in repelling the attack. As of 09:00, air defense shot down 36 enemy drones in Kyiv, Chernihiv, Sumy, Kharkiv, Poltava, Zhytomyr, Khmelnytskyi, and Mykolaiv regions. In addition, 48 UAVs were lost in location, presumably due to active anti-aircraft defense of the Defense Forces, 5 drones left the controlled airspace towards Belarus, Russia and the temporarily occupied territories. Private and multi-apartment houses and property of citizens in the Kyiv region were damaged due to the fall of enemy UAV debris. Preliminary - no victims and no injuries. As reported by ArmyInform, the threat of an attack from the Black Sea: enemy took out the missile carrier.

Title: Ruins after shelling: 11 people were injured by Russian attacks in the Kherson region
Description: This was notified by the head of Kherson OVA Oleksandr Prokudin. Antonivka, Sadove, Prydniprovske, Bilozerka, Stanislav, Veletenske, Shiroka Balka, Mykilske, Ingulets, Beryslav, Odradokamyanka, Novovorontsovka, Shlyakhove, Mylove and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. According to the head of the OVA, the Russian military attacked the residential quarters of the populated areas of the region, in particular damaged a high-rise building and 10 private houses. The occupiers also mutilated a gas pipeline, a service station, a garage and private cars. As reported by ArmyInform, during occupiers made 369 strikes on 12 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: The threat of a strike from the Black Sea: the enemy has withdrawn a missile carrier
Description: This was reported by the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. There are no ships in the Mediterranean. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, tests were planned, and combat launches were carried out: the commander of the Navy told about the first attack by -Neptune-.

Title: Heaven's punishment in Toretsk is our bomber
Description: The video was published on November 27 on the brigade's channel. Thermal imaging cameras were good at finding the occupants in the dark, and a drop flew in their wake. Sometimes one round was enough to hit two Russians. -Don't run away, Rusak, or you'll die of exhaustion. Operators of the 2nd mechbat catch the occupiers who are running around Toretsk. Rusnia hears an ominous buzzing overhead and tries to run away, but our drones skillfully work with resets,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the units of the Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytsky crushed the enemy armored column with infantry in the area Great Novosilka.

Title: Defense forces restrained 224 Russian assaults: the enemy intensified the offensive in two direction...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In addition, it carried out more than four thousand attacks, 142 of them from rocket salvo fire systems, and engaged about 1,300 kamikaze drones for attacks. The aggressor carried out airstrikes in the areas of settlements of Bilovoda, Spaske, Sumy Region; Pitomnyk, Visoka Yaruga, Kurylivka, Kharkiv region; Ivanivka, Lyman, Zarichne, Sloviansk, Toretsk, Katerynivka, Kramatorsk, Zelene, Pokrovsk, Kurakhove, Uspenivka, Komar of the Donetsk region; Pavlivka, Mala Tokmachka, Temyrivka, Zaporizhzhia region. Last day, in the Kharkiv direction, there were five enemy attacks in the areas of Vovchansk settlements, in addition, the enemy actively used bomber aircraft. In the Kupyansk direction there were 18 attacks by the occupiers during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults in the direction of Hryhorivka, Zeleny Gayu, Zagryzovo, Senkovo, Kolisnikivka, Synkivka, and Andriivka. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked 21 times. Tried to advance near Grekivka, Druzhkivka, Cherneshchyna, Makiivka, Terniv, Torsky, and in the Serebryansk Forestry area. Yesterday, the enemy once tried to dislodge our defenders from their positions in the Siversk direction districts of Hryhorivka with assault actions. There was no success. Thirteen assaults took place last day in the Kramatorsk direction in the areas of Chasiv Yar, Stupochki, Bila Gora and Predtechine settlements. In the Toretsk direction the enemy actively used bomber aircraft, carried out six attacks in the areas of the settlements of Dilyivka, Shcherbynovka and Toretsk. In the Pokrovsky direction our defenders stopped 59 assault and offensive actions of the aggressor in the direction of Myrolyubivka, Krasny Yar, Lysivka, Dachensky, Chumatsky, Pustinka and Novoy Trud. The greatest concentration of enemy attacks was near the village of Promin. In the Kurakhiv direction the defense forces repelled 46 enemy assaults. The enemy carried out airstrikes on populated areas. The main offensive efforts of the enemy were concentrated in the districts of Dachny, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhovo, Dalny, Katerynivka, Elizavetivka, Hanivka, Antonivka, Berestkiv, Zori and Sontsivka. In the Vremivsk direction the enemy carried out 17 assaults on our positions near the settlements of Trudove, Kostiantynopolske, Rozdolne, Novoandriivka, Vesely Hay, Rozlyv and Rivnopil. In the Gulyajpil and Orihiv directions the invaders did not carry out offensive actions, but they actively used aviation. In the Dnieper direction Russian invaders attacked our positions five times. They were fiercely repulsed and suffered losses. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. In general, the last day's loss Russian invaders numbered 1,580 people. Also, Ukrainian soldiers destroyed 14 tanks, 48 ​​armored combat vehicles, 24 artillery systems, 1 rocket salvo fire system, 1 air defense vehicle, 64 UAVs of operational-tactical level, 84 units of automobile equipment and 4 units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: Where it is narrow, there is also Russian. Burning - the use of enemy fortifications to destroy the ...
Description: The video of the combat operation was made public on the channel of the -North- operational command. Columns of Russians trying to use the passages between the rows of concrete pyramids ran into our mines and exploded brightly. But the enemy drove again and again, and again exploded on mines. -Dozens of destroyed equipment and hundreds of eliminated enemies. The Kursk operation continues. - commented on the video in OK -Pivnich-. As reported by ArmyInform, marines repelled powerful assault of the Russians in Kurshchyna.

Title: Propagandists launched an anti-Ukrainian article in the media: why are they in Greece?
Description: On November 26, the site -Banking news- with a reach of 6.5 million users in Greece published article with just a wild set of Russian narratives. It is dedicated to the so-called -Ukrainian nationalist battalions -Azov-, -Aidar-, -Kraken- and others-, the destruction of which, in the opinion of Greek propagandists this time, is -one of the main goals of the Russian invasion of Ukraine-. In the material, the Greek pseudo-journalists quote the sanctioned ex-deputy of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine Spyridon Kilinkarov, Russian military analysts Oleksandr Sharkovsky and Oleksandr Perendzhiev. They accuse units of the Armed Forces of various war crimes typical of daily Russian propaganda. The material was obviously made at the behest of Russia and is spreading through the Greek-speaking segment of the Internet with the clear aim of discrediting Ukraine, the Defense Forces of our country and specific units. Such publications are made to undermine the confidence of foreigners in Ukraine and to reduce their support. In October, the President of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelenskyi, and the Prime Minister of Greece, Kyriakos Mitsotakis, signed the Security Cooperation Agreement in Brussels, which confirms Greece's readiness to continue providing the most urgent defense needs of Ukraine. Therefore, such information -leaks- specifically in Greece can be directed against a specific security agreement.

Title: Almost 50 BBMs and 1,580 occupants: the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine announced the l...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 27.11.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, over 200 assaults per day: enemy strongly attacks in the East.

Title: Almost 50 BBMs and 1,580 occupants: the General Staff of the Armed Forces of the Ukrainian Armed For...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 27.11.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, over 200 assaults per day: enemy strongly attacks in the East.

Title: Attack on Zaporizhzhia: 369 strikes on 12 settlements per day
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhzhya OVA. Russian troops carried out 4 airstrikes on Novodarivka, Shcherbaki, Malya Tokmachka and Pavlivka. In addition, 186 UAVs of various modifications attacked Lobkovo, Primorske, Gulyaipole, Novoandriivka, Shcherbaki, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Malynivka, Biloghirya, Novodarivka, and Olhivske. According to the head of the OVA, 6 shelling from RSZV covered Lobkovo, Novodarivka and Novodanilivka. Also, 173 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Malaya Tokmachka, Novodarivka, and Olhivskyi. -We received 12 reports about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. Civilians were not harmed,- added Ivan Fedorov. As reported by ArmyInform, during the night attack of Russian drones on Kyiv debris of downed drones fell in the Dnipro district of the capital.

Title: More than 200 assaults per day: the enemy is aggressively attacking in the East
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. In the Kharkiv direction there were five skirmishes with the Russian invaders. All of them in the Vovchansk region were repulsed by Ukrainian soldiers. The settlement of Pytomnyk was hit by three guided bombs. In the Kupyansk direction the enemy tried 17 times to dislodge our units from their positions near Hryhorivka, Zeleny Gay, Zagryzovy, Senkovy, Kolisnykyvka, Sinkivka, and Andriivka. One guided aerial bomb was dropped by the enemy on the village of Kurylivka. Twenty-one times the enemy attacked in the Lymansky direction, trying to advance in the directions of Grekivka, Druzhkivka, Cherneshchyna, Makiivka, Terniv, and Torsky. In addition, the settlements of Ivanivka, Lyman, Zarichne were hit by airstrikes by nine anti-aircraft missiles. In the Severskyi direction, the occupiers attacked in the Hryhorivka district, without success. At the same time, the enemy launched an air strike with a guided bomb on Sloviansk. The areas of the settlements of Chasiv Yar, Stupochki, Bila Gora, Predtechine and Dilyivka were attacked by the enemy in the Kramatorsk direction 13 times. The situation in the direction is under control, the Defense Forces firmly hold the occupied lines. The enemy tried six times to wedge into our defenses on the Toretsk direction. The occupiers operated in the areas of Diliivka, Shcherbynivka and Toretsk settlements, all attacks were repulsed, the enemy had no success. Toretsk, Katerynivka and Kramatorsk were hit from the air, in total the enemy dropped six guided bombs. The enemy is intensively attacking the Ukrainian defenders on the Pokrovsky direction. Here, the aggressor carried out 32 assault and offensive actions. The Russian occupiers are most active in Myrolyubivka, Promenya, Krasny Yar, Lysivka, and Chumatsky districts. In total, 29 attacks in that direction have already been repelled by Ukrainian defenders, and three more clashes, in the Pustinka and Novy Trud districts, are ongoing. Available at that time, according to information, the losses of the aggressor in this direction amounted to 169 people killed and 219 wounded. A car and a motorcycle were destroyed. In addition, one more car and three BMPs were seriously damaged. In the Kurakhiv direction there were 39 combat clashes. The invaders remain highly active, trying to advance in the areas of Dachne, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhove, Dalnye, Katerynivka, Elizavetivka, Hanivka and Antonivka settlements. Units of the Defense Forces repelled 26 enemy attacks, 13 attacks in the Berestki, Zori and Sontsivka districts are still ongoing. In this direction, the enemy lost 90 killed and wounded. Two BMPs and one ATV were destroyed. Three BMPs, one gun and one car were damaged. In the Vremivsk direction our soldiers stopped 12 attacks by the occupiers in the areas of Trudove, Kostiantynopolske, Roszdolne, Novoandriivka and Rivnopil settlements. Four more skirmishes in the area of ​​Vesely Gai settlement continue until now. In the Gulyajpil direction the enemy did not conduct active operations. In the Orikhov direction, the invaders actively used aviation in the areas of the settlements of Mala Tokmachka, Temyrivka and Pavlivka, dropping a total of ten guided aerial bombs. In the Dnieper direction our soldiers repelled the attacks of the Russian invaders on the positions of the Ukrainian army five times. The opponent had no success. The Defense Forces of Ukraine continue the operation in the Kursk Oblast. Enemy aviation strikes with guided aerial bombs on the territory of Russia. At the moment, it is known about 11 air strikes with the use of 17 anti-aircraft missiles and 196 artillery strikes, including four from rocket salvo systems. There were no significant changes in the situation in other areas. The department also honored the soldiers of the 60th separate mechanized Ingulets brigade, the 71st separate hunting brigade, the 12th special purpose brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine -Azov-, the 141st separate infantry brigade, as well as the 126th separate territorial defense brigade. which are extremely complex conditions deter the attacks of the enemy's superior forces, cause him irreparable losses. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the battalion of shock air defense systems -Achilles- /->destroys enemy equipment and Russian personnel in Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: Will South Korea enter the war on the side of Ukraine: expert's opinion
Description: -At the beginning of November, everyone admitted that the North Korean military was on the territory of the Russian Federation and may even have taken part in hostilities. We had first very cautious assessments, then we had positive assessments. Now we will receive them in doses, because this information still has a great political and diplomatic weight. Therefore, it will not appear quickly. Some will try to hide it, but we will try to get it as soon as possible, use it as soon as possible. The question now will be whether international institutions are ready to do something about it. As we can see from the latest reaction of most international organizations, unfortunately, they are not ready to act according to even their own statutes. That is, how they should react to Russian aggression, how they should react to Iran's actions, how they should react to North Korea's actions, no one is reacting. Therefore, now the North Korea factor, most likely, will be the catalyst that the world order that exists, those interstate organizations that exist, will be forced to change their approaches to events and to their activities. As for the reaction of other countries, in particular, South Korea, here it is necessary to know their military doctrine, how it should react to North Korea's indirect aggression against another state. But we are already seeing the -first swallows- appearing in the international space. We know that North Korea will also demand the participation of a Russian contingent in a possible war against South Korea. I don't think South Korea is very excited about that prospect. After all, the Russian army is absolutely different. There are units that we despise, but there are also units that give us a huge amount of trouble. And South Korea, the United States of America, and NATO also understand this very well. So the activity of other countries will depend on how well their doctrinal documents correspond to the existing situation, on the one hand, and on the other hand, how ready the military-political leadership of other countries is to react to the situation that is emerging.

Title: More than 150 shots per day: CAESAR crushes Russians in Donetsk region. Reportage
Description: We arrive at the specified point, where the gunners are already waiting for us. Just like us, in body armor and helmets. Because it can already fly here. - Follow us. We pull into the position, unload, our car drives away. Then you stop by. Here the safety rules are written in blood, so it is better not to break them. Let's go. We will drive past the mines. Some were destroyed by the arrivals, others continue to work, despite the approach of the front. From time to time, towering tericonas are visible from the road. Fields between them. The harvest from them has been collected, but the winter crops have not been planted. Apparently, local farmers are waiting for what will be here in the spring. The road is getting worse, there are more and more potholes, as well as tracks of heavy equipment. We turn around at one of the landings, drive through the field. The front car stops, passengers get out of it, the car starts. Next, we will land. We enter the landing, among the trees we see the CAESAR self-propelled gun, hidden under a canopy made of a metal mesh, on which a camouflage net is draped. We are met by the gun crew. Her commander, sergeant Andrii, is of medium height and wiry. He has a phone and a tablet, necessary for combat work, sticking out behind the automatic stores on his body armor. We welcome you. Andrei says that he is waiting for the goal. If we're lucky and the target is there, we'll go to the fireground and see CAESAR in action. Meanwhile, Andriy talks about his gun. — Before that, I fought on the Soviets: -Hyacinti-B-, D-20, -Vsti-B- and I can say that CAESAR, if compared with them, is like -Mercedes- and -Zhiguli-. - What is its greatest advantage? - It is maneuverable. On CAESAR, you arrive at the firing line, lay down in a minute, quickly work and drive away, and you don’t wait to see if it will fly in response or not, as is the case with trailed guns. And it's coming fast now. Both -Lancets- and FPV drones began to fly far, and enemy artillery, and now also KABs were added. So speed becomes an important advantage. - And what, do you actually have time to spread out in a minute? - You will see for yourself if there is a goal. In this regard, CAESAR works clearly. We arrived at the place, the gunner entered the coordinates, so we are ready to shoot. - And what was the highest rate of fire you had in practice? - The same as in TTX, 6 shots per minute. You can't do it faster than the manufacturer's set, because there are a lot of sensors that you can't fool. But there is no need, because here everything is done for the safety of shooting. And conveniences. The same automatic loader helps a lot, because you don't need to stuff the shells with your hands, and they weigh a lot. Once our CAESAR was under repair and we were working on a domestic gun. I manually loaded 18 rounds and tore a muscle in my stomach. So, if offered, would never change CAESAR to anything else. CAESAR has a crew of four. According to French standards, there should be 5 of them, but then it is too cramped in the cabin, which for the crew is their native home, especially now that it has become cold. They joke that they take off their shoes when they enter the cabin. — When I worked at the towed artillery, we had to constantly dig dugouts nearby so that there was a place to live and hide during shelling. CAESAR with its armored cabin is much more comfortable in this sense. - Have there been such approaches when the armor protected? Ironically, it is at this very moment that a rather loud -babah- is heard. Whether it's a departure or an arrival, I involuntarily bend over, the gunners just look around. — Once a -Lancet- flew at us, hit the roller. We had minor injuries, one of the hoses broke, but the car was not damaged, the damage was quickly repaired and we continued to work. Andriy and his crew work on the older version of CAESAR (produced in 2007), they say that they would not like to switch to the new one. — Because the new one is much larger: there are four axles instead of three, it is longer and higher, it is difficult to hide it in the landing, you have to dig a much larger caponir, and it is not so maneuverable. And there are much more electronics there, which increases the probability of some kind of breakdown. Of course, something can break in us too, because we work actively, and this is iron, it is not eternal. But we repair something on the spot, our repairmen trained in France work with something, and the enterprise that provides maintenance is already engaged in serious repairs. - There is a stereotype that Western equipment is too poor for the conditions of our war. - It all depends on service. If it's serviced well, it works well. CAESAR is a gentle machine. But if you take care of it correctly, follow all the rules for maintenance, then it works well. Andriy finally gets the coordinates of the target. — Two shells, we are working to ban actions. This is when enemy activity is detected, fire is placed on that area to force them to abandon their plans. — We are leaving for the firing position! The crew gets into the cockpit, the CAESAR quickly moves out of hiding and heads to the pre-equipped firing position. There are several such positions, they are constantly changed to confuse the enemy and prevent him from hitting. According to Andrii, his CAESAR often takes part in counter-battery combat, that is, strikes at enemy artillery. — We work on absolutely everything: from jet artillery to barrel artillery. We worked against both -Hyacinta- and -Msty-, we reach everything. We also hit mortars, anti-aircraft guns, even anti-aircraft systems. In the Vugledara area, they once worked on the Strela air defense system. It is clear that we are hitting and being hit, so we need to act quickly. CAESAR unexpectedly pulls into a forest strip. At first it seems that it is going straight to the trees, but then you notice a carefully cut gap in the wall of the trunks. CAESAR fits perfectly into it and falls under the arch of trees that cover from above. The crew leaves the cabin. The gunner turns on the computer and lowers the hydraulic plate, which provides a stop during firing. The driver prepares the gunpowder needed to hit the targets, and the loader programs the detonators, which are wound onto the projectile. The gun commander dictates the coordinates of the target, the gunner enters them into the computer. The barrel of the gun is raised and aimed. The branches in front of him are cut so as not to interfere with the projectile. CAESAR is ready to fire in exactly one minute. Second to second. - Fire! — Shot! If it wasn't for the headphones, it would have been very loud. The next projectile is already on the loading machine, which delivers it into the barrel of the gun. Followed by gunpowder, shutter closes. - Fire! — Shot! Another -babah-. Already dry leaves begin to fall picturesquely from the trees. However, the crew is not into romance. The plate rises, the barrel lowers, the computer near the gun turns off. And now CAESAR is rapidly leaving the firing position. The enemy has almost no chance to hit him in response. They just don't have time. —Mr. Andriy, what is the record for shots per day? — The maximum shot per day was 153 shots. But it is very difficult. Health minus 1. Now we are steadily firing 60 shells a day, sometimes up to 90. — But CAESAR ammunition is only 18 shells. — Yes. So we shot them, drove off and reloaded, we continue to work. — But 153 shells, that’s 9 rounds per day! — I mean, it’s difficult. — And how often do you have to change the barrel with such intensity of shooting? — It all depends on its condition. This barrel has already fired 4,000 rounds. But its condition is normal, we just take into account the correction for wear. We have such barrels that fired 6,000 shells each. Our specialists will check for wear, if it is significant, then the barrel is replaced with a new one provided by the French manufacturer. - This is the first barrel on your car? - What about you, the barrels of all the guns have already been changed three or even four times. Because we work every day, without days off. - And what is the maximum firing range? - We had 41 kilometers, it is an active-reactive projectile. Usually, we work on targets at a distance of 14 to 36 kilometers. - Have you been working with cluster ammunition for a long time? - Yes, a few days ago. We shoot them regularly. - What about the famous American -Excaliburs-? - Many used to work. And worked very well. In 2023, when the enemy was advancing on Vugledar in the winter, we fired 52 Excaliburs in one day. This is a very good projectile. Because if you work with ordinary projectiles, you need 2-3 shots for close range. And -excalibur- shot one - and it hit the target exactly. CAESAR returns to its hideout in the landing area, where it will await new targets. During the day, the guys can rest a bit, because most of their shooting is at night. I ask for permission to hold the projectile in my hands. It weighs over 40 kilograms. I take it in my hands and understand that, even with the presence of a charging mechanism, the work of the charger is not easy. We photograph the crew against the background of his car: Andriy is the commander, Yevgeny is the gunner, Kyrylo is the driver, Bohdan is the loader. For those who don't know, CAESAR is an acronym for the French CAmion Equipé d'un Système d'ARtillerie, meaning -truck equipped with an artillery system.- This truck causes a lot of trouble for the enemy and helps our infantry a lot. We wish the boys success and good luck in their difficult but necessary combat work.

Title: Autocivilka for UBD: what will change in 2025
Description: According to article 13 of the Law, participants in hostilities, persons with disabilities as a result of the war, who personally drive their own vehicles, are exempted from mandatory civil liability insurance on the territory of Ukraine. That is, it is not necessary to issue anything. There must be documents for a car and a UBD certificate or a person with a disability due to war. But already from January 1, 2025, you will have to issue a driver's license. Article 13 of the Law suffered certain changes. And now there are no categories of citizens who are exempt from compulsory insurance. In return, combatants will receive a discount. In particular, for them, -the amount of the insurance premium under the domestic insurance contract is reduced by 50 percent.- But there are also certain nuances. The discount is provided for a vehicle that has an engine displacement of up to 2500 cubic centimeters or an electric motor power of up to and including 100 kilowatts and is owned by a combatant /strong>, provided that such vehicle is driven exclusively by the insured or by a person who also owns to preferential categories, and using a vehicle without the purpose of providing paid services for the transportation of passengers and/or cargo. Another important point is that the amendments to the Law indicate that the reduction of the insurance premium can be applied at the same time only regarding one vehicle of the insured.

Title: Seven years to the goal: in Turkey, the development of a mortar system with the possibility of 360° ...
Description: As indicates the official portal of the manufacturer, this advanced system combines high accuracy, mobility and versatility, which makes it an effective weapon for various types of combat missions, ArmiyaInform reports. The SM-81 Keskin mortar is equipped with an 81 mm barrel with a length of 1.453 meters and a manual vertical slide. The system provides full circular horizontal firing (360 degrees) and an elevation range of −5 to +82 degrees, which is manually controlled by pointers. A hydropneumatic recoil system is installed above the barrel to soften recoil. Depending on the type of ammunition, the firing range is from 100 to 6,000 meters. Shots are fired through the trigger mechanism, which allows precise control of fire. The SM-81 Keskin mortar supports both direct and indirect guidance. For direct fire, the system is equipped with a six-fold day sight, a thermal imaging camera and a laser rangefinder, which ensures accuracy of aiming at distances up to 6 thousand. meters Experts of the defense portal Army Recognition note that when firing with an indirect with guidance, the system is loaded from the muzzle and supports two options for firing: the normal mode, when the projectile falls on the fixed trigger pin, and the trigger fire, in which the striker is activated by the trigger. If the angle of the barrel is less than 30 degrees when firing with a direct aim, the system allows loading from the breech, which expands its tactical capabilities. The SM-81 Keskin is compatible with various types of standard 81mm ammunition, including high-explosive, smoke, and illumination rounds. To improve shooting accuracy and simplify control, the system has a 10.1-inch screen that displays a digital map and ballistic calculations for elevation correction and horizontal guidance. In addition, GPS/INS technologies are implemented in the system, which ensure more accurate hitting of targets even in difficult conditions. The total weight of the mortar system is 450 kg, which allows it to be installed on light trucks for high mobility on the battlefield. The diameter of the system's pedestal is 770 mm, and its height varies from 1005 mm to 1980 mm depending on the position of the barrel. In addition to being mounted on vehicles, the SM-81 Keskin mortar can be used for stationary defense of bases or other key facilities. One of the main advantages of the SM-81 Keskin is the ability to fire 360 ​​degrees without reorientation between shots. This significantly reduces the time to prepare for firing and reduces vulnerability to counter-battery fire. The system is optimized for mobile deployment and high rate of fire, making it an essential element for modern warfare that requires flexibility and precision. Specialists of the iNEWS portal underline the fact that at the level of SM-81 localization Keskin is a cost-effective solution. More than 90% of the parts and components of the mortar system were designed and manufactured by Turkish contractors. The SM-81 Keskin system is an important addition to the arsenal of today's armed forces, providing high firepower, flexibility and reliability. Its mobility, accuracy and ability to be used in various scenarios make it an effective tool for both defensive and offensive operations. SM-81 Keskin 81mm Mortar System. Video: Saver Savunma

Title: Debris of a drone damaged a house on the water in Kyiv: there are victims
Description: reported this by the head of KMVA Serhiy Popko. As a result of falling debris, a non-residential infrastructure object was damaged. It is noted that the debris fell on a house on the water in the Dnipro district, where two people were injured. One of them was hospitalized. The building was seriously damaged. Emergency services work quickly at the scene of incidents, eliminating the consequences of the attack and providing assistance to the victims. As reported by ArmyInform, Russian troops shelled Nikopol: dozens of houses and communications were damaged.

Title: Russian troops shelled Nikopol region: dozens of houses and communications were damaged
Description: This was notified by the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak. Nikopol, Marganetska, Chervonogrigorivska, Pokrovska and Myrivska communities came under attack. More than 20 private houses and 23 farm buildings were damaged. A car, several gas pipes and power lines were destroyed. Fortunately, there were no casualties or injuries. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy fired at the public stop on the occupied territory of the Kherson Oblast, the investigation is ongoing.

Title: Blown up with mines, finished off with drones and artillery: how the Russians lost $11 million at on...
Description: A video of combat work appearedon the unit's page. -Further, the enemy was finished off with drones and artillery. They broke up the assault of the Russians without a chance,- Ukrainian soldiers said. They destroyed seven BMD-4. Chasiv Yar. They destroyed the assault of the Russians without a chance - the 24th brigade destroyed seven BMD-4s. The invaders tried to mount a mechanized assault on the positions of the 24th OMBr. When trying to cross the Siverskyi Donets channel – Donbas they were met by our mines. Then the enemy was finished off with drones and artillery. pic.twitter.com/diwrZ0iGTD — 24th OMBr named after King Danilo (@24th_brigade) November 26, 2024 -The BMD-4 amphibious assault vehicle is one of the newest models enemy vehicles, they are used by elite airborne units. In this unsuccessful attack, the Muscovites lost equipment in the amount of more than 11 million dollars,- the defenders noted. As reported by ArmyInform, soldiers of the -Rarog- unmanned systems battalion of the 24th mechanized brigade named after King Danylo struck a significant amount of Russian -armor-.

Title: The enemy fired at a public stop in the occupied territory of the Kherson region, the investigation ...
Description: This is reported by the Kherson Regional Prosecutor's Office. The video shows the consequences of the impact on the public transport stop, the bus is damaged, there are injured and dead people. Under the procedural leadership of the Kherson Regional Prosecutor's Office, a pre-trial investigation into violations of the laws and customs of war has been launched. -Within the scope of the investigation, prosecutors together with investigators are taking measures to establish the circumstances of the event, as well as the exact number of victims among the civilian population. The pre-trial investigation is ongoing,- the statement said. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day, on November 26, Russian troops with drones obstrilyuyut-zhyteliv-hersonshhyny/->fired on residents of Kherson Oblast, as a result of which there are victims.

Title: - Some of the residents were frightened, others - were frightened - - fighters about the burning tra...
Description: A video of the combat operation appearedon the unit's page. -A cool fiery video from our guys! The adventures of orcs who -got lost- in the occupied part of the Zaporozhye region continue. As a result — an enchanting salute. Some of the residents -became frightened- with fright, others fled, -said the defenders of Ukraine. Earlier, ArmiyaInform showed how in Kharkiv Oblast the night FPV drones of the Achilles BpAK battalion of the 92nd Assault Brigade named after Chief of Staff Ivan Sirkdestroyeda Russian tank T-72, two Loaves and a cannon, as well as BREM, 3 Ural-4320 and BMP-2 were hit.

Title: Ignorant fakirs, who were tempted by a thousand from the occupiers, sat down for ten years
Description: This is reported by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. It is noted that a 30-year-old and a 25-year-old from Kharkiv are accused of obstructing the activities of the Armed Forces, intentional destruction of property by arson, and committing a crime based on a previous conspiracy. According to the investigation, the accused through the Telegram messenger established contact with an employee of the Russian special service, who instructed them to set fire to a serviceman's car. At the beginning of July this year, they captured a green Volkswagen Transporter on the street. Kyrgyz, after which they received instructions and an action plan from the curator. The men prepared the incendiary mixture, set the fire and filmed their actions on video to confirm the completion of the task. However, they never received the promised reward of $1,000. The accused are currently in custody, and their case will be considered by the Kharkiv Comintern District Court. Both face up to 10 years in prison. Additionally, it was established that the oldest of the suspects was involved in another arson of a serviceman's car, committed in August of this year. This case is already pending in court. As reported by ArmyInform, the SBU detained a Russian agent who wanted to blow up a police outfit in the center of Kyiv.

Title: At the border with Hungary, a father of many children was detained with a bought child
Description: About this informs the State Border Service of Ukraine. The incident happened at the -Tysa- checkpoint, where a 44-year-old man from Kharkiv was heading to Hungary by bus. During the inspection, he provided his passport and photocopies of the children's birth certificates issued by the state authorities of Ukraine and Moldova. The border guards doubted the legality of the Moldovan certificate. The man initially insisted that he is the father of three minor children, one of whom was born in Moldova. However, during the interview, he admitted that he has two children, and that his wife bought him the certificate. The border guards refused him to cross the border and forwarded the information to the National Police. Criminal proceedings have been opened against the man under Article 358 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine -Forgery of documents, seals, stamps and forms, their sale, use of forged documents.- The court will decide the further fate of the offender. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Night Hunters: A few devastating hits, and the enemy tank and -Loaves- are eliminated
Description: The video of combat operation appeared on November 26 on the unit's page. -Night lights of FPV drones. -ACHILLES- shock anti-aircraft battalion of the 92nd OSHBr continues to inflict devastating blows on the enemy even in the dark,- Ukrainian defenders noted. FPV DRONE NIGHT LIGHTS The ACHILLES shock anti-aircraft battalion of the 92nd OSHBr continues to inflict devastating blows on the enemy even in the dark Kharkivshchyna Destroyed: T-72 tank, -Loaves- (2 units) and a cannon. Affected: BREM, Uraly-4320 (3 units) and BMP-2. https://t.co/OXKt2dLf9d pic.twitter.com/evgE4gogI0 — BUBpAK “ACHILLES” 92 OSHBr (@achilles_92osbr) November 26, 2024 Earlier, ArmyInform showed how the battalion of shock BpAK -Achilles- destroys enemy equipment and Russian personnel in Kharkiv region.

Title: Courage, Javelin and drones — the marines repelled a powerful assault by the Russians in Kurshchyna
Description: The video of the battle was released on November 26 on the brigade's channel. Two Russian infantry fighting vehicles with a landing party moved towards our positions at high speed. One of them was hit by a Javelin ATGM missile and burned, it seems, together with the landing party. The second was immobilized, but was able to land attack aircraft. They attacked the positions of Mykolaiv marines, but encountered strong resistance. In addition, our FPV drones started working on the Russians. Their blows forced the invaders to retreat and then flee. They were also killed on the way. -This is only a conditional half hour of what is happening on the line of battle with the enemy in Kurshchyna. Coordinated units of the Mykolaiv marines continue to defend around the clock and repel enemy attacks,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the fighters of the 36th Marine Brigade named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Bilinskyi showed how -baggi-motoczyklah-ta-nyvah/->destroy Russian assault groups with artillery and drones

Title: The Defense Forces spoke about the enemy's preparations for assaults in the South
Description: The spokesperson of the Defense Forces of Southern Ukraine told about this on Army TV Colonel Vladyslav Voloshyn. -For about 10-15 days, our situation is approximately the same. The enemy is continuing assaults in the Vremivsk direction and is preparing to conduct assaults in the Gulyaipil and Orihiv directions,- said Vladyslav Voloshyn. In addition, according to him, the enemy is conducting reconnaissance and search operations, small assaults in the Dnieper direction, on the Dnieper islands near Kherson. -There is constant counter-battery fighting, the enemy is constantly launching missile and air strikes, as well as shelling with MLRS,- the spokesman added. He noted that the weather sometimes affects the enemy's use of drones, but the number of shelling and assaults does not decrease, remains constant. -Mostly, assaults take place in small infantry groups, from 5 to 10 people. Military equipment is mainly used to transport these groups. But, according to our intelligence, the enemy constantly receives replenishment of buggies and motorcycles,- said Vladyslav Voloshyn. As reported by ArmyInform, since the beginning of the day on November 26, our defenders have repelled 12 enemy attacks in the areas of Vesely Gay, Trudove, Kostyantynopolske, Rozdolne, Novoandriivka, and Rivnopil Vremivskyi settlements, and one battle is ongoing. The enemy did not conduct active operations in the Gulyaipil direction. In the Orihiv direction, the invaders actively used aviation in the areas of the settlements of Mala Tokmachka, Temyrivka and Pavlivka, dropping a total of 10 guided aerial bombs. In the Dnieper direction, our defenders repelled two enemy attacks.

Title: The Ukraine-NATO Council discussed the Russian strike on the Dnieper with a new ballistic missile
Description: This was reported by the press service of the Alliance. The meeting was held at the level of ambassadors. Senior Ukrainian military officials held a video briefing for the members of the Council. -During the meeting, the Alliance members confirmed their support for Ukraine. The attack, which was directed at the Dnipro, is seen as another attempt by Russia to terrorize the civilian population in Ukraine and intimidate those who support Ukraine, which is defending itself from Russia's illegal and unprovoked aggression,- the message reads. As NATO spokeswoman Fara Dahlalla previously noted, -the deployment of this potential will not change the course of the conflict and will not distract NATO allies from supporting Ukraine.- The Ukraine-NATO Council is a platform for consultations between Alliance members and Ukraine on security issues of mutual interest, including Russia's aggressive war. The meeting was chaired by Acting Deputy Secretary General of NATO Boris Ruge. The next meeting of the Ukraine-NATO Council should take place during the meeting of foreign ministers of the Alliance member countries, which will be held on December 3-4. As ArmiyaInform reported, on November 21, the Russians hit the Dnipro with a new medium-range ballistic missile based on the older Rubezh ICBM, which is a potential carrier of a nuclear warhead. GUR IOU reported that Russia struck by using a ballistic missile, probably from the -Kedr- missile complex. The flight time of this Russian missile from the moment of launch in the Astrakhan region to the impact in the city of Dnipro was 15 minutes. Six combat units were installed on the rocket: each one was equipped with six sub-munitions. The speed on the final part of the trajectory is more than Mach 11. As of October of this year, Russia was supposed to produce two experimental rocket samples from the -Kedr- missile complex.

Title: - Behy- are destroyed, and the infantry is finished: our fighters repelled the assault of the Russia...
Description: They published a video of combat work on their channel. It is noted that two Russian BMPs, killed by infantry, advanced towards the Ukrainian positions, and FPV drones of the Separate Presidential Brigade set out to chase them. -The -bekhs- were destroyed, and the infantry, which scattered around the landings, were caught and finished off with -Maviks- with rocket launchers. The 4th mechanized battalion of the Separate Presidential Brigade does not tolerate Russian garbage in its defense area. It should be burning,- the military said. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how fighters of the Bulava attack drone unit of the Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytskyi effectively piloty-rozrobyly-novu-metodyku-udariv/->burned Russian tank shed, seemingly protected from drones.

Title: MARCH is on the march: the cadets underwent an intensive 16-hour training in takmed
Description: All conditions are created here for high-quality and fast training of combat medics, paramedics and soldiers of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -The cadets take the basic ASM (All service members) course with us, which is coordinated with the current Ukrainian standard of providing first aid. Here, they have the opportunity to hone their knowledge and skills directly during simulations of injuries and combat injuries, taking into account all the stress factors that accompany them,- says Diana, head of the tactical medicine center. Training takes place in full compliance with the MARCH first aid protocol (Massive bleeding, Airway Management, Respiration, Circulation, Head injury / Hypothermia / Hypovolemia) in all possible phases: -red-, -shelter-, -evacuation-. The training itself lasts 16 hours over two days. Each cadet practices this protocol independently. For this, models are used, or another cadet plays the role of the wounded. Certain marks simulate wounds (injuries) of varying complexity, according to the nature of which certain methods and means of assistance are used. Simulation of combat conditions helps cadets feel real responsibility and practice the skills of using various auxiliary medical devices (tourniquets, decompression needles, occlusive stickers, hemostatic bandages, etc.). It is also extremely important to take coordinated actions in the shortest possible time during the organization and evacuation of the wounded. In general, during the training, future officers must master the CLS (Combat Life Savior) level, which corresponds to the functionality of a medical marksman. Training takes place under the supervision of experienced combat medics. The principle -train as you will fight- applies - it educates the cadets' endurance and prepares them for actions in extreme combat situations, where the ability to save one's life and the life of a comrade is one of the most important tasks. -We work according to the MARCH protocol. First, we examine for the presence of massive bleeding, then we work with consciousness and breathing problems, tamponate, glue and carry out evacuation,- says cadet Mykola about the basic course of tactical medicine. Testing and awarding of certificates are ahead. And one more step towards receiving the rank of -lieutenant- will be taken. Vladislav Siniagovskyi for ArmiyaInform

Title: Volodymyr Zelenskyi: We need a new push for supplies for the defense of Ukraine
Description: He said this in the evening address. -We appreciate that the partners are now implementing the announced support packages. They are implemented in a timely manner. And it is important that the volumes of what is announced correspond to our agreements and objective needs. A new push is needed for supply for the sake of defense. And we have to ensure it in December,- he said. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also said that this morning he listened to the report of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, General Oleksandr Syrsky, regarding the situation at the front. -And there will be another conversation in the evening. The priorities are obvious. Front — Pokrovsky direction, Kurakhivskyi. Also, the Kursk operation,- the head of state said. As reported by ArmyInform, Volodymyr Zelensky declared that defend against enemy airstrikes realistically only by destroying Russian weapons and Russian launchers on Russian territory.

Title: The form with -z- and escape to the Russian Federation: the traitor in the shoots was sentenced for ...
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this on November 26. Prosecutors proved that during the occupation of Kozacha Lopan village, an unemployed local woman voluntarily decided to work for the enemy. She assumed the position of temporary acting precinct inspector of the so-called -Territorial police department of Kozach Lopan township-. -Law enforcement agency- issued documents in accordance with Russian legislation. It is noted that at the court hearing, the witnesses said that the suspect conducted -searches- at the residences of local residents, and also wore a uniform with a -z- mark. -The woman worked in a pseudo-position until September 10, 2022, and then fled to the Russian Federation together with the occupiers. She is wanted,- law enforcement officers said. The court found a 38-year-old woman guilty of collaborative activity for maintaining a public indictment by prosecutors of the Dergachev district prosecutor's office of Kharkiv region. She was sentenced to 14 years of imprisonment with deprivation of the right to hold positions in law enforcement agencies of Ukraine for 15 years and confiscation of property. The guilty verdict was handed down by the Dergachiv District Court of the Kharkiv Region. The period for an appeal continues. Since the convict is still hiding from Ukrainian justice on the territory of the Russian Federation, the term of her sentence will begin to be calculated from the moment of actual detention. As reported by ArmyInform, the Security Service and the National Police detained a Russian agent who, on the order of enemy special services committed a terrorist attack in the center Kyiv on November 17 of this year.

Title: The enemy assault failed: the Spartans thwarted the Russian infantry attack
Description: They published a video of combat work on their channel. The invaders tried to advance with a group of infantry on the positions of the National Guardsmen, but their actions were detected in time by the air reconnaissance of the -Spartan- and all the plans of the enemy collapsed. 🫡 The -Spartan- brigade stopped the Russian offensive. The occupiers tried to advance with a group of infantry on the positions of the National Guardsmen, but their actions were detected in time by the -Spartan- aerial reconnaissance and all the enemy's plans failed. More videos https://t.co/E2EPYXNKjz pic.twitter.com/LGK6vsEDnr — Military Unit 3017 (@ngu_3017) November 26, 2024 -In the Zaporozhye direction, the Russians do not change their tactics and try to carry out assaults and combat reconnaissance exclusively by infantry, without using equipment,- the military said. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how the Russians tried to advance to Ukrainian positions, but did not take into account that the defense here is held by soldiers the -Spartan- brigade, which successfully repelled the enemy assault.

Title: The president named a method of countering Russian airstrikes
Description: President Volodymyr Zelenskyy announced this in his evening address. -And that is why the opportunity to strike on Russian territory is so important for us. This is the only thing that can currently limit Russian terror and, in general, Russia's ability to fight. I am grateful to all partners who understand this and explain it to others,- the head of state said. According to him, a rescue operation at the place of shelling at the service station is still ongoing in Sumy. -Unfortunately, two people died. My condolences to family and friends. There is probably another person under the rubble. A house and a kindergarten nearby were also damaged by this blow. And before that, it was shelling from a salvo missile system,- the President said. He recalled that nearly 200 Russian attack drones enemy launched last night. Most were shot down or neutralized thanks to EW. -I am grateful to all mobile fire groups, all air defense and EW calculations. It was a significant increase in pressure on Ukraine due to such terror. And it is important that we manage to protect our people, our infrastructure from most of these threats. But, unfortunately, not one hundred percent,- the head of state said. The President reported that the liquidation of the consequences of the attack is still ongoing in the Ternopil region. -Almost 200 Russian drones against Ukraine per day are almost 200 proofs that Russian desires are extremely far from any ideas about real peace,- he emphasized.

Title: Merciless attacks from the sky: Russian drones bombard residents of the Kherson region all day long
Description: informs the head of Kherson ODA Oleksandr Prokudin about this. -In Veletenskyi, the Russian army dropped explosives from a drone on a man riding a bicycle. A 65-year-old resident was hospitalized with a mine-explosive injury and leg injuries. Doctors are providing the victim with all the necessary assistance,- the message says. Also, at noon, two people were hit by a Russian UAV in Kindyitsa. As a result of dropping ammunition from a drone, a 27-year-old man received a mine-explosive injury and a shrapnel injury to his arm and leg. A 60-year-old woman was diagnosed with a shrapnel injury to the shin. In addition, the Russian occupation army attacked the residents of Antonivka from a drone. -A 61-year-old man was taken to the hospital with a mine-explosive injury and a fragmentary leg injury. At approximately 15:00, the Russian military dropped explosives from a drone on a 74-year-old man. He has a landmine-explosive injury and a fragmentary wound to his forearm,- said Oleksandr Prokudin. As ArmiyaInform reported, in the Dnipro district of Kherson, the occupiers dropped explosives from a drone on a civilian car. A 57-year-old woman received a mine-explosive injury a> and ssada head. Two other people were also injured.

Title: A Russian soldier was woken up by a mine, the SBU is hunting enemy equipment, Kurshchyna: a stream f...
Description: On the Zaporizhzhia direction 110, a separate mechanized brigade named after Colonel-General Mark Bezruchka used FPV drones to stop the Russian advance. The battle resulted in the destruction of three enemy BMPs and one BBM. The Russian soldier was sleeping so soundly that he did not hear our infantrymen sneak up on him. In order not to risk our fighters, an FPV drone was used as an alarm clock for the occupier, but even it did not disturb the Russian's sleep. Already after that, our soldiers threw an anti-tank mine at the son, after which he fell asleep forever. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - lieutenant colonel Serhii Misyura and captain Artem Golub.

Title: Drug addicts in the service of Russia: arsonists of post offices and military vehicles arrested
Description: About this informs November 26 SBU. -In order to commit crimes, the occupiers remotely involved two recidivists who, after -serving time- for drug trafficking and theft, were looking for money on Telegram channels,- the report says. It is noted that during the arson, the perpetrators used flammable mixtures, and the fires were recorded on phone cameras for a -report- to curators from the Russian Federation. So, a 28-year-old drug addict from Berezan was arrested in Kyiv Oblast, who burned down a local branch of a private postal service. He also planned to destroy several more administrative buildings of the community, but did not have time to do so, as he was exposed by law enforcement officers. The subversive activity of a 40-year-old recidivist, who burned a car of the Armed Forces after a -term- behind bars, was also documented in Prykarpattia. -After the arrest of the person involved, the investigation additionally established his involvement in setting fire to the turnout heating cabinet on an important railway line,- the SBU noted. On the basis of the received evidence, both perpetrators were notified of suspicion (according to the crimes committed) under two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: The extras are in custody. As reported by ArmyInform, the Security Service and the National Police detained a Russian agent who, on the order of enemy special services, committed a terrorist attack in the center Kyiv on November 17 this year.

Title: Reinforced dry rations for the military: the DOT of the Ministry of Defense concluded the first supp...
Description: This is stated in messages MOU. This improved food kit provides a complete three-time meal for a serviceman in conditions where it is not possible to prepare food. -The Ministry of Defense is working on improving the quality of food for the military, because it depends not only on the effectiveness of combat missions, but also on the health and morale of our servicemen. Improving dry rations is an important step in this strategy,- said Deputy Defense Minister of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. The first contacts for the supply of reinforced dry rations were concluded with three suppliers. At the same time, contracts with two others — who previously won tenders for separate positions — were not concluded, because their documents, as it turned out, did not meet the tender requirements. Therefore, the DOT will soon re-announce tenders for these lots. We will remind, at the end of September - beginning of October, the Army+ application was a survey of military personnel was conducted regarding the filling and quality of dry rations. Most appreciated the quality of the set quite highly and noted that it is worth diversifying the filling and adding inclusive dry solders.

Title: A traitor in a cassock: the archimandrite of the UOC (MP) who blessed Kherson's accession to Russia ...
Description: About this informs November 26 SBU. -After the capture of the regional center, the Archimandrite went to cooperate with the occupiers and the local Gauleiter Saldo,- the report says. As the investigation established, the cleric regularly invited him to the temple for pro-Kremlin speeches to the faithful. Also, during the services, the Archimandrite blessed the pseudo-referendum of the Russian Federation regarding the -joining- of the Kherson Oblast to Russia. In addition, the cleric personally appealed to Moscow Patriarch Kirill with a request to include the local cathedral in the parish of the Russian Orthodox Church. -For supporting racism, the traitor was given real estate seized in the center of Kherson and invited to the Kremlin to participate in the -ceremony of inclusion- of the temporarily occupied regions of Ukraine into the Russian Federation,- the SBU said. During the liberation of the regional center, the cleric fled with the Russian invaders, first to the left bank of the region, and then to Crimea. On the basis of the evidence base of the Security Service, the court found the intruder guilty under two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: Comprehensive measures are underway to bring him to justice for the crimes committed against our state. As reported by ArmyInform, the Security Service detained the abbot of one of the temples of the Kharkiv diocese of the UOC (MP), who suspected of work on the enemy.

Title: Russian aviation attacked Kramatorsk with bombs: dozens of private estates were damaged in the subur...
Description: The devastating consequences of the explosion were recorded by ArmyInform. -Kramatorsk has been hit by the enemy - the private sector. Dozens of residential buildings were damaged. So far, there has been no information about the victims. We continue to record the consequences - all relevant services are working-, reported head of the Kramatorsk City Military Administration Oleksandr Honcharenko.   The shelling of the city by the military of the armed forces of the Russian Federation took place in the afternoon of November 26. The first blast occurred around 1:40 p.m., the second at around 1:45 p.m. One of the munitions hit outside the settlement, while the second hit the area of ​​a one-story manor-type residential building in the village of Yasnohirka in the suburbs of Kramatorsk. An aerial bomb hit a paved road in the middle of the street. The force of the explosion was such that several nearby structures on both sides of the street suffered catastrophic damage. It was only a miracle that there were no victims or serious injuries, because there were local residents in the houses and in the yards near the place of impact. At least three buildings are almost completely destroyed - their roofs have completely collapsed and load-bearing walls have been destroyed. A car parked next to one of the almost completely destroyed houses was completely burnt out. In several dozens of residential and commercial buildings, located further from the epicenter of the explosion, the debris and the blast wave destroyed the roofs, knocked out windows and doors. Gas furnaces were destroyed, electric wires were broken, and several poles of power lines were knocked down. All relevant services arrived at the site of the impact, provided first aid to local residents, secured power communications and recorded the effects of the shelling. Photo by Ruslan Tarasov

Title: They woke up an anti-tank mine - the occupier was sleeping very soundly
Description: The video of the combat operation was published on November 26 on the brigade channel. Our aerial scouts spotted an invader in a dugout in the middle of a forest strip. The Russian did not move, he seemed to be sleeping. First, an FPV drone was sent against the invader, which managed to fly right into the dugout. When the smoke after the explosion cleared, the aerial scouts noticed the occupant in the same position. In order not to risk it, our infantrymen brought an anti-tank mine to the dugout and threw it inside. Only after that it was possible to say with confidence that the Russian went to Kobzon's concert. -The soldier is sleeping - the service is going. The occupier fell asleep so well that he did not hear either the FPV or our fellow soldiers who threw an anti-tank mine into his dugout,- the brigade commented on the video. On the channel, the brigade is conducting a muster for the battalion of unmanned systems. As reported by ArmyInform, the crew of the tank of the 33rd mechanized brigade, together with the artillery, was able to kolonu-vorozhoyi-bronetehniky/->stop the breakthrough attempt of Russian armored vehicles.

Title: There are more than 140 combat clashes at the front today: the General Staff of the Armed Forces rep...
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff Armed Forces as of 16:00 on November 26. The occupiers continue to use aviation, in particular KAB, and carry out attacks in almost all directions of the east and south of our country, especially actively in the Pokrovsky and Kurakhiv directions. The defense forces are holding the lines and taking the necessary measures to prevent a defense breakthrough. On the Kharkiv direction, four combat clashes took place today in the Vovchansk district. 12 assaults by invaders were repulsed by our soldiers near Hryhorivka, Zeleny Gay, Zagryzovo, Senkovo, and Andriivka in the Kupyansk direction, three clashes are still ongoing. On the Lymansky direction, the enemy, with the support of aviation, is attacking in the areas of Grekivka, Druzhkivka, Cherneshchyna, Makiivka, Terniv, and Torsky. Since the beginning of the day, there have already been 17 clashes in this direction, of which seven are still ongoing. On the Siversky direction, the occupiers are attacking in the Hryhorivka area, the fighting is still ongoing. On the Toretsk direction the enemy attacked the positions of our troops near Diliivka and Toretsk three times. In the Pokrovsky direction, fierce battles are taking place in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promeny, Krasny Yar, Lysivka, Chumatsky, Pustinka and Novy Trud. So far, the enemy has made 31 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their positions, 25 attacks have already been repelled by our defenders. The occupiers dropped two aerial bombs in the districts of Zeleny Pol and Pokrovsk. In the Kurakhiv direction, 12 clashes continue in the areas of Berestki, Sontsivka, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhove, Dalnye, Katerynivka, Elizavetivka, Hanivka and Antonivka settlements. Our defenders have already repelled 23 enemy assaults. In the areas of Vesely Gai, Trudove, Kostiantynopolske, Rozdolne, Novoandriivka and Rivnopil settlements of the Vremivskyi direction, our defenders repelled 12 enemy attacks, one skirmish is ongoing. In the Gulyaipil direction, the enemy did not conduct active operations. In the Orikhov direction, the invaders actively used aviation in the areas of the settlements of Mala Tokmachka, Temyrivka, and Pavlivka, dropping a total of 10 guided aerial bombs. In the Dnieper direction, our defenders repelled two enemy attacks.

Title: The defense forces advance in the north of Kharkiv Oblast, the Russians withdraw their reserves
Description: Lieutenant Colonel Anton Bayev, Chief the planning department of the 13th brigade of operational assignment of the National Guard -Charter-. According to Anton Baev, -Charter- carried out successful offensive actions. Now trying to gain a foothold in order to create further conditions for improving the tactical position. And also — for further advancement in the direction of Hlyboke and Lukyantsi settlements. -Because of our actions, the intensity has increased significantly. Now the enemy is starting to react and charge additional reserves, which will be advanced in the future to recapture the positions they lost. In addition, we note that we brought a special UAV unit here, which began to work actively, helping the enemy,- said Anton Baev. As reported by ArmyInform , enemy tanks, guns and howitzers did not withstand the blows of the fighters of the 13th brigade of operational assignment -Charter- of the National Guards of Ukraine.

Title: A vice for logistics: the Russians are trying to cut the road to Kurakhovo
Description: This is what told on the broadcast of the telethon -Edyny Novyni- Nazar Voloshin, spokesman operational-strategic group of troops -Khortytsia-. According to Nazar Voloshyn, the enemy is rushing to the outskirts of Kurakhovo. The enemy does not pay attention to the losses and tries to occupy the commanding heights and logistical routes that lead to the city. -Kurakhove is under the control of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Over the past day, more than 350 occupiers were killed and wounded in that direction, in particular. Also two tanks, three motorcycles, a mortar, several cars,- said Nazar Voloshyn. Earlier ArmyInform reported , that in the Kurakhiv direction the enemy is attacking — striking across the entire front with attempts to break out into the flanks.

Title: The enemy attacked Sumy
Description: This was notified by the Sumy City Council. There were no casualties or injuries as a result of the impact. The consequences of an enemy attack are clarified. Previously, the parking lot, cars, and windows of residential buildings were damaged. All relevant services are on site. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russian military carried out an FPV drone strike on a civilian car in the Vasyliv district of the Zaporizhia region.

Title: More than 60 items: how Ukrainian servicemen are provided with equipment in Britain
Description: This was reported at the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Military personnel receive clothing, personal protective equipment, hygiene products and many other necessary items. In total, the list contains more than 60 names. When new recruits receive their equipment under the guidance of the British military and INTERFLEX partner countries, they have the opportunity to try everything on to ensure comfort and fit. If necessary, the equipment can be replaced with a more suitable size to ensure maximum comfort during training. It's not just a set of things - it's essential gear that matters. Every detail, from a protective vest to the most comfortable shoe, helps create comfort and increases the combat effectiveness of our military. -We thank Great Britain and the partner countries of the Interflex operation: Australia, Canada, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Lithuania, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Romania, Sweden, Kosovo for this invaluable assistance,- the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine noted.

Title: Battlefield Communication: A new training course has launched in Army+
Description: This was reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. This is the fourth course to be launched in the last two months. The communication course will teach: -Already 12,000 soldiers have started training in Army+, and 4,000 certificates of completion of the courses have already been issued. This proves that fighters are looking for additional sources of knowledge in order to learn new things or sharpen their already acquired skills. Therefore, we continue to replenish our educational platform with relevant materials and plan to do it systematically,- said Deputy Minister of Defense for Digitalization Kateryna Chernogorenko. As reported by ArmiyaInform, servicemen who will submit reports for a change of place of service through Army+, in case of approval -nakaziv-pro-perevedennya/-> will see the order number for the transfer.

Title: The military man became the absolute champion of Ukraine in natural bodybuilding
Description: This was reported by /a> Ministry of Youth and Sports. In 2024, Oleksandr Omelchenko became a gold medalist and the absolute champion of Ukraine in natural bodybuilding, having won two gold medals, a cup and a WNBF Pro Card. As a teenager, he was involved in athletics, but later discovered bodybuilding for himself. While in the service, he decided not only to keep in shape, but also to reach sports heights in order to prove to himself and others: the military routine is not an obstacle to self-realization. Oleksandr's passion for bodybuilding began during his first contract service in 2019. However, he got a real boost to the professional level after returning to the army in 2022. His story is not just a personal success, but also an example for those who doubt their own abilities. Oleksandr proved that perseverance and self-belief can be the key to achieving dreams even in the most difficult conditions. Currently, Oleksandr Omelchenko continues to serve, train and show that, being in the army, you can also achieve success in other areas. As reported by ArmyInform, the army athlete chose a historical award for Ukraine.

Title: A record number of kamikaze drones: the President called for stronger sanctions against Russia
Description: This was announced by the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy. Ukrainian air defense forces shot down about 80 drones, more than 90 are considered lost. Despite the efforts of the defenders of the sky, there is damage to critical infrastructure, in particular in Ternopil. Currently, restoration work is ongoing there, repair crews are working to restore power as soon as possible. The President emphasized the need to strengthen sanctions control. According to him, each of the 188 drones contains about 85 foreign components without which they could not function. That's nearly 16,000 parts supplied through sanctions circumvention. -Such attacks are possible only due to violation of sanctions. We need more joint work in the world to block supplies and force Russia to stop the war,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy said. He called on the international community not only to declare opposition to the war, but also to actively fight the circumvention of sanctions, which allows Russia to continue its aggression. As reported by ArmyInform, in Ternopil, the Russians hit an energy facility .

Title: Drone attack in Zaporozhye: Russians destroyed a civilian car
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhia Regional Military Administration. The incident happened in the village of Primorske. The drone hit an old car parked in a private yard. As a result, the car burned to the ground. The blast wave and debris damaged a nearby house. Fortunately, no residents were injured. As reported by ArmiyaInform, during the day the occupiers struck 285 attacks on 12 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region. As a result of Russian attacks in Pologiv district, a 74-year-old man suffered injury.

Title: Welcome to Hell: 46 Russians ended their contract with the Horde early
Description: About this on the broadcast of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- the spokesman of the OTU -Kharkiv- told - lieutenant colonel Yevhenii Romanov. According to Yevgeny Romanov, enemy attacks continue. However, they are unable to advance in columns with armored vehicles. All this is due to a specific area where hostilities and defense organized by our units have been going on for a long time. -These are solid ruins. There are no roads. That which is mined. Each area is targeted, fire equipment is on duty there, aerial reconnaissance is constantly carried out in the air by unmanned systems, strike drones are circling,- Yevgeny Romanov said. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the change of weather hurts the occupiers in Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: Art therapy at the front: chaplains and artists supported the soldiers of the hospital
Description: The project combines art, national traditions and spiritual support for the psychological rehabilitation of soldiers. As military chaplain Borys Kutovy noted, participation in such events helps to awaken something important and inspiring in the hearts of soldiers. -Something poignant and seemingly long-forgotten, but alive, exciting- This is a kind of art therapy, the strength of which lies in national spiritual, cultural and artistic traditions,- he added. As part of the project, mobile groups of chaplains, masters of folk art and performers of authentic Ukrainian singing visit places where military personnel rest or undergo treatment. Their activities are organized in the combat zone and are aimed at the psychological recovery of fighters participating in operations in the Kharkiv, Luhansk and Donetsk directions. The project is implemented by the command of the Khortytsya Armed Forces within the framework of the program of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine -Protecting the Life and Health of Servicemen-. Its effectiveness has already been confirmed in frontline conditions. -Get well, brothers! There is still a lot to do! With faith in God and the Armed Forces, we will win!-, the participants of -Kola Pokrova- appeal to our defenders. As reported by ArmyInform, the command of the Khortytsia Special Operations Command within the framework of the program of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine -Saving the Life and Health of Servicemen- introduced the project -Circle Pokrova-, which provides for the psychological rehabilitation of the military.

Title: If not the ruins, then the fires — the Defense Forces showed Toretsk destroyed by the enemy
Description: Toretsk's video appeared on November 26 on the brigade's channel. Destroyed industrial zones, private sector houses, of which walls remained at best. Panel high-rises look a little more intact, but they are almost completely burned out. This is how another city of Donetsk region looks like, where the -Russian mir- came. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the unmanned systems battalion -Perun- of the 42nd mechanized brigade were able to hit Russian anti-aircraft missile complex -Tor-.

Title: -They are killed there, and they climb several times a day- — the tactics of the enemy near Chasov Y...
Description: Mykola Zinko, the commander of the fire support company of the 5th Kyiv assault brigade, said this on the ArmyTV stream. -The orcs are running across the channel. This is, so to speak, a -brimstone- in which they are unable to gain a foothold. They are being killed there, but they continue to try several times every day to somehow sneak in, jump over this channel of ours,- Mykola Zinko reported. According to him, the Russians move in the morning or during the day, but they don't try to storm at night. -Most people go in the morning, when it's not quite light yet, but it's not dark either. They try to move during the day as well. But not at night, because the temperature dropped, the contrast became great and thermal imaging drones easily detect the enemy,- Mykola Zinko explained. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 5th Kyiv assault brigade hit a Russian bomber RBU-6000 -Smerch-2- in the Kramatorsk direction.

Title: Force the channel and die: in Chasovoy Yar, dozens of occupiers realize their dream
Description: The representative of the 24th OMBr named . King Danyla Andriy Polukhin. According to Andriy Polukhin, the reason for the popular Russian tactics of -small infantry groups- is the work of our drones. That is why from 2 to 5 stormtroopers go into attacks. -In order for their forces to be invisible, they need to form small infantry groups, no more than a few men. They try to go to the rear and impose a battle there. Such sorties are not very pleasant for our defense, but still they do not decide, this is still a small infantry group,- noted Andriy Polukhin. Previously ArmyInform reported that the Russians are giving up their attempts to occupy the city of Chasiv Yar, the situation remains difficult.

Title: PA NATO called to provide Ukraine with more long-range weapons for strikes on the territory of the R...
Description: This is stated in the message at site PA NATO. -Russia remains the most significant and direct threat to the security of the Alliance … this threat will persist in the long term,- says the resolution adopted at the annual session of the NATO Parliamentary Assembly in Montreal. The document emphasizes that NATO should -maintain and increase military, financial and humanitarian support to Ukraine, ensuring the timely delivery of ammunition and advanced weapons systems, including air defense systems, long-range precision weapons and multi-role fighters.- Such assistance to Ukraine should be maintained -as long as it resists Russian aggression or its threat.- The governments of NATO countries must also recognize -the right of Ukraine to strike at legitimate military targets- on the territory of Russia in accordance with the principles of self-defense of the United Nations.
