That's why we teach recruits to get used to the idea that they will constantly be in front of our eyes and the enemy's eyes,- says Norman. The copters dive at the fighters, and they learn to notice them in time and not to panic. Vlad is the youngest in the entire department. On September 2, he turned 25, it is from this age that mobilization now begins, and already on September 3 he had a summons. Vlad himself is from Cherkasy, says that since 2022 he has received summons several times, but he was not taken because of his age. -I was told that you are still young, go for a walk for now. I updated my details and waited. September 3 came, I was sent to the VLK, I passed it in two days. In two, because the tests had to be taken the next day. In the TCC, I met with a representative of the battalion, and he offered me to serve in it. I agreed, got the attitude and went to the training center, after which I got into the battalion, everything was as it should be. Is it difficult? It is difficult, but useful. I listen a lot, I try to remember everything,- says Vlad. According to Oleg, deputy chief of staff of the battalion for mobilization work, Vlad's case is not an isolated one. -Our vacancies are on many sites. Now they have also appeared on Army+. If a person is interested in them, write to us. I contact her, ask questions, send a questionnaire. A person is filling it out, and at this time I am checking it on the website of court decisions to weed out people who want to hide in the army from some administrative or criminal cases. If the person is suitable for us, then we will provide them with a letter of recommendation. This is an official document with a registration number and seal. With it, a person goes to the TCC. If he is going to sign a contract, then he will 100% come to us. As for mobilization, there are options, because the General Staff can decide that some brigade needs more replenishment. That's why I always recommend a contract. For the most part, the positions of clerks, UAV operators, and drivers are filled with us through recruiting. There are less snipers or shooters,- said Oleg. Training on the range ends with firing from a Browning machine gun. The guys come two by two, squat down, the instructors show how to prepare the machine gun for battle, how to aim and how to fire. Short bursts fly towards the targets. Some of the cartridges are tracers to make it easier to adjust the fire. -Browning- shoots loudly, out of habit it can cover your ears a little. But the work of the machine gun, it is far from the loudest thing that can happen in the positions. Recruits are animated, they are interested in shooting with a machine gun. Someone sits on a box, someone kneels, short queues, shell casings fly. Fighters listen to the advice of instructors, adjust their fire. Today they still have grenade throwing here at the training ground. And in the evening, classes on tactical medicine. The battalion tries to give its soldiers maximum skills that will help them in battle. And in just a week or two, the boys will be in combat positions. Hold the front and do not let the enemy into the operational space.

Title: Getting Closer to the Assault Rifle: Introducing the US Army's Newest 30mm Grenade Launcher
Description: As said in a release posted on the Barrett portal, the new Squad Support Rifle System (SSRS) is designed to revolutionize the battlefield with its advanced capabilities and innovative design. This marks a significant step forward in the evolution of soldier protection systems, ArmyInform reports. Manufacturers classify the weapon as a -support rifle-, which is designed to fire both at enemy infantry and vehicles, as well as at drones. -We are pleased to partner with Barrett, the world's leading manufacturer of military weapons, to further advance our 30mm support rifle for the US Army's PGS program,- said Michael Merino, president of MARS Inc. Merino added that the companies are developing a solution that will significantly improve a soldier's ability to counter a wide range of threats on the battlefield. The PGS is a magazine-fed semi-automatic weapon that provides soldiers with greater accuracy and firepower. The grenade launcher is designed to engage targets at a distance of 35 meters to over half a kilometer, including enemy manpower hiding behind shelters. The PGS aims to offer a flat firing trajectory for faster and more accurate target engagement, reducing flight time for long-range shots. In addition, the PGS will include a sophisticated fire control system capable of programming shots and ammunition families for different tactical situations. The arsenal can include rounds for counter-defilade, close combat, and even armor-piercing charges or anti-drone (Counter-UAS) munitions. As inform the authors of the defense portal Army Recognition, the program reached its final stage when several companies such as FN America and Plumb Precision Products, submitted their own projects for evaluation by military experts. The new weapon is designed to participate in the PGS (Precision Grenadier System) tender, which is expected in fiscal year 2026, when the US Army will select the final candidate after a successful technology demonstration. The key to the design of the Barrett SSRS is its comfortable assault rifle-based design. The weapon has a stock in the rear, a magazine with five cartridges in the center and a barrel length of 305 mm. The grenade launcher is compact and versatile with a total length of 861 mm and a weight of only 6.3 kg. It can fire a variety of ammunition, including anti-aircraft shells, giving soldiers a decisive advantage on the battlefield. The weapon is also equipped with a Vortex Optics XM-157 scope, similar to the sight installed on the 6.8 mm machine gun XM7 army USA. This sight is used in the marksmanship developed under the Next Generation Squad Weapons (NGSW) program. This optical enhancement further strengthens SSRS's ability to deliver precision in combat, aligning with the US Army's modernization goals. With Barrett leading a team of industry-leading partners, this next-generation grenade launcher will be a key component of future lethality systems in the U.S. Army soldier's arsenal, combining firepower, accuracy and safety on the modern battlefield. The US Army announced the launch of the PGS program in August 2024. It is worth reminding, as reported ArmyInform , the products of the arms company Barrett Firearms are on the list of about 20 samples of sniper and anti-materiel rifles, which from the beginning of the large-scale invasion of the Russian Federation by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine were codified and accepted for use in the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Exhibition presentation of the SSRS 30-mm semi-automatic grenade launcher Video: World military news

Title: Should we give up propaganda: a military historian on the world experience of working with human con...
Description: -We do not like to mention either the Soviet experience or the experience of other totalitarian states. But in reality, propaganda always works the same way. She worked in the same way in Ancient Rome, in European states, when the Crusades were being prepared. It worked like this in Europe during the 30 Years War. She worked like this during the First and Second World Wars. At the moment, certain democratic circles believe that the use of propaganda is unacceptable, although we see that no country in the world shies away from using propaganda. The only difference is that now the word -propaganda- has been replaced by the construct -strategic communications-. But the essence and methods have not changed from this. We can call them whatever we want, but these principles are absolutely constant, they have always worked the same way. And I don't think that Ukraine should give up on this, it's just that in the end we have to get used to the fact that evil should be called evil, and not the phrase -not everything is so clear-cut.- Good should be called good, struggle should be called struggle, one should go precisely to Victory. And then propaganda turns into just a tool. She is neither good nor bad. It is simply a tool for working with human consciousness. Likewise, someone may not like a scalpel. But the scalpel during surgery cannot be replaced by anything else. In the same way, nothing else can replace propaganda in working with consciousness.-

Title: The occupiers are threatening an offensive in the South, and they are shifting their troops to other...
Description: Serhii, the spokesman of the volunteer Ukrainian army -South- told about this in ArmiyaTV stream Bratchuk -The week is passing... under the sign of a certain hysteria in the media that the enemy is preparing a large-scale massive offensive on the regional center of Zaporizhzhia. It was again necessary, as they say, to throw the fire information team to explain to people that today the biggest threat to the Zaporizhzhia agglomeration is, of course, the actions of enemy aviation, which is engaged in terrorizing the civilian population: they drop anti-aircraft missiles, use unguided air missiles...-, - Serhii Bratchuk explained. In addition, according to him, separate enemy units are withdrawn from the Zaporizhzhia direction and transferred to the Donetsk front, the Pokrovskoe-Kurakhov direction. The spokesman also emphasized that Velika Novosilka is an important logistics point, because it is actually located on the border of three regions: Donetsk, Zaporizhzhya, and Dnipropetrovsk, although administratively it belongs to Donetsk region. -With the questions that arise around Velika Novosilka, we are talking about the fact that then the enemy will be able to become more active and threaten the Orihiv and Gulyaipil directions more,- Serhiy Bratchuk said. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russians are using all possible forces in the South of Ukraine, from convicts to marines.

Title: All documents are burnt! — the Russians confirmed that our drones were hit
Description: Footage from the cameras of the Russians and from our drones was combined and made public on the channel of the unit. In the video, Russians drive along the road in the Pokrovsky direction and observe a pile of destroyed equipment. At some point, they notice our FPV drone, try to run away or shoot it, but they don't succeed. They are forced to run away from the car. Which is destroyed by our drone, along with weapons and documents. There are the same videos from the cameras of our drones. -The enemy fixes one of the torn -Hrads- and shows the path of death. On that day, we burned 1 -hail-, 5 -loaves-, 2 -Urals-, 3 buggies and hit 2 tanks. This is all the result of one TPO group working 24/7 to 'improve' enemy logistics,- Muramasa commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the Muramasa 109th separate brigades of the Armed Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces destroy enemy logistics in the Pokrovsky direction.

Title: Lithuania transferred a new batch of military aid to Ukraine
Description: This is stated in messages of the Ministry of Defense of Lithuania. In response to Ukraine's requests this year, Lithuania has already transferred 155 mm ammunition, M113 armored personnel carriers, anti-drone systems to Ukraine. Ukraine also received winter equipment and sets of warm clothing, ammunition for the -Karl Gustav- anti-tank grenade launcher, RISE-1 remote detonation systems, generators, loaders, trailers, folding cabins and other auxiliary equipment. Since the beginning of the war, Lithuania has provided military aid to Ukraine in the amount of more than 705 million euros. Lithuania's overall support to Ukraine is long-term and has exceeded 1 billion euros. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine reached specific agreements with Norway, Denmark, Sweden and Lithuania on investing directly in Ukrainian defense production.

Title: Three thermobars for the dugout of the dead! — our stormtroopers showed the old school
Description: The video of the battle was released on the battalion channel. -Skaly- fighters conducted a successful assault in the Mykolaivka village area in the Pokrovsky direction. First, the Bradley infantry fighting vehicle went to the positions where the enemy was located. She brought the landing party to the positions, landed and covered our attack aircraft, mowing down the nearby landing from the cannon. Our fighters started clearing the trenches. It turned out that the occupiers were entrenched in one dugout. Ours tried to smoke them out with a smoke grenade. When the smoke did not penetrate the Russians, our fighter threw three grenades into the dugout at once, thereby contributing to the urgent demobilization of two Russian soldiers. As reported by ArmyInform, our attack aircraft arranged a whole performance for the sake of a successful assault.

Title: President: Putin cannot be given a week to adapt and find a countermeasure
Description: This was stated by President Volodymyr Zelenskyy in his evening address. He emphasized that it is necessary to focus on the supply of these systems and Russia should feel that every step it takes to expand the war has consequences for it. -The consequences are in our actions at the front, our soldiers, our units. And also — consequences in the actions of the world. In how the world responds. You can't give Putin a week to adapt and find a countermeasure. It is necessary to constantly do everything so that Russia is forced to look for the possibility of peace. Real peace. And this can only be achieved by two things — aid to Ukraine and pressure on Russia,- the President said. Volodymyr Zelenskyi reported that today the Security Service of Ukraine, the Ministry of Internal Affairs showed news agencies the fragments of a Russian missile that hit our Dnipro. -Examinations, work with partners to establish all the details and all the characteristics of this missile are ongoing now. And in order to find an answer to this Russian escalating step together,- the head of state added. As ArmiyaInform reported, on November 21, the Russians hit the Dnipro with a medium-range ballistic missile based on the older Rubezh ICBM, which is a potential carrier of a nuclear warhead. GUR IOU reported that Russia struck by using a ballistic missile, probably from the -Kedr- missile complex.

Title: Kyiv OVA reported on the consequences of the Russian attack
Description: This was reported by the Kyiv Regional Military Administration. As a result of the fall of fragments of downed enemy targets, a fire broke out at the facility, which was promptly extinguished by rescuers. The roof of the building is partially damaged. There are no victims. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 24, according to preliminary information, attack on Chernihiv region.

Title: Run, Vanko, run - the occupier was given a running test
Description: The video was published on November 24. The invader was moving towards our positions when it was spotted by an FPV drone. The Russian did not want to die, so he ran away. Quickly realizing that he was inferior to the drone at a direct distance, the Russian tried to save himself by maneuverability. Jumping to the side, running around the bushes and other tricks gave the occupier half a minute of his worthless life. But then the inevitable payback happened. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the unmanned systems battalion Strike Drone Company of the 47th mechanized brigade made a two-part movie based on Russian classics -Crime and Punishment-.

Title: I didn't have the strength to look at it anymore - the Harpy drone about why she went to the front
Description: The story about the fight was published on November 24 on the brigade's page . -There is a war here, the enemy is in front of us, and he must be destroyed. Apart from us, no one will stop the invaders, no one will win back our lands. And if we don't need it, then someone else definitely won't do it!… The Horde has no right to simply perish. She has to take responsibility,- says the Harpy. She has her own, instructive for many -fighters of the economic front-, story of how the project manager came to the defense of Ukraine and has been fighting since the beginning of spring 2024. What do you like about work? What should -good Russians- look like? How to deal with enemy REB? What kind of relationships prevail within a small military team? Answers to these questions in the video: As reported by ArmyInform, Fighters of the 46th Airborne Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine destroyed three boats of the occupiers, which tried to land a landing.

Title: Oleksandr Syrskyi met with military and civilian bloggers
Description: This is stated in a message on the page on Facebook. -Their attention to pressing issues in the Defense Forces helps to respond quickly and find appropriate solutions,- the statement said. The Commander-in-Chief noted that at the meeting they openly discussed the situation at the front and focused in detail on the need to reform the Armed Forces, the creation of new brigades, the replacement of brigades and many other issues that concern society. -Similar meetings will take place in the future. Thank you for consistently supporting the Armed Forces of Ukraine and for reporting the truth about the heroic struggle of Ukrainians against the occupiers. We are strong when we are united,- the message reads.

Title: They turned the vegetable storage into a pilot burial ground — the destruction of the shelter of Rus...
Description: The video of the defeat was released on November 24 on the unit's channel. Aerial scouts spotted Russian drones sitting on the roof of a vegetable store buried in the ground. Our FPV drone took off to meet the Russians, which was able to fly inside past the bars and caused a stir among the Russian pilots. A powerful explosion and a lot of smoke gave confidence that if any of the Russians survived, it was only in a -vegetable- state. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the platoon of the Totem 3 mechanized unmanned aerial systems battalion of the 72nd mechanized brigade named after the Black Zaporozhets showed how remotely mine enemy roads.

Title: Funding of the Ukrainian defense industry is an effective method of operational support of the Defen...
Description: He said this during a meeting with Senators Rebecca Patterson, Gwen Boniface, Peter Behm, Stanley Kutcher and David Wells on the sidelines of the International Security Forum in Halifax, Canada, reports MOU. -For us, it is extremely important that the decisions meet our needs as much as possible and that the aid provided promptly arrives in Ukraine and is felt on the battlefield,- said Serhii Boev. The deputy minister also discussed with the Canadian parliamentarians the possibility of financing the Ukrainian defense industry by the Canadian government. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine reached specific agreements with Norway, Denmark, Sweden and Lithuania on investing directly in Ukrainian production.

Title: The Defense Forces of Ukraine spoke about the blue dreams of Russians in the Dnieper region
Description: Serhii, the spokesman of the volunteer Ukrainian army -South- told about this in ArmiyaTV stream Bratchuk -The main task of the enemy is to take possession of our islands on the Dnieper, to enter small and large ones. The day before, the enemy attacked Kozatskyi Island, which is quite large. But it was not possible to carry out assault actions there, which the enemy was counting on,- said Serhiy Bratchuk. He emphasized that fire control over the islands from our right bank is the responsibility of the Defense Forces of Ukraine. -The enemy has a present plan to try to create something - this is such a -blue dream- of the Russians - to create something like our Krynyk, what we had on the left bank. That's what they say: -do it on the right bank a la Krynka in order to continue your offensive actions.- But today we are not talking about forcing the Dnieper, because we understand that the Russians do not have, first of all, the resources, because some units are also withdrawn from the Dnieper direction and transferred as reserves, in particular, to Kurakhivsko-Pokrovsky. All offensives on the right bank are also simply impossible today,- Serhii Bratchuk summarized. As reported by ArmyInform, near Kherson, Russians attack the Dnipro islands on air mattresses.

Title: The enemy struck Nikopol region six times, damaged infrastructure
Description: This was announced by the head of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Serhiy Lysak. The Russians sent kamikaze drones to the district center. Chervonogrihorivska and Pokrovsk communities were hit with heavy artillery. An infrastructure facility was damaged in Nikopol. Specialists are determining what other destructions we have in the local settlements due to the attacks of the Russians. Fortunately, there were no casualties anywhere. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 24, according to preliminary information, attack on Chernihiv region.

Title: The season of vertical navigation — another Russian crossing was bombed in Kurshchyna
Description: The video was published on the channel of Air Force fighters of the Sonyashnyk Armed Forces. the Russians had been building a crossing over the Seim near the village of Karizh for several days and had just begun to use it when SDBs arrived - American high-precision cruise bombs that hit the target precisely. At the time of the attack, there was a Russian military truck on the crossing, it seems that it went on its maiden voyage. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the 39th tactical aviation brigade of the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine hit guided bombs GBU-39 Small Diameter Bomb on dugouts with enemy manpower and ammunition in the Zaporizhzhia direction.

Title: The General Staff showed how Australian instructors train soldiers of the Armed Forces in Britain
Description: This was reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Australian instructors are hard at work training commanders of duty units, platoons and companies for the Armed Forces of Ukraine as part of the multinational initial operation INTERFLEX in Great Britain. The training was a great opportunity to exchange ideas and strengthen our relationship. As reported, in Great Britain within the scope of the Interflex operation -2025-rik/->held an international partner conference dedicated to planning the training of the Ukrainian military for 2025. ArmyInform published a series of materials about the training of Ukrainian servicemen in Great Britain as part of the Interflex operation.

Title: the Russians are afraid that the Armed Forces will force the Dnipro - they put their -northern fleet...
Description: This was spoken of the Southern Defense Forces Colonel Vladyslav Voloshyn on November 24. -In particular, in the west, in the area of ​​the Tendrivskaya and Kinburn spits, there are representatives of the -Northern Fleet of the Russian Federation-, and they, by the way, are now increasing the number of groups in order to defend and destroy, in which case, our landing force, which will try to force these braids The Russians are afraid that we will force the Dnipro there, land and hit their left flank,- said Vladyslav Voloshyn. Next, according to him, are the groups of the -Southern Military District- - three combined armies. Then - representatives of the Eastern Military District, two combined armies. -In addition, there are representatives of widows here - about seven brigades and regiments. Therefore, the group is quite serious, it constantly conducts rotational activities of units that participate in assaults. In addition, they constantly bring in replenishment in order, in particular, to replenish losses. Do they transfer any new ones?... Large groups are not transferred, some units, for example, assault units or drone operators, are transferred. We have information that one of the small units was transferred from Donetsk in order to intensify their assaults,- the spokesman summarized. As ArmyInform wrote, in the Zaporizhzhia direction na-zaporizkomu-napryamku/-> Russian troops storm the positions of the Defense Forces of Ukraine in small groups.

Title: Air defense systems, armored vehicles, plans for 2025: Serhiy Boev held a meeting with the State Sec...
Description: About this reports MOU. The negotiations took place on the sidelines of the 16th International Security Forum, which is taking place in the Canadian city of Halifax. This annual conference is one of the world's most influential and representative platforms for discussing global security and defense issues. Serhiy Boev thanked Germany for the Patriot and IRIS-T air defense systems provided, which are critically necessary in the conditions of constant Russian missile attacks on Ukrainian cities and villages. The parties exchanged information on cooperation plans in 2025 and discussed what types of weapons could be delivered. -We discussed the possibility of deeper involvement of Germany in the supply of heavy armored vehicles for Ukraine,- Serhii Boev said after the negotiations. He also suggested to his German colleague to consider the possibility of deeper cooperation between Ukrainian and German defense companies in the spheres of air defense and armored vehicles production.

Title: The Defense Forces named the reason for the decrease in the number of Shaheds
Description: This was spoken of the Southern Defense Forces Colonel Vladyslav Voloshyn on November 24. -When it was windy yesterday, the number of drones was 40 percent less than in the previous days, when the weather was more or less favorable for UAVs and, in general, for the conduct of hostilities,- said Vladyslav Voloshyn. Therefore, the weather also affects the intensity of destruction of enemy equipment. -And the same number of destroyed reconnaissance drones, in particular, eagles, zalls, superkams - when the weather is good, we destroy them much more. And when less flies, we destroy less,- explained Vladyslav Voloshyn. As ArmyInform wrote, according to the data of the Defense Forces, Iranian designers have not solved the technical problem of their kamikaze drones, with which the Russians attack peaceful Ukrainian cities. It is, in particular, about the influence of weather conditions on the quality of the flight of the Shaheds.

Title: Studying the norms of international humanitarian law: the Armed Forces organized additional classes ...
Description: This was notified by the General Staff of the ZSU. According to the decision of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, General Oleksandr Syrskyi, in order to maximize the coverage of the personnel of military units, authoritative international organizations were also involved in such exercises. Thus, in November 2024, thanks to the support of the international humanitarian organization -Geneva Call-, six additional training sessions on IHL were provided for more than 200 sergeants of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in various military garrisons. The most valuable thing is that the educational trainings are conducted with an emphasis on practical modeling of possible problem situations in the field of application of IHL norms on the battlefield with the determination of the optimal algorithm of actions to solve them. In addition, the systematic holding of such classes contributed to the establishment of an active exchange of experience and educational practices between representatives of the legal services of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and international organizations, in particular the -Geneva Call-, which take care of training military personnel in the rules and customs of warfare. The practical implementation of the mentioned project is ensured by the NGO -League of Officers-, which is an executive partner of international organizations that cooperate with the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the field of application of IHL norms.

Title: The occupiers hit Chernihiv Oblast, there is an injured person
Description: This was reported by the head of Chernihiv OVA Vyacheslav Chaus. Two explosions were heard in the Koryukiv district. Farm buildings were damaged, a 28-year-old man was injured, he was hospitalized in one of the local hospitals. There are damaged houses in the Chernihiv district, a community near Chernihiv. Currently, information on the consequences of the Russian shelling is being clarified. As ArmiyaInform reported, the occupying Russian army began to strike more often the city of Slovyansk in Donetsk region. In particular, the occupiers drop guided aerial bombs on the city.

Title: Investments in the Ukrainian defense industry: Rustem Umyerov talked about agreements with 4 countri...
Description: reported this by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov, following the results of a trip to several European countries. Each of the mentioned countries has already announced funding for our production, in particular, for our Ukrainian long-range drones and missiles. Norway has allocated 500 million kroner (45 million dollars) to finance Ukrainian production. Denmark will continue investing in the Ukrainian defense industry according to the -Danish model- in 2025, and will also increase military support to Ukraine in 2025 to 2.2 billion euros. Part of this aid will be directed to the training of brigades, joint defense projects and financing under the -Danish model 2.0-, which will speed up arms deliveries and invest in Ukrainian defense enterprises. Sweden is joining the -Danish model- to finance the production of Ukrainian long-range drones. Lithuania signed a Memorandum of Understanding , which provides for the first tranche of 10 million euros for the production of Ukrainian weapons, in particular within the framework of the -Palyanytsia- project. These funds will be transferred in the near future. Another important result is that new format of cooperation - -Nordic Group - Ukraine-, which unites 12 key countries: Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Finland, Iceland, Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania, Germany, the Netherlands, Poland and Great Britain. These are the states that provide the largest military support to Ukraine in Europe. The first meeting was held in Denmark, the next is planned in Ukraine. -During the negotiations with partners, clear directions of cooperation for 2025 were determined: training and equipping brigades, joint projects in the defense-industrial complex, procurement of drones, air defense systems and ammunition. Thanks to our partners for their support! We continue to look for new opportunities, expand cooperation and work together for a common victory!- - said Rustem Umyerov.

Title: They burned the tank, burned the barn, too — our pilots developed a new method of strikes
Description: The video of the defeat was released on November 24 on the unit's channel. Our thermally charged FPV drone flew up to the immobilized Russian tank and carefully placed its ammunition on its brazier. The thermal charge began to burn, burning first the anti-drone protection of the tank, and then its turret. As a result, the tank caught fire. -Funeral of metal Katsap shit that will never go anywhere,- the video was commented on in the unit. The funeral went out with a fire: As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the units of the Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytsky crushed the enemy armored column with infantry in the area Great Novosilka.

Title: Today, the defense forces repelled 12 attacks in Kurshchyna, fighting continues in the Kurakhiv and ...
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff Armed Forces Today, the communities of settlements of Chernihiv and Sumy regions, such as Solyaniki, Khrinivka, Basivka, Zhuravka, Novenke, Oleksandria, Volfine, Obody and Timofiivka, were affected by enemy artillery and mortar fire. In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy twice attacked the positions of our units in the area of ​​Tykhi and Vovchansk, one attack was repulsed by our soldiers, the battle is currently ongoing. Enemy aircraft also attacked Granovo with aerial bombs. In the Kupyansk direction, the Russian occupiers attacked the Defense Forces eight times in the areas of Novomlynsk, Kolisnykyvka, Kruglyakivka, Senkovo ​​and Lozova. In the Lyman direction, the invading army carried out 19 attacks on Ukrainian positions near the settlements of Druzhelyubivka, Grekivka, Novoehorivka, Terny, Yampolivka, Torske, and Serebryanka during the day, three skirmishes are still ongoing. Ukrainian soldiers steadfastly hold the defense and inflict losses on the enemy. In the Kramatorsk direction since the beginning of the day, units of the Defense Forces have repelled four attacks by Russian invaders near Chasovoy Yar and Stupochky. In the direction of Toretsk, the aggressor made six attempts to advance in the districts of Diliivka, Toretsk, and Shcherbinivka, one combat clash is ongoing. In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian invaders made 16 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their positions in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promenya, Lysivka, Hryhorivka, Dachensky, Pustinka, and Chumatsky. The defense forces restrained the onslaught and repelled 12 enemy attacks, four clashes are still ongoing. In the Kurakhiv direction the enemy army attacked 34 times near settlements such as Berestki, Sontsivka, Novodmytrivka, Zorya, Kurakhove, Dalnye, Romanivka, Elizavetivka, and Hanivka. Twenty-three attempts by the occupiers to advance have already been repulsed, and fighting continues. In the Vremivsk direction, five enemy attacks continue near Trudovoy, Novosilka and Makarivka. Ukrainian defenders have already repelled eight attacks by the occupiers in this direction. In the Dnieper direction the enemy tried unsuccessfully once to attack the positions of Ukrainian units. The operation in the Kursk region is ongoing. Enemy aviation continues to destroy their villages and cities. Since the beginning of the day, Russian planes have carried out 18 strikes, dropping 21 anti-aircraft missiles on their own territory. The defense forces repelled 12 attacks by the occupying forces of the Russian Federation in this direction today, the fighting continues. There are no significant changes in the rest of the directions.

Title: - Our portraits are the most beautiful - Russian fighters were sent reinforcements in the form of Pu...
Description: Serhii, the spokesman of the volunteer Ukrainian army -South- told about this in ArmiyaTV stream Bratchuk -A corresponding directive has arrived for the Russian troops: every dugout should now have a portrait of the -bunker grandfather- and their so-called defense minister. I understand that this will certainly raise the motivation for the Russians; of course, it can make them happy. And things will go much better for them,- commented Serhiy Bratchuk ironically. He also added that there are those servicemen who still want to surrender. -And this is the best way to stay alive. But you see that the Zampolites take care of just such moral and psychological support of those troops, which, according to their moral composition, are not motivated. Because the mobilization resources that come, in particular, to these units, are poorly prepared and are thrown into battle, where they take a -ticket to a concert in Kobzon,- Serhiy Bratchuk summarized. As reported by ArmyInform, the President of Ukraine called on the world -pragne-myru/->strengthen sanctions because -Putin spits in the face of those who seek peace.-

Title: Carlson on minimalkas! — the occupier tried to take off on our drone
Description: The video was published on the battalion channel. In the very first scene, the Russian tried to ride our FPV drone, and threw himself at it with his back, apparently he really wanted to fly. And it succeeded! True, complete fragmentation of the invader took place. Another Russian was able to escape from one drone, and from the second, but the third forced him to be urgently demobilized. See even more Russian death in the video:   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 414th battalion of unmanned aerial systems -Birds of Madyara- as part of the marines showed their method of overcoming enemy anti-drone defense.

Title: In Toretsk, the Russian military killed two and wounded one civilian
Description: This was reported by the Donetsk Regional Prosecutor's Office. Russian military personnel entered one of the apartments in the residential quarter of the city of Toretsk, where three civilians were staying. The occupiers deliberately opened fire on them from automatic weapons, as a result of which two local residents died on the spot. The man who was next to them was injured, with fractures to his shoulder and collarbone. Currently, the victim is receiving qualified medical assistance. Investigative (search) actions aimed at establishing all the circumstances of the specified event are being conducted. Under the procedural leadership of the Bakhmut district prosecutor's office, a pre-trial investigation was launched into the fact of committing a war crime that caused the death of people (Part 2 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). As reported by ArmyInform, soldiers of the -Tsunami- assault regiment of the -Lyut- brigade of the National Police of Ukraine captured the occupier.

Title: In the Luhansk region, our tank drove up close to the Russians and -dismantled- them in landing
Description: This is stated in the message of NSU on its Facebook page. In the video from the drone, you can see how our tank approaches the Russian positions hidden in the landing at a distance of several hundred meters. After that, he fires about ten shots at the occupants and returns to his position unharmed. -I drove in - worked - returned: all within a few minutes. Well-coordinated and professional work,- says the post to the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the units of the Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytskyi /->crushed the enemy armored column with infantry in the area of ​​Velika Novosilka.

Title: It took off, swallowed energy, destroyed it - the everyday work of our pilots on the front lines
Description: The video was published on the battalion channel. Lubart drones help stop enemy assaults near New York, destroy enemy equipment and personnel. The video captures the work from launching the drone to hitting the targets. While the drone is flying, the operator has time to drink energy to maintain concentration and reaction speed. The countdown of their lives begins for Russian attack aircraft. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 12th special purpose brigade -Azov- of the National Guard first force the Russian soldiers to climb into the ground, and -jorku/->then destroy.

Title: The number of Russian shelling of Sloviansk increased this week — MBA
Description: The head of the city's military administration, Vadym Lyakh, said this on -Society. Studio-. -As a rule, it is not one bomb, several of them arrive at a time. The problem is that it is very difficult to warn about the arrival of the KABs with the alarm signal that sounds, because they are in the sky for a short time. Enemy aviation operates both on the front line and in our cities,- said Vadym Lyakh. According to him, this week the number of shelling increased, there were casualties among civilians. The infrastructure was also affected — some neighborhoods of the city were without electricity for 15-20 hours as a result of damage to high-voltage networks outside the city. About 50,000 people remain in the city of Slovyansk, almost 5,000 of them are children. Hospitals, critical infrastructure, at least 13 points of invincibility in case of blackouts function here. In the community, about six thousand houses are not equipped with gas supply - they are helped with firewood by volunteers, local and state authorities. As reported by ArmiyaInform, on November 22, around 10:00 a.m., the Russian invaders hit the village of Krasnotorka of the Kramatorsk urban community in Donetsk region with six rockets with cluster submunitions. Read more about this in our report from the scene.

Title: the Russians are preparing to break through to the south of Donetsk region
Description: This was spoken of the Southern Defense Forces Colonel Vladyslav Voloshyn on November 24. -On the Orihiv and Gulyaipil directions, the enemy is preparing to carry out assault operations and soon, there is a high probability that he will start assault operations, trying to wedge into our defense,- said Vladyslav Voloshyn. When asked by the host about what exactly indicates this, Voloshyn said that our intelligence is transmitting information that assault groups are preparing. -These are small groups of infantry that conduct classes specifically on assault operations. In addition, in these directions, the enemy is dropping ammunition, conducting aerial reconnaissance using UAVs, engineering reconnaissance, advance routes... In addition, the enemy is actively trying to hit the previously identified ones in these directions... and scouting out where our fire equipment is located, trying to suppress and destroy them in order to make it easier for them to carry out assault actions,- says the spokesman. On the Vremivsk combined direction, the enemy uses equipment, in particular, armored. The day before yesterday, our fighters destroyed 4 enemy tanks and about a dozen and a half armored combat vehicles. During the past day, the enemy used combat equipment only to transport groups of infantry and, in the event of that, to support their assault actions with fire. -The enemy is trying to break through to the south of the Donetsk region, where the Donetsk and Dnipropetrovsk regions meet; where one of the largest settlements in this area is located — Velyka Novosilka,- concluded Vladyslav Voloshyn. As ArmyInform wrote, last day, according to the General Staff of the Armed Forces, in the Vremiv direction, the enemy carried out 26 assaults on our positions in the areas of Velika Novosilka, Novodarivka, Trudovoy, Suhy Yali, Rozdolny, Kostiantynopol and Rivnopil.

Title: Epic battle - our -Vampire- defeated the Russian -Batman-
Description: The video was published on the company's channel. Our pilots on the bomber -Vampire- (the frightened Russians call it -Baboy Yaga-) were patrolling the area when they noticed a strange figure in the dark. It turned out that the Russian attack aircraft had put on a thermal raincoat and walked towards our positions in it. The Russian's idea was that our drones should not notice him in a raincoat. But the occupier was wrong. Our aerial scouts spotted the enemy and made an accurate drop, after which they recorded the defeat of the Russian. -I rewatched cartoons, felt like a superhero, put on an invisibility cloak, and ran to storm Ukrainian positions… Didn't catch up, didn't work out… Our -Baba Yaga- turned out to be a -horror that flies on the wings of the night- for the Russian, which interrupted his movement on Ukrainian land,- commented the video in the mouth. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the company of unmanned attack aircraft complexes of the 65th mechanized brigade near Robotyn Zaporizhzhia regions took the moment suicide of the Russian invader.

Title: On motorcycles and ATVs: the Defense Forces talked about the tactics of the Russians in the Zaporozh...
Description: About this on the air “Social.News” said the head of the section of the first battalion of the 3rd operational brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine Ihor Shafigulin. -Over the past week, the enemy tried several times to carry out assaults by small groups of up to 10 occupiers. There were also attempts to carry out assaults on motorcycles and ATVs. Military personnel of -Spartan- discovered the invaders in advance and destroyed them: with artillery, skids and FPV drones,- said Ihor Shafigulin. He added that the Russians are accumulating personnel at their -points-, after which the groups try to carry out assault operations. -Usually their total number is up to 20 servicemen. If the first wave has arrived, then the second is launched. If the first offensive was not successful, then occupiers are added to the -point- in order to continue the assault attempts,- said Ihor Shafigulin. As reported by ArmyInform, the occupiers also put constant pressure on our positions with small infantry groups that are constantly trying to approach our positions.

Title: One against six enemies: our warrior stopped the Russian assault group
Description: The video was published on the Facebook page of the battalion. In the footage from the drone, you can see how the occupiers are advancing through the trenches with the intention of seizing Ukrainian positions. A serviceman with the call sign -Kum- met them in automatic turns. The Russian military was frightened by such resistance and began to retreat. Some of them tried to hide in the remains of the landing, but were eliminated by drones. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the units of the Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytskyi /->crushed the enemy armored column with infantry in the area of ​​Velika Novosilka.

Title: The GUR spoke about the tactics of using Magura V5 attack marine drones
Description: This was reported to the GUR of the MOU. -It is already a fact, it has already happened: Ukraine dominates the Black Sea over the Russian Federation,- said the intelligence officer. He described some elements of the tactics of using combat -Magur-. -The first drone is, you know, such a 'hooligan.' It doesn't matter to him where to touch - he just has to start a fight,- explained the Thirteenth. The scout recalled that after the destruction of a number of enemy ships, the Black Sea fleet of the aggressor state of Russia remains paralyzed, although it continues to consume large monetary resources. -The fact that the Russian fleet is paralyzed is a good thing. But it exists. We have to get him. And we are working in this direction. It is a constant game, like chess. The situation is changing. Technologies are changing extremely quickly,- said the commander of the GUR special unit. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ukrainian Magura was recognized as the most effective naval attack drone: during the large-scale invasion of Russia, the soldiers of the GUR of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine used this weapon successfully hit 18 Russian ships, 9 of which were completely destroyed.

Title: The occupiers shelled Kherson with artillery, there are wounded
Description: This was reported by Khersonska ODA. As a result of the shelling, an 83-year-old woman was injured, who was on the street at the time of the impact. She has explosive and craniocerebral injuries, a contusion, as well as a partial traumatic amputation of the forearm. The victim was in a serious condition, she was taken to the hospital. Later it became known that another person was injured due to the Russian shelling of the Dnipro district. A 65-year-old woman went to the hospital on her own. She was diagnosed with an explosive injury, chest, shoulder and leg injuries. Doctors provide the victims with the necessary assistance. As reported by ArmiyaInform, during the week, Russia used more than 800 guided aerial bombs, about 460 attack drones and more than 20 missiles of various types against Ukraine.

Title: I'm in shock! Do not climb here ever! — the last video from the phone of the Russian commander in Ku...
Description: The video was published on November 24 on the brigade channel. Together with his detachment, the occupier completely destroyed one of the villages in the Kurshchyna, trying unsuccessfully to knock out units of the Galician paratroopers from it. Having suffered losses, the Russians ran to the basements. Frightened, without communication, water and food, they waited for reinforcements for almost a week. But instead of help – received an order for another attempt at a meat assault, which turned out to be the last for -Larkin- and his subordinates. -Every day, hundreds of fortune-seekers like Larkin end their lives in confrontation with the Ukrainian army. The mercenaries realize the mistake of the decision to go to this war too late - when there are almost no chances of salvation. This video is an example of how Russia sends thousands of its citizens to their death, who regret that they became victims of propaganda and took up arms against Ukrainians before their death,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the 80th Galician Airborne Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine captured 26 troops of the Russian army in the Kursk region at once.

Title: Losses of the Russian army in a week: 9,860 invaders and more than 1,560 units of weapons and equipm...
Description: This was reported by the commander of the Ground Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, Lieutenant General Oleksandr Pavliuk. Weapons and military equipment of the Russian troops suffered significant losses, in particular, 73 tanks and 188 armored combat vehicles were destroyed. Ukrainian defenders also destroyed 209 artillery systems, two MLRS and five air defense systems. It was possible to successfully hit 543 units of vehicles, 26 units of special equipment and shoot down 123 enemy missiles and 392 UAVs of the operational-tactical level. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of November 24, units of the missile forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in cooperation with other components of the Defense Forces destroyed in the territory of the Kursk region the radar station of the anti-aircraft the S-400 missile system.

Title: The weather-dependent - Shaheds - continue to fly less in bad weather
Description: Serhii Bratchuk, the spokesman of the volunteer Ukrainian army -South- told about this in the ArmiyaTV stream. According to him, the weather conditions worsened in the southern direction: gusts of wind, low cloud cover, rains are beginning. -This affects the operation of UAVs, and kamikaze drones, -shaheeds-, including. There are technical problems that the enemy has not been able to solve. Even those who created these Shaheds - Iranian designers - failed to solve the problem. I hope it won't work. That is, in this case, the weather is in our hands. This also applies, including some types of tactical aviation. Therefore, the air today is more or less relatively calm. Although the activity of the aviation component during the week has always been and is high. When the weather improves – the enemy will begin to use it more actively. Moreover, the enemy uses it in all directions,- explained Serhiy Bratchuk. As reported by ArmyInform, 50 enemy UAVs were shot down over Ukraine.

Title: Tiger hunters - Teroboron troops hunted down the first enemy -Tiger- in Kurshchyna
Description: The video of the combat work was released on the unit's channel. The equipment was impressive on the move. The Russians were not helped by their EW systems installed on transport. The affected -Tiger- drove into the bushes to burn out. -The first festive (but we are sure not the last) knocked down by The Ravens -Tiger- from Katsap joins the mountain of scrap metal that we filled during the last months in Kurshchyna. Loaves are already commonplace, if it weren't for the dead katsaps that come with them, it wouldn't be interesting at all,- the unit commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of The Ravens unit of the 129th brigade of the Territorial Defense Forces recorded a case of striptease from a Russian attack aircraft that tried to shoot down our drone with a jacket.

Title: Over the course of a week, Russia used more than 800 anti-tank missiles — the President
Description: This is stated in the post of the President, which was published on the morning of November 24. >. -Only this night, our air defense forces managed to shoot down about 50 attack drones. During the week, Russia used more than 800 guided aerial bombs, about 460 attack drones and more than 20 missiles of various types against Ukraine and our people,- Volodymyr Zelenskyi said. He noted that Ukraine is not a weapons testing ground. -Ukraine is a sovereign and independent state. But Russia still continues its efforts to destroy our people, sow fear and panic, and weaken us. Ukraine needs more air defense, and we are working on this with our partners. It is very important to strengthen the protection of our sky. Thank you to everyone in the world who understands and helps,- said the President. As reported by ArmyInform, Volodymyr Zelensky criticized the G20 summit because of weak support for Ukraine.

Title: The Kursk battle continues — the defense forces hit the enemy air defense system -S-400-
Description: This was reported on October 24 by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. A successful hit to the radar station of the S-400 anti-aircraft missile complex was recorded. -It should be noted that the indicated unit of the Russian Armed Forces conducted combat operations in the -ground-to-ground- mode, that is, hitting land-based stationary targets. Civilian objects and peaceful residents of settlements in the front-line regions of Ukraine mostly fall under such shelling by the Russian invaders. Combat work on the military objectives of the occupiers continues,- the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine said in a statement. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces showed a missile attack on the territory of the terrorist country.

Title: The enemy starts hysteria when they hear it - Baba Yaga - sows not only death, but also panic
Description: This was told in the ArmyTV stream by the sergeant of the RUBPAK unit of the -Hart- DPSU brigade with the call sign -Fox-. -And when they hear that -Baba Yaga- flies over their position - they just start hysterics, the whole air is jammed,- said Fox. According to him, the enemy is actively using artillery and mortars, FPV drones, and airstrikes in the Vovchan direction. -Unfortunately, while we cannot do anything with their KABs, their gunners and mortars have repeatedly paid for their actions and have been transferred to the status of so-called -good Russians.- Their reconnaissance UAVs of the -wing- type (-halls-, -superkams-, -orlans-) are still bothering. However, we learned to fight with them, and, I don't know why, but their -wings- began to fall for some reason. Why? Let it be a mystery,- noted Fox. When asked by the presenter if there are military personnel from the DPRK in the direction where the -Fox- unit is defending, the serviceman replied: -We cannot say that we saw a North Korean soldier at the moment. However, if they appear on our site, we will also destroy them with various forces and means. There is no big difference: we destroy the Russians or we destroy the Koreans. For us, those who are enemies, and they will pay for the fact that they came to our land.- As reported by ArmyInform, border guards of the -Hart- brigade with mortars and FPV drones in the Vovchansk direction -nashi-bijczi-vidpraczyuvaly-na-vovchanskomu-napryamku/->caused losses to manpower and equipment of the occupiers.

Title: Blow to pieces in Vovchansk - Russian attack aircraft cannot withstand meeting with FPV drones
Description: The video of the combat work was released on November 24 on the brigade's channel. The invaders tried to hide behind buildings, disguise themselves in grass or bushes, but it did not help them. -Our operators disrupt the enemy's plans by delivering precise strikes on their positions and manpower. Thanks to skill and innovative approaches, the enemy remains disoriented and loses the initiative. Mastery in every flight, strength in every decision!-, the team commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 82nd Bukovyna Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces <a href=-https://armyinform.com.ua/2024/10/25/teper-i-na-kurshhyni-desantnyky-vlashtuvaly-vorogu-dorogu- all 14 kilometers between the villages of Lyubimovka and Snagost of the Kursk region of the Russian Federation.

Title: Decolonization on the march — our drones destroyed the assault column of the Russians
Description: A video of the battle was released on the channel of Bulava strike drones. Chimera, Nova, and the 20th special purpose battalion also took part in the defeat of the Russians. The occupiers went on an assault in a column led by a tank shed. He was followed by MTLB with grills to protect the landing party. On the way, our FPV drones started working on them, as a result of which several pieces of equipment were knocked down. As reported by ArmyInform, during the battle in the area of ​​Velika Novosilka against enemy infantry hiding in a landing, our -Queen of Hornets- drone with a machine gun installed on it.

Title: 50 enemy UAVs were shot down over Ukraine
Description: This was reported on the morning of November 24 Air Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine In total, 73 enemy UAVs were detected and escorted. Aviation, anti-aircraft missile units, electronic warfare equipment and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine are involved in repelling the attack. As of 09:00, air defense shot down 50 enemy drones in the Kyiv, Cherkasy, Kirovohrad, Chernihiv, Sumy, Poltava, and Zhytomyr regions. 19 drones were lost in location, presumably due to active anti-aircraft defense of the Defense Forces. -There are 4 enemy UAVs in the air, combat work continues! Information is being updated. Let's keep the sky! Together - to victory!- - said in the message of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, during the last enemy attack 64 enemy drones were shot down, mainly in the center of the country and in the northeastern regions.

Title: The enemy carried out more than a quarter of a thousand attacks - the General Staff of the Armed For...
Description: Operational information as of 08.00 November 24 was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine . The situation at the front remains difficult. The enemy, using his advantage in manpower and equipment, attacks our positions. Ukrainian defenders steadfastly restrained the onslaught of the occupiers and inflicted significant losses on the enemy. The aggressor carried out airstrikes in the areas of Lozova settlements in the Kharkiv region; Hard bread of Luhansk region; Hryhorivka, Bilogorivka, Chasiv Yar, Toretsk, Nelipivka, Katerynivka, Ivanopillia, Yablunivka, Zorya, Oleksandropil, Grodivka, Myrolyubivka, Elizavetivka, Sukha Balka, Dachne, Romanivka, Ulakli, Kostiantynopol, Velika Novosilka of the Donetsk region. Over the past day, aviation, missile forces and artillery of the Defense Forces hit two areas of concentration of personnel, weapons and military equipment, and one radar station of the enemy. Last day, 13 combat clashes took place in the Kharkiv direction with the Russian invaders in the Vovchansk and Tykhoi districts. In the Kupyansk direction, 12 attacks by invaders took place during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Hlushkivka, Sinkivka, Zagryzovy, Novoplatonivka, Kindrashyvka, Pischany and Zeleny Gay. The enemy attacked 17 times in the Lyman direction. Tried to wedge into our defenses near Druzhelyubivka, Tverdokhlibovo, Novoyehorivka, Grekivka, Novomykhailivka, Cherneshchyna, Kopanok, Yampolivka, and Terni. On the Siverskyi direction last day, our defenders repelled one enemy assault in the area of ​​Bilogorivka. In the Kramatorsk direction, the occupiers attacked three times in the areas of Stupochki and Chasovoy Yar. In the direction of Toretsk, the enemy made two attacks towards Toretsk. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 55 attacks by the aggressor in the areas of Promin, Lysivka, Krutiy Yar, Myrnograd, Hryhorivka, Myrolyubivka, Zhovte, Pushkine, Petrivka and Pustinka settlements. The largest concentration of clashes was near Dachenskyi. The enemy actively used bombing and attack aircraft for strikes on the direction. In the Kurakhiv direction, the Defense Forces repelled 47 attacks. Actively using aviation, the occupiers tried to advance near Berestki, Dalny, Romanivka, Sontsivka, Zora, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhovo, Katerynivka, and Antonivka. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy carried out 26 assaults on our positions in the areas of Velika Novosilka, Novodarivka, Trudovoy, Suhy Yali, Rozdolny, Kostyantinopilsky and Rivnopilly. The enemy did not carry out assaults in the Gulyaipil and Orihiv directions last day. Five times, without success, the invading forces tried to dislodge units of the Defense Forces from their positions in the Dnieper direction. The operation is ongoing in the Kursk region. Over the past day, the enemy fired 197 artillery shells at the positions of our soldiers, 13 of them from rocket salvo systems. No signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected in the Volyn and Poliske directions. Our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying troops and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. In general, the Russian invaders lost 1,020 people last day. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed four tanks, 17 armored combat vehicles, five artillery systems, one operational-tactical UAV, 14 vehicles and a unit of special equipment. As reported by ArmyInform, more than a thousand soldiers and 17 armored vehicles oprylyudnyv-vtraty-voroga/->made up the losses of the enemy for the past day.

Title: They send 1-2, they say that their own are ahead - in the Kramatorsk direction, the enemy is resorti...
Description: This was reported on the ArmyTV stream by the chief sergeant of the 93rd mechanized brigade -Kholodny Yar- Ivan Buryak. -They deceive their own people. They send one or two soldiers at a time, explain that go, your own are waiting for you there. And they go, not afraid. There are moments when the Russian goes to our positions -relaxed-, takes his time and does not strain. And when you see our FPV drone, you start running quickly,- said Ivan Buryak. According to him, the Russians are accumulating under the rubble, and then they are trying to get through the landings to the canal, where they are storming our positions. The demarcation line has been held in this area for a year and a half, so all positions are well known. -At first it was under the enemy, then we knocked it out, now there is a -brimstone-. But this territory is perfectly known both to us and to them,- explained Ivan Buryak. As reported by ArmyInform, in the 93rd mechanized brigade -Cold Ravine- -poranenyh-bijcziv/->told about their team of medics working at the brigade stabilization point.

Title: APCs have run out — in Kurshchyna, the enemy is attacking on buggies, motorcycles and
Description: The video of combat work was released on November 24 on the brigade's channel. Artillery halted the advance of attack aircraft, and drones, both FPV and bombers, engaged in mopping up enemy infantry. -Mykolaiv marines repel the attacks of numerous assault groups of the enemy every day, who use various offensive tactics. For your attention, there are several moments of our defense in Kurshchyna, where the enemy uses buggies, motorcycles and other artisanal methods for movement,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, Mykolaiv marines destroy elite Russian soldiers.

Title: The enemy took ships with -calibers- — the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine into the Black Sea
Description: as of 06:00 on November 24 the Naval Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces reported this. According to their data, there are no enemy ships in the Azov and Mediterranean seas. During the day, in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: to the Black Sea - 4 vessels, of which 1 continued its movement in the direction of the Bosphorus Strait; to the Sea of ​​Azov - 5 ships, of which 3 were moving from the Bosphorus Strait. Russia continues to violate the International Convention for the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the government approved /a> implementation plan of the Maritime Security Strategy of Ukraine, developed by the Ministry of Defense.

Title: More than a thousand soldiers and 17 armored vehicles — the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukr...
Description: This was reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 24.11.24 are estimated to be: The data is being verified… As reported by ArmyInform, during the day before the loss of the enemy vtraty-rf/->composed dozens of artillery systems, BBM and more than 1,400 infantrymen.

Title: Ukraine's invitation to NATO membership is fundamental for achieving peace - Serhii Boev
Description: About this notified the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The negotiations took place on the sidelines of the 16th International Security Forum, which is taking place in the Canadian city of Halifax. This annual conference is one of the world's most influential and representative platforms for discussing global security and defense issues. From 2022, a significant part of the agenda of the forum is dedicated to finding ways to repel Russia's armed aggression against Ukraine. NATO is extremely important for ensuring peace and will strengthen the security of Ukraine and NATO itself.- He added that it will also evidence of the determination of Ukraine's partners. In addition, the parties discussed the current state and plans for assistance to Ukraine from NATO countries, as well as the formation of military capabilities necessary for the implementation of the Victory Plan President Volodymyr Zelenskyi. Special attention was paid to the state of implementation of current aid programs and the prospects of new joint projects of Ukraine and NATO. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense and the Swedish delegation discussed provision of military assistance in 2025.

Title: Pour from the sky! — the first ever combat use of a drone with a machine gun
Description: A video of the combat operation of the new weapon was released on November 24 on the Ukrainian drone community channel -Wild Hornets-. -The first ever combat use of a drone with a machine gun! The day before, the Katsapas tried to storm our positions in the area of ​​Velikay Novosilka. Their entire column of equipment was destroyed by drones, the infantry hid in the landing. The Queen of Hornets drone, equipped with a machine gun, was sent to clear out the infantry,- commented the video in -Wild Hornets-. According to the channel, the invention was invented and tested by fighters of the -Bulava- strike drone unit of the presidential brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytskyi. -During the battle, the drone received several bullets, but continued to work,- noted in -Wild Hornets-. ArmyInform talked about the experience of the Bulava unit, where the FPV drone they teach to shoot from a grenade launcher.

Title: A quarter of all enemy attacks fell on the Pokrovsky direction — the General Staff of the Armed Forc...
Description: Operational information as of 10:00 p.m. November 23 was published by the General Staff of the ZSU . There were 13 combat clashes with the Russian invaders in the Kharkiv direction. Eleven attacks in the Vovchansk and Tykh regions were repelled by Ukrainian soldiers, two more are ongoing. In the Kupyansk direction, the enemy tried 12 times to dislodge our units from their occupied positions near Hlushkivka, Synkivka, Zagryzovo, Novoplatonivka, Kindrashyvka, Pischany, and Zeleny Gay. Seventeen times the enemy attacked in the Lymansky direction, trying to advance in the direction of Druzhelyubivka, Tverdokhlibovo, Novoyehorivka, Grekivka, Novomykhailivka, Cherneshchyna, Kopanok, Yampolivka, and Terniv. In addition, the enemy carried out airstrikes with unguided missiles on the settlement of Tverdokhlibove. Our defenders repelled one enemy assault in the Siverskyi direction in the Beilohorivka area. Attacking the settlement of Chasiv Yar with unguided missiles in the direction of Kramatorsk, the enemy carried out three assaults on the positions of our defenders. The activity of the occupiers was manifested in the areas of Stupochki and Chasovoy Yar, all attempts of the enemy to improve their position were stopped by Ukrainian soldiers. By launching airstrikes on Toretsk, Nelypivka, Katerynivka, and Ivanopil, the enemy twice tried to penetrate our defenses in the Toretsk direction in the vicinity of the settlement of Toretsk. The enemy is intensively attacking the Ukrainian defenders in the Pokrovsky direction. Here, during the day, the aggressor carried out 55 offensive actions. The Russian occupiers are most active in the districts of Promin, Lysivka, Krutyy Yar, Myrnograd, Hryhorivka, Myrolyubivka, Dachenske, Zhovte, Pushkine, Petrivka, and Pustinka. In total, Ukrainian defenders have already repelled 49 attacks in the direction, six more clashes are ongoing. The situation is difficult, but controlled by the Defense Forces. Our soldiers are making efforts to prevent the enemy from advancing deep into Ukrainian territory. According to the currently available information, the losses of the aggressor in this direction amounted to 167 people killed and wounded. Two armored personnel carriers, one infantry fighting vehicle, two vehicles were destroyed. In addition, three enemy infantry fighting vehicles were damaged. At this time of the day, there are 47 combat clashes in the Kurakhiv direction. The invaders remain highly active, trying to advance in the districts of Berestki, Dalny, Romanivka, Sontsivka, Zori, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhovo, Katerynivka, and Antonivka. The enemy carried out airstrikes with guided air bombs on the districts of Dachny, Romanivka and Ulakli. In this direction, the enemy lost 64 people killed and wounded. Our soldiers destroyed one tank, one unit of motor vehicles and six dugouts, two armored vehicles of the enemy's infantry were significantly damaged. Twenty-five clashes took place in the Vremivsk direction. All enemy assaults were stopped in the areas of Velika Novosilka, Novodarivka, Trudovoy, Suhy Yali, Rozdolny, Kostiantynopolski and Rivnopil. The enemy did not conduct active operations in the Gulyaipil direction. The settlements of Temyrivka and Zelene Pole in the Orihiv direction were bombarded by six guided aerial bombs. In the Dnieper direction, our soldiers repelled the attacks of the Russian invaders on the positions of the Ukrainian army five times. There were no significant changes in the situation in other directions. Today, we should celebrate the soldiers of the 28th separate mechanized brigade named after the Knights of the Winter Campaign, the 92nd separate assault brigade named after the Kosh ataman Ivan Sirk, the 13th brigade of the operational assignment of the NGU “Charter”, the 65th separate mechanized brigade, as well as the 124th separate brigade of territorial defense, which in extremely difficult conditions restrain the attacks of the dominant ones forces of the enemy, cause him irreparable losses. As ArmiyaInform reported, the number of clashes per day increased to 125.

Title: How is preparation for takmed: a master class from instructors -Kabana- and-Puma-
Description: Such training of fighters already after arriving from the training center to the battalion is a mandatory element of continued training. No soldier will go on combat missions until he has received additional training, including tactical medicine. The instructors told the correspondents of ArmiyaInform how the training in the technical field takes place and why it is necessary for every fighter newly arrived in the battalion. During training, those who have well mastered the basics of tactical medicine during BZVP have the opportunity and will be able to refresh and consolidate their knowledge. Those who were less attentive and diligent must make up for lost time. — Such training takes place with all newcomers. We work in small groups - from 4‒6 to a maximum of 10 fighters in order to be able to pay attention to everyone, says Vladyslava. Medics must firmly make sure that newly arrived fighters at a sufficient level have mastered the necessary set of knowledge, abilities and skills in order to be able to provide first aid to themselves or a brother in case of injury. To do this, with each successive group of replenishment, they go through the same set of classes, exercises and training again and again. After all, as the Ukrainian proverb says: -Until you try, you won't know how.- — With beginners, we always go through the MARCH algorithm and consolidate knowledge and practice skills in practice. This is necessary so that they do not get lost in the position and during combat, so that everything is done as correctly as possible, she says. — When newcomers come, we treat them as if they know absolutely nothing. We understand that they have already received training at the BZVP, but we need to make sure of the level of their knowledge acquisition, - explains the head of the medical center, Senior Lieutenant Yuriy Faustus. This is why medics work in small groups, which, moreover, can be divided into pairs in such a way that the fighters train on each other and check each other. — Today they listen with interest, work responsibly. Therefore, it was easy to train them - they helped each other, applied tourniquets, made bandages. They themselves checked whether the tourniquet was put on properly, -Puma- says with satisfaction. New arrivals are different, doctors explain. It is easier for someone to explain everything and to teach what is necessary, but for someone it is necessary to force. It's not so bad when a person can't do something, they note - it's much worse if he doesn't want to learn. Not everyone immediately understands where they got to, that they are really at war. Therefore, sometimes it is necessary to force. It is very bad when a person himself does not realize how terrible the consequences of his negligence can be, doctors are convinced. — We must teach all those who come to us so that they do not get lost in combat conditions. Of course, they are not seeing these tourniquets and bandages for the first time, but we understand very well that time and opportunities to bring knowledge and skills to a perfect level are not always enough, - explains Vladyslava. She does not hide that not only the attitude of the fighters, but also the level of their training after passing the BZVP can be different. There are those who after the training center really have a sufficient level of knowledge and skills, but there are also those who wasted their time and did not learn even the most necessary minimum at a sufficient level. — There are cases when they think that they only have to learn how to shoot from an automatic machine, and they don't really need everything else. I encountered this quite often. Because of this, we make sure to train all new arrivals and then try to repeat them every time the opportunity arises, says Yuriy. Because of this attitude, some have to be forced to learn through disciplinary measures. Instead, it's always nice to have one or two motivated fighters in a training group who set the tone and become an example for others to follow. — What is important for us is what we have taught them now, what we have taught them right here. Because we understand that from now on the responsibility for their training lies with us, emphasizes Puma. The truth of these words is confirmed by intensive training, during which Yuriy and Vladislava give 100%, either working with the whole group of fighters at the same time, or by dividing them into pairs or singling out someone alone. It is noticeable that doctors treat their mission extremely responsibly and diligently.

Title: Barrage -Jackal-: a new high-precision missile with a turbojet engine was presented in the USA
Description: As stated in the abstract of this project on the official portal of this corporation with headquarters in Virginia, the Jackal multi-purpose missile (-Шакал- in Ukrainian) can use both lethal and non-lethal payloads for a range of functions such as electronic warfare and reconnaissance, surveillance and intelligence (ISR), ArmyInform reported. Developed in cooperation with AeroVironment, this rocket uses the technological developments of the Switchblade series, a family of ammunition that has already proven itself well in practical applications. It should be noted that the Switchblade barrage drones (-Ejection Knife- in Ukrainian) have repeatedly dopomogy-na-13-mlrd/->included in the packages of weapons that were transferred to the Defense Forces as part of the foreign partnerships and about which our editors in detail she told in her publications. The Jackal missile features a modular configuration that allows integration of lethal and non-lethal payloads suitable for complex military operations. Thanks to its turbojet engine running on JP-10 fuel, the Jackal missile can reach a speed of more than 644 km/h, has a flight range of 100 kilometers and can stay in the air for about 15 minutes. Its useful load capacity is 4.5 kilograms. The open architecture of the Jackal missile allows for flexible integration of various payloads, including electronic warfare (EW) systems, reconnaissance, surveillance and intelligence (ISR) equipment. This missile can be deployed on air, land and sea platforms. The Jackal missile was first presented at the Special Operations Forces Industry Conference (SOFIC) in Tampa, Florida. in May 2022. As the manufacturer explains, the purpose of the Jackal missile was to fill the gap between existing ammunition, such as the Switchblade 300 and Switchblade 600, thanks to increased range, speed and versatility. While the Switchblade 300 is ideal for precision strikes at short ranges and is adept at dealing with armor, the Jackal strikes a balance between speed and payload as it can carry heavy warheads and other essential equipment over long distances while maintaining the flexibility needed to dynamic combat conditions. Moreover, as Northrop Grumman points out, the Jackal missile is an excellent choice for counter-terrorism missions, allowing it to gather valuable information in difficult environments for a long time before striking. As emphasize defense market researchers from the profile portal Army Recognition, this high-precision strike missile combines advanced avionics and flight control systems, designed for navigation in conditions where GPS is unavailable, ensuring operational reliability even when conventional navigation systems fail. The Jackal missile's next-generation flight control system offers advanced capabilities such as GPS-disabled navigation and an automatic targeting mechanism that is fine-tuned for target recognition, detection and enhanced situational awareness. Thanks to its high-speed turbojet engine, the Jackal missile quickly reaches targets, providing the necessary response to emerging threats, which is an important feature for maintaining tactical superiority in changing combat scenarios. Due to its modular design, the Jackal missile provides a variety of effects, both lethal and non-lethal. It autonomously follows set waypoints and can be reconfigured in flight depending on tactical tasks.
