Currently, all those involved have been notified of suspicion (according to the crimes committed) under several articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: h. 2 Art. 28, Ch. 4, 5 and ch. 6 Art. 111-1 (collaborative activity committed by a group of persons based on prior collusion); h. 1 Art. 111-2 (assistance to the aggressor state); h. 1 Art. 436-2 (justification, recognition as legitimate, denial of armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, glorification of its participants). Perpetrators face up to 12 years in prison with confiscation of property. As reported by ArmyInform, the Security Service of Ukraine and the Prosecutor General's Office notified about the suspicion of two Russian militants who tortured local residents during the occupation of Kherson.

Title: Heavenly Buntar - the Defense Forces have a new reconnaissance -wing-
Description: This was announced by the Deputy Prime Minister for Innovation, Education, Science and of Technologies, Minister of Digital Transformation of Ukraine Mykhailo Fedorov. Buntar-1 is used for real-time reconnaissance, target detection, as well as adjustment of artillery, in particular reactive. The main feature of the drone is uninterrupted communication even under EW. One of the developers of the reconnaissance UAV Buntar-1 is a fighter of the Security and Defense Forces, so the drone was developed for the real needs he saw at the front. Buntar-1 operates at a range of 80 km, so it was difficult to test it on the test site. With this request, the developers turned to Brave1. The cluster helped with test flights and introduced the company to the defense tech community. After that, the drone was successfully used on the battlefield. Learn about further plans, market challenges and feedback from the front in the new edition of Warchangers. As ArmiyaInform reported, Ukrainian FPV drones developed by Brave1 teams successfully tested for resistance to work in conditions of active radio electronic suppression (REB).

Title: The enemy focused on two directions: the Defense Forces already held back 114 assaults
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Ukrainian defenders are taking the necessary measures to prevent the enemy from advancing deep into Ukrainian territory. Today, the communities of Volfine, Klyusy, Pokrovka and Zhuravka settlements of Sumy and Chernihiv regions were affected by the fire of enemy artillery, mortars, and multiple rocket systems. In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy stormed the positions of our units in the Vovchansk region six times, the fighting continues. In the Kupyansk direction Russian occupiers attacked the Defense Forces 12 times in Petropavlivka, Kolisnikivka, Zagryzovo and Lozova districts. Five skirmishes are ongoing. In the Lyman direction, during the day, the invading army also carried out twelve attacks on Ukrainian positions near Tverdokhlibovo, Novoyehorivka, Grekivka, Terni, Torsky, and in the Serebryansky forest. Ten battles completed, two more in progress. Ukrainian soldiers firmly hold the defense and inflict losses on the enemy. On the Seversky direction enemy aircraft struck Kuzmynivka with anti-aircraft missiles. In the Kramatorsk direction, since the beginning of the day, the enemy has attacked twice near Chasovoy Yar and Stupochky, and the battle is currently ongoing. On the Toretsk direction the aggressor tried four times to penetrate our defenses in the regions of Toretsk and Shcherbinivka settlements. The enemy actively uses aviation. Attacked Toretsk, Kalinovy, Ivanopilly and Kostyantynivka with KABs. In the Pokrovsky direction Russian invaders made 30 attempts to push our defenders out of their positions in Myrolyubivka, Promeny, Lysivka, Petrivka, Chumatsky and Pustinka districts. The defense forces are holding back the onslaught and have repulsed 22 enemy attacks, with eight engagements still ongoing. In the Kurakhiv direction, the enemy army carried out 21 attacks near Berestki, Sontsivka, Zora, Kurakhovo, Dalnyi, Katerynivka, and Antonivka. Nine attempts by the occupiers to advance have already been repulsed. Fighting continues. The enemy dropped seven aerial bombs on Andriivka. In the Vremivsk direction there were seven enemy attacks in the direction of Trudovoy, Kostiantynopolsky, Rozlyv, Suhy Yali and near Novodarivka. Three fights are still going on. Ulakli and Velika Novosilka were hit by enemy bombs. In the Orichivsk direction, the occupation forces once stormed the positions of the Defense Forces near Pyatikhatok. An enemy attack continues in the Dnieper direction. Operation in Kursk Oblast continues. Since the beginning of the day, Russian aircraft have struck 15 strikes with 22 anti-aircraft missiles on their own territory. Ukrainian soldiers repelled 11 attempts by the invaders to break through our defenses, the fighting continues. There are no significant changes in the rest of the directions.

Title: Occupant, what's wrong with your face? — our drones surprised the enemy with their accuracy
Description: The video was published on the brigade's channel. Russian attack aircraft tried to hide from our drones under trees, in trenches and dugouts, but fighters of the 63rd brigade hit them everywhere. The darkness also did not help the invaders, because our bombers flew on missions with thermal imaging cameras and easily spotted the temporarily warm invaders. -They hit a grenade right in the mouth of the Moscow policeman! Sniper accuracy of the pilots of our 107th battalion,- the brigade commented on the video.   As reported by ArmiyaInform, the fighters of the 63rd mechanized brigade showed how to install EW helps save combat equipment from Russian kamikaze drones.

Title: He turned evaders into -volunteers- - near Kiev, the miracle worker received 7 years
Description: This was reported by the Kyiv Regional Prosecutor's Office on November 21. A 30-year-old resident of Kyiv region was found guilty in court of organizing the illegal transportation of people across the state border of Ukraine by providing advice, instructions, means, and removing obstacles, based on a prior conspiracy by a group of people, for selfish motives (Part 3 of Article 332 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). Thus, the convict, together with accomplices who were declared wanted, in order to make a profit, during the martial law, developed a scheme to transport conscripted men abroad. For $5,500, they promised to organize an unhindered crossing of the state border of Ukraine using forged documents under the guise of volunteers with the entry of relevant information into the -Way- information database. The court sentenced the man to 7 years of imprisonment, with the deprivation of the right to hold positions related to the organization of management, cooperation and ensuring the activities of state border protection for a period of 2 years, and confiscation of the property in his possession. The verdict can be appealed. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Tests were planned, and combat launches were carried out: the commander of the Navy spoke about the ...
Description: The Commander of the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Vice-Admiral Oleksiy Neizhpapa, told about this in a video for 1000 days of the full-scale invasion. -The first blow was struck at a frigate that was approaching our shores. The most interesting thing is that during the repulse, he shot down his own plane, which was providing cover,- the vice admiral shared. He also mentioned the attack on the flagship of the Black Sea Fleet of the Russian Federation, the missile cruiser Moscow. It became a historic case when a small Ukrainian fleet, which the enemy considered almost non-existent, destroyed one of the enemy's most powerful ships. Earlier, the Navy of the Ukrainian Armed Forces reported on the events of October 29, 2022, the first joint operation of the Naval Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the Security Service of Ukraine using surface drones. During this operation /-> managed to hit several enemy ships, in particular the flagship of the Black Sea Fleet of the Russian Federation -Admiral Makarov-.

Title: 26 injured: in Kryvyi Rih, search operations at the site of a Russian missile hit have been complete...
Description: This was notified in the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. -The population is provided with all the necessary assistance. In particular, psychologists are working on site and a heating station of the emergency services has been installed. The work has been completed,- the message reads. By in the words of the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak, a 38-year-old woman is in serious condition, she incised head wounds. The November 21 attack caused significant damage to civilian infrastructure: an industrial enterprise, residential buildings, an administrative building, a medical facility, a boiler house, and a number of garages were damaged. In the city, in addition to the administration building, 5 apartment buildings, 2 minibuses, and a car were damaged.

Title: Six flashes - a video of a strike on the Dnipro by a Russian intercontinental missile appeared
Description: The video of the November 21 strike was made public on the channel of the -Return Alive- foundation. The video shows six powerful flashes of light in the sky. Perhaps their number is equal to the number of warheads carried by the Russian missile. In -Povarnys zhivym- they ask to keep calm and donate to Ukrainian air defense. The fund is currently conducting another large collection for the needs of our defenders of the sky. As reported by ArmyInform with reference to the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, >Russians launched an intercontinental ballistic missile over Ukraine.

Title: -Grandfather brought his grandchildren from a neighboring village-: the occupiers killed a boy in Do...
Description: About the war crime of the Russian invaders reported in the Donetsk regional prosecutor's office. Correspondents of ArmiyaInform recorded the devastating consequences of the criminal shelling committed by the Russian military and spoke with local residents. The peaceful village of Pershomariivka was fired upon by the Russian invaders from the Tornado-S salvo missile system. Cluster munitions of indiscriminate action covered a large area within the residential buildings of the village, hitting residential buildings, yards and streets of the settlement. As a result of the Russian attack, an 11-year-old boy died on the spot, and his 12-year-old sister and her grandfather received numerous landmine-explosive injuries — injuries to the head, chest, arms and legs. According to data of the National Police of Ukraine, as a result of the Russian attack on Pershomariivka, the girl suffered shrapnel wounds face and body. The child's condition is serious, she is saved by Dnipro doctors. A 63-year-old man was also treated for multiple injuries. The wounded are given the necessary medical assistance. As reported in the Prosecutor General's Office, residential buildings and motor vehicle Local residents say that the grandfather brought his grandchildren from the nearby village of Malynivka. They came to Pershomariivka from time to time to take care of the household and feed the dog that guarded the house. There are only two streets in the village, one of which is named after a local native, Nikita Rzhavsky, a military pilot who died fighting the Nazis during World War II. Today, the latest Russian occupiers shelled his native village, killing and seriously injuring children and an elderly man. The military armies of the Russian Federation like to appeal to the history of the -Great Patriotic War- and boast that they are the descendants of the victors over Nazism. In fact, the latest Russian invaders are repeating the crimes of the Nazi occupiers of World War II, specifically shelling peaceful Ukrainian towns and villages with indiscriminate ammunition. The occupiers deliberately terrorize local residents, destroying residential buildings and civil infrastructure. Despite the civilian casualties, including children, women and the elderly, the Russians do not hide their crimes and even flaunt them. In view of this, the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin once again reminded that it is dangerous to stay in Donetsk region and urged local residents to evacuate.

Title: Changing traditions: Kyiv focused on the role of women in mine action
Description: reports this by the Main Directorate of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security. As the participants of the meeting noted, the share of women among government and non-government operators in the field of mine action in Ukraine already reaches about 30%. This is a significant achievement within the framework of the Women, Peace and Security agenda, which promotes equality of opportunity in security and peacekeeping activities. The Initiative Group included representatives of the Main Department of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security, the Ministry of Economy of Ukraine, the Canadian Embassy, ​​the Danish Refugee Council and other organizations involved in humanitarian demining. The participants of the meeting expressed the idea of ​​conducting a nationwide campaign with an emphasis on the gender component and inclusiveness. As Lt. Col. Olena Danylyuk, a representative of the Main Department of Mine Action, noted, the social media campaign to involve women in this area has significant potential. According to her, the correct approach to this initiative can significantly speed up the demining process of de-occupied territories. During the meeting, a questionnaire to study gender barriers in mine action was also presented. The main administration, which performs the functions of the Secretariat of the National Mine Action Authority, will develop recommendations based on the collected information and make proposals to the Initiative Group's work plan. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine and Croatia strengthen cooperation in the field of humanitarian demining.

Title: The next phase of intimidation: a strike on the Dnipro as an element of the Russian game
Description: A military and political commentator told about this on the broadcast of the -Edyny Novyny- telethon Oleksandr Kovalenko of the -Information Resistance- group. According to Oleksandr Kovalenko, there was no real need for the Russians to launch such an expensive and rare missile. The power of the Rubezh ICBM is only 2.5 times that of the Iskander, or one and a half of the Kh-22 missile. -Iskander is also a carrier of nuclear weapons, a tactical nuclear weapon. The Kh-22, Kh-101, Kh-555 missile - they can also carry a warhead with a nuclear component. Kh-47M2 -Dagger-. Why launch an ICBM to deliver a nuclear strike, if there is already a nomenclature that can be a carrier of a nuclear warhead?-, Oleksandr Kovalenko notes. The expert believes that all these are elements of the Russian -game-. And this -game- is connected with one thing - intimidation of the West. -They understand that Ukraine, one way or another, received permission to strike the territory of the Russian Federation with Western weapons. And in order to disrupt the obtaining of this permission, to postpone it, they introduced this general doctrine,- the military-political observer of the -Information Resistance- group assures. As reported ArmyInform, in the morning On November 21, 2024, between 5:00 a.m. and 7:00 a.m., Russian troops attacked the city Dnipro, including enterprises and critical infrastructure, by missiles of various types.

Title: The Ministry of Defense was told about the purchase of technological weapons worth UAH 90 billion
Description: This was notified in the MoU. The procurement of deep-strike drones, other UAVs, electronic warfare equipment and robotic complexes for 2024-2025 exceeded UAH 90 billion and constitutes almost a third of all arms expenditures. The priorities of investments in technological weapons are as follows: What does this mean for Ukraine? -We are also working with international partners to attract additional resources to increase production. The Ukrainian army must receive the best weapons for victory,- said the director of the Procurement Policy Department, Hlib Kanevskyi.

Title: They climb into the graves themselves - Azov residents invented a simplified method of disposing of ...
Description: The video of combat work appeared on November 21 on the brigade's channel. Azov pilots first search for the enemy, then drive him into pits and cellars, and destroy them with explosives there. In the almost completely destroyed New York and its surroundings, our drones find the location and movement of the enemy and deliver accurate strikes. -The Russians throw their -three hundred- on the battlefield, and the bodies of the dead burn in gray areas. The video shows a selection of injuries to enemy personnel from our operators,- commented personnel in the brigade.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 1st company of the 2nd battalion of the 12th special purpose brigade -Azov- of the National Guard captured by the enemy positions and prisoners in the Toretsk direction.

Title: It went well! — The defense forces showed a strike by Storm Shadow missiles on the territory of the ...
Description: The video of the hit was released on November 21 on the battalion channel. The video recorded more than half a dozen powerful explosions at the place where the Russians had a large communication bunker. In the process of destroying the enemies, the units of the consolidated detachment of unmanned systems -Bumblebee- of the 78th Airborne Assault Regiment and -Harpoon- of the 413th Battalion -Raid- took part.   As reported by ArmiyaInform, Serhii with the call sign Kum, an officer of the -Nachtigal- unit, 413th -Raid- battalion of the Forces of Unmanned Systems of the Armed Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, participated with his comrades in operations that led to total losses of the enemy in more than $590 million.

Title: -Putin uses Ukraine as a training ground-: The President reacted to the use of intercontinental weap...
Description: In his speech, the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky compared the desire of Ukrainians for freedom with the actions of Russia, which is -afraid of dignity and independence-. The President emphasized that today the Russian military deployed a new missile with the characteristics of an intercontinental ballistic weapon. -It is obvious that Putin is using Ukraine as a training ground to test the latest weapons,- Volodymyr Zelenskyi said. He also emphasized that Russia, looking for new sources of weapons, is turning to countries such as Iran and North Korea in order to maintain its influence and restrain Ukraine's aspirations for independence. The President expressed his gratitude to all defenders of Ukraine who are fighting against Russian aggression. -Dignity is one of the main words about Ukraine. And this is a word that will never be said about Russia,- he noted. Today, Volodymyr Zelenskyi signed a decree that implements the decision of the National Security and Defense Council of Ukraine regarding -respect for the real heroes of Ukraine.- The document envisages fair treatment of those who chose to fight for freedom and condemnation of those who sided with Russia. The first list of such persons contains 34 surnames. -This decision is about Dignity,- the President concluded. We will remind you that the Russians launched an intercontinental ballistic missile over Ukraine .

Title: The government has allocated more than UAH 4.1 billion for compensation for the purchase of housing ...
Description: Such a decision adopted at a government meeting. This increases the volume of subventions from the state budget to a record 10.1 billion UAH, which will make it possible to cover the housing need for 4,433 veterans and their family members this year. The document provides for the allocation of additional funds in the amount of UAH 4.1 billion by the end of 2024, which will ensure the payment of monetary compensation for the purchase of housing to 1,836 war veterans. Of them, 388 persons with disabilities of I-II groups and family members of deceased war veterans, as well as 1,448 internally displaced veterans. -Despite the difficult situation in the country, thanks to cooperation we managed to find an additional 4.1 billion hryvnias for housing. This increases the amount of subventions from the state budget to a record 10.1 billion hryvnias, which will allow this year to cover the housing needs of 4,433 veterans and members of their families,- emphasized the Minister of Veterans' Affairs of Ukraine Nataliya Kalmykova. As of November 1, 2024, monetary compensation has already been paid to 1,886 veterans, of whom 695 have purchased housing.

Title: In Kryvyi Rih, the number of victims has increased: doctors are fighting for a woman's life
Description: This is informs the Office of the Prosecutor General. As a result of the shelling, 17 people were injured, including two teenagers aged 16 and 17.   According to the words of the head of OVA Serhii Lysak, a 38-year-old woman is in a serious condition, she incised head wounds. The attack caused significant damage to civilian infrastructure: an industrial plant, residential buildings, an administrative building, a medical facility, a boiler house and a number of garages were damaged. In the city, in addition to the administration building, 5 apartment buildings, 2 minibuses, and a car were damaged. Law enforcement officers together with prosecutors document war crimes committed by the Russian military. The investigation is ongoing to bring the perpetrators to justice in accordance with international law.

Title: He already bought the boats, but he did not take the money: details of the detention of the organize...
Description: About this reports State Border Service of Ukraine. It is noted that the organizer tried to attract a border guard of the Izmail detachment to the scheme, offering him a bribe of 5,000 US dollars. With this money, he wanted to ensure the smooth crossing of the border for five men aged 20 to 48. However, the border guard reported the proposal to the management, after which a special operation was launched. The attacker drove the men to the border in his own Mercedes car and prepared rubber boats for crossing the Danube. At the time of the illegal border crossing attempt, the organizer and five men were detained. Violators were issued with administrative protocols pursuant to ch. 2 Art. 204-1 of the Criminal Procedure Code (attempt to illegally cross the state border). Criminal proceedings have been opened against the organizer under part. 3 Art. 332 of the Criminal Code (illegal transportation of persons across the state border of Ukraine) and ch. 1 Art. 369 of the Criminal Code (offer of undue benefit to an official). He faces up to 9 years in prison with confiscation of property and a ban on holding certain positions. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The Council allowed voluntary return to military service for those who first joined the SZCH
Description: This was reported by People's Deputy Yaroslav Zheleznyak. During the period of martial law, military service and the validity of the contract continue for military servicemen who voluntarily left military units or places of service for the first time or deserted and voluntarily arrived at the place of service and expressed their willingness to continue military service. Cash payments and implementation of food, material, other types of security, benefits and social guarantees are being resumed. Initiated criminal proceedings for criminal offenses provided for in Articles 407 and 408 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine against servicemen who for the first time voluntarily left military units or places of service or deserted and voluntarily arrived and expressed readiness to continue military service are not grounds for refusing extended military service. the military service of such servicemen and the validity of their contract. It should be noted that on August 20, the Verkhovna Rada supported the draft law, which was supposed not to punish the first voluntary abandonment of a military unit or desertion, if the soldier himself returned and the commander allows him to continue his service. As reported by ArmyInform, servicemen who voluntarily left their units for the first time instead of imprisonment start return to the front. ArmyInform explained about SZH and desertion: how to return to the service and not go behind bars.

Title: They wore burgundy and worked for Russia: two more traitors were detained in Chernihiv Oblast
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. According to the SBU, the detainees turned out to be residents of the Prylutsky district of the Chernihiv region. Russian special services recruited them remotely through Telegram channels, where women were looking for the opportunity to -make quick money.- The agents received a task from the Russian curator: to transmit the coordinates of the objects of the Defense Forces of Ukraine in the territory of Kyiv and Chernihiv regions. To hide their activities, they used the accounts of relatives to contact the occupiers. The investigation established that the women planned to spy on military facilities with the help of hidden video cameras, recording data on a flash drive. Their goal was to determine the locations of the Ukrainian military, their movement routes and the positions of mobile fire groups that protect the airspace in the north of the country. Counter-intelligence of the SBU timely exposed the criminal activities, documented the collected evidence and arrested the traitors before they had time to purchase equipment for espionage. During the searches, mobile phones containing evidence of cooperation with the Russian GRU were seized from the detainees. Both women were notified of suspicion for h. 2 Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). The court chose to remand them in custody. For committing these crimes, they face life imprisonment with confiscation of property. The operation was carried out by SBU employees in Chernihiv region under the procedural guidance of the regional prosecutor's office. As ArmiyaInform reported, the security service detained another agent of the special services of the Russian Federation, who was active in the Kyiv and Vinnytsia regions. He was a 22-year-old barista from Vinnytsia, who corrected enemy fire and committed arson.

Title: Rocket terror in Donetsk region: dozens of houses were damaged, more than 300 people were evacuated
Description: reported this by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. In the city of Kurakhove, numerous high-rise buildings and private houses were damaged. Three residential buildings were damaged in Pokrovsk. Private houses were also damaged in Uspenivka, Vesely Gay, Hannivka, Kostiantynopolski, Suhy Yaly, Dachno, Ilinka, Sontsivka, Zora, Berestki and Novodmytrivka. One person died, two were injured, and two private houses were damaged in Pershomariivka, Mykolaiv community. In Mykolaivka, a high-rise building was damaged by shelling. In Kostyantynivka, six people were injured, 10 high-rise buildings, a store, a sports hall and two infrastructure objects were damaged. In Virolyubivka, three private houses and an administrative building were destroyed. Six private houses were damaged in Chervony. In the Chasovoyarsk community, two private houses, one high-rise building and two non-residential buildings were destroyed by shelling. During the day, 368 people, including 14 children, were evacuated from the front line. Defense forces continue to counter Russian aggression, despite systematic attacks on civilian targets. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the occupiers dropped an aerial bomb. on the residential quarter of Kostyantynivka, 6 people were injured.

Title: -You take three steps - a bucket is on your foot-: on the Siverskyi direction, Russian attacks sink ...
Description: Stepan Barna, commander of the unit, told about this on the air -Suspilne Novyny- -Barney- of the 10th Separate Mountain Assault Brigade -Edelweiss-. However, according to Stepan Barna, the technique in the presence of Ukrainian drones is quite ineffective. It will get stuck in the swamp and actively deteriorate. -The swamp is here, the specifics of the soil. Such a complex structure is enough. That is, you take three steps, and a bucket sticks to your leg. A bucket of swamp,'' noted the commander of the Barney unit of the 10th Separate Mountain Assault Brigade, Edelweiss. As reported ArmyInform , the intensity of enemy shelling of Chernihiv, Sumy and part of Kharkiv regions along the state border with Russia and which are included in the zone the responsibility of the operational-tactical group of troops -Siversk- at the end of this week has slightly decreased.

Title: Rustem Umyerov on the Day of Dignity and Freedom: Ukrainians proved that the strength of our unity i...
Description: This is stated in his statement on the occasion of the Day of Dignity and Freedom. -Today we remember the events that determined our path and changed the history of Ukraine forever. In 2004 and 2013, Ukrainians demonstrated to the whole world that our state is a full-fledged part of the European community, and the will, dignity and desire for justice are the basis of our national identity,- Rustem Umyerov said. He added that the Russian aggression, which gained momentum, was aimed at destroying the gains of the two revolutions. -The Kremlin wanted to divide us, subjugate us, erase our freedom. But Ukrainians proved that the power of our unity is unbreakable. We answered every challenge not with words, but with actions, becoming stronger, more united and more determined,- he said. The Minister of Defense stated that for more than 1,000 days of the great war, Ukrainians together defend their statehood and values ​​that unite the nation. -We are turning the Defense Forces of Ukraine into one of the strongest and most technological armies in the world. We are changing the format of defense cooperation with partners, reaching new levels of strategic cooperation. We destroy the potential of the enemy by striking his positions hundreds and thousands of kilometers from our borders. And we will win. This is not only our goal, but our duty. We must do everything to ensure that Ukraine never faces such threats again,- Rustem Umyerov emphasized.

Title: Reforms in a few clicks: surveys in Army+ are really changing the Defense Forces
Description: The Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine from issues of digitization Kateryna Chernogorenko. According to Kateryna Chernogorenko, surveys allow to keep in direct contact with military personnel. Thus, according to the results of one of the surveys, Army + implemented a video course on unmanned systems — more than 6,000 military personnel were interested in it. -We were interested in the needs of combat IT systems and our innovation center. In particular, the Ministry of Defense is already working on a convenient, secure chat. We collected food wishes, one in four expressed the need for halal, kosher, plant-based dry rations. This need will soon be realized,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko. According to the Deputy Minister of Defense, the last surveys were conducted regarding transfers. And it helped to implement the functionality of reports on a change of duty station. -We've unlocked this feature, this feature. Now Army+ has already processed more than 2,000 such reports. More than 650 of them were resolved positively,- said Katryna Chernogorenko. As reported by ArmyInform, the single state register of servicemen has to simplify the life of defenders. It will become the basis for providing all digital services for military personnel, in particular through the Army+ application.

Title: The first school for operators of unmanned ground robotic complexes was opened in the Armed Forces o...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The school is already training future operators who master about 10 different types of BpNK. Among them are logistics, engineering and special complexes. Military personnel are trained in a specialized program, which involves obtaining the appropriate military accounting specialty. For high-quality training, specialized software tools and training samples of complexes have been created. Emphasis is placed on acquiring practical skills that will allow future specialists to effectively use robotic systems in combat mission conditions. -It is extremely important that BpNK operators possess both theoretical knowledge and practical skills. We should not wait for the future, but confidently go towards it. The introduction of innovative solutions in the training of specialists is one of the key directions of the development of the Armed Forces of Ukraine,- noted the head of the Department of Innovative Activities of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Colonel Vitaliy Dobryanskyi. Work is currently underway to scale up the project, improve the training program, and create the necessary educational and training base for the effective development of robotic technologies in the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, born to crawl: in the ZSU explained the difficulty of controlling ground drones.

Title: In Kryvyi Rih, 15 injured as a result of a Russian missile attack
Description: This was reported by the head of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Serhiy Lysak. Among the injured are two teenagers. A 17-year-old boy is hospitalized. Another 16-year-old boy was treated on the spot. In total, 9 people were hospitalized. Oleksandr Vilkul, head of the Kryvyi Rih Defense Council, said that two adults are in serious condition. Everyone is provided with the necessary medical assistance. According to preliminary information, about 10 residential buildings were damaged. The information is being clarified. -The headquarters for helping people is being deployed. Necessary building materials and utility crews will be issued to the people of the affected houses. If necessary, help with resettlement, applications for financial assistance from the city are accepted,- Oleksandr Vilkul added. As ArmiyaInform reported, Russian troops launched an attack on Kryvyi Rih in the morning of November 21. In addition, as a result of the enemy attack on the Dnipro this morning damaged rehabilitation center for people with disabilities. The boiler house was partially destroyed, several dozen windows were broken.

Title: -Take me prisoner, because they will kill your own-: the Armed Forces spoke about new trends among t...
Description: About this on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- spoken the spokesperson of OSU -Khortytsia- - lieutenant colonel Nazar Voloshyn. According to Nazar Voloshyn, the assaults on the Pokrovsky and Kurakhiv directions actually do not end. The defense forces fight back, and somewhere they counterattack and take the Russians prisoner. -In particular, over the past few days, many occupiers have been taken prisoner - only three this morning. As the prisoners testify, they choose life in captivity over death at the hands of their commanders,- said Nazar Voloshyn. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the enemy is attacking in the Kurakhiv direction, striking across the entire front with attempts to break through to the flanks.

Title: -And so it happened-: the occupiers restore the intact, leaving the ruins out of sight
Description: reported this by the head of the Luhansk OVA, Artem Lysogor. At the same time, the occupation administration decided to start work in Luhansk, which almost unscathed by hostilities. The city plans to repair the roofs of nine apartment buildings. Other localities are likely to be left out of consideration for subsequent programs. In addition to real estate, the occupiers took up land. By January 1, farmers and sharecroppers in the occupied Luhansk region must re-register their land plots according to the legislation of the Russian Federation. Failure to comply with this requirement threatens to -nationalize- the land. Re-registration requires a full package of documents according to Russian standards, including a Russian passport. This creates additional pressure on local residents and forces them to accept the citizenship of the aggressor country. As reported by ArmyInform, in Alchevsk, as well as in other settlements of the temporarily occupied Luhansk region, the situation with the removal of garbage has remained critical for more than ten years. Spontaneous landfills continue to grow, and instead of solving the problem the occupation administration chose the path of repression, installing more than 100 video surveillance cameras to fine citizens for littering.

Title: -Snowball is falling, trails are being tracked-: the change in weather is hitting the occupiers in K...
Description: About this on the broadcast of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- spoken the spokesman of the OTU -Kharkiv- - lieutenant colonel Yevhenii Romanov. According to Lt. Col. Yevgeny Romanov, the weather significantly changes the situation on the battle line. Yes, traveling on country roads is now very difficult to hide. Especially armored vehicles. -Now they have no opportunity to hide. As the leaves have fallen and all these movements become visible. When it snows, these trails are constantly monitored,- said the spokesman of Kharkiv OTU. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Kharkiv Oblast the occupiers increased the number of airstrikes against the positions of the Ukrainian defenders.

Title: The OVA spoke about the consequences of a missile attack on the Dnipro
Description: informs the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak about this. In addition, there is destruction in the garage cooperative. There was a fire there. 9 garages damaged. Besides, as reported earlier by ArmyInform, damaged industrial enterprise. And also two private houses. A fire broke out in one of them, it was extinguished. The fire was brought under control in the second place of ignition. Previously, two people were injured. A 57-year-old man was treated at the scene. A 42-year-old woman is hospitalized. Utility services are operating at emergency locations. The National Police accepts claims about damage to property. Philanthropists joined in helping people. They provide psychological help and materials for quick repairs. We will remind you that the Russians launched an intercontinental ballistic missile over Ukraine .

Title: The Council adopted a draft law on tactical pre-hospital care
Description: This is stated in the message of the parliament. This draft law introduces the term -tactical pre-hospital care-. This will enable servicemen who do not have a medical education to provide pre-medical care in an expanded format, which will include medical interventions and the use of medicines. In addition, it demarcates the activities of medical personnel, as well as persons who have the right to provide pre-medical care (including tactical pre-hospital care), and those who exceed the scope of pre-hospital care without the appropriate authority. As ArmiyaInform reported, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine approved new volumes of medical assistance at the pre-hospital stage during hostilities. Order No. 598 defines a model of role-based medical support according to NATO standards. Document covers all stages: measures for prevention, treatment and evacuation of wounded and sick military personnel, police officers and civil defense services of all Security Forces and Defense Forces. In general, it defines four roles of medical support.

Title: Drone operator training: The Ministry of Defense is expanding the network of certified schools
Description: The Ministry of defense of Ukraine. The project aims to test new approaches for increasing the training of future operators, instructors and external crew members of unmanned aerial vehicles and unmanned aerial systems (UAVs/UAVs) for the Defense Forces of Ukraine. -Drones should fight, and people should control them from a safe distance. Today, driving a drone is no longer a hobby, but a requirement of the time. The number of units of unmanned systems has increased in the Armed Forces, there is a demand for such vacancies. That is why we have to increase the number of certified schools where people can receive professional training,- stressed the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine, Brigadier General Anatoly Klochko. The process is directly handled by the Main Directorate of State Aviation of Ukraine, whose representatives have formed a certification commission. It is there that applications from organizations are considered and within five days a decision is made to issue a school certificate or to refuse it with reasons. Certified schools involve representatives of the training centers of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, other components of the security and defense forces for the practical exam. Based on the results of the practical exam, school graduates are given certificates with recommendations for assigning a military accounting specialty (VOS). Graduates of schools who are not military personnel can receive VOS after acquiring the status of military personnel and passing basic military training (BZVP). Military personnel studying at certified schools can obtain a military accounting specialty based on the results of successfully passing a practical exam. It is envisaged to maintain a list of certified schools and their graduates. This will make it possible to know the potential of trained UAV operators, and the Defense Forces will be able to appoint specialists to positions related to the use of unmanned systems. As reported by ArmyInform, the OSCE held a course for Ukrainian specialists in mine countermeasures.

Title: - Maneuvers with landings, seeded bodies-: the leaves have fallen - the enemy is no longer able to h...
Description: Yuriy Fedorenko, commander, told about this on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- of the battalion of strike unmanned aircraft systems of the 92nd separate brigade named after the head of the army Ivan Sirk. According to Yuriy Fedorenko, the invaders do not stop attacking, but every day they suffer very serious losses, in particular in manpower. -Now that the leaves have fallen, we can see the plantations, which are the enemy's main logistical routes along which he tries to maneuver. They are literally littered with the bodies of the slain occupiers,- Yuriy Fedorenko said. Previously ArmyInform reported that the Defense Forces destroyed a tank, 2 MTLB and an enemy landing party that was flying under the cover of fog to gain a foothold on the outskirts of Kupyansk.

Title: The President honored the memory of Ukrainians who died during the Revolution of Dignity
Description: About this reported the Office of the President. The head of state installed a lamp next to the cross on the Alley of Heroes of the Heavenly Hundred in Kyiv. -Today is the Day of Dignity and Freedom. We remember the real price of freedom for Ukraine. And we don't forget all our people of different times who fought for Ukraine and became a model of dignity for the world,- says the President's message on the Telegram channel. On the eleventh anniversary of the Revolution of Dignity, eleven bells were rung in memory of the fallen. -Thanks to the people, thanks to the desire of our people to preserve freedom and independence for Ukraine, our state will always be on the political map of the world. Always free and sovereign,- the President emphasized.

Title: Air Force: the Russians launched an intercontinental ballistic missile over Ukraine
Description: The Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this. In particular, an intercontinental ballistic missile was launched from the Astrakhan region of the Russian Federation, an Kh-47M2 -Kinzhal- aeroballistic missile from a MiG-31K fighter jet was launched from the Tambov region, and seven Kh-101 cruise missiles from Tu-95MS strategic bombers (launch area - Volgograd Region) . As a result of anti-aircraft combat, six Kh-101 missiles were destroyed by units of anti-aircraft missile forces of the Air Force. On other missiles, without significant consequences. Information about victims and victims has not yet been received. -Once again, we ask citizens not to be delayed by air warning signals! And we call on all media people and bloggers to responsibly spread this or that information about the combat work of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and any threats to the Ukrainian state,- the agency emphasized.

Title: Morning shelling of the Dnipro: the enemy used intercontinental missiles
Description: The Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this. In particular, an intercontinental ballistic missile was launched from the Astrakhan region of the Russian Federation, an Kh-47M2 -Kinzhal- aeroballistic missile from a MiG-31K fighter jet was launched from the Tambov region, and seven Kh-101 cruise missiles from Tu-95MS strategic bombers (launch area - Volgograd Region) . As a result of anti-aircraft combat, six Kh-101 missiles were destroyed by units of anti-aircraft missile forces of the Air Force. On other missiles, without significant consequences. Information about victims and victims has not yet been received. -Once again, we ask citizens not to be delayed by air warning signals! And we call on all media people and bloggers to responsibly spread this or that information about the combat work of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and any threats to the Ukrainian state,- the agency emphasized.

Title: ATACMS, the Kursk bridgehead and the US permit: an expert on whether there will be a turning point o...
Description: For example, the media cites the position of Polish President Andrzej Duda, who says that this could be a turning point on the front. But military expert Petro Chernyk has a different position. He explained to the correspondent of ArmiyaInform why the possible US permission for Ukraine will not be a turning point. -Permission for ATACMS strikes deep into Russian territory cannot and will not be a turning point in the war. With one single exception, if these missiles are given several thousand, and this is a fantasy. There will be no fiction,- says the military expert. And he adds that our country was given somewhere in the range of a couple of hundred of these missiles: -We used a certain amount, if they give a couple of hundred more, it will be very good. ATACMS will help to really hold the Kursk bridgehead. Because it is they who are called to destroy warehouses with ammunition, warehouses with fuel and lubricants: this is if we are talking about the cassette part. And the high-explosive part is the control points and communication nodes. Chernyk emphasizes that if everything goes like this, then everything will be complicated for the enemy in terms of knocking us out of Kurshchyna. -And this is already a big geopolitics. Our task is to hold out until next year's dry weather cycle,- the expert noted.

Title: The occupiers dropped an aerial bomb on the Kostyantynivka residential quarter, wounding 6 people
Description: This was reported by the Donetsk Regional Prosecutor's Office. Previously, the enemy dropped two FAB-250 aerial bombs with a UMPK module on the settlement. One of the means of destruction was aimed at a residential area. As a result of the attack, 5 women aged 18 to 75 and a 56-year-old man were injured. They were in their homes at the time of the attack. The victims were diagnosed with mine-explosive injuries, shrapnel wounds, contusions and concussions. They were provided with qualified medical assistance. 10 facades of apartment buildings, a shop, a garage and a car were damaged. Under the procedural leadership of the Kostyantyniv District Prosecutor's Office, a pre-trial investigation was started in criminal proceedings on the fact of a war crime (Part 1 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). As reported by ArmyInform, November 20 the Russian army struck, probably with the Tornado-S anti-aircraft missile system, on the village Pershomaryivka, Kramatorsk district. Cluster munitions hit a residential building, where an 11-year-old boy died in the yard of one of the houses.

Title: Kharkiv Region: the enemy attacked residential buildings, an administrative building, and civilians
Description: This was informed by Oleg Synegubov, the head of the Kharkiv Regional Military Administration. A private house was damaged in the Lipetsk community as a result of shelling. In addition, an administrative building in the Vysochan community came under fire. A 64-year-old woman was injured. In the city of Kupyansk, shelling injured two men aged 42 and 64. They are provided with the necessary medical care. In the village of Senkove, a private house was damaged as a result of enemy shelling. Also, near the village of Kalinove, wreckage of the -Shakhed- drone was found in a field. There are no casualties. Over the last day, 139 residents were evacuated from the Kupyanskyi and Borivskyi directions. As reported by ArmyInform, during the past day Russian troops struck Nikopol district of Dnipropetrovsk region, using artillery and kamikaze drones

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Crocodile tears of prisoners near Kupyansk: what the captured occupiers are crying about
Description: About this informs State Border Service of Ukraine. One of them said that on the Russian side, mostly Zeks are fighting in this direction. He clearly saw through it and began to complain about the leadership of the Russian Federation. -Nobody here understands why we are fighting against the Ukrainians, it's just that Uncle Vovochka wanted to grab more land,- said the occupier and added that it is time to end this war. -I hope that what was taken from Ukraine will be returned to Ukraine,- said the Russian, but he could not clearly answer the elementary question: -Whose Crimea?- The Russian also complained about the conditions of his stay in the occupation army. -You sit in dugouts, and we sit in damp, cold pits that look like latrines,- the invader wailed. Another prisoner turned out to be a native of the Samara region. He was sent to the assault even without identification marks. -They don't give us anything, they spit on us like they threw meat, I don't even know how to shoot,- cried the Russian invader to the Ukrainian border guards. He says that he did not serve in the army, and before being sent to attack, he was not even shown how to use a machine gun. The occupier admitted that he was going to the positions under duress, because there were blocking units behind him. The State Border Service of Ukraine is an integral part of the Defense Forces of Ukraine, which adheres to international humanitarian law and guarantees the preservation of life, the provision of medical assistance and the provision of other rights to representatives of the Russian armed forces who choose the right decision - to surrender. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 1st company of the 2nd battalion of the 12th special purpose brigade -Azov- of the National Guard captured by the enemy positions and prisoners in the Toretsk direction.

Title: The occupiers fired at a bread distribution point in the Kherson region, there are wounded
Description: This reported the head of the Kherson State Administration Oleksandr Prokudin. Last day Prydniprovske, Komysany, Antonivka, Sadove, Novodmytrivka, Tomyna Balka, Shiroka Balka, Beryslav, Virivka, Novovorontsovka, Burgunka and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes. It is noted that the Russian military hit the bread delivery point and the gas station. They also hit the residential quarters of the populated areas of the region, in particular, damaged 5 high-rise buildings and 8 private houses. In addition, the occupiers vandalized the garage and private cars. It also became known about the death of a resident of Dar'ivka due to Russian shelling the day before yesterday. A 62-year-old woman was at home at the time of the enemy attack. Unfortunately, she received non-life-threatening injuries. As reported by ArmyInform, Russian shelling in Kherson Oblast is not abating: terrible consequences of attacks.

Title: Historic day of war at sea: Navy commander spoke about the first use of naval drones
Description: This was told by the commander of the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine vice admiral Oleksiy Neizhpapa in a video dedicated to the 1000 days of the large-scale invasion of Russia. During this, it was possible to hit several enemy ships, in particular the flagship of the Black Sea Fleet of the Russian Federation -Admiral Makarov-. Oleksiy Neizhpapa noted that subsequent operations were also successful. Among them is joint work with the SBU on the Crimean bridge and damage to other enemy ships. -Combined with strikes by coastal missile forces and aviation, we managed to liberate the northwestern part of the Black Sea and force the enemy to leave Sevastopol,- the vice admiral explained. He also informed that by the decision of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces, a special unit of unmanned maritime systems was created within the Navy, which is currently developing rapidly. As reported by ArmyInform, today in the Black Sea there are 24 enemy ships, of which 5 are carriers of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 28 missiles.

Title: At the front, there were 153 combat clashes per day, the enemy is actively storming the Vremivsk dir...
Description: This is stated in operational information General Staff of the Armed Forces as of 08:00 on November 21. On the Kharkiv direction, the enemy carried out unsuccessful assaults in the Vovchansk and Staritsa districts four times. The number of combat clashes per day in the Kupyansk direction reached seven. The defense forces repelled the attacks of the occupiers in the areas of Kolisnikivka, Zagryzovo, Kucherivka, Kruglyakivka and Zeleny Gayu. On the Lyman direction our troops stopped ten enemy attacks. The invaders concentrated their main efforts in the districts of Cherneshchyna, Zarichny, Hryhorivka, Serebryanka, and Terni. In the Siversk and Kramatorsk directions, the enemy did not carry out assault and offensive actions, however, it carried out airstrikes in the areas of the settlements of Siversk, Chasiv Yar and Lypivka. Actively using bomber aircraft, the enemy tried to advance seven times in the area of ​​Toretsk and Shcherbinivka. 34 attacks, this number for the past day, were repelled by our defenders in the Pokrovsky direction. The enemy tried to advance near the settlements of Myrolyubivka, Pustinka, Promin, Krutyy Yar, Krasny Yar, Lyskivka, Yuryivka, Zhovte, Petrivka, Dachenske, Novooleksiivka, Hryhorivka, and Pushkine. Defense forces continue to restrain the enemy in the Kurakhiv direction. Occupants tried 29 times to break through the Ukrainian defense lines in the areas of Berestka, Zorya, Sontsivka, Maksimilyanivka, Katerynivka, Elizavetivka and Antonivka settlements. The same number of enemy attacks were stopped by our defenders in the area of ​​Trudovoy, Kostiantynopolsky, Rozdolny, Velika Novosilka, and Novodarivka as in the Vremivsk direction. On the Orihiv and Gulyaipil directions the enemy did not conduct active operations last day. In the Dnieper direction our soldiers six times repelled the attacks of the Russian invaders on the positions of the Ukrainian army. The operational situation on the Volyn and Polissky directions has not changed significantly. No signs of formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. On the border with Chernihiv and Sumy regions, the enemy maintains a military presence, conducts reconnaissance and artillery fire. The Defense Forces of Ukraine continue the operation in the Kursk direction, where the enemy carried out 25 airstrikes over the past day, using 39 guided air bombs. In general, last day losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1510 people. In addition, Ukrainian soldiers destroyed eight tanks, 24 armored combat vehicles, 50 artillery systems, one anti-aircraft missile system, two anti-aircraft vehicles, 57 UAVs of the operational-tactical level and 97 vehicles of the occupiers.

Title: Almost 300 strikes per day: Zaporozhye suffers from Russian shelling
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhzhya OVA. Russian troops carried out 4 airstrikes on Novodanilivka, Malia Tokmachka, Biloghiry and Novodarivka. In addition, 135 UAVs of various modifications attacked Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghirya, Malynivka, Olgivske and Novodarivka. Also, 10 shelling from the anti-aircraft missile system covered Novodanilivka, Novoandriivka, Novopavlivka, and Mala Tokmachka. It is noted that 139 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriyivka, Novodanilivka, Malaya Tokmachka, Biloghirya, Malynyvka, Olhivskyi and Novodarivka. -We received 19 reports about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure,- added Ivan Fedorov. As reported by ArmyInform, a child died as a result of a Russian strike with cluster munitions on a residential building in Donetsk region.

Title: Oleksandr Syrskyi: In the battles for the independence of Ukraine, the soldiers of the Armed Forces ...
Description: This is stated in his message on the page on Facebook. -Today, we honor the knights of Archstrategist Mykhailo - tenacious and brave soldiers of the Airborne Assault Troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The Ukrainian paratroopers in the battles for the independence of Ukraine and the freedom of our people worthily confirm their slogan - -Always the first-, - says the greeting. Oleksandr Syrsky emphasized that already 10 years since the beginning of the Russian aggression, and especially during the large-scale invasion, the soldiers of the Russian Armed Forces have been bravely and loyally fighting on the hottest areas of the front, effectively destroying the Russian occupiers. The commander-in-chief of the Ukrainian Armed Forces emphasized that the paratroopers managed to destroy the aggressor's plans to attack the Sumy direction from the Kursk region, to transfer this war to the enemy's territory, because they were at the forefront of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in operations in the Kursk region. And now they stop Russian attacks in the Kursk, Pokrovsky, Kurakhivsk and other directions and actively oppose the aggressor. -Dear Ukrainian defenders, on this day I sincerely thank each of you for your steadfastness, courage and heroism! I wish you good health, high morale, new achievements and victories! I am grateful to the fathers and mothers who raised such brave and patriotic sons and daughters. A low bow to the feat of paratroopers who gave their lives for the Motherland. Eternal honor and memory to them! Glory to DSHV! Glory to Ukraine! Glory to the heroes!-, says the greeting. As ArmiyaInform reported, our journalists visited the 82nd Bukovinsk Airborne Assault Brigade, which broke through the Russian border and is still performing tasks on enemy territory. More about the participation of paratroopers in this operation said its commander Colonel Dmytro Voloshin.

Title: 24 enemy ships were recorded in the Black Sea, among them carriers -Calibers-
Description: The Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. In the Mediterranean Sea, 2 enemy ships, 1 of which is a carrier of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 16 missiles. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine has successfully scaled up mass production of cruise missiles P-360 -Neptun- with improvements for hitting targets at longer distances. It was the Neptune missile complex that destroyed the flagship of the Russian Black Sea Fleet - the cruiser -Moskva-

Title: Fires in the Dnipro as a result of a morning massive strike
Description: This was reported by the head of the regional military administration Serhiy Lysak. Nikopol, as well as Marganetska, Mirivska and Pokrovska communities came under fire. As a result of the attacks, a garage and a power line were damaged. Fortunately, there were no casualties. On the morning of November 21, the aggressor launched a massive attack on the region. Damage to an industrial enterprise and the occurrence of two fires were recorded in Dnipro. Information on the consequences of these strikes is being clarified. In addition, at night, the Russian army continued shelling the Nikopol district, in particular the district center, Pokrovska and Chervonogrigorivska communities. Artillery and rocket salvo fire systems -Grad- were used. There are no casualties among the civilian population. Law enforcement officers and emergency services are working at the sites of the attacks to eliminate the consequences of the attacks. As reported by ArmyInform, a child died as a result of a Russian strike with cluster munitions on a residential building in Donetsk region.

Title: Paratroopers are always strength, courage and professionalism: Rustem Umyerov congratulated the sold...
Description: This is stated in the congratulations of the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov on the Day of Defense Forces of the Armed Forces. -You overcome any obstacles, performing the most difficult tasks. Your contribution to the destruction of the enemy and the defense of Ukraine is invaluable,- said Rustem Umyerov. The minister added that today we bow our heads in memory of the soldiers who gave their lives for our freedom. Eternal glory to the Heroes who will forever remain in our hearts. -Paratroopers are always strength, courage and professionalism. You are the first in the offensive, indomitable in the defense, always where it is necessary for our common victory. Thank you for your devotion to Ukraine, for your courage and bravery. Together we will defeat the enemy and restore peace to our country,- the greeting reads. As ArmiyaInform reported, our journalists visited the 82nd Bukovinsk Airborne Assault Brigade, which broke through the Russian border and is still performing tasks on enemy territory. More about the participation of paratroopers in this operation said its commander Colonel Dmytro Voloshin.

Title: Fifty artillery systems and more than 1.5 thousand occupiers: the General Staff of the Armed Forces ...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The total combat losses of the enemy from February 24, 2022 to November 21, 2024 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy became more active in the East: most of the assaults fall on three directions .

Title: The enemy has become more active in the East: most of the assaults are in three directions
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The enemy launched one missile strike, 61 air strikes using 91 anti-aircraft missiles, more than 560 kamikaze drone strikes, and carried out more than 3,000 attacks on the positions of our troops and populated areas using various types of weapons. On the Kharkiv direction, there were four combat clashes with the Russian invaders in the Vovchansk and Staritsa areas, near Kozachai Lopan, the enemy dropped three guided aerial bombs. In the Kupyansk direction, the enemy tried 23 times to dislodge our units from their positions near Kolisnykyvka, Zagryzovy, Kucherivka, Kruglyakivka, and Zeleny Gay. Ten times the enemy attacked in the Lyman direction, trying to advance in the direction of Cherneshchyna, Zarichny, and Thorny. Actively used bombing and attack aircraft in the areas of settlements of Novoyehorivka and Zakitne. In the Siversk direction, the Russian occupiers dropped ten anti-tank missiles in the Siversk region. On the Kramatorsk direction, the enemy dropped five aerial bombs in the areas of the settlements of Chasiv Yar and Lypivka. The enemy tried seven times to wedge into our defenses in the Toretsk direction. The occupiers in the Toretsk and Shcherbynivka areas were fiercely repulsed by our defenders five times. Two attacks are ongoing so far. The enemy is intensively attacking the Ukrainian defenders in the Pokrovsky direction. Here, the aggressor carried out 33 assault and offensive actions. The greatest activity of the Russian occupiers remains in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Pustinka, Promin, Krutiy Yar, Krasniy Yar, Lyskivka, Yuryivka, Zhovte, Petrivka, Dachenske, Novooleksiivka, Hryhorivka, and Pushkine settlements. Twenty-two attacks in the direction of the Ukrainian defenders have already been repelled, eleven more clashes are ongoing. At the same time, the enemy carried out airstrikes on the settlements of Myrolyubivka, Sukha Balka, Stara Mykolaivka, Lysivka, dropping a total of 15 guided bombs. In the Kurakhiv direction there are 23 combat clashes. The invaders remain highly active, trying to advance in the areas of the settlements of Berestki, Zorya, Sontsivka, Maksimilianivka, Katerynivka, Elizavetivka and Antonivka. Units of the Defense Forces repelled seven enemy attacks, 16 attacks are still ongoing. The settlements of Ulakly and Andriyivka were hit by guided bombs. In the Vremivsk direction there were 28 skirmishes. Five enemy assaults have already been stopped by our defenders in Trudovoy, Kostiantynopolsky, Rozdolny, Velikay Novosilka, and Novodarivka districts. Fierce fighting continues to this day. Also, the enemy actively used aviation in the area of ​​Oleksiivka and Novodarivka, dropping eight guided aerial bombs. Today, the enemy did not conduct active operations in the Orihiv and Gulyajpil directions. Our soldiers repelled the attacks of Russian invaders five times in the Dnieper direction. Defense forces of Ukraine continue the operation in Kursk Oblast. Enemy aviation continues to strike with guided aerial bombs on the territory of Russia. At the moment, 20 air strikes with the use of 33 anti-aircraft missiles are known. There were no significant changes in the situation in other directions. The department also honored the soldiers of the 39th separate anti-aircraft missile regiment and the 124th separate territorial defense brigade, who in extremely difficult conditions restrained the attacks of the enemy's superior forces, causing him serious losses. As reported by ArmyInform, the -Sivalka-VM8- flamethrower systems of the RHC-defense units of the Support Forces carried out fire damage to the enemy's manpower with special thermobaric projectiles.

Title: Encircled battles, destruction of alligators and revenge against the marines of the 155th brigade: a...
Description: ArmiyaInform journalists visited the 82nd Bukovinsk Airborne Assault Brigade, which broke through the Russian border and is still performing tasks on enemy territory. In more detail about the participation of paratroopers in this operation, its commander Colonel Dmytro Voloshyn said: -In my opinion, there were several key aspects. First of all, secrecy in the planning and preparation of the operation. And also the secret movement of troops. We had several interactions with the Commander-in-Chief and were instructed to move to a new area. We moved to the Sumy region in three days at night. But they did it in such a way that even some of our units, which should have known about it, did not know. I even had a conflict with the head of the VSP, who should have known that I was moving and should have provided me with an escort. And he found out when we moved, about three days after that. It is a real skill to move unnoticed by an organism like a brigade. You yourself understand that personnel, heavy equipment, and shells were being moved. Already on the territory of the Sumy region, we disguised ourselves as much as possible. There was no -shuffling-. No one knew that the 82nd Brigade had appeared there. And this continued for about a week after the operation began. For example, Russian media reported that the 22nd Mechanized Brigade broke through the front line and went deep. For understanding, the 22nd brigade was moving behind me. She was in our second echelon. The second aspect is who was bet on to carry out such an operation. And I think the airborne assault troops did it for once. The third aspect is the territory on which we fought. If you look at it, it is a rough terrain, full of difficult sections. I do not think that the enemy saw it as suitable for large-scale operations. And it is necessary to hit where it is weak, where the enemy does not expect. Yes, it was difficult. But we coped with it. Of course, another aspect of success was provisioning. Sometimes I think that if the Commander-in-Chief had raised problematic issues at some regular interaction, then I would have said that I need some kind of intergalactic blaster, I think that it would have been found for us somewhere within a week. To be honest, they gave literally everything. So that you only perform tasks properly. He attacked, destroyed the enemy, took possession of certain areas and borders. And all this, in fact, was successful. After all, the credo of the airborne assault troops is that we do not back down in the face of difficulties, we move to the end. And the main aspect why we have succeeded in all this is the belief in what we are doing. My immediate, faith of my subordinates. No one said: -we have to go to Russian territory anyway.- When the soldiers were told that they had to go and fight in enemy territory, the reaction was quite expected: -finally we will go and slander these bastards on their territory.- Why not? Our country is destroyed every day, children die. So let them also feel what war is like, but for them it is somewhere far away. The first day was probably the most difficult, you had to overcome a barrier in your head. After all, the introduction of such large-scale offensive actions is a very difficult task, taking into account the enemy's use of various means of fire damage. These are high-precision weapons, anti-aircraft missiles, anti-aircraft missiles, military aviation, FPV drones, and Lancets. Of course, it is like that everywhere now. It stands on the stream in them. So I had to overcome this barrier in my head. Somewhere he adjusted himself to some extent, somewhere he adjusted the commanders. There was anxiety, but they went to perform the task. I thought that if we break through the front edge now, then everything should go according to plan. And we broke through the front edge. It was something with something, how we crossed the border. The entire brigade passed through one passage made in the mine-explosive barriers by the 225th assault battalion assigned to me. The car is moving, and I am thinking: now it should be hit by ATGMs, or now the Lancet should fly into it. And nothing comes flying in… troops enter in huge columns. The noise was so loud that probably the whole of Sumy shuddered. I was puzzled, because there is such a sign that when everything is going according to plan, somewhere ahead, the enemy has prepared something. The Wisent barrier machine was the first to pass. It has no weapons, just an armored car with a big bucket. He crossed the border and went to the enemy stronghold. I think, well, that's all for him. And he turned around and drove back. I had even more questions than I had. But the units went further deep into the enemy's defenses. Why we managed to break through the border in such a way became clear when I was already on the territory of Russia. They did not see us, because, as they say, no one mowed the grass in front of their positions. Literally. The grass was taller than my Hummer. And they just didn't see what was happening. They heard explosions, the rumble of equipment, but did not see. So we slipped past them and did not storm those positions. It was also nonsense for them that we do not storm positions where the enemy is, but move on. I'll be honest, when the actions started, everything just went, and we completed the tasks as I set them for myself. The tasks of the first, second, third day, we still did. They occupied certain areas, surrounded the enemy. Somewhere they bypassed him. And perhaps one of the key decisions that led to rapid success was that I did not task my units to enter populated areas. Before that, I spoke with the participants of the campaigns on Russian territory - RDK, GUR. They said that when they entered populated areas and knocked out the enemy, then they were simply mixed up with aircraft and that was it. That's why it was a failure. I decided that the enemy would build defense nodes in populated areas. Therefore, we simply bypassed them, and it was already incomprehensible to the enemy. As we passed through the front end, we thought there were maybe 200 people at most. It is clear that there were pre-prepared positions, but they looked uninhabited. And then, when the enemy was in our rear, it turned out that there were much more of them. Apparently, on the seventh or eighth day, I think you heard, the SBU special unit -Alfa- took about 120 prisoners at just one stronghold. And just so you understand, there were 30 to 40, sometimes 50 enemy military personnel at each stronghold. That is, in general, there were about two thousand servicemen in our rear. Yes, there were mostly conscripts who did not cause us much harm, and they were then taken prisoner. But such a number of personnel were in our rear, and, in fact, our soldier did not pay attention to this, but moved forward and performed his task. Of course, there were also some -slips-. The 225th battalion fulfilled its task, entered and blocked a number of settlements. In particular, the route that went from Korenev to Suja. The second battalion was supposed to go at the same time with it, but it was not possible to make passages in it. There were failures of engineering equipment. So while we were redeploying this battalion to a neighboring route, I decided to immediately bring the second echelon into battle. These units overcame the combat formations of the 225th battalion and immediately went to the first line of enemy defense. The first is because, according to the operational construction, we first overcame the echelon of the state border cover. And behind it, at a depth of 10-12 km, there was already another boundary. Again there were -dragon's teeth-, again an anti-tank ditch, again mines. Two battalions slipped through and went all the way to Novoivanivka, where they pressed the enemy and prevented him from occupying strong points on this line. With this, I set myself the task of the day - to get behind these -dragon's teeth-. If we did not do this, there would be no point in moving forward. Overcoming such barriers under enemy fire… it would be Zaporizhzhia number two. But the staff did not disappoint.   Strong resistance was put up by the enemy's army aviation. Helicopters flew over the columns at a height of 50-100 meters. They fired from cannons, anti-tank missiles, unguided missiles. We immediately deployed anti-aircraft defenses. The first Ka-52 was destroyed with Strela MANPADS. We also damaged the Mi-8 with small arms fire. He fumed. As it turned out later, he flew a little further and also fell. That is, on the first day, we destroyed two enemy rotorcraft. They didn't fly the next day. Then they started working again. On one of these days, we destroyed another Ka-52. A paratrooper hit him with a Stinger MANPADS. The entire crew was destroyed there (ArmyInform already wrote about this episode. Read more can be read here - Ed.). About two weeks after the operation began, a large number of drones appeared here. Serious units arrived with trained crews who know how to use all this. They were constantly working on technology. Here, by the way, they encountered FPV drones in the 330 MHz frequency range for the first time. And at that time we did not have EW tools against them. But we found options. Their points were detected, fire damage was inflicted, and at this time they slipped wherever they needed. There were many different solutions that we constantly combined. While we were advancing, the enemy tried to throw at least someone to stop us. In fact, they threw their units into the tiger's mouth. The -scoop- once had such a thing as marching companies. Literally, from the wheels, they threw themselves at some boundaries with only small arms. We met such companies. They smashed them to zero. First with combat vehicles. And then the soldiers went to clean up if someone continued to resist and did not want to surrender. There were moments when our advanced units went deep into the defense, and the sweep did not have time. And the units found themselves surrounded by the enemy on all sides. But we are paratroopers. We are always in the rear of the enemy - surrounded. We were preparing for this, for a circular defense. And it does not matter whether it is a department, a company or a battalion. Everyone should be able to conduct an all-round defense. Determine dangerous directions, where to place grenade launchers or anti-tank weapons, how to -close- (mining the terrain. - Ed.). We have been trying to unblock one of the units for about a month. And they kept the defense all this time. The first real resistance was offered by the 810th Marine Corps Brigade. For understanding, its composition includes 13 battalions. And these are not security battalions at all. She arrived only by arrangement. The prisoners said that it was 96% manned and 90% equipped. My third battalion captured their APC. Yes, there was still polyethylene on the seats. New car. Only from the factory. There are also paratroopers here. 83rd, 51st, 56th, 119th Parachute Regiments. 73rd Reconnaissance. This is a Vedevesh battalion. Various -Akhmatians- are also here. Well, the most finished is the 155th Marine Corps Brigade. These are the infamous freaks who cut off heads, cut off ears, knocked out teeth, and shot prisoners. The most interesting thing is that they are so boring when they are all together. And if anything, they are afraid to admit that they are from the 155th brigade. They are called anything. I understand that this is a war. But torturing and killing an unresisting opponent is low. There are certain laws and rules of war. No normal commander would set such a task. But there are no moral boundaries in this swagger. Therefore, there is no mercy for them from our paratroopers either. We are trying to destroy them. An eye for an eye, as they say.
