The air attack was repulsed by aviation, anti-aircraft missile forces, electronic warfare units, mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine. As of 11:00, two Kh-59/69 guided air missiles and 56 enemy UAVs have been shot down in Kyiv, Cherkasy, Chernihiv, Poltava, Kirovohrad, Zhytomyr, Khmelnytskyi, Sumy, Mykolaiv, Kherson, Zaporizhzhia, Dnipropetrovsk, Donetsk, and Kharkiv regions. As a result of active countermeasures, 58 enemy UAVs were lost in various regions. Six drones left the airspace of Ukraine: five — to Russia, one — to Belarus. As reported by ArmyInform, The Minister of Defense awarded female defenders, which shot down the Kh-101 missile.

Title: In the Kyiv region, a new movie theater was opened for military personnel undergoing rehabilitation
Description: This was reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. During the event, the defenders watched the film -House of the Word- and talked with director Taras Tomenko, actors Nina Naboka and Gennady Popenka. Kinoprostyr will allow defenders to systematically watch Ukrainian tapes on a large screen with high-quality sound and image and communicate with the stars of Ukrainian cinema. The opening of movie theaters for Ukrainian soldiers in hospitals and rehabilitation centers is an initiative of the -Look Ukrainian!- Association, the Main Directorate of Communications of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, and the -MHP Community- Charitable Foundation. As of November 2024, cinema spaces have been created in four medical institutions of Vinnytsia Zaporizhzhya, Khmelnytskyi and Kyiv regions.

Title: Servicemen of the Ukrainian Armed Forces became the first laureates of an international award from B...
Description: This was reported by the General Staff of the ZSU. The decision on the award was supported by the Chief of the Defense Staff of Great Britain, and the award itself was personally presented by the Ambassador of Great Britain, Martin Harris. Among the representatives who had the honor to attend the presentation were: -This recognition is an important step in supporting women in defense and we are proud to of our heroines!- — noted in the General Staff of the Armed Forces. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov presented awards to the female calculation of the MVG for the downed Kh-101 missile with MANPADS.

Title: More suppliers of high-quality property for the Armed Forces: almost 70 applications have already be...
Description: About this notified the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Among them were requests for military research tests, clarifications, and applications for receipt of acts of compliance of rear property with regulatory and technical documentation of the Ministry of Defense. According to the results of the review of applications for acts of conformity, the Ministry of Defense issued 68 positive decisions. Currently, 22 applications are still pending. -The first results of the digital portal -MOU Partner- indicate the interest of manufacturers and suppliers in cooperation with the Ministry of Defense and the willingness of counterparties to meet modern requirements,- said Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. In total, during the period from August 2 to November 18, 4,200 users viewed or used the MOU Partner platform. The main goal of the digital portal is to expand the range of suppliers of high-quality rear property for the needs of the Armed Forces, to establish effective communication between the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine and manufacturers (suppliers), as well as to ensure maximum transparency in the procurement process. The Ministry of Defense will continue to improve the platform to ensure even greater efficiency of cooperation with business. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense launched a personal account for suppliers of the Armed Forces on the digital portal -MOU Partner-. Thanks to this, counterparties are able to monitor the status of their applications in real time. In the event of a change in status, the applicant will be notified by e-mail. In addition, the office will allow you to save the entire history of applications. The digital portal also has a chat for direct communication with site administrators.

Title: Hundreds of meters, sometimes meters: the DSHV told what they cost the enemy -meat assaults-
Description: Brigadier General Ihor Skybyuk told about this on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- , commander of the Airborne Assault Troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. According to Ihor Skybyuk, the enemy's losses are disproportionate to his gains. He -bites-, realizing his numerical advantage, and not surprising with military genius. We must understand that the enemy must be exhausted. -I advised everyone to take a ruler, look in kilometers, in hundreds of meters, sometimes in meters, how far and where the enemy advanced and what it cost him. Yes, it's a shame to retreat, but sometimes the tactical situation requires retreating to certain other lines,- said the commander of the Airborne Assault Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 95th Polish Airborne Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces were crushed in the Kursk region, the Russians, who went on an assault with a whole convoy of armored vehicles -Akhmat-, named in honor of the father of the current Russian Gauleiter Ichkeria.

Title: Kharkiv is on fire: 10 injured as a result of the attack on the gas station
Description: This was notified by Oleg Synegubov, the head of Kharkiv OVA. In particular, in the city of Kharkiv, the canopy of a gas station and one car were damaged as a result of shelling. 10 people were injured, five of whom were hospitalized. Also today, Russian troops carried out airstrikes near the villages of Chornoglazivka and Myronivka of the Zolochiv community. According to preliminary data, KAB aerial bombs were used. In Kupyansk, as a result of the FAB-1500 strike, at least 12 residential buildings were damaged. According to the head of the OVA, a series of shelling in Kupyansk damaged a private household and an apartment building. Two women, aged 47 and 59, were injured. In addition, as a result of shelling in Kupyansk, the buildings of three enterprises were damaged. Also, an enemy UAV hit an open area within the borders of Kupyansk. During the day, 95 people were evacuated from Kupyansk and Borivsk directions. As ArmiyaInform reported, Russian troops covered Nikopol with -Hurricanes- and -Hrads-.

Title: The commander of the Defense Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine explained how long-range strikes ...
Description: This information was confirmed on the broadcast of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- by Brigadier General Ihor Skybyuk , commander of the Airborne Assault Troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. According to Igor Skybyuk, the operational level of the enemy's construction and our operational tasks will now correspond to the range of long-range weapons. -This will greatly complicate the deployment of its logistical bases and forces. This will make it difficult to base his tactical strike aircraft, army aircraft. It will significantly complicate the deployment of its reserves, control points - that is, everything will be within our reach,- said the commander of the Airborne Assault Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. How reported ArmyInform, Lithuanian President Gitanas Nauseda supported the decision to grant Ukraine the right to strike military targets on the territory of the Russian Federation with long-range weapons.

Title: Transport froze, garbage does not disappear: communal collapse in -lnr-
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysohor, the head of the Luhansk Regional Military Administration. According to him, the occupation authorities found a way to make a profit even from their own inaction - to fine local residents for garbage dumps that arose due to the failure of communal services. The crisis also affected transport. The buses that the Russian Federation handed over to Luhansk are parked in garages under the pretext of a lack of drivers — most of them have been forcibly mobilized. Local residents suspect that the equipment may have been partially returned to Russia, as private transporters with dilapidated vehicles that barely work have increased on the streets. The occupation administration demonstrates an inability to provide basic communal services, which only worsens the living conditions of local residents. As reported by ArmyInform, from December 1, 2024, the passports of the so-called LNR, which the Russians have been forcing residents to receive since 2014 will be invalidated.

Title: Border guards interrupted a night rendezvous of two residents of Vinnytsia near the Romanian border
Description: About this informs the State Border Service of Ukraine. A response team immediately went to the area. Thanks to aerial surveillance, the violators were quickly apprehended. They turned out to be residents of the Vinnytsia region, who admitted that they planned to illegally cross the border at night. The detainees were taken to the border unit, where they were brought to administrative responsibility under Article 204-1 of the Code of Ukraine on Administrative Offenses (-Illegal crossing or attempted illegal crossing of the state border of Ukraine-). ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Russian troops covered Nikopol from -Hurricanes- and -Hrads-
Description: reported this by the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak. Destruction was recorded in 10 private houses, two farm buildings and power lines. The explosions damaged the gas station and the gymnasium yard. The attacks were carried out with artillery shells, Grad salvo fire systems, kamikaze drones and ammunition from drones. Nikopol, Myrivska, Marganetska, Chervonogrigorivska and Pokrovska communities came under attack. On Kryvorizha, the enemy shelled the Zelenodol community. Fortunately, there were no casualties, and experts continue to assess the extent of the damage. On the night of November 20, the occupiers fired at Nikopol from the Uragan anti-aircraft missile system. The destruction of two private houses, two garages and a power line was also recorded in the Dnipro district. There are no dead or injured. Local authorities are urging residents to be cautious and follow safety rules during the shootings. As reported by ArmyInform, Zaporizhzhya 415 times a day shuddered from the Russian blows.

Title: The alarm lasted for more than 11 hours: the consequences of the night drone attack on the Kyiv regi...
Description: This was notified by the Kyiv Regional Military Administration. -Air defense forces worked in the region. Enemy targets destroyed. There are no victims among the population. No hits to critical or residential infrastructure were allowed,- the message reads. Currently, a kindergarten, a school, three administrative buildings, two shops, and agricultural machinery have been damaged in one of the settlements as a result of falling fragments of downed enemy targets. Windows, doors and roofs were damaged in the buildings. Operational services continue to work on fixing the consequences of the enemy attack. As reported by ArmyInform, in the evening of November 19, a Russian missile hit the administrative building in Pryluky.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: In uniform and on the training ground: Valery Zaluzhnyi attended the training of the Ukrainian milit...
Description: The Ambassador of Ukraine wrote about this in his Telegram channel. During the visit, high-ranking officials noted the determination and fighting spirit of Ukrainian defenders. The training program, organized by Great Britain in cooperation with other countries, aims to prepare the Ukrainian military to perform the most difficult tasks at the front. This initiative was an important contribution to strengthening Ukraine's defense capabilities and increasing the effectiveness of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine is on the decisive stage of its struggle for independence, and Great Britain remains one of the closest allies in this struggle.

Title: The enemy hit Pryluky with a rocket: there is a casualty
Description: This was reported by the head of Chernihiv OVA Vyacheslav Chaus. According to the head of the OVA, there is a wounded person. A 70-year-old man was hospitalized in Prylutsk Central Medical Center. In addition, the impact caused a fire in the administration building, damaged windows, and a car. Rescue workers, medics, and law enforcement officers worked on the spot. As Vyacheslav Chaus noted, the enemy shelled the territory of Chernihiv region 5 times during the day. A total of 22 explosions were recorded. As reported by ArmyInform, two people died in Kherson Oblast as a result of Russian shelling.

Title: GUR MOU: The command post of the troop group - north - on the territory of the Russian Federation wa...
Description: This was reported by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Residents of Gubkin observed thick black smoke, smelled it, and heard loud explosions. The GUR of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine reminds that for every crime committed against the Ukrainian people, there will be an adequate and fair retribution. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of November 19, units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, in cooperation with other components of the Defense Forces, caused fire damage to the arsenal of the 1046 logistics center in the district the city of Karachev, Bryansk region of the Russian Federation. On November 12, the Defense Forces inflicted fire damage according to the composition of fuel and lubricants -Oskolneftesnab-, located near the city of Stary Oskol, Belgorod region of the Russian Federation. Damage to such objects creates serious logistical problems for the army of the Russian invaders and significantly reduces their offensive potential.

Title: In the Pokrovsky direction, the Defense Forces stopped 38 enemy attacks — the General Staff of the A...
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff ZSU as of 8:00 a.m. on November 20. On the Kharkiv direction the enemy unsuccessfully tried five times to penetrate the defenses of our defenders near Vovchansk. In the Kupyansk direction, 11 attacks by the occupiers took place during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Kindrashyvka, Lozova, Petropavlivka, Zagryzovo, Pershotravnevo, and Kruglyakivka. The enemy actively used aviation in this direction. In the Lyman direction, the enemy attacked 14 times. Tried to penetrate our defense near Grekivka, Novoehorivka, Hryhorivka, Torske and Terna. There was one skirmish in the Stupochki area in the Kramatorsk direction. Actively using bomber aircraft in the direction of Toretsk, the enemy carried out eight attacks near Toretsk, Druzhba and Shcherbinivka. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 38 assault actions of the aggressor in the districts of Promeny, Lysivka, Petrivka, Dachenskyi, Myrolyubivka, Novotoretskyi, Yuryivka, Pustinka and Pushkini. In the Kurakhiv direction Defense forces repelled 23 attacks. The occupiers most actively tried to advance in the areas of Novoselidivka, Sontsivka, Berestki, Kurakhovoy, Dalnyi, Elizavetivka, and Antonivka. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy, with the support of aviation, carried out 15 assaults on our positions near Kostyantynopolsky, Trudovo, Suhy Yaly, Rozdolny and Novodarivka. On the Orihiv direction, the occupiers attacked in the direction of Novoandriivka once without success. In the Dnieper direction in the past day, our defenders stopped two attempts by the Russian invaders to advance, the invaders received a tough repulse, suffered losses, and retreated. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. On the border with the Sumy region, the enemy from the territory of the Russian Federation is actively using artillery and aviation in the areas of Ukrainian settlements. Our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying troops and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. In general, last day the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,690 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 8 tanks, 27 armored combat vehicles, 49 artillery systems, 2 air defense systems, 91 operational-tactical UAVs, 2 cruise missiles, 100 vehicles and 2 units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: In the Kherson region, two people died as a result of Russian shelling
Description: This reported the head of the Kherson Regional State Administration Oleksandr Prokudin. Antonivka, Veletenske, Shiroka Balka, Mykilske, Oleksandrivka, Stanislav, Novovorontsovka, Mykhailivka, Bilozerka, Gavrylivka, Tomarine, Poniativka, Vesele, Kozatske, Tomina Balka, Red Lighthouse, Komyshany, Sadov, Novoraisk, Trifonivka came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. and the city of Kherson. The Russian military attacked the critical and social infrastructure of the region; residential quarters of settlements in the region. 5 high-rise buildings and 23 private houses were damaged by the blows. The occupiers also mutilated private cars. During a nighttime drone attack, the Air Defense Forces over the territory of our region destroyed one Shahed-131/136. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day the occupiers inflicted 415 strikes in 12 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: Will the armistice save Ukraine: a military historian on a 100% repeat of Russian aggression in the ...
Description: -In this situation, only we can save us. Neither Euro-Atlantic integration nor even the return of territories will save us. We must clearly understand that as long as the Russian Federation exists, it will be an existential threat to us. And, accordingly, it will not disappear even in the event of a truce. I don't say -end of hostilities- because it's not likely to be a peace treaty, it's going to be an armistice. The truce, everyone should understand, is temporary in nature and can be broken for both objective and subjective reasons at any moment. Here it is necessary to understand and immediately prepare for how and for what we will use this truce, because we must clearly understand that any truce ends in the next war. Therefore, in this situation, the Ukrainian population, the Ukrainian political community, and the world community must understand that the time that will appear in our country after the conclusion of the armistice should be used to make the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the military-industrial complex of Ukraine even more powerful Because only this is a guarantee of avoiding possible future aggression of the Russian Federation. It must be said right away that the future aggression of the Russian Federation, or at least an attempt at aggression, is actually a 100% option. And the Russians will not hide even that. They will say that they have completed the objectives of their 1st and then they will start their 2nd. We have already seen this on the example of the anti-terrorist operation that was completed by the Minsk agreements. We know this because the Russians never keep their word and are proud of it. All diplomats in the world know about this. It is written about in all history and diplomatic textbooks, everyone studies it, but no one draws any conclusions. The Victory Plan is the requirements of the President of Ukraine, which are the requirements of the Ukrainian State and are the requirements of the Ukrainian people. There is nothing surprising in these requirements. We simply demand ours back. The question is how we will succeed, how the world community will help us in this. The Victory Plan, most likely, is not an attempt to issue an ultimatum, but actions so that the issue of Ukraine does not disappear from the agenda, so that it is constantly in the circle of interests and in the sphere of interests of the leading states of the world, so that we could continue to resist. No more and no less.

Title: Almost five dozen artillery systems and 1,690 occupants: the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Uk...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 20.11.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, The Armed Forces stopped 130 attacks per day: Defense forces exhaust the combat potential of the enemy.

Title: The enemy is concentrating forces in the Black Sea: 6 ships with -Calibers-
Description: The Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informed about this. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. In the Mediterranean Sea, there are 3 enemy ships that are carriers of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 24 missiles. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea of ​​1974 (SOLAS) by turning off automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, almost 100% will be destroyed: in Russia, they understood the ineffectiveness of -Kalibriv-.

Title: Zaporozhye shuddered 415 times a day from Russian strikes
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA. Russian troops carried out 4 air attacks on Stepnohirsk, Lobkovo and Novodarivka. According to him, 190 UAVs of various modifications attacked Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghirya, Malynivka, Olgivske and Novodarivka. In addition, 21 shellings from the MLRS covered Novodanilivka, Novoandriivka and Mala Tokmachka. As Ivan Fedorov noted, 200 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Primorsky, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriyivka, Novodanilivka, Malaya Tokmachka, Biloghirya, Malynyvka, Olhivskyi and Novodarivka. There were also 22 reports of the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. Civilians were not injured. In addition, according to Ivan Fedorov's information, the Russians struck a village in the Zaporizhzhia region. Previously, they aimed at residential buildings. The consequences are currently being clarified. As reported by ArmyInform, a search operation was completed in Gluhovi: Russian drones killed 12 people.

Title: The Minister of Defense awarded female defenders who shot down the Kh-101 missile
Description: The Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov personally thanked the defenders for their contribution to security of the country by presenting them with the Ministry of Defense awards. A heroic operation was performed: -Your work protects our skies and brings victory closer. We are proud of you, your service and indomitability,- Rustem Umyerov noted during the meeting. This event once again emphasized the importance of professional training and coordinated work of the Ukrainian military in countering Russian aggression. As reported by ArmyInform, on the morning of November 17, an anti-aircraft gunner of the anti-aircraft missile unit of the Galicia-Volyn radio engineering brigade Natalia Grabarchuk destroyed a cruise missile from the Igla MANPADS. It was her first combat launch, and her first hit.

Title: The Armed Forces stopped 130 attacks per day: the Defense Forces are exhausting the combat potential...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The enemy carried out 51 air strikes (in particular, 78 anti-aircraft missiles were used) and 600 kamikaze drone strikes, and carried out almost 3,500 attacks on the positions of our troops. Near Vovchansk in the Kharkiv direction Russian terrorists stormed the positions of Ukrainian units five times. The enemy dropped aerial bombs in the regions of Neskuchny, Visoka Yaruga and Nova Kozachoya. Eleven times the enemy attacked our fortifications on the Kupyansk direction near Kindrashyvka, Lozova, Petropavlivka, Zagryzovo, Pershotravnevo, and Kruglyakivka. Petropavlivka and Lozova were hit by airstrikes. The positions of Ukrainian defenders in the areas of the settlements of Grekivka, Novoehorivka, Hryhorivka, Torske and Terny were stormed by Russian troops 14 times during the day in the Lyman direction. The enemy dropped a KAB in the Raigorodka district. In the Seversk direction, the enemy dropped nine aerial bombs on Seversk and four more on Zakytne, and did not conduct offensive operations. One skirmish took place near Stupochy in the Kramatorsk direction. Stinky and Mykolaivka were hit by airstrikes. In the Toretsk direction, the occupiers stormed the Toretsk, Druzhba and Shcherbinivka districts eight times. The opponent had no success. One battle continues in Toretsk. The enemy carried out airstrikes on Romanivka, Kostyantynivka and Sukhiya Balka. In the Pokrovsky direction the enemy carried out 37 assault and offensive actions. The greatest activity of the Russian occupiers remains in the districts of Promeny, Lysivka, Petrivka, Dachenskyi, Myrolyubivka, Novotoretskyi, Yuryivka, Pustinka and Pushkini. Four skirmishes in the direction are still ongoing. The enemy is intensively attacking our units in the Kurakhiv direction. Currently has 22 attacks. Terrorists tried to advance in the districts of Novoselidivka, Sontsivka, Berestki, Kurakhovo, Dalniy, Elizavetivka, and Antonivka, at the moment there is one battle near Sontsivka. In the Vremivsk direction, the aggressor, with the support of aviation, stormed the front edge of our defense 15 times near Kostyantynopolskyi, Trudovoi, Suhy Yalyi, Rozdolnyi, and Novodarivka. Four clashes are still ongoing. The enemy's attempt to advance in the direction of Novoandriivka on the Orichivsk direction ended in vain. In the Dnieper direction two enemy attacks were repulsed, the enemy was unsuccessful. The operation of the Defense Forces of Ukraine in the Kursk region is ongoing. Ukrainian defenders repelled more than 20 attempts by the occupiers to knock our units out of their positions. The department also honored Ukrainian soldiers from the 128th Separate Transcarpathian Mountain Assault Brigade, the 126th Separate Territorial Defense Brigade, the 25th Separate Sicheslav Airborne Brigade, the 71st Separate Hunter Brigade, and the 38th Separate Marine Brigade, who steadfastly restrain the onslaught of overwhelming enemy forces. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the 63rd mechanized brigade showed >how installing EW helps protect military equipment from Russian kamikaze drones.

Title: In a flock or alone: ​​Israeli aircraft manufacturers are promoting an unmanned missile-carrying hel...
Description: How emphasized in their statement posted on the company's official portal, representatives of the company, this project is an example of unique cooperation between Steadicopter and Rafael and provides fast, maneuverable, accurate capabilities for striking heavy targets for tactical air operations, ArmyInform reports. The Golden Eagle HS unmanned rotorcraft is armed with powerful Spike missiles, which ArmyInform reported in one of its materials, designed for precision strike missions in a variety of environments, from tactical conflict zones to border protection, regional perimeter protection, and urban operations. These capabilities allow the wielder of this weapon to dominate the battlefield, providing an advantage, particularly in difficult or overcrowded areas. Experts of the defense portal Army Recognition point to the fact that, thanks to the integration of the Spike missile, the Golden Eagle HS helicopter ensures prompt and precise strikes on particularly important targets, allowing ground forces to operate from safe positions, regardless of time of day and visibility conditions. The Golden Eagle HS armament uses high-precision Spike missiles with the possibility of using -fire and forget- tactics. Equipped with a powerful warhead, this platform combines enhanced stealth with high combat effectiveness, expanding the tactical capabilities of assault forces. With a total take-off weight of 50 kilograms, Golden Eagle HS is compatible with Spike-SR missiles with a firing range of 2.5 kilometers and Spike-LR2 with a firing range of 5.5 kilometers, providing flexible applications thanks to a data link between the missile's homing head and the operator. These missiles belong to the sixth generation, capable of self-targeting with the help of an infrared homing head. As soon as the missile reaches the target, it destroys it with a powerful anti-tank high-explosive warhead capable of penetrating up to 70 cm of rolled armor. The Golden Eagle HS unmanned aerial vehicle is equipped with an advanced suite of sensors, including a high definition EO/IR tele/thermal imaging system for day and night use with target tracking capability. Integrated with advanced SightX artificial intelligence (AI) technology, the system can seamlessly detect, track and classify targets even in adverse weather conditions or difficult terrain. This advanced method of applying AI can distinguish between different types of targets, whether people or vehicles, providing ground forces with real-time situational awareness. -The launch of Golden Eagle HS in partnership with Rafael Advanced Defense Systems Ltd is an important milestone for Steadicopter,- said Itai Toren, CEO of Steadicopter. This unmanned aerial vehicle meets modern operational requirements, providing exceptional accuracy and the ability to launch strikes in autonomous mode. -Combining experience in the field of unmanned aerial vehicles of the helicopter type with Rafael's extensive experience provides the military with a solution that increases the effectiveness of its use on the battlefield.- In turn, a representative of the Rafael Corporation added: -Our collaboration with Steadicopter in the creation of this unmanned aerial vehicle meets the changing needs of modern warfare, where innovation and advanced capabilities are critical. This partnership will allow current and future users of Spike missiles to be more versatile and effective, potentially game-changing on the modern battlefield.- Golden Eagle HS is capable of operating both independently and as part of inconspicuous swarm groups launched from different points for combined attacks on important targets. This UAV helicopter from Stedicopter is a new step in the development of rotary unmanned systems that combine compactness, autonomy and powerful weapons. With its ability to destroy heavy equipment and provide reliable air support, this drone has every chance of becoming an indispensable tool for today's armed forces. Golden Eagle HS unmanned missile carrier helicopter. Video: Stedicopter

Title: F-16 as an air defense tool: how effective were the Fighting Falcons during the recent shelling of U...
Description: Is it a lot or a little within the limits of the general statistics of Russian air weapons used by the enemy and shot down by the Defense Forces of Ukraine? What enemy munitions could not be shot down by F-16 pilots? How effective are the -Battle Falcons- as a component of air defense assets? ArmyInform answers these questions based on official data of the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported President of Ukraine, on the night of November 17, with the help of F-16s, about 10 enemy air targets were shot down, without detailing which exactly the aircraft managed to shoot down the pilots of the Ukrainian -Battle Falcons-. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also noted that, in total, during the previous week, Russia used more than 900 guided aerial bombs, more than 600 attack drones and almost 140 missiles against Ukraine. Of this number, about 120 missiles of various types, including Zircon, Iskander, and Kinjal, as well as about 90 drones, including Shahed, were used by the Russian invaders on the night of November 17. The President informed, that during a massive combined strike on November 17, Ukrainian air defense forces destroyed more than 140 enemy air targets - missiles and drones, and thanked to Ukrainian defenders, separately mentioning military aviation pilots who piloted various types of aircraft, including F -16: -We are grateful to all our air defenses, which were involved in repelling this attack: anti-aircraft missile troops, our aviation - pilots F-16, -susok- and MiGs, mobile fire groups, EW - all worked out in an organized manner. Thank you for the reliable protection!- Official statistics of the results of the combat work of the Air Defense Forces in repelling the record-breaking Russian combined air attack reported in Air The forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces - defenders of the Ukrainian sky shot down 102 missiles of various types and 42 unmanned aerial vehicles. If we take the number of aircraft shot down with the help of F-16 aircraft mentioned by the President - about 10 units - as a basis, we find out that the pilots of the Ukrainian -Fighting Falcons- shot down about 7% of all enemy air targets destroyed on November 17. Is it a lot or a little? Depends on what data we can operate on and what factors should be taken into account. Back in the summer of 2023, the then spokesman of the Air Force Command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Colonel Yuriy Ignat noted that the F-16 as an air defense vehicle has limitations - fighter jets cannot shoot down ballistic missiles: -It can cover the sky from kamikaze drones and cruise missiles, that is, bring the percentage of shooting down closer to 100, now we have 70-80% - this is with strong Russian attacks, with the F-16 this figure can increase to the maximum Plus, it will allow us to use cheaper missiles.- In view of this, from the general list of munitions used by the enemy, those that the F-16 cannot shoot down should be excluded. These are ballistic, aeroballistic and hypersonic missiles. There are at least 10 of them: It should also be taken into account that a significant proportion of the air strikes used by the enemy on November 17 - 85 units - were Kh-101 and Kalibr cruise missiles. Kh-101 missiles can fire dipole reflectors as obstacles against radar-guided missiles. Missiles with infrared (thermal contrast) guidance on such small targets, equipped with a compact turbojet engine, work much worse than on airplanes and helicopters. One should also take into account the share of F-16 used to repel an enemy attack among other means of the Ukrainian air defense forces, which cannot be significant. In view of the above, the estimated 7% of enemy air targets shot down by F-16s during the massive combined strike of the Russians on Ukraine on November 17 is a significant indicator. It testifies to the high efficiency of the -Battle Falcons- as an air defense vehicle.

Title: A gun from Afghanistan, a 30-grade gunner and dreams of victory: how the calculation of the M777 gun...
Description: While they were waiting, a large shaggy sheepdog came out of the darkness very quietly. The dog sat silently next to us, looked up somewhere. Then he left as silently as the shadow of sadness of a small village of Donetsk region, not far from the front. Here, at night, only the constant cannonade of explosions from the front line and the sound of the engines of military vehicles can be heard. We get into a pickup truck, a car with a night vision camera drives us in the dark to the position of the artillery calculation of the 148th separate artillery brigade of the Zhytomyr Airborne Assault Troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. We are met by the commander of the calculation on landing, we quickly move to the shelter, highlighting a red flashlight. A large, tidy dugout welcomes you with warmth and light. Two-story beds with dark army mattresses are lined up along one of the walls of the underground shelter. On one of the beds, everything lights up and shines, it is the equipment of a signalman - 45-year-old Taras with the call sign -Tarik-. He himself is from the Poltava region. In civilian life, he worked as a construction worker, installing gas pipelines and heating. He has been serving in the 148th brigade since April 2023. He speaks simply about his duties: there must be communication and light at the position, maintenance of equipment, batteries, generators, and transmitters. - A lot of work. Why might there be no connection? The reasons are different. Something can fly in, fragments can damage the generator, the walkie-talkie will break, the equipment sometimes fails, my job is to make sure everything works properly, - Tarik explains. He adds that civilian work is almost no different from army work. . -It's the same, only a little scarier,- says the operator with a smile. At home, Taras is waiting for his wife and two schoolboy sons. They often talk on the phone, the family supports. He recently returned from vacation, he says that everything is fine, but not enough, he would like to spend more time with his family. - The only wish is for the war to end as soon as possible and to return home. I have many dreams, but the biggest one is victory. Taras's brother approaches us and sits down next to us. He has a gray beard, a red flashlight sparkles on his head, cheerful eyes, as they say, -with beads-, he smiles and introduces himself. Anton is 44 years old, call sign -Baker-, a senior soldier, has the position of senior howitzer gunner M777A1. He has been in positions and performing combat missions for over a year. I joined the ranks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in April 2023, from the city of Berdychiv. — In 2022, I was not drafted into the army, because I have four children, and in 2023, when my eldest son turned 18, according to the first the summons went to the military commissariat. I have an older son and a daughter from my first marriage and two more sons. At the time when I was drafted, my wife and I had not yet been registered, - says the artilleryman. He says that he likes to serve in the artillery. Training with work on this Pekar gun took place in Germany. — The training lasted 10 days. Why so fast? Howitzer M777A1 is easy to maintain. After completing the courses, he received a 30-grade gunner's certificate, he says jokingly. He recalls that he really liked Germany for its order and cleanliness, as well as food for the military. And they were also impressed by the roads. -The baker- was abroad for the first time. He is a bricklayer-plaster by profession, but he was a baker for many years, hence the nickname: -Peak bread, buns, cakes in Berdychiv in a restaurant-. Pekar speaks with pride about the Pekar gun, a very powerful and accurate weapon, everything depends on the gunner and the accuracy of the coordinates. — Zaporizhzhia is beautiful worked, a little less in Donetsk region. It happens differently: mostly 40-50 shots, but when it’s 10. Here you can’t guess how the enemy will attack, there’s an assault, if it’s -forbidden- so that they don’t climb, don’t forget who we are, then a few shots are enough, he explains he. It is admitted that the first time was terrible in the war. Now he already easily distinguishes where the projectile flies, how it flies and where. - At first it was scary. Now it's just flying in, it's commonplace. The hardest part of the job is carrying shells, and also moving from place to place, it's several days with almost no sleep, says the gunner. silhouettes The boys are stomping, because the morning autumn coolness gives the first breaths of the coming winter frosts. A quiet conversation, almost in a whisper, over coffee and a cigarette while waiting for the team to fight. The first, first pink, then more and more saturated yellow rays of dawn. Suddenly, the command: -To battle!- The gunners run to the gun, with coordinated movements everyone does their job: remove the masking, get the coordinates of the target, aim, load — -Shot!- , so as not to interfere with the calculation. Within a minute the gun is cloaked again, everyone goes back to the dugout to talk and finally see each other's faces and take some pictures. One of the guys looks like Jesus from the painting, the other looks like an athlete. They are smoking again, smiling, drinking coffee. 42-year-old sergeant Dmytro with the call sign -Lion- from the city of Dnipro commands the cannon. On May 19, 2022, he went to the Military Commissariat with his brother and best man, applied for the elite troops and got into the DSHV. — I thought that victory would come sooner. I had no idea what it would be like. And everything turned out as it should be, I became the gun commander. First, I got the position of a gunner after training, and then I was in the 95th artillery brigade, which was disbanded, and I was transferred to the 148th brigade. He passed sergeant courses, then training in Germany, he says. -Lev- proudly mentions that the Germans and Americans were shocked that in such a short period the Ukrainians learned everything so quickly. - We have a war, there is no time to study for half a year. We are -rexes- of the DSHV, he says. This is already the third gun of the crew. They worked on the first boy for a long time and even gave her the name -Lyalya-. - She worked like a clock mechanism. She never let me down, unfortunately, she stayed in another unit, that's how it happened. This one is a little cranky. I know that this gun fought in Afghanistan. The barrel was changed, and, consider it as new, some mechanisms were updated, then it will work as it should, says -Lev-. They have been fighting with this team for a year, they went through training in Zhytomyr Oblast. - There is also a young addition, Oleg came to us a week ago, the main thing is that he is motivated, he learned everything quickly. Currently, I can choose people for the team, only those who are needed here. Because an unmotivated person does not have time or energy to shout, argue, explain. This is a war, everyone must clearly understand why he is here, - the commander proves his position. He controls the entire process, records the coordinates, gives orders. The gunner Viktor directs the gun to the target according to the coordinates, Oleg and Andrii load the projectile, Oleksandr loads the gunpowder and brings the gun into combat order. Anton gives the gunpowder, and the commander fires. - Our calculation is one iron fist. Everyone knows what they are doing here and they have no questions about who is doing what, we are all working to win. Everyone knows their job. How do we hold on? The main thing is respect for each other. In general, we are already here as a family, - assures -Lev-. Before the large-scale invasion, Dmytro worked at a power plant. After the end of the war, he wants to return home, to civilian life, he misses his family. — What do I dream about, except victory? My wife really wants to go to Italy. They are waiting for me at home, the children go to school. We talk on the phone, via video. I take a photo of the boys in farewell, and we run to the car. We leave the position in the morning fog, -Candy- constantly beeps on the road... Photo by Natalia Kravchuk

Title: Propagandists invented a fake about the surrender: what is Trump doing here
Description: This time, they spread, with reference to the Institute, a fake about the fact that the Ukrainian military allegedly began to surrender eight times more often after the victory of Donald Trump in the elections. This -news- was also allegedly commented on by the editor-in-chief of Euronews, Klaus Strunz, who called it an -absolutely natural- development of events, saying that now -it is finally clear to everyone that Ukraine is doomed.- However, this news and everything related to it was invented by propagandists. The Institute for the Study of War did not publish such information either on its website or in social networks. There is also no reaction to this hoax in any of the reputable Western media, including Euronews - obviously because it is a poor fake. In fact, there are no independent and reliable data on how many Ukrainian soldiers surrender as prisoners, because such statistics are available only to the Russian side, and it is difficult to trust them. At the same time, the Human Rights Commissioner of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine, Dmytro Lubinets, said that the government is aware of more than 100 executions of Ukrainian military personnel by the Russians, who have surrendered or are being captured. There may be many more real cases, but such crimes are difficult to verify and legally record.

Title: Syndrome of the Kursk operation: the troops of the Russian Federation are sick with Kursk - the symp...
Description: told about this on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyny- a> spokesman of OTU -Siversk-, Colonel Vadym Mysnyk. — Hundreds of kilometers [along] the northern state border, the enemy is [mining], increasing his minefields. They also carry out such defensive measures, and this says something - we call it the syndrome of the Kursk operation, he said. In the Kursk region itself, the Russian command is building up its forces and throwing its soldiers into reckless assaults with the aim of knocking out the Defense Forces of Ukraine from the territory of the Russian Federation as soon as possible. — The rest of the [Russians] forces were concentrated in the Kursk region. Here they are both in a hurry and nervous. They throw everything they can into the battle, transfer new units, new forces here to continue the onslaught, he said. The officer said that during the day, the fighters of the Defense Forces repelled more than 20 enemy assaults without losing a single controlled settlement. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that 5 drones destroyed a Russian assault group in Kurshchyna.

Title: PereREBilo — the enemy drone could not reach our tank
Description: Unique footage appeared on November 19 on the brigade channel. Our tank led a raid in the forest, where it destroyed enemy positions. As the tankers began to turn around, an enemy FPV drone appeared above it and attempted to dive on the tank. But due to the action of the WB, it lost controllability and exploded on the ground a few meters from the tank. -A very rare shot is a clear example of how EW works... Valuable equipment and the lives of our soldiers were saved,- the brigade commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 63rd mechanized brigade showed risky raid of his tank, which destroyed the trenches of the invaders in the forest.

Title: King Bradley — mechanic Taras was one of the first to master the American BMP engine
Description: About the master on November 19 the General Staff of the ZSU told. -The Bradley engine is similar to the Kamaz engine, only much better!-, says Taras. At his workplace, he provides the striking power of the Armed Forces at the front, where American infantry fighting vehicles have performed very well.   As reported by ArmyInform, Bradley demolishes the roof to Russian armored personnel carriers in Kurshchyna.

Title: Russian stormtroopers demined the road to our positions near Kurakhovo. By myself
Description: The video of the battle was released on November 19 on the battalion channel. A Russian armored fighting vehicle, together with the landing party, was quickly driving towards our positions. But she didn't make it, because she exploded on a mine. Smoke billowed from the car and the invaders began to climb out. They were also smoking. Some of them remained lying down, and some tried to hide in the landing. But here our bomber drones flew in and carried out a sweep with the help of drops. -Not a single racist creature from this video survived, not even the one that ran into the landing!- - assured the battalion.   As reported by ArmiyaInform, fighters of the 214th special OPFOR battalion of the Armed Forces of Ukraine ambushed enemy armored vehicles at the landing site and -znyshhyly-na-kurahivskomu-napryamku/->started immediately to bomb.

Title: Mortals in Chasovoy Yar: Russians run to -meat-reconnaissance under fear of being shot
Description: told about this on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyny- a> spokeswoman of OTU -Luhansk-, Major Anastasia Bobovnikova. — On the Toretsk direction, the enemy constantly storms the city of Toretsk. In addition, battles are taking place near Nelipivka and near Toretsk is the village of Shcherbynivka. In the Kramatorsk direction in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar, the enemy is accumulating its forces, and in the Seversky direction literally today, the enemy has already shelled 13 times with anti-aircraft guns, she said. The officer said that despite constant assaults, the occupiers are not succeeding either in Toretsk or in Chasovoy Yar. — The enemy is not advancing. We will stop all his attempts, all assaults, both in Toretsk and in Chasovoy Yar, the military woman assured. The spokeswoman denied information about the advance of the occupiers in Chasovoy Yar. — I know you probably want to ask about the alleged advancement in the Rift of Time. However, I will say that this is not an advance, but rather a situation where the enemy is running across the channel and scouting our positions, she explained. Anastasia Bobovnikova described the tactics of the enemy. — They just run forward and whoever has caught up has caught up, and whoever has not caught up has not caught up. It is more like a -meat- reconnaissance, when the units just throw and try to feel where there are weak points, where there are strong points, where the enemy cannot come, said the military woman. The spokeswoman assured that the enemy's attempts to advance are detected and stopped. — Such attempts, of course, are revealed. The enemy is destroyed, the groups are hit and the enemy does not advance, the officer said. At the same time, the morale and psychological spirit of the occupiers, according to her, is very low - they run forward due to fear of punishment - up to and including physical execution - from their command. - Their moral and psychological spirit is very low. They do not want to run into such -meat- assaults. These are rather suicide bombers who were driven to certain death under the threat of being shot. Because we recorded such statements in our intercepts, when the leaders, commanders of the enemies simply told them that if they go into battle, they will be shot,- said the spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU. Anastasia Bobovnikova said that many such cases are recorded - sometimes whole units of the Russian occupation forces refuse to obey the order. — There are many such people. There are entire units that refused to go on assaults. However, unfortunately, they are forced to do just that. Of course, they are afraid of being shot, and in this way they have a chance to run and get captured and save their lives in captivity, the military woman explained. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that up to a hundred occupiers are killed in Toretsk every day.

Title: 5 traitors were sentenced to 15 years each in Donetsk region
Description: This was reported on November 19 by the prosecutor's office of the Donetsk region. One of the convicts, a native of Donetsk, was enrolled in the -DNR- motorized rifle regiment. Made combat missions to the cities of Krasnohorivka and Avdiivka, as well as the village of Vesele, Pokrovsky district. A resident of Torez served in the -people's militia-, provided the occupiers with radio communications. Supervised the work of the Reb in the Marinsky direction. A member of the Russian troops from Lyman as part of a tank regiment fought in the Luhansk region and in the village of Terny of the Lyman community. Two natives of Luhansk region served near the villages of Klishchiivka and Ivano-Daryivka, Bakhmut district. As ArmiyaInform reported, 4 residents of the Kharkiv region, including a software engineer, a former military man and two unemployed men, were recruited by the Russian special services and acted in the interests of the state- aggressor.

Title: Burns, explodes and goes! — spectacular destruction of Russian $50 million
Description: The video of the defeat was released on November 19 on the unit's channel. Aerial scouts from Shadow immediately recorded 4 Russian air defense systems located in the field. These were 2 -Buk-M2- and 2 -Arrows-. Our aerial scouts reported the targets of the 14th regiment of unmanned aviation complexes of the Forces of Unmanned Systems of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, which inflicted fire damage on one of the Buk-M2 air defense systems, which caught fire. The occupants tried to escape on the burning equipment, but the ammunition began to detonate on it. It looked spectacular, especially since the enemy SAM costs about $50 million. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 27th UAV attack unit of the Pechersk Brigade of the National Guard destroyed Russian BUK-M1 anti-aircraft missile complex.

Title: Blood without iron: in the South, the Russians use tactics -infiltration-
Description: The tactics of the occupiers were described and explained on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyny- in the Vremivsk direction there are one and a half dozen assaults per day and explained the goal of the occupiers.

Title: Volodymyr Zelenskyi and Mette Frederiksen visited wounded Ukrainian soldiers
Description: About this in the evening of 19 November reported the website of the President. Volodymyr Zelenskyi and Mette Frederiksen, in particular, talked with soldiers who were wounded in battles in Kurshchyna, in the Kupyansk and Lymansk directions. The President awarded the defenders with orders -For Courage- II and III degrees. -Thank you for your service, for protecting our country. Get well as soon as possible,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. The President also presented the military medics with the Order of Princess Olga III degree and the medal -For Military Service to Ukraine-. -Thank you for what you do for our boys. Much respect for your work, for saving lives. A low bow to you for this,- said the President. In addition, the leaders inspected the equipment that doctors use to perform operations, and also familiarized themselves with the construction project of a new reception department designed for 40 patients at the same time. It will house a diagnostic center, an examination room, a manipulation room and an intensive care unit. It will also be integrated into the transition between the surgical and trauma buildings, which will provide quick and barrier-free access to the three buildings in the complex. As reported by ArmyInform, Denmark will provide Ukraine 130 million euros for the development of the defense industry.

Title: In the Vremivsk direction, one and a half dozen assaults per day: the Armed Forces explained the goa...
Description: The goal of the occupiers was explained on the national telethon -Edyny Novyny- by in the Vremiv direction enemy assaults — the occupiers are trying in vain to wedge themselves into the positions of the Ukrainian defense.

Title: The occupiers did not like it - a huge fireball was recorded near Kupyansk
Description: The video of the combat operation was released on November 19. A long-range Russian self-propelled artillery unit fired from a position in a forest strip, where it was spotted and hit by our aerial reconnaissance. -Msta-S- first simply caught fire, and then, due to the explosion of ammunition, turned into a spectacular fireball. The damage was done with the help of Pulstron, which was supplied by the Come Back Alive Foundation.   As reported by ArmyInform, the medics of the 77th separate airmobile Naddnipr brigade showed how their typical day at the stabilization point passes.

Title: Denmark will provide Ukraine with 130 million euros for the development of the defense industry
Description: About this President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky reported on November 19 based on the results of a meeting with the Prime Minister of Denmark, Mette Frederiksen, who came to Ukraine on a visit. The head of state thanked Denmark, the entire Danish people and personally Mette Frederiksen and her team for helping Ukraine. In total, Denmark has already provided more than 20 packages of defense support, and together with Ukraine created a special model for the development of Ukrainian industry. -It makes it possible to unite other countries around investments in the production of weapons in Ukraine. These are artillery, our -Bogdans-, also missiles, long-range drones. We will continue to develop such cooperation,- said the President. One of the main topics of the negotiations is the key areas of relations: bilateral and with partners. Particular attention is paid to joint work at the level of European institutions, because in the second half of next year Denmark will preside over the EU. -Our Ukrainian policy is to be as fast as possible in integrating into Europe. And finally, we all in the Euro-Atlantic community have to admit that we have to be quick. And every day, obviously, decisions are needed for Ukraine. In the entire Alliance, there is a decision on the invitation to Ukraine. The sooner it happens, the sooner Russia will realize, come to an understanding and make a decision that the war against Ukraine does not and will not make sense for them,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy said. Separately, the President emphasized that the world needs to put pressure on the Russian shadow tanker fleet, as well as react to the involvement of North Korean troops in Russia's war against Ukraine. Mette Frederiksen said that Ukraine should win this war, so Denmark provided and will provide assistance and support the defense industry. -We already see what your defense industry is capable of. We understand that these investments lead to real impact on the battlefield,- said the Danish Prime Minister. She also added that the outcome of this war will determine the future not only of Ukraine, but also of Europe. -You belong to our Euro-Atlantic family, you belong to the NATO space, the EU, and we will support you in your next steps during Denmark's EU presidency, where the main priority will be EU enlargement,- concluded Mette Frederiksen. As reported by ArmyInform, Volodymyr Zelenskyy together with the Prime Minister of Denmark Mette Frederiksen met with Ukrainian manufacturers of long-range drones and soldiers who use them.

Title: One flag and two tanks - our pilots did not limit themselves to enemy vehicles
Description: The video of combat work was published on November 19 on the battalion channel. The drones of the brigade killed two enemy tanks that were abandoned by their crews with several hits. Then the pilots noticed a Russian flag neatly spread out on the road. Ammunition was not spared for him either.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 110th unmanned systems battalion of the mechanized brigade named after Colonel General Mark Bezruchka destroyed 6 enemy vehicles.

Title: In the Kyiv region, a dealer with fake documents on unfitness went to court
Description: This was announced on November 19 by the Prosecutor's Office of the Kyiv Region. According to the investigation, the accused ensured that Ukrainian citizens conscripted into military service received forged military registration documents regarding their unfitness for military service, as well as forged decisions of the local self-government body. These documents gave the latter the possibility of unimpeded travel abroad in wartime conditions. The man valued his services at $4,000 to $5,000. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: They do not deserve mercy - the presidential pilots looked into the eyes of the occupiers
Description: The video was released on November 19 on the battalion channel. The occupier is running away, our FPV drone is approaching, the Russian is looking around in panic, stop, shot! A new occupier is already fleeing and a new kamikaze drone is flying after him. -Our soldiers decided to look into the eyes of the occupiers, and there …. nothing, darkness! For your attention, a selection called -photo album — the last look of the occupier!-, commented the video in the battalion.   As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the 4th mechanized battalion of the Separate Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytsky gathered a selection of well-hit drops on enemy attack aircraft.

Title: Having lied, the Russian propagandists buried our rocketmen, and they escaped
Description: Footage of combat work and non-trivial rescue was made public by the State Border Service of Ukraine. A few days ago, Russian propagandists began to brag about the shots of their FPV drone of our RAK-SA-12 installation, which was installed on a Humvee armored vehicle. The invaders boasted that they destroyed not only the car, but also the entire crew. But it turned out that the Russians lied. As usual. Our rocketmen told the story of their amazing rescue, when not only they themselves survived, but also their equipment, which is very annoying to the Russians. What it's like to be in the crosshairs of a Russian FPV drone - see in the video: ArmyInform told how RSZV RAK destroys enemy infantry .

Title: More than 1,500 transfer reports have already been processed — the Ministry of Defense
Description: About this reported on November 19 by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. -The number of reports shows that the military was waiting for the opportunity to change the place of service without lengthy approvals, bureaucracy and groundless refusals. Instead, the number of agreed shows that the service works effectively. Digitization continues to transform our army into the army of the future, where any service is received simply, transparently and quickly,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko, deputy minister for digitalization. Changing the place of service through Army+ has a fairly simple algorithm. It is necessary to submit a report, attach to it a military card or an officer's certificate, a letter of recommendation from another unit. In some cases, a VLK opinion is required, for example, if a soldier wants to transfer from a combat unit to the rear. Then the report goes to the Personnel Center of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. If there are no grounds for refusal, an order is prepared, which is subsequently signed by either the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces or the Chief of the General Staff. -Also, what makes this service unique is that the place of service can be changed without the approval of the commander. It is needed only in certain cases and it will be received by the Personnel Center of the Armed Forces, not the military. We are doing everything to free people's time for efficient service as much as possible,- added Kateryna Chernogorenko. In addition to being simple, the new algorithm for changing the place of service is also transparent. If the serviceman is refused, he will receive the reason why it happened. Currently, the most frequent reasons for refusals are as follows: — the report is submitted by military personnel who do not serve in the Armed Forces; — lack of a conclusion of the VLK for transfer to the rear from the combat unit; — copies of all pages of the military document with records of service are missing. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense in 2024 secured the supply of clothing for female defenders at 158 million hryvnias

Title: Together with Denmark, we produce weapons for Ukraine - the President
Description: This was announced by the President of Ukraine on November 19. -We inspected the drones purchased with the support of Denmark and according to the Danish model: the funds are allocated to the contracts already concluded by the state enterprise with the manufacturers. Denmark is a friend we can really count on. Together we protect the lives of Ukrainians. Together we produce weapons for Ukraine. And together we are working on recovery after the destruction caused by this war,- Volodymyr Zelenskyi said.   As reported by ArmyInform, President discussed with the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Japan the strengthening of cooperation between the countries.

Title: In Sumy Oblast, 4 Russian servicemen received prison terms for theft
Description: This was reported on November 19 by the prosecutor's office of the Sumy region. During the occupation of the village of Vorozhba of the Lebedyn territorial community in March 2022, four Russian servicemen broke into the house of civilians and, threatening them with weapons, forced them to leave their homes. At the same time, the soldiers fired at two cars parked in the yard. Therefore, the owner of the house, together with her son and her 81-year-old mother, were forced to walk and seek shelter from fellow villagers. Later, the Russians set up their headquarters in the house of the victims. After the occupiers fled the community, people returned to the house and discovered the disappearance of all household and garden equipment. The occupiers also stole $700 from the woman's bag. As ArmyInform reported, an investigation has been launched in Donetsk due to the murder of a local resident by the occupiers.

Title: A rubber boat in the steppes of Ukraine - the Russian fleet was sunk in Donetsk region
Description: The video of the defeat was published on November 19 on the brigade's channel. In the direction of Kurakhiv, the occupiers tried to cross the stove under the cover of darkness with one and a half dozen of their attack aircraft so that they could reach the city. -But our aerial scouts detected the movement of the enemy in advance, the pilots of drop drones waited for the grandmaster's pause, and then unexpected -gifts- fell on the heads of the uninvited zaids. Boats, of course, are in pieces. And the losers, who managed to row out, -rowed out- already on dry land. And they will never plow or trample our land again,- the brigade commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 46th separate airmobile brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces repelled two consecutive attempts of assaults by the Russian invaders.

Title: Punished for violation of personal distance — 5 drones destroyed a Russian assault group in Kurshchy...
Description: The video of the battle was released on November 19 on the battalion channel. The enemy advanced an assault group on buggies and motorcycles. But the Russians were spotted in time by our reconnaissance drones, and kamikaze drones also flew in their wake. -FPV-drones, precisely according to the coordinates, began the destruction even before the attack aircraft could approach our infantry. In a few minutes, the attacking group was simply dismantled. This is what reconnaissance drones are for: they find the enemy in time, giving the opportunity to organize a precise response. It is not just a technique - it is a synergy of the human mind and technology. And thanks to such coordination, the attack was stopped at an early stage,- the battalion commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the 225th assault battalion filmed the consequences of the defeat of the armored assault group of the occupiers.

Title: Ukraine and Croatia are strengthening cooperation in the field of humanitarian demining
Description: reports this by the Main Directorate of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security. The delegation was headed by the head of the Main Department of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security, Colonel Ruslan Beregulya. Main topics of discussion: Colonel Ruslan Beregulya informed the Croatian partners about Ukraine's progress in humanitarian demining, stressing the importance of international support. He emphasized that experience and technical assistance from Croatia are key to increasing the efficiency of work in the de-occupied territories. -Using the Croatian experience allows us to save the lives of Ukrainians. We are grateful for the support and help of our international partners,- said Ruslan Beregulya. The representatives of the Croatian Center noted Ukraine's significant progress in the liberation of territories from explosive objects, the flexibility and efficiency of the Ukrainian mine action system, as well as its openness to cooperation. The Ukrainian delegation visited one of the sites being demined by the Croatian government. The use of mechanized demining machines and mine detection dogs was demonstrated. This combined approach attracted the interest of Ukrainian specialists. During the event, a meeting was held with the Ambassador of Ukraine to Croatia, Vasyl Kyrylych, who confirmed the readiness of the Croatian side to continue supporting Ukraine, in particular in the field of humanitarian demining. Cooperation between Ukraine and Croatia is an important step in strengthening security and returning the territories to peaceful life. As reported by ArmyInform, 20 first military environmental auditors received certificates after completing studies at the State Environmental Academy of Postgraduate Education and Management.

Title: The General Staff of the Armed Forces named the direction where the enemy attacks the most
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff ZSU as of 16:00 on November 19. The occupiers continue to use aviation and artillery in the border areas of the Sumy region. The areas of the settlements of Zhuravka, Vodolagi, Volfine, Ryasne, Mezenivka, Basivka came under artillery fire, and the enemy hit Oleksandria and Yunakivka with anti-aircraft guns. According to currently available information, the Russian aviation dropped 14 guided aerial bombs on the territory of the Kursk region of the Russian Federation. On the Kharkiv direction, Russian terrorists stormed the positions of our units in the Vovchansk region four times, so far two enemy attacks have already been repelled. Five times the enemy attacked our positions on the Kupyansk direction, in the areas of the settlements of Kindrashivka, Lozova and Kruglyakivka, and received a decent repulse. In the Lyman direction the enemy is trying to advance near Grekivka, Novoehorivka, Torsky and Terni. Since the beginning of the day, there have already been eight clashes in this direction, and one is still ongoing. In the Siversk direction, the enemy did not carry out offensive actions, however, they dropped 13 anti-tank missiles in the areas of Siversk and Zakitny. In the Kramatorsk direction, one skirmish continues near Stupochy. The enemy bombarded the areas of Stinky and Mykolaivka settlements. In the Toretsk direction, the number of enemy attacks increased to six. The occupiers are attacking near the settlements of Toretsk, Druzhba, and Shcherbynivka, where our defenders repelled three attacks, three more clashes are ongoing. At the same time, the enemy carried out airstrikes on Romanivka, Kostyantynivka and Sukhiya Balka. The enemy most actively attacked the Ukrainian defenders in the Pokrovsky direction. Here, during the day, the aggressor carried out 19 attacks in the areas of Promenya, Lysivka, Petrivka, Dachenskyi, Pustinka and Pushkini. The defense forces restrained the onslaught and repelled 16 enemy attacks, three clashes are ongoing. The enemy carried out airstrikes in the districts of Stara Mykolaivka and Oleksandropol. The situation is also tense in the Kurakhiv direction, where since the beginning of the day the invader has attacked our units 13 times. Tried to advance near Novoselydivka, Sontsivka, Berestki, Kurakhovoy, Dalnyi and Antonivka, carried out airstrikes on Romanivka and Hannivka, battles are currently ongoing in six locations, seven attacks have already been repulsed. In the Vremivsk direction, our troops repelled eight attacks in the Kostiantynopolsky, Trudovo, Rozdolny, and Novodarivka districts. Three skirmishes continue in the direction of Velika Novosilka, where the Russian invaders have also dropped three anti-aircraft missiles. On the Orihiv direction, Ukrainian defenders repelled an enemy assault in the direction of Novoandriivka. In the Dnieper direction there was one unsuccessful attack by the invaders. There were no significant changes in other areas of the front.

Title: A search operation was completed in Glukhiv: Russian drones killed 12 people
Description: The Ministry of Internal Affairs of Ukraine reported this According to the final information, 12 people died as a result of the attack on the dormitory, among them a boy who should have turned 8 the other day. 11 people were injured, including two children aged 13 and 14. Police officers recorded the consequences of the Russian attack. In the deployed mobile stations, work with victims continues to receive applications and provide psychological assistance. As reported by ArmyInform, late in the evening of November 18, the troops of the Russian Federation /->hit the dormitory in Gluhov by two -Shakheds-.

Title: Britain has announced an additional contribution to the Drone Coalition for Ukraine
Description: This is reported in messages of the British government. The funds are in addition to the £120 million announced by the British Prime Minister last month for the Ukrainian Navy and Maritime Forces, which will be used to fund unmanned surface ships and maritime reconnaissance drones. It is also reported that the Drone Coalition will receive an additional £16m from countries such as Germany (£10m), Canada (£3m) and Luxembourg (£3m) who have pledged purchase drones through the coalition. So, the total fund is 67 million pounds, including 15 million pounds from Great Britain. -This additional support provides another significant boost to strengthening the capabilities of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the face of Putin's illegal war of aggression. Over the past weekend, Russia launched more than 120 missiles and 90 drones at Ukrainian infrastructure facilities, which resulted in the deaths of civilians in eastern Ukraine,- the statement said.

Title: Everything for veterans: the President announced the -Policy of Heroes-
Description: This was stated by President Volodymyr Zelenskyi, who presented in the Verkhovna Rada Rady Internal Stability Plan. According to Volodymyr Zelenskyi, it is about systematic work with veterans and their involvement in public service. In addition, about the introduction of a complex of support programs for veterans and their families. -Preparatory work for the launch of the veteran's assistant program has been completed. Necessary regulatory acts have been adopted, budget funds have been allocated. Next year, it is planned to train and pay for the work of 11,000 veterans' support specialists,- the President assured. In addition, Volodymyr Zelenskyi said, every district of the country should have a space for veterans. At least 80 new veteran spaces will be built in communities in the next year. As reported by /a> ArmyInform, President Zelensky said that the main guarantor of the Stability Plan should be weapons — 30,000 long-range drones, 3,000 cruise missiles and a wave of technological innovations.

Title: They burned a bunch of -akhmats- in Kurshchyna - the paratroopers repelled the attack of the newest ...
Description: The video of the fight was released on November 19 on the brigade channel. Previously, -Akhmat- were not often used on the front line, their losses were single. -We continue to destroy the enemy on his territory. Once again, the 810th Marine Corps Brigade of the Russian Federation receives a beating from the Polish paratroopers,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the 95th Polish Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces showed two days of active assaults on the Russians, which did not bring those nothing good.

Title: The Council adopted the 2025 state budget with record expenditures on defense and arms procurement
Description: Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal reported this . -All taxes of citizens and businesses next year will be directed to the defense and security of our country. The total resource that will be directed to the security and defense sector will amount to UAH 2.23 trillion,- the head of government said. Record funds will be directed to the production and purchase of weapons — 739 billion hryvnias. Funding for the modernization of our defense-industrial complex, as well as for the purchase of drones, will also increase. Earlier it became known that 54.55 billion will go to the development of production, the development and implementation of new technologies, the increase of production capacities for the production of defense products. This is more than was allocated for 2024 — about 51 billion UAH. Another 500 million UAH was allocated for the program of affordable loans for defense enterprises. This program was created this year, and allows producers to take loans at 5% per annum. The remaining interest will be covered by the state budget.

Title: The Ground Forces reported how many military personnel were trained abroad
Description: This was reported by the Commander of the Ground Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, Lieutenant General Oleksandr Pavlyuk in an interview Ukrinform. -If we talk about the Ground Forces, almost 30,000 military personnel have been trained on the territory of the partner countries. About 20,000 of them are under the basic military training program,- Oleksandr Pavlyuk said. The commander also emphasized that, in general, the quality of training of the mobilized has already changed, it has increased significantly. From November 1, 2024, the duration of the BZVP course in educational centers and training centers has increased — 45 days instead of 30. -That is, it has increased by one and a half times. In addition, the program became not only longer, but also significantly changed in quality. This is the fourth revision of the course since the beginning of the large-scale invasion. Now there are more practices, more anti-drone training,- Oleksandr Pavlyuk explained. He added that since November 1, recruits have been actively studying countering UAVs, EW, equipment and masking positions. Among the new exercises is shooting down a UAV with a pump-action shotgun. -Recruits practice it on a simulated drone. That is, on a target attached to a real drone. Simulated drops from drones are made on recruits so that they get used to the realities of modern war and, what is very important, understand how to counter it,- said Oleksandr Pavlyuk. According to the updated program, more attention is paid to actions during direct contact with the enemy, approaching trenches and clearing them, throwing hand grenades in various conditions, shooting at short distances. As reported by ArmyInform, from the beginning of 2022, Ukrainian defenders received and mastered otrymanyh-zsu-z-2022-roku/->hundreds of new models of weapons and military techniques.
