These are at least eight modifications of tanks, 10 types of BMP, nine modifications of armored personnel carriers, more than 50 modifications of self-propelled and towed artillery and MLRS.

Title: The occupiers attacked Kharkiv, at least 9 were injured
Description: This was reported by the head of Kharkiv OVA Oleg Synegubov. Currently, it is known that five people are hospitalized, two civilian men are in serious condition. It was previously reported that during the past day in Kharkiv Oblast, again numerous shellings resulting in civilian casualties. As reported by ArmiyaInform, during the day Russian troops 15 times /->shelled populated areas of Donetsk region, three people were killed, seven more were wounded.

Title: A thousand days of resistance: the struggle for Gostomel, Zmiiny, Kharkiv... How it was: memories on...
Description: Gostomel airport was considered a strategic object even before the war. Capable of receiving cargo planes, located only 25 kilometers from Kyiv, it became a key point in an attempt to quickly capture the Ukrainian capital. The airport was guarded by a brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine, but most of its soldiers and equipment were in the east at the time of the invasion. And it seems that the enemy knew. What he did not count on was that even with small forces the National Guardsmen would take the fight. Trying to delay the landing of the Russian landing force as much as possible and prevent transporters with heavy equipment and main forces from landing at the airport. Armed essentially only with -needles- and small arms, the Ukrainian fighters held out for several hours, shot down several helicopters and disrupted the enemy's first plan. But the ammunition eventually ran out. I had to retreat from the airport. However, the National Guardsmen won the time during which the artillery from Bila Tserkva managed to pull up to the position. Which began to fire at the Russians, trying to disable their equipment, and most importantly, the landing strip. Or at least demonstrate that any attempt to land transporters still expected by the enemy on it will end fatally for the planes - they will come under direct fire. The Russians, who managed to report on the seizure of the airport, tried to expand the control zone, pushing the Ukrainians further, but they did not succeed. The defense forces counterattacked, and most importantly, they did not stop shelling in order to prevent the already damaged lane from being repaired. In the end, the invaders were forced to abandon the amphibious operation and wait for the arrival of their main forces by land. They captured Gostomel in a few days. However, they could not advance further. And on April 1, they left the city and the airport under threat of encirclement. Already on February 24, the Russian troops approached Kharkiv close, and on the 27th, one of their special forces groups with ten -Tigers- and several KAMAZ trucks broke into the city itself. When the breakthrough was stopped, they decided to seize the school closest to them at that moment - 134 school. But turn it into your stronghold, because it was located on higher ground. The Russians were blocked by the forces of the military, security forces and volunteers. But they did not dare to storm the building at first - in the first days, the usual experience was not enough. After some time, the invaders recovered and began to retaliate with sniper fire. It seems that reinforcements were also waiting. Wasting time was simply dangerous. So the brave men who volunteered to attack went to the school under the cover of fire from an armored personnel carrier. Later, the tank also pulled up - but it was able to fire only one shot. The melee was fierce. The Russians fought back desperately. However, the grenades they used to throw at the Ukrainian fighters soon ran out. They refused to surrender. However, in the end, two were captured. And these were the last invaders who set foot on the land of the city with weapons. The Russians were never able to break into Kharkiv again - in almost three years of war. Maybe that's why they continue to take revenge on him - destroying from a distance, Mariupol was threatened by the encirclement already a week after the full-scale invasion. The defenders turned the -Azovstal- plant into their citadel, in the bunkers of which both civilians and wounded soldiers were hiding. The sky above the city was controlled by enemy aircraft, the sea – fleet. The occupiers attacked the city with the heaviest bombs they had at hand - three-ton fabs. The Russians expected that the forces of the defenders would quickly be exhausted without support from the -big land-. But in the military intelligence of Ukraine, they decided on a desperate operation. Having information about the location of enemy units and their weapons, try to lay out a route for the helicopters. The risk was deadly - that's why only volunteer pilots were involved in the operation. Almost all weapons were removed from the sides. The cargo was more important - provisions, medicines, ammunition and means of communication for the defenders of Azovstal. They flew at maximum speed, but at a minimum height. They entered from the side of the sea, because of the smoke over the constantly shelled city, they simply could not break through. Defenders say that at first they did not even believe that it was theirs. Five minutes to unload, and how much will it cost to load the wounded. The engines were not silenced to take off at any moment. At first, the Russians did not even understand what had happened. But then the hunt for Ukrainian helicopters began. However, all 16 ships will deliver their cargo to Mariupol. Three helicopters were shot down on the way back, one was hit by a missile, but he made it with all the wounded on board. Thanks to the defenders of -Azovstal- and the helicopter crews that helped them, Ukraine won a month to equip the defense system. Mariupol shackled the enemy's forces and did not allow him to move immediately to the east - to Zaporozhye and the Dnipro. Okhtyrka is a border town. The enemy was near him already five hours after the start of the invasion. The sappers took the first blow. They had almost no anti-tank weapons, but they still organized a circular defense, set up positions on the roofs, ambushes, mine barriers… The advanced enemy group managed to break through to the city, but the Ukrainian fighters destroyed one of the tanks and a car with ammunition, which began to explode. The attackers were forced to retreat, abandoning their equipment. During this time, fighters from the Kholodny Yar brigade came to the aid of the defenders. It was they who repelled the second, tank attack. The battle lasted half a day - and the Russians withdrew again. with heavy losses. Convinced that they would not be able to take Okhtyrk from the move, the occupiers began mass bombardment of the city with -hurricanes-. The kindergarten, where civilians tried to hide, was not the first to suffer. The next day, thermobaric weapons were used for the first time. A direct hit to the location of the unit cost the Ukrainian military 70 lives. And then the systematic destruction of the city's infrastructure began. After the oil depot, they took on the CHP plant. When the -hurricanes- and rockets failed to cope with the task, bombs were dropped. 20 thousand citizens were left without heat. The next day, the water supply and sewage system were disabled. They deliberately tried to punish Okhtyr residents for their persistence - and the mayor is still confident. A doctor by profession, on the most critical days he himself performed operations - under enemy fire. The defenders, of course, answered the enemy with everything they could. The Russians soon realized that their planes could also be targeted and were already wary of bombing from low altitudes and during the day. Assault attempts did not stop. On March 16, the enemy even managed to enter the outskirts of the city, but at the cost of heavy losses. He was never able to break through the Ukrainian defense. And within a week he was forced to start withdrawing troops from Sumy Oblast. The strategic importance of the Snake Island is difficult to overestimate. The only island in the entire Black Sea at a great distance from the coast, it allows you to control the approaches to Odessa and the mouth of the Danube - and in fact all shipping between mainland Ukraine and neighboring countries - including Turkey. It is not surprising that the Russians were in a hurry to capture Zmeinyi as soon as possible. Already on the morning of February 24, 2022, it was blocked both from the sea and from the air. Communication with the border guards was lost. The enemy tried to intimidate the Ukrainian defenders, but they responded with an expression that became one of the symbols of this war. Annoyed by the response, the Russians subjected Zmiiny to a frenzied shelling, destroying all the buildings on the island. But the border guards continued to defend themselves, repelled two attacks, and only because of a lack of ammunition, the invaders managed to capture them. The defenders were freed on March 24 - during the first exchange of prisoners. The enemy tried to turn the island into his stronghold. But the Armed Forces did not allow it to be done. On April 14, two Neptune missiles hit the Moscow cruiser – the same one that was -sent- by the border guards and shelled the island. In two weeks, the Russian control post on Zmiiny itself was destroyed. Then they -thinned out- the personnel of the occupiers and sank the boats with which the enemy tried to maintain communication with the island. The tugboat carrying the TOR anti-aircraft complex also went to the bottom. The blows to the enemy became stronger and more regular. And the Russians understood that they were doomed. On June 30, they evacuated their soldiers from Zmiyny with two speedboats. And the remains of the equipment that they left on the island were destroyed by Ukrainian drones and ... Russian aircraft. On July 4, 2022, Zmiiny returned to the control of Ukraine. And the yellow-blue flag flew over him again. Before the large-scale invasion, it seemed that Bashtanka was located deep in the Ukrainian rear. And if the war comes to her, then not quickly. However, the locals did not sit idly by. Territorial defense and formation of volunteers were created. They even prepared -molotov cocktails- - it turned out that it was on time. Because already on March 1, the Russians were in nearby Yavkin. It was near him that peaceful residents came to the road. It seems that the invaders simply did not expect this. But they stopped in embarrassment. Not for long, of course. They listened to the people in silence for fifteen minutes - and after firing a machine gun over their heads, they moved on, past them. But even a short stop helped the defenders better prepare for the -meeting-. As soon as the first invaders entered the city, bottles with -cocktails- flew at them. The machines caught fire, the ammunition began to detonate almost immediately. The Russians were shocked, but continued to move. However, the deeper they broke through, the fiercer resistance they met. The forces of the defenders were not so large, but small groups were scattered throughout the city. Thus it was possible to create the appearance of a large garrison. When the Russians drove up and stopped, their column was cut up and began to be destroyed piece by piece. The end of the rout was put by a plane that appeared unexpectedly for the enemy and struck two devastating blows. The invaders finally realized that they had fallen into a trap and ran away to save their lives. Twenty-one Russians were captured. They -captured- more than four dozen units of enemy equipment, but most of it was burned during the battle. The second column of Russians was ambushed. And decided not to tempt fate and retreated. In the future, the Russians did not dare to attack Bashtanka -head on-. They dug in on distant slopes. And they tried to destroy the city with shelling. Or maybe they were just taking revenge for the defeat. Until the Ukrainian army went on the offensive and repelled the enemy as far as the Dnipro. And Bashtanka was not in the rear again. Control over the Black Sea is one of the strategic tasks of the Kremlin in this war. And at the beginning of the invasion, she was close to fulfilling this task. The initial balance of naval forces was also in favor of the Russians - the aggressor had more of them by an order of magnitude, and the quick destruction of the ships of the Ukrainian Navy. Even the disabling of the flagship of the fleet - the cruiser -Moscow- - did not seem like a critical loss. But everything changed already in the summer of 2022. It was then that Ukraine made a bet on the use of surface drones. And conducted their first tests - then it was about devices on hydrocycle platforms with high-explosive bombs. In September, they already tried to use them in a real battle. The operation failed due to communication problems. But the very fact of the attack forced the Russians to reduce the number of ships on the external raid and retreat to the port of Sevastopol. However, this was only the beginning. At the end of October, drones reached the Sevastopol Bay itself, damaging two ships and an oil filling station. The following spring, the attacks became regular, and in the summer, drones attacked the Kremlin dictator's favorite brainchild, the Kerch bridge. Within a month, Ukrainian drones caused noise on the approaches to Novorossiysk. The targets were ships capable of transporting military cargo to the occupied peninsula. In August 2023, a separate naval drone brigade was formed as part of the Ukrainian Navy - the first unit of this type in the world. A real hunt for Russian ships began - in most cases quite successful. Among the trophies were boats, and tugboats, and large landing ships. And the Russians... began to simply hide their fleet. The presence of ships in the open sea has decreased tenfold. Most of them were taken from the Crimea to the Caucasian coast. Moscow can still use its fleet to launch -calibres- over Ukraine, but the entire western part of the Black Sea is currently free. And this is a truly unique achievement – ​​no country in the world has yet managed to defeat the enemy fleet with the help of unmanned remotely controlled vessels. The Russian occupation of part of the Kharkiv region in 2022 ended with the Ukrainian offensive. The occupiers fled from the territories they occupied. One of the last they left was the city of Vovchansk, which is located very close to the Russian border. In May 2024, the enemy returned. Vovchansk again became one of the directions of his attack. The direction to Lipka became different. The calculation was obvious – while the Ukrainian defenders, dripping with blood, hold back the onslaught of the main Russian forces in Donbas, hit their flank and try to break through to Kharkiv again. Or at least get closer to the city at a distance that would allow it to be shelled at close range with artillery. The situation was really difficult. Ukrainian units were still waiting for reinforcements from the new mobilization, defensive structures in the border strip were not built. However, within a few days, having encountered resistance, the enemy's offensive stalled, and by the end of the month it was stopped. In Vovchansk, the Russians were never able to cross the Vovcha River. There was no question of an attack on Kharkiv - and the Kremlin leader even stated that this was not in the plans. However, the tactics of the Russians remained unchanged, not being able to completely capture the city, they destroyed Vovchansk with shelling. The bombing of Kharkiv also intensified. Ukraine's partners could not help but react to the aggressor's next war crimes - they lifted the restrictions on the use of their weapons against military targets in the border regions of Russia - from where, in fact, Ukrainian cities are shelled. Attempts of enemy breakthroughs in the north of Kharkiv region continue to this day. However, Ukrainian fighters managed to recapture some settlements from the invaders, and Russian soldiers blocked at the aggregate plant were eventually taken prisoner. Since the first days of the full-scale invasion, Russia has constantly bombarded Ukraine with missiles and attacked with drones - there is not a single area to which it does not -fly- from time to time. Instead, the possibilities of retaliatory strikes were limited - if only because the Defense Forces were inferior to the enemy from the beginning in terms of the number of long-range weapons and the -range-. Partners could help, but it took a long time to coordinate and deliver already agreed packages. In addition, in many cases, weapons were transferred with the condition not to strike deep into Russian territory. Without denying Ukraine's right to active defense, the allies made it clear more than once that there would be no restrictions on the use of their own, Ukrainian means of destruction, and domestic manufacturers accepted the challenge. The bet was made primarily on drones - they are cheaper, but often even more effective than missiles. The first strikes on objects deep in Russia were already carried out in 2022. The target was primarily the airfields on which the planes that launched the missiles over Ukraine were based. In the following year, the appearance of drones in one or another Russian city ceased to be perceived as a surprise or coincidence. In May, a drone exploded just above the Kremlin, causing a real commotion in the Russian capital. Since the beginning of 2024, strikes on Russian territory have become systematic. Russian oil refineries and related infrastructure were the first to feel it. Since March, they have been joined by enterprises of the Russian military industry - manufacturers of jet engines for aircraft, assemblers of drones, etc. The range of attacks also increased constantly - Ukrainian drones flew to the Volga region, the Urals and the Russian North. However, the most daring were the attacks on enemy arsenals, the loudest of which was the destruction of warehouses in Toropka, near Tver. And in the summer of 2024, for the first time, the number of Ukrainian drones launched on Russian territory exceeded the number of Russian drones that struck Ukraine. And this is certainly a success. What to be proud of. The operation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Kursk region is called the most unexpected and perhaps the loudest event of the war in 2024. Until now, the defense forces conducted combat operations only on their territory. Raids on Russian territory were carried out only by fighters of foreign volunteer formations that support the struggle of Ukraine, and they usually lasted only a few days. Now the war has come to the land of the enemy for a long time. The success of the operation was ensured, in particular, by careful preparation and the fact that it was managed to be kept a secret until the last. The large-scale movement of troops was disguised as military exercises - the enemy was sure that the Armed Forces of Ukraine were preparing to repel their own offensive in Sumy Oblast. Only a narrow circle of those involved knew that it was an offensive on Russian territory: the officers were informed three days before the start of the operation, and the private soldiers - a day before the offensive. The offensive began on August 6, 2024 - and Ukrainian troops managed not only to crush the Russian forces near the border, but also to go deep into Russian territory. Initially, the enemy did not even understand what was happening, and I try to diminish the successes of the Armed Forces, even more disoriented with its soldiers. Many of which quickly realized that they had thrown and hurried to surrender. Without deciding to talk about the war in its territory, Moscow continued to pretend to be a small raid. Instead, Ukrainian fighters managed to take control of thousands of square kilometers in hostile territory in a week and to become entrenched in Sudzh and surrounding settlements. In fact, a buffer zone was created, which should not allow the enemy to fire the Ukrainian territory close. Equally important are the tasks of the operation - to cause maximum damage to the enemy, the intersection of his forces and the destruction of logistics. The transfer of hostilities to the Russian territory had a significant psychological effect. First of all, because she demonstrated the possibilities of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The partners, for whom the offensive also became unexpected, supported the right of Ukraine to active self -defense. It took the enemy to take a long time to get together with the forces, then to start attempting to counter -offensive in Kurkh. But most of these attempts were not successful. The situation on the collision line remains difficult, but the armed forces continue to fulfill their tasks. Listen more during the day to Army FM .

Title: Rustem Umyerov: The power of Ukrainian developments has already been felt by the enemy's military ai...
Description: This stated the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. -3,925 days of Russian aggression against Ukraine, which began with the temporary occupation of Crimea. 1000 days of full scale invasion. Our answer to the occupiers is the language of strength. It is the only language the dictator understands. And this force is, in particular, our Ukrainian long-range drones,- the minister said. He recalled that a year and a half ago, the President set the task of creating and scaling modern means of long-range destruction. -Today, the capabilities of our DeepStrike have become obvious to the whole world. The force of Ukrainian developments has already been felt by the enemy's military airfields, bases, and fuel depots hundreds and thousands of kilometers deep into Russia. We do not stop at what we have achieved,- Rustem Umyerov said. The minister took part in a meeting with manufacturers of long-range weapons. They discussed prospects, plans, conclusion of long-term contracts and approaches to strengthening the efficiency of the entire industry. -Our goal is to create means capable of hitting targets at the maximum possible distance with maximum accuracy. DeepStrike is a contribution to our victory. Thank you to everyone who works daily to strengthen the defense potential of Ukraine. We remain in touch with each manufacturer in order to promptly resolve issues and bring our victory closer together,- said Rustem Umyerov. As reported by ArmyInform, the main guarantor of Ukraine's stability should become a weapon — 30,000 long-range drones, 3,000 cruise missiles and a wave of technological innovations.

Title: Three tanks and three armored vehicles — the royal pilots thinned out enemy equipment
Description: The video of the injuries was released on November 19 on the battalion channel. Our drones hit enemy T-90M, T-80, T-72, BMD-4, BMP-1 and MT-LB. -Let's keep fighting!- — commented on the video in the battalion and invited them to support the collection that the unit is holding on its page. As reported by ArmyInform, the operators of the battalion of unmanned aerial systems -Rarog- of the 24th mechanized brigade named after King Danylo spectacularly impressed in the Time Yar storm troop a group of Russian paratroopers.

Title: -Neptunes-, drones and innovations - the head of state defined what guarantees the country's stabili...
Description: This was announced by President Zelensky, who presented in the Verkhovna Rada Internal stability plan. According to President Volodymyr Zelenskyi, the country is developing military production as much as possible. So, more than 2.5 million mortar rounds and artillery shells were fired this year. The next goal is 30,000 long-range drones and 3,000 missiles. In addition, according to the President, it is necessary to be ahead of Russia in technologies. -For this reason, the format of the Technological Stavka is being implemented in Ukraine. In this format, on a regular basis, we will collect the best specialists and the most useful technological ideas. The first meeting of our Stavka will take place at the beginning of December,- said the President. According to the head of state, it is the strong defense and industrial complex of Ukraine that is able to ensure our state's independence in choosing a military strategy. Even without nuclear weapons, Ukraine can find conventional means of deterring the Russian Federation. As ArmyInform reported, Volodymyr Zelenskyi said on the need to appoint a military ombudsman.

Title: Volodymyr Zelenskyy stated the need to appoint a military ombudsman
Description: The President of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelenskyi, said this while presenting the Internal Stability Plan of Ukraine in the Verkhovna Rada. -A person who will enjoy, first of all, the trust of the military and the entire society. I expect this in the near future,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. He emphasized that within the Defense Forces there should be confidential opportunities for soldiers to resolve issues arising from violations of their rights. -Changing approaches to people management in the Armed Forces, in the National Guard of Ukraine, as well as spreading the best management practices in units. Each commander now answers the same question - -What is needed first of all?-. It's the personnel, it's people, the composition of teams, effective real training,- said the President. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also emphasized that it is necessary to talk about difficult things in our army, because effective solutions are possible only if there is an honest conversation about mobilization, reservation, and the system of military personnel. -Problems should be solved, not silenced. The reasons are to be found out and removed,- he said.

Title: They are dumping in Lviv, and they are brazen in the Kyiv region - the General Prosecutor's Office r...
Description: This was announced on November 19 by the Office of the Prosecutor General of Ukraine. Criminal schemes related to the illegal acquisition of disabilities allowed conscripts to avoid mobilization and illegally travel abroad. In Lviv, four doctors of one of the inter-district medical and social expert commissions were informed of the suspicion. They falsified medical documentation, on the basis of which men of military age were unjustly given disability. In this way, at least five people left the country. The cost of -services- was from $1,300. In the Kyiv region, two doctors of a district hospital were exposed, who for $12,000 offered a man to organize influence on MSEK members to obtain a disability group. The doctors started a fictitious treatment of the patient, but were exposed while receiving a part of the bribe in the amount of 3 thousand euros. A criminal group of seven people was exposed in Odesa, which included the head of the trauma department, a neuropathologist, an official of the regional center of MSEK and four civilians. Doctors produced fake medical documents that allowed them to evade military service, and an employee of MSEK ensured positive decisions of the commission. The remuneration for such -services- ranged from $4,500 to $6,000. During the searches, a significant amount of material evidence, including forged documents, accounting journals and other materials confirming illegal activity, and cash was seized from the suspects. All participants of the schemes were notified of the suspicion. Depending on the crimes committed, they are charged with abusing influence, obstructing the legal activities of the Armed Forces, assisting in the illegal transportation of persons across the border, and issuing a knowingly false official document (Article 2, Part 2, Article 369-2, Part 1, Article 114- 1, part 3 of article 332, part 1 of article 366 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). The question of choosing preventive measures for them is being resolved. Investigative actions are ongoing, the circle of involved persons is being established. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: -We will win, there is simply no other way out-: military journalists asked Odessans about 1000 days...
Description: -I'm from Donetsk, so I ran here, to Odessa. Then I had to run to Romania and build a new life there, I had to move my relatives there. I have a father, he is already retired. I was in Bakhmut, during the period when it was completely bombed,- said Alina, a resident of Donetsk. Adapting to new realities was probably the most difficult, shared Alina from Odessa. It remains the most difficult even now. -Of course, I would like the situation in the country to stabilize and the war to end as soon as possible. As it was before the beginning, it was not at all full-scale, as it was before the beginning of the war in 2014,- said Alina. Meanwhile, Odessans are in pain and it is difficult. -It is very painful that they are dying, they are bombing us to this day. We very much believe that it will all stop soon,- Anastasia noted in her turn. True, not everyone is optimistic. As for the end of the war, Kateryna from Odesa says that -not surrender- would be a good option for war. -To be honest, I don't think it will be more than 5 years from now. I think it will take a lot of time,- Kateryna said. In general, the people of Odessa state, the final can only be one - we will win. One way or another. After all, there is simply no other way out. How reported ArmyInform, President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy shared a video dedicated to 1000 days of heroic struggle of Ukrainians against aggression and for the freedom of his state.

Title: The President instructed to present a new system of contracts for service in the Armed Forces
Description: The President of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelenskyy, said this while presenting the Internal Stability Plan of Ukraine in the Verkhovna Rada. According to him, these contracts will have a tangible, very specific motivational component. -And there is no need for any speculation: our state is not preparing to lower the mobilization age. On the basis of new contractual approaches, we should gradually move to the formation of the army to a greater extent thanks to contracts, and not only mobilization,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy said. As reported by ArmyInform, currently 44 recruiting centers operate in the regions and 3 operating centers in the vertical of the General Staff of the Armed Forces. Tens of thousands of people have already applied to recruiting centers. The number of volunteers in the total number of those who join the army every month is 20-30 percent. The new procedure for recruiting started working on October 1 citizens of Ukraine in electronic form. According to the new rules, the military unit selected by the candidate must clarify his intentions regarding the conclusion of the contract. This happens through the use of a recruiting platform and includes an interview.

Title: This man does not change for a trifle: a dealer who transported evaders in groups was detained at th...
Description: About this informs State Border Service of Ukraine. The criminal was caught red-handed when he was transporting -evaders- in his vehicle to the border, having previously agreed with them on the details of the illegal operation. During the pre-trial investigation, it became known that the shipper is a resident of the Sarnen region. He had previously been convicted of property crimes and committed a new crime while on probation. The 21-year-old criminal was informed of the suspicion of illegal transportation of persons across the state border of Ukraine. The court chose a preventive measure in the form of detention with the possibility of bail. Law enforcement measures were carried out under the procedural guidance of the Sarnen District Prosecutor's Office, together with the National Police of the Rivne Region and the regional SBU Department. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Tense situation in Donetsk region: Russian troops shelled 15 settlements
Description: reported this by the head of the Donetsk regional military administration, Vadym Filashkin. Pokrovsky district: In Kurakhovo, one person was injured as a result of shelling, and 5 houses were damaged in the village of Dachne. There is also an injured person in Myrnograd, and a house was damaged in the city. Kramatorsky district: 4 houses were damaged in Ozernoy of the Lyman community, 4 objects were damaged in Zor of the Illiniv community. In Kostyantynivka, 2 people died and another 5 were injured, 9 private houses, 2 high-rise buildings, a shop, an industrial building, a gas pipeline and 6 vehicles were also damaged. Bakhmut district: In Siversk, one person died as a result of shelling, 6 private houses and 2 high-rise buildings were damaged. In the Chasovoyarsk community, 10 private houses, a high-rise building and 2 non-residential buildings were damaged. The situation in the east of Ukraine remains extremely tense, but despite all the difficulties, Ukrainian forces continue to ensure the safety of the civilian population and carry out the task of protecting the region. As reported by ArmyInform, during the past day in Kharkiv Oblast, numerous shellings resulting in civilian casualties.

Title: A servicewoman of the Ukrainian Armed Forces spoke at an international conference and met with the p...
Description: This was reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In her speech, Oksana Rubanyak emphasized the needs of Ukraine and its Armed Forces, and also talked about the heroism of the Ukrainian military in the fight for freedom and independence. The commander of the platoon of unmanned aerial systems of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, known by the nickname -Xena-, gave a speech in the Church of St. Anne in Prague, where she also had the opportunity to meet with the President of the Czech Republic, Peter Pavel.

Title: -The general state of the enemy - they are going crazy-: near Pokrovsk, the Russian infantry are dri...
Description: Serhiy Tsekhotskyi, officer 59, told about this on the air of -Social News-. of the separate motorized infantry brigade named after Yakov Handziuk. According to Serhii Tsehotskyi, during the assaults, the enemy infantry is supported by aircraft. The occupiers are advancing on motorcycles, buggies and cars. Attempts to attack tanks were also recorded. -If you characterize the general mood of the enemy, then they are psychotic. This must be understood. They are pushed very hard by their management in order to achieve certain successes,- Serhiy Tsehotskyi said. As ArmyInform reported, on In the Pokrovsky direction, our soldiers destroyed the Russian automated complex of radio-electronic suppression -Borysoglebsk-2-.

Title: The commander of the Ground Forces spoke about hundreds of samples of weapons received by the Armed ...
Description: The commander of the Ground Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, Lieutenant General Oleksandr Pavlyuk, said this in an interview Ukrinform. -These are at least eight modifications of tanks, 10 types of BMP, nine modifications of armored personnel carriers, more than 50 modifications of self-propelled and towed artillery and MLRS, 16 modifications of anti-aircraft missile systems, more than 75 modifications of close combat equipment. In addition, we have more than 11 modifications of armored vans,- – Oleksandr Pavlyuk said. He gave examples of the most famous names of military equipment in the Defense Forces: Abrams, Challenger 2, Leopard-1 and Leopard-2 tanks of various modifications, PT-91; BMP Bradley and Spartan, Marder, CV-90; APC M1117, Stryker, VAB, etc.; HIMARS MLRS, M270; many modifications of barrel self-propelled and towed artillery - PZH2000, ARCHER, AS-90, KRAB, CAESAR, M109, of course M777 and many others. Oleksandr Pavlyuk added that more than 20 modifications of surveillance and reconnaissance devices, 25 modifications of unmanned aircraft complexes have also been mastered. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense codified and allowed for operation in units of the Defense Forces all-wheel drive -broneavtomobil-zubr/->armored off-road vehicle -Zubr- and remotely controlled module -Pernach- of domestic production.

Title: Fires, casualties and destruction: Kharkiv region was covered with enemy fire
Description: This was reported by Oleg Synegubov, the head of Kharkiv OVA. In the Kharkiv district, a 52-year-old man and a 59-year-old woman were injured as a result of shelling. According to the head of the OVA, a house was on fire in the Chuguyiv district as a result of shelling. Also, in the city of Kupyansk, a car was damaged as a result of a drop from a UAV. During the day, 76 people were evacuated from Kupyanskyi and Borivskyi directions. As reported by ArmyInform, the occupiers aimed at a utility company in Dnipropetrovsk Oblast.

Title: -1000 days we break the plans of the Russian half-empire-: Oleksandr Pavlyuk on the resistance of th...
Description: This was reported the commander of the Ground Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, Lieutenant General Oleksandr Pavlyuk. During these 1,000 days of war, Ukraine was able not only to endure, but also to win important victories. In general, Russians were expelled from Kyiv region, Chernihiv region, Sumy region, and Kharkiv region was also liberated. The enemy retreated from the right bank of the Dnieper, and Ukrainian troops are gradually approaching Russian territory, returning the land that was encroached upon by the aggression. -The precious plans of the Russian half-empire are broken by courageous, heroic men and women in Ukrainian unity,- Oleksandr Pavlyuk noted, emphasizing the importance of every day of struggle. He also noted that these 1000 days have become the most difficult for Ukrainians in history, because the enemy retains significant offensive potential. However, according to the commander, the Ukrainian army has never been so strong and ready to fight. -Despite fatigue, loss and pain, we will defend our right to life and freedom,- Oleksandr Pavlyuk emphasized. He thanked the Ukrainian soldiers for their dedication and courage, which allow the country to rebuild a new history. -Let's keep in line! Glory to the Ukrainian soldiers! Glory to Ukraine!- - the commander of the Ground Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces concluded his address.

Title: Digital transformation of defense: the Armed Forces are testing the latest IT solutions
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. During a joint briefing with the Minister of Defense Rustem Umerov and the Deputy Minister of Defense Kateryna Chernogorenko, dedicated to the results of digitalization in 2024, Anatolii Bargylevych stated that our goal is the continuous development and implementation of effective IT solutions for the needs of the state's defense. -This year, the Armed Forces together with the Ministry of Defense are already testing a number of IT products that will allow them to perform combat tasks more efficiently and, most importantly, save the lives of Ukrainian soldiers,- he added. Anatoliy Bargylevych emphasized that the speed of introduction of new technologies is a key success factor in modern wars. According to him, automated control systems are aimed at increasing situational awareness, promptness of decision-making, planning of operations and management of troops and weapons in real time. About 16 projects related to combat information systems are currently in operation and actively developing. Among them are the automated control systems -AS Tsok-, -VIRAZH-tablet-, -Kropyva-D- and others. All these solutions have proven their effectiveness in practice. In addition, new information and communication systems, software and hardware complexes and specialized software solutions are being actively implemented. They make it possible to significantly reduce bureaucratic processes and automate administrative work in the troops. In particular, we are talking about systems for automating personnel accounting, training, as well as a medical information system. Lieutenant General Anatolii Barhylevych concluded that digitization of the defense sector is not only a modern trend, but also an urgent need that determines the future victory of Ukraine on the battlefield. Army+ @armyplus.app As reported by ArmyInform, thanks to the DELTA combat system The Defense Forces of Ukraine destroyed enemy equipment worth more than 15 billion dollars .

Title: The Ministry of Defense prevented the loss of a plot of land worth more than UAH 32 million to the D...
Description: About this reported to the MOU. There were no legal documents for the land plot, at the same time arbitrary construction was carried out. This violation was discovered by the Internal Audit Service of the Ministry of Defense during the inspection of the activities of housing and operational units and a separate military unit. In general, more than UAH 80 million of violations, deficiencies, and risks in resource management were identified. -Timely identification and research of the risk will make it possible to draw up the necessary documentation and ensure the use of defense lands to meet the urgent needs of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Internal audit is a systematic and coordinated work, one of the key tasks of which is the prevention of illegal, inefficient and ineffective use of budget funds and other assets,- said the director of the Department of Internal Audit of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, Colonel Oleksandr Tytkovskyi. In addition, according to the results of the inspection, compensation was provided, violations and deficiencies were eliminated for a total amount of more than UAH 30 million.

Title: The occupiers targeted a utility company in the Dnipropetrovsk region
Description: reported this by the head of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional Military Administration Serhiy Lysak. Nikopol, as well as Marganetska, Mirivska and Pokrovska communities came under fire. As a result of the attacks, a utility company, a non-residential building and a private house were damaged. Yesterday evening, the occupiers hit Nikopolshchyna with kamikaze drones two more times, directing them to Myrivska and Marganetska communities. Fortunately, there are no victims or victims among the civilian population. The night passed peacefully in all regions of the region, without enemy shelling. As reported by ArmyInform, over the course of the day, the occupiers inflicted 458 strikes on 11 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: -1000 days together. 1000 days of Ukraine-: the President showed footage of Ukrainian resistance to ...
Description: He wrote about this in his Telegram channel. In the caption to the video, the head of state noted: -1000 days together. 1000 days of Ukraine-. The short but emotional video shows the key points of resistance of the Ukrainian people, the strength of spirit and unity, which became the basis for facing the challenges. The video contains footage of ordinary citizens, military personnel, volunteers and government leaders working together to bring victory closer. These 1000 days became a symbol of indomitability, self-sacrifice and faith in a better future for Ukraine. These shots should remind the whole world that Ukraine continues to fight for its rights and sovereignty.

Title: Natural selection in the Luhansk region: only the heat-resistant will survive
Description: the head of the Luhansk OVA, Artem Lysogor, told about it. At the same time, those who do not issue a Russian passport by the beginning of 2025 will be significantly limited in their access to social, medical and administrative services. This is another stage of forced passporting of the local population. The occupiers also acknowledged the disruption of the heating season in Siverskodonetsk, Lysychansk, Hirsky and Zoloty. In these cities, people remain without heat and centralized water supply. The lack of repair of damaged infrastructure systems since the time of active hostilities leads to an aggravation of the humanitarian crisis. Local residents found themselves on the edge of survival, relying only on their own strength. Broken water and heat supply systems make winter especially difficult for people. As reported by ArmyInform, occupants continue to delay capital repairs in the so-called -lnr-, leaving the local population without the necessary communal services.

Title: Consequences of shelling in the Kherson region: numerous damages to residential areas and victims
Description: This was notified by the head of Kherson OVA Oleksandr Prokudin. Kherson, Antonivka, Sadove, Komyshany, Bilozerka, Kizomys, Shiroka Balka, Mykilske, Ingulets, Tokarivka, Berislav, Novovorontsovka, Kachkarivka, Trifonivka and other settlements came under fire. In addition, the enemy once again attacked Zelenivka. He targeted residential areas. As a result of the shelling, a fire broke out, during the extinguishing of which one of the rescuers was injured. In total, 31 private houses, farm buildings, a garage, a moped and private cars were damaged as a result of the attacks. As a result of Russian aggression, two people died and two more were injured. According to information of the Kherson OVA, the Russian army covered Belozerka with fire at night. The enemy fired more than a dozen shells at the village. Due to the -arrivals-, eleven residential buildings were mutilated - windows were broken, walls and roofs were gutted. In addition, private cars, farm buildings and critical infrastructure were also damaged. There was no information about victims among local residents. As reported by ArmyInform, over the course of the day, the occupiers inflicted 458 strikes on 11 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: Appeal of the Armed Forces of Ukraine: - For a thousand days we fight with the aggressor who wants u...
Description: For a thousand days, we fight with an aggressor who wants us to simply be gone. For a thousand days we defend our European home. We fight for our families, our friends, our colleagues, our neighbors. For Kyiv and Kharkiv, Lviv and Odessa, Mariupol and Chernihiv, Simferopol and Luhansk, Donetsk and Zaporizhia. The main thing is that we are fighting for the future of our children. The Ukrainian army will never betray your faith. Because this is our people's army - everyone has friends or relatives serving in the army. We have one pain for the whole country, one heart and one soul. Each of our victories and defeats is shared. Every joy and anxiousness is for everyone. Everyone reading this should know: The Defense Forces of Ukraine are stronger than ever and united to destroy the occupiers. A thousand days of our resilience proved it once again. We won the battles for Kyiv, Chernihiv, Sumy, Mykolaiv and Odessa. We conducted a brilliant counteroffensive in Kharkiv region and an equally successful counteroffensive in Kherson region. In the end, the Armed Forces of Ukraine returned the war to Russian territory. Made the impossible possible - something no one believed possible. Brothers and sisters, today each of us must say: -I am here, I continue the battle and support the army, in spite of everything I go forward and seek victory.- The Russian-Ukrainian war is not a sprint, it is a marathon. We've made it through the first thousand days of a large-scale invasion. Many superhuman trials are behind us. However, the one who lasts a day longer than the enemy will win. Therefore, it is time to act together again. Just like a thousand days ago. Just like ten years ago, when the Russian-Ukrainian war began. Support the Defense Forces of Ukraine, where your loved ones, friends, colleagues are already serving. Support the army in any way you can. Do everything in your power - whether you are in Ukraine or abroad - so that we can walk this path together. The foundation of our victory is unity in the struggle. We will surely avenge every fallen hero, every dead child, every destroyed house. Together, we are realizing a historic chance to bury the Russian threat for decades. Together, we will provide our families with the long-awaited peace. Together we will overcome any difficulties and realize the dream of generations about the freedom and independence of our Nenka. With faith in victory, Armed Forces of Ukraine

Title: -Resident- and two other important enemy objects were destroyed by our aircraft
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. However, our soldiers continue to actively inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying forces, exhausting the enemy along the entire line of battle. Yesterday, aviation and missile forces and artillery of the Defense Forces carried out nine strikes on the areas of concentration of personnel and anti-aircraft defenses of the enemy. Also, our soldiers hit the UAV control post, an artillery system, two warehouses of material and technical equipment, the Zhytel EW station and two other important enemy facilities. We will remind, last day of loss Russian invaders numbered 1,610 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 17 tanks, 33 armored combat vehicles, 46 artillery systems, 38 operational-tactical UAVs, one cruise missile, 120 vehicles and 17 units of enemy special equipment. As reported by ArmyInform, more than 140 assaults per day: the enemy maintains the greatest activity in two directions.

Title: He invented some breakthroughs for himself: what the Russian commanders are lying about
Description: This is reported by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The commander of the 67th Motorized Rifle Division of the Russian Federation recently provided Major General Yusupov, the commander of the 25th Army of the Moscow Military District, with false information about the events on the battle line in the Lyman area, Donetsk region. In particular, in his report, the Russian commander announced the alleged fighting in the vicinity of Yampolivka and the breakthrough of occupiers to Torsky. However, this information is not true. Probably, in this way, the commander tried to hide significant losses from the strikes of the Security and Defense Forces of Ukraine. Distorted or false reports on the state of affairs at the front are common practice at all levels of command of the Russian occupation forces. This once again emphasizes systemic incompetence and disorganization in the ranks of the Russian army. As reported by ArmyInform, prostitutes, apartments and not only: what Ukrainian activists found on a hacked computer the commander of the Russian forces in the Zaporozhye direction.

Title: In Glukhiv, the number of dead as a result of the Russian strike has increased, people are being sea...
Description: This was reported in the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. Among the dead is a child. Previously, 11 people were injured, including two children. The dormitory building was partially destroyed, 5 people are probably under the rubble. Rescuers continue rescue operations. As reported by ArmyInform, late in the evening of November 18, the troops of the Russian Federation /->hit the dormitory in Glukhov with two -Shakheds-.

Title: 139 occupiers killed during the landing: the Defense Forces spoke about the losses of Russians in th...
Description: About this on the air -Social.News- Captain Yury Fedorenko, commander of the battalion of unmanned attack aircraft complexes -Achilles- of the 92nd OMBr named after the basket chieftain Ivan Sirk, said. -I want to explain what disproportionate losses are to the tactical results obtained on the battlefield. In one landing no more than 200 m long, we managed to count 139 occupiers who were destroyed by the Defense Forces. These are the ones that are visible, that are not covered with earth and other junk,- said Yuriy Fedorenko. He noted that it is currently impossible to predict how long the enemy will be able to maintain such a high intensity of hostilities and use their cheapest resource - people. -But the ability of the enemy directly depends on the countermeasures of the Defense Forces at various levels,- he emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy in Kupyan region tries to implement a task that it failed to complete by a predetermined deadline.

Title: Air Force of the Ukrainian Armed Forces: shot down 51 attack UAVs at night
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As of 09:00, the downing of 51 enemy UAVs in Cherkasy, Chernihiv, Kyiv, Poltava, Zhytomyr, Sumy, Mykolaiv, Zaporizhia and Kharkiv regions was confirmed. As a result of active countermeasures, 30 enemy UAVs were lost in various regions. One UAV in the airspace of Ukraine. The air attack was repulsed by aviation, anti-aircraft missile forces, electronic warfare units, mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 18, the enemy attacked one of the dormitories in Glukhiv, Sumy Oblast, directing two Shahed-type attack UAVs at the civilians. six people died.

Title: Defense forces of Ukraine hit the enemy arsenal in Bryansk region
Description: This is stated in the message of the General Staff of the Armed Forces. As of 02:30 that night, 12 secondary explosions and detonations were recorded in the area of ​​the target. The destruction of warehouses with ammunition for the army of the Russian occupiers in order to stop the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine will continue. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 12, the Defense Forces inflicted fire damage at the composition of fuel and lubricating materials “Oskolneftesnab”, near the city of Stary Oskol, Belgorod region of the Russian Federation. Damage to such objects creates serious logistical problems for the army of the Russian invaders and significantly reduces their offensive potential.

Title: Defense forces hit an arsenal with ammunition in Bryansk region
Description: This is stated in the message of the General Staff of the Armed Forces. As of 02:30 that night, 12 secondary explosions and detonations were recorded in the area of ​​the target. The destruction of warehouses with ammunition for the army of the Russian occupiers in order to stop the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine will continue. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 12, the Defense Forces caused fire damage to the composition of fuel and lubricant materials “Oskolneftesnab”, which is near the city of Stary Oskol, Belgorod region of the Russian Federation. Damage to such objects creates serious logistical problems for the army of the Russian invaders and significantly reduces their offensive potential.

Title: 1,369 aerial alarms in Kyiv: OVA reported how many drones and missiles were launched over the capita...
Description: The head of the Kyiv City Military Administration Serhiy Popko summed up this difficult period. Russian troops released more than 2,500 units of modern weapons on Kyiv, including: Despite these terrible numbers, thanks to the efforts of the Air Defense Forces and mobile fire groups, most of the attacks were repelled. -In the 21st century, the capital of a European state withstood thousands of missiles and drones. Imagine what would happen if they all achieved their goals?- - emphasized Popko. The head of the KMVA urged not to forget about the heroes who defend the country, to support the military and to help them in every possible way. -With your support and a strong rear, we are approaching peace and our victory. Glory to the Armed Forces! Glory to Ukraine!- he concluded.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: The enemy did not complete the assigned tasks in the Kupyan region, blocked by the Defense Forces
Description: About this on the air “Social.News” said the commander of the battalion of attack unmanned aircraft complexes -Achilles- of the 92nd OMBr named after the basket chieftain Ivan Sirk, captain Yury Fedorenko. -By November 1, they were supposed to enter Kupyansk-Vuzlovy and the left-bank buildings of Kupyansk with the aim of occupying the bridgehead and further preparatory work on the possibility of directing the crossing and forcing the Oskil River and exiting to the right bank,- said Yuriy Fedorenko. According to him, at the moment all that the enemy has been able to do is to partially enter the settlement of Kruglyakivka, where at the moment the enemy has no permanent positions. -There are only temporary shelters, where they try to attract new forces. At the same time, the Defense Forces of Ukraine timely detect these reserves and destroy the enemy,- explained the battalion commander. The Russians are also trying to move up the course of the Oskil River in the direction of the settlement of Kolesnikivka. -The enemy had partial success, but was blocked by the Defense Forces and has not had any success in the last week, work is underway to destroy the enemy,- Yuriy Fedorenko said. He added that new deadlines were set for the enemy - to reach Kupyansk-Vuzlovy and Left Bank Kupyansk by the beginning of the new year. -But with the systematic work of the Defense Forces, with the proper support of our partners, we will be able to thwart these plans of the enemy,- he emphasized. As ArmiyaInform reported, in Kharkiv Oblast, servicemen of the army of the Russian Federation often resort to insidious tactics of dressing in the military uniform of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. However, the Defense Forces have already worked out effective algorithms for distinguishing -one's own from another's-.

Title: The president reacted to the Russian attack on Glukhov: there may be people under the rubble
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. At the moment, seven people are known to have died, including one child. More than ten people were injured, including two children. Rescuers continue to work at the scene of the tragedy, as people may remain under the rubble. -We are doing everything possible to save everyone,- emphasized Volodymyr Zelensky, expressing his condolences to the families of the victims. The President also appealed to the international community, calling for decisive action in support of Ukraine. -Each new strike by Russia confirms Putin's true intentions to continue the war. We must force Russia to a just peace by force,- the President noted. As reported by ArmyInform, Sumshchyna is under attack: -Shaheds- destroyed a dormitory, there are victims among children.

Title: The Armed Forces told how the Russian troops changed their tactics in Kurshchyna
Description: Oleksiy Dmytrashkivskyi, the spokesman of the commandant's office in the city of Suja, told about this on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyni- . -The enemy is constantly attacking, maneuvering, and his tactics have changed somewhat. He does not start work early in the morning, as it was, but starts at night. Columns advance at night and try to wedge themselves into the defense of the Armed Forces,- said Oleksiy Dmytrashkivskyi. The spokesman emphasized that the enemy constantly attacks not only our units, but also constantly attacks the civilian population. According to him, at least four villages have been completely destroyed today: Sverdlikovo, where people were evacuated from, Lebedivka, Darino, Leonidovo. In addition, the enemy attacks the city of Suja every day. As reported by ArmyInform, due to the weather conditions in Kurshchyna, the use of enemy FPV drones and reconnaissance drones is limited, but attempts to storm occupiers will not leave.

Title: More than 140 assaults per day: the enemy maintains the greatest activity in two directions
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. In addition, he carried out more than 4,900 attacks, of which 152 were from reactive salvo fire systems. The aggressor carried out airstrikes in the areas of populated areas, in particular, Staritsa, Kozacha Lopan, Okhrimivka, Zakitne, Ozerne, Mykolaivka, Semenivka, Maiske, Chasiv Yar, Kostiantynivka, Toretsk, Druzhba, Sloviansk, Aleksandro-Kalynove, Sukha Balka, Lysivka, Romanivka , Dachne, Yantarne, Oleksandropil, Suhi Yaly, Velyka Novosilka, Temyrivka, Zelene Pole, Novoandriivka, Biloghirya and Olhivka. On the Kharkiv direction six combat clashes took place in the Vovchansk district. In the Kupyan direction, the number of attacks per day was nine. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Kruglyakivka and Lozova. On the Lyman direction the enemy attacked six times near Novolyubivka, Torsky and Bilogorivka. On the Toretsk direction the enemy launched four attacks near Toretsk and Shcherbinivka. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders repelled 38 assaults in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promenyu, Lysivka, Petrivka, Pustinka, and Novooleksiivka, where the invaders, with the support of aviation, tried to dislodge our units from the occupied lines . In the Kurakhiv direction the defense forces repelled 30 attacks near Berestki, Sontsivka, Voznesenka, Dalnyi, Elizavetivka, Katerynivka and Antonivka, where the enemy tried to break through the defenses of our troops. In the Vremivsk direction the enemy carried out 14 assaults near Trudovoy, Rozdolny, Makarivka, Rivnopol and Novodarivka. In the Dnieper direction there were eight combat encounters with the enemy in the island zone of the Dnieper delta. The opponent had no success. On the Siversky, Kramatorsk, Gulyaipilsky and Orihivsk directions the situation has not undergone significant changes. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. The Defense Forces of Ukraine continue the operation in the Kursk Oblast. Enemy aviation continues to strike on its own territory. Over the past day, Russian planes carried out 27 airstrikes, dropping 37 anti-aircraft missiles. Ukrainian defenders repelled 22 assaults by invaders. We would like to remind you that last day the loss of Russian invaders numbered 1,610 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 17 tanks, 33 armored combat vehicles, 46 artillery systems, 38 operational-tactical UAVs, one cruise missile, 120 vehicles and 17 units of enemy special equipment.

Title: The Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine has launched notifications in Viber: join the official ...
Description: This is inform the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In the community you can quickly receive: Ukrainians are encouraged to use only official and verified sources of information. -We guarantee promptness and reliability!- - the department emphasizes. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 19, 2024, on the 1000th day of the large-scale war with Russia, The Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine begins to inform citizens about aerial threats through the official Viber community.

Title: Massive attacks on the Zaporizhzhia region: 458 strikes per day
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhia OVA. Russian troops carried out 9 airstrikes on Malya Tokmachka, Novoandriivka and Biloghirya. In addition, 239 UAVs of various modifications attacked Zaporizhzhia, Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghirya, and Novodarivka. According to the head of the OVA, 8 shelling from the anti-aircraft missile system covered Preobrazhenka, Mala Tokmachka, Novodanilivka and Novoandriivka. As noted by Ivan Fedorov, 202 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Orikhov, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Malaya Tokmachka, Biloghirya and Novodarivka. There were also 28 reports of the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. Currently, it is known that more than 15,600 subscribers remain without electricity after the night attack of -shaheeds- on Zaporizhzhia. The enemy left more than 17,600 consumers without electricity. Thanks to the efforts of energy workers and utilities, electricity has already been restored to almost 2,000 subscribers. 677 houses were disconnected from heat supply. As reported by ArmyInform, yesterday, November 18, late in the evening, the enemy attacked one of the dormitories in Glukhov, directing two Shahed-type attack UAVs at the peaceful residents.

Title: Minus 1,610 occupiers, 17 tanks destroyed: losses of the Russian army per day
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 19.11.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, since the beginning of the day, November 18, the total number of combat clashes along the entire front line increased to 135 .

Title: The Navy of the Ukrainian Armed Forces reported how many missile carriers the enemy had taken to the...
Description: This was reported by the Naval Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. There are three enemy ships in the Mediterranean Sea, which are carriers of -Caliber- cruise missiles with a total volley of up to 24 missiles. During the day, in the interests of the Russian Federation, 16 ships passed through the Kerch Strait to the Black Sea, 11 of them continued their movement in the direction of the Bosphorus Strait. 11 ships passed to the Sea of ​​Azov, four of them moved from the Bosphorus Strait. -the Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention for the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS), turning off the automatic identification system,- the statement of the Armed Forces Navy says. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine successfully scaled up the mass production of cruise missiles P-360 -Neptun- with improvements for hitting targets at longer distances. It was the Neptune missile complex that destroyed the flagship of the Russian Black Sea Fleet - the cruiser -Moskva-

Title: Sumyshchyna under attack: - Shaheds - destroyed a dormitory, there are victims among children
Description: informs Sumy OVA about this. As of this morning, there are six dead, including one child. Twelve people were injured, including two children. Emergency and rescue operations are currently underway at the site. Rescuers continue to search for people who may remain under the rubble. Information about the consequences of the attack is being clarified. As reported by ArmyInform, on the evening of November 17, Russian troops nemaye-svitla/-> hit the densely populated residential neighborhood of Sum. Civilians were injured, 6 high-rise buildings and vehicles were damaged.

Title: Oleksandr Syrskyi: 1,000 days of the Armed Forces confronting the enemy on the front, which stretche...
Description: The statement was published in the telegram channel of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces. -1000 days of full-scale war. 1,000 days of extremely complex fierce battle for our existence. For the future of Ukraine and each of us. -For 1,000 days, the Armed Forces of Ukraine are facing the enemy on a front that stretches over 1,000 kilometers,- said Oleksandr Syrskyi. He stated that the Armed Forces of Ukraine are fighting the enemy in the frozen trenches of Donetsk region and in the burning steppes of Kherson region under shells, hail, and anti-aircraft guns - we are fighting for the right to life. Us and our children. -1000 days of victories and losses. 1000 days of destroying the enemy. Hundreds of thousands of invaders will no longer defile our land, tens of thousands of units of enemy equipment will never destroy our homes,- the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces emphasized. -Every dark night, even if there are a thousand of them, always ends with dawn. And one day it will be the dawn of our Victory. Gratitude to all who fight, gratitude to all who help. Eternal memory to everyone who died in this war. Glory to the heroes! Glory to Ukraine, which is fighting! Glory to the Ukrainian people!- added Oleksandr Syrskyi.

Title: The Armed Forces restrain the enemy: the Russians tried to break through the defenses of our troops ...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The invaders carried out two missile strikes on the territory of Ukraine using two missiles, 65 airstrikes, dropping 97 guided air bombs. In addition, 678 kamikaze drones were engaged for destruction and more than 3,930 attacks were carried out on the positions of our troops and populated areas. In the Kharkiv direction the enemy stormed the positions of our units in the Vovchansk region six times, the Defense Forces repelled all enemy attempts to advance. In this direction the enemy lost 89 servicemen killed and wounded, in addition, Ukrainian soldiers destroyed 31 UAVs, two vehicles and two special vehicles of the occupiers. A tank, two artillery systems and 11 cars were also damaged. In the Kupyansk direction the enemy carried out offensive actions near Krugliakivka and Lozovoy. Ukrainian defenders stopped all nine enemy attacks. In the Lyman direction, the Russian invaders stormed the positions of the Defense Forces near Novolyubivka, Torsky and Bilogorivka four times, and were repulsed. Four skirmishes took place in the Toretsk direction. The enemy stormed the positions of Ukrainian units near Shcherbinivka and in the Toretsk area. All attacks of the aggressor were repelled. In the Pokrovsky direction the enemy attacked 35 times in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promenya, Lysivka, Petrivka, Pustinka and Novooleksiiivka. Our defenders have repulsed 27 assaults, eight more clashes are still ongoing. In this direction, according to preliminary data, 285 occupants were neutralized, 119 of them irreversibly. A tank, three artillery systems, nine cars and two motorcycles were also destroyed, in addition, three tanks, two guns, three armored combat vehicles, two units of road transport and two motorcycles were damaged. On Kurakhivsky direction the enemy made 26 attempts to break through our defenses near the settlements of Berestki, Sontsivka, Voznesenka, Dalnye, Elizavetivka, Katerynovka and Antonivka. Sixteen engagements have been completed and ten more are still ongoing. In the Vremivsk direction the enemy attacked our units 14 times near Trudovoy, Rozdolny, Makarivka, Rivnopol and Novodarivka. Ukrainian defenders are firmly holding the defense, eight combat clashes are still going on. The enemy also attacked our defenders in the Dnieper direction in vain eight times. In Kurshchyna Defense forces repelled nineteen assaults by Russian invaders, the fighting does not stop. In other directions, there are no significant changes. The department also recognized the soldiers of the 102nd separate brigade of territorial defense named after Colonel Dmytro Vitovsky, who are effectively destroying the enemy, inflicting significant losses in manpower and equipment. As reported by ArmyInform, the number of shells spent in 2023.

Title: The anti-drone regiment has arrived: how the American system neutralizes UAVs
Description: In the official release from this manufacturing company from Virginia (USA) emphasizes that this system is the latest development, combining both kinetic and non-kinetic threat neutralization methods, providing a powerful and mobile solution for airspace protection, ArmiyaInform notes. The AirShield architecture is based on a multi-layered structure capable of operating in both stationary and mobile positions, covering all critical stages of protection: detection, tracking, classification, identification, prioritization and neutralization of threats. This complex chain of destruction allows the latest equipment to seamlessly integrate into existing air defense systems. -The threat posed by drones is rapidly evolving,- said Derrick Birdsell, AirShield Program Manager at Leidos. AirShield is designed to adapt to current systems and keep up with technological advances, allowing the addition of effectors for different types of weapons.- Once identified, the system prioritizes the threat and activates the appropriate effectors, which may include kinetic weapons such as missiles or non-kinetic effectors such as lasers or electronic jamming systems. This rapid and adaptive response not only neutralizes UAVs, but also includes cyber security strategies to counter any attempt to disrupt AirShield systems, providing comprehensive protection against emerging threats. Among the key elements of the system is the CUGAR (Co-axial Unmanned Guided Autonomous Rotorcraft) effector. This unmanned vehicle already demonstrates significant capabilities in the field of combating threats, but the company plans to expand its potential by integrating the APKWS (Advanced Precision Kill Weapon System) missile system. This will increase the accuracy and effectiveness of hitting targets. AirShield is easily compatible with a number of other technologies: high-energy lasers, turret guns, and powerful microwave systems. Such flexibility makes the system a versatile solution for combating a wide range of air threats. Leidos is actively exploring the use of artificial intelligence and machine learning to further improve the AirShield system. These technologies can improve the system's ability to adapt and make independent decisions under complex combat conditions. An important aspect of AirShield's development is ensuring its resistance to cyber attacks, for which both offensive and defensive strategies are being developed. This project continues Leidos' work on C-UAS systems initiated by the US Defense Advanced Projects Agency's Mobile Force Protection (MFP) program (DARPA). After a successful demonstration, the program was transferred to the Air and Missile Development Center of the US Army Combat Capabilities Command (DEVCOM). Leidos plans to begin production of the AirShield in 2025, with initial deployment expected to the US Southern Command (SOUTHCOM), which will be a significant advance for this innovative technology. As note analysts of the defense portal Army Recognition, the development of the AirShield system by Leidos is crucial due to the rapid growth of threats posed by unmanned aerial vehicles aerial systems (UAVs). As the use of drones for military operations and hostilities increases, the need for an effective and adaptive defense response becomes critical. AirShield is not only designed to protect military and civilian facilities from potential drone incursions, but also to provide an integrated solution that can adapt to new technologies and combat tactics. This positions Leidos as a leader in a growing market where air safety is a top priority. In addition, as geopolitical conflicts escalate and asymmetric threats grow, countries are looking for ways to protect their critical infrastructure and armed forces. As a versatile air defense system, AirShield offers real-time threat detection, tracking and neutralization capabilities that are vital to maintaining operational superiority. By integrating advanced technologies such as artificial intelligence and various effectors, Leidos positions its system as an important response to the complex security environment, thereby helping to protect the strategic interests of its customers. At the international level, US allies that have problems with enemy UAVs, especially those participating in coalition operations, have expressed interest in acquiring such advanced C-UAS systems to strengthen their air defense capabilities. However, specific details about other foreign military forces interested in the AirShield system may not be publicly available at this time. AirShield is an advanced anti-drone system. Video: Leidos

Title: Winter is near. We check dugouts, prepare firewood and pet cats together with soldiers of the 44th O...
Description: ArmyInform visited the soldiers of 44 separate mechanized brigades, who are fighting in one of the hot areas, to ask how they prepare for winter and adjust their life in conditions of constant danger of airstrikes. Do the dugouts leak, how much do mice interfere, how to wash in the field and how much firewood should be prepared for the winter - you will find out in the ArmyInform photo report below. We start our conversation in the field kitchen - this is where they gather to talk about life, to pet cats and dogs that nail themselves to positions, and to prepare food and even wash their hair. Recently, the soldiers insulated it for the winter - oilcloth around the perimeter was enough, because the -burzuyka- heats here almost 24 hours a day. There is an entrance to the dugout from the kitchen, which additionally makes it warmer and more protected. - The dugout was made by those who live here. There are five of us. Well, did Oleg -move- because he stayed in the forest alone in his dugout. He moved to live with us, the boys say. When asked if water does not flow from the kitchen down to the dugout during rains or when the snow melts, they explain that once it could collect at the entrance, but everything was still dry and warm below. At the beginning of the day, a bucket with water is left on the stove, it can stand like this all day long - so that, on occasion, someone who needs it can wash his head or take water for a trip to the bath. We go down from the kitchen to the dugout. From the conversation, it is felt that the guys made a good effort when they built their -housing-: the height here is about 2.3 meters, then there is a 50 cm -roll- and the ground. They show -heating- - the volume that can be placed under one -bunch- is enough for the winter. They say that there are stocks and they have time to chop more firewood. The immediate answer to the question of who is cutting down is everyone who lives. They do it when they are in the mood: -You know, sometimes you want to physically do something. So you take an ax and go chop wood.- They emphasize that they do not do any exceptional things about the dugout on the eve of winter, because it is already warm. Unless you often have to open the door to ventilate, but in general you can breathe normally. — The main thing is to periodically clean the pipe of the -burzuika- from soot. We clean once a week, because we smoke intensively in winter, - they explain. — We sleep in thermal baths, in the winter the -burzhujika- may take a little more firewood. But we did everything in such a way that on the eve of winter there is no need to prepare anything in particular, - says the soldier Valeriy. To avoid leaks, oilcloth is used everywhere. In general, this is a very useful thing in everyday life - it is also used to insulate the toilet and bath. All the remaining gaps are blown with mounting foam, which also helps retain heat. We ask the -Artist- about some features of everyday life that are not found in other of their peers. He immediately shows us a kitchen cabinet, which was made from a box from BC, as well as a -mashed- for potatoes with a grenade tip.
