If it seems that this is a very positive factor for us, but in fact it turns out that there is a reservoir in the lowlands and in the -gray- part of the day we have fog. It is very difficult for our drones to find enemy groups that use highly technological camouflage measures,- said the commander of the UAV platoon of the 92nd OSHBr with the call sign -Cat-. Previously ArmyInform reported that the attempts of the Russian invaders to advance as far as possible on the northern border of the Kharkiv region before the change in weather conditions failed once again. Trying to storm, including with the use of armored vehicles, the Russians suffered significant losses.

Title: -Gerbery- made of plywood and foreign electronics: the GUR told about a drone that imitates -Shahedy...
Description: This is stated in message GUR MOU. The aggressor state of Russia assembles such multi-tasking UAVs at a factory in the city of Yelabuga. -Gerbera- can carry a combat unit as a kamikaze and carry out radio-electronic reconnaissance, in particular, to detect air defense positions and record the hits of other strike drones. This UAV imitates the Shahed-136/Geran-2 and is widely used by Russia to overwhelm Ukrainian air defenses. Due to the use of simple materials (plywood, foam), -Gerbera- is ten times cheaper than -Shakhed-. However, the structure of this drone contains a set of components of foreign manufacturers, which is already familiar for Russian weapons. The research of the downed samples proved that the Russians are making these UAVs according to the Chinese prototype using foreign components imported from China. The developer of the UAV is the Chinese model aircraft manufacturer Skywalker Technology Co., Ltd., which also produces fuselages and organizes the delivery of kits to Russia. Delivery is carried out through third-party companies. The anti-interference antenna (CRPA) contains chips from Analog Devices and Texas Instruments (USA), NXP Semiconductors (Netherlands). The universal flight controller also includes components manufactured by Texas Instruments, Atmel (USA), STMicroelectronics, U-Blox (Switzerland), NXP Semiconductors (Netherlands), XLSEMI (China). For targeting by the pilot (according to the FPV-drone principle) of the barrage version of the UAV and conducting aerial reconnaissance, the Gerbera is equipped with a Chinese camera with a three-axis suspension Topotek KHY10S90 and a Xingkai Tech Mesh Network XK-F358 modem. The DLE60 engine is manufactured by the Chinese Mile Hao Xiang Technology Co., Ltd. In the summer of 2024, this company came under US sanctions for supplies to Russia.

Title: A role model for soldiers and indispensable assistants for commanders: Rustem Umyerov congratulated ...
Description: This is stated in a message in the telegram channel. -Dear sergeants and officers of the Defense Forces of Ukraine! I sincerely congratulate you on the professional holiday! You are the foundation of our army. A role model for soldiers and irreplaceable assistants for commanders,- said Rustem Umyerov. He emphasized that sergeants teach, inspire and lead servicemen by their own example, ensuring their combat readiness, maintaining the spirit and discipline of the units. -Thank you to each of you for your courage on the battlefield, professionalism and responsibility in your daily service. You are a reliable pillar of our Defense Forces and the personification of the indomitable spirit of Ukraine,- the minister said. Rustem Umyerov wished good health, endurance and effort to achieve the common goal of victory and protection of our independence. To the Sergeant Day of the Armed Forces of Ukraine ArmyInform spoke with the chief sergeant of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Oleksandr Kosynskyi, who told why sergeants sometimes have to perform the duties of officers at the front, how many sergeants have been awarded state awards since 2014, and how the sergeant corps lives in the third year of a large-scale invasion.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , I decree: to start holding a nationwide minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, to be announced in all mass media regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: In the Kherson region, the Russians killed a local resident and destroyed two medical vehicles with ...
Description: reported this by the Kherson Regional State Administration. It is also reported that at night the Russian occupiers attacked one of the regional health care facilities with a UAV. Two ambulances were destroyed due to the dropping of explosives from an enemy drone. There were no casualties among patients and doctors. As reported by ArmyInform, in Kherson Oblast on November 17 as a result of Russian shelling 4 people died and another 10 were injured.

Title: Air defense forces destroyed 8 attack UAVs at night
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Also, from Kurshchyna, the enemy launched 11 Shahed-type attack UAVs and drones of an unspecified type. Eight attack drones were shot down by air defense in the Poltava, Kharkiv, Cherkasy, Chernihiv and Kyiv regions. Three UAVs are lost to location. As reported by ArmyInform, in Sumy as a result of a Russian missile attack /->11 people died, including two children - a 9-year-old boy and a 14-year-old girl.

Title: In Sumy, the number of dead and injured as a result of the Russian attack has increased
Description: The data as of 7:55 were made public by the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Ukraine. According to information of the Sumy OVA, as a result of the attack by the Russians, 84 people were wounded of varying degrees of severity, among them 11 are children. 11 people are in the intensive care unit, 6 of them are children. The police conducted an apartment-by-apartment search, all victims were provided with assistance. The headquarters for liquidation of consequences and all specialized services continue to work on the spot, applications from citizens are accepted. Investigators, criminologists and explosives experts collect evidence of a crime committed by the Russian invaders. As reported by ArmyInform, on the evening of November 17, Russian troops nemaye-svitla/-> hit the densely populated residential neighborhood of Sum. Civilians were injured, 6 high-rise buildings and vehicles were damaged.

Title: Consequences of two Russian strikes on Sumy: 11 dead and more than 80 injured
Description: The Ministry of Internal Affairs of Ukraine informed about this. A missile strike, probably ballistic, by the Russians inflicted on Sumy in the evening of November 17. Windows of six ten-story buildings were damaged, four cars were destroyed. An apartment-by-apartment inspection of all damaged buildings is being conducted. Rescuers and all necessary services continue to work at the scene of the tragedy. More than 400 residents were evacuated from damaged buildings. The point of invincibility of the State Emergency Service has been deployed. Psychologists provide assistance to victims. In addition, at 00:10 today, the enemy launched a second missile strike, also probably a ballistic missile, against the critical infrastructure of the city of Sumy. The light in the city has now disappeared. Emergency services are working. The consequences of the impact are established. Updated data. By information of the Sumy OVA, as of 08:00, 11 people, including two children, were killed as a result of the Russian attack. 84 people were injured of various degrees of severity, 11 of them were children. 11 people are in the intensive care unit, 6 of them are children.

Title: At the front, 149 combat clashes per day: the General Staff reported on the situation in the main di...
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff ZSU as of 08:00 on November 18. In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy unsuccessfully stormed the positions of our defenders four times near the settlements of Vovchansk and Staritsa, while actively using bombing aircraft. In the Kupyansk direction, there were 10 attacks by invaders during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Kucherivka, Kruglyakivka, Zagryzovy, and Kolisnikivka. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked six times. Tried to penetrate our defenses near Tverdokhlibovo, Grekivka, Novoehorivka, Terni and Cherneshchyna. On the Seversky direction, our troops repelled one attack of the enemy near Verkhnyokam’yansky. In the Kramatorsk direction, one combat clash took place in the past 24 hours in the area of ​​the settlement of Bila Gora. Actively using bomber aircraft in the direction of Toretsk, the enemy launched three attacks in the direction of Toretsk and Shcherbinivka. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 32 assault and offensive actions of the aggressor in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Lysivka, Krutiy Yar, Yurivka, Hryhorivka, Pustinka and Petrivka settlements. In the Kurakhiv direction Defense forces repelled 42 attacks. The occupiers most actively tried to advance near Nova Ilyinka, Berestki, Voznesenka, Sontsivka, Zora, Maksimilianivka, Dalny, Kurakhovo, Katerynivka, Elizavetivka, and Antonivka. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy carried out eight assaults on our positions in the areas of Trudovoy, Novodvorivka, Rivnopillia and Rozdolivka, in addition, assault and bomber aircraft attacked the settlement of Velyka Novosilka. In the Gulyaipil direction, the enemy did not conduct active operations. In the Orihiv direction, our defenders repelled one enemy attack near Novoandriivka. Four times, without success, the invading forces tried to dislodge units of the Defense Forces from their positions in the Dnieper direction. The operation in the Kursk region is ongoing. The aviation of the Russian Federation continues to raze its villages and cities to the ground. Over the past day, Russian planes carried out 26 airstrikes with 33 anti-aircraft missiles on their own territory. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. On the border with the Chernihiv and Sumy regions, the enemy from the territory of the Russian Federation is actively using artillery and aviation in the areas of Ukrainian settlements. Our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying forces and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. In general, the Russian invaders lost 1,560 people last day. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 15 tanks, 38 armored combat vehicles, 30 artillery systems, 99 operational-tactical UAVs, 112 missiles, 107 vehicles and 2 units of special equipment.

Title: Oleksandr Syrskyi congratulated the soldiers on the Sergeant's Day of the Armed Forces of Ukraine
Description: This is stated in his message on the page on Facebook . -Dear brothers-in-arms and sisters-in-arms! Sergeants and officers! I sincerely congratulate you on the professional holiday — the Day of the Sergeant of the Armed Forces of Ukraine! Your role in the life of every military team is extremely important,- Oleksandr Syrsky emphasized. He noted that it is sergeants who command primary units, train and educate the personnel, are responsible for its coherence, clear interaction and constant combat readiness. -Your experience, motivation and personal example are a significant support for the morale of Ukrainian defenders, who fight on the front with weapons in their hands every day and do everything to stop the enemy's onslaught,- said the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces. Oleksandr Syrskyi wished the entire sergeant corps good health, strength and endurance. -Also, today we should remember those who gave their lives in the fight for the freedom and independence of our Motherland! Eternal honor and memory to them! Glory to Ukraine! Glory to the heroes!- he said. To Sergeant's Day ArmyInform spoke with the chief sergeant of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Oleksandr Kosynsky, who told why sergeants sometimes have to perform the duties of officers at the front? How many sergeants have been awarded state awards since 2014? And in general, how does the sergeant corps live in the third year of a large-scale invasion? Chief Sergeant of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Oleksandr Kosynskyi told ArmyInform about this.

Title: Enemy shelling of Kherson region: 4 dead and 10 wounded
Description: This reported the head of the Kherson Regional State Administration Oleksandr Prokudin. Last day Tomyna Balka, Zolota Balka, Stanislav, Oleksandrivka, Burgunka, Mylove, Novodmytrivka, Osokorivka, Mykilske, Antonivka, Tyaginka, Novovorontsovka, Prydniprovske, Sadov, Bilozerka, Molodizhne, Novoraisk, Mykolaivka and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes. the Russian military attacked the social infrastructure of the region; residential quarters of settlements in the region, in particular, damaged two high-rise buildings and 53 private houses. The occupiers also mutilated the farm building, garage and private cars. As reported by ArmyInform, the occupiers hit the populated areas of the Zaporizhzhia region 424 times in the past day due to shelling. -obstriliv/->six people injured.

Title: The President of Lithuania on Ukraine's permission to use long-range weapons against the Russian Fed...
Description: This is stated in his post on the social network H. -This day has come! From now on, Ukraine can strike military targets in Russia with long-range missiles,- the message reads. The President of Lithuania emphasized that this is a decisive moment in the fight against aggressive Russia. -Peace cannot be achieved through weakness. Peace is the reward of the strong. Be strong, Ukraine!- Gitanas Nauseda added. On Sunday evening, the American publication NYT reported that the USA had given permission to Ukraine to strike the territory of the Russian Federation with ATACMS missiles. After that, the French media reported that France and Great Britain had given a similar authorization for the use of Storm Shadow/SCULP missiles. President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi in the evening address commented on this information, noting that such things are not announced. -The rockets will speak for themselves. Definitely,- he said.

Title: The defense forces eliminated 1,560 invaders and destroyed dozens of pieces of equipment: Russian lo...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 18.11.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, since the beginning of the day, November 17, the total number of combat clashes along the entire front line increased to 134.

Title: In Zaporizhzhia, six were injured after enemy shelling
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA. In addition, 52-, 55-, 61-year-old women and a 59-year-old man were injured as a result of an attack by Russians in Pologiv district. During the day, the occupiers made 424 strikes on 13 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region. The enemy launched three rocket attacks on Zaporozhye. Russian troops carried out 22 airstrikes on Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Yurkivka, Temyrivka, and Malya Tokmachka. 225 UAVs of various modifications attacked Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghir and Novodarivka. 8 shellings from the MLRS covered Preobrazhenka, Novodarivka and Mala Tokmachka. 166 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Orikhov, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Malaya Tokmachka, Biloghir and Novodarivka. 16 reports were received about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. As reported by ArmyInform, as a result of a rocket attack on a residential building 10 people died in Sumy, including two children. 51 people were injured, including five children.

Title: Defense forces repelled 35 attacks in the Kurakhiv direction and more than 20 in the Pokrovsky direc...
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff ZSU as of 22:00 on November 17. On the Kharkiv direction there were ten combat clashes with the Russian invaders. Five attacks were repelled in the Staritsa area, four in the Vovchansk area, one attack was repelled by our defenders in the area of ​​the settlement of Visoka Yaruga, the enemy had no success. In the Kupyansk direction the enemy tried 10 times to advance our units from their occupied positions near Kucherivka, Kruglyakivka and Kolisnikivka. One skirmish near Zagryzovo is still ongoing. Seven attempts to dislodge our defenders from their positions were stopped in the Lymansky direction, the enemy tried to advance in the directions of Tverdokhlibovo, Grekivka, Terni, and Cherneshchyna. In the Seversky direction, our troops repelled one enemy attack near Verkhnyokam’yansky. In the Kramatorsk direction one combat clash took place. The activity of the occupiers was shown in the area of ​​the settlement of Bila Hora, the enemy, having received a strong repulse, retreated. The enemy twice tried to penetrate our defense in the direction of Toretska. Since the beginning of the day, the occupiers have been in the areas of Toretsk and Shcherbynivka settlements. Both attacks were successfully repelled by our defenders. The enemy does not stop trying to push our defenders out of their positions in the Pokrovsky direction. The greatest activity of the Russian occupiers remains in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Lysivka, Krutiy Yar, Yurivka, Hryhorivka and Petrivka settlements. In total, 23 attacks in the direction of Ukrainian defenders have already been repelled, five more clashes are still ongoing. According to the currently available information, the losses of the aggressor in this direction amounted to 251 people killed and wounded. Two tanks, 10 units of motor vehicles were destroyed. In addition, two tanks, one BMP, one vehicle and one artillery system were damaged. The enemy is intensively attacking the Ukrainian defenders in the Kurakhiv direction, at this time of the day there are also 35 combat clashes. The invaders remain highly active, trying to advance in the areas of Novaya Illinka, Berestkiv, Voznesenka, Sontsivka, Zora, Maksimilianivka, Dalniy, Kurakhovo and Antonivka. Units of the Defense Forces repelled 20 enemy attacks. The situation is difficult, but controlled by the Defense Forces. Our soldiers are making efforts to prevent the enemy from advancing deep into Ukrainian territory. In this direction, according to preliminary data, the enemy lost irretrievably and wounded 128 people. Two tanks, one BMP, two units of automobile equipment, two motorcycles and one mortar of the enemy were also destroyed, in addition, one enemy BMP and one artillery system were damaged. In the Vremivsk direction, four clashes took place in the areas of Trudovoy and Rozdolivka. Three clashes continue until now. On the Orihiv direction, our defenders repelled one futile enemy attack during the day near Novoandriivka. In the Dnieper direction, our soldiers repulsed the attacks of the Russian invaders on the positions of the Ukrainian army four times. Defense forces of Ukraine continue the operation in the Kursk region. The aviation of the Russian Federation will continue to strike with guided aerial bombs on the territory of Russia. At present, 24 air strikes using 37 anti-aircraft missiles are known. There were no significant changes in the situation in other areas.

Title: Junior Sergeant -Hunger-: the story of an anti-aircraft gunner from the DSHV who destroyed an enemy ...
Description: — I'm -Hunger- because that's what the boys like, and to be honest, I'm always hungry for everything - movement and adrenaline. Well, sometimes I don't finish my meal or overeat, as happens on duty,- Ivan jokes. A paratrooper from Bila Tserkva, he has been serving in the brigade for the second year, which he calls his second family. And when he is asked what he does in the service, Ivan simply answers: -Everything — training of personnel, and inspection of property, ammunition, missiles, weapons. And, of course, I motivate the boys. Sometimes with a word, sometimes with a pronoun. The main thing is to set them up so that they don't want to die, but want to kill and come back.- One of Ivan's major achievements was the 2024 raid on Kurshchyna, during which he shot down a Russian Ka-52 Alligator. -The third day of the operation. The guys broadcast on the radio: pinwheels are flying, running for destruction. I'm in position, taking the Stinger MANPADS. The helicopter was flying straight at me. Only the power grid got in the way - I was afraid that the rocket might catch on. But everything went smoothly. A shot, and in a few seconds I hide in the landing so that the enemy does not capture the position. I hear on the radio: -Hit!- The guys are happier than I am, because I'm in shock. Then came the feeling of maximum joy and satisfaction. After that, the enemy did not fly so brazenly,- he says. -Hunger- emphasizes that the -Stinger- is a powerful tool, but not all MANPADS are so -smooth-: -I had 4 missiles for the older MANPADS that simply did not fly - old equipment. You want to cover the infantry, but you can't. Therefore, Stinger is a solution to many problems for us. Everything is simple there: the target in the crosshairs - a second and a half - a shot. There is no time to think.- Now there are slightly fewer combat missions, because the enemy has realized that it is dangerous to fly in. But, according to Ivan, they are always ready. -If it is a UAV of the Zala or SuperCam type, we are working on the situation. If it just flies by, we don't waste the resource and don't -burn- the position. If it flies specifically at us, then we shoot it down with small arms. With MANPADS, we only go for the -big fish-. When Ivan joined the service, at first he planned to join the 95th Brigade of the Military Police, because his friends served there. But he got into the 82nd and did not regret it: -When I started studying, many of my fellow students wanted to study art or be tank drivers. I thought and realized that it would be cool for me to destroy enemy aircraft as much as possible. And so it happened. I am constantly learning, improving my qualifications. I dream of becoming the chief sergeant of the platoon and not only teaching the boys, but also running with them, destroying enemy turntables.- Ivan's words resonate in hearts. He lives for Victory and does everything so that the enemy is afraid to even appear in the sky over Ukraine.

Title: Sergeant's Day of the Armed Forces of Ukraine: about military art, refusal of officer positions and ...
Description: Why do sergeants sometimes have to act as officers at the front? How many sergeants have received state awards since 2014? And in general, how is the sergeant corps living in the third year of a large-scale invasion? Chief Sergeant of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Oleksandr Kosynskyi told ArmyInform about this. — Sergeants’ tasks today essentially remained the same: preparing personnel for combat, keeping weapons in constant readiness, preparing positions, managing people during combat, their moral support, maintaining discipline, says the chief sergeant of the Armed Forces. According to him, quite often sergeants and senior officers perform the duties of officers. This is sometimes due to the absence or inability of such persons to manage the personnel, to manage the battle. After all, some of these officers were drafted into the army only because they have a higher education. — Sergeants, who perform the duties of platoon commanders, manage the unit during the battle. Some even serve as company commanders. So war is not about education, it is about ability, training and experience. Oleksandr Kosynsky claims that sergeants and senior officers are practitioners. Because they were all soldiers, they know how to work with them. Sergeants are always closer to people, and therefore they manage to adapt faster to the conditions of the constantly changing environment. — The main thing is that there should be support, interaction and freedom of action, choice of methods and ways of completing tasks. As for the challenges, one of the most critical for us sergeants is the lack of entry into the personnel units, as well as the physical and moral qualities of those who come. He explains this by the fact that during the fighting of such intensity as now, servicemen fall out of formation every day. First of all, due to injuries and contusions. Many return to duty after being wounded, but it takes time: - Even after some wounds, no matter how motivated a sergeant is, he can no longer physically perform the combat tasks he used to perform. — The sergeants in the units are also today accepting newcomers who come from the training centers. Who after BZVP, who after professional training. The sergeants carry out their additional training and adaptation, Kosynskyi says. And he adds that this training is conducted by sergeants with combat experience, specifically for the types of weapons that are in the unit. And these are not only automatic rifles and submachine guns, these are also machine guns and portable anti-tank vehicles: - Sergeants teach the art of survival on the battlefield, train for the type of combat that is relevant in this area of ​​the front. But many of those who are called -young recruits- often lack the proper physical shape, endurance, have diseases and injuries, or are morally weak, not warriors. The chief sergeant of the Armed Forces claims that during the training of recruits, both motivation and confidence increase, skills and abilities increase. But you cannot go against certain physical or psychological limitations. And to carry out a combat mission, strong and brave men are needed. — And they are a potential for filling sergeant positions. After all, sergeants also fall out of the ranks. Or they go to higher positions, after the detachment - to the positions of chief sergeants of platoons, companies, battalions. This is important so that they can apply their experience at the highest levels of military management. But sergeant positions must be constantly replenished, and there are difficulties with this. There is no soldier - there will be no sergeant, says Kosynskyi. Separately, he notes that many sergeants and foremen are appointed to officer positions: - Why do they take the best of the best. Yes, it is important to replenish officer positions as well. It is important that there are experienced, adequate military personnel. The success of the battle, the survival and health of personnel, the survivability of the unit itself, and its cohesion depend on them, on their decisions and actions. At the same time, the chief sergeant of the Armed Forces notes that it is very difficult to maintain and grow in these conditions the -bone- of professional, experienced and motivated sergeants who would form the basis of the foundations of the sergeant corps. Because no one but a sergeant will train a soldier. — We have more than 250,000 non-commissioned officer and sergeant positions, which are approximately four-fifths full. This is what I say for all types and types of troops. -Unfortunately, the worst staffing is precisely in those combat units and units that fight the enemy on the front line every day,- says Oleksandr Kosynskyi. And he clarifies that now about three quarters of sergeants are mobilized. That is, the personnel potential of professional sergeants, who have been raised since 2014, bearers of the -sergeant idea-, is decreasing: - Although I must note that a lot of mobilized servicemen are mastering the sergeant's business, taking over the foundations that were laid in the formation of the modern professional corps of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, reach a level no worse than that of professional sergeants. I meet a lot of such mobilized sergeants and chiefs while working in units, in areas of combat operations. I am often surprised at how quickly some of them are permeated by our sergeant's ideas, values. The master sergeant emphasizes that many of these soldiers have already completed various non-commissioned officer courses, and abroad as well. — I meet many and those who refused to move to officer positions, although they have a higher education, some even more than one. I think, I believe, I know that the future of the sergeant corps lies with such sergeants and chiefs. Because only the faithful are worthy. Our sergeants and senior officers are modern heroes, supermen, those on whose shoulders rests this thin and extremely long battle line of our nation's battle with the evil coming at us from Moscow, Kosinsky notes. Since 2014, more than 25,000 sergeants and officers have received state awards, 105 of them the title of Hero of Ukraine, unfortunately, 76 of them posthumously. — But they are our Heroes forever. Those who inspire us to continue the struggle, those who define the meaning of this struggle, our brothers in arms who are waiting for us and look at us from the sky. We have no right to betray them, must fight, must win. Sergeant Day for us, it is not just a professional holiday… rather, it is not even a holiday, especially at this time. This is a day when we can pay tribute to our fallen brothers and feel our identity and our unity in this battle.

Title: Noah's Ark for Kim: North Korea is likely to build its largest warship
Description: Project details investigated specialists from the International Institute for Strategic Studies (IISS). As stated in the expert report, North Korea has built a new slipway 170 meters long and 30 meters wide at its shipyard in the city of Nampho. The direct construction of the facility started in May 2024. Such volumes of the construction site are a third larger than the dimensions of the recently launched Amnok and Nampo class corvettes for the DPRK military fleet, which were the largest military ships of the North Korea, built after the Najin-class frigates, delivered in the 1970s. Thanks to the appearance of such an object, the regime of -Rocketman Kim-, as the leader of the DPRK was nicknamed by the newly elected US President Donald Trump, will be able to build a particularly powerful, as according to its dimensions, a ship. However, experts do not yet have an understanding of what kind of combat vessel it might be. Available satellite images show that the North Korean regime is already building some kind of ship on this slipway. In particular, you can see something similar to sections of the hulls painted with a red oxide primer. You can also see two gantry cranes that can be used to move sections of the ship's hull along the slipway. But since the North Koreans have stretched a frame with a camouflage net over this slipway, it is impossible to see the construction of this ship in more detail on satellite images. Researchers from the IKK defense portal Defense Express (DE) singled out an interesting detail, which is that the shipyard in the North Korean city of Nampo essentially has a -dual purpose-: civilian vessels were also built there. However, it was at this shipyard that two missile corvettes under the Amnok project were also built, which are currently the most powerful warships of the DPRK Navy. that these ships have a displacement of up to 1.5 thousand tons and a hull length of 80 meters. And it is on this comparative basis that the two versions are further based on which task North Korea could build a huge, considering its scale, a slipway as long as 170 meters. The first version - the North Korean regime has the ambition to build a more powerful surface ship for its Navy, for example, a “missile frigate” class. The second version is that the DPRK wants to use this facility to build a new ballistic missile carrier submarine. On this background, ICC DE mentions the report that North Korea and Russia may work, including segment of technologies for the construction of nuclear submarines. Which, in turn, leads to the conclusion that in this story, Pyongyang's new project was not without Moscow's advice and help. While Nampo Ship yard can produce a vessel with a larger hull, which in mirrors the design of a modern warship, North Korea is unlikely to be able to single-handedly reproduce the relevant modern combat systems and capabilities. This is another proof of the presence of the -hand of Moscow-. kp/en/article/q/bb7704b49447dd80b52c60420f45e9dc.kcmsf->reported that during a September 2024 visit to a new naval base under construction, dictator Kim said , that the country's Navy -will soon receive large surface warships and submarines that cannot be anchored at existing warship mooring facilities. And the construction of a naval base for the operation of the latest large warships has become an urgent task.- One of the possible explanations for what kind of ship may be under construction is that a floating shock platform is being built with placing cruise missiles of a certain type on it. Also, in September 2023, Pyongyang test-launched long-range cruise missiles from an Amnok-class corvette. Thus, a larger platform will allow the transportation of more cruise missiles and will also potentially allow short-range ballistic missiles to be included in its arsenal. At the same time, experts note that although the North Korean fleet is formally large enough in terms of the number of vessels, it mainly consists of from small patrol and coastal ships, which have extremely limited combat capabilities. Thus, the hypothetical -frigate- (if it really is) will be a giant step forward for North Korea's military ambitions. A visual presentation of the North Korean missile project. Eurasia Naval Insight's visualization

Title: Human shield tactics in Kurshchyna: the enemy mirrors its own crimes
Description: Thus, Russian and Belarusian propaganda resources coordinatedly disseminated false information, arguing that the Armed Forces in Kur Region allegedly use a live shield tactics. In fact, the tactic of a live shield is typical for the Russian army, which since 2014 has been repeatedly covered by civilians in occupied territories and prisoners of war. For example, in December 2023, the Ukrainian Prosecutor's Office opened criminal proceedings on the use of Ukrainian prisoners as a living shield in the Zaporozhye region. The Kremlin's propaganda resources are also spreading excerpts from an interview with a Ukrainian prisoner of war about the threats of -shooting in the back- that he heard from the commanders. Ukrainian prisoners are forced to fulfill the requirements of the invaders: confess to the crimes invented or committed by the Russians themselves, to speak under a record of frank lies, etc. The torture and murder of prisoners, other violations of the rules and customs of war is a common practice for Russians. Like the practice of thighs, invented by Stalin and revived in the Russian army. This function is currently performed by the Kadyrov special unit -Akhmat-. Back in March 2022, the SBU published intercepted negotiations by the Chechen language of Rosgvardia's fighter with his wife, where he confesses that his key task is to restrain the Russian military: -Our task is to drive back of those east soldiers who begin to run away from the blows of Ukrainian artillery.- Therefore, the current accusations of the Ukrainian military are another attempt by Russian propaganda to erase reality and justify their own crimes.

Title: There are dead and wounded in Sumy as a result of a Russian missile strike
Description: About this reported Sumy Ova. The ballistic missile probably hit a densely populated residential neighborhood of the city. -Rocket hit a nine-story building in Sumy. All the necessary services are already on the spot, a rescue operation is conducted, -the President of Ukraine said. notified that as of 10:00 p.m., 8 people were killed as a result of the enemy attack , including one child, another 10 local residents were injured. At least 10 high-rise buildings and vehicles were damaged, the number of which is currently being determined. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of November 17, the Russian occupiers vidbyttya-rekordnoyi-za-masshtabom-ataky-rf/?utm_source=mainnews&utm_medium=article&utm_campaign=traficsource->carried out a massive combined strike on the objects of the energy sector of Ukraine with various types of air, land and sea-based missiles , as well as shock UAVs of the shahed type.

Title: -Plus or minus 30 years- - the Russians are throwing young fighters into the offensive
Description: Andriy Otchenash, a serviceman of the 4th operational brigade of the National Guard -Rubizh-, told about this on ArmyTV stream. -When we destroy the enemy, we try to fly around and see how the enemy is equipped and stuff. We can see that quite young guys are really going into battle. And this youth gives them many chances to survive. Because, objectively, it is much more difficult to destroy a young enemy than to destroy some grandfather who will be half fatter and half slower,- Andrii Otchenash said. According to him, captured Russians of this age group explain that they went to fight because of money. Added to this are the consequences of propaganda, because Russians believe that they are defending their country on foreign land. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the -Svoboda- battalions of the 4th operational brigade of the National Guard -Rubizh- caused great losses to the occupiers who tried to break through our defenses.

Title: A shocking discovery by divers at the bottom of the Kyiv Reservoir
Description: informs about this by the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. Divers-sappers of the State Emergency Service quickly arrived at the scene of the incident. They conducted a thorough survey of the water area and successfully removed the remains of the UAV. Specialists continue to work on the identification of the find, as well as surveying the area to ensure the safety of the residents of the region. As reported by ArmyInform, in Kyiv region wrecks of a Russian drone found by an underwater hunter were retrieved from the Dnipro.

Title: Your documents are a collection of dead Russians and their
Description: The photos were published on November 17 on the brigade's channel. -The last weeks have been more difficult than ever. The enemy rolled in waves, trying to break through our lines, but we stand! Hundreds of occupiers have already learned what it means to meet the 97th battalion on their way. Next week, we will show what their fate looks like when they dare to set foot on our land. Every day is a new -history lesson- for the invaders we are reducing to ashes. We continue to maintain formation and destroy the enemy to the last. Glory to Ukraine!-, — commented on the pictures in the brigade. As reported by ArmyInform, aerial reconnaissance units of the 60th unmanned systems battalion of the Ingulets mechanized brigade rammed shot down the enemy -mavik-.

Title: To smoke the Russians - Russian propagandists invented a story about supplying dozens of mobile morg...
Description: reported on November 17 the Countering Disinformation Center about yet another piece of Russian propaganda. The false post is accompanied by a photo showing mobile containers with the apparently English inscription -Mobile Morgue-. In fact, this is another fake of Russian propaganda, and the mobile containers in question are mobile boilers that the Ukrainian Red Cross, in cooperation with the Coca-Cola company, delivers to local communities to support the population of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Russian information space there are more and more reports about the crimes of the military of the Russian army against the civilian population in the Kursk region.

Title: Bombed -Buk- - the guardsmen destroyed the Russian air defense system with a reset
Description: The video of the defeat was published on the brigade's page. Air scouts found the -Buk- hidden in a forest strip on one of the hottest areas of the front. Our bomber drone flew to the air defense system. One hit with the ammunition turned out to be enough for the full ammunition of the air defense system to detonate and present our aerial scouts with an impressive sight. -Every day we negate the enemy's equipment. We make the enemy weaker every day,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, National Guardsmen of the 27th Pechersk Brigade increase combat capability and readiness to perform tasks in the conditions of modern threats.

Title: 20 specialists completed the environmental audit course for humanitarian demining
Description: notifies the Main Administration of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security. The training was conducted within the framework of the OSCE Support Program for Ukraine and was aimed at improving the qualifications of military specialists in the field of environmental audit of humanitarian demining. They gained knowledge about the environmental problems caused by humanitarian demining and the methodology of conducting environmental audits, in accordance with EU and NATO standards. The training covered the legal aspects of environmental activities, the practice of mine action work and the basics of environmental auditing. The classes were conducted by leading experts in the field of nature protection and ecology. After completing the course, 20 representatives of the environmental safety department of the Main Directorate of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Safety, as well as the Center of Excellence in Mine Action and Environmental Safety, received certificates of environmental auditors. The deputy head of the Main Department of Mine Action, Colonel Valery Weber, congratulated the newly minted environmental auditors and noted that the certificate makes it possible to conduct audits in accordance with European environmental legislation and assess the possibility of using mine-free land for agriculture and other economic needs. Colonel Valery Weber also thanked the representatives of the OSCE, the Ministry of Environment and the teachers of the academy for their support in organizing the training. As reported by ArmyInform, a meeting of the Council was held in Kyiv of the United Nations Development Program (UNDP) project -Mine-countermeasures in Ukraine-, where the results of work for 2024 were summed up and plans for the future were outlined.

Title: They filled up, fried, struck — -Birds of Magyar - showed a tough plot with the occupiers
Description: The video of combat work was published on November 17 on the battalion channel. In the key plot of the video, the Russians tried to hide from our pilots in an abandoned house. But an FPV drone flew in and bombarded the occupants with ruins. They caught fire. One of the Russians tried to get out, but was hit by the next drone. Another invader was never able to get out of the burning ruins. His other siblings did not fare better. -Birds of Magyar- gather at their place on the channel. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the -Klima-TEAM- unit of the 414th battalion of unmanned aerial systems -Birds of Magyar- as part of the Marine Corps worked well against the enemy in the Kursk region.

Title: -It blew so much that everything in the world sparkled-: Druzhkivka in Donetsk region suffered a ter...
Description: reported this by the head of the Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. Correspondents of ArmiyaInform recorded the consequences of the occupiers' devastating attack on civilian residential buildings and infrastructure. Local residents say that the shelling took place at night around 11:30 p.m. - 11:35 p.m. The impact of the enemy ammunition was extremely powerful. - It blew so much that everything in the world sparkled! - says one of the women. — God had mercy that there were no dead or seriously wounded, they all sigh together, answering questions about the victims. It was the hardest for a 90-year-old woman, whose house is located closest to the epicenter of the explosion - she has numerous bruises and stress. - On the head, on the hands, on the knees, fragments fell, the leg was completely blue, - says her daughter. After providing help, the children took their mother to their home. — She is 90 years old, it is very difficult for her mother, — adds the son. The impact was so powerful that, in addition to the place of impact, it destroyed dozens of residential and commercial buildings on three nearby streets. Even in buildings several tens of meters away from the place where the ammunition was hit, the roofs were damaged and the panes in the windows were broken. The destruction of buildings near the impact site is catastrophic. In them, as well as in the house of a 90-year-old woman, not only the roofs were demolished and the windows and doors were knocked out along with the frames, but also the ceiling and walls were moved. Some of them are already unrecoverable. Despite Sunday being a day off, representatives of the Salvation Angels Charitable Foundation, which works with the support of the Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees, arrived at the site of the explosion early in the morning. — Just as an -arrival-, we immediately arrive, help so that people can be repaired. We will find out about the need for help from the local administration, says Oleksandr, a representative of the foundation. Boards, chipboard, plastic film, construction foam, nails, screws are unloaded from the arriving trucks - everything necessary for quick installation and temporary repairs capable of protecting the buildings damaged by the explosion from the weather. Residents of destroyed houses are queuing for registration and receiving materials. Difficult days are ahead of them, because the received materials still require skilled workers - if almost anyone can cover shutters with a film, even temporary roofing requires a skilled worker. No less than the most damaged private houses, the enterprise located in the building of the former school suffered. — All 36 windows were broken, the roof was demolished, the doors in the offices were smashed. This building is over 90 years old. There used to be a stable here, after the war there was a school, says the director of the enterprise, Volodymyr. The destruction inside the building is no less than outside. Of particular concern is the equipment - will it be possible to restore it, will it work after such an impact and damage? The company's production was important for the Ukrainian energy system, which is under regular attacks from the Russian occupiers, so its shutdown would cause significant damage. The occupiers once again struck a blow at the civil infrastructure and housing development. Without any military purpose, it is purely designed to continue to terrorize the civilian population, both directly through the destruction of residential buildings and indirectly through the destruction of an enterprise that produced important products. Photo by Ruslan Tarasov

Title: They went on an assault and burned down - another battle of Kursk was staged for the Russians
Description: The video with the burning Russian equipment was released in the evening of November 17 on the battalion channel. -Titans from the adjacent unit in the Kursk direction successfully destroyed the equipment of the enemy assault group. These shots were taken by our bomber pilots during a search operation to eliminate the remains of the infantry. At such moments, all units join and finish off enemy assault groups, because it is important to eliminate them as soon as possible to make it impossible to consolidate and create positions. We are waiting for whining in the Russian public about how much our drones bother them,- the battalion commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 225th assault battalion demonstrated effective destruction of another enemy vehicle in Kurshchyna.

Title: Something burned, something is burning - enemy transport is parked forever near Pokrovsk
Description: The video of the combat work was released on the unit's channel. Our FPV drones hit all possible transport of the Russians. In some places, whole traffic jams appeared on the roads from the burned cars of the occupiers. At the same time, the car was not protected either by the shooting of the passengers or by the installed EW. -A real road of death for the occupiers,- Muramasa commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the Muramasa 109th unmanned attack aircraft company of a separate brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine were able destroy Russian crew, who hunted our drones with EW and a pump-action shotgun.

Title: -Truly Russian many- - our soldiers showed the Russians captured in the South
Description: The captives were told on November 17 on the brigade channel. During the assaults in the Zaporizhzhia direction, soldiers of the Russian army were captured. One of the prisoners is a 25-year-old native of the Yamalo-Nenets Autonomous District, twice convicted of murder. His motivation to fight is amnesty and financial support. The second is a 33-year-old resident of the Republic of Tajikistan who signed a contract to avoid a criminal record. The third invader is a 49-year-old resident of the Republic of Tatarstan who joined the Russian army voluntarily for the sake of financial support. Before replenishing the -exchange fund-, the occupiers fought for one to three months. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kharkiv direction, soldiers of the -Spartan- brigade successfully korotkym-i-nevdalym/->repelled the enemy assault.

Title: In Sumy Oblast, a fisherman became a target of Russian artillery
Description: The Prosecutor General's Office informs about this. On November 17, 2024, around 1:00 p.m., Russian troops shelled the territory of the Znob-Novgorod community of Shostkinsky district. A 73-year-old man who was fishing on the lake died as a result of the artillery attack. The shelling also caused significant damage to civilian infrastructure: a medical facility and seven private houses were damaged. Law enforcement officers, including prosecutors and investigators of the Shostky district police department, record the consequences of the shelling for further investigation and bringing the culprits to justice. As reported by ArmyInform, Kyiv shuddered from Russia's strikes : The area is heavily damaged.

Title: The main participation — a Russian attack aircraft made a record jump thanks to our drone
Description: The video of the combat work was published on the brigade's channel. Two Russians first ran through the trenches, and then hid in a shelter from which they tried to shoot down our drone. When they realized that it was impossible, one of the Russians tried to run away, got an explosion in his legs and flew almost 10 meters away. -The occupiers do not stop trying to attack Chasiv Yar, using the tactics of small infantry groups. Very often, these are trained and well-equipped paratroopers who try to storm our positions. Soldiers of the battalion worked out one of these enemy groups on the outskirts of the city. The invaders tried to shoot back, but our FPV drones turned out to be more accurate,- commented the video in -Rarog-.   As reported by ArmyInform, the drones of the battalion of unmanned aerial systems -Rarog- of the 24th mechanized brigade named after King Danylo destroyed the Russians as they hid in the canal pipe.

Title: A piece of a rocket got stuck in a high-rise building in the center of Kyiv: what is known
Description: informs about this by the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. The operation was carried out with the help of a crane by specialists of the capital's State Emergency Service together with the pyrotechnic division of the Mobile Rescue Center of Rapid Response. After recovery, the remains of the rocket were handed over to the competent authorities for further study. Rescuers continue to eliminate the consequences of shelling and provide safety of residents. We will remind, in the Pechersk district of Kyiv as a result of falling debris rockets, a fire broke out on the roof of a five-story residential building. As reported by ArmyInform, the five-hour alarm: details of the combined attack on Kyiv.

Title: Point attacks in all directions: the enemy is trying to break through the defense of the Armed Force...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Our soldiers hold the lines and take all necessary measures to prevent a defense breakthrough. The occupier does not stop using artillery and aviation on the territory of Sumy region. Areas of the settlement of Basivka came under enemy fire. Enemy aircraft also struck the Zhuravka region, dropping two guided aerial bombs. According to the available information at the moment, the Russians carried out nine airstrikes on the territory of the Kursk region of the Russian Federation, using 13 anti-aircraft missiles. In the Kharkiv direction, four combat clashes took place today. Our troops repelled enemy attacks in the Vovchansk and Staritsa districts. Also, the enemy carried out airstrikes in the districts of Tsyrkuny, Kozachai Lopan, and Vovchansk, dropping seven anti-aircraft missiles. Nine assault actions of the invaders were repulsed by our soldiers near Kucherivka, Zagryzovo, Kruglyakivka and Kolisnikivka in the Kupyansk direction. Three more clashes are still ongoing. On the Lyman direction the enemy is attacking near Tverdokhlibovo, Grekivka, Terni and Cherneshchyna. Since the beginning of the day, there have already been four clashes in this direction. In the Seversk direction, the occupiers are actively using aviation, Siversk was hit by six KAB. In addition, in this direction since the beginning of the day, our defenders repelled one attack by the occupiers near Verkhnokamyanskyi. In the Kramatorsk direction, the enemy used attack aircraft, striking with eight unguided missiles in the area of ​​the settlement of Novomarkove. With the support of aviation in the direction of Toretsk, the enemy twice attacked the positions of our troops near Toretsk and Shcherbinivka. At the moment, one battle is ongoing. In the Pokrovsky direction in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Lysivka, Krutiy Yar, Yurivka, Hryhorivka and Petrovka, our defenders repelled 18 enemy attacks, six clashes are still ongoing. Four skirmishes were repulsed by our defenders in the Kurakhiv direction, another 19 skirmishes are ongoing in the districts of Novaya Illinka, Berestki, Voznesenka, Sontsivka, Zora, Maksimilianivka, Dalnyi, Kurakhovo, and Antonivka. In the Vremivsk direction, two enemy assaults were repulsed near Trudovoy, in addition, the enemy dropped six guided aerial bombs in the area of ​​the settlement of Velika Novosilka. In the Orykhiv direction, the invaders use aviation in the Novodanilivka and Novoandriivka areas. In the Dnieper direction our defenders repelled one enemy attack. As reported by ArmyInform, the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine showed, >what awaits the Russian occupiers on Ukrainian soil.

Title: The church was not hit: about the Good News after the shelling of Sloviansk
Description: Summary of the devastating consequences of the enemy strike reported by the head of the Slavyansk City Military Administration Vadim Lyakh. Chaplain Oleksandr told ArmyInform correspondents more about the destruction caused by Russian shelling. From 10 a.m. in the main hall of the -Good News- Church in Sloviansk, the service is already underway. The pastor talks about today's shelling and the Lord's will. Citing the -Epistle to the Romans- (8:28), the apostle Paul emphasizes several times that God supports those who love Him in everything, so according to His Will, -all things work together for good- for them. It is hard not to agree with this - during today's shelling, an enemy ammunition hit the road asphalt a few meters from the Church building, due to which there were no victims, wounded and injured. As a pastor at the service, Chaplain Oleksandr agrees to talk about the explosion and its consequences. — This morning, at seven o'clock in the morning, it -flew- near the road to Shevchenko. We thank God that at that time there were almost no people in the building and that the Lord saved those who were here, they were not hurt. Maybe they were scared, but everyone is alive, healthy, unharmed, he says. -Road to Shevchenko- is Mir Street, the asphalt pavement of which was hit by a Russian munition. A little further, it adjoins Taras Shevchenko Street, at the beginning of which there is a monument to the poet. The building of the -Good News- Church was less fortunate - the explosion occurred just a few meters away from it. Debris and the blast wave destroyed part of the roof and floors, broke the panes in the windows, mutilated the doors. The destruction inside the building is also significant. Oleksandr says with comfort that before the service, many believers who live nearby responded to the request to come early and clean up the debris, put things in order in front of the church and in its mutilated premises. — Many thanks to the members of the church, people who come here to praise God. We just gave a little cry that help was needed, and people came. At 7 o'clock in the morning it -flew in- - and by 9 o'clock in the morning we had already removed the garbage. We have restored order in the hall, closed some broken windows on the floors and are conducting services, he says. The chaplain says that the -Good News- Church is an important center for the local community, which helps and supports the needy and internally displaced persons during the difficult times of the war. — When there is an opportunity, we provide humanitarian aid. We are trying to somehow influence the community, to help, because times are difficult and it is necessary to stick together, help each other, says the chaplain. The Good News Church played an important role in the life of the community even before the large-scale invasion. As early as 2020, an elementary school started working in its premises, and a Sunday school operated. The main impact of the powerful blast wave after today's impact came precisely on the wing of the church building in which the children's classes are located. Alexander shows mutilated classrooms with books scattered about. — Today we have a Sunday school, we provided them with another room, but those rooms intended for children suffered the most, he says without hiding his sadness. The blackboards in the classrooms have the same inscription: -February 23. Cool job.- It has not been erased since 2022 as a reminder of when the day school was suspended until a solid peace. Since then, classes with children took place only on Sundays within the Sunday school. Now they too are under threat, because many children, frightened by the shelling, did not come today. This is how the Russian occupiers continue to destroy centers of peaceful life in Ukraine - hitting children and adults, school classrooms and the Church. However, the way the believers rallied to eliminate the consequences of the enemy shelling testifies to the strength of the Slavic community, and the expeditious filling of the hole from the explosion by local utility workers shows the responsibility and effectiveness of the local authorities.   This is good news from Donetsk region. Photo by Ruslan Tarasov

Title: - Your genitals will be cut off - Russian commanders intimidate their soldiers so that they do not s...
Description: Andriy Otchenash, a serviceman of the 4th operational brigade of the National Guard -Rubizh-, told about this on ArmyTV stream. According to Andrii, the fighters of his brigade repeatedly recorded cases when Russians cut their own lives short in order not to be captured. -They are horrified as much as possible, they are told that we cut off the genitals of captives, abuse them, do some absolutely terrible things in the style of terrorists. And they are so afraid of it that it is easier for them to shoot themselves or blow themselves up with a grenade. Because of this fear, the occupiers do not surrender as often as they shoot,- said Andriy Otchenash. According to him, when the Russians do get captured, they are very surprised that they are not abused, but the norms of international law are applied to them. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the -Svoboda- battalions of the 4th operational brigade of the National Guard -Rubizh- caused great losses to the invaders who tried to break through our defenses.

Title: Kyiv region shuddered from Russia's strikes: there were numerous damages in the region
Description: Ruslan Kravchenko, the Head of Kyiv OVA, told about it. Air defense forces worked actively, they managed to shoot down enemy missiles and drones, which made it possible to avoid hitting critical and residential infrastructure. However, a 45-year-old woman suffered a head injury. All necessary medical assistance is provided. Falling debris from downed targets damaged infrastructure in four districts of the region. 21 private houses, 5 outbuildings, a shop, 2 garages, an administrative building and 5 cars were damaged. As a result of the shelling, emergency power cuts were introduced in the region, about 125,000 subscribers were left without electricity. Work on restoration of power supply continues. 466 unbreakable points have been deployed to support the population in conditions of blackouts. The authorities, together with international partners, are working to help the victims and restore the damaged infrastructure. As reported by ArmyInform, five-hour alarm: details of the combined attack on Kyiv.

Title: -Let's show you who's here daddy-: the border guard told what they are doing with the occupiers
Description: About this reported in the State Border Service of Ukraine. According to Sadak, the training included a detailed study of the material part of the weapon and active practical shooting at the range. -We're showing the occupiers who's dad here. We shot a significant number of zincs, which made it possible to prepare well, shoot and see what a grenade launcher is capable of,- the border guard shares. Its primary combat mission is to suppress enemy infantry. -The fire from our grenade launcher significantly helps our comrades. The occupiers have to hide from our MK-19, because its firepower is significantly superior,- the serviceman said. Sadok is convinced that everyone should take responsibility for the country's defense. -If not you, then who? If you don't stop the enemy here, you will have to do it at home. This cannot be allowed,- the border guard emphasizes.

Title: Terror in the Kherson region: the enemy attacked civilian cars and houses
Description: informs Kherson OVA about this. In the Dnipro district of Kherson, the enemy dropped an explosive device from a drone on a civilian car, resulting in the death of a man who was in the car. His identity is being established. Also, in this area, a 51-year-old woman was hit by a drone and was fatally wounded and died on the spot. Several more civilians were injured by the Russian attacks: In Komysany, a 60-year-old man suffered an explosive injury and concussion after dropping explosives from a drone. He is treated on an outpatient basis. In Kherson, a 62-year-old man suffered shrapnel wounds to his arm and leg as a result of an attack on a civilian car. Doctors provide him with the necessary assistance. Two men, 37 and 39 years old, were injured in the Dnipro district. They were diagnosed with mine-explosive injuries and shrapnel wounds. In addition, a 67-year-old woman was injured as a result of artillery shelling. Doctors are working on her recovery. Medical assistance is being provided to all victims, and the situation in the region remains difficult. As reported by ArmyInform, Russian troops shelled the Kherson region: There are wounded and infrastructure damage.

Title: They like to die at dawn - the Russians attack most from 5 to 7 in the morning
Description: About this on the ArmyTV stream public relations officer of the 37th marine brigade junior lieutenant Denis Bobkov . According to him, the Russians attack in small assault groups of 3 to 7 people. If such a group manages to move forward and gain a foothold, then a group of up to 20 fighters is already advancing towards it. According to Denis Bobkov, the Russians used a motorized rifle brigade, 2 tank battalions and special forces units in the offensive. -These are military personnel, with good equipment and weapons, with skills. These are not some -mobs-. Besides, they are well supported by artillery and mortars,- said Denys Bobkov. He said that the Russians almost do not use armored vehicles in assaults, instead they prefer light vehicles: motorcycles, cross-country and ordinary ones, including those with strollers, buggies, and cars. As reported by ArmyInform, our marines thinned out enemy assault groups.

Title: Lifetime disqualification - a group of Russian golfers was sent to the other world
Description: The video of the combat work was published on the unit's channel. -The Russians are continuing their assault in the Novooleksiivka area, they are making small advances, but they are suffering heavy losses. So, on November 16, our group burned two golf carts that the Orcs use to transport the landing party and eliminated 25 invaders (7 – 200 and 18 -300)... Now is an important moment when you need to press the enemy to the maximum and knock down their potential.- — commented on the video in the unit.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the -Sharp Cartouche- unit of the National Guard punished the occupiers for burning the Ukrainian house.

Title: Rescue workers showed the consequences of Russian shelling in several areas
Description: informs the State Emergency Service of Ukraine about this. In the morning, Russian troops attacked a critical infrastructure facility in Prykarpattia, which caused a fire. Rescuers promptly went to the scene and successfully extinguished the fire. According to preliminary information, there are no victims. As a result of a rocket attack on Poltava Oblast, one person was injured. The victim was admitted to the hospital. Rescue services are working to eliminate the consequences of the shelling. In the Zhytomyr district, a private household was damaged due to an enemy attack, an outbuilding and a residential building were damaged. Rescuers extinguished the fire with an area of ​​3 square meters. m. Fortunately, there were no casualties or fatalities. As reported by ArmyInform, Russia's massive strike: 120 missiles and 90 drones attacked Ukraine.

Title: The Armed Forces spoke about the decrease in the intensity of shelling in the northern regions of Uk...
Description: This was reported by the spokesperson of this OTU on the national telethon -Edyny Novyny- Colonel Vadym Mysnyk of the Defense Forces. -Over the last two days, we have observed a certain decrease in shelling especially on the border. This is connected, to some extent, with seasonal features. -Probably, the enemy is having logistical problems with the delivery of ammunition,- the officer noted. At the same time, the official representative of OTU -Siversk- ruled out the possibility of stopping such terrorist actions on the part of the Russians. -In addition to the fact that they terrorize the civilian population of the border with such actions, they also bind our forces, which we could use in other directions. In general, we control the situation on the border, we do not allow the enemy to bring equipment to the border, we destroy technical means,- stated Colonel Vadym Mysnyk. According to him, the creation of any large-scale enemy group to carry out offensive actions has not been recorded in the area of ​​responsibility of this OTU. As reported by ArmyInform, the aggressor from the depths of his territory inflicts up to 40 hits on Defense Force-controlled of the district of Ukraine in the Kursk region.

Title: Natasha hit! — a former kindergarten teacher shot down a Russian rocket
Description: On November 17 the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported on the accurate anti-aircraft gun . Natalya completed training courses at the training center lasting 5 months, mastering various types of portable anti-aircraft missile systems. -When the enemy missile appeared in front of me, I rejected all emotions and worries. I made hundreds of training launches on simulators, and here is the first combat one and on target!... MANPADS weighs about 18 kilograms, and the responsibility is also pressing. I am very glad that I succeeded. Already after combat work, I gave free rein to my emotions,- Nataliya said.   There are other female servicemen in her mobile fire group. -We are making maximum efforts to achieve the result, we are giving all our strength,- Nataliya Grabarchuk assured. In civilian life, she was a preschool teacher. Since 2021, she is in the Galicia-Volyn radio engineering brigade of the -West- air command. As reported by ArmyInform, our air defense knocked down more than 100 enemy missiles while repelling a record-breaking Russian attack.

Title: The commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces showed what awaits the Russian invaders on Ukrainian soil
Description: He published footage of combat work on his channel. This footage shows how the Ukrainian military effectively destroys enemy vehicles, weapons and personnel of the occupiers. -The fate of the Russian occupiers on our land: either to surrender, or to be destroyed by the soldiers of the Defense Forces of Ukraine, or to leave,- stressed Oleksandr Syrskyi. As reported by ArmyInform, 25 million dollars became dust: shots of the liquidation of the Tor-M2 air defense system.

Title: Today, our F-16 pilots shot down about 10 aerial targets — the President
Description: The President wrote about this on the afternoon of November 17. -Today, our F-16 pilots shot down about 10 air targets. The liquidation of the consequences of the combined attack on our infrastructure in the Rivne, Lviv, Dnipropetrovsk, Volyn and Odesa regions is now underway. Russian terrorists once again want to scare us with cold and lack of light. Repeating your actions again and trying to get a result from them. The whole world sees and knows that we are defending ourselves against an absolute evil that understands no language but force. We need unity, the world needs unity. Only together can we stop this evil,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. As reported by ArmyInform, our air defense knocked down more than 100 enemy missiles while repelling a record-breaking Russian attack.

Title: Numerous destructions in Donetsk region: the consequences of Russian strikes
Description: reported this by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. Several private houses were damaged in the Pokrovsky district, in particular in Hannivka of the Kurakhiv community. In Pokrovsk, shelling damaged a shop, as well as a house in Shevchenko and Uspenivka. In the Kramatorsk district, high-rise buildings and administrative buildings were damaged. Yes, 3 high-rise buildings and an administration building were damaged in Liman. In Druzhkivka, 18 houses were damaged, and in Kostyantynivka - 8 private houses, a high-rise building and 3 businesses. In Ivanopil, 10 private houses and an administrative building were damaged. In Bakhmut district, in particular in Chasovoyarsk community, 12 private houses, a high-rise building and a religious building were damaged. During the day, the enemy carried out 17 shellings on populated areas of Donetsk region. 159 people, including 10 children, were evacuated from the front line. As reported by ArmiyaInform, shrapnel wounds and destruction in Dnipro after the missile strike.

Title: Novogrodivka for the Russians - one of our battalions destroys two brigades of the Russian army near...
Description: The video of the everyday destruction of the occupiers was published on November 17 on the battalion's channel. -The command of these brigades is flooding the Pokrovsky direction with corpses. The occupiers go on meat assaults straight into the arms of -Skala-. The video shows only a small part of what we encounter every day. Everything will be -Rock-, - the battalion commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 425th assault battalion -Skala- ->knocked out the enemy from their positions and replenished the exchange fund.

Title: We don't play quack with them: nine tourists decided to test the dexterity of the border guards
Description: informs about this State Border Service of Ukraine. Border guards received anticipatory information from a unit of the Armed Forces of Ukraine regarding the movement of unknown persons in the direction of the border, to which they immediately responded. Nine men, residents of Kharkiv, Vinnytsia, Dnipropetrovsk, Khmelnytskyi and Kyiv regions, were found near the state border. As it turned out, those wishing to illegally enter neighboring Moldova received online navigation instructions from the Telegram channel administrator. The latter, in case of successful transfer of clients, was supposed to receive 120,000 to the bank card. hryvnias from each. During the detention, one of the group ran away, but the border guard and the service dog proved more agile. For the attempt to illegally cross the border, administrative protocols were drawn up against the men under Article 204-1 of the Code of Administrative Offenses, the cases were referred to the court. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: More than 100 enemy missiles were shot down - the work of our air defense in repelling a record-brea...
Description: This was announced on November 17 by the Air Force of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. In general, according to preliminary data, the radio engineering troops of the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine identified and escorted 210 enemy air targets: 120 missiles and 90 UAVs. By type, the Russians used the following weapons: — 1 hypersonic cruise missile 3M22 -Zircon-; — 8 Kh-47M2 -dagger- aeroballistic missiles; — 101 Kh-101 cruise missiles, -caliber-; — 1 Iskander-M ballistic missile; – 4 Kh-22/Kh-31P cruise/anti-radiation missiles; – 5 Kh-59/Kh-69 guided air missiles; – 90 attack UAVs/drones of an unspecified type. The enemy involved 7 Tu-160 and 16 Tu-95MS strategic bombers, 2 Tu-22M3 long-range bombers, 5 Su-34 fighter-bombers, 4 Su-27 fighters, 10 MiG-31K fighters, 4 cruise missile carriers for the air attack. . During the night, all available forces and means of air defense worked along the tracking route of missiles and drones. Aviation, anti-aircraft missile units, EW devices and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine were involved. According to preliminary data, as of 12:00 p.m., there is information about the downing of 144 air targets — 102 missiles and 42 unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs): – 1 3M22 -Zircon- hypersonic ship missile; – 7 Kh-47M2 -dagger- aeroballistic missiles; – 85 Kh-101 -Caliber- cruise missiles; – 4 Kh-22/Kh-31P cruise/anti-radio missiles; – 5 Kh-59/69 guided air missiles; – 42 attack UAVs/drones of an unspecified type (from Kursk, Orel, Primorsko-Akhtarsk regions - Russian Federation). As a result of active countermeasures by the Defense Forces, 41 enemy UAVs were lost in location in different regions of Ukraine, two more UAVs flew towards Russia and the temporarily occupied territory. Anti-aircraft defense worked in almost all regions of Ukraine — in Kyiv, Cherkasy, Kirovohrad, Chernihiv, Sumy, Kharkiv, Poltava, Odesa, Mykolaiv, Zaporizhia, Dnipropetrovsk, Zhytomyr, Vinnytsia, Khmelnytskyi, Ternopil, Ivano-Frankivsk, Rivne, Volyn and Lviv regions. As reported by ArmyInform, about massive strike Russian said President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi.

Title: Injured teenager and rescued dog: Odesa recovers from Russian attack
Description: This was informed Oleg Kiper, the head of Odesa OVA. There are interruptions in the supply of heat, water and electricity in the region. Emergency power outages are applied as directed by Ukrenergo. Hospitals and other critical infrastructure facilities operate with the help of generators. All authorized services are working to repair the damage. At the moment, specialists are taking all possible measures to restore heat and water supply within a few hours. Energy workers are continuously working to eliminate the consequences of shelling. On the morning of the 10th, 445 points were deployed in the region. Another 357 will be opened additionally if necessary. In addition, as a result of the shelling, fires broke out in three private houses, four more houses were partially destroyed. Also, two people died from the Russian attack. A 17-year-old boy was also injured. Currently, doctors are providing him with all the necessary assistance. A psychologist from the State Emergency Service provided assistance to local residents. Rescuers also found a lost dog and handed it over to its owners. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of November 17 Russian troops carried out a massive combined attack on all regions of Ukraine, using about 120 missiles of various types, including -Zirkon-, -Iskander-, -Kinjal-, as well as about 90 drones, including -Shaheed-. The enemy's target was the country's energy infrastructure.

Title: A minimum of 20 tickets to the kobzon - in the South HIMARS - tickets - Russian attack aircraft
Description: The video of the damage was published on the Internet. The occupiers gathered in a forest strip near the settlement of Tavriya, Vasylivsky District, Zaporizhzhia. And it was there that the HIMARS missiles arrived, which provided funeral payments to at least 20 Russian families. Our gunners did not stop there and accompanied the attempts of the remnants of the invaders to escape with a cluster munition strike. Be sure to watch the video to the end:   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the Black Forest artillery reconnaissance brigade were able to track down the 39N6 -Kasta-2E2- long-range detection radar and impress her.

Title: 14 countries are financing the mine action project in Ukraine
Description: reports this by the Main Directorate of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security. The event was attended by representatives of the Secretariat of the National Mine Action Authority, the Mine Action Center, the Ministry of Economy of Ukraine, other authorities and international donors. According to the Permanent Representative of UNDP in Ukraine Yako Silje, this year the main focus was on supporting the development of the National Mine Action Strategy for 2024-2033, as well as its operational plan for 2024-2026. Within the scope of the project, the following was carried out: The head of the mine countermeasures department, Colonel Oleg Shuvarskyi, thanked UNDP and donors for their contribution to the reduction of the territories of Ukraine potentially contaminated by explosive objects by 35,000. km².
