I am referring to those camps that serve to train units that leave for replenishment, rotations, etc. Currently, these camps are filled with new contract workers by about 70%, and by 30% — those who are assigned to rotation from the front line. This is the first time, because before that the camps were filled to 100%, and those allocated for rotation were located either in the north of the Mariupol district or on the territory of the Ilyich plant. Now the trend is different, and this means that the Russians do not have time to replenish their manpower in accordance with the losses they are suffering,- Petro Andryushchenko summarized. As ArmyInform wrote, in June 2024 the first enemy tanker entered the port of Mariupol since the Russian occupation, probably to provide fuel for military equipment and equipment on the front line.

Title: Russian aircraft attacked Sloviansk: one person died
Description: This was reported by the head of the Slavyansk City Military Administration, Vadym Lyah. -It's a bad morning in Sloviansk today. Last night, around half past eight, the city was shelled. Hitting the industrial zone on the outskirts. Unfortunately, one person died,- said the official and expressed his condolences to his family and friends. The devastating consequences of hitting enemy aircraft ammunition were recorded by ArmyInform. Explosions of enemy ammunition of an unknown type caused significant destruction to several industrial and economic buildings. The impact caused a fire, as a result of which a civilian vehicle parked next to the buildings burned down. In addition to the man, a dog guarding the territory was killed by the Russian shelling. The invading and occupying forces of the Russian Federation continue to bring death and destruction to peaceful Ukrainian cities. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the morning of the 14 In November, Russian troops shelled the Donbas State Pedagogical University. Photo by Ruslan Tarasov

Title: The occupiers began to bring military equipment to the Kurakhiv direction by an unusual route
Description: Such observations were shared by the adviser to the mayor of Mariupol Petro Andryushchenko in Efiri Public on Saturday, November 16. -We haven't seen such activity for a long time, at least a year and a half. This activity is quite unusual and sometimes looks chaotic. What is the difference from what was before? We see that all kinds of military equipment (tanks, armored personnel carriers, armored personnel carriers) are being pulled. All of them come from the direction of Berdyansk or Pologiv (from the Zaporizhzhia region). And then, through Mariupol, it moves north, towards Volnovakha,- said Petro Andryushchenko. According to him, military equipment continues to take part in the Kurakhiv offensive of the Russians, but it is unusual that it is coming from the Zaporizhzhia region. Previously, 90 percent of the equipment moved from the territory of the Russian Federation and further through either Mariupol or Granitne, but definitely not from the Zaporizhzhia direction. reinforcements where their greatest point of effort is currently,- added Petro Andryushchenko. He emphasized that a large number of trucks of all kinds, dumping of ammunition were also recorded. -And this is also unusual. Because they dismantle the operational-tactical warehouses located on the territory of the Mariupol, Berdyansky, Rozivsky districts. That is, what they did as reserves when they were preparing for the offensive in the Zaporozhye direction — all this is removed, reformatted and thrown in the direction of Volnovakha and Kurakhovo,- says the adviser to the mayor of Mariupol. As reported by ArmyInform, last day in the Kurakhiv direction The defense forces repelled 35 attacks. The occupiers tried to advance in the areas of Berestki, Novoselidivka, Voznesenka, Novodmytrivka, Maksimilianivka, Dalnyi and Antonivka.

Title: In Chernihiv Oblast, the Russian tricolor installed by the enemy DRG was destroyed
Description: This was reported to the DPSU. After detecting the Russian symbols, the border guards quickly directed the drones to the target, which destroyed the -rags- with precise strikes. At the same time, the intelligence conducted indicated that the Russian subversive-reconnaissance group left the area before the flags were removed, not daring to take further actions. -The enemy continues to try to impose his -victories- and psychological pressure, without any military sense. We urge you not to succumb to the informational and psychological influences of the enemy,- – emphasized in DPSU. As ArmiyaInform reported, on November 15, Russian propagandists spread information about the alleged -entry- to the village of Gremyach. The DPSU denied it was noted that the enemy DRG planted a flag near the border on the destroyed bridge over the Sudost River.

Title: Driver drill: the GUR told how Russia solves the problem with the shortage of junior officers
Description: This was reported to the GUR of the MOU. On the basis of civilian higher educational institutions, the aggressor state creates military training centers where basic training of platoon commanders, artillery batteries and deputy company commanders is to be conducted. A junior officer of the enemy army primarily performs the function of an infantry chaser for an assault directly on the battlefield, which explains the high level of casualties and, as a result, the acute shortage of lieutenants in Russia. The Kremlin began to establish a mechanism for training and uninterrupted supply of junior officers for the war against Ukraine in the first year of the full-scale invasion. According to the enemy's plans, by the end of 2024, 33 new military training centers were to be launched in Russia in addition to almost a hundred existing ones. Another activation of leaders in Moscow to drill even more fresh lieutenants shows that the personnel crisis of the command staff of the Russian occupation army is deepening.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, fortitude, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , I decree: to start holding a nationwide minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, to be announced in all mass media regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Air Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine: 53 UAVs were shot down during the enemy's night attack
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The enemy also attacked with 83 attack UAVs of the Shahed type and unmanned aerial vehicles of an unknown type from the regions of Kursk, Orel, Primorsko-Akhtarsk — Russia. As of 08:30, the downing of 53 enemy UAVs in Cherkasy, Odesa, Kyiv, Zhytomyr, Sumy, Mykolaiv, Kirovohrad, Poltava, Zaporizhzhya, Kharkiv and Khmelnytskyi regions has been confirmed. As a result of active countermeasures by the Defense Forces, 30 enemy UAVs were lost in various regions of Ukraine.

Title: In the Pokrovsky direction, the Armed Forces of Ukraine stopped 38 enemy attacks
Description: This is stated in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 08:00 16 November In the Kharkiv direction the enemy stormed the positions of our troops nine times in the areas of the settlements of Visoka Yaruga and Vovchansk. In the Kupyansk direction, 17 attacks by the occupiers took place during the day. Defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Kolisnikivka, Kopanok and Nadia. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked 16 times. Tried to wedge into our defenses near Novoyehorivka, Makiivka, Terni and Torskyi. Two skirmishes took place near Verkhnokamyanskyi and Vyimka in the Siversky direction. In the Kramatorsk direction, the occupiers attacked once in the area of ​​White Mountain. In the direction of Toretsk, the enemy, supported by aviation, carried out nine attacks near Toretsk, Dilyivka and Shcherbinivka. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 38 assault and offensive actions of the aggressor towards the settlements of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Lysivka, Petrivka and Pustinka. In the Kurakhiv direction Defense forces repelled 35 attacks. The occupiers tried to advance in the areas of Berestki, Novoselidivka, Voznesenka, Novodmytrivka, Maksimilianivka, Dalnyi and Antonivka. In the Vremivsk direction the enemy carried out seven assaults on our positions in the areas of Trudovoy, Rivnopol and Novodarivka. Actively used attack and bomber aircraft for strikes on the direction. On the Orihiv direction, the occupiers attacked once in the direction of Novoandriivka, without success. In the Dnieper direction, the Russian invaders tried five times to dislodge our units from their positions. They were repulsed and suffered losses. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. On the border with the Chernihiv and Sumy regions, the enemy from the territory of the Russian Federation is actively using artillery and aviation in the areas of Ukrainian settlements. The operation in the Kursk region is ongoing. Over the past day, Ukrainian defenders repelled 30 enemy attacks in the direction. Enemy aviation continues to attack its territory with guided aerial bombs. Currently, 15 air strikes using 19 anti-aircraft missiles are known. Our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying forces and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. In general, the Russian invaders lost 1,650 people in the past day. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed eight tanks, 26 armored combat vehicles, 28 artillery systems, 28 UAVs of the operational-tactical level, 69 vehicles and six units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: In the Kherson region, one person was killed and another 10 were injured due to enemy shelling
Description: This reported the head of the Kherson Regional State Administration Oleksandr Prokudin. Antonivka, Stanislav, Berislav, Bilozerka, Odradokam’yanka, Sadove, Yantarne, Tomarine, Shlyakhove, Novoberislav, Novovorontsovka, Oleksandrivka, Kozatske, Osokorivka and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes. the Russian military targeted the territory of a critical infrastructure object, an educational institution and a private enterprise. There are also hits in the residential quarters of the populated areas of the region, in particular, the Russians damaged 4 high-rise buildings and 9 private houses. The occupiers also mutilated a gas pipeline and private cars. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day the occupiers inflicted 464 strikes on 17 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region. A 67-year-old man died during shelling by enemy artillery in Pologiv district.

Title: He embezzled funds collected for a unit of the Armed Forces: the military officer was informed of su...
Description: This was reported by the Office of the Prosecutor General. In this way, the suspect took possession of the victims' money in the total amount of more than 357 thousand hryvnias. Under the procedural guidance of the prosecutors of the General Prosecutor's Office, the serviceman was informed of the suspicion of taking possession of someone else's property by deception (fraud), committed on a large scale (Part 3 of Article 190 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). As part of the criminal investigation, law enforcement officers searched the suspect's place of residence. At present, the serviceman has been served with a request to choose a preventive measure - detention. As reported by ArmyInform, in Dnipropetrovsk detained the commander of the military unit, who forced servicemen build houses for mother and mother-in-law. If they refused to work, the commander threatened to send them to the front line in the hottest spots. Military personnel did not report for duty for almost three years, but received full monthly allowance, including additional remuneration for their performance of combat (special) tasks

Title: The Ministry of Defense reported on the first results regarding changing the place of service throug...
Description: This was reported by Deputy Minister of Defense for Digitalization Kateryna Chernogorenko on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novy- . -As of this moment, 610 completed, signed and sent reports are registered in the system. We see this as a strong response rate from service members and hope this feature becomes popular,- – said Kateryna Chernogorenko on Friday evening. On November 15, the Army+ started work function, which simplifies the submission of reports on the change of place of service. Now all you need is a copy of your military ID (or officer's ID) and a letter of recommendation from your new brigade. For private and non-commissioned officers, permission from the acting commander is no longer required. The personnel center of the Armed Forces processes documents according to a clearly defined procedure within 72 hours. If there are no reasons for refusal, the serviceman receives a notification about the result of the review in the Army+ application. And in the case of a negative decision, a notification of the reasons for refusal.

Title: Armed Forces Navy: Russia hid all ships in the Black and Azov seas
Description: This was notified by the Naval Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. There are two enemy ships in the Mediterranean Sea, one of which is a carrier of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 16 missiles. In the interests of the Russian Federation, 7 ships passed through the Kerch Strait to the Black Sea during the day, 5 of them continued their movement in the direction of the Bosphorus Strait. 6 ships were heading to the Sea of ​​Azov, of which 3 were moving from the Bosphorus Strait. -the Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea of ​​1974 (SOLAS) by turning off automatic identification systems,- the Navy of the Ukrainian Armed Forces emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, Russia is forced to -okupovanomu-krymu/->raise large forces for air defense and other military infrastructure to maintain control over the temporarily occupied Crimea.

Title: The defense forces eliminated 1,650 invaders and destroyed 26 armored vehicles during the day
Description: This is evidenced by the data on the total combat losses of the enemy, which was published by in the morning of November 16, the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The losses from 24.02.22 to 16.11.24 are estimated to be: The data is being verified... As reported by ArmyInform, last day at the front 157 combat clashes took place. The largest number of battles took place in the Pokrovsky and Kurakhiv directions.

Title: The enemy shelled 17 settlements in the Zaporizhzhia region, one person was killed
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA. A 67-year-old man died during shelling by enemy artillery in Pologiv district. Russian troops carried out 24 airstrikes on Odarivka, Lobkovo, Stepovo, Orikhov, Temyrivka, and Novoandriivka. 275 UAVs of various modifications attacked Zaporizhzhia, Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Zaliznychne, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novomykolaivka, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghir'ya, Novodarivka and Gulyaipole. 6 hits from the anti-aircraft missile system covered Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Novodarivka and Chervone. 159 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriyivka, Novodanilivka, Malaya Tokmachka, Biloghirya, Novodarivka and Malynyvka. 15 reports were received about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities.

Title: Defense forces repelled 35 attacks in the Pokrovsky direction and 21 in Kurshchyna
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff ZSU as of 22:00 on November 15. In the Kharkiv direction the enemy tried to storm our positions near Vovchansk and Visoka Yaruga. Seven attacks were repulsed by the defense forces, two clashes are ongoing. The losses of the enemy so far in the direction amounted to 68 servicemen killed and wounded, two units of motor vehicles, 13 unmanned aerial vehicles and a unit of special equipment of the enemy were destroyed; two cars and two units of special equipment were also damaged. Kupyansk direction: the enemy carried out offensive actions near Kolisnikivka, Kopanok and Nadia. 14 battles have been completed, one is still ongoing. In the Lyman direction Russian invaders stormed the positions of the Defense Forces near Novoyehorivka, Makiivka, Terni and Torsky 16 times. Ukrainian defenders stopped all enemy attacks. Northern direction: the enemy once stormed our positions near Verkhnokamyansk. In the Toretsk direction, with the support of bomber aircraft, the enemy carried out nine assault operations. The invaders stormed the positions of Ukrainian units near Toretsk, Dilyivka and Shcherbinivka. Eight attacks of the aggressor were repelled, the battle continues in the Toretsk area. Pokrovsky direction: since the beginning of the day, the enemy has attacked 35 times in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promeny, Lysivka, Petrivka, and Pustinka. Our defenders repelled 34 attacks, one combat clash is still ongoing. According to available data at that time, the losses of the enemy amounted to 373 servicemen killed and wounded; 12 armored combat vehicles, two tanks, nine cars, two artillery systems, anti-tank missiles and electronic warfare systems were destroyed by Ukrainian defenders; our soldiers also damaged the occupiers' car. In the Kurakhiv direction, the invaders attacked 34 times near Berestki, Novoselidivka, Voznesenka, Novodmytrivka, Maksimilianivka, Dalnyi and Antonivka. 14 attacks of the occupiers have already been repelled, the fighting continues. In the Vremivsk direction fighting continues near Trudovoy, Rivnopol and Novodarivka, the situation is under control. In the Dnieper direction The Defense Forces of Ukraine stopped five attempts by the occupiers to attack our positions. In Kurshchyna, our defenders repelled 21 enemy attacks, three skirmishes are ongoing at this time. In other directions, there are no significant changes.

Title: Transformers go into battle: the British army was offered a new version of a light protected patrol ...
Description: How howled not without advertising bragging representatives of the manufacturing company in a release on their official portal, thanks to the modular design Foxhound is the best vehicle for light infantry and special operations forces during combat missions. The vehicle provides a high level of field-proven protection, reliability and availability, as well as the ability to adapt, ArmiyaInform reports. This project is under development. And as informed by the company General Dynamics Land Systems - Great Britain, which has been operating since 2012, its enterprises previously supplied the British Army with 400 basic Foxhound models (also known under the global brand of General Dynamics Land Systems - -Ocelot-). About these armored vehicles, reporters of our editorial office mentioned in one from defense industry reviews. The Foxhound GMRV is designed to operate in the most challenging environments, demonstrating a combination of protection, mobility and flexibility. Experts of the defense publication Army Recognition, who got acquainted with the new armored vehicle at the Defense Vehicle Dynamics (DVD) arms exhibition held in the British Millbrook in September of this year, announced that its modular design offers a significant advantage in allowing the vehicle to adapt to different mission requirements. The platform can be configured for multiple roles with the help of a newly developed mission module, which provides, according to the machine's developers, -unparalleled operational efficiency-. The GMRV variant includes a highly secure crew compartment with advanced self-defense weapons that can be controlled directly from the inside, ensuring optimal crew safety. In addition, the vehicle's design has been shaped to accommodate a NATO-standard pallet in the rear, offering endless transformative possibilities for integrating complex mission systems. They can include weapons for short-range air defense (SHORAD) and other mission-critical technologies that go beyond the traditional patrol car. By improving protection and firepower while retaining the core capabilities of the original Foxhound, the GMRV is set to be a game changer for military operations. General Dynamics UK is keen to use this new option for both the British Army and international allies, focusing on export opportunities for partners around the world. The vehicle is entirely designed, engineered and manufactured in the United Kingdom, ensuring quality control and compliance with the national defense industrial strategy. The original Foxhound LPPV has long been renowned for its protection and mobility in high-risk environments. This new variant of the GMRV carries on this legacy, but with significant improvements in operational flexibility and modular integration. The ability to seamlessly switch between roles — from patrol to air defense — without the need for a completely different vehicle underscores its value on the modern battlefield. As military forces around the world face increasingly complex operational landscapes, the Foxhound GMRV is poised to offer a solution that can evolve with these changing requirements. With design and manufacturing firmly rooted in the UK, the car is also a testament to its defense capability and commitment to innovation. A total of 52 new GMRV vehicles will be delivered to UK Army units by March 2025, according to a statement from General Dynamics Land Systems - UK. Presentation of the light protected patrol vehicle Foxhound GMRV. Video: Military Center Line

Title: Battles in the Kursk region: how the artillerymen of the 82nd brigade of the DSHV organized the Kurs...
Description: A key role in the destruction of the forces and means of the Russian Federation in Kurshchyna is played by the artillery of the ZSU, which works almost 24/7. ArmyInform visited units of the 82nd separate amphibious assault Bukovynia brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, which are carrying out combat missions in Kurshchyna. The commander of the artillery division, Major Ivan Bakrev, told our correspondents about the first days of the Kursk operation, how artillery calculations manage to destroy military targets of the Russian Federation, what artillery systems are used by our defenders and what is the most difficult part of the artillerymen's work: -In July, we received a combat mission from the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In the shortest possible time, planning was carried out, a plan was developed. After that, it was necessary to move the artillery from the concentration area to the future area of ​​combat missions as soon as possible. Artillery was transferred covertly so that the enemy would not find out. One or two cannons at night, so that they did not notice that we were gathering forces here. Before the beginning of the Kursk offensive operation, with the help of aerial reconnaissance, we identified the front edge of the enemy, planned the objects of attack and their detailed fire damage. Everything has been thought through to the smallest detail. The sector of fire of my artillery division was determined. And as further developments showed, the enemy was not ready for this. In the first hours of the offensive of units of our brigade, the enemy was hit by fire. Moreover, it is quite effective, because the enemy retreated, at some points simply ran. Our gunners hit enemy platoon and company strongholds and even individual combat positions very quickly and accurately. The offensive developed quite dynamically. Next, they hit manpower, military equipment, and places of concentration of enemy personnel. The Russians were not given a single chance. Even later, after we started advancing in depth, the enemy did not know where we were exactly. This helped us a lot. Then the enemy began to transfer his reserves. And we, accordingly, destroyed them. They worked in convoys of motor vehicles, where they mainly transported personnel and mortar weapons, hit armored combat vehicles. Our drones very often detected the enemy's field artillery depots. the Russians just accumulated a certain number of shells, and we immediately destroyed them. On the armament of my artillery division is towed artillery. These are Soviet-style D-30 guns (caliber 122 mm) and British M119 howitzers are NATO-style 105 mm. M119 shows good combat capabilities: a very mobile gun, takes up little space, so it is convenient for camouflage and movement. Its most important feature is that it accurately hits the targets. The range of combat use on standard ammunition is 11.7 thousand. m. Also, projectiles can reach the cannon up to 20 km. But the 105-caliber ammunition itself would like better. Unfortunately, it gives few fragments and an impressive effect on the enemy. On the other hand, if working for counter-battery, rockets are a pretty good option. After all, the M119s are located at a short distance from the front edge and, accordingly, they can be used normally at a long range, in the depth of the enemy's battle formations. D-30 cannons are mainly used to destroy the enemy's manpower and firepower located in trenches, trenches, communication passages and strongholds, as well as outside shelters. We also work with them on the accumulation of enemy troops. The effective firing range of these guns is up to 15 km. Here, in Kurshchyna, in the modern conditions of the combat situation, we do not work in the classic version in the composition of platoons and batteries. A reconnaissance fire complex (RVK) is used to destroy the enemy's manpower and equipment. It consists of means of detecting the enemy (quadrocopters, Mavics, outlays, etc. - ed.), artillery means of destruction, and the third element is the management of units, which is carried out during the execution of combat missions. Ideally, this is how it works: there are calculations of UAV operators who conduct reconnaissance of enemy targets and provide through communications means of targeting for use in combat calculations of guns. A fire damage decision is made and boom, shells fly where they need to go. An interesting moment with the movement of the RVC deep into the territory of the Russian Federation. At first, the gunners worked from the border area on targets, then some RVCs remained in their places to cover the units of the airborne assault battalions, and other fire groups have already begun to move deep into the Kursk region. They quickly moved, took up firing positions, disguised themselves and inflicted fire damage. Then, in a chess order, other artillery units that were behind were gradually moved. In this way, it was possible to destroy the enemy quickly, without revealing one's location. At the beginning of the operation, the Starlink system helped us a lot in combat work. This is for general situational awareness, i.e. where the enemy is and transmitting the coordinates of targets to hit them. But Starlink no longer operated on the territory of the Russian Federation. Therefore, there were difficulties with communication, they worked at radio stations. This problem had to be solved as soon as possible. After all, the situation in Kurshchyna was developing quickly and it was necessary to establish cooperation in the battle with other units of the brigade and our neighbors. A system of military communications repeaters of domestic production was deployed. These repeaters then performed quite well in data transmission and situational awareness on the ground. Therefore, already in the process of such intensive hostilities, we solved the issue of communication. There were no problems with the supply of ammunition at all. Art shells were always delivered in plenty. The results of combat work eloquently testify to this. When the enemy performs his actions effectively, I already understand accordingly how I need to improve to reduce his effectiveness. This applies to countering FPV drones, various types of drones, counter-battery. Another important question. Use of EW means against enemy drones. Our priority targets are the enemy's reserves, air defense systems and ROPs, manpower concentrations, combat vehicles used to transport personnel and weapons to the front line. The exact number of enemy vehicles and personnel affected is difficult to determine. Fighting continues. From what is confirmed: our fire groups destroyed five artillery pieces, 4 mortars. This is within the limits of counter-battery only. In terms of manpower and armored vehicles, I can't tell you until the end, because the number of losses of the Rashits is simply huge. We try to destroy the enemy even on the approach to the front edge. We determine in what ways they throw up personnel, plan -meeting points-. The cannons are already aimed at us. If one gun does not have time to work, another joins in the work. The work is very hard, but it is worth it. The other day we discovered about seven or eight enemy armored vehicles. Some cars were driving in a chaotic manner, it was clear that they were lost, while others were moving purposefully. So, in just one day, the consumption of shells on these targets amounted to 270 shells. I think the consumption of ammunition in other artillery units was no less. They worked very powerfully, destroyed everything that moved in our direction. Before the beginning of the Kursk operation, it so happened that in my division, the full-time personnel complement was slightly more than 50%. Completed combat calculations actually from wheels. But the guys who were already here in the art division and those who came to us were very motivated, they all wanted to beat the occupiers on their territory, in a word, they were charged for success. Therefore, those who joined us quickly learned to act as part of calculations, mastered the intricacies of artillery in order to effectively strike the enemy in battle. There is no need to motivate the boys in any way, everyone is conscious and responsible, and most importantly, they are professionals. Personnel training is conducted constantly in concentration areas. If the situation permits, when one gun remains unengaged, the training is conducted by the battery sergeants-majors. We analyze the experience of combat operations, enemy tactics, analyze our shortcomings in combat work. I will give you an example. There are experienced gun commanders in the division who came from other artillery units. And they pleasantly surprised me with their work, their attitude to their duties. So, we give them targets, and they completely perform accurate calculations of data to shoot, adjust fire and, as a result, destroy the enemy and his important objects. Worked with one gun commander who had recently arrived. His guys know everything and are able to do all the necessary measures at firing positions. The main thing: they work exactly according to their goals. Where there is a responsible commander, there is discipline and efficiency. This is very gratifying. Once, enemy FPV drones wanted to hit the cannon of this commander three times. Thanks to the concerted actions of his team, the cannon was kept in operational condition and the soldiers themselves survived. The howitzer was well camouflaged. Countering enemy drones in general is key right now. Well done guys! The hardest part, unfortunately, was the loss of our personnel. The Kursk operation is very hard daily combat work. It's not easy here. At the beginning, of course, there were constant worries and sleepless nights. It was necessary to effectively establish a system of combat control and communication deployment. It was very difficult for the personnel at the firing positions in the Kursk region. There, gunners work at their maximum. Plus, the correct choice of fire positions, adjustment of moments for logistical support. There was a lot of useful information for us. Taking into account the experience of combat operations, we -entrusted- some points in preparation, in the general conduct of combat operations, as well as in the construction of battle orders: what to include in this battle order, what to add, and what, for example, we do not need and the like. Photo by Oleksandr Marchenko and the communications department of the 82nd separate airborne assault Bukovynia brigade of the Ukrainian Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine

Title: Loss of a combatant's ID card: how to restore it
Description: ArmiyaInform tells how to restore the document. Currently, there are several options for obtaining a new ID. If we are talking about an active serviceman, then a report to the commander of the military unit is required. If you are released from military service, you should contact the TCC and SP in which you are registered. You can also contact the Ministry of Veterans, if you received the status of UBD through the interdepartmental commission created under this ministry. Certain documents must also be attached to the report or application. The type of report, as well as which documents need to be attached to it, depends on the circumstances. In such a case, the following documents should be attached to the report: This happens periodically, taking into account the realities of military life. So, if the certificate has become unusable, then the following documents are attached to the report: This also happens from time to time, because no one and nothing is safe from shelling. So, if the certificate was destroyed, first of all, an official investigation should be conducted in the area. And on its basis, recovery will be carried out. You will only need to submit two 3 x 4 cm color photo cards on matte paper. Samples of all three types of reports can be found here. Also, ArmyInform has already written about how to UBD status, at what benefits can a combatant expect and how to use these preferences.

Title: propaganda spreads a fake video calling for a fight against the DPRK military
Description: This animated video is about Ukraine's victory over the Mongol-Tatars. And the emphasis is on the phrase -They were able to then! We can do it now!-. However, this is a fake, reports by Gwara Media. The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine did not make any videos with appeals to fight against the North Korean military. The characters in the video are stock artwork that anyone can download to use in their animations. Moreover, such animated characters had already been used by propagandists earlier in a video that was distributed in the Russian segment of the Internet at the end of January 2024. At that time, Ukrainian farmers were offered to -send their roosters to the front- to make them combat fighters. Cartoon animation is voiced by a female voice recorded with the help of Google Translate. The fake number is also indicated by the incorrect number of the Ministry of Defense hotline. With such videos, the enemy tries to ridicule Ukrainians and discredit the Defense Forces of Ukraine. And also to sow fear about the possible participation of Korean military personnel in the war.

Title: Two pseudo-deputies of the occupation city councils of Donetsk and Makiivka were informed of the sus...
Description: reports this by the Donetsk Regional Prosecutor's Office. In June 2023, a resident of Makiivka joined the so-called state-building process in the fake republic. The man registered as a candidate for the deputy of the -city council- from the -United Russia- party. 2 months later, with the aim of being elected to the -city council- of her city by the same police force, the ex-director of the gymnasium also submitted documents for registration. Donetsk, which already had experience in conducting -election- processes. According to the falsified results, they received the coveted -deputy- mandates. -Yedinoros- participate in the meetings of fake bodies of the -DNR-, helping the aggressor state to establish its power in captured settlements. We remind you, military counterintelligence and investigators of the Security Service with the assistance of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the commander of the SSO, a -de-canned- agent of the Russian military intelligence (better known as game).

Title: In order to get to the territory of the -lnr-, people have to go through a long filtering process
Description: This reports the head of Luhansk OVA Artem Lysogor. The vast majority of people do not pass these checks. In addition, FSB employees recently began to warn all men about urgent military registration and ask for their consent to enter into a contract with the Russian army. Personal data of those who refuse are entered in a separate list. Before the large-scale invasion, the residents of Staro Bil, like other residents of the free Luhansk region, received hundreds of public services either online or within a few minutes at the National Center for Public Health. In the territories occupied by Russia, digitization takes place only on paper. And the more pieces of paper, the better. Therefore, an extract from the relevant register is not enough to receive a certificate of family composition. To confirm the number of people living at the specified address, you should bring neighbors who must certify this in writing, if, of course, they want to help for free. We remind you, the invaders staged an assault positions of Ukrainian defenders near Balka Zhuravka.

Title: The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces showed how powerful and steadfast our soldiers are
Description: He published footage of combat work on his channel. The video shows how the Ukrainian military effectively destroys enemy vehicles, weapons and personnel of the occupiers. -We will destroy the Russian invaders until they leave our land- , Oleksandr Syrskyi stressed, stressing the steadfastness of the Ukrainian army in the fight for the liberation of the country. As reported by ArmyInform, paratroopers showed how they rescue the wounded at the stab post.

Title: Volodymyr Zelenskyy addressed the students and teachers of the VVNIZ of Colombia about the importanc...
Description: This was stated by the Head of State during his address. What this future will be depends on each of us today - people who live in different corners of the world, but have the same understanding of such concepts as freedom and justice. -This is an attempt to restore the colonial empire, to enslave our people, to take away our freedom and right to choose. Colombians who survived the struggle against colonialism know what it is like. They know how cruel invaders can be, how they try to break your resistance and how important it is to fight, defend your freedom and the right of every people to live independently, to preserve their identity,- the President emphasized. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also emphasized, during a conversation with students and teachers of higher education institutions in Colombia, about the Ukrainian struggle against Russian aggression, the importance of the Peace Formula, responsibility for war crimes and the reaction of the world community to the involvement of the North Korean military in the war. We remind you that the President of Ukraine told about the key areas of the internal stability plan.

Title: Ukrainian FPV drones have passed tests for resistance to enemy EW
Description: This was reported by the Deputy Prime Minister for Innovation, Education, Science and Technology. Minister of Digital Transformation of Ukraine Mykhailo Fedorov. The tests took place during the DEMO DAY training ground, organized with the support of the Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Colonel Andrii Lebedenko. Drones from 20 development teams took part in the testing. The drones were checked on a 6-kilometer area with the active operation of EW devices. As Mykhailo Fedorov pointed out, EW-resistant drones demonstrate the ability to fly to the target and perform combat tasks, which is critically important for increasing the effectiveness of strikes on the front. -Enemy EW is one of the main problems on the battlefield: it can stop our drones or prevent them from completing their missions. The creation of REB-resistant drones is a breakthrough that will significantly increase the number of successful operations,- the minister emphasized. A video of the tests is available for viewing, which shows how the drones cope with the impact of enemy EW systems. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine has become one from the world capitals in the field of drone technology and now offers its experience to Europe as a foundation for European security.

Title: The Construction Service of Ukraine — a new format of combat training: the commander who forced subo...
Description: This is reported by the State Bureau of Investigation. The servicemen did not show up for duty for almost three years, but received full monthly allowance, including additional remuneration for their performance of combat (special) tasks. The total amount of losses to the state is 2.5 million hryvnias. Law enforcement officers conducted 12 searches at the place of residence and work of the commander and his subordinates, as well as in the cars they use. During the investigation, documents related to accrued and paid wages to military personnel, information on their -representation- in daily uniforms, personal files, mobile phones, and draft records regarding construction were seized. The commander of the military unit was detained and reported on suspicion of abuse of power and official authority, committed under martial law, which caused serious consequences (Part 5 of Article 426-1 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). The sanction of the article provides for punishment in the form of imprisonment for a term of up to 12 years. We remind you that the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine is studying information about the incident. with the use of weapons by an employee of the territorial procurement center in Shchaslyvo.

Title: Russians continue to drive public servants into the ranks of their dictator's party for the rest of ...
Description: About this preports Center of National Resistance. The leaders of the occupation institutions received a request to provide lists of those who are still not members of the ruling party. In the future, such people are interviewed, where in fact they are forced to write an application for joining the party. In addition to the purely propagandistic goal of allegedly supporting the course of the ruling dictator, such coercion is aimed at tying Ukrainians into a circular bond, because the Russians systematically scare Ukrainians that they are all collaborators and have no place in the Motherland, which is not true. We remind you, The enemy continues to invent various attempts to cross the Siverskyi Donets-Donbas channel, along which our line of defense runs.

Title: The Ministry of Defense presented a study of the environmental consequences of the use of new types ...
Description: notifies the Main Directorate of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security. A round table dedicated to the challenges of using new technologies in armed conflicts and their compliance with international humanitarian law was held in the capital. The event was attended by scientists, international experts and representatives of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The main topic of discussion was the impact of autonomous weapons systems on the civilian population and the environmental consequences of such actions. The participants also shared their experience regarding international mechanisms for the examination of new types of weapons and their environmental assessment. The position of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine was voiced by Colonel Serhii Savchenko, who presented developments in the field of environmental security during the introduction of new types of weapons. The event will be part of a wider dialogue, the continuation of which is planned for the end of the month in Krakow (Poland), where the results of Ukrainian efforts will be presented. As reported by ArmyInform, scientists and business have joined forces to clear the territories of mines and pollution.

Title: A shooting occurred in the Kyiv region during the implementation of warning measures
Description: This is inform the Ground Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. It included, in particular, military personnel of the RTCC and SP, employees of the National Police and the -Municipal Guard- of the community. The alert group checked the documents of drivers and passengers of cars moving on community roads. During one of these checks, it turned out that the driver of the car was wanted for violating the rules of military registration. And the passenger of the same car ran out of it, hit the employee of the municipal guard and started to run away. An employee of the -Municipal Guard- who was hit ran after the man and fired a traumatic weapon. The victims are missing, the man fled in an unknown direction. Currently, all known facts are being checked. We remind you that the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine is studying the information a> regarding the incident involving the use of a weapon by an employee of the territorial procurement center in Shchaslyvo.

Title: Digitization of mine action: work on a unified demining database continues
Description: notifies the Main Administration of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security. A working meeting dedicated to optimizing work in the field of demining was held in the office of mine countermeasures of the State Emergency Service. The event was attended by representatives of various departments, in particular People's Deputy Ihor Gerasimenko, head of the Administration of the DSST Oleksandr Yakovets, representatives of the Ministry of Defense and the State Emergency Service. Vitaliy Myronyuk, the first deputy head of the State Emergency Service, introduced the participants to the work of the office and the achievements in digitalization of the processes of responding to threats related to explosive objects. The main topic of discussion was the exchange of information between mine action actors and the creation of a single database on demining. As a result of the meeting, a number of decisions were made aimed at improving coordination and efficiency in the field of mine action. As reported by ArmyInform, scientists and business have joined forces to clear the territories of mines and pollution.

Title: The President of Ukraine spoke about the key areas of the internal stability plan
Description: About this he declared during the evening address. Volodymyr Zelenskyi emphasized that these two aspects are fundamental for the protection of Ukraine in the face of Russian aggression. He emphasized the importance not only of providing defense but also of preserving and strengthening the nation after the war. The goal, according to the President, is to protect Ukrainians, both military and civilian, and to create conditions for the post-war recovery of the state and its people. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also continued international work, including diplomatic contacts, and noted that today he spoke with students from Latin American universities. The President emphasized the importance of people all over the world understanding the need to restore peace in international relations. As reported by ArmyInform, -Minska-3 will not happen - we need real peace-: The president reacted to the call of Sholcza to Putin.

Title: Digging for history, but digging up suspicion: Putin's archeologist caused damage to Ukraine in the ...
Description: notifies the Security Service of Ukraine about this. We are talking about the head of the archeology sector of the federal institution -State Hermitage- in St. Petersburg. In 2014, he led an expedition that was personally visited by Putin and that has been conducting illegal excavations at a Ukrainian cultural heritage site in Crimea for more than 10 years. In particular, the suspect's group conducted illegal excavations on an area of ​​hundreds of square meters, as a result of which the diggers removed the so-called cultural layer of the Ukrainian peninsula to a depth of almost 2 m. First of all, we are talking about the territory of the Ukrainian archaeological complex -Ancient City of Myrmekii-, located in the Kerch region. As the examination established, during the excavations, the rascals damaged the Ukrainian historical site and caused damage in the amount of more than UAH 200 million. On the basis of the received evidence, the archaeologist was informed in absentia about the suspicion under part. 4 Art. 298 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (illegal conducting of search works on an archaeological heritage site, destruction, destruction or damage of cultural heritage sites, committed for the purpose of searching for movable objects originating from archaeological heritage sites). Currently, the issue of declaring the figure on the international wanted list for prosecution for crimes against the cultural heritage of the thousand-year-old Ukrainian statehood is being resolved. Previously ArmyInform reported that a native of Kherson, who serves in the army of the Russian Federation, will be tried.

Title: The enemy does not stop attacking Nikopolshchyna: a utility company was damaged
Description: This was notified by the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak. The occupiers shelled Nikopol, Myrivska, Pokrovska, Marganetska and Chervonogrigorivska communities. As a result of the attacks, infrastructure, a utility company and an economic building were damaged. Thanks to operational actions, the victims and victims were avoided. As reported by ArmyInform, in Zaporizhzhia from the Russian attack a man was fatally wounded in his own home.

Title: Occupiers collect money in schools for -their-
Description: This is reported by Center of national resistance. -Volunteers- from the Russian Federation forcibly collected money from the parents. At the same time, the children of the younger classes traditionally drew postcards to the Russian occupiers under the supervision of their teachers. high school students wrote letters under dictation. The responsibility for the propaganda action lies with the education department of the local occupation administration, as well as the -volunteer company of the fighting brotherhood.- All this is not only a means of brainwashing Ukrainian children, but also a demonstrative campaign of alleged local support for the occupiers. We remind you, military counterintelligence and investigators of the Security Service with the assistance of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the commander of the SSO detained a -de-canned- agent of Russian military intelligence (better known as a game).

Title: -Blood in exchange for territory-: the tactics of the Russians are completely similar to the Soviet ...
Description: Bohdan Petrenko, head of the department, told about this on the air -Suspilne Novyny- communications of the 48th separate artillery brigade. According to Bohdan Petrenko, the invaders want to completely capture southern Donetsk region and advance to the north. To carry out this plan, they kill their soldiers by the hundreds. -This tactic is not much different from the tactics used in the Soviet Union - we throw hats. Blood in exchange on the territory. The only difference is that then it was frontal attacks, and now it is the tactics of small groups,- said Bohdan Petrenko. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the South, the enemy is especially actively storming in the direction of Vremivsk, in the direction of Velika Novosilka.

Title: --Minsk-3- will not happen - we need real peace-: the President reacted to Sholtz's call to Putin
Description: He announced this during the evening address. The President of Ukraine emphasized that Putin's goal is to preserve the possibility of not changing anything in his policy. According to him, such a call may lead to new negotiations, which, in the President's opinion, will not lead to real changes in Russian policy. Volodymyr Zelenskyi noted that in the conditions of these challenges, Ukraine does not need Minsk-3, but real peace. -We understand all these challenges now. We know how to act. And we want to warn you: -Minsk-3- will not happen - we need real peace,- emphasized Volodymyr Zelenskyi. As reported by ArmyInform, in the temporarily occupied territories /->Russians are recruiting workers to assemble drones for their needs army.

Title: From the department to the cell: the associate professor--the thief--received a personal residence f...
Description: reports this by the Security Service of Ukraine. He spied on the Defense Forces and corrected Russian missile and bomb attacks on the city. As the investigation established, the attacker is a 50-year-old associate professor of a local university, who was recruited remotely by the invaders after the start of a full-scale war. His main task was to record the consequences of enemy -arrivals- in order to prepare new and correct repeated attacks by the Rashists in the regional center. The traitor also monitored the movement routes of the Ukrainian troops and the location of warehouses with ammunition of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. He transmitted the received intelligence to his Russian curator via messenger in the form of text messages and marks of potential -targets- on Google maps. SBU counter-intelligence detained the agent at the end of 2023 in his own apartment in Kharkiv. On the basis of the evidence collected by the Security Service, the intruder was found guilty under part. 2 Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). According to the SBU materials, the court sentenced him to 15 years in prison with confiscation of property. We remind you, breakthrough of the border by the Russian DRG on Chernihiv Oblast was not, as well as -entering the village of Gremyach of Chernihiv Region- with Russian flags.

Title: Oleksandr Marchenko, a journalist and military officer of the Inform Army, was awarded the Order of ...
Description: This is stated in the Decree of the President of Ukraine No. 767/2024 - About the state awards of Ukraine to the employees of the -Ukrainian Radio- directorate of the -National Public Television and Radio Company of Ukraine- Joint Stock Company. So, for a significant personal contribution to the development of radio broadcasting in Ukraine, the popularization of national culture and musical art, significant creative achievements, high professional skill, and on the occasion of the 100th anniversary of Ukrainian Radio, the head of the editorial office of the main editorial board of the thematic programs of the creative -Ukrainian Radio- association of Oleksandr Marchenko. Previously, he worked as a producer of the -UA:Donbas- Regional Directorate. Oleksandr has been a serviceman of the Armed Forces of Ukraine since last year. Olexandr Marchenko is currently part of the creative team of the Armiya Inform information agency.

Title: -The enemy wants to bind his soldiers with blood-: the reasons for show executions by the occupiers ...
Description: Maksym Golubok, head of headquarters, deputy commander of the 13th Brigade of the National Guard -Charter-. According to Maksym Golubek, the enemy wants to bind his soldiers with blood so that they do not surrender. At the same time, to frighten Ukrainian defenders. -They are trying to influence our soldiers psychologically in this way. Highlighting it in their social networks, spreading it through mass media, they think that our soldiers will review it and leave their positions on their own,- said Maksym Golubok. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the border zone in the north of the Kharkiv region, the soldiers of the Defense Forces reliably control tank-dangerous directions of possible enemy assaults.

Title: Norway joins the increased support for the defense industry of Ukraine
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. During the meeting, Rustem Umyerov thanked the government and people of Norway for the comprehensive support that the country provides to Ukraine, in particular for the support of President Volodymyr Zelensky's Victory Plan, which has the full support of all Scandinavian countries. The minister paid special attention to the security aspects of this plan and discussed steps to bring Ukraine closer to NATO. Separately, the issue of further support for the defense industry of Ukraine was discussed, in particular through cooperation within the framework of the -Danish model- of financing purchases of Ukrainian defense products. -This format of cooperation has already proven its effectiveness, and we must jointly strengthen it,- Rustem Umyerov emphasized, noting the importance of further support from Norway in strengthening Ukraine's defense capabilities. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov met in Oslo with the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Norway Espen Bart Eide to discuss current security issues and further international support for Ukraine. We will remind, on November 14, Rustem Umyerov arrived with a working visit to the Kingdom of Norway, where he met with the Minister of Defense of Norway, Bjorn Arild Gram. The delegations discussed important issues of bilateral cooperation, in particular ways to develop and strengthen the Ukrainian air defense system. November 15 Rustem Umyerov met with Norwegian Prime Minister Jonas Har Støre and discussed with him the situation at the front and the key needs of Ukraine, in particular strengthening our air defense ahead of winter.

Title: At TOT, employment centers are campaigning for locals to collect drones for the enemy's army
Description: About this reports Center of National Resistance. Drones are assembled in workshops at TOT. Employment centers created by the occupiers offer suitable work. Having created a humanitarian crisis in this way, the enemy is trying to use it to his advantage. Note that this is a violation of international law, which forbids the inclusion of residents of occupied territories in working for the invaders. However, the Kremlin once again shows contempt for the laws of war. We remind you that the Russian government has approved resolution on differentiated amounts of payments for combat injuries and mutilations.

Title: The Ministry of Defense published a Voluntary Report in the field of international humanitarian law
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. In particular, it is about: Such reports are a global trend in recent years. It was started by Great Britain and continued by more than 15 countries. As the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine, Brigadier General of Justice Serhiy Melnyk emphasized, the product of the Ministry of Defense is unique. Firstly, no state in the world issued this document during ongoing hostilities of such intensity. Secondly, the defense department of any country in the world did not issue it independently, in its own name. Thirdly, such a report demonstrates the openness of the Ministry of Defense policy in the field of IHL. -The Ukrainian Red Cross believes that the practice of writing a voluntary report with IHL is an important tool for ensuring transparency and accountability during armed conflict. As an auxiliary body of the state, we are glad that we were able to support this initiative of the Ministry of Defense,- said Maksym Dotsenko, General Director of the Red Cross Society of Ukraine. An important role in the preparation of the Voluntary Report of the Ministry of Defense was played by the Interdepartmental Commission on IHL of Great Britain. -This is an honor for me personally and the whole team. The publication of such a report, despite the significant challenges of armed conflict, is incredible. Such efforts provide Ukraine with additional tools for building a dialogue with other states and societies, demonstrating what the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine is doing in the field of IHL,- said Andrew Murdoch, head of the UK Interagency Commission on IHL. The voluntary report of the Ministry of Defense is addressed to representatives of state authorities, international organizations, and the academic community both in Ukraine and abroad. It was first presented to the international community during the 34th International Conference of the Red Cross and Red Crescent in Geneva. It is the largest humanitarian site held every four years. -125 pages, 50 practical examples in 6 chapters is about systematicity and practice. This is our legal way of demonstrating to our partners the reliability of Ukraine in the use of transferred weapons and military equipment. This is a call for more decisive actions and political decisions regarding the provision of international military assistance to fight for common values,- said the Deputy Head of the Department of International Law of the Department of Legal Support of the Ministry of Defense, Lieutenant Colonel of Justice Inna Zavorotko. Voluntary report of the Ministry of Defense in the field of IHL is available English and in Ukrainian languages . As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense and NAZK developed recommendations for eliminating corruption risks in rear procurement for the Armed Forces.

Title: Business approach to treason: ex-tax employee who worked for the enemy during the occupation of Kupy...
Description: reports this by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. According to the investigation, during the capture of Kupyansk, the accused voluntarily went to cooperate with the enemy. At that time, she held the position of senior state inspector of the Kupyan department for work with tax debt of the GU of the State Tax Service in the Kharkiv region. Already under the occupiers, she passed an interview and certification with representatives of the occupying forces for the position of -leading specialist of the department of registration and acceptance of reports of the Tax Service of the Kharkiv region.- She transferred the available data of taxpayers in the territory of the Kupyan district of the Kharkiv region to representatives of the Russian Federation and ensured the maintenance of databases of persons who live in the temporarily occupied territory and are forced to make mandatory payments to representatives of the occupation authorities. The traitor submitted information to the -Register of Entrepreneurs Without Legal Entities Operating in the Kharkiv Region-. If people did not agree to work according to Russian laws, they were warned that there would be trouble: business activities would be stopped, and premises and goods confiscated. In September 2022, before the de-occupation of the Armed Forces of Kharkiv Oblast, the suspect fled to the territory of the Russian Federation. The accused is wanted. She will be tried in absentia at the Chervonozavod District Court. Kharkiv The maximum sanction that threatens the defendant is life imprisonment. We remind you, will try a native of Kherson who serves in the army of the Russian Federation.

Title: The Ukrainian brigade completed training in France and received modern equipment
Description: reported this by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. This is the first Ukrainian brigade that not only underwent training, but was also fully equipped by France within the framework of the EU military training mission for Ukraine. The French side provided Ukrainian soldiers with high-quality training: both general and specialized. In addition, the brigade received modern equipment and weapons, including armored personnel carriers, self-propelled artillery installations, trucks, situational awareness systems and other necessary equipment. -I sincerely thank the people of France and Defense Minister Sébastien Lecorne for their leadership and invaluable support. This strengthens Ukraine's defense capability and brings our joint victory closer,- Rustem Umyerov emphasized. The minister also recalled that last month he personally met with Ukrainian military personnel who were undergoing training in France, and noted their high fighting spirit and level of training. In conclusion, Rustem Umyerov called on international partners to join such initiatives, taking the example of France: -Together we are stronger!- As reported by ArmyInform, a Ukrainian brigade completed training in France Anna Kyivska-.

Title: NATO membership and air defense supply: key topics of Rustem Umerov's talks in Oslo
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. Rustem Umyerov thanked the Norwegian government official for his recent visit to Ukraine and for the active assistance that Norway provides to our country in this difficult time. The parties discussed the prospects of supporting Ukraine on the way to NATO membership. According to Rustem Umyerov, the decision on Ukraine's accession to the Alliance is the best guarantee that Russia will never again pose a threat to our country. During the meeting, special attention was paid to the level of military aid for 2025. Among the issues discussed were the supply of air defense equipment, missiles, as well as the possibility of procurement for the Ukrainian military by the domestic defense industry. The minister emphasized the need for a quick and decisive response from the free world. -Together with our partners, we are able to stop the axis of evil led by Russia,- Rustem Umyerov stressed. As ArmiyaInform reported, Norway will join the -Danish format- of support — direct financing of production in Ukraine. We will remind, on November 14, Rustem Umyerov arrived with a working visit to the Kingdom of Norway, where he met with the Minister of Defense of Norway, Bjorn Arild Gram. The delegations discussed important issues of bilateral cooperation, in particular ways to develop and strengthen the Ukrainian air defense system. November 15 Rustem Umyerov met with Norwegian Prime Minister Jonas Har Støre and discussed with him the situation at the front and the key needs of Ukraine, in particular strengthening our air defense ahead of winter.

Title: The paratroopers showed how they rescue the wounded at the checkpoint
Description: The corresponding video was published by the brigade's official page. Each of their shifts is a struggle for life, moments of tension and concentration that do not allow them to lose any chance of salvation. Here they provide first aid to the wounded, stabilize their condition and prepare for further transportation. Experts tell how it is possible to work on the front lines so that every fighter has a chance to return home alive. It is about courage, resilience and boundless humanity in the most difficult conditions. We remind you, in the direction of Toretsk, the enemy is advancing in small assault groups - they are destroyed by tens or even hundreds.

Title: The attempt to bypass sanctions through the countries of Central Asia does not cover Russia's losses...
Description: About this notifies the Foreign Intelligence Service of Ukraine. In 2023, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan and Armenia increased their imports from the EU by an amount almost identical to the growth of their exports to Russia. In 2023, the import of goods from the EU by the EAEU countries increased by 45%, reaching 13 billion US dollars. At the same time, exports from these countries to Russia increased by 43%, reaching about 14.5 billion dollars. USA. In many cases, the goods are physically immediately sent to the Russian Federation, and through the countries of Central Asia, only a formal payment is made in order not to violate European sanctions. Kazakhstan is the best option for organizing parallel imports — the country is closer to Europe and has a long border with Russia. Exports from Kazakhstan to Russia increased by 31.2%, reaching $10.2 billion. USA vs. 7 billion dollars. in 2021. At the same time, in November 2024, Astana increased the terms of making payments from Russian businesses — from seven days to a month, demanding additional documents with data on senders and receivers of money. We remind you that the Russian government has approved resolution on differentiated amounts of payments for combat injuries and mutilations.

Title: In Zaporozhye, a man was fatally wounded in his own home by a Russian strike
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhia OVA. According to him, the pensioner was in his house when Russian troops shelled the village. The man suffered fatal injuries as a result of the impact. We will remind, during the day the occupiers struck 466 blows on 12 inhabited points of the Zaporizhzhia region. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russian attacks in the Kherson region: dozens of victims.

Title: SSO special operation in Kurshchyna: 16 comrades from the Defense Forces were rescued from the envir...
Description: The relevant video was made public by the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. At two o'clock in the morning, SSO operators received the combat task of removing a group of servicemen from friendly units from the encirclement. Within two hours, the operators planned the task and advanced on two armored Humvees to rescue their comrades. The servicemen of the Defense Forces were successfully evacuated, for which they thanked the SSO operators. We remind you, since the beginning of the day, 109 combat clashes have already taken place.

Title: From Sloviansk to Kurakhovo: the President praised the courage of Tavri paratroopers
Description: announced President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy. The brigade participated in the defense of Slovyansk, Krasny Liman, Debaltsevo and Donetsk airports. At the beginning of the large-scale invasion, its fighters were in Luhansk region, later they inflicted significant losses on the enemy near Siverskodonetsk, defended Lyman and Maryinka. Currently, the soldiers continue to repulse the invaders in the Kurakhiv direction. For its combat merits, the brigade was awarded the honorary award -For courage and bravery-. Their slogan is -Strength in unity!- The President thanked the soldiers for their courage and struggle, which is bringing the victory of Ukraine closer. As reported by ArmyInform, a Ukrainian brigade completed training in France Anna Kyivska-.

Title: Battle for the East: more than 100 Russian attacks per day, the Armed Forces repel the onslaught of ...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The situation on the front lines remains difficult. The Defense Forces of Ukraine direct efforts to disrupt the offensive plans of the Russian aggressor and destroy its personnel and equipment. Today, the communities of the settlements of Sumy Oblast, Chernihiv Oblast, and Kharkiv Oblast were affected by enemy artillery and mortar fire, including the settlements of Zhuravka, Leonivka, Grabovskoe, Pokrovka, Volfine, Leonivka, Timofiivka, and Ryzhivka. In the Kharkiv direction the enemy is trying to put pressure on our units in the direction of Visoka Yaruga, where the battle is currently ongoing, and the enemy has also stormed the positions of our units in the Vovchansk region, where three attacks are ongoing. On the Kupyansk direction the enemy stormed the positions of our units five times in the area of ​​Kolisnikivka, Kopanok and Nadia. Four clashes are still ongoing. Ukrainian soldiers continue to maintain their defense. With the support of bomber aircraft in the Lyman direction, the invading army carried out nine attacks on Ukrainian positions near Novoyehorivka, Terni and Torsky. The fighting continues. The invader dropped anti-aircraft missiles on Yampolivka, Terny, Liman and Torske. In the Seversky direction units of the Defense Forces repelled an attack by Russian invaders near Verkhnokamyansk. Siversk and Ryznikivka were hit by enemy aircraft. On the Toretsk direction, eight enemy attacks took place in the Toretsk and Shcherbinivka area. Ukrainian soldiers have already repelled six of them, the fighting continues, and the enemy is also actively using bomber aircraft in Toretsk. In the Pokrovsky direction since the beginning of the day, the occupiers have made 23 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their positions in Myrolyubivka, Promenya, Lysivka, Petrivka, and Pustinka districts. The defense forces are holding back the onslaught and have repulsed 17 enemy attacks, with six engagements still ongoing. In the Kurakhiv direction, the invaders attacked 26 times near Berestki, Novoselidivka, Voznesenka, Novodmytrivka, Maksimilianivka, Dalnyi and Antonivka. Ten attempts by the occupiers to advance have already been repulsed. The enemy also carried out an air strike on Kurakhovo, dropping two air bombs. In the Vremivsk direction four skirmishes take place near Trudovoy, Makarivka, Rivnopol and Novodarivka. During the day, five enemy CABs flew over Velika Novosilka. In the Orykhiv direction, the occupation forces are shelling the territory controlled by the Ukrainian government, targeting civilian infrastructure objects and populated areas. Five times the enemy tried to storm our defenders on the Dnieper direction. Operation in Kursk Oblast is ongoing. Enemy aviation and artillery continue to strike their territory. Today, Ukrainian soldiers repelled ten attacks by the invading forces, and clashes are currently ongoing in eleven locations. As reported by ArmyInform, a Ukrainian brigade completed training in France Anna Kyivska-.

Title: The situation in the Pokrovsk community is deteriorating, the enemy is hunting the civilian populati...
Description: head of Pokrovsk MBA Serhiy Dobryak told about it. -The other day, a family was attacked by a UAV. The son died. They were in their own car, which was hit by a drone. There is a hunt for people, so it is extremely dangerous to stay in the community. I will always thank all the residents who evacuated and took the children away,- he said. 11,500 local residents and 49 minors remain in Pokrovsk. As of today, Pokrovsk lives without centralized water supply, in some places without gas and 40% without electricity. There will be no heating season this year either. -The only correct way to save yourself and your loved ones is to evacuate,- added Serhiy Dobryak, the head of the Pokrovskaya MBA. As reported by ArmyInform, our defenders repelled 24 enemy assaults of varying intensity in the Pokrovsky direction in the areas of Promin, Lysivka, Sukhy Yar, Pushkine, Zhovte and Pustinka settlements.

Title: In Shchaslyv, an employee of the TCC used a weapon: the Ministry of Defense has started an investiga...
Description: This is reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. In order to find out the circumstances, the Main Inspection of the Ministry of Defense (GIMO) started checking the legality of the actions of the representative of the TCC and the grounds for using weapons. In the case of establishing the facts of exceeding official authority or identifying signs of a criminal offense, the materials will be directed to law enforcement agencies for further investigation and the adoption of appropriate decisions. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense commented on the proposal of disbandment of TCC and SP.

Title: The Ukrainian brigade -Anna Kyivska- completed their studies in France
Description: This was announced by the General Staff of France on the social network Kh. The French side showed training footage and reminded that this is the first Ukrainian brigade trained and equipped in France. — The Joint Staff – Military operations (@FrenchForces) November 15, 2024 -Brigade -Anna -Kyivska-, prepared at the request of the Ukrainian army as part of the EU mission for the training of the Ukrainian military, illustrates France's strong support,- the message says. In the footage, you can see how the military of the Armed Forces of Ukraine are training bojovi-diyi-na-zaporizhzhi-ta-na-shodi/-> shoot from self-propelled guns CAESAR, fire from a machine gun at armored vehicles, with MANPADS, and also practice assault operations. France became the first country to fully prepare and equip an entire brigade of the Armed Forces with weapons and military equipment.

Title: 20 billion hryvnias for food for the Armed Forces: new tenders for 2025 have been announced
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. -Providing the military with adequate nutrition is not only a matter of health and comfort, but also a factor that directly affects the morale and combat effectiveness of our defenders. We must provide servicemen with high-quality and varied food, in particular by improving its quality and implementing modern standards and the latest technologies. We continue to improve all aspects of rear support so that the army has everything it needs to effectively carry out combat missions,- said Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. Currently, tenders are announced according to the current model: the supplier independently determines the manufacturers of goods for the Armed Forces of Ukraine. At the same time, to improve the quality of products and strengthen control, the new contract already provides for a number of changes: detailing product descriptions, expanding the scope of audits and inspections, updating transportation requirements, revising fines, etc. Subsequently, it is planned to announce procurement for the new pilot procurement model, which was presented in September 2024. Framework agreements have already been announced this week for signal bidding for producers in certain categories, namely: vegetables and fruits, sausage products, meat, dairy products and fish. It is these categories of goods that have been selected as requiring increased attention in terms of quality. The pilot supply project will operate simultaneously with the current model in 2025 in five oblasts: Kyiv, Vinnytsia, Zhytomyr, Cherkasy and Kirovohrad. Currently, the DOT is selecting counterparties for further qualification and holding, in fact, signal auctions, which are scheduled for mid-December. -This year, we are announcing purchases in advance, as early as November, to ensure continuity of supply for military personnel. The current logistics model is well-established, familiar and understandable to market participants, so it remains primarily in areas where the collision line passes. At the same time, the -pilot- has a number of advantages, which will allow to increase the quality control of goods and direct contact directly with producers,- said Halyna Litosh, director of the food program of the DOT. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine strengthens cooperation with manufacturers and suppliers of physical support for the Armed Forces.

Title: There is no threat of an invasion of Chernihiv Oblast, there was no breach of the border - CPD
Description: This was reported by the head of the Center for Combating Disinformation, officer of the Defense Forces Andriy Kovalenko. He noted that the Russians did not even cross the destroyed bridge from the border, so the information was a lie from the beginning. He also reminded that in June a very similar story happened with Ryzhivka in Sumy Oblast. -Someone appeared somewhere, took down the flag and ran away.
