The perpetrator faces up to 15 years in prison with confiscation of property. As reported by ArmyInform, the people's deputy of Ukraine was informed about suspicion of treason.

Title: President: We continue to work to prepare our internal Sustainability Plan
Description: He announced this in his evening address. -Today there was a report by the Head of the Syrsky Committee. As always, this is where the day starts. Not only Donetsk region, but also the Kupyan region. Our soldiers worked very effectively there. I am grateful to everyone for their stability,- the Head of State emphasized. The President also said that he is proud of all our people, every unit that holds its ground and provides Ukraine with the opportunity to convince the world. Convince people that they should win. Exactly what Ukraine is fighting for. We remind you that in 10 months of 2024, the Agency defense procurement The Ministry of Defense concluded 16 contracts worth almost 300 million hryvnias.

Title: Border guards prevented 11 illegal tourists from meeting sleepy bears
Description: This is reported by the State Border Service of Ukraine. The incident occurred during the patrolling of the mountainous section of the border by the department of inspectors of the -Bohdan- border service. The detainees are men of draft age from different regions of Ukraine, including Ivano-Frankivsk, Mykolaiv, Dnipropetrovsk, Sumy and Odesa. They tried to get to Romania by bypassing checkpoints. Border guards emphasize that even in the most difficult weather conditions, such as snowfall and night frosts, border patrols continue continuously. In addition, in the mountains, the tracks of wild animals such as bears testify to the danger posed by such behavior. aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Russian troops shelled the Kherson region: five civilians were injured
Description: This is reported by Khersonska ODA. As a result of the shelling of the village of Sadove, three people who were on the street were wounded. The victims were taken to the hospital with blast and brain injuries, as well as contusions. They include a 52-year-old woman with shrapnel injuries to her back, a 74-year-old woman with leg, shoulder and forearm injuries and a 51-year-old man with head, chest and leg injuries. At 12:30 a Russian drone attacked the village of Kindiyka. As a result of dropping explosives, a 46-year-old man received a blast injury. Also at noon, an enemy UAV attacked the village of Veletenske, where a 59-year-old man received an explosive injury and an abdominal wound. All the victims have been hospitalized and are being treated. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day Russian troops carried out six attacks on Nikopol region, using kamikaze drones and Grad rocket launchers.

Title: Russian airlines are in a steep rush due to the threat of bankruptcy
Description: About this reports the Foreign Intelligence Service of Ukraine. Due to restrictions on currency settlements, the Russian authorities allowed air carriers to transfer funds to special accounts in rubles, but foreign lessors do not accept such payments due to non-compliance with the terms of the contracts. As a result, the companies stopped paying debts, and the released funds were directed to support the technical suitability of the aircraft fleet, the cost of which has increased significantly due to sanctions restrictions. The government of the Russian Federation allowed to write off debts for payments in 2025, but according to current tax rules, these amounts will still be subject to a 25% income tax, which air carriers will not be able to pay. The possible bankruptcy of small and medium-sized Russian airlines will have serious consequences for the aviation industry and the Russian economy in general. It is about reducing the availability of air transportation, reducing the level of their safety, losing jobs and reducing the investment attractiveness of the industry. The increase in the tax burden in the context of the Russian government's measures to fill the budget due to the war against Ukraine is a systemic factor that is gradually destroying various sectors of the Russian economy. We remind you that the cost of loans is rapidly increasing in the Russian Federation and inflationary processes are accelerating, which is inevitable ->approaches the economic crisis in the country.

Title: Priority on Ukrainian manufacturers: the Ministry of Defense is modernizing the physical support of ...
Description: This is reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The main topic of the meeting, chaired by Deputy Minister of Defense Dmytro Klimenkov, was the introduction of innovations in production and the modernization of materials that will increase the combat readiness and comfort of the military during missions. In particular, they discussed the latest fabric processing technologies that provide increased wear resistance and durability of equipment, development of samples of military uniforms for extreme conditions, as well as solutions that optimize supply logistics. Ukrainian manufacturers are the priority in the provision of the army. The Ministry of Defense emphasizes the importance of supporting domestic business, which ensures the stability of supplies and the ability to adapt products to the changing needs of the military. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine strengthens cooperation with manufacturers and suppliers of physical support for the Armed Forces.

Title: The Defense Forces talked about the importance of flamethrowers at the front
Description: The story of the fighter was made public by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: They have become very tight: the Defense Forces reliably control tank-dangerous areas in the north o...
Description: The head of the planning department of the 13th brigade of operational assignment -Charter- told about this on the air of the -Kyiv 24- TV channel Lieutenant Colonel Anton Baev of the National Guard of Ukraine. — The operational situation of the defense brigade's strip in the north of Kharkiv Oblast remains unchanged - under control. Over the past day, no enemy assaults have been recorded, he said. Currently, there is no significant accumulation of enemy forces and assets in the section of the battle line north of Kharkiv. — We are not recording a large accumulation now, as it was a couple of weeks ago. This, first of all, is due to the deterioration of weather conditions in Kharkiv Oblast. We see that now Kharkiv Oblast is covered with snow, the officer said. Despite the fact that the Russians do not use armored vehicles in the north of the Kharkiv region, the fighters of the Defense Forces are in constant readiness to repel enemy armored assaults. - As for the use of equipment, the enemy's tactics remain unchanged for the time being: movement and actions in general by small assault groups. Armored vehicles are currently not in use and do not travel, but we see trends along the entire front line and we are constantly preparing, the military assured. Charter fighters pay special attention to identifying and destroying the enemy at the stage of accumulation and concentration, including on the territory of the Russian Federation. — We are starting to hit equipment across the border, because we see that we need to destroy those armored groups that are kept by the enemy for reserve or for assault. It is necessary to work at the stage of their concentration and accumulation. In our country, this happens mainly across the state border of Ukraine, that is, it is necessary to search, identify and destroy. We are doing this little by little so that it will be easier later, the guardsman emphasized. Thanks to coordinated combat operations, the enemy has no success in the north of Kharkiv Oblast. — The adversary does not stop trying, constantly tries to carry out some accumulations, advances in order to acquire the potential to go into offensive actions. We see all movements, most premises, we control all tank-dangerous directions. The defense forces of Ukraine have become very dense here and are working well, said Anton Baev. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that on the temporarily occupied territory within the borders of the Kharkiv region, the Russian military forces civilians to continue living in the same buildings in which they are housed. In this way, they use local residents as a -human shield-.

Title: Scam with prisoners of war: criminals offer exchange lists for money
Description: This was reported by the Coordinating Headquarters for the Treatment of Prisoners of War. Criminals contact relatives in private messages and offer fake documents, allegedly from the databases of official bodies. Fraudsters convince that they can include the names of prisoners in the exchange lists, but demand a large sum of money for -help-. Scammers usually link to real websites of organizations to give the appearance of being -official-, although they are not actually related to them. The coordination headquarters urges relatives of prisoners of war to be cautious, not to trust dubious offers and to contact only official institutions. Any attempted fraud should be reported to law enforcement immediately. The Coordinating Staff emphasizes that all issues related to the release of prisoners of war in Ukraine are resolved exclusively by official structures. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy intensified attempts to influence relatives of prisoners of war and under the time of personal communication provokes destructive actions and crimes.

Title: Attacks of drones and -Hrads- in Nikopol: a woman was injured by the shelling of the Russians
Description: This was reported by the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhii Lysak. Nikopol, Myrivska and Manganetsk communities came under fire. A 51-year-old woman was injured in the attacks and was treated. Treatment will continue on an outpatient basis. Substantial damage was caused to infrastructure, two private houses and power lines. In addition, an enemy drone hit the Zelenodol community in Kryvorizha, destroying part of the infrastructure. Fortunately, there were no injuries among local residents. As reported by ArmyInform, as a result of Russian shelling of the city of Slovyansk in Donetsk region, a patrol policeman was injured and is currently under medical supervision.

Title: The Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine launches a new information channel in Viber
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The message states that citizens can join the community to be the first to receive information about possible air threats and learn about the actions of the Air Force in the fight against the enemy. -Join the OFFICIAL Air Force Community on Viber to quickly receive up-to-the-minute air threat data and stay up-to-date on our defense efforts,- the message reads. The Air Force also urges citizens to diversify the channels of obtaining information, paying attention to the importance of official, verified sources. Promptness and reliability of the provided information are guaranteed. As reported by ArmyInform, Air defense forces shot down 21 attack UAVs, another 38 — locationally lost.

Title: - Lover of the narrow world - reported on suspicion of propaganda and support of the Russian Federat...
Description: reports this by the Donetsk Regional Prosecutor's Office. In the fall of 2022, the propaganda TV channel -Mariupol-24- started working in the airspace of the Russian-captured Mariupol district. A year and a half later, the former radio and TV presenter of the MTV channel started working in the fake media. The so-called media woman participates in the preparation and airing of stories laced with Russian narratives. She tells the audience about the activities of pseudo-law enforcement agencies and flaunts enemy symbols. Together with the camera crew of the fake media, the suspect is monitoring the reconstruction of the Mariupol Drama Theater cynically destroyed by the invaders, under the rubble of which civilians died. The woman is wanted. Earlier ArmyInform reported , that the Russians will build a training ground in Luhansk, where they will train young people to operate UAVs.

Title: Slovyansk is on fire: a patrol policeman is injured, houses are destroyed
Description: This was notified by the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Ukraine. The shelling damaged a police official vehicle, as well as several high-rise buildings and an educational institution. The relevant services are working to find out the scale of the destruction and to eliminate the consequences of the attack. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russians shelled populated areas 19 times in just one day. Daughters. 268 people, including 31 children, were evacuated from the front line.

Title: Magyar burns Russian equipment, battles for Kupyansk, clearing of GUR in Kurshchyna: stream from the...
Description: The General Staff of the Ukrainian Armed Forces reported yesterday that the Ukrainian military stopped the enemy's advance on Kupyansk, destroying armored vehicles and a significant part of the manpower. In the direction of Zaporozhye, the drones of the NSU -Spartan- brigade hunted down a Russian man who was trying to hide behind a tree. The other two turned out to be wiser and, after a successful reset, decided to surrender to the drone, which led them to our positions. In the Pokrovsky direction, the Flying Skull drone caught up with the fleeing Russians. The occupiers comfortably settled under the BMP-2 grill, and when they saw our drone, they even tried to shoot back, but the Flying Skull pilots flew the drone straight into the Russians' recreation area. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - Lieutenant Colonel Serhiy Misyura and Major Andriy Makarenko.

Title: Dozens of destroyed invaders, a tank and destroyed positions: the border guards showed the destructi...
Description: The relevant video was published by the Luhansk border detachment. Drone operators from the commandant's office of the -Phoenix- reconnaissance and strike unmanned aerial systems successfully worked on enemy targets in Donetsk region. Dozens of occupiers were eliminated, dozens were wounded, a tank and several units of motor vehicles, an ammunition depot, electronic warfare equipment and an enemy crossing were destroyed. As a reminder, operators of combat drones of the GUR of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine continue to operate effectively on the front lines, destroying the equipment and scattered enemy.

Title: The attack of the Rosarmy on Zaporizhzhia: the building of the village council was damaged
Description: About this informs the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA Ivan Fedorov. As a result of one of the strikes, the building of the village council was partially destroyed. Nearby houses were damaged by the blast wave and debris. Previously, there were no casualties. The scale of the destruction is being clarified. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day, the occupiers struck 410 blows in 10 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: The occupiers recruit propagandists from among schoolchildren
Description: This is reported by the Center of National resistance Since the beginning of the large-scale invasion, the Russians have killed independent journalism, and all media editorial offices have been forced to leave TOT. Instead, the occupiers began to create fake publications under the control of propagandists brought from the Russian Federation. In order to create the illusion of independence, the occupiers began to attract young people there, who sometimes, due to little life experience, go for easy money and seek fame. The deficit of propagandists in the media has not yet been overcome, and now the enemy has begun to attract high school students from captured Ukrainian schools to the editorial offices. The -Kherson news agency- (subordinate to the occupied administration) and the Kremlin's -movement of the first- deal with the recruitment of schoolchildren. In return for the materials, they promise to facilitate the educational process, as well as money and excursions to the Russian Federation. We remind you that in Mariupol they want to create 50 -meter-meter monument to -asvabaditiyel-.

Title: The People's Deputy of Ukraine was notified of suspicion of treason
Description: This is reported by the Office of the Prosecutor General of Ukraine. According to the investigation, the people's elected official systematically spread the narratives of the aggressor state publicly in his speeches and interviews. Disseminating specially selected information and using various forms of manipulation, he voiced distorted facts about the external and internal political course of Ukraine, influenced the consciousness and opinion of citizens. The suspect posted statements on social networks aimed at harming the information security of Ukraine. He distorted facts and events, creating informational pretexts for anti-Ukrainian informational activities. With such actions, the suspect provided assistance to the aggressor state in carrying out subversive activities against Ukraine. So far, the prosecutors of the Prosecutor General's Office have submitted to the suspect a request to choose a preventive measure in the form of detention. We remind you that on November 10 on the outskirts of the village of Terny of the Lyman community /->representatives of the Russian army attacked a civilian.

Title: Stronger and more comfortable uniform: the Ministry of Defense is strengthening cooperation with man...
Description: This was notified in the MoU. The main focus will be on the introduction of innovations that can increase the combat readiness of the military and improve their comfort during the performance of tasks. This was discussed at a meeting with the participation of representatives of Ukrainian business, the Central Directorate for the Development of Material Support and the procurement agency of the Ministry of Defense -State Rear Operator-. In particular, the meeting participants discussed: Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov emphasized the importance of providing the military with modern, high-quality and safe equipment that will meet the requirements of a modern armed conflict. -Modernization of property for the Armed Forces is a critically important step for improving the efficiency of our military. We must provide our defenders with the best materials and technologies that will increase their combat readiness and comfort in the most difficult conditions. Together with manufacturers, we will implement innovative solutions that meet modern requirements,- Dmytro Klimenkov emphasized. The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine emphasizes the importance of cooperation with Ukrainian business to implement innovations and ensure a high level of equipment for the servicemen of the Armed Forces. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine announced the beginning conducting military (experimental) tests of new samples of three items of material property to provide servicemen of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: The Defense Procurement Agency concluded contracts worth UAH 300 million in 10 months of work
Description: This was reported by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. These funds will be used for the purchase of several hundred reconnaissance-strike, logistics and other complexes that will help our combat units and save the lives of soldiers.

Title: Ruthless accuracy: Ukrainian drones deliver devastating blows to the enemy
Description: This is reported by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Another portion of effective strikes was noted, in particular with the help of FPV drones, which destroyed several units of Russian communication and surveillance equipment, as well as a vehicle of the occupiers. In addition, the kamikaze drone has been successfully used to detonate minefields the enemy The video also shows how scouts carry out accurate drops of ammunition that accurately land on the positions of the Muscovites, causing them significant losses. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 225th assault battalion demonstrated the spectacular destruction of another enemy vehicle in Kurshchyna.

Title: 88 skirmishes: the heaviest in the Kurakhiv direction
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: In Luhansk, the Russians will build a test site where they will teach young people how to operate UA...
Description: This reports the head of Luhansk OVA Artem Lysogor. During this time, more than 500 young men and women have completed the relevant courses, and another 300 are continuing their studies. Children and teenagers undergo military training, master the skills of tactical medicine, and control drones. In particular, the practical part of the classes is organized, during which young people launch models of unmanned aerial vehicles on equipped platforms and perform assigned tasks. A special training ground will also be opened to expand training opportunities. During the demonstration renovations in Siverskodonetsk, not only valuables and furniture disappear from the apartments of citizens. In several high-rise buildings, the builders completely cut out the heating systems in the bathrooms. It is believed that this should relieve the district heating system if the houses are connected to it. The fact that due to the reduction of heating sources in the apartments will potentially become colder, they are not concerned. We remind you that the enemy continues hit Luhansk region with drones: 38 applications per day.

Title: The EU plans to strengthen defense capabilities
Description: This is reported by Service of foreign intelligence of Ukraine. The budget plan of the European Union for 2021-2027 provides 392 billion euros for -cohesion policy- initiatives. About five percent of them have been used today. According to current regulations, these funds cannot be used to purchase defense equipment or directly finance the armed forces. In order to avoid their inappropriate use, the European Commission is considering the possibility of spending money on programs for regional development, in particular, logistics infrastructure. It is about the construction and strengthening of bridges and roads for the safe passage of military equipment. In addition, legislative changes are not excluded, which will provide more flexibility to the rules of budget allocation, in particular, its use for the expansion of defense industries. Such a change in policy indicates an increased focus on defense in the next EU budget for 2028-2034, negotiations on which will begin in 2025. We would like to remind you that in the Russian Federation the cost of loans is rapidly inflationary processes are accelerating, which inevitably brings the country's economic crisis closer.

Title: Another employee of the occupation pension fund will appear before the court
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs you about this. Research has established that during the occupation of Kupyansk by the armed forces of the Russian Federation, a local resident volunteered to work for the -pension fund management-. In August 2022, she assumed the position of -Chief Specialist of the Department of Labor Organization and Pension Payments.- The collaborator was responsible for the formation and maintenance of the register of pensioners who received so-called financial assistance from the Russian Federation. After the deoccupation, the woman hid from the Ukrainian law enforcement officers for a long time and changed her place of residence, moving to one of the villages of the Mykolaiv region. However, she still did not manage to avoid responsibility - the law enforcement officers collected the necessary evidence base and exposed her. The woman will be tried in the Chervonozavod District Court of Kharkiv. We remind you that on November 10 on the outskirts of the village of Terny of the Lyman community /->representatives of the Russian army attacked a civilian.

Title: The enemy shelled Donetsk region 19 times during the day
Description: notifies the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin about this. In the Kurakhiv community, one person died in Hannivka, three were injured in Kurakhovo. One person died and two were injured in Novotroitskyi of the Pokrovsky community; one house each was damaged in Pokrovsk and the village of Shevchenko. An infrastructure facility was damaged in Udachnenska hromada. A house was damaged in Zarichnoy, Lymanska hromada. In Mykolaivka, an administrative building, an infrastructure facility and three high-rise buildings were damaged. In Kostyantynivka, four people were injured, 25 private houses, an administrative building, an enterprise, four power lines and two gas pipelines were damaged; in Predtechyny, a person was injured, a house was damaged. In the Chasovoyarsk community, 8 private houses, three high-rise buildings and an industrial building were damaged. Earlier ArmyInform reported , that an investigation into the murder of a local woman by the occupiers has been launched in Donetsk region.

Title: France adapts military training programs for Ukraine
Description: Oleksandr Syrsky reported this on his Facebook page. During the conversation, he informed his French colleague about the operational situation at the front, in particular, about the specifics of defensive operations in the most tense areas. General Thierry Burkar confirmed that France will continue to provide logistical and technical assistance to Ukraine and support the training of Ukrainian servicemen within the framework of the EU training mission (EUMAM). It is noted that the training programs are adapted to the needs of Ukraine and taking into account the combat experience of the Armed Forces. At the end of the conversation, General Oleksandr Syrskyi thanked France for its constant support of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, General Oleksandr Syrsky visited Kharkiv Oblast, where he worked with servicemen of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after Kosh chieftain Ivan Sirk.

Title: Ukraine and Lithuania discussed cooperation in the field of recruiting and defense
Description: About this discussed during the meeting of representatives of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine with the delegation of the Armed Forces of Lithuania. During the discussion, the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine, Brigadier General of Justice Serhii Melnyk emphasized the importance of cooperation between the two countries and thanked Lithuania for its continued support of Ukraine since the beginning of the full-scale Russian invasion. -We are grateful to the people of Lithuania for the support you have provided to Ukraine since the very beginning of the large-scale Russian invasion. For our part, we are ready to share our own developments so that this black war does not cross the borders of your country and the European Union,- Serhii Melnyk said. The Ukrainian side talked about reforms in the field of mobilization and recruiting. In particular, about the creation of 44 recruiting centers in most regions of Ukraine, where citizens can now apply for contract military service. The parties also discussed this year's innovations aimed at strengthening defense capabilities: the possibility of recruiting directly to a specific military unit and the introduction of basic military service instead of conscription from 2025. The head of the Military Conscription and Recruitment Service of the Republic of Lithuania, Arunas Balciunas, emphasized that it is important for Lithuania, which also borders Russia, to study the experience of Ukraine gained during almost a thousand days of war. -Lithuania also borders the Russian Federation, so we are interested in the experience that Ukraine received resistance for almost a thousand days. When peacetime is replaced by war events, everything changes very quickly. And it is very important for the military, who are responsible for the security of the state, to be ready for these changes,- said Arunas Balciunas. During the meeting, the Lithuanian delegation spoke about its own initiatives in the organization of registers of conscript citizens and their notifications for service, which also became an important topic of exchange of experience between the two countries. The sides also agreed to continue cooperation to strengthen defense capabilities and ensure the national security of the two countries using best practices and innovations. As reported by ArmyInform, the -Defense Procurement Agency- of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine (AOZ) and the Norwegian Defense Materials Agency (NDMA) agreed on strengthening current cooperation in the field of procurement weapons.

Title: Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of the Kharkiv Region: - There will be more enemies destroyed...
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. During the meeting, further actions and ways to increase the effectiveness of fire damage to the enemy were discussed. Oleksandr Syrsky emphasized that the number of destroyed occupiers will only increase, stressing the determination of Ukrainian forces in the fight against the enemy. The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces continues to coordinate the actions of units to achieve maximum results on the battlefield. As reported by ArmyInform, the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces General Oleksandr Syrsky published a video that demonstrates the effective work of the Defense Forces of Ukraine to eliminate the Russian invaders and their equipment.

Title: The dormitory was destroyed, the classrooms were destroyed: Russian troops shelled the university in...
Description: Correspondents of ArmiyaInform visited the scene. According to an employee of the university, she was just passing near the institution when she heard the distinctive roar of a projectile approaching, followed by three explosions. Then she saw black smoke. She was very scared, because she works as a watchman at the university, and it was a miracle that she was not on the territory of the institution. According to Stanislav Chaichenko, Vice-Rector for Scientific and Pedagogical Work of the Donbass State Pedagogical University, as a result of the Russian shelling, probably a missile, there is a hit in one of the university dormitories. In the main building of the university, windows and doors were broken, classrooms were damaged. Fortunately, during the Russian terrorist attack, there were no workers in the premises and only the premises were destroyed. — The educational process in us is carried out remotely. The university is in the stage of relocation, currently the administration works in the city of Dnipro on the basis of another educational institution, - says Stanislav Chaichenko. - Our university is a pedagogical one, the entire line from preschool education is represented: preschool, primary, secondary education in various subjects and specializations, professional education. There are also non-pedagogical specialties such as psychology, management, social work, therapy, rehabilitation and some others. The number of students currently fluctuates at different times, so somewhere on average 2.5-3 thousand students are currently studying, this is together with our separate unit, the Horliv Institute of Foreign Languages, which also moved from Bakhmut to the Dnipro for the second time and now they are next to each other, - he adds vice-rector of the university. He mentions that in a certain period 11 thousand studied in Slovyansk students It was in the early 2000s, the population of Slovyansk at that time was approximately 120-110 thousand inhabitants, and more than 10 thousand people studied at the university. — Most of the students were from Donetsk region, Luhansk region, Kharkiv Oblast, a little bit of Dnipropetrovsk Oblast, came to us from all over the region to acquire a teaching profession, - adds Stanislav Chaichenko. The head of the Slavic MBA, Vadym Lyakh, said that high-rise buildings, a kindergarten, a supermarket, and private cars were also damaged by the shelling. Photo by Ruslan Tarasov

Title: Prostitutes, apartments and more: what Ukrainian activists found on the hacked computer of the comma...
Description: About this reports Center of National Resistance. At the same time, the general managed to spread a computer virus on equipment at the headquarters of the command of the Russian group in the Zaporizhzhia direction. Also, while sending Russian soldiers to their inevitable death, he sent his own son abroad with a military education. Hackers-activists -Cyber ​​Resistance- and -KibOrg- managed to download a spy virus to the personal computer of the commander of the forces of the Russian Federation in the Zaporizhia region in 2023, Colonel-General Alexander Romanchuk. He spread the malicious program on a number of devices in the main headquarters of the Russian group. The surveillance operation lasted more than a year and a half and made it possible to obtain information about the enemy's plans, the location of his forces and intelligence. Part of the obtained material was handed over to analysts of the CNS. Since the active period of the operation has ended, it became possible to familiarize with a number of its details publicly. Also, the motive for the publication was the rhetoric of Russian propaganda regarding Romanchuk. Some of its elements cause sharp fits of laughter in people who are informed from primary sources. If you compile a portrait of Romanchuk from the publications of some of the Russian -military forces- in Telegram, then a real Rimbaud with the mind of Clausewitz or Sun Tzu appears, who almost personally stopped the Ukrainian offensive in the Zaporozhye direction in 2023. Romanchuk receives the epaulettes of colonel-general from the hands of the chief of the general staff of the Soviet Union Gerasimov and in the presence of the then commander of the invasion forces of Ukraine Surovikin on the eve of being sent to the Zaporizhzhia region. February 2023. Photo from Romanchuk's personal archive, to which CNS analysts were given access. It follows from the publication of the -Rybar- channel that Romanchuk seized a tank during a business trip to Syria, -set up a carousel of fire- and -pulled 40 fighters out of the cauldron.- Another popular channel -Children of the Arbat- adds Romanchuk to the top ten most talented Russian commanders, and the -Neighbor- channel writes that Romanchuk is a key element of Russian defense in Zaporizhzhia in 2023. With such a reputation, Romanchuk received the right to open the parade until May 9, 2024 in Moscow. In fact, under the leadership of Romanchuk, the Russians traditionally bombarded the front line with cannon fodder in the Zaporozhye direction. This became clear in detail thanks to the publication of statistics by Captain Vyacheslav Dondokov from Buryatia, who then headed the tactical group of the 42nd medical battalion of the Russian Federation in the relevant area. Only one tactical medical group of the enemy (stable point) received more than 1,100 wounded for a month. According to Ukrainian intelligence, there were at least 11 such groups in the Zaporizhzhia region. This means that in 2023, Russian troops lost more than 12,000 wounded there every month. Did Romanchuk try to improve the position of the fighters and resort to non-standard steps, continuously studying the situation on the line of contact? The most impressive discovery of the CNS analysts was that the -heroic- colonel-general, while in the position of head of an entire direction, did not show any interest in the affairs at the front. There is no exaggeration here. Romanchuk literally did not deal with the matters entrusted to him. The defense forces had full access to Romanchuk's personal computer and recorded everything he did when he used the device, as well as full access to the colonel general's mail and social media accounts. Romanchuk had a very peculiar occupation during working hours. Judging by the actions on his computer, the lion's share of time was spent choosing on the sites of ads for cottages and apartments for the needs of the family. Romanchuk also engaged in the selection of girls on the dating site for personal needs. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Mariupol they want to create a 50-meter monument to -aswabadityals-.

Title: mass bankruptcies and corporate defaults await Russia
Description: This is reported by /a> Foreign Intelligence Service of Ukraine. The number of loans with a dynamic rate, which critically depend on the discount rate of the Central Bank of the Russian Federation, is constantly increasing: at the end of 2023, their share was 44% of the total number of corporate loans, but by the end of 2024, it reached 53%. Economists close to the Russian government expect unsecured money issuance, explosive growth of inflation and the collapse of the ruble in the near future. The critical point of this scenario is considered to be mid-2025. In addition, the regulator's tight monetary policy creates risks of recession and transition to stagflation in the short term. The further situation may develop according to the -shock with a decline in production- scenario, which will be accompanied by mass bankruptcies and corporate defaults. Earlier ArmyInform reported , that the President thanked the Sicheslav paratroopers who are holding positions in the Pokrovsky direction.

Title: In Mariupol, they want to create a 50-meter monument -asvabaditilyam-
Description: Mariupol City Council informs about this. The head of the Russian Federation, Putin, commissioned the creation of a monument to the -liberators of Mariupol-. It is planned to be erected on the seashore, adding the Russian coat of arms. This is how the invaders are trying to glorify the killers who systematically destroyed the city in 2022, taking it under a three-month siege. As a result, at least 22,000 civilians died. It is important for the occupiers to impose a distorted version of events on children. Therefore, at the meeting of the society, they also announced the creation of specialized classes on -in-depth study of Russia's past-. They are trying to Russify the children and erase their Ukrainian identity. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that Ilyinka in Donetsk region is controlled by the Defense Forces of Ukraine.

Title: The enemy continues to strike Luhansk region with drones: 38 applications per day
Description: This reports the head of Luhansk OVA Artem Lysogor. The enemy's offensive was supported by aviation. Unguided aerial missiles struck Novoyehorivka and Serhiyivka. From artillery installations, the occupiers fired at Makiivka and Balka Zhuravka. They used 38 drones on the indicated section of the front. From bottom 28 - near Makiivka. Earlier ArmyInform reported , that an investigation into the murder of a local woman by the occupiers has been launched in Donetsk region.

Title: In Poltava Oblast, an enemy UAV attacked an industrial facility
Description: This was notified by the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. As a result of the shelling, a fire started at the facility, but there were no casualties. As of this morning, the rescuers extinguished the fire. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of November 14, the enemy /->attacked 59 Shahed-type attack UAVs and drones of an unspecified type from the area Kursk - Russian Federation. As of 8:30 a.m., 21 enemy UAVs were shot down in the Sumy, Kharkiv, Poltava, and Kyiv regions. 38 enemy drones were lost in location.

Title: An investigation into the murder of a local woman by the occupiers has been launched in Donetsk regi...
Description: This was reported by the Prosecutor General's Office. A woman was walking down the street when Russian soldiers opened fire on her. As a result of a shot from a small weapon, she died on the spot. Under the procedural leadership of the Donetsk regional prosecutor's office, a pre-trial investigation is being conducted into the fact of violation of the laws and customs of war, which is combined with intentional murder (Part 2 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). Currently, operational investigative actions are being conducted to establish all the circumstances of the tragedy and to identify the deceased. As reported by ArmyInform, the prosecutor's office launched an investigation into the alleged murder of a civilian committed by representatives of the armed forces of the Russian Federation in the Pokrovsky District. According to the media, this crime occurred after the capture of the village of Novooleksiiivka, near the city of Selidove in Donetsk region.

Title: In Kyiv, a law enforcement officer who was transporting men of military age to Hungary was exposed
Description: This is stated in message DBR. The impersonator used social networks to find clients who wanted to illegally leave for Europe and for $10,000, and offered them help in -solving the issue.- In particular, the law enforcement officer ordered two Kyiv citizens of draft age to leave packages with money in a designated place in Kyiv among garbage containers. Later, he met them in a car at another location and drove them to Mukachevo, where he called a taxi and explained to the driver how to take the men to the outskirts of one of the villages near the border with Hungary. From this village, the boys, following the instructions of a law enforcement officer, set off on foot towards the border. However, the border guards detained them and drew up reports on an attempt to cross the border illegally. The law enforcement officer was notified of the suspicion of illegal transportation of persons across the state border by a group of persons (part 3 of Article 332 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). The sanction of the article provides for punishment in the form of deprivation of liberty for a term of up to 9 years. At the request of the SBI, the court chose a preventive measure for him in the form of detention with the possibility of posting bail. During searches, cover license plates were found in the suspect's car.

Title: Air bombs and artillery shelling: details of yesterday's shelling of Kramatorsk and the district
Description: This was reported by a> in the Main Department of the National Police of the Donetsk region. In nearby Druzhkivka, a private house, a minibus, and a gas pipeline were damaged by an UAV strike. Russian troops attacked Kostyantynivka with three FAB-250 aerial bombs and artillery — four civilians were injured. 26 private houses, an administrative building, an enterprise, 4 power lines, two gas pipelines, and two civilian cars were damaged. In Predtechyn, a person was injured and a private house was damaged as a result of artillery fire. Russia dropped three UMPB D30SN bombs on Mykolaivka — three apartment buildings and an infrastructure object were destroyed. A private house was damaged in Pokrovsk as a result of a drone strike. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 11, the Russians twice /->hit Kramatorsk and the suburbs. Read more read in our report.

Title: In the basements under the civilians: locals are forced to live in buildings seized by the Russian m...
Description: The head of the planning department of the 13th brigade of operational assignment -Charter- told about this on the broadcast of the -Edyny Novyny- marathon Lieutenant Colonel Anton Baev of the National Guard of Ukraine. -The presence of civilians on the battlefield is always a problem for us, for the Defense Forces of Ukraine,- he said. The officer said that if there are civilians next to the soldiers of the occupiers, the fighters of the Defense Forces are forced to cease fire. On the other hand, the appearance of civilians in the combat zone does not pose any problem for the enemy. - Our enemy is not as humane as we are. Therefore, it is not an obstacle for him, but for us it is a very big obstacle. When we see the movement of the enemy from the drone and start using means to defeat him or use artillery - and when we see from the drone that a civilian (usually elderly people) comes out on the way or near the target where the enemy is located - then, accordingly , we understand that there is no question of any fire injury. We have to wait until either the civilian disappears or the enemy moves to another place, - explained the soldier. Moreover, the Russian occupiers deliberately and specifically use civilians as human shields. - Unfortunately, the enemy also knows that we treat our civilians this way. Sometimes it happens that [the enemy] resorts to vile acts, taking cover of civilians, settling in civilian houses. They settle and do not drive civilians out of their houses, they force them to live on, but they themselves settle in basements and in this way protect themselves, because they know that at this time nothing will fly into this house, - said Anton Baev. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that The defense forces destroyed the invaders , who tried to gain a foothold in Kupyansk.

Title: The President thanked the Sicheslav paratroopers who are holding positions in the Pokrovsky directio...
Description: This is stated in the message of the head of state in the telegram channel. The 25th separate Sicheslav Airborne Brigade has been on the frontline of Ukraine's defense since 2014. Sicheslav paratroopers are the only ones in Ukraine capable of parachuting almost in full force, together with equipment. Even before the full-scale invasion, the brigade gained considerable combat experience. Battles for Slovyansk, Krasny Liman, Donetsk airport, Avdiivka, Shakhtarsk, liberation of populated areas of Donbas. From February 24, 2022, the 25th Airborne Division is hitting the enemy no less decisively. The soldiers counterattacked in Kharkiv Oblast and liberated Izyum. Now they are fighting in the difficult Pokrovsky direction. -I thank the defenders for their service, for every position they took, no matter how difficult it was. Glory to all who fight for Ukraine!- said the President. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 13, our defenders repelled 40 attacks on the Pokrovsky direction. The enemy tried to advance in the vicinity of Sukha Balka, Promeny, Lysivka, Krutoy Yar, Hryhorivka, Dachenskyi, Myrolyubivka, Petrivka, Novooleksiivka, Pustinka.

Title: Ilyinka in Donetsk region is controlled by the Defense Forces of Ukraine — StratCom of the Armed For...
Description: This was reported by StratCom of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. On the outskirts of Ilyinka, battles with the enemy are constantly ongoing, but our units are firmly holding their positions. It is also reported that information about the alleged presence of Russian troops in the city of Kupyansk, Kharkiv Region not true. -We ask you to carefully check the information and trust only official sources,- - emphasized the StratCom of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 13, the Russian occupiers -hvyli/->made an attempt to break through our defenses in the Kupyansk direction. The enemy's assault groups attacked the positions of the Ukrainian defenders in four waves. In total, the enemy used about 15 units of equipment. In particular, tanks, armored combat vehicles and the UR-77 demining installation. Some of the Russian soldiers were dressed in uniforms of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: The Defense Forces named the reason that makes it difficult for the enemy to move in the Kharkiv reg...
Description: A representative of the communications service told about this on the air -Society.News- Volodymyr Degtyarev, Public Relations Officer of the 13th operational assignment brigade of NSU -Chartiya-. -The weather worsens and makes it difficult for the enemy to move, but at the same time it makes it difficult for both the enemy and us to use UAVs. They are trying to use this to restore their reserves,- he said. The spokesman explained that the units of the brigade constantly monitor such movement of the enemy, destroy his personnel and fortifications. -If we compare with October, when we destroyed 208 enemies, then in just two weeks of November, 40 occupiers were already destroyed and 75 wounded. And given their lack of evacuation, the wounded will turn into the dead,- he said. Volodymyr Degtyarev explained that Ukrainian units are keeping the logistics routes of the occupiers under fire control. In addition, the enemy has limited use of heavy equipment. -There have been no mass attacks for several weeks. We hit the enemy's hidden equipment. They mainly use cars or motorcycles to move,- he said. As reported by ArmyInform, enemy propaganda information that the enemy has allegedly gained a foothold in the city of Kupyansk, Kharkiv Region, not true. On November 13, the Russian invaders made an attempt to break through our defenses in the Kupyansk direction. The enemy's assault groups attacked the positions of the Ukrainian defenders in four waves. In total, the enemy used about 15 units of equipment. In particular, tanks, armored fighting vehicles and the UR-77 demining installation. Some of the Russian soldiers were dressed in uniforms of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: Fiery extraction - our drones showed how a damaged Russian armored personnel carrier gets rid of a b...
Description: The video was released on the battalion channel. a Russian armored personnel carrier with a landing party tried to break through to our positions at speed, but was hit and caught fire. By inertia, the armored vehicle continued to move, and Russian attack aircraft began to fall out of it, burning and smoking. Then there were also successful defeats. -All the armored vehicles of the next column of Russians in Kurshchyna were destroyed. Currently, the operation to destroy the remnants of the landing is underway. The battle is held by several brigades of the Defense Forces, cooperating harmoniously and effectively,- the battalion commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the 225th assault battalion showed na-kurshhyni/->results of the assaults, when the command of the Russians sent 5 assault columns one after the other along the same route, observing the methodical destruction of each.

Title: FPV application research, training programs for DELTA and -Nettles-: the first successes of the new ...
Description: About this reported in the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. During this time, its specialists: In general, specialists of the unit implement projects in 4 areas: training and education, collection and analysis of combat experience, development of concepts and their verification, as well as development of proposals for doctrines and standards. The unit was created as a prototype of the Center of Excellence of Robotic Operations (COE RO, Center of Excellence of Robotic Operations). -Modern warfare requires modern knowledge to create an asymmetric advantage at the front. The Best Practices Unit will help build this advantage. The expertise and suggestions of specialized specialists will help not only to make the work of systems and technologies more efficient, but also to create new tactics to deter Russian invaders,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko, Deputy Minister of Defense for Digitalization. The unit and its staff are actively working to provide Ukrainian soldiers with knowledge of the application of information and robotic systems to protect the country. Specialists of the division of advanced experience of robotic operations call for the cooperation of manufacturers of robotic systems for the joint development of the implementation of innovative solutions on the battlefield. E-mail for appeals: coero@cidtd.mil.ua

Title: Defense forces destroyed the invaders who tried to gain a foothold in Kupyansk
Description: This was announced by the head of the Countering Disinformation Center, officer of the Defense Forces Andriy Kovalenko. According to him, enemy units attempted to gain a foothold in the city, but Ukrainian defenders destroyed them. -As of this morning, the situation is under control of the Defense Forces,- Andriy Kovalenko emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 13, the Russian occupiers -hvyli/->made an attempt to break through our defenses in the Kupyan direction. The enemy's assault groups attacked the positions of the Ukrainian defenders in four waves. In total, the enemy used about 15 units of equipment. In particular, tanks, armored combat vehicles and the UR-77 demining installation. Some of the Russian soldiers were dressed in uniforms of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: Pro-Russian forces are preparing provocations to discredit TCC and SP in Europe
Description: These rallies are planned to be held on November 17 in Dublin and Berlin at the same time as actions of -good Russians- led by Yulia Navalna and Ilya Yashin -against Putin's war-. Therefore, it is possible that the Russians are behind the organization of these provocations and will make the necessary picture for the Russian media with -war-weary- Ukrainian protestors. took place in the capital of Ireland on October 27. Molfar Agency analysts have already identified of pro-Russian protesters who gathered in Dublin. These are separatists who fled Ukraine abroad and are now declaring a dictatorship in the country on social networks and calling international aid to Ukraine -sponsoring Zelenskyi-. that broadcast the narratives of Russian propaganda. Such public events are aimed at discrediting the TCC and SP, the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the state leadership and Ukraine in general.

Title: Here the bombs whistled and aha — our aviation hits the enemy's shelter
Description: The video was published on the Internet. The blow was inflicted on a large farm whose buildings the enemy used to store their equipment and live in personnel. 4 American light high-precision winged bombs GBU-39 (SDB) and one GBU-62 (JDAM-ER) were used for defeat.   As reported by ArmyInform, Ukrainian MiG-29 released eight high-precision GBU-39/B cruise bombs at the place of concentration of assault groups in the Orichiv direction.

Title: In Zaporizhzhia and Volyn, men were arrested who set fire to a relay cabinet and military vehicles
Description: This was reported to the SBU. Thus, in Zaporizhzhia, a 31-year-old drug addict was detained, who previously spent 6 years in prison for theft, and after his release was remotely recruited by the occupiers. According to their instructions, the recidivist set fire to a service car of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, which was undergoing maintenance after combat missions at the front. In addition, the person involved monitored the presence of personnel at the deployment locations of the Defense Forces. According to the available data, the Rashists tried to obtain this information in order to prepare new airstrikes on the city. The police detained the suspect during an attempt to set fire to another car. At the same time, the SBU conducted complex measures to secure the locations of the Defense Forces on the territory of the front-line city. An 18-year-old local resident was arrested in Volyn, who burned down a relay cabinet on a railway line near the regional center. He received such a task from a representative of the special services of the Russian Federation, who remotely engaged the young man to cooperate through Russian telegram channels in search of -easy- earnings. According to the revealed facts, both detainees were notified of suspicion (according to the crimes committed) under several articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: The perpetrators are in custody. They face life imprisonment with confiscation of property. Complex measures were carried out by SBU employees in Zaporizhzhia and Volhynia regions together with the National Police under the procedural guidance of regional prosecutors' offices.

Title: The occupiers launched an airstrike on Kostyantynivka: there are casualties
Description: This was notified in the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. As a result of enemy shelling, 4 people were injured, 25 private houses, an administrative building and an enterprise were damaged. Rescuers extinguished the fire in the residential building. The day before, Russian troops again struck the city of Kramatorsk. An enemy ammunition hit the territory of one of the general secondary education institutions of the city. As reported by ArmyInform, received injuries in Kherson Oblast as a result of Russian shelling on November 13 15 people. 410 shellings were recorded in the Zaporizhzhia region last day >.

Title: The Ministry of Defense codified the remote firing module
Description: reported this in MOU. A 7.62 mm machine gun and a control system unit with a battery and a camera are installed on the Pernacha turret. The operator controls the module from a safe shelter, using a remote control and FPV glasses, which are transmitted from a video camera. The Ministry of Defense reminded that manufacturers and developers of samples of weapons and military equipment, who have questions about the codification process, can contact the Main Directorate for Life Cycle Support of Weapons and Military Equipment by e-mail: mdalc@mil.ua. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the Main Directorate for Support of the Life Cycle of Weapons and Military Equipment of the Ministry of Defense (GU ZSZHC OVT) prepared for developers and manufacturers of a typical package of documents necessary for the codification of a wide range of OVT samples.

Title: Liquidation of the headquarters of the Russian Navy in Sevastopol: what will be the consequences for...
Description: He shared his thoughts on -We are Ukraine-. -The relevant officers are senior personnel. Given the position, these are the people on whom the organizational core of the entire structure rests. The chief of staff is a person who actually manages all processes,- said Dmytro Pletenchuk. He explained that the commander makes decisions, the general strategy, but all staff work rests with the chief of staff and it can be said that he is an irreplaceable person. -There may be many applicants for such a position, but there may not be people with the appropriate skills and experience. And considering that in the Russian army there is still a problem of cronyism, a component of corruption, such positions may go to people who are not professionals. Any similar cases are positive for us,- Dmytro Pletenchuk emphasized. The spokesman added that part of the command of the Russian fleet had already forcibly moved to Novorossiysk in the Krasnodar region of the Russian Federation. -If I were in their place, I would start to worry, of course. Yes, of course, some part of the leadership should already be in Novorossiysk, just as some families of servicemen have actually moved to Novorossiysk forcibly. Because in fact now both the fleet and the personnel are serving in Novorossiya and I cannot say with any guarantee where exactly their staff is located, but in any case, in the place of his colleagues, one should probably start looking around.- — noted Dmytro Pletenchuk. On November 13, it became known about the liquidation of the chief of staff of the 41st brigade of missile ships and boats of the Black Sea Fleet of the Russian Federation Valery Trankovsky. He died as a result of an explosion in a car in temporarily occupied Sevastopol. The Russian captain's legs were torn off by the explosion, he died from blood loss.

Title: Training of military sailors abroad: the Navy of the Armed Forces of the Ukrainian SSR revealed the ...
Description: About this on the air -We are Ukraine- said the spokesman of the Navy of Ukraine, captain 3rd rank Dmytro Pletenchuk. -Training is ongoing, many servicemen are studying abroad, we are talking about hundreds of people. We are mastering new types of equipment, including new ships,- said Dmytro Pletenchuk. He explained that these ships are not just new types of weapons specifically for Ukraine, they are also different in terms of service. -These ships were built for NATO countries. There, the structure and operation are built differently, the crew composition is different, and the ship service is organized differently,- the spokesman said. Dmytro Pletenchuk said that the learning process is long and begins with language courses. After that, individual training takes place, when military sailors master their specialty — communication, navigation, weapons, etc. As ArmiyaInform reported, the Hetman Ivan Mazepa corvette, built in Turkey, continues to successfully undergo state trials. During artillery fire corvet demonstrated excellent results, accurately hitting air, sea and land targets.

Title: From tanks to motorcycles: in the Kurakhiv direction, the enemy throws all available equipment into ...
Description: A representative of the press service of 79- Orest Drymalovskyi of the Tavrian Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -Our paratroopers are holding the defense in the southeast, in the Kurakhiv direction, maintaining the line of battle. This line has been unchanged for a long time in our area of ​​responsibility, despite the fact that the enemy has concentrated significant forces against us,- said Orest Drymalovskyi. According to him, the enemy carries out constant mechanized and infantry assaults, using a significant amount of equipment. -The enemy throws tanks, armored personnel carriers, infantry fighting vehicles into battle and tries to break through the defense of our brigade using motorcycles, buggies and other tactics. The goal is to break through a number of settlements to Uspenivka, but our paratroopers are firmly holding the defense,- the spokesman emphasized. In addition to assault attacks, the enemy actively uses aviation and artillery. -Effectiveness of enemy artillery remains extremely high. We record from 3 to 10 airstrikes per day carried out by KABs, which greatly complicates the situation, but our soldiers continue to maintain the defense,- added Orest Drymalovskyi. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 13, in the Kurakhiv direction, the occupiers mainnews&utm_medium=article&utm_campaign=traficsource->45 times they tried to break through Ukrainian defense lines. The enemy attacked in the areas of the settlements of Berestka, Illinka, Novoselidivka, Sontsivka, Kreminnaya Balka, Voznesenka, Novodmytrivka, Maksimilianivka, Dalnye, Antonivka, and Katerynivka

Title: Navy of the Ukrainian Armed Forces: enemy aircraft turned the Black Sea into a gray zone
Description: The spokesperson of the Navy of Ukraine, Captain 3rd rank Dmytro Pletenchuk. -There is a change in weather conditions, an important role is played by the fact that they put a large amount of the functionality of their ship-boat composition on aviation. From the composition of the Black Sea Fleet and not only,- said Dmytro Pletenchuk. He added that Ukraine informs its partners about the presence of Russian aircraft in the waters of the Black and Azov seas. -We are fighting this problem, the Navy is also involved in air defense when it comes to shooting down drones.- The water area that we freed remains a -grey zone- due to aviation, the Russians use the airspace to carry out strikes,- Dmytro Pletenchuk explained. As ArmyInform reported, in the Black and Azov seas as of November 14, enemy ships completely absent.

Title: Once 10 Russians went on an assault - a funny counter about the Russian infantry
Description: The video was released on November 14 on the battalion channel. -Another day passed under the sign of resets. Our aerial bombers dropped some on the heads of the occupiers!- - commented on the video in the battalion. As it should have been according to the plot, none of the enemy attack aircraft survived.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 4th mechanized battalion of the presidential brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytskyi every day make hundreds of ammunition for drones, mine -under the nose- of the occupiers and build targets underground cities.

Title: More than 400 shelling per day in Zaporizhzhia: consequences
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya Regional State Administration. The troops of the Russian Federation carried out an air strike on Biloghirya. 251 UAVs of various modifications attacked Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghir and Novodarivka. 16 shellings from anti-aircraft missiles covered Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka and Mala Tokmachka. 142 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Primorsky, Gulyaipol, Orikhov, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghir and Novodarivka. 38 reports were received about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. Civilians were not injured. As reported by ArmyInform, were wounded in Kherson Oblast as a result of Russian shelling on November 13 15 people.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Air defense forces shot down 21 attack UAVs, another 38 were lost to location
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As of 08:30, 21 enemy UAVs were shot down in the Sumy, Kharkiv, Poltava and Kyiv regions. 38 enemy drones were lost in location. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy lost almost 1,700 soldiers and more than 60 artillery systems. 161 combat clashes took place at the front during the day >, mostly in the Kurakhiv and Pokrovsky directions.

Title: 15 injured not in Kherson Oblast as a result of Russian shelling
Description: This reported the head of the Kherson Regional State Administration, Oleksandr Prokudin. Beryslav, Ponyativka, Stanislav, Tyaginka, Odradokam’yanka, Antonivka, Vesele, Kozatske, Mylove, Kachkarivka, Komyshany, Sadove, Tomyna Balka, Novovorontsovka, Tomarine, Bilozerka, Zelenivka, Inzhenerne and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes. the Russian military targeted the utility company and the local fire department; residential quarters of settlements in the region. In particular, a high-rise building and 7 private houses were damaged. Also, the occupiers vandalized an economic building, a garage, a car “fast” and private cars.

Title: Colombia presents — the Armed Forces prepares Latin American drones
Description: Photo preparation was made public on November 14 by the Luhansk operational-tactical group. The Colombian already has a base, but is retraining on the DJI Mavic drone, learning combat experience, how to work in the wind, how to bypass the enemy's EW, how to use the drone as efficiently as possible. -In any case, we show how we do it, some of our views, our features, especially in different sectors there are their own peculiarities, their own problems,- said the platoon commander with the call sign -Chile-. He admits that full wings have an advantage, they fly further, they see targets standing at a distance from the line of combat. But it is Mavik that provides information about what is happening a dozen meters from our infantry. Accordingly, having near-real-time intelligence on what the enemy is doing right in front of you makes it easier to make the right military decision. As reported by ArmyInform, 60 Czechs received permission to join the Armed Forces.

Title: 161 combat clashes took place during the day — the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine
Description: Operational information as of at 08.00 on November 14 was published by the General Staff of the ZSU . The enemy carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of the settlements of Basivka, Zhuravka, Yunakivka, Velyka Pisarivka, Odnorobivka, Kozacha Lopan, Liptsi, Pischane, Kivsharivka, Zagryzove, Novoosynovka, Kupyansk, Golubivka, Bohuslavka, Serhiivka, Ivanivka, Novoehorivka, Yampolivka, Terny, Siversk, Zvanivka, Mykolaivka, Chasiv Yar, Kramatorsk, Dachne, Katerynivka, Toretsk, Petrivka, Kostyantynivka, Pushkine, Sukha Balka, Myrnograd, Shevchenko, Kurakhove, Velyka Novosilka, Biloghirya, Zelene Pole, Novopil, Natalivka, Zaporizhzhia, Cossack Over the past day, missile troops and artillery of the Defense Forces have struck five strikes on areas of concentration of personnel and air defense systems, one on a control point, and two on enemy artillery systems, and another important enemy object was hit by aircraft. In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy carried out offensive and assault operations eight times in the areas of Vovchansk and Visoka Yaruga. The number of combat clashes per day in the Kupyansk direction reached 12. The defense forces repelled the attacks of the occupiers in the areas of Lozova, Kucherivka, Petropavlivka, Kolisnikivka, Zagryzovo, Kruglyakivka, and Pershotravnevo. In the Lyman direction, our troops stopped eight enemy attacks. The invaders concentrated their main efforts in the areas of Cherneshchyna, Zarichny, Novoyehorivka and Terni settlements. In the Kramatorsk direction, one skirmish took place in the Stupochky area. In the Toretsk direction, the enemy tried to advance seven times in the Toretsk and Nelipivka areas. 40 attacks, this number in the past day were repelled by our defenders in the Pokrovsky direction. The enemy tried to advance in the vicinity of Sukha Balka, Promeny, Lysivka, Krutoy Yar, Hryhorivka, Dachenskyi, Myrolyubivka, Petrivka, Novooleksiivka, Pustinka. Defense forces continue to restrain the enemy in the Kurakhiv direction. In the areas of the settlements of Berestka, Illinka, Novoselidivka, Sontsivka, Kreminnaya Balka, Voznesenka, Novodmytrivka, Maksimilyanivka, Dalnye, Antonivka, and Katerynivka, the occupiers tried to break through Ukrainian defense lines 45 times. Ten enemy attacks were stopped by our defenders in the areas of settlements of Rivnopil, Novopil, Trudove, Kostiantynopolske and Makarivka in the Vremivsk direction. Enemy units tried three times to advance in the directions of Novodanilivka and Novoandriivka in the Orihiv direction. In the Dnieper direction, the invaders unsuccessfully attacked the positions of our troops five times. The operational situation on the Volyn and Polissky directions has not changed significantly. No signs of formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. On the border with Chernihiv and Sumy regions, the enemy maintains a military presence, conducts reconnaissance and artillery fire. The Defense Forces of Ukraine continue to conduct operations in the Kursk direction, where the enemy has carried out twenty-eight airstrikes over the past day, using 40 guided air bombs, and Ukrainian defenders have also repelled thirteen enemy attacks. In general, the Russian invaders lost 1,690 people last day. In addition, Ukrainian soldiers destroyed 19 tanks, 51 armored combat vehicles, 64 artillery systems, three rocket salvo systems, one air defense vehicle, 54 UAVs of the operational-tactical level, four cruise missiles and 124 cars of the occupiers. -Join the Defense Forces! We will win together!-, - said the message of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy lost almost 1,700 soldiers and more than 60 artillery systems.

Title: To lie in the ground in Kurshchyna - our marines thinned out enemy assault groups
Description: The video of combat work appeared on November 14 on the brigade's channel. Assault groups of Russians were quickly identified and put to work. The enemy's attempts to hide in bushes or grass did not help: the process of producing -good Russians- continued. -We continue to stuff the enemy in Kurshchyna,- the marines commented on their video. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kursk region, a Russian infantry fighting vehicle tried to storm positions of the 36th Marine Brigade named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Bilinskyi.

Title: The enemy lost almost 1,700 soldiers and more than 60 artillery systems — General Staff of the Armed...
Description: This is evidenced by the data on the total combat losses of the enemy, which was published by on the morning of November 14 General Staff of the Armed Forces. Losses from 02/24/22 to 11/14/24 are estimated to be: Data under review… As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy used 115 KAB and more than 780 kamikaze drones.

Title: By zero - the enemy has hidden its ships in the Ukrainian seas
Description: This was reported by the Naval Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces as of 06:00 on November 14. There are 2 enemy ships in the Mediterranean Sea, 1 of which is a carrier of -Caliber- cruise missiles with a total firing of up to 8 missiles. During the day, in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: to the Black Sea - 3 vessels, of which 0 continued their movement in the direction of the Bosphorus Strait; to the Sea of ​​Azov - 3 vessels, of which 1 was moving from the Bosphorus Strait. Russia continues to violate the International Convention for the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, within a day the Kerch Strait is in the interests of the Russian Federation as many as 23 ships passed.

Title: The Ministry of Defense commented on the mobilization plan until February 2025
Description: The spokesman of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Lazutkin commented on these statements on the air of -Suspilne Novosti- -. -You have to understand, given the information, the Financial Times gives such numbers. Indeed, the mobilization will continue as long as Russian aggression continues,- noted Dmytro Lazutkin. As the spokesman noted, now the front line is more than 1,300 kilometers, where fierce battles are taking place everywhere. Therefore, Ukrainians who are part of the Defense Forces heroically fight for our land and people. -However, now we are dealing with an aggressor who will not stop. The enemy has already proven that there are no principles and rules for waging war for him, so Ukraine must be ready to fight back for a long time and build a defense system that will allow effective recapture of territories,- concluded Dmytro Lazutkin. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense commented on the proposal of disbandment of TCC and SP.

Title: Bradley demolishes the roof of armored personnel carriers - new footage of heavy battles in Kurshchy...
Description: The video of combat work appeared on November 14 on the brigade channel. Drops on infantry, hitting FPV drones in -armor-, using anti-tank mines, finally, American Bradley infantry fighting vehicles, which spectacularly worked on Russian armored personnel carriers and infantry. -One hundred lost -nedovins-, almost three dozen units of destroyed equipment and not a single successful battle for the 810th brigade of marines of the Russian Federation. Thanks to the coordinated work of the 95th brigade of the Ukrainian Army and with the help of neighboring units, the Ukrainian army destroyed the enemy on its territory,- the brigade commented on the video. The paratroopers thanked the 92nd Assault Brigade named after Kosh Ataman Ivan Sirk, the Special Operations Forces, the 80th Galician Airborne Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the 414th unit of the -Birds of Madyar- strike unmanned aerial systems battalion for their support and repulse of assaults and the destruction of the enemy.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 95th Polish Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces repelled massive assaults of the Russians, who threw a large number of armored personnel carriers into battle with landing party

Title: The enemy used 115 anti-aircraft missiles and more than 780 kamikaze drones — General Staff of the A...
Description: Operational information as of at 22.00 on November 13 was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces . In the Kharkiv direction, the occupiers carried out eight attacks during the day near Vovchansk and Visoka Yaruga. Three clashes are still ongoing. In the Kupian direction, the Defense Forces repelled 12 attacks. The enemy was active in the areas of Lozova, Kucherivka, Petropavlivka, Kolisnikivka, Zagryzovo, Kruglyakivka, and Pershotravnevo. Pišchane, Kivsharivka, Zagryzove and Bohuslavka were hit by airstrikes. Eight times, the enemy attacked in the Lymansky direction, tried to advance in the direction of Cherneshchyna, Zarichny, Novoyehorivka, and Terni. The enemy attacked Serhiivka, Novoyehorivka, Yampolivka and Terny with KAB and NAR. In the Kramatorsk direction, one skirmish took place in the Stupochky area. Siversk and Zvanivka were hit by KABs. The enemy tried seven times to penetrate our defense in the Toretsk direction. During the day, the occupiers attacked in the districts of Nelipivka and Toretsk. The enemy carried out airstrikes in the districts of Dachnoy, Toretsk, Mykolaivka, Petrivka, Kramatorsk and Kostiantynivka. In the Pokrovsky direction, since the beginning of the day, in the areas of Sukhoi Balka, Promeny, Lysivka, Krutoy Yar, Hryhorivka, Dachenskyi, Myrolyubivka, Petrivka, Novooleksiivka, Pustinka, our troops repelled 36 offensive and assault actions of the enemy. One of them is still ongoing. Our troops are taking measures to maintain the designated borders, and are retaliating fiercely. The enemy attacked Pushkina, Myrnograd, Shevchenko and Petrivka with KABs, and hit Sukhiya Balka with NARs. According to preliminary data, the enemy lost more than 400 people killed and wounded today, Ukrainian servicemen also destroyed two tanks, three armored combat vehicles, and ten units of automobile equipment. In addition, two tanks, eight units of automobile equipment were significantly damaged. At this time of the day, there are 40 combat clashes in the Kurakhiv direction. The invaders remain active, trying to advance in the areas of the settlements of Berestka, Illinka, Novoselidivka, Sontsivka, Kreminnaya Balka, Voznesenka, Novodmytrivka, Maksimilianivka, Dalnye, Antonivka, and Katerynivka. Two anti-aircraft missiles were dropped on Kurakhov. According to the available information, the enemy lost two tanks, three armored fighting vehicles, and thirteen units of motor vehicles today in this direction. One tank and three vehicles were also damaged. In the Vremivsk direction, the occupiers attacked ten times near the settlements of Rivnopil, Novopil, Trudove, Kostiantynopolske and Makarivka. Five attacks have already been repelled. In the Orihiv direction, our troops stopped three enemy attacks in the directions of Novodanilivka and Novoandriivka. The areas of Natalivka and Zaporizhzhia were attacked by four KABs. In the Dnieper direction, the situation has not undergone significant changes, no losses of positions and territories have been allowed. Ukrainian soldiers repelled five assaults by Russian invaders. At the same time, the enemy carried out an airstrike with twenty NARs on Kozatskyi.
